
1a1(mdo 'grel): rta 'bum sha li ho tras bsdus pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sha li ho tra ya yA ma shwA yurba d+ha sing ha ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ rta'i tshe'i rig byed sha li ho
1b2(mdo 'grel): tras bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
1b3(mdo 'grel): sman gyi bla bai DUrya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyab 'jug gi ni btsun mo'i mchog/ lha mo dpal mo rta yi mngal/ /
1b4(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal nas ni rta rnams kyi/ /tshe yi rig byed rtogs bshad bya/ /gang las gang phyir gang don yin/ /de dag
2a1(mdo 'grel): kun kyang brjod par bya/ /kha ba can gyi byang phyogs na/ /lha yi dbang po'i gnas 'dra bar/ /sha li ho tra drang srong che//
2a2(mdo 'grel): sbyin sreg byas nas 'dug pa'i tshe/ /legs thos thos pa phun tshogs ldan/ /bu yis pha la dris gyur pa/ /legs ldan chos rnams
2a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen/ /rta tshe'i rig byed mkhas lags na/ /rta rnams kyi ni gso ba 'di/ /ji ltar byung bar gyur pa lags/ /drang srong
2a4(mdo 'grel): gzi brjid chen po yis/ /de la mnyan par gyis zhes smras/ /sngon tshe rta rnams rang dgar ni/ /mkha' la rgyu zhing gnas byed cing//
2b1(mdo 'grel): zas dang spyod pa spyi dga' bar/ /de rnams rang dgar spyod pa yin/ /thams cad la yang lus kyi ni/ /goms pas nad ni byung ma gyur/ /gang nas brtsams te
2b2(mdo 'grel): nga yis bu/ /gzhon pa nyid du byas gyur pa/ /de nas brtsams te gnod byed pa'i/ /nad kun gyis ni gzir ba yin/ /de nas de la sems gdung skyes//
2b3(mdo 'grel): nga? yis dka' thub chen po byas/ /tshangs pa lha ni mnyes byas nas/ /de yi gso ba rnyed pa yin/ /zug rdu lus kyi gso ba dang/ /de bzhin cha byad nyid dang
2b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rte'u yi ni gso ba dang/ /dug gi rang bzhin sman dang ni/ /bcud len gdon nad gso ba dang/ /ro tsa byed pa brgyad pa yin/ /de ltar rta yi tshe'i rig
2b5(mdo 'grel): byed/ /'di ni yan lag brgyad du bshad/ /yan lag brgyad po 'di yi gnas/ /rgyas par bu yis mnyan par gyis/ /mdo yi gnas ni dang po ste//
3a1(mdo 'grel): de yi phyi ma gnyis pa yin/ /gsum pa 'dir ni lus yin la/ /bzhi pa nyid ni gso ba yin/ /lnga ba rte'u'i sman yin te/ /drug pa phyi ma'i phyi ma
3a2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /bya ba de dang de bstan pa/ /grub pa'i gnas ni bdun pa yin/ /gsang ba gnas ni brgyad pa ste/ /tshe yi rig byed bsdus pa yin/ /le'u'i rim pa nges pa ni//
3a3(mdo 'grel): gnas gnas su ni ngas bshad bya/ /tshe yi rig byed byung ba dang/ /de bzhin slob ma sbyang ba dang/ /nges pa'i tshig dang byung tshul dang/ /de nas mngal du chags gyur dang//
3a4(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin dang ni skye gnas dang/ /de bzhin rigs ni bzhi dag dang/ /yan lag thams cad brtag pa dang/ /bshad pa dang ni tshad gzhal dang/ /yan lag bcu yi cha dbye
3a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /sdug dang mi sdug shes bya dang/ /chad shes bya dang zas sbyor ba/ /mdzes dang mtshan gyi le'u dang/ /de bzhin kha dog shes bya dang/ /zhur mdongs dang ni thig
3b1(mdo 'grel): le brtag/ sha ra'i mdog ni bzang ngan dang/ /'dren ma rgyal po'i bzhon pa dang/ /mig brtag pa dang so brtag pa/ /gtsug dang na tshod shes bya dang/ /tshe shes pa dang bcas
3b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /dri dang skad sangs brtag pa dang/ /'gros dang lus 'phel cho ga dang/ /rgyug pa brtag dang gra ma can/ /nyes pa che dang snying stobs brtag/ gzi mdangs brtag dang rigs
3b3(mdo 'grel): brtag dang/ /ston ka pa dang nyo tshong pa bcas?/ /de ltar gnas ni dang po yi/ /le'u'i rim pa gnas pa yin/ /'dri ba chen po nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin sgo nga las byung dang/ /rmen bu'i le'u
3b4(mdo 'grel): gsum pa ste/ /nad shes bya ba rnam gsum dang/ /yid bde yid mi bde shes dang/ /rlung 'khyil 'khrul pa shes bya dang/ /rlung 'khyil btus pa zhes bya dang/ /de bzhin lto ba rgyas pa dang//
3b5(mdo 'grel): rtsub par 'khyil ba'i le'u dang/ /de bzhin gcin 'gags gso ba dang/ /ri dwags ltar 'khyil ma 'dres 'khyil/ /rlung gi dmu rdzing gso ba dang/ /de bzhin khrag gi gcin nad dang/ /ko ra du
3b6(mdo 'grel): shas gnod gyur dang/ /snum 'khyil ba dang rnam 'khyil ba/ /khrag 'khrugs nad ni gso ba dang/ /khrag 'khrugs nad gzhi bzhi las gyur/ /khrag 'khrugs rjes la gso ba dang/ /'theng
4a1(mdo 'grel): dang rkang nad gso ba dang/ /skyegs bu dbugs mi bde gso dang/ /dbugs mi bde ba lud pa can/ /sna rnag dang ni mngon par che/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan rims/ /'dus pa las gyur
4a2(mdo 'grel): rims gso dang/ /dus ni go bzlog las byung dang/ /snang ba las gyur rims dang ni/ /yid kyi rims ni gso ba dang/ /de bzhin 'khru ba mang po dang/ /sman kha'i gong bu'i sbyor ba dang/ /sbeg pa brtag pa'i le'u
4a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /de bzhin snga ma'i nad gso dang/ /gzhang byung ba yi gso ba dang/ /khrag dang mkhris pa gso ba dang/ /so lhag byung ba gso ba dang/ /'ug pa'i rkang 'dra'i le'u dang/ /gdug pas zin pa'i mtshan nyid
4a4(mdo 'grel): gso/ /smad pa'i mtshan nyid can le'u/ /dug gi shugs ni shes bya dang/ /de bzhin dug gis zin gso ba/ /dug mdangs phog pa zhes bya ba/ /gnyis pa'i gnas su bsdus pa yin/ /mngal chags zhes
4a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i le'u dang/ /de bzhin lus kyi rnam dbye dang/ /lus bskyed pa dang rtsa yi tshegs/ /yul dang tsha sogs bstan pa dang/ /'phel dang 'bri ba shes bya dang/ /ro drug gi ni bdag nyid dang/ /nad gi bdag
4a6(mdo 'grel): nyid can byung dang/ /bya dang bya min brtag pa dang/ /'dir ni zas skom tshogs dang/ /de bzhin ljang pa'i ro yi tshogs/ /gso ba'i yan lag dbang byas dang/ /long dang lkugs sogs bstan pa dang/ /de bzhin
4b1(mdo 'grel): skrang pa gso pa dang/ /gzhan yang rma gnyis le'u dang/ /zug rdu khong rlag gdon pa dang/ /zug rdu dbyung ba'i le'u dang/ /sbugs kyi rma ni gso ba dang/ /de bzhin chags grugs gso ba dang/ /chu bur gso ba nyid dang ni/ /rgod ma'i mtshan nyid brtag
4b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /rlung nyen mngal gyi nyes pa dang/ /mngal du shi pa'i nad gso dang/ /ba la'i til mar dang bcas pa/ /le'u'i rim pa 'chad rnams kyis/ /gnas ni gsum pa yin par bshad/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u ni/ sems khong chud par
4b3(mdo 'grel): byed pa dang/ /ni ra ka yi nad gso dang/ /rkan nang bye ba med pa nyid/ /a ba taM ka'i gso ba dang/ /lce rengs sna nad 'dzag byed dang/ /sna nad gal lag gso ba dang/ /mgo nad rlung las gyur pa dang/ /de bzhin mkhris pa las gyur dang/ /bad kan
4b4(mdo 'grel): las gyur khrag las gyur/ /'dus pa las gyur mgo nang dang/ /glo bur srin bu las gyur pa/ /de bzhin rna ba'i nad gso dang/ /mchi ma 'dzag pa gso ba dang/ /rlung nad pa la sha nyid dang/ /de bzhin bkol nyes nad nyid dang/ /
4b5(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang brang tsha ba yi nad/ /tshe'u tsha'i nad ni gso ba dang/ /gzugs 'khums gzugs gyod nad gso dang/ /rmig pa rdul can nad gso dang/ /sbal pa tsha bar bshad pa dang/ /mtshan ni 'chang bar gyur sogs dang/ /rlig pa bskrangs pa
4b6(mdo 'grel): gso pa dang/ /de bzhin rlig 'bras g.yos pa dang/ khrag las gyur pa'i rlig nad dang/ /de bzhin mkhris pa las gyur dang/ /bad kan las gyur snga ma'i nad/ /sna rengs de bzhin rgyab rengs dang/ /lto ba gzhong 'dra'i nad gso dang/ /mtshu skrangs nad
4b7(mdo 'grel): ni gso ba dang/ /rlung nad the? ba lta bu dang/ /mkhris nad sprang bu lta bu dang/ /ri dags can dang ri dags bla la/ /chu 'dzin ces bya'i nad dang ni/ /de bzhin snying nad rlung gyur dang/ /mkhris pa las gyur snying nad dang/ /gzhan yang bad kan can
5a1(mdo 'grel): snying nad/ /srin bu las gyur snying nad dang/ /rlung gi gzer dang lkog ma'i nad/ /snum bcos nyes ba'i nad dang ni/ /lan tshwa'i sbyor nyes chad blud nyes/ /de bzhin 'bru zos nyes pa dang/ /'o ma 'thung nyes chu 'thung nyes//
5a2(mdo 'grel): sbubs las blud ni nyes pa dang/ /gdul nyes gzhan pa bos bsnad? dang/ /lud pa gso dang mdzad nad gso/ /gyen 'byung smon nad gso ba dang/ /dregs dang nyes pa gso ba dang/ /smyo nad gso dang mtshan mo bcom/ /gzhang 'brum gso dang
5a3(mdo 'grel): rdo gso dang/ /de bzhin dbyen pa gso ba dang/ /skrangs nas gso ba nyid dang ni/ /gzhan yang ri mo can nad gso/ /yan lag phyogs gcig nad lcod can/ /mgo 'khor chu yi dmu rdzid dang/ /chu lha'i gdon ni gso ba dang/ /mig can 'gegs
5a4(mdo 'grel): pa can gso dang/ /mig snang? mig snang sgo nga can/ /chu bur can dang sngo mtshan nyid/ /ling teg? can dang mchim 'dzag/ lto nad ma 'dres mthong ba nyams/ /mig dmar dang ni muny+dza can/ /muny+dza'i dra ba can gso dang/ /thal mo byed pa can gyi
5a5(mdo 'grel): nad/ /khrag 'khrugs pa yi nad gos dang/ /tshigs su rma byung thogs 'bab dang/ /gnye'u rengs dang sbos nas gso/ /'khru ba gso ba zhes bya ba/ /gnas chen bzhi pa gso ba yin/ /rte'u'i gdon ni bstan dang bshad 'khru dang de bzhin rimS dang ni//
5a6(mdo 'grel): g.yan pa lkog nad sha lu ka /khong pa'i srin nad gcin srir bcas/ /bong bu can dang rlig rlugs dang/ /gcin nad ze'u zhes bya ba/ /bkres pa nyen dang lug pa gso/ /zas byed dang ni ro hi ni/ /ri mo can dang spal pa 'dra/ /mes tshig tshigs
5a7(mdo 'grel): nad gcin dmar gso/ /yid mi bde dang rna ba'i nad/ /so nad dang ni mdzing? pa'i nad/ /'gram nad lce yi nad bcas dang/ /rmig nad sna nad bcas pa dang/ /rmig pa'i nad dang dbyig pa'i nad/ /sems 'khrul pa dang rdul nad bcas/ /sbrul gyiS?
5b1(mdo 'grel): zin dang mes tshig gso/ /de bzhin chag grugs gso pa ni/ /rte'u'i nad rnams gso ba yin// rta khangs ni brtag pa dang/ /khang pa'i lha rnams mchod pa dang/ /de bzhin gdon ni bsal ba dang/ /dpal 'phel ba zhes bya ba dang/ /rta rnams
5b2(mdo 'grel): rjes su bsrung ba dang/ /rnam rgyal rta ni dbang bskur dang/ /mche ba chags pa'i lhas brtan dang/ /ltas kyi mtshan nyid gzhan bstan dang/ /zhi ba skyed par byed pa rnams/ /drug pa'i gnas su btus pa yin/ /dang por rjes btung cho ga ste/ /
5b3(mdo 'grel): de 'og lan tshwa'i cho ga yin/ /snum dang lan tshwa chad dang 'bru/ /lo ma chu dang sprus las byung/ /gdon ba'i nang ni bdun po yi/ /nad gzhi gso bar bcas bstan dang/ /mar blud dug gi cho ga dang/ /dur byid kyi ni til mar dang/ /don grub ces bya'i
5b4(mdo 'grel): til mar dang/ /me bca' ? las kyi cho ga dang/ /mas btang cho ga bstan pa dang/ /de bzhin brta ba'i las bstan dang/ /snum blud pa yi yon tan dang/ /ro tsar byed pa bstan pa dang/ /sbubs las gyur ba'i nad gso pa'i/ /bya ba bstan
5b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i gnas 'di ni/ /bdun pa grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /dang po ri mo las tshe brtags/ /de rjes nad kyis 'chi ltas bstan/ /nad med 'chi ltas bstan pa dang/ /pho nya la sogs ltas bstan dang/ /phye ma rnams gyi le'u dang/ /sman mar dang
5b6(mdo 'grel): ni til mar dang/ /de bzhin sman khu'i le'u dang/ /ma zhu sbyang ba'i sbyor ba dang/ /so sor btung dang rjes su btung/ /mas btang las kyi cho ga dang/ /sna sman rnams ni bstan pa dang/ /'jam rtsi sna tshogs bstan pa dang/ /de bzhin phye yi lde khu
5b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /thal sman lan che'i cho ga dang/ /'bras bu gsum dang a ru ra/ /gu gul sgog skya'i cho ga dang/ /ming la brtag pa dang bcas pa'i/ /khur bstan pa yi le'u dang/ /de bzhin skyes bu dang bcas ba'i/ /shing rta dang sbyar cho ga dang// // 
6a1(mdo 'grel): sngags dang bya ba'i sbyor bdag/ mchog tu gsang ba nyid yin no/ /de ltar gsang ba mchog gyur ba'i/ /gnas kyi le'u yin zhes bya/ /gnas brgyad yan lag brgyad dang bcas/ /rta yi tshe'i rigs skyed mchog/ ma lus
6a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni tshangs ba che/ /zhal bzangs bzhi dang ldan pas byin/ /legs ldan sha li ho ta yis/ /de skad rjes bstan smras pa yin/ /sha la'i ho tra'i gnas dang po las tshe'i rig byed byung ba'i tshul bstan pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dang bo'o// //
6a3(mdo 'grel): de nas sha li ho tra yis/ /legs thos la ni yang smras pa/ /slob ma sbyang ba zhes bya ba/ /legS thos de bzhin nga la nyon/ /slob ma rigs bzang yan lag tshang/ /mtshan ldan dad par bcas pa bya/ /bram ze sogs gsum gang yang
6a4(mdo 'grel): rung/ /gtsang ma bla mas slob du gzhug/ rta la shin tu brtsebs na/ /bram ze las ni slob ma bzung/ /skye dgu skyong la brtson pa yi/ /rgyal rigs slob mar bzung bar bya/ /dmangs rigs rnams ni gso ba yis/ /'tsho ba tshol bas
6a5(mdo 'grel): de yang bzung/ /nyi ma byang 'gro bsod nams dus/ /gza' las mig dmar nyi ma dang/ /chos drug brgyad dang lnga dang bcu/ /ches bzhi tshes ni bcu bzhi dang/ /tshes gcig dang ni tshes dgu ni/ /rig pa rtsom la spang bar bya/ /ches grangs
6a6(mdo 'grel): lhag ma shis pa yin/ /gzhan yang skar ma nga las nyon/ /gang zhig 'jam dang myug ba dang/ /g.yo dang gdug dang smin drug dang/ /tha skar ma gtogs mi rnams kyi/ /rig slob rtsom la rtag tu shis/ /skar ma yang ni 'di rnams dang/ /
6a7(mdo 'grel): thang cig kyang ni shes pa dang/ /gza' ni ma smad pa rnams dang/ /chu tshod bzang la brtsam bar bya/ /de lta'i dus ni shes pa la/ /slob ma gos gcang bgos pa dang/ /bram ze mchod phyir thogs dkar btags/ /dri ni dkar bos byugS pa
6b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /phreng ba dkar btags mkhas pa dang/ /gos dkar bgos pa mdun du gzhug/ de bzhin rgyal rigs rnams kyang ni/ /cha lugs thams cad dmar ba dang/ /de bzhin dmangs rigs thams cad ser/ /lha rnams thams cad byed du gzhug/ bram ze
6b2(mdo 'grel): yis ni tshangs pa mchod/ /rgyal rigs kyis ni brgya byin te/ /dmangs rigs kyis ni rlung lha mchod/ /bye brag med par kun gyis ni/ /dbyangs can de bzhin dpal mo dang/ /sha li ho tra mchod par bya/ /de rnams la ni me tog spos/ /kha zas phun
6b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyis mchod nas/ /de yi 'og tu sa bi tra/ /me la mar gyis tshim par bya/ /bram ze rnams la kha zas sbyin/ /de nas bu gcig yon bcas pas/ /slob dpon la ni yon byin te/ /sa phyogs dag cing brgyan pa ru/ /slob ma nub tu bltas nas
6b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /slob dpon shar du bltas te brjod/ /rtag tu las la brtson pa yis/ /bu khyod kyis ni bslab par bya/ /srog gis kyang ni bla ma dag/ mnyes par bya na nor ci smos/ /bla ma bram ze sa bdag la/ /bu yis 'khu bar mi bya ste/ /khyod kyis rta rnams
6b5(mdo 'grel): la yang ni/ /'khu bar nam yang mi bya'o/ /nga yi kha las gang thos pa/ /de ni bu yis 'bad de slobs/ /de bzhin phongs par gyur kyang ni/ /glegs bam las ni slob mi bya/ /glegs bam las ni gang slabs te/ /'jig rten gnyis ka dag
6b6(mdo 'grel): dang 'gal/ /dang po 'di dag thams cad ni/ /gso ba bu yis slab par bya/ /ma slabs pa ni spangs nas kyang/ /gang smras 'di ni mnyan par gyis/ /bco lnga gnyis dang bcu gzhi gnyis/ /chas brgyad bcas dang sa 'gul dang// bu btsas shing
6b7(mdo 'grel): drung nyid dang ni/ /mi btsang bas ni khyab gnas dang/ /bdag nyid mi gtsang ba nyid dang/ /nad kyis sems ni rmongs pa dang/ /rlung ni chen po rgyu ba dang/ /de bzhan 'brug sgra sgrogS ba'i che/ /'di bslab ba ni spang byas la/ /bu yis bstan bcos
7a1(mdo 'grel): bzung bar bya/ /bstan bcos bzung bar byas nas ni/ sta bcos don ni bzung bar gyis/ /bstan bcos don ni bzung byas nas/ /de 'og las la goms par gyis/ /bstan bcos shes pa 'ba' zhig la/ /las kyi bya ba rtsam
7a2(mdo 'grel): mthong ba/ /gso ba'i las la 'jug par ni/ /de dag gnyis gdon med 'gyur/ /gso pa'i las la 'jug pa ni/ /khyod kyis rta ni rtag tu skyongs/ /mi zad nang kyis nyen na yang/ /khyod kyis spang bar mi bya'o/ /rta gang gsor ni mi rung ba/ /de yang
7a3(mdo 'grel): rigs pas gso bar bya/ /ma gsos na ni nges par 'chi/ /gsos kyang nges pa med gyur pa'i/ /nad kyis gdungs par gyur pa gang/ /nang ni gzhan la mgo bar 'gyur/ /bstan bcos las de spang bar bshad/ /spang tshul de yang nga
7a4(mdo 'grel): las nyon/ /de ni rta bres las ring bar/ /bsrungs ma dang bcas gzhag par bya/ /na ba'i rta ni gang rung yang/ /gtan spang ba ni rigs ma yin/ /ma dang sdeg dang rgas pa'i rta/ /gtan spong bram ze gsod dang mtshungs/ /rta ni mtshan nyid ngan
7a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /nyo ba'i dus su blang mi bya/ /gang zhig rang gi khyim du skyes/ /bram ze gzhan yul ba la sbyin/ /ltas ngan byung bar gyur na ni/ /'di nyid sbyin par btang bar bya/ /mi 'tshe rab ni chos kyi mchog/ sems can la rtag brtse bya yin/ /de bas
7a6(mdo 'grel): ci tsam gso nus ba/ /de tsam zhig ni bzhag par bya/ /bde bar 'dzag? par nus gyur las/ /lhag par 'jog pa 'bad mi bya/ /rta ni sdug bsngal bar bzhag na/ /chos don 'dod ba 'joms par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rgyal po'i sa skyong ba'o/ /
7a7(mdo 'grel): bya ba rta la rag las bas/ /de la khyed kyis gus bya zhing/ /de bzhin slob dpon bla ma dang/ /bram ze ba lang la gus bya/ /des ni khyed kyis dpal 'thob 'gyur/ /de las gzhan du byed ni/ /ltung las nye bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /dmyal
7b1(mdo 'grel): ba ldar? ni btung ba dang/ /des par ldan pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dam pa'i lam la gnas na ni/ /grags dang bsod nams tshe ring dang/ /chos don 'dod pa ma lus pI/ /dpal mchog 'bad ba med par 'thob/ /de skad brjod nas slob ma yis/ /khas slangs
7b2(mdo 'grel): de rjes slob dpon gyis/ /dus shis pa la ma yengs par/ /slob ma de ni slob du bzhug/ de'i 'og tu rgyun tu ni/ /mkhas pa rtag tu brtson pa yin/ /bya ba ci bzhin rdzogs par du/ /slob ma de ni slob du gzhug/ de ltar rig pa byin pa yis/ /bla mas
7b3(mdo 'grel): slob ma bslabs pa yin/ /slob dpon dang ni slob ma dag/ 'dod 'jo ba ltar zad med 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo gnas las slob ma spyad pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas sha li ho tras bu/ /legs thos la ni yang
7b4(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ /gang phyir 'di ni dpal mo'i bu/ /de phyir mchog tu bkra shis yin/ /gzhan yang rta yi mchod sbyin la/ /rta ni dgos pa nyid yin pas/ /de bas shin tu dag byed de'ang/ /'di ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /ri dags dang ni thag rings
7b5(mdo 'grel): 'gro/ de bzhin g.yul gyi las rnams la'ang/ /rgyal po rgyal par byed pa'i rgyu/ /rta las mchog gyur yod ma yin/ /rta yi mchod sbyin dag la ni/ /skye dgu ri bdag gis longs spyod cig /de bas mchod sbyin thams cad la/ /de ni
7b6(mdo 'grel): spang bya nyid yin no/ /de phyir shin tu gtsang bas na/ /kun la rjes su gnang ma yin/ /de phyir tshangs pa ma gtogs pa/ /thams cad kyi ni zas ma yin/ /rta yi mchod sbyin las lhag pa'i/ /dag byed mi la yod min pas/ /rta ma gtogs par
7b7(mdo 'grel): sa gsum na/ /bkra shis mchog gzhan yod ma yin/ /rna can myur 'gro lam las rgyal /'gros legs 'grog byed la sogs dang/ /mgyogs dang mgyogs? 'gro myur 'gros can/ /dpal mo'i bu yang bshad pa yin/ /'jig rten na ni sna che bar?
8a1(mdo 'grel): de ni sna can zhes byang bshad/ /rtag tu 'gro bas mgyogs 'gro yin/ /lam du rgyal bas lam las rgyal/ /'gros legs ldan pas 'gros can yin/ /dbang med 'khyer bas 'phrog byed de/ /las rnams rdzogs par byed
8a2(mdo 'grel): nus pas/ /las rdzogs zhes ni tshangs pas bshad/ /mgyogs pa dang ni 'gyogS 'gro dag /de bzhin myur 'gro can zhes ba/ /de ni mgyogs pa kho nar bshad/ /'di dag nges tshig tshul yin no/ /rta ni dpal mo'i bu yin pas/ /dpal mo'i bu
8a3(mdo 'grel): zhes bshad pa yin/ /mtshan dang rigs ni bzang ba dang/ /dpa' bos gzhon zhing byang ba yis/ /rta ni gang gis gzhi dag/ ma lus pa las rgyal bar nus/ /mtshan thogs pa yis mi thub pa'i/ /gnas der stobs che ba yi brtas/ /'phral du
8a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal par nus ma yin/ /de phyir khyed kyis de la ni/ /shin tu gus shing brtsa bar bya/ /rgyal po sman pa'i chos don 'dod/ /phun tshogs pa la'ang gzhan las min/ /sha'i ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las nges pa'i tshig gi le'u ste gsum ba'o// //
8a5(mdo 'grel): sha la ho tra blo gros che/ /rta yi gnas na 'dug pa la/ /legs thos thos pa phun tshogs pas/ /slar yang phal dris gyur pa/ /rta ni ci ltar byung bar gyur/ /mchod sbyin 'tsham pa pa ci ltar gyur/ /de ni dang por rgyal po dag/ gang gi gzhon pa nyid
8a6(mdo 'grel): du gyur/ /de yi rigs bzhi ci lta bu/ /de lta bur ni ji ltar gyur/ /ci yi phyir ni de 'drar gyur/ /de dag shes par 'tshal lags so/ /de yi tshog ni thos pa dang/ /sha la ho tras smras gyur pa/ /'di na rgyal ba'i chos kyi mchog/ sa rnams
8a7(mdo 'grel): yongs su sbyor ba yin/ /de yang dpung gis byed par nus// dpung gis mchog ni rte rnams yin/ /de phyir rang don la mkhas pa'i/ /rgyal po'i chos don 'dod don du/ /yong ye rnam pa thams cad du/ /'bad de rta rnams bsrung bar bya/ /chos dang
8b1(mdo 'grel): grags 'dod sman ba ni/ /bstan bcos mkhas gyur pas kyang bsten/ /de bas de rnams lha dang ni/ /mi ni ji ltar byung ba bshad/ /rigs dang nye ba'i rigs dang tshe/ /na tshod shis dang mi shis dang/ /gtsug dang gdong dang thig le dang/ /'tshar dang 'gros kyi
8b2(mdo 'grel): rim pa dang/ /mtshan ngan gnyen po mtshan khung dang/ /'byung dang bzhon pa'i bya ba dang/ /nang med nang ni rgyas ba dang/ /na ba rnams kyi sman dang ni/ /de bzhin sman ni byung ba yi/ /go rim ji bzhin nyid dang ni/ /spu mdog mdog 'dres khyad par dang/ /spu mdog
8b3(mdo 'grel): dag dang mig dag dang/ /rang bzhin snying stobs dag dang ni/ /ston ka skyes pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /'di dag thams cad mdor bsdus nas/ /khyed la legs par bshad par bya/ /lha rnams kyis ni mngal skyes dang/ /mngal med 'byung ba gnyis su bshad//
8b4(mdo 'grel): sngon che 'jig rten zhig gyur cing/ /'jig rten 'di ni med pa'i tshe/ /'byin byed me la sbyin sreg ni/ /byas pa dang por tshangs pa dang/ /rta pho de rjes rgod ma mchog /rang gi skye gnas dag tu bskyed/ /gzhan yang skye dgu'i bdag bo yis/ /mchod sbyin la
8b5(mdo 'grel): ni tshangs pa la/ /mchi ma byung ba dang la mo'i ni/ /dga' bas snying rjes sbyar bas blangs/ /de yi yan lag las byung ste/ /rta rnamS bram ze'i rigs sogs gyur /kha dang dpung pa brla gnyis dang/ /rkang pa gnyis las go rim bzhin/ /g.yas g.yon
8b6(mdo 'grel): las ni pho mo ste/ /tshangs pa las rta de ltar skyes/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i tshe/ /rta dang bdud rtsi lhan cig byung/ /ngo ming u tsa sra ba ste/ /sgra ni sprin chen lta bu yin/ /rgyu mtsho de las nam mkha' la/ /shugs kyis rnam par 'gro ba na/ /lha min stobs
8b7(mdo 'grel): dang lha 'khrugs pas/ /phyi rkang gnyis ni gzung bar gyur/ /stobs chen stobs ldan gyis drangs pas/ /dpyi ni? cung thad nyams par gyur/ /de bas lha rnams da dung ni/ /dbyi ni myur bar mi 'degs shing/ /de la sa bon rkang pa ni/ /phyi ma des kyis ?
9a1(mdo 'grel): bar 'degs/ /tshangs pa'i bur gyur gtum po ni/ /smos pa yin ni 'ug par gyur/ /yid 'ong yid kyis mchod sbyin ni/ /ri dags mor gyur de nyid 'dus/ /de las sgong sna tshogs pa/ /du ma byung bar gyur pa yin/ /lte ba
9a2(mdo 'grel): man chad mes gdungs ba'i/ /rdul ni thal bar 'dzag gyur pa/ /de las kyang ni kha dog pa rnams/ /tha dad bod po bong mor 'gyur/ /sgra skad rtsub cing rno bdag /rang bzhin rtsub cing rkang pa rtsub /de yang rta dang lhan cig byung/ /skye dgu'i bdag gi gnas
9a3(mdo 'grel): na 'dug /de nas de dag rmongs pa yis/ /de yi sbyin sreg khang pa brlag/ des ni la bsad dang bcngs/ /sgro bcang rtswa ni za ba dang/ /lha dang mi yi bzhon pa ni/ /nyid gyur cig ces smod pa btag /rta de yid ni khums gyur nas/ /skye dgu'i
9a4(mdo 'grel): bdag la gsol ba btab/ /de nas de las mgu gyur nas/ /mchog 'di thob par gyur pa yin/ /rta yi mchod sbyin la bsad dang/ /g.yul du bsad par gyur ba dang/ /legs par sbyin pa btang ba na/ /bsod nams khyed kyis thob gyur cig/
9a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du ni yon rnams kyis/ /mchog nyid du ni rta gyur cig/ dad pas dge sbyong bram ze la/ /rta rnams byin par gyur na ni/ /rta yi ba spu ji snyed par/ /lha yul du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /sbyin ba btang pa'i rta yang ni/ /'gro ba'i mchog tu gyur ba
9a6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de nas skye dgu'i bdag po yis/ /tshig gis 'dus nas kha ba can/ /sha li ho tra la 'khur zhing/ /drang srong rnams dang lhan cig brtse/ /stobs ldan u tsa sra ba ni/ /zhon nas lha rnams gzir bar byed/ /lha kun mngon mtho 'dod pa yis/
9a7(mdo 'grel): sha li ho tra la gsol btab/ /de nas lha la bzhon pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byin/ /zla ba la dkar lha chen la/ /ljang khu khyab 'jug la rta ser/ /mrgad? mdog 'dra nyi ma la/ /me lha la dmar gshin rje nag/ pad+ma dag pa 'dra chu lha
9b1(mdo 'grel): la// snga dang khra bo tha skar gyi/ /bu gnyis dmar po rlung lha la/ /lha rnams gzhan la sna tshogs la/ /rang rang ji ltar dga' bar ni/ /'di 'dra yid 'phrog byed pa phyin/ /lhag ma'i rta ni skye dgu'i bdag /yid ces bya bas blangs nas ni/ /de yis mi yi
9b2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po las/ /ci rigs par ni bgos te byin/ /bshog pa bcad bas de rnams ni/ /na gyur slar yang me yis bsregs/ /nad gdungs sha la'i ho tra la/ /'khus par gyur te khro pa yis/ /'chi ba bcad nas stobs kyis ni/ /de nyid log ba
9b3(mdo 'grel): bza' snyam na/ /de tshe drang srong mi snang gyur/ /de nas rta rnams zos snyam nas/ /dga' bas rta spangs 'byin cing snom/ /de phyir rta rnams da dung yang/ /rta spangs btang nas snom par byed/ /skye dgu'i bdag gi khyim rlag che/ /kaha zer bas ha yar
9b4(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /bya ltar bshog pa mgyogs 'gro bas/ /mgyogs 'gro zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /lam rdzogs mgyogs pas byed pa ni/ /'phrog pa 'tshor ba nyid la'ang bya/ /lha rnams kyis ni rta byung ba/ /rnam pa bzhi ste du ma'ang yin/ /bong bu rgod ma
9b5(mdo 'grel): la dre'u/ /bong bu bas ni bzad bar 'dod/ /dre'u las skyes ki na yin/ /de las skyes pa ki sad ta/ /ki sad ta'i bu chu bur can/ /chu bur can bu bong bur gyur/ /rang dang rta yi skye gnas te/ /bong bu'i skye gnas gnyis su 'dod/ /bong bu dang ni rta sogs la/ /
9b6(mdo 'grel): lugs su 'byung dang lugs las ldog/ de ltar rigs kyi dbye ba ni/ /go rim bzhin du brjod ba yin/ /rta rnams kyi ni 'byung ba dag/ slar yang 'od chen bka' stsol cig/ 'o ma'i rgya mtsho las byung nyid/ /thams cad shes par 'tshal lags so/ /bu yis
9b7(mdo 'grel): de ltar dris ba dang// sha li ho tras smras pa ni/ /skye dgu dang po byung ba'i tshe/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten bde gnas gyur/ /de rjes lha dang lha min gyi/ /'jig rten kun la tshangs pa yis/ /'jig rten thams cad khyab byed pa'i/ /skom gyis gdung ba nyid du byas/ /
10a1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa yi srog chags rnams/ /slar yang rgyug cing 'gro bar byed/ /lha dang lha min sha za dang/ /lto 'phyi srin bu de rnams kyang/ /stobs dang ldan pa'i skom gyis ni/ /gdungs pas nye bar zin par gyur/ /lha dang lha
10a2(mdo 'grel): min kha zas dang/ /mal stan la ni dga' med gyur/ /de rnams da ltar sems pa na/ /de yi tshe na blo skyes pa/ /gang 'di chu yi snying por ni/ /gnas der bdag cag skom sel gyur/ /de nas ri bo man dang/ /grags ldan srubs shing nyid du
10a3(mdo 'grel): byas/ /klu'i rgyal mtshan mdza' yas ni/ /srub thag tu ni yang dag sbyar/ /der ni phyogs gcig lha rnams te/ /phyogs gcig tu ni lha min gnas/ /srub thag 'dren cing mtsho chen ni/ /'jigs pa'i sgra rnams bsrubs pa na/ /mtsho chen
10a4(mdo 'grel): der ni lha dang ma'i/ /sman ni rtsub lo ma dang/ /'o mar bcas pa bsdus nas ni/ /thams cad cug pa nyid du gyur/ /gzi brjid che zhing gzi brjid can/ /ro la sogs pa 'byung zhing dge/ me tog ser dang go srid gi/ de bzhin sor mo
10a5(mdo 'grel): la spyod dang/ /mdangs ldan jo ti sa ra dang/ /'tsho byed 'chi ba gso byed dang/ /de bzhin rma 'tsho byed la sogs/ /gzhan yang tshangs pas gang sprul pa'i/ /bcu dang mthu stobs bsam mi khyab/ /sman rnams mtsho chen der bcug ste/ /rgya
10a6(mdo 'grel): mtsho? srubS par gyur pa na/ /de tshe dang po kho nar ni/ /dpal mo la sogs byung bar gyur/ /gang gis nang par brjod na ni/ /rmi ngan la sogs 'jigs byed ba'i/ /dge ba zhes bya'i rin po che/ /brgyad ni chu las byung bar gyur/ /nyi ma gzhon
10a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i shing rta ni/ /'jig pa'i rta dang lha yi 'chang/ /de bzhin nor bzangs ko phu ba/ /nor bu'i rna cha bzang po dang/ /bdud rtsi zhes bya'i sman dang ni/ /bdud rtsi nyid kyang byung bar gyur/ /bstan bcos thams cad 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sman
10b1(mdo 'grel): pa thang la bar dang ni/ /sgra mthong zhes ni bya ba'i rta/ /snying stobs che zhing stobs che la/ /'brug dang rnga yi sgra dang ni/ /dung dang rnga chen sgra 'dra ba/ /gang zhig skad gsangs 'thon po yis/ /sgra des ming du btags pa ni/ /de che lha dang lha min gyis/ /sgra mtho
10b2(mdo 'grel): zhes ni bya bar btags/ /sprin dkar gyis ni mdog 'dra zhing/ /mgyogs shing bdud rtsi las byung ba/ /mdangs ldan rgya mtsho chen po las/ /byung ste mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ /stobs ldan zhes bya'i snang byed bus/ /de yis rkang pa gnyis las
10b3(mdo 'grel): bzung/ /de tsho lha min thams cad kyis/ /manda ra dang de bzhin du/ /klu yi rgyal po bor nas ni/ /rta yi rin chen la 'jus te/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho spangs nas ni/ /sa gzhi 'dir ni phyin par gyur/ /lha min bum pas mnyam pa dang/ /de bzhin sems
10b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'phags pa dang/ /me? dra ba dang 'dod lha dang/ /gnod sbyin gser mdog zhes bya ba/ /chu bur zlum po zhes bya bas/ /stobs ldan la ni tshig 'di smras/ /gang gis dpal thob 'gyur ba yi/ /don gnyer rin chen thob pas na/ /bdag cag lha dang mi
10b5(mdo 'grel): rnams las/ /'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag por rab tu dga' byed cing/ /thams cad stobs kyis drags pa dang/ /lha min skyes bu thams cad ni/ /dga' zhing mgu ba nyid du bya/ /de nas stobs ldan yid dga' bas/ /des ni lha
10b6(mdo 'grel): rnams la smras pa/ /rgya mtshon chen po srubs pa las/ /rin chen gang zhig thob gyur pa/ /de ni de la byin pas na/ /gzhan gyis de rnyed 'os ma yin/ /lha rnams kyis kyang tshig smras pa/ /bdag cag gi yang rtsal yin paS/ /rin chen khyed ni gcig pu'i
10b7(mdo 'grel): min/ /khyed dang bdag cag thun mong yin/ /de nas lo ni khri yi bar/ /skar ma'i tshad kyis g.yul 'gyed de/ /lha dang lha min g.yul dor ni/ /dpung tshogs ldang zhing ldang zhing 'thab/ /de tshe sobs ldan sgra mtho ba'i/ /stobs mchog ldan pa'i rta 
11a1(mdo 'grel): zhon nas/ /lha rnams kyis ni dngung? gi tshogs/ /chen bo dag kyang brlag par gyur/ /gang yang der ni lha rnams kyis/ /g.yul du bsang ba'i lha min rnams/ /rta dbang de yis bsnams pa dang/ /yang dang yang du slar 'tsho gyur/ /
11a2(mdo 'grel): de nas lha min chen po yis/ /bsad bar gyur bas rmongs nas ni/ /skyabs 'dod pa yi tshangs pa la/ /skyabs su nye bar song bar gyur/ /legs ldan stobs chen ldan pa yis/ /lha min g.yul gyis pham par gyis/ /legs ldan gyis ni bdag cag
11a3(mdo 'grel): la// gzhan pa bzang po stsal ba'i rigs/ /bdag cak? gis kyang lha min gyi/ /g.yul dor gnas las rgyal bar bgyi/ /de nas tshangs ba skye dag yi/ /bdag pos de la smras ba ni/ /phyis 'byung ba ni gang ci'ang rung/ /rang nyid kyis ni sngar shes te//
11a4(mdo 'grel): gang tshe gang gis ci tsam 'gyur/ /'di ni kho bos sngar shes bas/ /nga yi sngon tshe rta sprul bas/ /de bzhin sa stengs 'gro ba dang/ /bar snang dang me sa 'og gi/ rgyu dang mi rgyu gang yin dang/ /srogs chags rnams ni gang ci'ang rung/ /de dag thams cad
11a5(mdo 'grel): mngon sprul te/ /mchod sbyin bzhon ba'i don du ni/ /rta yang nga yis sngon byung ste/ /sbyin sreg byed tshong yin ni/ /mchi ma 'dzag bar gyur ba de/ /dbal mo yid ni dga' ba yis/ /lag pa gnyis kyis blangs bar gyur/ /de las der ni rta byung bas/ /de phyir
11a6(mdo 'grel): dpal mo'i bu zhes bya/ /der ni lag ba g.yas pa yi/ /mchi ma las ni rta phor gyur/ /g.yon pa'i mchi ma laS rgod ma/ /snying stobs ldan dang mgyogs ldangs ldan/ /dpal mo'i lag ba'i de'i mchi ma/ /der ni rta de bram ze'i rigs/ /nga yi mchi
11a7(mdo 'grel): ma dpal mo yi/ /lag pa gnyis las 'jog gyur ba/ /brang na gnas pa rgyal rigs te/ /g.yul ngor sra bar shes par bya/ /lte ba brla yi rje'u rigs te/ /rkang bar 'dzag ba dmangs rigs yin/ /der ni g.yon ngos rgod ma te/ /g.yas ngos kyis ni rta phor
11b1(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /'di rnams phan tshun 'dus ba ni/ /rigs bzhi dag tu bshad pa yin/ /de ltar rta rnams yang dag byug ba yid ltar mgyogs shing mdog ldan ste/ /mdog cig mdog ni 'dres ba dang/ /sna tshogs mdongs kyis phye ba dang/ /thig le can dang kha dog
11b2(mdo 'grel): mang/ /mtshan ma can dang zhung ba dang/ /rkang dkar rdog ma muny+dza 'dra/ /rgyal mtshan dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang/ /rda rdog mdog ni mang ba dang/ /khra bo thig le phra ba dang/ /'dam mdog se ba nyid dang ni/ /dkar la rdog ma gnag ba ste/ /phal cher kha dog
11b3(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs shing/ /ba spu snum zhing bzang ba dang/ /tshad dang ldan zhing mig bzang la/ /ro stong mtho bar gyur ba dang/ /dbus phra bsus khyim chung ba dang/ /mchu legs brang zhing yangs pa dang/ /rdog ma rkang pa rmig ba bzang/ /bags srab spu mtshamS
11b4(mdo 'grel): phra ba dang/ /yid du 'ong zhing phum phum bzang/ /snying stobs ldan zhing rkang mdog mthun/ /lus las skyes ba'i gshog pa bzhin/ /nam mkha' 'gebs ba lta bu dang/ /yan lag dang ni nyid lag rnams/ /lha yi char ldan gzi brjid che/ /dpal ldan
11b5(mdo 'grel): myur ba dpal me'i bu/ /changs pa'i mchi ma las byung mgyogs/ /me yis gdungs ba las gyur ba'i/ /lte ba las ni byung ba'i rdul/ /thal bar 'jags gyur de las ni/ /bong bu dang ni bong mor gyur/ /rna ba ring zhing mjag mar ldan/ /gzhung
11b6(mdo 'grel): thog bya zhing rmig? pa sra/ /skad gdangs rtsub cing khur sran che/ /gang zhig rtsub pa bong bu yin/ /thal ba las ni skyes ba'i phyir/ /de bas bong bu thal mdog ldan/ /de dag de ltar gyur nas ni/ /skye dgu'i bdag po'i gnas na 'dug/ de nas dregs
11b7(mdo 'grel): ba? khor? ba dang/ /bsrag rdzas dgang gzar blugs gzar dang/ /gzhong ba snod dang bum pa bsnams/ /rmongs ba'i rta yis rab tu brlags ga? 'jag mag thal bas khyab pa yi/ /mi gang de ni mthong ba dang/ /dang khrab ? par gyur nas ni/ /rta rnams
12a1(mdo 'grel): dmod pa btab par gyur/ /gshog bcad mtshon ni nub pa dang/ /sa la rgyu zhing tshig mi 'don/ /lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyi/ /bzhon pa nyid du song gyur cig/ de thos sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/ /de tshe rta rnams dang khra ni// de nyid la ni
12a2(mdo 'grel): skyabs song nas/ /slar yang rjes su phan btags byas/ /rta yi mchod sbyin 'bras bu ni/ /bsod nams don du 'gro gyur cing/ /mchod pa bzang po thob gyur cing/ /bsod nams 'jig rten gyis thob shog/ phan btags thob pas de dga' ste/ /dang khra
12a3(mdo 'grel): la ni bskor ba byas/ /mgo bos phyag byas bdag cag gi //ci zhig bgyis zhes tshig tu smras/ /dang khra des ni lung bsgo bas/ /kha ba can du khyed song la/ /ri 'dab yid du 'ong ba dang// chu dang ldan bar gnas par gyis/ /de skad smras nas rta rnams
12a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /dga' ba ri rgyal dag tu song// sbyin sreg bshig pas khros ba na/ /dang khras ha ha zhes bzlog pas/ /de phyir 'di la ha yi sgra/ /rta rnams la ni btags pa yin/ /ri bo'i dam pa de ru ni/ /rta rnams gnas bar gyur bas na/ /gang zhig 'dod ba spyod gyur
12a5(mdo 'grel): pa/ /rigs ni 'dres par gyur ba'i rgyus/ /rta dang bong bu de dag gi /skye gnas 'dre bar bshed par bya/ /bong bu rta la 'jug gyur ba/ /gang yin de la dre'u 'byung/ /dre'u dang rgod ma dag las ni/ /go ri zhes ni bya ba skye/ /go ri rgod mar 'jug ba las/ /ki ni
12a6(mdo 'grel): zhes ni bya ba skye/ /ki ni rgod ma las skyes pa/ /ki sang ta zhes bya ba skye/ /ki sad ta dang rgod ma las/ /chu bur can zhes bya ba yin/ chu bur can dang rgong ma las/ /slar yang bong bu zhes byar bshad/ /bong bu 'ong bar mthong na ni/ /rta ni thams cad rmongs bar
12a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /bya ba mang zhing slab par dka' / /de phyir bong bu bzhin dgra yin/ /de ltar 'di ni dre'u ste/ /ma 'dres 'jug las rta nyid yin/ /dang dang rta yi skye gnas te/ /bong bu'i skye gnas gnyis su 'dod/ /rta rnams gzhan gyi mngal du ni/ /'khrig pa? bya? skong?
12b1(mdo 'grel): bar mi byed la/ /gal te byed par gyur na ni/ /yul de 'jigs par shes par bya/ /de ltar de ni rta 'byin pa/ /mchod sbyin don de phyugs kyis mchog/ /dgra 'joms rgyas byed la sogs pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dpung gi mchog/ de nas kha ton la dga' 
12b2(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /sbyin sreg byed la rab gzhol ba/ /gzhon nu tshangs bar spyod la gnas/ /sha li ho tra dka' thub che/ /kha ba can gyis ngos kyi nags/ /lha yi tshal 'drar 'ongs par gyur/ /de ni de ru gnas /bcas nas/ /ri yi tshogs ni nyams dga' zhing/ /ri dags
12b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs ni dums khyab/ /mi'am ci ni sna tshogs gnas/ /bya? chogs? du ma sgra sgrogs shing/ /dri za'i bu mo rnams gyis bskor/ /grub dang drang srong rol mo pa'i/ /tshogs dang lha rnams dag gis mdzes/ /me tog 'bras bu mang po yis/ /nyams dga' 
12b4(mdo 'grel): ne'u srib bzang bos khyab/ /shin tu yid du 'ongs pa'i gnas/ /nyams dga' der ni gnas par 'gyur/ /der ni phyi ma leb yan chad kyis/ /yi dags la sogs sna tshogs gnas/ /rta dang dri za mi 'am ci/ /ne'u le sprul dang bya rnams ni/ /seng ge stag
12b5(mdo 'grel): dang phag dang ni/ /glang po'i dbang po spre'u dang don/ /de la sogs pa mang bo ni/ /sha li ho tra drang srong che/ /bdag nyid thul cing gtsang ba yi/ /gnas dang nye bar 'khor ba na/ /sha li ho tras rta de rnams/ /bu dang 'dra bar yongs su bskyangs/ /kha ba can
12b6(mdo 'grel): gyi ngos na brtse/ /sha yi ho tra'i dbang du gyur/ /de bas lha rnams myur du ni/ /sha li ho tra'i gnas su song/ /der ni khyed la bzhon pa mgyogs/ /sha yi ho tra ster bar 'gyur/ /lha mchog tshangs pas de skad du/ /lha rnams la ni smras pa dang/ /dga' 
12b7(mdo 'grel): bas de ltar bgyi zhes te/ /de rnams ri mchog de ru chas/ /de nas skad cig tsam gyis ni/ /brgya byin gshin rje chu lta dang/ /dpal ldan nor gyis bdag po dang/ /bcas pa drang srong gnas su song/ /phyin nas bsti gnas gnas de la/ /snyan ba'i
13a1(mdo 'grel): tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /drang srong khyed ni gang gi phyir/ /dka' thub gnas bcas dka' thub grub/ /tshur byon grub dang drang srong tshogs/ /mi zad ba yi gnas su dengs/ /de nas ngas ni dgra 'joms pa'i/ /brgya byin la ni der smras ?
13a2(mdo 'grel): dka' thub yang spyad ba/ /mi dgos de ltar bya zhes smras/ /de nas nga la gshin rje yis// snyan ba'i tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /rga med 'chi med zad med ba/ /lha'i dbang po'i gnas 'dra ba// 'jig rten kun na gang bzang ba'i/ /gnas deng yis sbyin par bya/ /zas
13a3(mdo 'grel): dang stan dang mal khri dang/ /spyod lam ci bde gnas med pa'i/ /nags 'tshal 'dir ni dka' thub can/ /khyed ni ji ltar dga' bar gyur/ /brgya byin bcas pa'i lha mchog ni/ /kun la nga yis slar skyes pa/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu da yi zas/ /gos ni shang
13a4(mdo 'grel): shun ri dags lpags/ /'don dang sbyin sreg byed ba na/ /mthar thug med par nga'i blo 'jug/ ri dags tshogs yang rtag tu ni/ /kho bo'i sti gnas dag tu 'ong/ /glo bur lhags pa gzhan dag dang/ /gshog thogs dag ni lta bya yin/ /de dang
13a5(mdo 'grel): lhan cig gnas bya yi/ /lha yul 'dod pa nga la med/ /de nas dgra thub gshin rje yis/ /dal yang ni slar smras pa/ /gang dang 'grogs na khyed dga' ba'i/ /gzugs sdug ri dags bya tshogs dang/ /gshog pa yod ba'i rkang bzhi pa/ /thams
13a6(mdo 'grel): cad bdag la bstan du gsol/ /nga yi de ltar khas blangs te/ /ri dags bya tshogs de dag kun/ /ji srid mthong bar gyur gyi bar/ /lha rnams yud tsam 'dug par gyis/ /de nas lha rnams mkha' las ni/ /phyogs rnams kun nas 'ongs gyur cing/ /
13a7(mdo 'grel): ri rtse chu bo rnams las kyang/ /brang gi phyogs ni ston cing 'ongs/ /de tshe rta phran bar snang la/ /yid du 'ong ba'i skad du 'tsher/ /snang snyan pa yi sgra dang ni/ /gshog pa'i rlung ni yid 'ong ba'i/ /sgra des mdangs dang ldan pa yi/ /sgra des ngo mtshar skyes/
13b1(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /lha rnams dga' bas da la ni/ /snum zhing yid 'ong zab ba dang/ /rjes mthun sgra ldan pa snyam dga' / /e ma'o mtho ris mtshungs zhes smra/ /kye ma'o khyod ni nyams dga' bar/ /gnas par gyur pa legs so legs/ /kye ma'o ri dags gzuD
13b2(mdo 'grel): bzang zhing/ /snying stobs snying por mgyogs par ldan/ /lha dang mi ni su la yang/ /'di 'dra'i gzhon pa yod ma yin/ /bdag cag 'di la zhon nas ni/ /'gron nges par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /khyed kyis bdag cag la gsol cing/ /ci ltar bzhon bar
13b3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa yi/ /thabs de drang srong mchog gis ni/ /yid la bdag cag bsam par 'dod/ /de nas de skad smra ba yi/ /lha mchog rnams langs lan smras/ /lha min brlag pa'i don dang ni/ /de phyir khyed rnams rgyal phyir dang/ /bram ze rnams
13b4(mdo 'grel): kyis mchod sbyin phyir/ /tshangs pas rta 'di sprul pa yin/ /de bas tshangs pas pa bsgo bas/ /khyed rnams shas cher dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /gzhon ba rnams kyi dam pa 'di/ /ma lus pa ni sbyin par bya/ /lha'i dam ba khyed rnams ni/ /bram ze'i yul
13b5(mdo 'grel): du 'gro bar gyis/ /der ni 'dul thabs bya bdag/ 'ongs nas bya yi gzhan du min/ /der song de rjes pa yis ni/ /rta ni ji snyed bod par bya/ /de nas nga yis rta rnams kun/ /bsdus nas tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /bla ma mkhan po mdza' ba dang/ /gnyen
13b6(mdo 'grel): dang bang mi rnams kyang ni/ /rengs par blta bar nga 'dod la/ /khyed rnams la yang mgron du 'bod/ /der ni 'bras dang mung+ga dang/ /ma sha nas? rang til dag dang/ /sa la drug cu pa dang 'bru/ /rtswa ni mtho zhing 'jam pa dang/ /chu bo ni gsing rnams kyang
13b7(mdo 'grel): yod/ /de'i nags gzar po ma yin na/ /de dang lhan cig 'gro bya 'am/ /yang ni 'di ru gnas par bgyi/ /de nas nga la rta kun gyis/ /snyan pa'i tshig tu 'di srad? smras/ /nags 'tshal stong ba 'di mthong na/ /bdag cag shes cher yid skyo bas/ /
14a1(mdo 'grel): khyed kyis gang du 'gro 'gyur ba/ /bdag cag der 'breng gzhan du min/ /khyed kyi rjes su 'brangs te ni/ /'gro ba bdag cag rab tu bsngags/ /de nas da ni rtas bskor zhing/ /bde gnas dgra dang lhan cig tu/ /gang du lha dang dus btab pI
14a2(mdo 'grel): bram ze'i yul du phyin bar gyur/ /der ni a shwat+tha yi rtsar/ /gtsub shing las ni me byung ste/ /sbyin sreg nga yis byas nas ni/ /lha dang srin po tshim par byas/ /de nas yul de'i sa mtshams kyi/ /nyen 'khor kun tu khyer nas ni/ /rta de dag gis 'bru dag ni//
14a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad za ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas 'bru de brlag gyur ba/ /bram zes mthong nas khros ba yis/ /yin kyis mig ni dmar po dang/ /nga la tshig rtsub 'di skad smra/ /sngon ni dka' thub la gnas pa'i/ /bram ze gzhan dag 'dir 'ongs tshe/ /dka' thub
14a4(mdo 'grel): tshangs par spyod pa dang/ /'don dang sbyin sreg byed pa yis/ /lo grangs yang por 'dir gnas shing/ /de bzhin yams kyang zhi byed na/ /khyed ni ri dags 'di 'dra ba/ /khyer te yul du ji ltar 'ong/ /lam gang nas ni khyed 'ongs pa/ /de las slar ni 'gro bar
14a5(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /khyed kyis yams 'di bdag cig gis/ /bzlog par nus pa ma yin no/ /bram ze khros pa de la ngas/ /bzod gsol sngon 'gro'i tshig 'di smras/ /rta rnams 'bru ni za ba dang/ /khyed la 'tshe nga mi dga' / /sbyin sreg byed par brel bas/ /khyed la
14a6(mdo 'grel): gnod ba ngas ma bkag/ de nas nga yis rta rnams ni/ /thams cad bsdus nas 'di skad smras/ /nga la yul gyi mi rnams ni/ /ci skad smras gyur pa la ltos/ /'di dag mgu bar bya ba'i phyir/ /re zhig khyed ni legs par bcing/ /de nas mtshan mor gyur ba dang//
14a7(mdo 'grel): slar yang ci dgar spyad par gyis/ /de nas bcings ba'i tshor ba ni/ /ma myong bas na bcing bar lhags/ /lha rnams ltad mo skyes ba yi/ /yid kyis nga la yid ches 'gyur/ /de nas chu lha rang nyid ni/ /bos nas zhags pas rta rnams ni/ /yan lag lngar byas
14b1(mdo 'grel): shing la ni/ /go rims bzhin du bcings par 'gyur/ /bcings pa'i rjes la stobs yod kyang/ /mgul bar gyur pa ma gyur to/ /nye bar bcings pa byas nas ni/ /mtshon ni rnon po thogs nas su/ /lha yis mdun dang rgyab kyi ni/ /rta rnams kyi ni gshog pa
14b2(mdo 'grel): bregs/ /de nas gshog pa bcang kyang ni/ phyi phyir zhing ni skye bar 'gyur/ /de rjes me yis bsregs pas na/ /tshig bas me lce byung bar gyur/ /bcings shing gshog pa med byas nas/ /gang tshe rta rnams nyam thag pa/ /de tshe lha rnams yid la ni//
14b3(mdo 'grel): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du khyer/ /zla bas ri bong dkar 'dra ba/ /nyi ma na tsho'i mdog 'dra ba/ /brgya byin gyis ni sto sangs te/ /gshin rje yis ni nag po yin/ /me lhas rgya skyegs mdog 'dra ba/ /rlung lhas dmar ser mdog 'dra ba/ /chu lhas
14b4(mdo 'grel): sngon po khyer bar gyur/ /nyi ma gzhan gyis kha dog skya/ /lha chen gyis ni ser po ste/ /sna tshogs ls kyi rkyang mdog can/ /nyi ma su shas sna nag pa/ /twaSh+Tas mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ /lta gzhan gyis ni rang rang gi /yid la 'dod pa bzhin du khyer/ /de ltar
14b5(mdo 'grel): rta rnams bgos nas ni/ /lhag ma nga yi gnas bzhag ste/ /g.yul du dgos pa'i las rnams dang/ /mtshan nyid mtshan ma rnams dang ni/ /gso dang slar 'bros las rnams la/ /bu dang lhan cig nye bar bskyangs/ /da'i bu mdza' o las rgyal dang/
14b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrul med tha chung byed ba zhes/ /yon tan nges las ming btags pa/ /bu gsum mkhas bar gyur pa yin/ /zhi zhing mdza' o rnams las rkyal/ /des de mdza' las rgyal zhes bya/ /rig byed bstan bcos ma 'khrul bas/ /de phyir 'khrag med
14b7(mdo 'grel): ces 'di bshad/ /nga yi tshig? la mngon dga' bas/ /rtag tu 'di ltar byed bas na/ /de'i phyir nga la byed ba zhes/ /tha chung la ni btags ba yin/ /de nas rta gzhan bdag nyid che/ /ma na zhes bya tshangs sras byin/ /de las gzhan ? bres su/ /las rnams
15a1(mdo 'grel): la ni byang par byas/ /gzhon pa la ni gdul ba dang// bya ba'i las rnams la yang bzhag /nga ni rgas phyir grol ba tshol/ /rta rnams kyi ni nang du nyal/ /de nas rta khros ba yid/ /gnyid log snyam te bsad par rtsams/ /de dag
15a2(mdo 'grel): 'dus nas 'khon gyis ni/ /skyod pa'i yid dang phan tshun smra/ /bdag cag bcing dang gsod 'di ni/ /gang las sdug bsngal skye 'gyur pa/ /'di dag kun gyis rtsa ba ni/ /drang srong gnyid log 'di yin gyis/ /de bas gnod yas lan bya zhing/ /thos? bar gyur
15a3(mdo 'grel): na legs ba yin/ /de nas bcings pa bcad nas ni/ /da gsod phyir ni lhag par gyur/ /da ni de la thabs gang gsi/ /bde bar 'gyur zhes sems zhing nyal/ /de nas lha yis sad byas bas/ /da yis rta la dmod pa btab/ /deng nas brtsams
15a4(mdo 'grel): te nga yin ni/ /dmod pas bzhon khyed ma la ni/ /'jug cing rlig pa 'phyar ba dang/ /rjed ngas ba ni nyid gyur cig/ de nas de ni ma tshig ba dag/ skyes shing smod pas rjed? nges 'gyur/ /de skad de langs smras nas/ /gnas de nas ni mi snang byas/ /
15a5(mdo 'grel): rta yi sgra de thos ba dang/ /de nas rtags 'tsho ba dang/ /rta la zhen dang 'ching byed dang/ /rta bres su ni 'ongs bar 'gyur/ /rta rnams grol nas gnas gnas su/ /phan tshun rgyu bar byed ba dang/ /mal khri rgya chen dag dang ni/ /mal stan dag kyang gtong
15a6(mdo 'grel): ba mthong/ /de yis da ni ma mthong bas/ /rta rnams kyis ni zos snyam nas/ /de yi mal khri las mtshon bas/ /bram ze mi snang nyid gyur snyam/ /'di ltar rta ni de dag rnams/ /bram ze zos par byas snyam sems/ /de yi phyir na rta rnams ni/ /rta spangs
15a7(mdo 'grel): btang nas lnga? du? snom/ /sha li ho tra ci nas kyang/ /phyis mi 'byung bar gyur to snyam/ /rta yi skye ba byung ba 'di/ /gang zhig rtag tu nyan byed ba 'am/ /yang na la la 'dzin byed dam/ /gtam la dad par gyur na ni/ /lha rnams kyi ni bskur tha dad/ /
15b1(mdo 'grel): bu dang tsha'o 'phel bar 'gyur/ /tshe ring ba ni tho ba 'gyur zhing/ /grags pa che ba ny+d du 'gyur/ /'di ltar lta yi mthu ldan zhing/ /'das dang ma 'ongs don shes pa la/ /drang srong sha li ho tra yiS/ khu yis dris tshe smras pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdog nas las/ /rta rnams byur
15b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshul zhis bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //tha skad che bo drang srong che/ /rta skad las ni lus skyes ba/ /lha yi mthu ldan dka' thub can/ /tshangs pa nyi ma me'i gzim dangs/ /sha li ho tra drang srong mchog/ /de la legs thos kyis nges ba/ /'di ltar mjal du chags bar
15b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /srog ni ji ltar 'dzin ba lags/ /lus zungs rmig pa spu dag dang/ /nang gzhi lto ba 'byung ba dang/ /yan lag lus kyi ga rnams dang/ /rtsa dang dus bde bzhin tshigS /zla ba gang la 'gyur bar 'gyur/ /mngal du ji ltar 'tshe ba lags /rte'u pho mo ji
15b4(mdo 'grel): ltar 'gyur/ /mtshan ni ldang dang ma ning dang/ /rte'u po gnyis ma rte'u mo gnyis/ /skye pa'am g.yang sham nyer 'gyur ba 'am/ /rte'u pho mo skye ma'i ma/ /phra dang rags pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /'dug pa dang ni nyal ba dang/ /
15b5(mdo 'grel): mngal du zhu dang/ skam? pa dang/ /shin tu 'khyer? 'thug pa dang/ /slab sbyangs so sor shes pa dang/ /de bzhin bzang dang rno dang bul/ /lho dang gzhi ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /dbal dang mi 'jigs blo ldan dang/ /stobs che mgyogs pa phun tshogs/
15b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bul dang blo ni zhan pa dang/ /ldeg dang nyams dang ldan pa dang/ /ngang tshul mdongs? ldan nang med dang/ /phor skyes don mer ci lta bu/ /tshe ring ba dang tsha thung nyid/ /bkra shis bkra mi shes gzugs bzang/ /mdog ma 'dres dang
15b7(mdo 'grel): mdog 'dres dang/ /sna tshogs dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /mtshan dang rlig pa lci dang ni/ /spu dang rdog ma dag dang rkan/ /so dang nrmig pa mig mi sdug/ kha dog mi sdug ji ltar 'gyur/ /sgu ba dang ma ning yan lag nyams/ /gzugs dang 
16a1(mdo 'grel): mjug ma yo ba dang/ /bems po 'dra dang lkug dang 'on/ /kha yon sna ni che ba dang/ /mig sdug ba yi nang bu can/ /gzhan gyi dbyibs 'dra khu ba med/ /si si can nam khyi sngo can/ /mdal du gnas che ji ltar 'gyur/ /
16a2(mdo 'grel): de ltar blo ldan gyis dris tshe/ /sha li ho tras smras gyur pa/ /ji ltar las dang nyan mongs las/ /sems can rnams ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /yid blo dbang po zhes bya ba/ /rnam shes dang ni 'dus gyur nas/ /mngal du chags
16a3(mdo 'grel): par gyur ba na/ /las kyi tshul la gnas ba yin/ /sems can 'byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /khong khrag rlung la brten pa yin/ /gang tshe rte po rgod ma ni/ /zla mtshan ldan la 'jug gyur ba/ /de tshe 'bar bar gyur pa yis/ /
16a4(mdo 'grel): rnam shes mdal du gnas ba yin/ /des ni khu ba khrag blangs nas/ /mngal gyi gnas su 'dren par 'gyur/ /ji ltar podma'i sdong bu? rtsar/ /skyes bus chu ni blugs pa ltar/ /de bzhin mngal gyi gnas su ni/ /khu ba rlung
16a5(mdo 'grel): gis 'dren par byed/ /de ni rtsol ba thams cad kyis/ /khrag gis lus ni 'phel bar byed/ /ji ltar ma grogs du ba ni/ /shing las byung ba gyen? du 'dren/ /de ni bar snang la gnas nas/ /gzugs can du ni gnas
16a6(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /de bzhin mngal na gnas pa'i rlung/ /khu ba khrag tu byung ba rnams/ /de ni mdal chags gyur pa na/ /rnam shes dang ni bcas ba las/ /sems med gyur ba'i dngos po yang/ /sems dang ldan pa nyid
16a7(mdo 'grel): du 'gyur/ /de nas lus su tshor 'gyur zhing/ /rang gi gnas su 'gyur las skye/ /mngal gyi khu ba khrag dang rlung/ /'dus pa las ni mdal chags 'gyur/ /rnam shes dang ni 'dres gyur la/ /khrag gis gsos par gyur ba las/ /snying stobs dang ni 'dres
16b1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /de ni mdal chags shes par bya/ /legs thos kyis ni slar smras pa/ /bdag la the tshom 'di skyes te/ /khu ba zla ba'i bdag nyid can/ /khrag ni me'i rang bzhin yin/ /de gnyis 'dus par gyur pa na/ /ji ltar mthal?
16b2(mdo 'grel): nas zags ma gyur/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang/ /sha li ho tras smras gyur ba/ /de ni rnam shes kyis zin bas/ /drod kyis zhu par 'gyur ma yin/ /ma'i nyes pa dbang dang ni/ /tshe yangs yongs su zad ma 'jig /sa sogs 'byung
16b3(mdo 'grel): ba chen po dang/ /khu khrag skyon med gyur pa las/ /de tshe yon tan dang ldan par/ /mngal ni 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ni da yis bshad bya yis/ /rim gyis khyod kyis shes par gyis/ /nam mkha' rlung dad me dang ni/ /chu dang de
16b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin sa rnams te/ /'byung ba chen po de dag las/ /mngal ni skyon med 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lus can dag ni thams cad kyi/ /skye pa de ltar 'byung ba yin/ /gzhan bshad bzhud yang mang mod kyis/ /kho bo de ltar mi 'dod
16b5(mdo 'grel): do/ /pha dang ma las byung ba dang/ /las dang de bzhin snying stobs skyes/ /de ltar sems can thams cad ni/ /mngal du chags bar shes par bya/ /ji ltar 'byung ba bshad bya ste/ /la la mgo bo sngar skye zer/ /kha gcig gis
16b6(mdo 'grel): ki? dang por snying/ /gzhan dag rgyu ma skye zhes zer/ /de lta mod kyis mdal du ni/ /ming can cig car skye bar 'dod/ /khu ba khrag dang rnam shes dag /'dres kyang rgyal bar gyur pa las/ /zhag bdun na ni rlung dag gis/ /skams las
16b7(mdo 'grel): nur nur bor 'gyur ro/ /zhag bcu na ni mer mer po/ /zla ba gcig na gor gor po/ /rdza bum gsar las chu blugs pa/ /kun tu gsher bar byed pa ltar/ /ma'i kha zas yon tan gyis/ /mngal du chags ba gso par byed/ /
17a1(mdo 'grel): nur nur po la sogs pa'i tshe/ /yan lag mi gsal nyid du bshad/ /zla ba gnyis na rkang lag ni/ /so so'i chir ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dus ni dus kyi khyad par gyis/ /yan lag gsal zhes bshad
17a2(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /sngar ni mi gsal de rjes la/ /gsal ba nyid du snang ba yin/ /ji ltar sman gyi sa bon la/ /thams cad mi gsal nyid du 'dod/ /des na byed ba bo mi snang/ /sa bon la rta de bzhin no/ /dper na 'o ma mar yod ba/ /de la
17a3(mdo 'grel): snang bar 'gyur ma yin/ /de ni srubs bar gyur ba na/ /thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin mad la? chags rang bzhin ni/ /phra bas mngon par mi 'gyur la/ /de nyid 'phel bar gyur pa yi/ /dus gzhan du ni gsal
17a4(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar a mra'i sa bon la/ /shun ba la sogs mi snang gi?/ /dus gzhan zhig na gsal bar snang/ /mdal du chags ba de dang 'dra/ /gang tshe gsal bar gyur nas ni/ /mngal du slar yang 'phel 'gyur te/ /
17a5(mdo 'grel): yan lag nyid lag chags gyur ba/ /zla ba gsum lon la sogs nyon/ /lus dang rgyab dang brang dang spu/ /bags ba bu ga rked ba lto/ /mid ba dpung ba rmig pa dang/ /rkan mchu nu mkha' gram sogs/ /nam tshod? brang dang rtsib ma
17a6(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /zla ba gsum na skye bar 'gyur/ /zla ba bzhi bar pho mtshan ni/ /rtsa rgyus bcas ba skye bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin pags sra sha 'phel dang/ /mjug mjog ma rus pa skye/ /zla ba lnga par rkub dang ni/ /long ka dag kyang skye
17a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /snying dang glo ba 'cher ba dang/ /mchin ba mkhal ma gzhang dang ni/ /sgyu ma snye ma sogs pa 'byung/ /zla ba drug par yan lag kun/ /rgyas shing rtsa phran rtsa chen dang/ /rus ba kun dang tshig rnams 'byung/ /zla ba bdun
17b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe na ni/ /ma yi nu ma g.yos 'gyur zhing/ /dbang bo drug ni tshang ba dang/ /dbugs ni ngan na ba nyid kyis rta/ /dbang bo'i don dang bya ba la/ /nus ba chung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de phyir zla ba bdun pa na/ /rgod ma dbugs rdub bder mi nus/ /de tshe yan lag rgyas shing
17b2(mdo 'grel): brtan/ /rtsa sogs bdun brgya gsal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin zla ba brgyad pa la/ /mngal du lus der 'char 'phel zhing/ /lus rgyas ro drug tsho ra ba dang/ /stobs dang ldan zhing dbang po gsal/ /dbang bos don ni gsal byed cing/ /ma yang bde bar dbugs mi
17b3(mdo 'grel): rdub/ /tshags tshigs gnyen zhing brtan 'gyur zhing/ /rgod ma'i lta ba ci zhig na/ /zla ba dgu par rgod ma ni/ /mtshan dang de bzhin nu ma skrangs/ /'byung ba gsal ba nyid 'gyur zhing/ /yan lag nyid lag rdzogs par 'gyur/ /zla ba dgu pa'am ni bcu pa 'am/ /zla ba bcu gcig
17b4(mdo 'grel): ba dag la/ /nye bar btsas pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rgod ma nad dang bcas par ni/ /bu bcas par ni 'gyur ba yin/ /bu yi lte ba dang 'brel ba'i/ /mngal na rtsa sdubs yod bas na/ /de las dangs ma rgyu ba yis/ /mngal na gnas par rtag par ni/ /mgo bo skye na du bltas nas gnaS
17b5(mdo 'grel): mngal na gnas ba'i gcin rtug ni/ /skye ba'i dus na 'byung 'gyur la/ /zla ba bcu bar de 'phel tshe/ /des ni sha ma la gnod byed/ /des ni gcin rtug la gnas bas/ /yid mi bde phyir bsgyur bar byed/ /mgo ni thur du bsgyur byed cing/ /go bzlog par ni gnas bas na/ /
17b6(mdo 'grel): ? skrugs par gyur ba'i phyir/ /ma yi nang ni mi zad skyed/ /de ltar 'thur du bsgyur bas na/ /de bas rgod ma'i kha zas ni/ /rjes su mthun pa nyid du bya/ /rgyu des zla ba bcu na ni/ /legs par bcos pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de ni 'byung bar byed pas na/ /dang po
17b7(mdo 'grel): mgo ba 'byung 'gyur te/ /de nas lus ni rim gyis 'byung/ /de ltar na ni bcos par bshad/ /de yi rjes la sha ma ni/ /mngal nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /pho la sogs ba mngal du ni/ /chags bar byed ba'i rgyu nyon cig/ /bu ba mang zhing khrag nyung ba/ /rlung gis 'dres
18a1(mdo 'grel): par byed nas ni/ /der ni rnam shes zhugs gyur na/ /rte'u lo ru skye bar 'gyur/ /de lta bu yi tshul gyis ni/ /khu ba nyung zhing khrag mang na/ /de las rte'u mor skye bar 'gyur/ /gang gis ma ning skye 'gyur nyon/ /rtswa dang chu ni zad 'gyur zhing/ /kha rlung gis nyen gyur
18a2(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /phyin ci log gi dus su ni/ /pha ma dag kyang nyam chung zhing/ /dbang po'i stobs kyang gyur ba/ /de gnyis/ phrad par gyur ba ni/ /khu pa khrag kyang cha mnyam na/ /ma ning du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /nyes pa de dag nyed dang ni/ /pha ma nang gzhing bcas gyur na/ /zla mtshen
18a3(mdo 'grel): nyes pa cher ldan las/ /rta ni g.yang bsham dag tu 'gyur/ /sngar bshad pa yi rgyu yod cing/ /mngal du changs par gyur ba na/ /mngal gyi gnas ni nang gzhir bcas/ /rlung ni shas cher gyur ba na/ /de la rte'u pho mo 'byung/ /khu ba'i nyes par ldan gyur na/ /gseb kyi bu
18a4(mdo 'grel): ni skyed mi byed/ /khu ba stong par gyur ba na/ /rlung gis gnyis su phye ba las/ /khrag dang 'dres par gyur ba ru/ /rnam shes gnyis ni zhugs pa na/ /rte'u tshe mar skye 'gyur la/ /khu ba mngan lo gnyis te/ /khrag ni mang bar gyur pa las/ /rte'u mo'i tshe mar skye bar 'gyur/ /
18a5(mdo 'grel): de las gzhan yang mngal gyi ni/ /nyes pa bzhi po mnyam bar gyis/ /rlung nang gdon gyi nyes pa yis/ /mngal du zhu bar rgyur pa yin/ /de la bad kan lhag gyur na/ /mngal na nyal ba zhes byar 'gyur/ /rlung dang bad kan gyis nyen pas/ /mngal du lug pa zhes byar 'gyur
18a6(mdo 'grel): rgod? ma rtse cing me drod nyams/ /mngal skams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /mngal du rlung gis gzir gyur cing/ /'jug tshe shin tu gnod byas la/ /bad kan khrag dang 'dres pa las/ /de tshe mtshan mi ldang bar 'gyur/ /sdum ma yin ni nyes pa dang/ /kha zas rtsub
18a7(mdo 'grel): bas rlung bskyed cing/ /zad pas bkag cing gnod gyur pas/ /de ni mngal du gzugs thur? 'gyur/ /gang tshe dus tshigs nyes pa la/ /rgod ma'i nang gzhi dang phrad par/ /mngal du chags par gyur pa na/ /de tshe nad bu can du 'gyur/ /ro ni mi mnyam nyes pa dang//
18b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du ni go log pas/ /mngal gyi rlung khris bad kan gyis/ /nyes pa nye bar 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /rlung gis lce yi rtsa dag tu/ /rjes su rgyu par byed pa na/ /nang gzhi de ni la brugs gyur na/ /de las rta ni lkugs par 'gyur/ /rna ba'i bu? ga 'gags pa las/ /'on pa
18b2(mdo 'grel): nyid du skye bar 'gyur/ /ming pa'i rtsa ni 'gags ba las/ /bems bo 'dra par skye par 'gyur/ /mngal du mig gi rtsa dag la/ /gnod gyur pa yis khebs pa las/ /rte'u dmus khong dag tu ni/ /rgod ma las ni skye bar 'gyur/ /sna yon rdog ma yo ba dang/ /gzhog
18b3(mdo 'grel): nyams gzhog phyed che ba dang/ /lus dang mjug rdo mi sdug dang/ /rgyab skur rlig pa che ba dang/ /rlig pa rab chung lhag pa dang/ /mtshan ni ring dang thung dang gug/ yan lag rengs dang yo pa dang/ /ma ning yan lag ma tshang dang/ /gzugs mi sdug dang yan lag nyams
18b4(mdo 'grel): yan lag phra dang lhag ma rnams/ /de ni rlung gi gnod las gyur/ /de ltar ji skad bshad pa dang/ /de las lhag ba'i smad bya ba/ /snang na rta de rlung gi ni/ /nad kyi nyen par shes par bya/ /rta ni gseb dang phrad gyur tshe/ /yid la gang zhig 'dod gyur pa/ /de yi bu ni de 'dra par
18b5(mdo 'grel): skye bar 'gyur pa kho na yin/ /de bzhin spyod lam dag dang tshad/ /mdog dang gzi mdangs 'gros dang ni/ /pha dang ma ni ci 'dra ba/ /de 'drar phal cher 'gyur ba yin/ /kha zas ngan du 'khru ba dang/ /snang dang 'jigs dang ral ba las// sbram? ma'i nang ni 'khrugs gyur bas/ /mngal
18b6(mdo 'grel): 'jig par ni 'gyur ba yin/ /gang tshe rlung ni mngal gnas pa'i/ /rdog ma'i gnas su phyin gyur na/ /rdog ma rtsub dang mi snyoms pa 'am/ /rdog? ma srab par 'gyur ba yin/ /pags ba spu dang rdam yi/ /skyon gang yong de rlung las gyur/ /bad kan khrid pa la gnas pI
18b7(mdo 'grel): so yi rtsa bar gnas gyur la/ /bad kan mkhris ba shas che las/ /so mi sdug par 'gyur ba yin/ /'khrig tshe khu bo skyan med cing/ /zla mtshan yon tan ldan pa dang/ /doms shing 'dod pa dang phrad cing/ /yid la 'dod pa ma bkag dang/ /bkra shis shis pa brjod byas
19a1(mdo 'grel): dang /dge sbyong bram ze mchod pa las/ /tshe ring bar ni 'gyur pa yin/ /gzhan du de ni tshe thung 'gyur/ /gseb sbyar tshe na skar ma tshes/ /byed ba la sogs bzang po dan/ /yid 'ong gzhan yang mang po yis/ /bkra shis dang ni mchod byas te/ /rta ni mtshan
19a2(mdo 'grel): ldan rgod ma ni/ /shis pa dang ni sbyar bar bya/ /lha dang bram ze mchod byas la/ /rol mo sems can gzhan gyis bskor/ /ro tsa gtsang ba'i kha zas dang/ /khu ba cung bzang po dag kyang sbyin/ /de ltar byas na bzang 'gyur te/ /gzhan du byas na bzang mi 'gyur/ /gzi mdangs nyams
19a3(mdo 'grel): dang snying stobs rtsal/ /gzugs dang nang med dpa' ba dang/ /'jigs med ba dang blo ldan pa/ /'og nas rgya cher bshad par bya/ /rdzas bcud nus pa smin pa las/ /rta rnams mngal du chags pa'i tshe/ /bad kan pags par khyab gyur na/ /rte'u dkar por skye par 'gyur/ /rlung
19a4(mdo 'grel): gis kha dog sde sangs 'gyur/ /mkhris pa yis ni nag por skye/ /bad kan mkhris pa 'dres ba las/ /rta mdog ser skyar skye ba yin/ /gal te khrag mkhris nyung gyur la/ /bad kan yang ni shas chung ba/ /rte'u'i pags par phyin gyur na/ /mdog rjes so'i dag tu 'gyur/ /
19a5(mdo 'grel): khrag ni gal te ma gyur cing/ /bad kan mkhris pa shas chung ba/ /rta yi pags par phyin na ni/ /rta ni dmar gro dag tu 'gyur/ /gang che mkhris ba mar gyur cing/ /khrag dang bad kan nyung gyur pa/ /rte'u'i pags bar phyin gyur na/ /rta ni gra nag dag tu 'gyur/ /rtag pa'i tshul ni
19a6(mdo 'grel): 'di nyid kyis/ /bad kan dang ni khrag 'dres dang/ /khrag mkhris 'dres par gyur pa las/ /rta ni ser skya dag tu 'gyur/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang/ /khrag rnams 'dres bar gyur ba las/ /rta rnams kyi ni kha dog dag/ rnam pa du mar 'gyur ba yin/ /nang gzhi rlung giS?
19a7(mdo 'grel): bcas gyur pa/ /bags par phan tshun gtor ba las/ /khra bo dang ni thig le can/ /kha dog dbye ba dag tu 'gyur/ /mdangs kyis gzi mdangs 'phel 'gyur la/ /de bzhin snying stobs dag tu 'gyur/ /mdangs dang rlung ni shas che shing/ /ma 'dres zas ni za ba
19b1(mdo 'grel): las/ /nad med par ni 'gyur pa yin/ /me rlung snying stobs dag las dpa' / /'byung ba chen po cha mnyam zhing/ /snying stobs che las 'jigs med 'gyur/ /snying stobs rlung dang stobs che las/ /mgyogs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /sems dang blo dang snying stobS
19b2(mdo 'grel): yid/ /de bzhin bad kan rang bzhin can/ /'di dag lhags par gyur ba las/ /yan lag bcu tshad blo ldan 'gyur/ /dge zhing byang la rab dga' dang/ /de bzhin dbang po dga' byed pa/ /rigs dang dus tshigs phun tshogs ldan/ /yid dang blo ni ma yangs pa/ /mngal du
19b3(mdo 'grel): rte ni gang skyes pa/ /de ni yon tan kun ldan 'gyur/ /de las bzlog par gang skyes pa/ /de ni yon tan can mi 'gyur/ /bzang dang rno dang zhan pa ste/ /rang bzhin rnams gsum ci bzhin dang/ /skye ba'i che yang de bzhin te/ /rang bzhin gsum du shes par bya/ /mngal du
19b4(mdo 'grel): gnas nas zla gnyis na/ /nags su nye bar bskyang bya zhing/ /kha zas sna tshogs pa dag dang/ /thug pa dang ni ldag pa sbyin/ /der ni rtag tu gang bsten pa/ /bzas? gang zhig 'dod gyur pa/ /don yid la de bar bshad/ /'di ni de la sbyin bar bya/ /gal te 'dod ba ma
19b5(mdo 'grel): byin na/ /gzugs mi sdug cing mi bsrun dang/ /yan lag mi chad blo chung dang/ /'jigs rkyen stobs chung sems nyams shing/ /'dus dang las kyi dbang dang ni/ /nang gzhi rnams kyis rang bzhin las/ /mngal du skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /ci lta bar ni yongs su bshad//
19b6(mdo 'grel): legs thos thos dang ldan ba yis/ /tshul bzhin yongs su dris lan/ /sha li ho tra dka' thub chos/ /dris lan de ltar smras pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las mngal du chags ba zhes bya ste le'u lnga pa'o// //rta skad las skyes drang srong ni/ /rta yi rang
19b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin shes gyur pa/ /? le ho tra nyid las ni/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs su dris/ /bu yis dris nas drang srong de/ /dga' ba'i tshig tu smras pa ni/ /rlung dang mkhris pa'i bdag nyid can/ /rang bzhin gsum du shes par bya/ /rtsub cing mi brtan rnga rdzogs pa/ /?
20a1(mdo 'grel): 'jigs rkyen skying zhan khur stobs chung/ /lam gyis du bcing sna nang mang/ /gnyid med shin tu gzugs mi sdug/ 'khrig pa la gdung 'dul par dka' / /'dod pa'i nus pa chung ba dang/ /rlung gi gang tshe 'khums pa
20a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /slar yang rjes su rgyug pa dang/ /rtag tu rta rdzi rnams dang ni/ /rta la so ni 'debs pa dang/ /mi dang rta yi phyi nas ni/ /sdun nas mdun du rgyug pa dang/ /'gre bar byed tshe lus kun ni/ /zlog cing 'gre bar mi nus kyi/ /gzhogs gcig gis
20a3(mdo 'grel): ni yang dang yang/ /'gre bar byed pa'ang nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin lam gyi gzhi snyam par/ /kha la med par yang thub pa dang/ /rdag kyang rang gi spyod pa ni/ /yun rings zhig nas 'dor ba dang/ /slabs pa rnams ni rjed gyur pa'i/ /rta ni rlung gi rang/
20a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin can/ /rdul can khro ba yun rings dang/ /gnyid med 'thab la dga' ba dang/ /so dang de bzhin lag gnyis kyis/ /rta la rtag tu 'tsho ba dang/ /rta rdzi'i las ni byed pa la/ /rang bzhin zhi pa ston pa ni/ /rtag tu 'jigs shing nus pa chung/ /lam
20a5(mdo 'grel): dang las la sran chung dang/ /gzhogs gcg gis ni cung zad tsam/ /thog mar 'dre bar byed gyur cing/ /de rjes lus ni thams cad kyis/ /zlog cing 'gre bar byed pa dang/ /de bzhin nyam ba'i lam du ni/ /khal gyi dub? dub pa dang
20a6(mdo 'grel): 'dul sbyong? ba yi tshig nyan cing/ /slabs pa 'dor zhing 'bros byed dang/ /grang ba la ni dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /rten mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can/ /sbu mdog snum zhing stobs che la/ /sgra snyan ngal gyis 'tsher pa dang/ /rta dang de bzhin mi rnams
20a7(mdo 'grel): la/ /rang bzhin zhi ba ston pa dang/ /'dul sbyong bla zhing slabs la brtan/ /gnyid che rtag tu brtan pa dang/ /khab dang lam du g.yul ngo ru/ /rtag tu sdul cher bzod dang/ /chu la brtan zhing shugs che la/ /gang du ?
20b1(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ma yin/ /'gre tshe gzhogs ni gnyis ka yis/ /yang dang yang du bzlog pa dang/ /'obs la gom pa mi 'dod gyi/ /shugs kyis mchod par 'dod pa dang/ /bdag po la ni dga' ba yi/ /rta ni bad kan rang bzhin can/ /mtshan
20b2(mdo 'grel): nyid gnyis ka dang ldan pa/ /rang bzhin gnyis pa zhes byar bshad/ /rlung dang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can/ /tha ma yin par yongs su bshad/ /rlung dang ban kan rang bzhin can/ /bar ma dag ni yin par bshad/ /mkhris pa bad
20b3(mdo 'grel): kan rang bzhin can/ /rta ni rab mchog yin par bshad/ /nad med lus zungs mnyam pa 'gyur cing/ /bad kan can gyi rta mngags so/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo gnas las rta'i rang bzhin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //
20b4(mdo 'grel): legs thos thos pa 'dzin pa yi/ /bu la sha li ho tra sa smras/ /bzang po dman dang ri dags dang/ /'dres pa'i mtshan nyid mnyan par gyis/ /stobs che mdog ni snum pa dang/ /dul pa'i gzugs can gcang sbrar
20b5(mdo 'grel): ldan/ /tshangs spyad mtshan mo gnyid log cing/ /le lo med cing phrag dog med/ /langs nas gnyid ni log pa dang/ /rtag tu langs nas 'dug pa dang/ /bdag po la dga' ldobs rkyen dang/ /bslabs ba nam
20b6(mdo 'grel): yang mi 'dod dang/ /thams cad du ni dpa' ba dang/ /g.yul dang lam dang me la ni/ /sdul gyis zhum med pa dang/ /nad kyis gdungs par gyur na yang/ /shin tu nyon mongs med pa dang/ /ci yang rung bzos na
20b7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /myur du lus ni rgyas 'gyur dang/ /thams cad du ni brtan pa yi/ /rta ni bzang po'i skye gnas yin/ /bkra shis mtshan nyid ldan mod kyi/ /cung zad smad pa yod pa dang/ /bslabs pa myur du lo bsan yang/ /myur du brjod par gyur
21a1(mdo 'grel): na yang/ /mtshan mo'i dus su lus phab ste/ /gnyid ni log par byed pa dang/ /snga la zhe sdang che ba dang/ /mkhrig pa la 'du phrag dog can/ /dang po dpa' zhing de rjes la/ /'jigs pa dag tu 'gyur ba dang/ /lcags
21a2(mdo 'grel): kyi cung zed bzhus pa na'ang/ /ring du 'gro bar byed pa ste/ de lta bu yi rigs ldan pa'i/ /rta ni dman pa nyid yin na/ /rtsub cing star la 'jigs rkyen dang/ /gnyid cha rgyan can le lo can/ /lte 'phye sbeg cing 'khyam la dga' / /de bzhin kun tu
21a3(mdo 'grel): dogs pa can/ /nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo dang rung/ /yan lag ma lus brkyang nas ni/ /rtag tu gnyid mi log pa dang/ /rta la 'che bar byed la dga' / /lcags gis bzhus la mi tsher zhing/ /myur du na bar byed pa dang/ /lus rgyas par
21a4(mdo 'grel): ni dka' ba yis/ /rta ni ri dags skye gnas yin/ /yon tan 'dras las 'dras gyur te/ /de bzhin dbye ba mang ba'ang yod/ /bzang bo mchog tu shes par bya/ /dman pa bar ma zhes bshad la/ /ri dwags tha ma yin shes bya/ /rta yi skye gnas
21a5(mdo 'grel): 'di nyid yin/ /mdor na skyon dang yon tan dag/ 'dres dang lhab kha yin shes bya/ /sha li ho tra mdog nas las/ /rta'i skye gnas kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //rta yi rang bzhin de nyid shes/ /dul la brtson zhing dbang po thul/
21a6(mdo 'grel): sha li ho tra blo chen la/ /mdza' o las rgyal gyis dris pa/ /gzi brjid chen po rta rnams kyi/ /rigs bzhi ji ltar shes bar bgyi/ /mtshan nyid spyod lam gang dag gis/ /de las bzlog par shes par gyis/ /de skad dris tshe drang srong che/ /sha ? ha
21a7(mdo 'grel): tras slar smras ba/ /rta'i rigs bzhi shes dkar ba/ /de zhing yis go par bya/ /rigs bzhir rnam par dbye ba ni// skye gnas dang ni gzugs byed dang/ /tshul sbyod dang ni dul ba dang/ /skad gdangs dbyibs dang kha dogs dang/ /dra nyid las ni nye
21b1(mdo 'grel): shes bya/ /gang zhig de las go zlog ste/ /de yi khyad par smras pa ni/ /nyon la rnam par dbyad par gyis/ /gzugs bzang dpal dang ldan pa dang/ /spyod ba dul zhing bsdags par 'os/ /blo ldan dang tshul bzang ba dang/ /'dul sbyor mkhan gyis
21b2(mdo 'grel): byas pa nyan/ /rjes su mthun zhing nus pa ldan/ /gtsang zhing gtsang sgra dag la brten/ bkres dang skom la sran che zhing/ /khro ba chung zhing glan par sla/ /gzi brjid dang ldan grags dang ldan/ /las rnams kun gyi rjes su 'jug /btung
21b3(mdo 'grel): dang kha zas bza' bya yi/ /lhag ma dang ni mi gtsang dang/ /rta spangs dang ni de bzhin gcin/ /'di na ring du spong byed cing/ /gtsang zhing gtsang mar spyod pa dang/ /nyal yang gnyid ni med pa dang/ /sbrang rtsi 'bras yos khur pa mar/ /'o thub
21b4(mdo 'grel): sreg rdzas la dga' zhing/ /dri dang sna ma'i phreng ba dang/ /khrus dang bkra shis la dga' zhing/ /'tsher zhing de dag snom pa dang/ /mi dge ldan sdus pa dang/ /'jigs med mkha' la sran tshe dang// snyan par 'tsher zhing sgra skad tshe/
21b5(mdo 'grel): ser dang dkar dang dmar ba dang/ /phal cher sbrang rtsi ltar ser dang/ /'gros tshe sran che ba dang/ /brtan zhing snyan par rjes su 'tshed/ /mdog snum dpag pa srab pa dang/ /bram ze kun la dga' ba dang// gnyid log tshe na 'bras
21b6(mdo 'grel): yos dang/ /mar dang a'u shing dri 'byung la/ /lha dang dri za'i snying stobs can/ /dge zhing rtag tu nges pa ste/ /de lta'i tshul spyod ldan pa'i rta/ /bram ze'i rigs su shes par bya/ /rgyal rigs khro ba'i tshul can te/ /tshangs pa'i mdog ldan
21b7(mdo 'grel): shes par bya// rang bzhin rno zhing dpal tha dang/ /sgra skad btang nas 'tsher pa dang//dbung pa rlo zhing snying stobs che/ /rang bzhin gtsang zhing spyod pa yang/ /gces par bsdus dang ldan pa dang/ /yan lag 'byes shing lpags ba srang/ /?
22a1(mdo 'grel): spyod pa gtsang zhing dul ba dang/ /'jigs ba rnams la mi skrag pa/ /chu dang me dang 'brug sgra dang/ /sgra cher grag dang lhung dang khur/ /sa rtsub shing gi tshang tshing dang/ /ring du 'gro dang lam
22a2(mdo 'grel): dog par/ /gang zhig 'jigs pa med pa dang/ /glang po'i tshogs ni chen po dang/ /dril bu rol mo'i sgra rnams dang/ /tsa co 'don pa'i sgra rnams dang/ /rta gzhan 'tsher bar gyur pa dang/ /dung dang rnga chen sgra dang ni/ /rol mo'i sgra
22a3(mdo 'grel): dang rdza rnga'i sgra/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bdan gyis/ /skrag par mi 'gyur rta mchog yin/ /rda rdog legs par brkyang nas ni/ /mga' ba' i yid kyis 'tsher ba dang/ /rkang gnyis legs par 'dzugs bzhin du/ /sa stengs na ni 'cher
22a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /rdul dang gcin dang rta spangs ni/ /yan lag brkyang ste 'dor ba dang/ /mthar ni shugs kyis 'dod pa dang/ /rta gzhan la ni bsdigs pa dang/ /g.yul dor rta dang glang po dang/ /shing rta dpung bu chung 'joms dang/ /
22a5(mdo 'grel): rjes su skad 'don sgra 'jam pas/ /phyogs kun khyab par 'tshor ba dang/ /rta gzhan dag gi phyi nas ni/ /de ni 'gro bar bzod mi byed/ /mtshon gyis bsnun kyang nang chung zhing/ /mtshon cha mthong na 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /spyod pa myur
22a6(mdo 'grel): zhing dpa' ba dang/ /'thab cho myur du pha rol gnon/ /nor bu lta bur mig ser zhing/ /mdog bzang kha dog ngan pa med/ /blo ldan de bzhin mgyogs ba dang/ /sgrin zhing ma zhum stobs che la/ /rtag tu las kun nus pa dang/ /bag yod rtag tu
22a7(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs med ? bsod nams byed pa'i me tog mang/ /'bras bur ldan pa'i dri yod la/ /lha dang dri za'i snying stobs can/ /de mtshungs spyod yul spyod par ldan/ /dge zhing spyod pa des pa'i rta/ /rgyal rigs su ni shes par bya/ /rje'u rigs btung ba
22b1(mdo 'grel): la dga' bstan/ /zhi zhing blo che le lo can/ /mi 'khrug dga' bar 'gyur ba med/ /dul ba'i spyod pa yang dag ldan/ /khro ba med cing nga rgyal med/ /dul zhing dang tshul snyoms pa dang/ /nad dang tsha dang bkres ba bzod/ /khal bkal lam du 'gre tshe brtan
22b2(mdo 'grel): de ni mgyogs dul ran pa yin/ /nyams dang lus stobs bar ma ste/ /mig ni de bzhin sngo dang ser/ /gnag dang dur ba'i mdog 'dra dang/ /sngo sangs spu mdog dkar ba dang/ /smin ma ta la'i mdog 'dra dang/ /phal cher dang ba'i mdog 'dre zhing//
22b3(mdo 'grel): steng 'og thad dkar che min gyi/ /ro stong che ba nyid yin no/ /ha re nu ka de bzhin du/ /rda mo'i 'o ma'i dri dang ldan /bag chung gi nyid ni che ba dang/ /mi yi snying stobS la brten ba/ bcom? ldan de lta'i spyod pa can/ /rta ni rje rigs yin zhes bya/ /dmangs rigs dang tshul ngan pa dang
22b4(mdo 'grel): spyod lam mang yul mi gtsang zhing/ /gzhan gyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i/ /lhag ma'i zas skom dag la dga' / /skam dang smad dang ngan pa dang/ /bshad gci dag ni bsten par dga' / /mig sked mig ni zlum pa dang/ /rkang pas sa ni brko ba
22b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bshad lci snom par byed pa dang/ /za zhing nyung du spyod pa dang/ /mi gtsang bar ni 'gro ba dang/ /rta rdzi? la ni 'phra ba dang/ /rang dang rtsig pa shing la sogs/ /so yis 'drang par byed pa dang/ /'breng pa dbyig pa bcug ma yi//
22b6(mdo 'grel): lcag mi tshor zhing mi 'khrug la/ /lung pa lus tshegs su pa che/ /'jigs pa kun la star ba dang/ /mi gtsang ba la mi smod cing/ /gtsang spra'i spyod pa de la med/ /du ba rdul 'dra'i mdog ldan zhing/ /ser skya mo gro dmar
22b7(mdo 'grel): skya'i mdog/ bsrung bar rab tu dka' ba dang/ /spyod pa ngan zhing zhi tshul rdung/ /ma khros las sbyang mi nus gyi/ /khros na las ni nus pa dang/ /bya rog tshang gi dri bro zhing/ /khrag dang mi ro'i dri dang ni/ /kun khyab gnyid tshe bag chung?
23a1(mdo 'grel): la/ /srin po sha za'i snyib stobs can/ /de 'dra'i spyod pa mdog ldan pa'i/ /rta ni dmangs rigs yin zhes bya/ /de dag 'dres par 'gyur ba yi/ /skye bdag kyang bstan par bya/ /rgyal rigs bram ze'i rigs mo la/ /zhugs
23a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i bu ni dngul chur bshad/ /dngul chu de ni spyod pa gtsang/ /des zhing lhag ma za mi byed/ /mdog ni bso ltar dkar ser/ /nag po'i mdog duAng 'gyur ba yin no/ /phal cher mig ni dang ba dang/ /sgra snyan rjes su sgrogs par byed/ /char
23a3(mdo 'grel): dang phreng ba'i dri ldan gyi /dri ni zhim pa'ang yod ma yin/ /gnyid log na ni bag med pa'i/ /rta ni rigs 'dzin rgyud yin no/ /bram ze rigs mor rje'u rigs zhugs/ /de ni mag d+ha zhes bya/ /snying stobs zhan zhing khur stobs che/ /lam
23a4(mdo 'grel): du chas tshe 'tshad zhing 'gro/ rdog ma 'chol bar skye ba dang/ /gang la'ang rmongs par mi byed do/ /bud med mi ga ni na ba dang/ /'gros che yid phebs med pa dang/ /kha dog mi sdug pa nyid de/ /sha za'i snying stobs dag la gnas/ /sdig
23a5(mdo 'grel): la dga' zhing star ba dang/ /gdul dka' dri ni mi zhim pa/ /spyod pa ngan par spyod pa dang/ /dman par lta ba ma ga dang/ /bram ze'i rigs mor rje'u rigs dag/ zhugs pa las ni skyes pa'i rta/ /de ni gdol pa zhes bshad de// sdig
23a6(mdo 'grel): pa skyed pa'i spyod yul can/ /las rnams la ni mi 'jug cing/ /gtum pa bong bu'i sgra can yin/ /sgra 'chag rtsub cing gdug pa dang/ /yan lag mi snyoms bag med ldan/ /mi shis pa yi mtshan nyid de/ /mtshan ma spyod
23a7(mdo 'grel): pas nyid rab sgos/ /thig le zhu ba mi sdug pa/ /smad pa yis ni yongs su khyab/ /bdag la gsod par byed pa dang// bag med gnas su khyed par byed/ /rta spangs lci ba gtong ba na/ /za zhing smod par mi byed pa/ /mthar ni gnod pa nyid byed cing
23b1(mdo 'grel): khang stong dag tu/ dga' bar byed/ /ce spyad dag gam spyang kuAm// du ba'i mdog gam mdog dan ldan/ /sgra rtsub yi dags dri can te// chang la dga' zhing sha la dga' // sha za srin po'i spyod pa can/ /spyod ba ngan pa gdol pa'i rta/ /rtags dang mtshan ma
23b2(mdo 'grel): 'di dag gis/ /rigs bzhir rnam bar dbye bar bya/ /gang zhig pha dang rtags spyod 'dra/ /skyas po'i bu ni gang yin pa/ /rigs bzhi ru ni rnam phye la/ /rta ni rang gi rigs su bzhag/ rigs kyi dbye ba ci bzhin shes/ /
23b3(mdo 'grel): //sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /snying stobs spyod pa lhag ma ni/ /gang gang yin pa mnyan par gyis/ /dri za bram ze dang mnyam la/ /gnod sbyin rgyal rigs nyid dang 'dra/ /srin bu rje'u rigs mtshungs te/ /dmangs rigs sha za
23b4(mdo 'grel): nyid dang 'dra/ /de ltar skye gnas 'dra ba yi/ /rang rang ci bzhin rnam par dbye/ /de bzhin sbyong tshul mi mthun pa/ /phye na sdig pas gos par 'gyur/ /de ltar legs ldan rjes ston pa// sha li ho tras bshad pa yin// sha la ho tra'i mdo gnas
23b5(mdo 'grel): las/ /rti'i? rigs bzhi'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de la rta yi mtshan nyid ni/ /yan lag ma rtogs tha dad ste/ /gdong ni srab la rgya che zhing/ /zur bzhi pa la g.yul snyoms pa/ /drang zhing 'khyog pa ma yin la// yongs su
23b6(mdo 'grel): tshang ba bsdags pa yin/ /bzhi? bcu mas dang rgya che la/ /dri bzang kha chu nyung ba dang/ /kha chu mi 'jig skam po min/ /rta la rab tu bsdags pa yin/ /so ni kha dog yid 'ong bzang/ /rdzogs shing sral brtan pa dang/ /ma gyes drang por ?
23b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /snum zhing nang ma mtho ba dang/ /mtho zhing rtsa ba brtan pa dang/ /mtshan ma gsal zhing sra ba dang/ /sbrang rtsi 'dra ba 'am rab tu dkar/ /rta la bsdags par gyur pa yin/ /'gram so mnyam zhing zlum pa dang/ /sra zhing snyoms bar
24a1(mdo 'grel): gyur ba bzang/ /mche ba mdun so'i mdog 'dra zhing/ /rtse mo rno bar gyur ba dang/ /zlum zhing rtsa ba brtan ba dang/ /snum zhing 'jam la skye ba bsdags/ /lce ni srab cing rjes 'brel dang/ /'jam zhing ring la snyoms pa dang/ /mnyam
24a2(mdo 'grel): zhing 'jam la dmar ba dang/ /khyi yi lce dang 'dran bzang/ /lce rtsa cung zad 'thug pa dang/ /'jam zhing mnyen la snyoms la srab/ /brtan zhing ljan ljin med pa dang/ /ring zhing dmar na rab tu bzang/ /lce'u chung gting ring rtse mo dmar/ /srab la ri mos
24a3(mdo 'grel): rnam par khyag /'jam zhing gos pa med pa dag/ rta la rab tu bsdags ba dang/ /mchu ni 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang/ /dbye sla sha rgyas dbyibs legs dang// shin tu g.yo dang 'chang ba'ang min/ /so ni khebs par gyur pa dang/ /mnyam zhing
24a4(mdo 'grel): snyoms la zlum pa dang/ /tshad ldan drang na bsngags pa yin/ /sna gung mnyam por dbugs rgyu zhing/ /zlum la nang na yangs par snang/ /gnyen zhing 'jam la gnod pa med/ /rta la bsdags par gyur pa yin/ /'tshul pa drang zhing dbyibs mdzes
24a5(mdo 'grel): la/ /skyon med par yang gang gnas dang/ /drang zhing zlum la 'jam zhing gnyen/ /yon tan dag gis brgyan na bzang/ /rta yi 'dzum ni dbus srab cing/ /'gram gnyis mtho bar gyur na bzang/ /kha 'gram mnyen zhing srab la snyoms//
24a6(mdo 'grel): bug khegs shing zlum la 'byar/ /kha 'gram yangs par snang gyur pa'i/ /rta ni yid du 'ong ba yin/ /mkhur chos byi dor byas 'dra zhing/ /dbus sdug srab la lta na sdug/ rim gyis 'khur ba'i zheng che zhing/ /sha yis rgyas bar
24a7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa bsdags/ /sna? 'gram bags sab sha chung ba/ /rims kyis zhing che srab dang/ /mkhur ba legs pa'i 'gram dang ni/ /rna bar legs par gnas na bzang/ /mchim 'dzag nas rgyus pa sra/ /mi mngon sha ni srab na
24b1(mdo 'grel): bzang/ /mig ni dkyus ring mig 'bras dag/ shin tu dang bar snang bdag/ nor bu'i 'ong kyis mdangs 'dra zhing/ /snum pa 'am sbrang rtsi ltar ser skya/ /snam 'dra 'am rma bya 'dra/ /rnga mo ka la bid ka 'am/ /dud pa'am gong ma sras
24b2(mdo 'grel): nag po/ /glang chen gyi ni mig 'dra ba 'am/ /seng ge ri dags mig 'dra 'am/ /de bzhin 'chil pa'i mig 'dra zhing/ /rdzi ma 'thug cing ring ba yi/ /mig ni rtal bsdags pa yin/ /mig sbubs sbom po ma yin zhing/ /gtsang dang mi
24b3(mdo 'grel): mnyam med pa dang/ /dang zhing rim gyis srab pa dang/ /blta ba'i tshe na lhod pa dang/ /smin ma'ang snyoms shing rim gyis srab/ /sha ni srab cing zlum pa dang/ /sha dang pags pa legs par 'brel/ /rtsa rgyus mi mngon mnyam na bzang/ /
24b4(mdo 'grel): 'phral ba yangs par snang ba dag/ sha srab mnyam zhing dbyes che dang/ /rim gyis yangs par gyur pa dang/ /gnyer ma med na bsdags pa yin/ /'gram klang rim gyis yangs pa dang/ /brtan zhing sra bar gyur pa bzang/ /rna ba
24b5(mdo 'grel): spu dang gnyer ma med/ /rtse mo phra ba bsdags pa yin/ /rta yi mgo bo snyoms pa dang/ /ring zhing rgya che nang med dang/ /gtsug dang phum phum legs pa dang/ /dbyibs legs pa ni bsdags pa yin/ /rdog ma shin tu mang nyung
24b6(mdo 'grel): min/ /'jam zhing de bzhin nag nog med/ /snum zhing ring la cung zad 'khyil/ /de bzhin rim pa legs gnas shing/ /shin tu mi ring rab thung min/ /rta la bsdags par gyur pa yin/ /rta yi spu ni 'thug gnyen
24b7(mdo 'grel): 'dram/? /rtsa ba brtan zhing shal 'jug /shin tu snum zhing legs pas skye/ /nyag re las ni skye ba bsdag sar /lkog ma mdog dang mgrin par 'brel/ /rang bzhin zlum la snyoms pa dang/ /ljan ljin gyis ni gos
25a1(mdo 'grel): pa med/ /dri ma med na bsngags ba yin/ /srol mdung zlum zhing ra nyam la 'brel/ /dbyibs ni drang por 'dug ba bsdags/ /ske mgrin rim gyis zlum pa dang/ /ring zhing dbyibs ni legs pa dang/ /ming pa rtse'u
25a2(mdo 'grel): chung dang 'brel cing/ /de bzhin mgo bo dang 'brel ba/ /lkog ma'i phyogs na shi srab cing/ /lhod min cung zad 'gugs ba dang/ /sha rgyas legs par 'brel ba ni/ /rta la bar du bsngags pa yin/ /skra rtsa legs par
25a3(mdo 'grel): rgyas ba dang/ /sha che sum mdo yangs ba dang/ /sha mkhregs yan lag legs 'brel cing/ /sha mi lhod na bsdags pa yin/ /ze'u ne legs 'brel cher mi mthong/ /ze'u ltag dang rjes su 'brel/ /phrag god ze
25a4(mdo 'grel): lhag 'brel cing yangs/ /sha rgyas tshig 'brel mnyam zhing sra/ /sogs pa sha rgyas dang rab 'phrel/ /rta la bsdags par gyur pa yin/ /ba ha zlum zhing sha rgyas la/ /gtsug med shin tu brtan pa dang/ /yang
25a5(mdo 'grel): zhing dbugs ni rgyu ba dang/ /mtho bar gyur na bsdags ba yin/ /dpung rgyas zlum zhing rgyus ba rtsa/ /mi mdon tshigs dad sha snyoms la/ /sha ni cung zad mtho bar snang/ /de ni shing tu mdags pa yin/ /dpung pa sha rgyas
25a6(mdo 'grel): ring ba dang/ /sra zhing zlum la drad zhing mnyam/ /rim gyis phra bar gyur ba dang/ /tshigs ni legs par 'brel ba bzang/ /bus mo dag ni rib mnyam zlum/ /tshigs dam tshigs ni mi mdon dang/ /mdzes shing rtse
