25a7(mdo 'grel): mi sngon ba dang/ /'gro tshe dgug par bden bzang/ /che grang ring zhing shin tu zlum/ /shin tu sha srab ma yin mkhregs/ /rtsa rgyus dag ni mi mngon la/ /nad med pa ni rta la bsdags/ /tshe'u rtsub cing 'greng ba dang
25b1(mdo 'grel): zlum zhing legs skyes thur ba dang/ /tshigs mi mngon zhing yod mo dang/ /sgrog mkhar ring por snang dang bcas/ /rkang pa dang 'brel mnyam zhing ring/ /rta la mdags bar gyur pa yin/ /tshe'u tshe shin tu mnyam zhing zlum/ /ring zhing rgyu ma la
25b2(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa dang/ /dbus ni cung zad lcong ba dang/ /tshe'u sbus g.yogs bsngags pa yin/ /rmig ba mtho zhing zlum ba dang/ /shin tu sra zhing 'thug pa dang/ /zam tog ltar zlum zhing mdzes/ /bod rmig 'dra na'ang bsdags pa yin/ /
25b3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin sgros ni ma gas zhing/ /rna zhing mi gu gzegs pa chad/? /kha dog du ma'ang kha dog gcig/ khra bor gyur pa med na bzang/ /dbus ni shin tu zab ba dang/ /rmig mthil rdo leb ltar sra zhing/ /sbal 'tshams legs par skyes
25b4(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /mdzes ba dag dang ldan pa dang/ /sbal ba bub cing gsal bar mngon/ /mtshams ni legs par 'dod pa dang/ /nyen 'khor mnyam zhing 'jam pa dang/ /rkang ba'i nad dang bral ba dang/ /brtan zhing ljan ljin med pa dang/ /kha
25b5(mdo 'grel): dog bsnum pa bsdags pa yin/ /ze'u shas ni rgyas pa dang/ /gtsug lag med pa ni bsdags pa yin/ /sga log mnyam zhing yangs ba dang/ /rgyab ni mtheb sor tsam gyis dma'/ /rgal tshigs cung zad mtho ba dang/ /sha yis rgyas na
25b6(mdo 'grel): bsdags pa yin/ /rtsig ma gug cing lcang lcong med/ /mi mngon rab tu mnyam zhing sra/ /phrag gong rgyas par khyab gyur cing/ /mnyam zhing 'jam na bsdags ba yin/ /gsus khyim zlum zhing yangs pa dang/ /ri dags kyi ni dbyibs 'dra zhing/ /
25b7(mdo 'grel): bug med la zung zlum chu/ /sku snyoms pa ni bsngags pa yin/ /ong do mnyam zhing zlum ba dang/ /dbyibs ni legs bar gyur ba dang/ /mjug ngo shin tu rgyas min zhing/ /ha cang zhum pa'ang ma yin la/ /rgyab gzhung bas ni mtho na bzang/ /sra zhing
26a1(mdo 'grel): zlum la rus mi mngon/ /gsal zhing rim gyis mdzes bar gnas/ /shin tu thung dang ring ba min/ /gdod gi tshang dang mnyam pa dang/ /mjug ma ngang legs 'bral ba bzang/ /rta yi rnga ma sbu ring zhir/ /ma nyams
26a2(mdo 'grel): kha dog gcig pa dang/ /mnyen zhing snum par gyur pa ni/ /rta la shis bar bshad pa yin/ /mjug cos shin tu mtho ma yin/ /shin tu byes dang 'dus pa'ang min/ /lus dang rjes mthun tshang dang ldan/ /de lta bu ngag bsngags pa
26a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rku ba ni zab cing zlum pa dang/ /dbyibs legs phyi rol gnyer ma med/ /gang gis rta sbrangs legs gtong ba/ /de ni rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /brla nang shin tu yangs min zhing/ /dog par gyur pa min na bsngags//
26a4(mdo 'grel): rlig pa ngo mnyam legs 'brel skyes/ /spu ni med par gyur pa dang/ /dbus ni bilba tsam zhig ni/ /shin tu mi 'phyang gyur ba bsngags/ /mtshan ni rtsa sbom rim gyis phra/ /'jam zhing myur du ldang ba dang/ /sbubs yangs pas
26a5(mdo 'grel): ni g.yogs pa dang/ kha zheng shin tu phye zhing zlum/ /gting ring kha dog gcig ldan pa'i/ /rta ni bsngags par gyur pa yin/ /dbyi mgul mnyam zhing dbyibs med la/ /pags srab sbu ni legs pa bzang/ /rku ba tsos sra zhing legs
26a6(mdo 'grel): par 'brel/ /rtsa rgyus dag ni mi mngon bzang/ /dbyi ni legs par 'byor ba dang/ /legs par rdzogs par gyur pa dang/ /yangs shing dkyus ni ring ba dang/ /pags pa srab la sha rgyas bzang/ /rje dang snyoms shing
26a7(mdo 'grel): dbyibs lags? dang/ /rim gyis phra bar gyur pa dang/ /shin tu phra ba'i rus pas khyab/ /rta ni bsngags par gyur pa yin/ /che sa? grang la sogs lus stong ni/ /ci 'drar ro smad de bzhin du/ /mtshan nyid thams cad bshad
26b1(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /de'i 'og tu rgong ma yi/ /lus kyis phyogs kyi mtshan nyid dag/ gang dag yin pa bshad par bya/ /de'i mtshan ni mnyam che gsal/ /legs par bltams shang legs par 'dzag/ bu ga che zhing grwa mtshams che/ /ring zhing
26b2(mdo 'grel): mtshan ni rga phyed la/ /mngal gyi nyes pa dang bral ba/ /de'i mo mtshan de 'dra bsngags/ /nu ma zlum zhing rgyas pa dang/ /shin tu 'chad pa ma yin dang/ /'o ma skyon med legs par rgyas/ /rgong ma rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /nu sor mnyam zhing
26b3(mdo 'grel): zlum pa dang/ /bu ga legs shing 'o ma rgyas/ /shin tu 'dus min gyes pa'ang min/ /'thug cing brten la legs par skyes/ /shin tu 'byar min rab 'phyang min/ /rte'us 'o ma btung bde bsngags/ /lhag ma rgong ma'i yan lag kun/ /rta pho
26b4(mdo 'grel): dang ni 'dra bar bsdags/ /de lta mod kyi gzugs mdzes pas/ /rgod ma'i gzugs ni bzang bar bshad/ /lus ni sbom bor gyur ba yang/ /phra ba lta bur mngon pa yin/ /lus srab par ni gyur na yang/ /rgod ma sbu mdangs yod pa
26b5(mdo 'grel): mngon/ /de 'dra'i tshul gyis lus kyi ni/ /dbyibs kyi bye brag shes par bya/ /rgod ma rta pho 'dra ba dang/ /rta pho rgong ma 'dra ba ru/ /gal te phyin ci log ci snang/ /dgos pa'i 'bras bu 'byin mi? 'gyur/ /lus tsha? mdangs ni bzang ba dang//
26b6(mdo 'grel): legs par skyes shing tshad dang ldan/ /gzi brjid yan lag dbyes pa dang/ /yan lag cha ni snyoms pa dang/ /gtsug 'khyil dag zhing gzi mdangs dge/ dri bzang yan lag mi sdug med/ /lus rgyas 'gros ni bzang ba dang//
26b7(mdo 'grel): 'jigs med/ gnas gsum yangs pa dang/ /tshad mnyam dbyibS ni legs pa ste/ /gang zhig de 'dra'i lus ldan pa/ /bdag po'i grags dang rigs dang nor/ /rnam par 'phel par 'gyur ba yin/ /yon tan phyin ci
27a1(mdo 'grel): log ldan pa/ /bdag bo'i don rnams nyams byed yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ /yan lag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //dka' thub sa sa ma gtan chen po
27a2(mdo 'grel): yis/ /gzi byin gsal gyur drang srod la/ /blo dang ldan pa legs thos kyis/ /sngar bshad pa ni dris gyur ba/ /khyed kyis phyogs bstan gsungs mod kyi/ /bshad pa dag ni ma gsungs base/ /bstan pa rnams kyis bshad pa ni/
27a3(mdo 'grel): legs ldan gsungs bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /bstan pa bshad pa dad bcas pa/ /bu yis bskul bas smras pa ni/ /ming pa srol kong dang 'brel bas/ /ro 'dzin lcer ni shes par bya/ /de'i steng ni rkan yin te/ /ma rkan lce 'og?
27a4(mdo 'grel): yin bar bshad/ /'gram so 'gram pa las skyes ba/ /ldad pa'i so ni yin par bshad/ /de las gzhan pa mdun gyi so/ /bcu gnyis mtshan mar ldan pa yin/ /de rnams kyi sa ni dbus gnas pa/ /steng 'og bzhi ni
27a5(mdo 'grel): mche ba yin/ /sted 'og gi ni so 'geb ba/ /gnyis po mchu ni yin par bshad/ /mchu mdza' yi ni ngos gnyis na/ /'gram pa'i dbus chud pa 'gram yin/ /ya mchu'i stong na bgros yod de/ /de yi steng gi mchu ltag
27a6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /ma mchu'i 'og ma ko sa ko ste/ /de ltag 'gam pa yin bar bshad/ /sna god mi gnyis bar 'tshams gdong/ /gdod gi yan lag sna god gnyis/ /gdong gi ngos gnyis khur chos yin/ /de bar dma' ba
27a7(mdo 'grel): mchi ma'i stan/ /de dag rnams kyi gong na mig/ mig 'bras 'gebs ba mig mchu yin/ /mig mdza' i dkar po mig sbin yi/ /de dbus zlum nag mthong mig yin/ /mthong mig nag po zlum po'i dbus/ /'phra zhis
27b1(mdo 'grel): zhing dang ba mig rgyal mo/ /mig ltag gnyis ni mig gi sgyu/ /de stengs smin ma gnyis yin no/ /mig gi rgyab ni mig zur ste/ /nang gi mtshams ni mig phugs yin/ smin gam gnyis re dpral ba ste/ /dbral ba'i steng gi dpral mtshams yin/
27b2(mdo 'grel): de stengs spyi bo yin par bshad/ /rna ba'ang gnyis bar glad pa ste/ /mig zur mu 'gram bar mur kod/ /mur kong rna ba'i bar mur 'gram/ /mkhur chos gnyis kyi rgyab za yu/ /de gnyis phyi rol 'gram glang yin/ /'gram pa srol
27b3(mdo 'grel): gong gnyis kyi bar/ /lkog ma zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /rna ba gnyis kyi steng dang rgyab/ /rna ltag dang ni rna mchen yin/ /mgo dang phrag so'i bar ske mgrin/ /ske mgrin phrag so'i ltag rke rtsa/ /de steng rdog g.yab yin par bshad/ /rdog mdza' 
27b4(mdo 'grel): rna ba'i bar phum phum/ /rdog g.yab mdza' ni ze'u ltag ste/ /de yi rgyab ni dang? ru yin/ /dang ru'i 'og ni nam chod zhes/ /rta rnams la ni bshad pa yin/ /ze'u ltag gi ni 'og ma nyid/ /ze'u yin par shes bar bya/ /ze'u'i rjes thogs kho na
27b5(mdo 'grel): la/ /sga 'og yin par shes par bya/ /de phan cad ni rgal tshigs dang/ /rgyab nyid yin par shes par bya/ /ze'u'i ngos gnyis phrag so ste/ phrag so'i rtsa ba dbud mgo yin/ /lkog ma dang ni srol god bar/ /mid nga 'o de 'og srol mdud
27b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /mid 'og lag par brang yin no/ /de rjes lag 'og bar snying ga/ de 'og dpung sna dbud pa yin/ /dpung pa'i nang ni mtshan khud phan/ /rgyab kyi cha ni dpung rgyab yin/ /de 'og pus mo gnyis kyi ltag/ pus gong dang ni
27b7(mdo 'grel): lag ngar gnyis/ /bus mo'i 'og? ru tshig? grang ste/ /de 'og tshig grang phra mo yin/ /tshig grang sbom phra'i bar na ni/ /tshig grang nad de de 'og gi/ mdun gyi cha ni tshe'u gdod yin/ /rgyab ni che'u spur ?
28a1(mdo 'grel): bya/ /de'i lhag de ni sgrog mkhar yin/ /de'i yang 'og na yod pa yi/ /tshe'u tshe zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /de'i 'og rmig pa'i mtshams yin la/ /de yi 'og tu rmig pa yin/ /rmig pa'i mdza' ma rmig sgos yin/ /rmig pa'i
28a2(mdo 'grel): 'og ni rmig mthil ti/ /rmig mthil nang mdza' sbal pa'i mtshams/ /rmig mthil dbus ni sbal pa yin/ /dbung mdza' i mgon snying yod de/ /nge'i ngos ni rtsib logs yin/ /rtsib log 'og tu dku yin la/ /de yi steng ni sga 'dab yin/ /rgal
28a3(mdo 'grel): chi gas kyis ni cha dag gi/ mtshams ni ro snang yin par bshad/ /rus pa gsum ni 'dus pa yi/ /sum mngo? mjug to yin par bshad/ /mjug to'i 'og tu ong ngo? ste/ /de rjes rnga rtsa yin par bshad/ /de'i ngos spyi steng yin//
28a4(mdo 'grel): dbyi steng 'og ni ro hi ni/ /bar na rnga ma rnga snying bcas/ /de gnyis 'og ni brla dbyi'i mtshams/ /rnga rtsa'i 'og ni rkub yin la/ /de yi ngos gnyis rku btsos yin/ /de yi 'og ni 'breg yin la/ /de dag ger ni mjug srungs yin/ /brla
28a5(mdo 'grel): ye nang na rlig pa ste/ /rlig pa dang 'brel mtshan yin no/ /de gnyis mdun na smad pa ste/ /smang ga snying nga'i dbus lta ba/ /dgu yang bar na gnas pa yin/ /dku na lta ba'i bar na rgyu/ /rgyab dang dku yi bar ra na 'dra/ /ran
28a6(mdo 'grel): 'dra'i 'og ni sdu gu mig/ de yi pha rol dpyi yin te/ /de yi 'og ma brla yin no/ /de yi yang 'og brla phra mo/ /de yi 'og ni rje dar yin/ /de 'og sre long chig gang yin/ /lha gam ro stong rjes 'brangs te/ /thams
28a7(mdo 'grel): cad nye bar dbye bar bya/ /sha li ha tra'i mdo gnas las/ /bstan pa rnams bshad pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// //rta yi tshe yi rig byed mkhan/ /drang srong mgyags? 'gro'i gnyen
28b1(mdo 'grel): gyur ba/ /sha li ho tra dbang thul la/ /mdza' la rgyal gyis yongs dris pa/ /rta yi tshul gyi de nyid mkhyen/ /tshad ni rnam pa du ru bshad/ /mi sdug gzhal min gang zhig lags/ /sdug cing gzhal bzod gang zhig lags/ /yan
28b2(mdo 'grel): lag nying lag shes pa dang/ /grangs nyid kyi ni bye brag rnams/ /bdag cag blo gros zhan bsam/ legs ldan khyod las mnyan bar 'tshal/ /de skad smras tshe slob dpon gyur/ /drang srong ngam bas slar smras pa/ /ji skad bstan pa 'di
28b3(mdo 'grel): mnyan nas/ /mdza' las rgyal gyis bzung bar gyis/ /rgur zhing gdod dang rkeng pa zhum/ /'khums dang shin tu rgyas grags dang/ /'dug dang dbang po yul gyi gnas/ /de bzhin brang ni 'phyugs pa dang/ /rkeng? pa skrangs
28b4(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa dang/ /shin tu dma' dang shin tu mtho/ /gang zhig lus stong shin tu che/ /de bzhin rgyab ni lhag par dma'/ /lus ni shin tu mi sdug dang/ /de bzhin rked bzhum pa ste/ /mi sdug rta ni bcu po 'di/ /gzhal min
28b5(mdo 'grel): yin par shes par bya/ /stobs mnyams shing mdzes pa yi/ /lus ldan rta ni bco lnga pa/ /lus kyi chu zhing legs gnas shing/ /gnas kyi chi nam 'chugs pa/ /chod shes pa yi gzhal bya yi/ /gzugs ngan nam
28b6(mdo 'grel): yang mi gzhal lo/ /rke mgrin lus ni cha mnyam zhing/ /rnga snying mgo dang mnyam pa dang/ /ong? mngo? ngang? ni brang zhing mnyam/ /pus mo'i tshe'u mnyam pa dang/ /dbangs dang zheng gi tshang dang ni/ /legs pa snyoms par
28b7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i rta/ /de 'dra'i tshad dang ldan pa dag/ cha mnyam yin par shes bar bya/ /rta ni lus kyi cha mnyam pa'i/ /tshang ni rnam gsum mnyam par gyis/ /rta mchog gi ni dpral ba la/ /sor ni bcu gnyis yongs
29a1(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /rna ba song drug yin zhes bya/ /so dag sor ni phyed dang gnyis/ /mig ni sor gsum shes par bya/ /mche ba'i dbangs ni sor gnyis yin/ /mgo'o sor ni nyi shu brgyad/ /phum phum gnas ni
29a2(mdo 'grel): dpangs sor gsum/ /rta mchog gi ni chu du ni/ /sor brgya rtsa bzhi nyid yin no/ /ske mgrin sor ni sum cu ste/ /ze'u ltag sor ni drug yin la/ /rgyab ni sum cur shes par bya/ /ong ngo gdong pa ngag dang mnyam/ /'breg ni sor ni bcu
29a3(mdo 'grel): yin te/ /'di yi chu yi chang du bshad/ /rlig pa bilba bzang po yi/ /tshad tsam yod pa shes par bya/ /rta mchog gis ni mtshan dag la/ /sor ni bcu drug yin shes bya/ /'phrag so sor ni nyi shu drug/ dpung mgo nying ni sor bcu
29a4(mdo 'grel): yin/ /dbung pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ pus mo'i tshig ni sor drug ba/ /che'u spu sod drug yin zhes bya/ /tshig grang dkyus su sor bcu drug/ tshe'u tsha sor ni drug pa yin/ /rmig pa'ang de dang mnyam pa yin/ /rked pa'i dbus
29a5(mdo 'grel): kyi zhang gang yin/ /dpangs ni de dang mnyam pa yin/ /tshad ni rta mchog dag gi yin/ /de nas bar ma'i bshad bya ste/ /dbral pa'i chad ni sor bcu yin/ /gdong pa sor ni nyi shu drug/ mig la sor ni phyed dang gsum
29a6(mdo 'grel): phum phum gnas kyang de dang 'dra/ /sor la sor gcig bzhi cha gcig/ mche ba sor gcig bzhi cha gnyis/ /rna ba'i dbangs su sor lnga ru/ /rta ni bar ma'i yin par bshad/ /ske mgrin nyi shu rtsa bdun du/ /bstan
29a7(mdo 'grel): bcos rtogs pas shes par bya/ /rdog mdza' sor ni lnga ru bshad/ /rgyab ni ske mgrin dag dang mnyam/ /'breg la sor ni bdun yin te/ /ong do nyi shu rtsa drug yin/ /bar ma 'di yi chu ru ni/ /so rin dbu bcu rtsa
29b1(mdo 'grel): gnyis yin/ /mgo bo sor ni nyi shu drug /'di yi rnga snying de dang mnyam/ /bar ma rlig pa'i tshang ngag ni/ /bilba 'bring bo tsam yin no/ /bar gyi mtshan gyi tshad dag ni/ /sor ni bcu bzhi yin par bshad/ /spangs su sor ni bcu
29b2(mdo 'grel): dgu ngag /'di la bsngags bar gyur pa yin/ /phrag sor sor ni nyi shu lnga/ /dpung mgo sar ni brgyad yin no/ /dpung ba sor ni nyi shu gsum/ /pus mo tsha'u dang mnyam pa yin/ /tshig grang sor ni bcu bzhi ste/ /tshe'u spu sor
29b3(mdo 'grel): ni lnga pa yin/ /tshe'u tshe'ang sor ni lnga ba ste/ /rmig ba'ang de dang 'dra bar bshad/ /rta yi tha ma dag gi tshad/ /dpral bsor ni brgyang yin te/ /mgo bo sor ni nyi shu bzhi/ /mig ni sor gnyis yin zhes bya/ /phum phum gnas
29b4(mdo 'grel): kyang de dang 'dra/ /mche ba sor ni phyang dang gnyis/ /so yi dpangs su sor gcig yin/ /rna ba'i dpangs ni sor bzhi ste/ /ske 'gram nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /rdog mdza' sor ni bzhi yin no/ /rgyab ni rked pa nyid dang mnyam/ /'breg
29b5(mdo 'grel): gi tshad ni sor bzhi ste/ /or ngo sor ni nyi shu bzhi/ /chu ru sor ni brgyad cu yin/ /mgo bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /rnga snying dag kyang de dang mnyam/ /rlig pa bilba chung du tsam/ /pho mtshan sor ni bcu gnyis yin/ /rta ni
29b6(mdo 'grel): tha ma'i dpangs su ni/ /sor ni brgyad cu yin par bshad/ /phrag so sor ni nyi shu bzhi/ /dpung mgo 'di yi sor drug yin/ /dbung ba sor ni nyi shu gnyis/ /pus mo sor ni bzhi yin la/ /rta ni tha ma'i tshig grang gi/
29b7(mdo 'grel): dpangs ni sor bcu gnyis yin no/ /che'u spu'i gnas ni sor bzhi ste/ /che'u tshe rmig pa de dang 'dra/ /de ltar chu yi tshang bshad pa/ /cha ni ci bzhin bzhag pa yin/ /ro stong kyi ni dpangs gang yin/ /'og nas rdog mdza' i
30a1(mdo 'grel): par du gzhal/ /ro smad mjug to'i mtshams nas ni/ /'og nas steng du de bzhin gzhal/ /de ltar dpangs su gzhal nas ni/ /bstan bcos mkhas pas bya ba yin/ /rnga snying rtsa nas mi gzur gyi//?
30a2(mdo 'grel): du chur ni gzhal bar bya/ /dpyi steng mjug to dbyi mgul dang/ /brla dpyi'i mtshams ni gang yin pa/ /mchog dang bar ma tha ma ya'ang/ /phyag so dang ni mnyam pa yin/ /rje dar dpyi yi ba ha las/ /sor gcig gis na tshung par
30a3(mdo 'grel): bshang/ /s+thur pus mo'i tshang las ni/ /sor gcig lhag par shes par bya/ /chig grang la sogs sngar bshad pa/ /phyi rkang gi yang de 'ngar? ldan/ /nas brgyad kyi ni lto gshibs pa'i/ /zheng ni sor du shes par bya/ /la la
30a4(mdo 'grel): mthe bo'i chags kyi zheng/ /sor yin par ni 'chang par byed/ /gzhan dag skyes bu ran pa yi/ /la gsor gyi ni gud mo yi/ /tshigs ni dbus ma'i nang dag la/ /ser yin par ni 'dod pa yin/ /rta gzhan gang dag yod
30a5(mdo 'grel): pa dag/ tsha nga 'di yis ni gzhal bar bya/ /de ldar mchog dang bar ma dang/ /tha mar gyur ba'i rta gsum la/ /tshad ni rnam pa gsum dag gis/ /gzhal bar 'dir ni bshad pa yin/ /de ltar chu zheng tshang ldan pa'i/ /lus
30a6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa gang zhig yin/ /lus dang 'tsham par sha rgyas shing/ /rkang pa sra pa mtshan? dang ldan/ /yan lag gsal zhing mnyan pa dang/ /lus snyoms sha ni mkhregs pa dag/ bkra shis dpal skyed dge
30a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /'dod pa thams cad sbyin byed yin/ /shal ho tra'i mdog nas las/ /tshad gzhal pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang yan lag bcu'i/ /cha yi le'u
30b1(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya/ /dang po'i gnas ni dpral ba yin/ /mthar thug tshad du bshad pa yin/ /gnyis pa dbral pa'i steng gi ni/ /glang pa la ni brten pa yin/ /gsum pa ske? mgrin phrag so yi/ /lus kyi phyogs ni yin par bshad/ /nam
30b2(mdo 'grel): chong ze'u stag ze'u/ /dpung mgo de gzhin phrag so dang/ /sog pa'i gnas ni gang yin pa/ /bzhi pa dag ni yin par 'dod/ /lus kyi ro stong cha mnyam dang/ /dpung sna la sogs lnga bo yin/ /snying ga lag 'og rtsib
30b3(mdo 'grel): logs dang/ /sga 'og dang ni rgyab nyid ni/ /rta yi gnas ni drug pa yin/ /rgal tshig dang ni lto ba dang/ /mtshan gyi nye 'khor gang yin dang/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu gang yin rnams/ /gnas ni bdun pa dag tu bshad/ /ong
30b4(mdo 'grel): ngo'i phyogs na gang yod dang/ /brla gnyis dang ni bcas pa dag/ de dag gnas ni brgyad pa yin/ /dpung pa dpung rgyab pus mo dang/ /brkub cos dbye mgul sbyi pa tshams dang/ /rje dar dang ni bcas/ pa dang/ /gnas
30b5(mdo 'grel): ni dgu pa yin par 'dod/ /pus mo rje dar man chad ni/ /gnas ni bcu pa zhes bya'o/ /dge ba 'am yang na mi dge ba/ /thams cad kyang ni mtshon par bya/ /gnas skabs cha yi 'bras bu dag/
30b6(mdo 'grel): de yi rtag tu brjod bya yin/ /de bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yi/ /rta yi tshang la sogs pa'ang bshad/ /gnas shes pa yi gnas rnams ni/ /rtogs bar byas la'ang 'bras bu brjod/ /tshe dang na tshong cha rnams ni/ /gnas
30b7(mdo 'grel): las shes par byas te bstan/ /mtshan nyid ldan na 'bras bur bcas/ /go zlog pa ni 'bras bu med/ /mtshan nyid gnas ni 'khrugs pa las/ /'bru du khyad par 'phags par 'gyur/ /mdog dang gi? 
31a1(mdo 'grel): mdangs snying stobs dri/ /ci bzhin dus su 'bras bu ster/ /lus kyi 'gros dang skad dang ni/ /rtag tu 'bras bu 'byin pa yin/ /thig le dang ni gtsug gi ni/ /gnas skabs cha ni 'di las 'byung/ /sha
31a2(mdo 'grel): li ho tra'i mdo gnas las/ /yan lag bcu'i tshan? bye ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //legs thos thos pa phun tshogs pas/ /sha li ho tra dris pa/ /mi sdug ci ltar shes par gyis/ /ji bzhin
31a3(mdo 'grel): sdug pa ji lta bu/ /dman dang de bzhin mi dman dang/ /yan lag tshang dang ma tshang dang/ /gzhal bya nyid dang gzhal min dang/ /gso sla gso dka' ji lta bu/ /de ltar bu yis dris pa dang/ /shal li ho tras slar smas pa//
31a4(mdo 'grel): sa so'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba/ /de dag khyad la bshad par bya/ /gang yang lus kyi byibs legs shing/ /rtsa rgyus gnang bar mi 'gyur dang/ /shin gnas dang 'tsham par skyes/ /lus snyoms gsus pa chung bdud
31a5(mdo 'grel): ? dang mig ni dga' byed pa/ /ro smad mnyam zhing zlum pa dang/ /mdzos shing dbyibs ni legs gnas dang/ /yan lag nyid lag rdzogs pa dang/ /yan lag kun gyis dbyibs legs dang/ /nyid lag rnams ni ma
31a6(mdo 'grel): sdug dang/ /mgyogs zhing nyams dang ldan pa dang/ /des shing stobs dang ldan pa dang/ /na tshong gzhon zhing 'gros che dang/ /sgo mgrin phrag so brang gi phyogs/ /sha rgyas tshad dang ldan la sogs/ /'di dag gzhal bya
31a7(mdo 'grel): cha mnyam dang/ /gso sla mi sdug med pa yin/ /de las zlog par gyur ba'i rta/ /gzhal bya la sogs ma yin no/ /de lta'i mi sdug la sogs dang/ /ldan pa'i rta ni gang yin pa/ /shing rta lam dang khal dang ni/ /? ?
31b1(mdo 'grel): gnas dang g.yul dag tu/ /las dang 'tsham pa ma yin pas/ /de phyir de ni spang bar bya/ /de ltar blang 'os blangs nas ni/ /lhag ma sdang bya rnam par spangs/ /chod pa rnams la rta dag ni/ /bzang po blang bar gyur ba dang/ /de phyir bzang po
31b2(mdo 'grel): shes byas la/ /de lta'i rta ni blang bar bya/ /spris ma bshus pa'i zho lta bur/ /lhag ma snying po med pa yin/ /de lta mos kyis brtse ba yin/ /spang bya de yang tshong pa dang/ /rta la brtse bar bya ba'i phyir/ /blangs te sbyin pa btang bar bya//
31b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan ni ngan par gyur na yang/ /mgyogs shing rigs dang na tshod ldan/ /rgyal pos lha khang rnams dang ni/ /bram ze la ni sbyin par bya/ /ma ning rgan dang nad kyis nyen/ /nye 'khor gnas pa'i mings sbyin/ /rlig pa med dang rlig gcig pa
31b4(mdo 'grel): rlig sar dang ni lus skems dang/ /yan lag mtshar gyur ba dag/ nyud rum la sogs rnams la sbyin/ /g.yul du 'jug par mi nus pa/ /gar mkhar dang na blu mkhan dang/ /khrus mkhan dang ni 'dreg mkhan dang/ /de 'dra'i tshul
31b5(mdo 'grel): ldan dag la sbyin/ /de la shin tu mi sdug pa/ /shin tu bzang ba'ang mi sbyin no/ /shu lag dang gzugs mi sdug/ so mi sdug dang mi bskun pa/ /nye 'khor gyi ni ? nya sogs/ /drag shul byed pa rnams la sprin/ /'gros
31b6(mdo 'grel): chung ba dang spag pa dang/ /rkang ngan blas kyi nang mi skyin/ /rtal gdug par gyur pa ni/ /mtshams bsrung mdza' 'kho ba bdag dang/ /nyes pa cher ldan dag la sbyin/ /rang gi yul du de mi bzhag/ de rnams rtog
31b7(mdo 'grel): la mkhas pa ni/ /rgyal po'i drung du rtag par bzhag/ de ltar rta ni rnam phye na/ /rgyal po'i 'byor ba 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /yid ni dka' zhing mgu ba ni/ /g.yul rang skra las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i
32a1(mdo 'grel): gnas lam/ /sdus pa dang mi sdug ba rnam par bye ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum ba'o// //? 'char ka 'dra ba yi/ /drang srong ba la byag byas te/ /legs thos kyi ni zas? kyi chad/ /nam
32a2(mdo 'grel): bar btags pa dris gyur pa/ /leg pa ldan mi la zas kyi tshad/ /bshad kyis rta la ci zhing 'tshal/ /byugs rnams dang ni khyad par du/ /rta la ngal? so ma mchis te/ /de rnams dbugs 'byin tsam gyis? ni/ /zos shad bcas pa 'ju
32a3(mdo 'grel): gyur la/ /phyugs na lto bar grags bas na/ /de la tshad ni ci zhig bgyi?/ /de skad legs thos kyis smas tshe/ /sha li ho tras slar smas pa/ /blo gros bzang po nan tan du/ /shin tu grangs kyang chad tsam du/ khyin na dga' ba skyed byed
32a4(mdo 'grel): cing/ /tshod zin dug kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /tshod ma zin na bdud rtsis kyang/ /gsod par 'gyur ba nyid yin no/ /bde zhing gsol 'tsho byed pas/ /tshod zin 'jig rten ma dang 'dra/ /de med srog mdza' i 'jigs bskyed la/ /de dang
32a5(mdo 'grel): ldan na gnas mchog 'gyur/ /rta ni mang du zabs na/ /tshang cing dgos ba bden mod kyi/ /sman dang zas sko mchog ni/ /'grong na bor bu la yang dgos/ /chod ma zin na sman gyis kyang/ /nad gzhan skyed bar 'gyur
32a6(mdo 'grel): yin la/ /tshed dang ldan par byas pa yis/ /dug gis kyang ni nang 'joms so/ /rdzas dang 'ju stobs rdzas ci yang/ /tshad ni rnam pa gsum la 'jug/ snying dga' shugs ni ma bkag dang/ /lta la shin tu mi gnod dang//
32a7(mdo 'grel): rtsib sogs rnam pa ni bde ba dang/ /gsus ba lci bdam gyur la/ /bkres rang skom ni zhib dang/ /dbang po rnams ni chim pa dang/ /dbugs rdub dbugs dbyung bde ba dang/ /ba nyid ni bde bar log byed dang/ /stobs dang
32b1(mdo 'grel): kha dog 'phel byed dang/ /bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur ba dang/ /lus gzungs 'khrug par mi byed pa/ /tshed zin zos pa yin par bshad/ /kha zas lci bas lto ba yi/ /phyed ma sum cha bkang ba bsngags/ /kha zas shin tu yang ba yang
32b2(mdo 'grel): shin tu 'grangs par mi sbyin no/ /de ltar tshad las tshad min par/ /kha zas shin tu yang ba dang/ /shin tu 'grangs par mi sbyin no/ /de ltar tshad las tshad min par/ /lhag pa 'am chungs par gyur pa ni/ /stobs
32b3(mdo 'grel): dang snying stobs blo dang ni/ /mdog dang dbang po la gnod byed/ /rlung ni 'gag ba 'am sbyor bar byed/ /nad skyed byed ba'i mchog yin la/ /ro mi tsa zhing tshe thung dang/ /mdangs med bkra mi shis par 'gyur/ /de
32b4(mdo 'grel): bas rto rnams log pa yi /zas la sbyod lam bzog bar bya/ /'gro ngas grags par ni gyur pa las/ /nad gzhi thams cad 'khrug byed cing/ /gsung dang pho ba'i nad skyed pas/ /rta ni de las bzlog par bya/ /ji
32b5(mdo 'grel): tsam byas ni lto ba'i me/ /'bar 'gyur de tsa mi sbyin par bya/ /tshad mi ldan par byin pa yis/ /yang na grags pa 'am mtshungs par 'gyur/ /rdzas ni chu skyes brlan can dang/ /skam sar skya ste gsum du
32b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod?/ /de dag tshad mi ldan par ni/ /bza' ba'i bya ba'ang thob 'dod de /mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam zas sogs/ /tshang mi ldan dang 'dra ba yi/ /bras ni smos kyi skom 'am ni/ /snam mas cu? yi
32b7(mdo 'grel): tshogs dang ni/ /gangs lhags bstan pa grags pas kyang/ /tshad mi ldan par gnod pa skyed/ /de bas spyi dang khyad par gyi/ /tshad ni nga yis bshad par bya/ /'o lams bzhi ma sha yin//
33a1(mdo 'grel): de bzhi la ni shan ste/ /de gcig la ni su ban/ /de nyid zho gnyis zhes bya'o/ /de bzhi la ni srang? gcig ste/ /de bzhi la ni phul du bshad/ /phul ba ni la ni bre gang yin/ /de bzhi la ni ?
33a2(mdo 'grel): bzhi ste/ /de bzhi la ni dron yin/ /'di ni spyi yi tshang yin la/ /gsher rdzas la ni nyes 'gyur bya/ /snam ni tshad kyi phyed du bya/ /ak+Sha lag pa'i mthil la sogs/ /zhe gnyis kyi ni ming yin no/ /srang byed ming ni ya mrad
33a3(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /srang gcig u dum+ba rang bshad/ /srang gnyis khyor gang zhes byar bshad/ /de gnyis la ni snyim par bshad/ /de la tswa skam dag las srang/ /brgyad brgya rta la ran pa yin/ /rlon pa de'i 'dab snye? mar?
33a4(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /bzhi brgya nyin mtshan gcig la ran?/ /thug sogs las ni bre bzhi tsam/ /bza' skam bre ni phye bar gnyis/ /snum las phul gang btung ba ni/ /bre gang sbyin par shes par bya/ /sbrang rtsi las ni phul
33a5(mdo 'grel): gang sbyin/ /bu re? ma las ni srang brgyad sbyin/ /hwags dang bar gang yin pa/ /srang ni bcu mched du sbyin/ /sna sman khub phul gang ste/ /snum gyi sna snan de yi phyed/ /du bas bdug la zho drug ste/ /du ba drag
33a6(mdo 'grel): po zho gnyis tshad/ /sman kha'i gong bu srang bzhi dag/ bad kan nad la sbyin par bya/ /rta la dgongs ka btung bar ni/ /chad ni bri gang blung par bya/ /rta rnams la ni phye ma'i sman/ /btags ba srang gnyis sbyin bar
33a7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /zas dang snum ni mnyam byin tshe/ /skam du chang ni blung par bya/ /rtal ? tshwa srang lnga yi/ /chang tu rab tu sbyin par bya/ /lus kun bsku byug bya ba mang/ /snum ni bre dang sbyar bar bya/ /rna bkang la yang
33b1(mdo 'grel): snum dag ni/ /grang gnyis nye bar gzhug par bya/ /bsku ba'i snum la sman las ni/ /srang brgyar phye mar btags pa gzhug bye las bre ni do dag dang/ /de ni bu ram bsrang brgyad gzhug/ mar las phul do sres ba yi/ /skyo mdag
33b2(mdo 'grel): ni sbyin par bya/ /chu skyes sha ni srang lnga bcu/ /brlan can shin srang bdun cu/ /skam ba'i sha ni srang dgu bcu/ /sha yi kha zas tshang yin no/ /khrag bre do la rgyam tshwa ni/ /srang gnyis nye bar gzhug bya zhing/ /snam yang
33b3(mdo 'grel): srang gnyis bcug pa ni/ /khrag zad pa la sbyin par bya/ /mas btang ba la bra gar tsam/ /dum bu gsum du byas te btang/ /btags pa las ni srang lnga? tsam/ / /srad pa? ni bcad de btang/ /'jam rtsi phul bzhi btang
33b4(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /'jam rtsi'i? gong ma phul gang btang/ /ma la 'jam rtsi btang ba ni/ /phul do dag ni bya bar bshad/ /sman ni srang bzhi'i chad dag ni/ /chu srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bkol/ /bzhi cha lus par byas pa dag/ 'di yi
33b5(mdo 'grel): sman khu yin par bshad/ /chu sman bcu drug 'gyur nang du/ /skal ba'i sman ni srang brgya gzhug/ snum yid srang brgya bcug nas ni/ /bzhen cha gsum bsdu bar bya/ der ni snum gyi bzhi cha yi/ /sman phye bcug la lde
33b6(mdo 'grel): gur bya/ /de la sha khu 'o ma ni/ /chu yi bzhi cha gzhug par bya/ /bskol chu sman dang sbyar ba yang/ /zhag lon ba ni spang bar bya/ /bu ram snyil du 'dod pa dang/ /bsregs na sgra mi 'byung ba yi/ mtshan ma de dang
33b7(mdo 'grel): dad bar ci/ /snang na thab la dbog par bya/ /de ni chos pa yin pa'i phyir/ /snum de slang ni dbab par bya/ /de ni btsags par gyur na na/ /yon tan ltag par 'gyur ba yin/ /snum zhing dang bar 'gyur ba dang//
34a1(mdo 'grel): gsal bar gyur nam mkhas pa yis/ /snum de mdog ni byin pa'i phyir/ /chos pa yin par shes par bya/ /de 'dra med? kun 'joms byed yin/ /mtshos chu dang 'dres ba dang/ /tshos drags
34a2(mdo 'grel): nag par gyur ba ni/ /nang kun 'khrug par byed pa yin/ /rma dang rna sman 'jam rtsi la/ /'jam par tshom ba btang bar bya/ /bskal? chos drags btung ba la/ /bar ma tsam ni bsngags pa yin/ /ma chos snum ni
34a3(mdo 'grel): nad skyed la/ /chos drags ban pa med pa yin/ /legs bar chos ba'i snum dag ni/ /rta yi nad ni 'jig byed yin/ /rlung mkhris bad kan sel ba'i snum/ /btung dang bsku dang sna sman dang/ /rma dang 'jam rtsi
34a4(mdo 'grel): las rnams te/ /rnam pa lnga la btang bar bya/ /tshad 'di dag ni rta rnams las/ /mchog gi yin par shes bar bya/ /bar ma la na bzhi cha dbri?/ /tha ma la ni byed de dbri'o/ /so so'i zas skom cho ga dang/
34a5(mdo 'grel): snum gyi chog tha dang bas/ /nang rnams zhi ba nyid 'gyur kyi/ /kun la gcig ni bsngags me yin/ /utpal ni kha 'byed pa/ /zla ba'i 'ong der nyid yin la/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis pad+ma ni/ /kha 'byed bar ni snang ba
34a6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /tshad ni ? stabs las shes la/ /ji dga' sbyin par mi bya'o/ /me drong de yang rnam bzhi ste/ /rno btul mnyam dang mi mnyam ba'o/ /rno bas shin tu myur du 'ju/ /brtul sa bsgang la du? ba yin//
34a7(mdo 'grel): ma snyoms pas ni 'ju mi snyoms/ /snyoms pas 'ju pa snyoms pa yin/ /me drod btul bas gzi mdangs mdog/ dbang po dang ? 'gros zhan 'gyur/ /ma drod rno bas de rnams dang/ /ldan zhib nang ni nyung ? gyu
34b1(mdo 'grel): me drod snyoms pas snying stobs mdog/ nad med 'gros dang skad dang ni/ /dbang po bde ldan nad med 'gyur/ /me drong mi snyoms skad dang mdog/ stobs chung nad ni mang ba dang/ /bde ba med par 'gyur ro zhes/ /sha li h+ro tras rjes
34b2(mdo 'grel): su bstan/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las tshad kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi ba'o// //rta bres la ni legs gnas pa'i/ /drang srong chen po dbang po thul/ /me la sbyin sreg byed pa rtsen la/ /legs thos la sogs
34b3(mdo 'grel): gyis dris pa/ /chas shing gang gi don 'gyur zhing/ /gang gi yon tan skye ? bshad pa/ /de yi zas kyi bya ba ni/ /lus dang nges 'brel bka' stsol cig/ de skad sha li ho tA la/ /drang srong dam pa bus dris tshe/ /zas kyi sbyor ba drang srong che//
34b4(mdo 'grel): mdangs dang ldan pa slar smras pa/ /zas kyi sbyor bas kha dog mdangs/ /mgyogs mdzes snying stobs dran pa dang/ /'drangs dang sems ni dga' ba dang/ /na tshong la ni 'jig pa yin/ /la la 'tsham dang mi mtsham dang/ /zas kyi
34b5(mdo 'grel): sbyor bas bded? 'gyur ?/ /sbyong? ba'i tsha ? bshad par bya/ /bshad pa da ni mnyam par gyis/ /me drong chung dang yid mi bde/ /lto ba na dang dpubs mi bde/ /dub cing khal gyis nyen pa dang/ /dug 'thungs pa dang skom pa dang/ /lam
34b6(mdo 'grel): 'grog mtshan nyi mi lngar dang/ /'dub la'ang kha zas mi sbyin no/ /stobs ldan lci ba'i kha zas ni/ /de la sprin bar mi bya'o/ /lam gyi nyam chung gyur stobs bri/ /rgan dang rab gzhon dbang ? ma chung/ /rtswe dang 'bras dang glo
34b7(mdo 'grel): bcod can/ /zas sbyong rtag tu bya bar rigs/ /gang tshe byi ? dus su ni/ /skyes bu gsum po'i srib ma ltags/ /cung zad ltag pa'am ma tshad pa'am/ /zas sbyor bya ba'i dus yin no/ /'bras bra gang ?
35a1(mdo 'grel): legs bcos la/ /de rjes chwa dang bsreb dang/ /snum dang ldan bar byas pa ni/ /byin na legs par 'ju bar 'gyur/ /drang por snum dang ldan pa yi/ /rjes la lan tswa ldan pa dang/ /zas
35a2(mdo 'grel): sbyor 'di ni sgom dang dag/ mi skyed legs par 'ju bar 'gyur/ /zhod dang ku ladtha'i khu ba/ /chang dang sbrang rtsi ? gang/ /til mar bsres pas mnye bya yi/ /khu ba gzhan dang bsre mi bya/ /many+dzi dang ni sha khu 'am/ /'o ma
35a3(mdo 'grel): 'am yang na hags dang mi /'di dag mnye ba sbyin bya zhing/ /yang na til mar sbyar pa'ang rung/ /zhag dang til mar mar sbyar ba/ /gsum po sbyar ba zhes bya ba'ang bsku/ /de la sha khu mchog yin te/ /de dang nye bar bya ba 'am/ /nas
35a4(mdo 'grel): dang ma sha gra dang ni/ /drug cu pa yi sbyong ba gang/ /de ni 'o ma 'am sbrang rtsi 'am/ /mar dang sbyar bas mnye bar bya/ /'di dag dang ni mnye ba'i tshe/ /de ru lan tshwa gzhug mi bya/ /rlung dang bad kan gyis nyen dang/ /rta yis snum
35a5(mdo 'grel): mang mthungs pa dang/ /me drod chung dang mi snyoms dang/ /sbeg la lan tshwar bcas pa btang/ /mnye ba'i sbyor ba bya ba dang/ /chang dang chang rnying zhog chus/ /lto ba'i ma zhu rnam sbyang zhing/ /kha chu rgyun ni 'dzag
35a6(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ khong ba'i srin du yod pa la/ /ba gcin dang sbyar sbyin bar bya/ /gang zhig rgan dang lung pa can/ /de la kha zas skam mi sbyin/ /de lta bu la snum dang ni/ /bcas pa'i zas kyi sbyor ba bya/ /rtal zas ni snin
35a7(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ /mgo bo phyen du legs bstan nas/ /zas ni kham re bcad nas ni/ /myur min 'god ba med par sbyin/ /nas thug mar dang ldan pa'am/ /yang na chag tse mar gyis spangs/ /rta rnams rta byed dam pa yin
35b1(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa can la mchog tu phan/ /chag che nas thug snum med pa/ /lan tsha dang ni ldan pa ru/ /bca' lga btab par gyur ba ni/ /bad kan can la sbyin par bya/ /rgyam tshwa dang ni bcas pa dang/ /ma sha til mar bcug pa ni/ /rlung
35b2(mdo 'grel): nad can la phan mong kyi/ /de las mkhris pa skye ba bsrung/ /sha rnams sna tshogs dag dang ni/ /bad kan can la chad blud cing/ /mkhris pa can la 'om blud/ /rlung nad can la sha khu sbyin/ /mkhris ba can la
35b3(mdo 'grel): rab bsal ba/ /rlung nad can la dro 'jam tsam/ /cung zad dro 'jam pad kan can/ /zas dang skom ni sbyin par bya/ /sdug cing snum ni med pa dang/ /yang zhing tshad las chung la ni/ /bad kan can la sbyin bya yi/ /kha zas snum
35b4(mdo 'grel): pa'ang mi sbyin no/ /chu dron gyis ni kha bkrus la/ /kha 'gram legs par ltams nas ni/ /mnyes la smas sman btang nas ni/ /de yi 'og tu 'di ru gzhug/ de yi mod la rtswa mi sbyin/ /khyad par du ni sngo mi sbyin/ /de tshe
35b5(mdo 'grel): lam 'gro dub ba'am/ /chu rgal ba ni bsngags ma yin/ /zas sbyin 'og tu btung ba ni/ /chang bre phyed ni blung bar bya/ /de ni drong bskyed nad gzhi sel/ /legs par 'ju bar byed pa yin/ /mgyogs shing stobs dang ldan pa
35b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /sha mkhregs dbang po brtan pa dang/ /khal dang khur la sran? bya bar/ /zas de yis ni 'gyur ba yin/ /snying dang 'bra yis zas pa dang/ /tshig dang du bas khyer ba dang/ /g.yul sar chad gyis nyan pa yi/ /rtswa ni rtal
35b7(mdo 'grel): mi bsngags so/ /skyon med pa ni nang bas kyang/ /yi gar 'ong zhing zos pas sreng/ des na rta yi 'tsho ba ni/ /rtswa yis nges par bsdus pa yin/ /ljang po dga' zhing yi gar 'ong/ /me drod gzi mdangs srog 'phal byed// 
36a1(mdo 'grel): de phyir rta yis ljang pa ni/ /zos na de 'drar 'gyur ba yin/ /ljang ba chad ldan byin ma ni/ /nad rnams skye bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /rigs par ljang pa byin ba yis/ /skyes zin nad kyang 'ju bar 'gyur/ /
36a2(mdo 'grel): bong? nga? bul shes tsha ba gsum/ /byi dang ka dang dug mo nyungs/ /'bras btags chad dang sbyar ba ni/ /mdog dang tshe ni 'phel byed mchog/ 'o ma mar dang ma shar bcas/ /til btags sbyar ba zho can yin/ /ma sha'i bye la
36a3(mdo 'grel): lan tshwa ra bcas/ /stobs skyed byed pa gzhan ngag gam/ /sa lu'i phye ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /pang ri dang ldan pa ni/ /'o mar sbyar ba zhag gsum byin/ /stobs dang kha dog 'phel byed yin/ /zho ngang skyur rdzas lan tshwa dang/ /mar
36a4(mdo 'grel): dang bcas par dkrugs pa ni/ /nas dang sbyar byin lus zungs? zang/ /stobs dang kha dog skyed byed yin/ /skom dang chu la skyal ba dang/ /rtswa ni sngon po dag dab? ni/ /gang zhig kha zas mngar ba dang/ /mang la sogs dang sbyang ba dang//
36a5(mdo 'grel): sha la sogs bcas bsal ba ste/ /drug po 'phrul du srog gtar? yin/ /'brog du tshwa? ni sna tshogs las/ /rtswa gcig la ni srang ba gang/ /goms pas bltan pa yin zhes bya/ /ro yi goms bzas sbyer? las/ /de yi
36a6(mdo 'grel): ro las shes par bya/ /bya ba'i sbyor bas lus 'phel 'gyur/ /gzhan gyis zos? de gad por dang/ /gang zhag rtswa nas gyung ba dang/ /nang du rul bang gyur pa yi/ /rtswa ni shin tu stobs 'grog byed/ /sha li ho tra'i
36a7(mdo 'grel): mdo'i gnas las/ zas kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //gang zhig zas sbyor sna tshogs kyis/ /'bang pa mang pos sgrubs byas ba/ /mdzes pa zhes 'di grags ba 'di/ /ci 'dra rnam
36b1(mdo 'grel): ba du zhig mchis/ /legs ldan nga ni gsungs shig ces/ /da ltar legs thos kyis bskul to/ /sha li to tra drang srong ches/ /gog rim de ni slad smras pa/ /ljad pa zas dang skom rnams dang/ /de bzhin mar dang snum tshogs
36b2(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /sos par gyur chi? mdzes gyur te/ /de ni rnam pa lngar bshad do/ /brag bcas zhes bya dang po ste/ /gnyis pa rtsib logs 'gangs byed yin/ /gsum pa stobs ni skyes? pa ste/ /bzhi pa shin rgyas pa yin/ /lnga pa lung
36b3(mdo 'grel): pa can zhes bya/ /da ltar rnam pa lngar bshad do/ /'di dag rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /so sor bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /mtshan dang rlig pa rmad ka dang/ /rkub dang brang dang? rtsa sbubs rnams/ /khrag dang sha ni srab pa yis/ /
36b4(mdo 'grel): gnyen zhing khrag gis rgyas 'dra ba/ /de ni khrag bcas mdzes la gnas/ /rta ni gdul sbyong dag la sbyar/ /yan lag shin 'jam po yis/ /cung zad g.yogs par gyur pa dang/ /phrag so brang sogs sha skyes pa/ /stobs
36b5(mdo 'grel): ldan rtsibs logs 'gangs byed yin/ /rked pa brla ni sha rgyas shing/ /rtsib ma shes ni legs par khebs/ /stobs chen cung zad ma rdzogs pa/ /mdzes pa dad ni stobs skyes yin/ /'dir ni ji ltar dga' bar/ /
36b6(mdo 'grel): gzhon pa'i don du bshad par bya/ /ci nus par ni bkol ba yang/ /de ni nyam chung gyis 'gyur ro/ /sha ni rgyas par gyur pa'i rta/ /bya ba kun la nus par ldan/ /dregs par bcas shing mdzes? dang bcas/ /dpa' zhing
36b7(mdo 'grel): stobs ldan dpa' ba dang/ /tshigs rus rtsibs logs rked pa dang/ /mjug ngo rang gi shar nub zlum/ /ze'u nas rda snying bar du ni/ /dma' zhing gang gi ri mo chags/ /sha ni shin tu rgyas? gu gyur ba/ /de ni lung?
37a1(mdo 'grel): can zhes bya/ /mdzas pa 'di dang ldan ba'i rta/ /bya ba thams cad bde blag nus?/ /sha/ rnams 'phyang 'di dbugs mi bde/ /rdul dang dub pa'i shes cheg //brus sman legs par btang ba yis/ /
37a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni nyams smad nyid du bya/ /de yan chad ni sha rgyas bar/ /rta ni nam yang mi bya'o/ /tshil ni shin tu chos? gyur pa/ /de yi las sbyor mi nus 'gyur/ /gso? dka' ba yi nad ldan na/ /rigs pas legs par gso par bya/ /zas kyi
37a3(mdo 'grel): sbyor sogs spang ba dang/ /rim gyis phri zhing sbyang par bya/ /nyams dmang pa'am myur du ni/ /byas nam goms dbang gis 'chi/ /me drod khong nas 'bar gyur pa/ /rgyu ba'i lam ni tshil gyis bka' /snum rnams byin bar
37a4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa ni/ /de ni nye par rgyas bar 'gyur/ /de bas brtab grags ba dang/ /nyams smad drags par mi bya'o/ /de dag gnyig drags pa yis/ /bsor mi rung ba nyid du'i? gyur/ /grib ma 'dod dang skom dang che/ /lung ba dbugS? 
37a5(mdo 'grel): mi bde bas nyen/ /khu bzhi'i nang ni mang ba dang/ /gcin mang bde ba med pa dang/ /gang zhig bdag nyid sdug bsngal zhing/ /nyam thag par ni 'gro gyur la/ /lam 'jug par ni mi nus pa/ /bzhon pa po yi ci byar yid/ /
37a6(mdo 'grel): de ni grang phrags ? grags pa 'am/ /bya kres dang snyom pa mi bzod pas/ /mdzes 'dod rta ni skye chos dag/ shin tu grags par mi bya'o/ /bkol du med cing lus nyam chung/ /gzim dangs chung zhing stobs med
37a7(mdo 'grel): la/ /las la sbyor bar mi nus pa/ /de ni mdzes par mi 'dod do/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ mdzas pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //sha le ho tra drang srong mchog/ legs thos kyis
37b1(mdo 'grel): ni yongs dris ba/ /gzugs ni gang dag nyid kyis na/ /rta ni gzugs gdug gyur pa lags/ /spyod pa dang ni mtshan dag ste/ /de ni bdag la lung bstan rtsol/ /de nas rta'i mtshan la mkhas pa'i/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /rta ?
37b2(mdo 'grel): yan lag nyid lag gi/ skyon med mtshan nyid mnyan bar gyis/ /mtshan nyid sum cu drug ldan pa/ /gang gis de ni bsngags pa yin/ /rigs dang mtshan nyid nad med dang/ /lus kyang smad bar med gyur pa/ /gang la 'di
37b3(mdo 'grel): bzhi yong pa yi/ /rta de bsngags bar 'os pa yin/ /gang zhig dbugs ni cher 'byin cing/ /ming pa srab bar mngon pa dang/ /sna yi sbrubs ni mi 'thug ba/ /rta ni rab tu bsngags ba yin/ /mchu ltag mnyam zhing zlum pa dang/ /che bar
37b4(mdo 'grel): gyur na bzang ba yin /ma mchu srab cing mnyen pa dang/ /mi 'byung? ba ni bsngags pa yin/ /so ni thams cad snyoms pa dang/ /thags bzang dkar zhing nang mtho la/ /snum zhing srab par gyur pa dang/ /mtshan nyid legs par
37b5(mdo 'grel): ldan na bsngags/ /rkan ni skyab cing gnyer ma chags/ /zab cing dmar ba bsngags pa yin/ /lce ni srab cing mnyen pa dang/ /rtsa 'thug rgya skyegs 'dra ba la/ /khyi yi lce dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ /rta mi bsngags par gyur pa
37b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /mgo bo phra min sbom pa min/ /lus dang 'tsham par gyur pa dang/ /'gram glang che bar gyur pa ni/ /bsngags par gyur pa nyid yin no/ /dpral ba mnyam zhing yangs la che/ /phags pa srab cing mi lcong la /
37b7(mdo 'grel): dbus na gtsug 'khyil gnas pa dag/ gang yin de ni bsngags pa yin/ /rta yi mig ni mig mchu dang/ /srab cing legs gnas rdzi ma srab/ /mig 'bras kyi ni mdza' mdag/ legs? par dkar zhing ?
38a1(mdo 'grel): nag la/ /gang zhig gzugs kyi mdog sngag cing/ /phra zhing thag dang mthong ba dang/ /glang bo'i mig 'dra me tog ni/ /ma li ka yi snying po 'dra/ /shel ltar yongs su dang ba dang/ /mthong ba
38a2(mdo 'grel): brtan pa bsngags pa yin/ /rna ba? srab cing mnyen pa dang/ /spu srab thung bar gyur pa dang/ /gang gis sgra grags 'phra ba dang/ /thag? ring ba'ang thos pa bzang/ /gdong da? gal zhing rtsa mi mngon/ /sha srab
38a3(mdo 'grel): sha 'thug ma yin zhing/ /dpal mtshams chung zhing rdog ring bsngags/ /ske mgrin sha rgyas ring ba dang/ /rna ltag rna mtshan legs par gnas/ /pags srab rim gyis sbom par ni/ /gyur ba de ni dge ba yin/ /
38a4(mdo 'grel): phra gso? legs 'brel nam chong? nub/ /rdog mdza' legs par 'dus pa dang/ /rim gyis kha zheng che na bzang/ /brang ni 'thug cing yangs la mkhrags/ /sra zhing gnyed ma med pa dang/ /bar yengs dpung sna che ba dang/ /
38a5(mdo 'grel): 'di 'dra ba dag bsngags pa yin/ /dpung ba mkhrags shing yangs pa dang/ /zlum zhing sbom la rtsa mi mngon/ /rim gyis phra bar gyur ba ni/ /rta la bsngags par gyur pa yin/ /lag dang phra ma rim gyis phra//
38a6(mdo 'grel): pus mo zlum par gyur ba dang/ /gnyen zhing rkyang bar bde ba dang/ /rta la bsngags par gyur pa yin/ /phyi grang ring zhing dbyibs legs pa/ /sha sra gci? rgyus mi mngon srab/ /pags srab shin tu zlum pa yi/ /rta ni
38a7(mdo 'grel): bsngags par gyur pa yin/ /tshe'u legs skyes mnyam zhing zlum/ /dong cing snyoms par gyur pa dang/ /sbu phra pags ba srab pa yis /rta ni bzang bor bshad pa yin/ /rmig pa sra zhing dkyil legs la/ /
38b1(mdo 'grel): bod bu'i rmig pa 'dra ba dang/ /sbal ba nub cing legs par 'byar/ /cha mnyam par ni 'gro ba dang/ /rgya ni zab mo dang 'dra zhing/ /rmig spros snyoms shing sra ba dang/ /mkhreD zhing gnyer ma med pa yi/ /rta mi rab tu bsngags pa
38b2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rgyab so thung dang rab tu bsngags/ /rtsib ma legs par dgu pa dang/ /ngos gnyis legs par skye ba bsngags/ /sga 'og gnas ni khengs pa bzang/ /lto ba zlum zhing rtsib ma'i nang/ /'dus pa ltar 'dug bsngags pa
38b3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /ong do yangs shing ches la 'jam/ /sbu yi tshogs kyis khebs ba bzang/ /mjug ma ja? ma phra zhing 'jam/ /mjug rtsa yod do legs par 'brel/ /mjug ma'i phyogs su drang por skyes/ /rta ni sngags par gyur
38b4(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /rkub ni zlum zhing legs par 'dzum// /thung zhing gnyer ma legs par gnas/ /gang gis rta spangs bde bar 'byin/ /de ni bsngags bang byung ba yin/ /rlig pa /mnyam zhing legs pad skyes/ /bu med par ni gyur
38b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /bilba? chung ngu'i chod tsam zhig/ ma 'phyir 'gyur pa bsngags pa yin/ /rta yi pho mtshan rim gyis? sra phra? /thung zhing drang la myur du 'byin/ /gting ding? kha dog gcig par ni/ /rta la bsngags par gyur ba yin/ /
38b6(mdo 'grel): rje dar rgyab mtho ya? yo med/ /sha srab gugs pa ma yin zhing/ /mnyam zhing ma mkhums dbyibs legs ba'o?/ /rta ni bsngags par gyur pa yin/ /rta spu srab cing drang ba dang/ /mdangs ldan kha dog ma 'dres bzang/ /rta ni
38b7(mdo 'grel): 'dre bar byed pa'i tshe/ /gang gis legs par sprugs ba dang/ /stobs dang ldan pa'i gzugs yod pa/ /mtshan nyid mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /chu la rgal pa'i gnas dang ni/ /khal bkal lam du 'gro ba dang/ /bsnun dang nyam nga'i?
39a1(mdo 'grel): gnas dag tu/ /brtsal 'byin gzi can mtshan nyid yin/ /de ltar bsngags pa'i mgyogs 'gro ni/ /rgyal po'i bzhon par rab tu brjod/ /sha ba'i ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ /
39a2(mdo 'grel): mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //legs ldan rta yi kha dog dang/ /de bzhin mdog gi dbye ba dang/ /de yi ming gi nyes pa dag/ bdag cag mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /bu yis de skad
39a3(mdo 'grel): smras pa dang/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis slar smras pa/ /nga yi gzhung gis ma 'dres mdog/ rta la rnam bzhir yod par 'dod/ /dkar dang dmar dang gnag pa dang/ /bzhi pa ser po zhes bshad do/ /'di rnams lus gyi phyogs
39a4(mdo 'grel): gnas dang/ /phan tshun 'dres par gyur pa dang/ /rdzas dang rdzas min 'dres pa las/ /rgyas par mdog ni du ma yin/ /dkar la sogs pa de dag rnams/ /ma lus shes bya mnyan par gyis/ /pags pa dkar zhing ba spu
39a5(mdo 'grel): dkar/ /de bzhin rnga ma rngog ma dkar/ /'di ni dkar bo zhes bshad do/ /rta de srid sgrub yin par 'dod/ /pags pa dmar zhing ba sbu dmar/ /rnga ma rdog ma dag kyang dmar/ /khrag dang nyi ma 'char ka 'dra/ /rta ni dmar
39a6(mdo 'grel): po zhes bya'o/ /pags pa spu dang jog? man nag/ bung ba 'dra ba gang yin ba/ /stang zil nag po'i mdangs 'dra'i rta/ /de yi thams cad nag por bshad/ /pags pa rnga rdog spu rnams ni/ /gang zhig gser gyi mdog 'dra
39a7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /dar ni ser pa'i mdangs ldan pa/ /rta de ser po yin zhes bya/ /de ltar kha dog rnam pa bzhi/ /so sor yangs dag bshad pa yin/ /de rnams mdog ni 'dres gyur pa/ /bshad pa ba las rtogs par gyis/ phags?
39b1(mdo 'grel): pa dmar zhing mig skyon med/ /kha dang rkan dang pho mtshan dmar/ /ma du ka'i me tog 'dra/ /'di ni la las kar kar bshad/ /pho mtshan rmangs kha rlig pa dang/ /rmig pa de bzhin rku pa dang ni/ /mchu ltag mchu dang
39b2(mdo 'grel): kha dang ni/ /pags pa pad+ma'i mdog 'dra gang/ /mig dang phum phum rngog ma'i bar/ /bad spu dkar bar gyur pa ni/ /rta ni dkar ka kha gcig 'dod/ /bkra shis dge ba'i dam pa yin/ /pags pa dmar zhing ba spu
39b3(mdo 'grel): dmar/ /rnga ma rngog ma dmar ba ni/ /nyi ma skyon bral mdog 'dra ba/ /de yang kar kar shes par bya/ /btso ma'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba'i/ /spu ni gang la yod gyur ba/ /pags pa pad+ma'i dbus 'dra zhing/ /mig
39b4(mdo 'grel): ni ma yi rtse mo 'dra/ /rmig pa kha dog gcig pa yi/ /rta de 'khor les sgyur pa'i yin/ /gang zhig kar ka rta'i gzhi la/ /yan lag lto dang dbyi dang stong/ /thig le nag po chags gyur pa/ /rta ni khyim bya can
39b5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya/ /gang zhig kar kar can 'dra la/ /dpyi la sogs pa dmar po yi/ /thig le chags par gyur pa ni/ /de yang khyim bya can gnyis pa/ /ba spu rnga ma rdog ma ni/ /dkar la bags pa nag po can/ /mtshan
39b6(mdo 'grel): dang rmig pa mig kyang nag/ de ni dur ba'i gshog par bshad/ /pags 'jam pags pa mig dang spu/ /rnga rdog rmig pa dkar pa dang/ /sin du bar dang 'dra bas/ /mdog de sin du ba ra can/ /pags dmar seng ge'i
39b7(mdo 'grel): spu 'dra zhing/ /rnga ma dang ni rngog ma dkar/ /rlig pa dmar zhing dbyar gyur pa/ /rta de seng ge'i mdog can yin/ /gang zhig spur rtse du ba 'dra/ /cung zad dmar zhing ser skya 'dres/ /kha dog de yis rta de ni/ /go ri'i spu?
40a1(mdo 'grel): bya bar bshad/ /de bzhin du ba'i mdog ldan pa/ /dud ser zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /ser shas che gang yin pa/ /me tog ku ? dang 'drar bshad/ /ser po'i sa tshig 'di yin/ /dpe yang khyed kyis mnyan
40a2(mdo 'grel): par gyis/ /sogs mngal sAg dad 'dra zhing/ /so dang kar na dra 'dra la/ /gang zhig ser po zlum po yang/ /de ni khyab 'jug bzhon pa ste/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal don gnyed la/ 'di dag thams cad bsngags pa yin/ /de bzhin kha dog
40a3(mdo 'grel): mang ba dang/ /seng ge'i mdog dang 'dra ba dang/ /dung dang kun da kha sha dang/ /'o ma dang ba nyi ma'i mdo/ /ku mu nga yi mngog 'dra dang/ /chu skyar bzang po 'dra ba dag/ dkar dang ser po 'dres pa ni/ /thams cad dang bzhes byar
40a4(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /gang zhig me tog mkha' lding 'dra/ /rnga ma rdog ma nag bo ni/ /yod pa'i rta de stang zil gyi/ /spyi bo can zhes bya ba yin/ /rdeg? ma 'jam zhing dkar ba ni/ /rdog ma muny+dza can zhes bya/ /shin tu dkar 'a? rdog ma
40a5(mdo 'grel): gnag/ rdog ma mig sman mdog 'drar bshad/ /gang zhig rdog ma'i mdog sna tshogs/ /'dres pa'i rdag ma zhes byar bshad/ /rnga ma'i kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /rnga ma 'dres ba zhes byar bshad/ /de dang 'dra ba gzhan dang
40a6(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /dkar po'i mdog 'dras pa zhes bya/ /gso ma'i me tog mdog 'dra dang/ /ldam du chu gsher 'dra ba dang/ /ya ma'i lo ma'i mdog 'dra dang/ /rta gang king shu dang 'dra dang/ /chu shing me tog 'dra ba dang/ /kar kan du yi /
40a7(mdo 'grel): mdog 'dra dang/ /me tog mandu jI? ba'i mdog/ lcang mar a shwa ka'i mdog dang/ /gang yang byu ru'i mdog 'dra dang/ /mig dang rnga rdog nag ba dang/ /mtshan dang bags pa da bzhin gnag/ de ni smu gnas zhes byar bshad/ /de dag
40b1(mdo 'grel): dmar po dang 'dres mdog/ nag po dang 'dres mdog nyon cig/ /khu byug dang ni char sprin 'dra/ /dur ba 'am ma he'i mdog 'dra ba/ /am+ba? smra ba'i mdog 'dra ba/ /gang yang lung btang rlon 'dra dang/ /sal ta la'i mdog 'dra
40b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /utpal sngon po lta bu dang/ /gang gzhan yang tshul ni 'di 'dra ba/ /rta ni nag po dang 'dres mdog/ gang yangs lu'i dram 'dra/ /ne tso'i sgrag shog 'dra ba dang/ /mar gyi snying po'i mdog 'dra dang/ /pad+ma'i sa bon mdog 'dra
40b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ pad+ma'i gsar lta bu dang/ /de bzhin me yi rtse 'dra dang/ /gang zhig gzhan dang 'dra ba dang/ /gang yang bab la 'dra ba dang/ /yul ti ka yi ser po 'dra/ /sh+ri sha'i me tog 'dra ba dang/ /gang yang khre? 'bras
40b4(mdo 'grel): mdog 'dra dang/ /gang yang spyang khu'i mdog can dang/ /kha dog ser po snyed dang/ /gzhan yang ser po dang 'dres dang/ /de 'dra ba las gzhan ba dag/ rta ni ser po dang 'dres mdog/ de ltar rnam pa bzhi pa ni/ /
40b5(mdo 'grel): mdog 'dras ba zhes bya bar bshad/ /gzhan yang kha dog dbye ba dang/ /kha dog sna tshogs nas na bar gyis/ /phug ron gyi ni ske 'dra zhing/ /pags pa spu yi mdog dmar ba/ /phug ron ske 'dra phug ron ske/ dmar
40b6(mdo 'grel): dang nag po cung zad 'dres /phags pa rnga ma rdog ma gnag/ mig dang gsang? ba rmig pa'ang bar ga/ mkhal ma'i mdog 'dra nag tsar ba/ /'di nyid gnag pa'i shas che ba/ /nag cher pa ni yin zhes bya/ /ga pa
40b7(mdo 'grel): te dmar nag cha mnyam 'dres/ /rgun 'bru ltar 'tsher yin bar bshad/ /dbun 'bru ltar? mchar de nyid la/ /cung zad ser sbyas 'dres ba ni/ /kha dog gnyis ni bsdus ba las/ /gang zhig shas cha de las
41a1(mdo 'grel): gdugs/ /nag po dkar po 'dres shing/ /bags pa nag gor? 'dug pa ni/ /spu 'dres drang srong pa zhes bshad/ /gsal ba ri dags mdog can yin/ /de nyid dkar por ma gyur na/ /dkar po'i drang?
41a2(mdo 'grel): srong pa zhes bshad/ /dkar po'i gzhi la gnag dang 'dres/ /khor ling mang du gnang ba dang/ /yan lag gnag cing mjug ma dkar/ /de'i skye ba'i drang srong pa/ /dkar dang dmar dar nag por 'dres/ /pags pa nag po yid gyur
41a3(mdo 'grel): cing/ /mig dang pho mtshan rmig pa gnag/ 'dre na ma'i drang srong ba zhes bya/ /dmar dang ser dang nag po yis/ /dkar la 'dres gyur gso dang mdog/ dmar ser dkar po mdog 'dres rta/ /ser skya'i ba 'dra ser skya yin/ /nag
41a4(mdo 'grel): po dmar pos khyab gyur cing/ /dmar po dang yang cher ldan pa/ /rta de rta mkhan dag gis ni/ /dud kha zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /khrag dang bcag gi mdog 'dra zhing/ /pags pa 'dren mar snang ba dang/ /rnga ma rdog ma dmar po yi/ /ser
41a5(mdo 'grel): dang dmar po 'dres gyur pa/ /spu? rtse mdog ni ba? nag /po dang rnga rdog gnyis kyang gnag gyur pa/ /rta de 'tshal bu zhes byar bshad/ /gang zhig spu rtse gnag gyur pa/ /gzhan dag ser skyar gnas gyur ba/ /gdong gi mdog ni ma 'dres pa'i/ /rta de dur pa zhes byar
41a6(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /kun tu dgang dang dmar ba yi/ /spu ni 'dres mar gnas gyur la/ /pags pa pho mtshan mchu dmar ba'i/ /rta ni se bo zhes bya re bshad/ /dkar dang ser ba'i mdog 'dres shing/ /bags nag rnga ma 'dren mar gnas/
41a7(mdo 'grel): seng la dkar shas che ba ni/ /kha na dza re zhes bya ba yin/ /gos ni srab? mos bkab ba ltar/ /kha dog gcig tu mi mngon zhing/ /'khor 'di mang po dang ldan pa'i/ /rta de 'khor ling can zhes bya/ /kha dog mang po dang ldan
41b1(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /mdog gzhan 'khor ling gnas pa yis/ /brgyan pa lta bur snang ba ni/ /rta de khra bo zhes bshad do/ /rta yi rkang pa bzhi dang ni/ /mdog dang rnga ma rngog ma dang/ /rked pa dkar por snang ba ni/ /rta de bkra shis brgyad par
41b2(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /dmar ba 'am dkar ba'i 'khor ling ngam/ /nag pa 'am kha dog gzhan dag las/ /kha dog dang ni rjes mthun par/ /de las ming du gdags bar bya/ /gang gi kha dog gang dag la/ /mdog gis 'dres par gyur na
41b3(mdo 'grel): yang/ /mdog gi shas ni gang che ba/ /de yi mdog las gdags par bya/ /gang zhig mdangs snum brten zhing gsal/ /kha dog de ni thams cad bsngags/ /de nas dkar ba mchog yin la/ /de dang ldan pa gzhan yang bzang?/ /rta yi kha
41b4(mdo 'grel): dog thams cad las/ /kha dog dkar po mi 'gyur yin/ /brtan zhing mi bzad nyid kyis ni/ /dkar po nyid ni khyad bar 'phags/ /de ltar rta yi kha dog ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin/ /kha dog dbye ba ma lus bar/ /smra
41b5(mdo 'grel): bar nus pa ma yin no/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ /kha dog shes par bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad ba'o// //sha li ho tra thub mchog la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /zhur dang de bzhin brgyan
41b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan dang?/ ji ltar gnas par bka' stsol cig/ de ltar dris tshe legs ldan ni/ /sha li ho tre sa slar smras pa/ /mchu sgros ltag nas dpral mtshams par/ /dkar ba 'am shin tu dkar gang yin/ /de ni zhur por shes bya ste/ /
41b7(mdo 'grel): 'di yi 'bras bu rnam bzhi yin/ /gnas dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang/ /rang bzhin las shes mi shis 'gyur/ /zhur ba de yi 'bras bu ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya/ /mchu ltag dpral ba sna gdong dang/ /de bzhin
42a1(mdo 'grel): sna gdong dbral pa'i bar/ /gzhan yang mchu ltag gdong ba dang/ /mchu ltar/ phrum phum mthar thug dge/ rta yi gdong pa kun dkar ba /rigs kyi dbang phyug 'phel byed yin/ /mgo bo rna bar bcas
42a2(mdo 'grel): dkar pa/ /bdag po bde ba kun skyed do/ /gnas gnyis na ni gang gnas pa/ /de yi 'bras bu bshad par bya/ /me long lcags kyu bum pa dang/ /gdugs dang rnga yab 'dwa ba dang/ /dpal shing rim gyis 'phel 'dra dang/
42a3(mdo 'grel): bum pa g.yud drung dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ /zhur ni gang gi rta la yod/ /de yi bdag por gyur ba yi/ /bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel/ /bran dang mdza' o 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /rgyal bos legs par bkur 'gyur la/ /rta yang bde
42a4(mdo 'grel): bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig gi ni rta yi zhur/ /byang chub shing gi lo ma 'dra/ /de'i bdag bskal ba bzang 'gyur zhing/ /bu ni mang bo yong bar 'gyur/ /zur bzhing yod na rgyal pos ni/ /yul khams rnyed par sten pa yin
42a5(mdo 'grel): ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje gzhu/ /gshol dang gtun shid dbyig ba dang/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan gzugs 'dra ba/ /gang gi zhu ra ci'i dbyigs byung ba'i/ /de ni rgyal po chen po yis/ /zhon na g.yul las rgyal byed yin//
42a6(mdo 'grel): rta de zhon nas rgyal po yis/ /dgra rnams thul bar 'gyur ba yin/ /chung ma bu dang tsha po dang/ /nor yang shin tu mang par 'gyur/ /dgang gzar blugs gzang mchod gdong me/ /kha khyer gyi ni dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ /zhur
42a7(mdo 'grel): pa gang gi rta la yod/ /de'i bdag 'bras bu chen po 'thob/ /mchod sbyin mang du byed pa dang/ /sbyin pa mang du 'gyed par 'gyur/ /gang gi zhur ni bum pa 'dra/ /me tog mgo lcogs dbyibs 'dra yang/ /rta de yin
42b1(mdo 'grel): bdag po yis/ /gter ni rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /me tog pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra ba 'am/ /mig mangs ris kyi dbyibs yod ba/ /bdag po bkur sti nor mang dge/ shing rta'i dbyibs 'dra'i zhur yod ba'i/ /rta ni nod rnams 'phel
42b2(mdo 'grel): byed yin/ /steng cha kha zheng tsha ba'i zhur/ /nor dang 'bru dang phrad byed do/ /de yi bdag pos dpal thob cing/ /bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel/ /de yi khyim du dpal rtag gnas/ /rgyal srid kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /rta de ci 'dod ma
42b3(mdo 'grel): smras par/ /bde bar 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de ltar shis pa bshad nas ni/ /mi shis pa yi mtshan nyid nyon/ /rta'i zhur kha dog 'dres pa dang/ /g.yon dogs 'gram glang bar du chags ba dang/ /g.yon pa'i mig dkyus dpral
42b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i ngos dang bcas/ /khyad par gang gi rta la skyes gyur pa/ /dpral chags zhes te de ni dang tshul ngan/ /rgyun tu sdang zhing 'thab rtsod dga' bar 'gyur/ /mur 'gram dag tu chags ba'i rta yang smad/ /de bzhin gdong par dbyibs
42b5(mdo 'grel): 'dra'i zhur chags dang/ /g.yon ngos che zhing cung zad chad pa dang/ /dbus na lcags sgrog 'dra ba gang la yod/ /de lta'i zhur ba gang la yod/ /rta de bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de yi bdag po thag pa'am/ /lcags sgrog gis ni
42b6(mdo 'grel): bcings par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid de 'dras mi 'gor bar/ /de ni dgra bo'i dbang du 'gyur/ /'phreng du zheng ni che ba'i zhur/ /nor brlag par ni ston pa yin/ /nag nog can gyi zhur yod pa/ /bdag po'i nor ni nyams par byed//
42b7(mdo 'grel): zhur ba yo dang sbub ba dang/ /chad pa'i zhur yang sdug bsngal bskyed/ /spang leb 'dra dang 'dres pa yi/ /zhur yod rta yang de dang 'dra/ /kha dog dkar la mdog gzhan gyi/ /zhur yod ba ni smad pa yin/ /nag pos bdag bo
43a1(mdo 'grel): mi zad du/ /reg pa'am rlag par byed ba yin/ /gang zhig glog gi dbyibs 'dra dang/ /mdung thung gi ni dbyibs 'dra ba 'am/ /gzhan yang rnam pa de 'dra ba/ /gang gi rta la yod gyur pa/ /
43a2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin mi gnang gzhan dag dang/ /srab cing gsal bar mi mngon pa/ /des ni nor rnams brlag pa dang/ /'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar zhur ni ngas bshad nas/ /mdongs kyi mtshan nyid gang yin
43a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ slar? yang gnas dang dbyibs las ni/ /shis dang mi shis khyad par dag/ rta yi bar? du bshad par yis/ /de ni ci bzhin mnyan par gyis/ /zla ba'am skar ma 'dra ba yi/ /mdongs ni gang gi rta la yod/ /de yi
43a4(mdo 'grel): bdag pos rgyal srid thob/ /bu dang cha po 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang gi dga' 'khyil 'dra ba'am/ /dus spal pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra yi/ /mdongs yod rta de'i bdag pos ni/ /nor ni mang brnyed par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgyal
43a5(mdo 'grel): mtshan sogs dbyibs 'dra/ /mdongs yod pa yi rta de ni/ /bdag po'i rgyan la sogs 'phel zhing/ /bu dang cha bo rnam par 'phel/ /nas 'bras 'dra ba'i mdongs yod pa/ /tha snyad kun la mkhas par 'gyur/ /
43a6(mdo 'grel): gdub gyur 'dra ba'i mdongs yod na/ /bdag pos zas ni rnyed bar 'gyur/ /ba glang pa dang bya dang sbrul/ /rnga mo yi ni dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ /mdongs yod de ni shis pa ste/ /bdag po skal ba bzang po 'phel/ /de ltar shis
43a7(mdo 'grel): pa bstan nas na/ /yi shes pa yang bshad par bya/ /dpral bar bya rog rjes 'dra dang/ /ba glang lci ba'i 'bu 'phra dang/ /g.yon 'dug pa 'am 'og na 'dug/ gang zhig thur du bltas pa yod/ /rta de'i bdag po
43b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal zhing/ /rta dang lhan cig nya mang thog /chang dang kha dog mi sdug dang/ /mi gsal ba dang sra ba dang/ /'dres dang sbags pa lta bu dang/ /gang zhig dbyibs ni mi sdug dang/ /kha dog gzhan la gzhan ba dang/ /rtsub dang rtso'i?
43b2(mdo 'grel): ba can rnams kyi/ /mdongs nges nor rnams 'jig pa ni/ /nges par ston par byed pa yin/ /'di gzhu bar dbye ba ste/ /rgyal mtshan la sogs mtshan ma nyon/ /mgo dang rna ba mig rdog mdza' / /rnga ma rkang ba lto dang rgyal ba/ /kha dog steng
43b3(mdo 'grel): du mdog gzhan gyi/ /mtshan ma yod par gyur pa'i rta/ /de la zhon te 'gro na ni/ /g.yul du dgra las pham par 'gyur/ /de bzhin skra mtshams gdog dang tsog/ ze'u dang ze'u mdza' a na to dang/ /smin ma dang ni sna rtse gnyis/ /mchu
43b4(mdo 'grel): ltag pho mtshan rnga ma dang/ /mdog steng kha dog byung gyur pa/ /rta de rgyal mtshan can zhes bya/ /rgyal mtshan can de zhon nas ni/ /rgyal po g.yul 'jug dpung nyams 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ zhung mdongs pa rtag pa'i
43b5(mdo 'grel): le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //sha li ho tra thub chen la/ /rgyal po ni sha tras dris pa/ /rta la kha dog du ma yi/ /thig le rnams ni mthong lags na /dge dang mi dge zhu 'tshal lo/ /drang srong gis ni slar smras pa/ /gang
43b6(mdo 'grel): zhig thig le ? mdog mi gsal/ /lus la skyes par gyur pa ni/ /phra zhing mi gsal ba yi gzugs/ /de la thig le zhes bya'o/ /kha dog 'dra ba'i thig le ni/ /'jam pa nyid kyis mngon gyur cing/ /snam dang rtsub dang gsal ba
43b7(mdo 'grel): dang?/ /spu? 'dus gyur pa las kyang sngon/ /ji ltar mig 'phras nag po'i dbus/ /mig gi rgyal mo snang bltar/ /logs shig gyur ba med gyur cing/ /mdog mthun na yang mngon pa yin/ /mdog ni phan tshun 'dres pa las ?
44a1(mdo 'grel): le gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar shing la 'bras bu ni/ /me tog snang ba skyed byed ltar/ /de bzhin lhas su thig la ni/ /rta la srad? bar gyur pa yin/ /da ni gnas dbyings kha dog
44a2(mdo 'grel): las/ /shis ba dang ni mi shis bskyed/ /gang gi mdun sol chags dang/ /ma mchu ya ma chu dag la ni/ /snum zhid dkar ba'i thig le snang/ /rmig ba rnams la'ang de 'drar chags/ /mkhas pas des ni zhag bdun na/ /nor thob
44a3(mdo 'grel): ltas su shes par bya/ /che chud las kyi zla phyed ni/ /bdun nam zla ba bdun gyis thob/ /mchu sgros lam ni thig le chags/ /zas dang skom ni snyed par bshad/ /kha 'gram kos kor byung na ni/ /de yis zas dang skem rnyed cing/ /
44a4(mdo 'grel): bdag po longs spyod 'phel ba dang/ /nor 'bru bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di yis khyim ni 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /gter thob par yang snang ba yin/ /shis par yis bshad zin gyis/ /de bzhin 'dres ma mnyan par gyis/
44a5(mdo 'grel): sna ru byung? na mtshon gyis 'chi/ /mkhur ba byung na bu nges 'chi/ /dpal bar byung na nor thob 'gyur/ /dpral mtshams kyis ni rgyal srid 'gyur/ /lkog mar byung na zas skom rnyed/ /mu 'gram dag tu byung na phud/ /chi stan
44a6(mdo 'grel): byung na nyer 'tshe byed/ /mu 'gram za yur byung de 'dra/ /rna ba g.yon pa'i g.yas las 'pho/ /g.yas su byung na mdza' o 'phel/ /ske mjing lhag pa ze mchan du/ /byung na mchon gyis 'thob ma 'de?/ /lkog
44a7(mdo 'grel): mar byung na? bdag? gis/ /chung ma dang ni bu rnyed 'gyur/ /phrag sor byung na bu rnyad do/ /rtsib logs ba byung na rang phyogs 'phel/ /bus mor byung na gnod pa skyed/ /dpud par byud na mdza' dang phrad/ /g.yon
44b1(mdo 'grel): logs kyis ni skod par byed/ /lus kyi stong smad du byung na/ /bdag po phrogs par ston pa yin/ /mchan khung dku yi gnas su byung/ /ltogs 'gyur ma mchung byung na 'chi/ /ya ma zung byung na mi 'chi la /mig du byung nags zas thob/ /ze ba
44b2(mdo 'grel): ltag dang? ze'u dang/ /sgyi? mgul brla ni bra mo dang/ /rje ngar dang ni de mtshams su/ /byung na 'di ni dmad bar bshad/ /sge rtsar byung na nor thob cing/ /rdog ltag gis ni rgyal srid bskyed/ /rgyu mtshams thig le nor rnyed la/ /snying?
44b3(mdo 'grel): gar byung na chos can 'gyur/ /rtsi ba logs g.yas byung bud med rnyed/ /mjug rtor byung na nor brad 'gyur/ /sgyur byung na ni skal ba bzang/ /rgyab tu byung na gnas rnams 'phel/ /ltar byung rltogs pa'i 'jigs pa ste/ /rta yin gi
44b4(mdo 'grel): par byung gyur na/ /skal ba bzang por 'gyur bar stan/ /lte ba'i rtsa las dmags dpon 'gyur/ /ong dor byung na chung ma 'phye/ /rkrub? dang rnga ma'i rtsa bar byung/ /nor rnams thams cad brlag par 'gyur/ /bus mar byung
44b5(mdo 'grel): na 'chi ba skyed/ /lko gam tshe'u sbus lam 'go ston/ /sman kha ru ni thig la chags/ /bu skyes bar ni ston pa yin/ /dpyi las bud med? nyes pa bskyed/ /tshe'u cher byung na gnod pa skyed/ /gang zhig bstan pa'i gnas su
44b6(mdo 'grel): byung/ /'khor? pa thams cad skyed byed do/ /yan lag kun la thig le byang/ /bdag po'i don kun 'grub byed cing/ /mdza' o? 'phel zhing dpal skyed la/ /rigs dad grags pa 'phel bar byed/ /mdog pa rjes mthun
44b7(mdo 'grel): na mdog? byung bshis/ /mdog gzhan shes pa ma yin no/ /ser po byung na g.yul du 'jug/ dkar po la'ang de dang 'dra/ /nag po 'thab mo skyed par byed/ /nag po byung na g.yul du 'chi/ /? dang mi sdug pa dag gis?/ /bdag po?
45a1(mdo 'grel): la ni 'jigs chen 'byung/ /thig le'i steng du thig le byung/ /de yang rjes mthun mdog tu min/ /des ni rgyal po brlag ba dang/ /yul 'khor dag kyang 'khrug par ston/ /gang tshe rta ni dkar?
45a2(mdo 'grel): po la/ /thig le dkar por snang gyur na/ /de yi bdag po rtag tu bde/ /bu dang tsha po rnam par 'phel/ /gang zhig rta ni dmar po la/ /thig le dmar po snang gyur na/ /bdag po mi bzad dgra 'du la zhing/ /longs spyod chen po
45a3(mdo 'grel): 'ang yun ring 'gyur/ /nad kyis thebs kyang myur du 'tsho/ /gang tshe rta ni ser po la/ /thig le ser po snang gyur na/ /de yi bdag po'i rigs brgyud ni/ /btsun zhing nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe rta ni nag po
45a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /thig le nag po snang gyur na/ /de yi bdag po mi bzad pa'i/ /nad kyis btab cing myur du 'chi/ /gang tshe rta ni dkar po la/ /thig le dmar po gnang gyur na/ /de yi bdag po myur du ni/ /dgra yis gsod
45a5(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gang tshe de nyid la thig le/ /nag po byung bar gyur na ni/ /de yi bdag por myur bar ni/ /'chi ba'am yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe rta ni dmar po la/ /thig le ser po snang gyur na/ /de yi
45a6(mdo 'grel): bdag po mi snang pa'i/ /dgra po yis ni gsong par 'gyur/ /gang tshe rta ni dmar po la/ /thig le nag po snang gyur na/ /de yi bdag po grags min pa'i/ /las kyis gsod par 'gyur ba yin/ /gang tshe rta ni
45a7(mdo 'grel): nag po la/ /thig le dkar po snang gyur na/ /de yi bdag po grags thob cing/ /g.yul las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /nag po la ni gang gi che/ /thig le dmar po snang gyur na/ /de yi bdag po g.yul du
45b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /grags pa dam pa thob bar 'gyur/ /dkar la shin tu dkar ba dang/ /snum zhing mnyam par gyur pa yi/ /thig le gang du snang gyur pa/ /de yi bdag pos rgyal srid thog /de ni rgyal po'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /bu dang tsha bo rnam
45b2(mdo 'grel): par 'phel/ /rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor shes/ /dpung dang mdzod kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ /thig le shis pa'i gzugs ldan zhing/ /rjes su mthun pa'i mdog can la/ /snum zhing mdog ni sdug ba dang/ /gnas las mdu mdu
45b3(mdo 'grel): blta ba dang/ /de ni nor rnams rnyed? par 'gyur/ /go bzlog pa ni smad pa yin/ /thig le nas 'bras 'dra ba ni/ /bdag po bu dang phrad par 'gyur/ /kha dog sna tshogs dmar shas che/ /nor rnyed par ni ston pa yin/ /mdog mi
45b4(mdo 'grel): sdug cing 'thor ba dang/ /rtsub cing cha ni mi nyam dang/ /dbyibs ngan pa dang 'phra ba dang/ /de bzhin rgyab tu lta ba dang/ /mi mthun gnas dang mtshon tshogs dang/ /mdog las mdog gzhan gyur ba rnams/ /de ni yul 'khor
45b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig byed yin/ /rgyal srid nyams par byed pa yin/ /rgyal po yi? ni dpung rnams dang/ /mdzod dad bu ni 'joms pa yin/ /thig le shis pa'i gnas byung yang/ /gang zhig mtshams su skyes pa dang/ /snum mdangs chung bar
45b6(mdo 'grel): gyur pa rnams/ /dmang? pa yin zhes rnam par bstan/ /snum zhing mdzes par gyur pa ni/ /shis pa thob pa kho nar bstan/ /de ltar gnas dang gnas min par/ /skyes pa'i mtshan ma kun bstan nas/ /'dir ni kha dog kun 'bras
45b7(mdo 'grel): bu/ /'di ni rtse gcig yid kyis zung/ /ji ltar gnas ni rnam pa bcur/ /mtshan nyid so sor rnam par phye/ /de bzhin thig le'i 'bras bu yang/ /ltas su gyur par shes par bya/ /de bas gnas dang ltas rnams ni/ /mtshan 
46a1(mdo 'grel): bdag kyang bzung bar bya/ /de ltar thig le ma lus pa'i/ /mtshan nyid ji bzhin smras pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ thig le bzang ngan brtag ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o////
46a2(mdo 'grel): sha li ho tra bder gnas la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /sha ra zhes bya'i khyad par mdog /dka' thub chen pos de gsungs shig /dkar la mdog gzhan dang 'dres pa/ /shar zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /gang zhig
46a3(mdo 'grel): kha dog gzhan gyis ni/ /kha dog dkar ba zil mnan na/ /gnas dang grags pa gzhan dag gis/ /de yi bdag po zil mnan 'gyur/ /'di yang gnas dang dbyibs dag ni/ /gzhan las 'bras bu gzhan du 'gyur/ /
46a4(mdo 'grel): rab mnga' yab 'dra ba dang/ /khang pa'i phyi skor lta bu yi/ /rtal shar yod na ni/ /bdag pos la dbang byed 'gyur/ /gdengs ga sprul 'khyil shing 'dra dang/ /khya mchog rus sbal chu srin 'dra/ /sha ra rta la yod na ni/ /bdag
46a5(mdo 'grel): bshin tu byug par 'gyur/ /khang bzang ri yi rtse mo 'dra/ /ri mo gsal po yod pa'i rta/ /bdag po dbang byug ldan pa dang/ /rang dang gzhan dbang bskur bar 'gyur/ /chag pa'i shing dang skra 'dra yod/ /bdag po la
46a6(mdo 'grel): phan zad par 'gyur/ /rnga rtsa dag tu byung na ni/ /bdag po'i 'ching ba 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig lte ba nas gzung nas/ /ro stong nyi ma shar kha 'dra/ /de bzhin ro smad cha dang ni/ /zla ba yi ni mdog 'dra ba/ /mdangs dang
46a7(mdo 'grel): mdog ni phun tshogs pa/ /nyin mo g.yul las rgyal byed yin/ /de las go bzlog gyur pa dang/ /mtshan mo g.yul las rgyal byed yin/ /gang zhig lte ba nas bzung nas/ /ro stong mdangs snum dkar pa la/ /ro smad mdangs
46b1(mdo 'grel): snum nag po ni/ /de yang nyin mo rgyal byed yin/ /de las go bzlog gyur rta yang/ /mtshan mo rgyal bar byed pa yin/ /cha ni 'di dag nyid kyi ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon du 'od gzhan byung/ /nyin mo 'am ni mtshan mo ngag/ 'thab pa'i tshe na rgyal
46b2(mdo 'grel): byed yin/ /g.yas phyogs kyi ni kha dog dang/ /ro stod kyi ni mdog 'dra zhing/ /mdangs snum shis pa'i gzugs can ni/ /rta de bsngags par gyur pa yin/ /bram ze 'am ni rgyal rigs las /gzhan gyis de thob mi rigs
46b3(mdo 'grel): so/ /des ni dag kun zad byed yin/ /chos dang 'dod pa'ang gter byed yin/ /gang gi ro stod mdog nag cing/ /ro smad mdangs snum dkar ba ni/ /dgra 'dzoms mdza' o 'phel byed de/ /de yang g.yul las rgyal
46b4(mdo 'grel): byed yin/ /ro stod dung ltar dkar ba la/ /ro smad mdog gzhan ldan pa yin/ /de la mdza' skyes ces bya ste/ /rigs 'phel nyin mo shes pa yin/ /pa ta la ltar mchu dmar zhing/ /kha dang lce'u chung dmar gyur ba/ /khyim duAng
46b5(mdo 'grel): shis par 'gyur ba dang/ /lam duAng phan pa skyed byed yin/ /gzhan yang de dang 'dra ba'i rta/ /mdog gsal spu ni srab pa dang/ /mdangs snum shis pa'i gzugs can ni/ /rta mchog de ni bsngags pa yin/ /gnag
46b6(mdo 'grel): dang dmar dang ser po la/ /zlum ris dkar pos brgyan pa'am/ /dkar la mdog gzhan gyis brgyan pa'i/ /rta ni dpal skyed byed pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las sha ra'i mdog gi khyad par zhes te
46b7(mdo 'grel): le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //lha dang drang srong grub pa'i mdza' / /gtsang ma'i bdag nyid dbang po thul/ /rta yi che yi rig byed mkhas /rta bres na ni gnas pa la/ /ka ta ya nas rkang pa la/
47a1(mdo 'grel): legs par bzung nas tshig 'di dris/ /rta yi shis dang mi shis pa'i/ /mtshan nyid thams cad shes bya ba/ /so sor rgyas par dag tu ni/ /legs ldan gyis ni sngar bshad na/ /'di dag thams cad
47a2(mdo 'grel): ma lus pa/ /bsres pa dag kyang rtogs par 'tshal/ /de ltar dris tshe legs ldan ni/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /mtshan nyid thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /bsres pa'i mtshan nyid mnyan par gyis/ /nag po snum mdangs
47a3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa la/ /kha dang rkang pa rdog ma la/ /de bzhin mig dang brang rnams ni/ /gang zhig dkar por gyur pa dag/ rta de zhon na rgyal po ni/ /ma lus pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmig pa spu yis ni/ /kun nas khabs par
47a4(mdo 'grel): snang gyur pa/ /rta de g.yogs pa zhes bya ste/ /bdag po'i phun tshogs 'phel byed yin/ /yan lag nyid lag la brtan nas/ /gang gi mdangs ni shis pa yod/ /mthong na mig ni dga' byed cing/ /yid kyang mgu par byed pa
47a5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rta ni kha dog gcig gyur pa'i/ /lus dang ldan pa de yi bdag/ 'jig rten du ni 'gro kun la/ /srog 'dra bar ni sdug par 'gyur/ /'dzam bu smin pa lta bur snang/ /gnag pa legs par bris pa 'dra/ /rta de rgyal
47a6(mdo 'grel): pos zhon nas ni/ /mi dbang ba'ang? dbang du 'gyur/ /shin tu dmar shing rab snum pa'i/ /rta ni gang zhig 'phyang byed pa/ /de yi don kun phun sum tshogs/ /g.yul ngo dag tu rgyal bar 'gyur/ /kun nag bya rog 'dra ba
47a7(mdo 'grel): 'am/ /ce spyar spyang khu'i mdog 'dra ba'am/ /gang yang gra ma'i mdog 'dra ba/ /de ni g.yul du rgyal byed yin/ /rgyab gzhung bong bu 'dra ba yi/ /mdog gzhan gyi ni ri mo can/ /de ni gzhung thig yin zhes bya/ /rta de nor
47b1(mdo 'grel): ni 'jig byed yin/ /gang zhig lus mdog ri dags 'dra/ /rmig pa sor mo 'dra ba skye/ /byi ba'i sngar mo zhes bshad do/ /rta de mdza' dang 'bral byed yin/ /gzhung thig can dang mig mi sdug /de bzhin byi ba'i sder mo can//
47b2(mdo 'grel): mdog mi sdug pa'i rta mthong na/ /ring du yongs su spang bar bya/ /rdza gyo chag pa'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /thal ba'i mdog dang byi la'i mdog /byi ba'i mdog can gang yin dang/ /du ba'i mdog dang mdog mi sdug /de dag gis ni
47b3(mdo 'grel): bdag po gsod?/ /don grub pa la smad pa yin/ /du ba du ba mig mdog 'dres/ /me tog pa ta la'i mdog 'dra/ /rnga ma rdog ma dmar ser yod/ /rta de rigs ni rlag byed yin/ /grang gi rlig pa rmig pa? dang/ /rnga ma
47b4(mdo 'grel): mig dang rkan yang gnag/ de ni 'jug nag zhes bya ste/ /rigs dang mdzod ni zad byed yin/ /phrag so rgyab dang rked rtsa dang/ /ong to dag tu ri dags ni/ /a na ya li? mdog ltar gnag /de ni g.yang gzhi can zhes bya/ /phrag
47b5(mdo 'grel): sos bu ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rke rtsas kha lo pa 'chi 'gyur/ /rgyab kyis bdag po 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ong dos chung ma ngan spyod 'gyur/ /gang zhig stag 'dra'i ri mo yod/ /rta de blun po zhes bya de/ /gser can zhes pa kyang de
47b6(mdo 'grel): la? bya/ /g.yul du ba dag po gsong byed yin/ /ro stad? dam ni gzhan dag tu/ /ri dags lpags 'dra'i nag pos khyab/ /bdag po gsod cing kun gsod skyed/ /gang zhig mdongs dang bcas pa yin/ /rkang lag gnyis
47b7(mdo 'grel): kar? shis ro? yin/ /rkang lag gnyis na dkar gyur pa/ /mdongs dang bcas na de mi smad/ /lag pa gcig dkar mdongs med pa/ /bdag po gsod byed g.yul du spang/ /rkang lag gnyis na dkar gyur pa/ /g.yul?
48a1(mdo 'grel): du shis shing dpal bskyed yin/ /rkang lag dkar ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /rgya cher nga yis bshad par bya/ /rta gang gis ni mdun rkang gi/ g.yas pa dkar por gyur pa de/ /bkra mi shis par gyur pa ste/ /
48a2(mdo 'grel): g.yul du don mi 'grub par byed/ /snga rkang g.yon ba dkar gyur pa/ /dpung ba snod pa skyed byed yin/ /phyi rkang gi ni g.yas pa dkar/ /bdag po gsod par byed pa yin/ /g.yon pa dkar bas g.yul du ni/ /zhoms po dang
48a3(mdo 'grel): bcas brtson 'khyar/ /snga rkang gnyis dang de bzhin du/ /phyi rkang gi ni g.yon pa dkar/ /bdag po g.yul du mnga' mdung gis/ /'chi bar byed pa nyid yin no/ /snga rkang gnyis dang de bzhin du/ /phyi rkang g.yas pa dkar gyur pa/ /
48a4(mdo 'grel): g.yul du bdag po 'chi gyur nas/ /de yi rjes la rang nyid 'chi/ /snga rkang g.yon pa dkar gyur cing/ /phyi rkang gnyis ka dkar gyur pa/ /rta de g.yul du 'jug gyur na/ /grogs dang bcas pa 'chi bar 'gyur/ /snga rkang
48a5(mdo 'grel): g.yas pa dkar gyur cing/ /phyi rkang gnyis ka dkar na ni/ /rta de bdag po gsod byed yin/ /las rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mi shis bshad nas ni/ /shis pa bshad kyis nyan par gyis/ /snga rkang g.yas
48a6(mdo 'grel): pa dkar gyur cing/ /phyi rkang g.yon pa dkar ba ni/ /thang kar dkar po zhes bya ste/ /mdza' bshes nye du 'phel byed yin/ /de bzhin gcig shos gnyis dkar ba/ /mdza' o 'phel bar byed ba yin/ /snga rkang gnyis ni
48a7(mdo 'grel): dkar gyur na/ /nor dang bde dang dga' ba bskyed/ /phyi rkang gnyis ni dkar gyur pa/ /g.yul du dgra las rgyal bar gyur/ /ngos gnyis dkar bar gyur pa las/ /g.yas pa dpung dang mdzod 'phel byed/ /g.yon
48b1(mdo 'grel): pas skal ba bzang ba dang/ /nor dang mdzod kyang 'phel bar byed/ /rkang pa bzhi char dkar ba'i rta/ /rigs dang chos ni 'phel byed yin/ /tshig grang man chad rkang bzhi dkar/ /'bras bu chen po bskyed shes bya/ /ba spu'i mdza' 'am rting
48b2(mdo 'grel): pa 'am/ /spyi bor gang zhig dkar gyur rta/ /de ni sngar bshad las khyad par/ /'bras bu chung du bskyed par byed/ /pus mo'i bar du dkar ba'i rta/ /'bras bu gsal por 'byin par 'gyur/ /rta ni kha dog bzhan yod pa/ /rkang pa
48b3(mdo 'grel): lus mdog mi mthun na/ /de yi 'bras bu sngar bshad pa'i/ /khyad par bzhin du shes par bya/ /gang gis lag pa gnyis dkar zhing/ /rkang pa gnyis ni gnag pa 'am/ /dmar ba'i kha dog gzhan yin pa/ /de ni nyin mo
48b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal byed yin/ /de las bzlog par gyur pa ni/ /mtshan mo rgyal bar byed pa yin/ /gang zhig kha dog dmar po'i rta/ /rkang pa sngo ser dkar dang gnag/ yang na rmig pa rngo ba'am/ /ser dang dmar dang dkar dang gnag
48b5(mdo 'grel): kha dog gnyis sam gsum ma bzhi/ /mdog gam mdog rjes yod gyur pa/ /lha yi rta ni de 'dra 'byung/ /de yi rgyal po rgyal byed cing/ /dgra rnams thul bar byed pa dang/ /g.yul tu rtag tu shis pa dang/ /nor dang bu
48b6(mdo 'grel): dang tsha bor ldan/ /gang zhig skyes pa tshun chad ni/ /rnga rdog skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ /bdag po rigs ni brlag byas nas/ /de yi rjas la rang nyid nyams/ /rmang kha yi ni g.yas g.yon na/ /ba yi nu sor lta bu dag /gang zhig la ni
48b7(mdo 'grel): snang gyur ba/ rta de rgyal srid 'jig byed yin/ /gang zhig pa lang rwa 'dra ba/ /ru ru'i rwa rtse lta bu 'am/ /ba yi nu sor dbyibs 'dra 'am/ /lci ba'i rtse mo lta bu 'am/ /de bzhin pags pa'i 'dzer? ba'i dbyibs/ /yang na bil ba'i la bu
49a1(mdo 'grel): 'am/ /lag sor lta bu'i rwa dag ni/ /sbom po bas yang na phra mo dag / ring dang thung dang rtsub dang 'jam/ /sra dang snyi ba gang yang rung/ /rna rtsa 'am skra mtshams tha ma 'am/ /dpral ba 'am yang spyi bo 'am/ /de las /
49a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan pa'i gnas dag tu/ /de las gzhan pa'i dbyibs yod pa/ /gang byung de ni rwa can de/ /bdag po yul 'khor 'jig byed yin/ /yul phyogs gang na rta de yod/ /yul de rlag par 'gyur ba yin/ /des nad ni dgra bo yi/ /yul du
49a3(mdo 'grel): skyal la rjes zhi bya/ /rta ni gang gi kha la ni/ /sha khrag gis ni kun tu khyab/ /de bzhin rkub dang rlig pa dang/ /rna ba dag dang mig tu byung/ /rta de sha khrag can zhes bya/ /mi shis sdig pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /rta bras su ni mi gzhug
49a4(mdo 'grel): cing/ /bkra shis 'dod pas reg mi bya/ /mig gi nyes pa bshad bya yis/ /de ni nga las mnyan par bgyis/ /khyi mig dom dang byi ba'i mig /sbal mig nor bu'i mig 'dra dang/ /byi ba 'ug pa nya mig can/ /phag dang
49a5(mdo 'grel): khyu mchog lta bu'i mig /bya rog lug dang khra mig can/ /khra yi mig can smad pa yin/ /mig yo mig ni gdug pa dang/ /mig ser ba yang spang bar bya/ /des ni bdag po mi bde zhing/ /rigs zad par yang byed pa yin/ /
49a6(mdo 'grel): de ni g.yul du bdag po dag /gsang cing pham par byed pa yin/ /rkan gyi mdog ni sna tshogs dang/ /mdog dang dbyibs ni mang ba yi/ /'bras bu khyad par gang dag yin/ /de ni nga las mnyan par gyis/ /ge sar nag
49a7(mdo 'grel): po lta bu yi/ /thig le gang la khyab gyur pa/ /des ni lam du nyon mongs 'gyur/ /rkan gyi phyed ni dkar ba yis/ /nor zad ge sar lta bu yis/ /'gags ni mi shes gyur pa yin/ /rkan ni snum zhing zab pa dang/ /dmang ?
49b1(mdo 'grel): gyur na bsngags pa yin/ /shin tu dmar zhing cher khyab la/ /rtsub mo mang la'ang 'bras bu che/ /snum chung dmar ba'i shas chung ba/ /'bras bu chung bar shes par bya/ /rkan gyi kha dog 'bras bu dang/ /so yi 'bras bu nyid dang ni/ /
49b2(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid gnas dang bzhi las brtag /rlig 'bras gcig pa bdag po gsod/ /rlig 'bras nyra? pa bu gsor byed/ /rlig 'bras med pa bkra mi shis/ /rlig 'bras dmar ser nor nyams byed/ /rlig 'bras shin tu
49b3(mdo 'grel): 'phyang ba dang/ /g.yul du bdag po gsod par byed/ /rlig pa spu ni che pa 'am/ /yang na ser skyar gyur pa 'am/ /de bzhin zhu bar gyur pa yang/ /de yi bdag po gsod byed yin/ /kha dog gzhan dang ldan pa la/ /pus mo
49b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis ni nag gyur cing/ /sre long nag por gyur pa ni/ /bdag po gsod byed shes par bya/ /lus kyi kha dog nyid las ni/ /rnga ma'i kha dog gzhan gyur pa/ /'bar ba'i rnga ma can zhes bya/ /rta de rtag tu spang bar bya/ /rnga
49b5(mdo 'grel): ma'i rtse mo mi dag gzhan gyur/ /yul 'khor yang ni rlag par byed/ /rta ni mdog dkar gyur pa la/ /nag po cung zad yod mi shis/ /rna ba dang ni rdog ma nag /rnga rtse nag por gyur pa ni/ /de ni rna nag yin zhes
49b6(mdo 'grel): bya/ /las rnams kun la shis pa yin/ /g.yul dang lam zhugs khal bkal ba/ /rgyal po'i 'dod pa kun sgrub yin/ /rnga ma'i bar pa zhes bya dang/ /rnga rtse nag pa ma gtogs pa/ /rta ni kha dog nag pa la/ /
49b7(mdo 'grel): dkar po cung zad yod pa shis/ /ldam bu chu shel mdog 'dra zhing/ /gang gi mdog ni dkar gyur pa/ /rta de dpal yon can zhes bya/ /rgyal po rnam rgyal skyed byed yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/
50a1(mdo 'grel): 'dres pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //kha ba can gyi ri bo'i mchog /'byung khungs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ /shin tu mtho zhing rtse mo che/ /kun nas rlung ni mi ldan
50a2(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /rtse mo kha bas rnam par g.yogs/ /mi 'am ci yi glu sgras khyab/ /bya rnams sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing/ /ri dags sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzas/ /sna tshogs shing gis kun tu khyab /mkha' la rgyu brtag tu dga' 
50a3(mdo 'grel): rigs 'dzin tshogs ni legs gnas shing/ /dri za'i tshogs kyis bsten par ni/ /sha'i ho tra legs gnas la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pas/ /rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta/ /drang srong chen pos bdag la gsungs/
50a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i rta ni ci lta bu/ /de yi nges pa bdag la gsungs/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /yon tan skyon dag rgyal po la/ /'jig rten 'byung ba ci 'dra bar/ /de ltar tha mal mi rnams la/ /'byung mi 'gyur
