50a5(mdo 'grel): bar gzhung las bshad/ /de bas rgyal po'i bzhon pa yi/ /mtshan nyid 'bad pas brtag par bya/ /ci nas nyes par mi 'byung bar/ /rnam pa kun tu bya ba yin/ /tshad dang stobs dang snying bstobs gzi /stobs dang lus
50a6(mdo 'grel): kyi me drod pa ldan/ /gtsug 'khyil bzang zhing mdangs rab snang/ /'gros ni phun sum tshogs pa dang/ /skad bzang dri ni zhim pa dang/ /de bzhin skye gnas bzang ba dang/ /rigs ldan dang tshul phun sum tshogs/ /
50a7(mdo 'grel): du la zhing mthong na dga' ba dang/ /bad kan rang bzhin can mchog dang/ /de bzhin bzang po'i skye gnas dang/ /smad pa'i mtshan nyid med gyur cing/ /kun nas rnam pa thams cad du/ /mtshan nyid bzang po phun tshogs pa/ /
50b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'bad de rtag par bya/ /rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta/ /rgyal ba'i rta zhes bya bar bshad/ /gang zhig gzhan kun med par yi/ /brtan pa'i gtsug ni bcu dang ldan/ /rgyal po'i bzhon par 'os pa'i rta/ /ma li ka dang
50b2(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba'i mig /mdog snam rab tu dkar ba'i rta/ /zla ba'i lha dang ldan pa yin/ /rgyal po de la zhon na ni/ /sa stengs dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /ne tso mdog can nyi ma'i rta/ /rgyal po g.yul dor zhon na ni/ /de yi don rnams 'grub 'gyur zhing//
50b3(mdo 'grel): sa yang dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rgyal po'i mdog dmar rta/ /rnam thos sras kyi lha can te/ /de la zhon nas rnams ni/ /ma lus dbang byed the tshom med/ /sngo sangs lha dbang rta yin te/ /mdangs snum ldan la rgyal po ni/ /zhon
50b4(mdo 'grel): nas ni ma lus las/ /rtag tu rgyal bar nges pa yin/ /gnag cing 'tsher ba'i mdangs dang ldan/ /rta mchog de ni chu lha'i yin/ /de bzhon na rgyal po ni/ /myur du nor dang 'bru 'phel 'gyur/ /mdog dkar rna ba sngo ba dang/ /rdog ma
50b5(mdo 'grel): dang ni rngam gnag /chu lha'i rta ni gnyis pa ste/ /de rnyed sa ni ma lus 'thob/ /ldam bu chu shel ltar snang ba/ /rta ni nor lha'i yin par bshad/ /rgyal po de la zhon na ni/ /myur du nor mang bdag por 'gyur/ /ba so'i mdog 'dra
50b6(mdo 'grel): rnga ma gnag /kun nas mdangs ni snum dang ldan/ /chos kyi lha nges de zhon na/ /rgyal po mchod sbyin byed par 'gyur/ /lung tang snum po dang 'dra ba/ /rta mchog de ni gshin rje'i yin/ /rgyal po de la zhon gyur na/ /myur du dgra
50b7(mdo 'grel): kun las rgyal 'gyur/ /rma bya'i mdongs dang 'dra ba yi/ /ri mos khyab par gyur pa'i rta/ /sna tshogs lha'i yin de zhon na/ 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin ma rgang bcag pa yi/ /mdog ltar shin tu 
51a1(mdo 'grel): dmar ba'i rta/ /khyab 'jug rta de de zhon na/ /myur du sa ni dbang byed 'gyur/ /de bzhin gser dang 'dra ba la/ /'tsher bas rnam par brgyan gyur pa/ /dbang phyug che yi rta zhon na/ /dgra rnams dbang du 'gyur
51a2(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /de bzhin shel dang 'dra ba ru/ /dang zhing mdangs bcas lus yong pa/ /rnyed na mchod sbyin dam pa yi/ /skal ba rnyed par 'gyur ba yin/ /gang zhig nag la mgo bo dang/ /rkang pa bzhi ni dkar gyur pa/ /shes ldan rta de rnyed na ni/ /
51a3(mdo 'grel): nad kyis zil gnon mi 'gyur ro/ /ldam bu chu shel 'dra ba la/ /sngar bzhin yan lag lnga dkar ba/ /rgyal po de la zhon na ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob/ /lus kyi mdog ni gzhan 'dra zhing/ /mtshan nyid thams cad
51a4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa yi/ /tha skar bu yi rta rnyed na/ /rta ni mang po rnyed par 'gyur/ /dkar dang gnag pa'i tshul gyis khra/ /g.yas logs dkar ba'i shas che la/ /g.yon pa khra bor gyur pa yi/ /rta ni khra bo rnyed gyur na/ /rta de'i lha ni ngan spong ste//
51a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub yin/ /ldam bu chu shel 'dra'i mdog la/ /ne tso'i mdog 'dra'i 'khor yid can/ /drag po'i rta de rnyed na ni/ /'dod pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar bu yi rgyal ba'i rta/ /rgyal po yis ni
51a6(mdo 'grel): rtag tu bya/ /de yi gnas ni rta gzhan dag/ gang dang yang ni cig mi bya/ /ngo mtshar mdog dang ldan pa'i rta/ /dmod pas sa stengs skyes pa yin/ /dri za'i bur ni shes gyis la/ /rab tu 'bad de bsnyen par bya/ /sha li
51a7(mdo 'grel): ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ rgyal po'i bzhon pa'i rta'i mtshan nyid brtag pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rta yi mig gi mtshan nyid do/ /gang zhig bai DUrya 'dra'i?
51b1(mdo 'grel): mdog/ de bzhin shel gyi mdog 'dra dang/ /phug ron gyi ni mig 'dra dang/ /ka la ping ka'i mig 'dra dang/ /glang chen rma bya rnga mo dang/ /sreg ba'i mig dang 'dra ba dang/ /gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba nyid/ /de yi mig ni shis ba yin//
51b2(mdo 'grel): skyon med pa yi mig la ni/ /rdzim phra mos khyab pa dang/ /mig 'bras legs shang ma snang la/ /thur du bltas bar ma gyur pa/ /mdog ni bzang po dang ldan zhing/ /mig gi mdangs dang ldan pa'i rta/ /de ni g.yul las rgyal byed pa'i/ /
51b3(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba yi ni bzhon par 'gyur/ /yangs shing snum la mnyam ba dang/ /me tog ma li ka 'dra dang/ /tha ma ring mo yang gyur cing/ /dbus na yongs su mdzes pa dag /rta de ma li ka'i mig can/ /mig zur cung zad gnag pa
51b4(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de yis mdza' o 'phel 'gyur zhing/ /rta dang mdzod kyang rgyas par 'gyur/ /dkar ba'am mdog rjes dkar gyur la/ /mig la skyon med mthong mig nag /rdzi ma mig sgyus nag gyur pa/ /gang la yod pa de ni ro skyed/ /
51b5(mdo 'grel): mig ni shel dang 'dra ba la rgyal mo'i rtsa ba gnag gyur cing/ /mig gi rgyal mo rdul med pas/ /de ni shal mig can zhes bya/ /mig dang lus kyi mdog 'dra ba/ /mig gi mdog can zhes bya dge /kha dog lus dang
51b6(mdo 'grel): tha dad kyang/ /gang gi mig ni bzang gyur cing/ /mig sdug pa dang ma tshang med/ /de ni mig bzang nor 'phel byed/ /kha dog lus dang tha dad cing/ /smad par bya ba'i mig yod pa/ /mig ngan pa yi rta gang yin /las rnams
51b7(mdo 'grel): kun la smad pa yin/ /de bas dbyibs dang tshad ldan zhing/ /dpe dang legs par 'dra ba dang/ /rdzi ma'i kha dog snum pa yi/ /mig gang yin pa de bsngags so/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ mig brtag ba'i le'u?
52a1(mdo 'grel): ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //bsgrub dang grub pa'i rigs 'dzin gtso/ /drang srong gzi brjid chen po la/ /yon tan nges kyis yongs dris pa/ /rta so'i rig byed mkhyen lags
52a2(mdo 'grel): sam/ /de skad dris tshe drang srong mchog/ sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /rta so'i rig byed shes la gso/ /bu khyod kyis ni mnyan par gyis/ /mdun so thams cad thags bzang snyoms/ /sra zhing mtshan ma rab tu gsal/ /snum pa
52a3(mdo 'grel): 'am sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rta yi so ni bsngags pa yin/ /mche ba so dang mdog 'dra dang/ /'gram so rnams kyang de dang 'dra/ /so rnams rting ring srab pa dang/ /ri mo phra zhing shin tu 'jam/ /gos pa med cing rtsa ba yi/ /mdog
52a4(mdo 'grel): dang kun tu 'dra ba shis/ /mnyam zhing yan lag kun tu 'byor/ /chu zheng tshad dang ldan pa dang/ /gzugs ni shin tu legs gyur pa'i/ /so ni bde ba skyed byed yin/ /so ni lhag pa yod pa'i rta/ /bdag po yul mi rnams la
52a5(mdo 'grel): gnod/ /de bzhin so ni ma tshang ba/ /bdag po chung mar bcas pa rlog/ so yis kha ni khangs gyur pa/ /rigs rlog byed pas spang bar bya/ /so rtsa so dang bcas pa ni/ /mi shis pa yi gzugs ldan zhing/ /logs las byung pa gyur
52a6(mdo 'grel): pa dag /gtsigs pa de ni rigs rlog byed/ /rta yi so ni gnag gyur na/ /bdag po'i nor ni brlag byed yin/ /mtho dman khyer dang sbom phra khyer/ /de bzhin phreng ni rnam par spangs/ /mi mnyam med zhes bya so de/ /bdag bo'i bu
52a7(mdo 'grel): ni gsod byed yin/ /rtse mo nang du grub pa yi/ /so ni nor rnams 'jig byed yin/ /thams cad byung ba 'am chags pa 'am/ /gang zhig so ni sngon du 'dus/ /tshe tshad de la ma 'bab byung/ /de ni shin tu nyas chen bskyed/ /mdog
52b1(mdo 'grel): dang dbyibs ni nya phyis 'dra/ /so de nya phyis can zhes bya/ /nya phyi so can rta yis ni/ zas dang skom la gnod pa bskyed/ /'og so shin tu gyas gyur na/ /bdag po ltogs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung/ /ya so shin tu gyes gyur na/ /bdag po dgra las pham par 'gyur/ /
52b2(mdo 'grel): zur gsum rtse mo rno ba'i so/ /sgo dang nor ni 'phrog byed yin/ /so dang bcas par skyes gyur na/ /de ni thams cad zad byed yin/ /de dag las ni go bzlog pa'i/ /so bzad 'bras bu shis pa yin/ /mche ba dang ni 'gram so yi/ /
52b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu de bzhin shes par gyis/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ so brtag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //me dang nyi ma'i mdog 'dra ba/ /dka' thub can de sdig pa med/ /thub mchog sha li ho tra la/ /
52b4(mdo 'grel): mdzes las rgyal byi yongs dris pa/ /brtan pa'i gtsug ni dur shes bya/ /blo bur bas ni du zhig yin/ /shes dang shes bya'i bdag po yis/ /gtsug rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid ni/ /gang du ji ltar gnas pa yin/ /gtsug rnams kyi ni dbyibS
52b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /rnam pa dur? ni 'gyur ba gsungs/ /gtsug gi tshad ni ji tsam zhig / shis dang smad pa'i grangs ni du/ /thams cad gnas las 'pho ba dang/ /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa dang/ /stabs pa dang ni sman pa yi/ /'bras
52b6(mdo 'grel): bu so sor ci ltar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang lus kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /brtan dang mi brtan ji lta bu/ /lus las skyes pa'i gnas rnams ni/ /gnas kyi gang zhig gnas skabs dang/ /rkan gyi kha dog bye brag gi/ glo bur byung
52b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'bras bu dang/ /srab dang 'thug pa'i spu rnams ni/ /gtsug la ji ltar 'byung ba lags/ /de skad thub mchog la dris tsha/ /sha li ho tras bu la smras/ /'di na brtan dang mi brtan dang/ /yan lag rnam pa brgyad
53a1(mdo 'grel): yin la/ /'bras bu 'byung ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /mtshan nyid rab tu shes par bya/ /shis dang smad bya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /thams cad lus la brten pa yin/ /lus las 'byung bar gyur pa ni/ /lus dang yan
53a2(mdo 'grel): lag rnams ba gnyis/ /dge ba'i gnas su shis pa'i gtsug/ rgya che ba yi 'bras bu ster/ /mi shis gnas ni ngan par 'byung/ /shin tu mi shis skal chen 'gyur/ /tshang dang ldan zhing gsal bar byung/ /mtshan nyid ldan
53a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'bra bu che /tshang mi ldan zhing mi gsal ba/ /de yi 'bras bu chung bar 'dod/ /gnas dang dbyibs kyi bye brag las/ /mtshan nyid 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ /sor gnyis las lhag nya phyis te/ /sor gnyis pa ni
53a4(mdo 'grel): lhags zhes bya/ /shing lham 'dra dang rkang bgya pa/ /sor ni byed dang gnyis pa yin/ /shing lham phyed ni nas drug zhing/ /'dres pa sor ni brgyad pa yin/ /de yi cha gsum phra ba ni/ /'khyil pa zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /bzhi cha
53a5(mdo 'grel): phri bar gyur pa ni/ /kha 'bum pa zhes bya ba yin/ /de las lhag pa 'am ma tshang ba'i/ /gtsug ni 'bras bu med pa yin/ /pags srab spu ni phra ba dang/ /lus kyi gsang ba'i gnas su byung/ /de ni ngo bo nyid kyis phra/ /tshad
53a6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan rung mi ldan rung/ /'bras bu bcas par shes par bya/ /bra ba de dag gnod byed yin/ /yan lag brgyad ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /shis dang mi shis 'og nas bshad/ /rta yi gnas bcu'i spu tshogs la/ /brtan
53a7(mdo 'grel): pa gang yin de shes bya/ /mchu spros rdog mar re re dang/ /gtsog dang brang la gnyis gnyis te/ /rgyu zhabs rkub rtag gnyis gnyis te/ /bcu po de dag ldan par bshad/ /kun nas rdzogs shing shin tu gsal/ /
53b1(mdo 'grel): gtsug ni g.yas su 'khyil ba dang/ /chung ba ma yin che ba min/ /gser ltar mdangs snum 'od dang bcas/ /dbyibs ni legs par skyes pa dag/ las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /legs thos the tshom skyes gyur nas/ /
53b2(mdo 'grel): drang srong de la bslar smras pa/ /ji ltar bcu po nyid ldan gyis/ /gzhan dag de ltar ma yin bshad/ /rta rnams skyes zin gyur nas ni/ /gtsug de nam yang mi skye la/ /skyes pa 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing/ /gnas las 'pho bar
53b3(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /skyes tshe lhag gi skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas thams cad bstan pa yin/ /legs thos tshig ni thos pa dang/ /de rjes drang srong gis smras pa/ /ji ltar phyogs der skyes gyur pa/ /de ltar gzhan du ma yin pa/ /pha
53b4(mdo 'grel): mar yod dang med gyur kyang/ /cig shos la ni dbang ba yin/ /phal cher gnas bcur dbang gyur gyi/ /de ltar gzhan du mi snang ngo/ /de bas bcu po brtan par ni/ /nges pa nyid du zung bar gyis/ /'di dag la med des
53b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung pa/ /gzhan dag de ltar yin par bshad de/ /brtan dang mi brtan gang yin kyang/ /'bras bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /gnas ni dgu bcu rtsa drug yin/ /dbyibs ni brgyad po nyid yin no/ /'dres dang kha 'bus
53b6(mdo 'grel): 'khyil ba dang/ /rkang brgya pa dang lhags pa dang/ /shing lham dang 'dra shing lham phyed/ /nya phyis 'dra ste rnam pa brgyad/ /smad pa 'am sngags pa'i gnas dag gam/ /gnas su brtan dang ma brtan gang/ /gtsug 'khyil
53b7(mdo 'grel): pa yi dbyibs byung na/ /de na rjes mthun 'bras bur bskyed/ /'khyil pa chu skor lta bu yin/ /nya phyis nya phyis dbyibs ltar 'od/ /dbyibs gcig gnyis sam mang por ni/ /du ma gang tshe 'dus gyur pa'i/ /gtsug
54a1(mdo 'grel): 'khyil de ni 'dres pa'am/ /'dus pa zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /spu ni 'gros tshe me tog dag/ /ba 'bus ltar snang la? 'bus yin/ /bzlog pa ltar snang lhags? pa yin/ /zlum po'am yang na zur bzhi ni/ /shing
54a2(mdo 'grel): lham dbyibs 'dra shing lham can/ /brang ba'am yang na rting ba'i gnas/ /phyed 'dra shing lham phyed pa yin/ /me tog mgo lcogs dbyibs 'dra ba/ /de ni rkang brgya par shes bya/ /dbyibs las mi mthun gyur pa ni/ /gzhan dag kyang ni snang
54a3(mdo 'grel): mod kyi/ /de ni sbu yi 'gyur ba yin/ /gnas las shis dang mi shis 'gyur/ /gtsug kyang gnas dang dbyibs dang ni/ /mi shes mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /chad dang 'phungs dang 'thor ba dang/ /gtsug ni 'phred du 'byung ba dang/ /lhag ba
54a4(mdo 'grel): 'am chad bar gyur pa 'am/ /gang yang gnas las 'pho 'gyur ba 'am/ /dbyibs ngan mdog ni mi sdug pa/ /brtan po rnams ni mi snang ba 'am/ /smad ba'i gnas su g.yas 'khyil dang/ /bsngags ba'i gnas su g.yon 'khyil ba/ /mtshan
54a5(mdo 'grel): nyid ngan pa yin zhes bya/ /nges ni tshe thung skyed par byed/ /gtsug gi gnas ni dgu bcu drug /yod par bshad pa de rnams ni/ /shis dang smad par bya ba ste/ /rnam pa gnyis su bsdu bar bya/ /de las gzhan ni nyi shu zhig/ shis pa yin par
54a6(mdo 'grel): shes par bya/ /bdun cu rtsa drug smang bya ste/ /de ltar dgu bcu rtsa drug yin/ /kha 'bram la gnyis dpral bar bzhi/ /dpral mtshams la gcig kho na yin/ /rna rtsar gnyis te lkog mar gcig /mgo bo'i mthar ni gnyis yin la/ /
54a7(mdo 'grel): brang du gsum ste dpung par gnyis/ /mid pa gcig de de bzhin du/ /rgyu dang lo bu gnyis gnyis su/ /gtsug ni 'byung bar shes par bya/ /da ltar shes par gyur ba'i gnas/ /nyi shu yin par rnam par bshad/ /gtsug? ni/
54b1(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams nyid la ni/ /sum cu rtsa bdun grangs su 'gyur/ /mur 'gram mur gong mchi stan dang/ /mkhur tshos sna phor smin ma dang/ /rna rtsa lce'u ldeng rtse'u chung dang/ /mtshan khung dgu dang 'gram sre long/ /sna rtse pus mo mig 'bras gnyis
54b2(mdo 'grel): rtsib logs rkub tsos dag tu ni/ /gnas ni gnyis gnyis dag tu gtsug /gnyis gnyis byung ba sum cu drug /sna gdang mchu ltag srol mdung? dang/ /dpung sna snying ga ze'u drug mod/ /lte ba rkub dang mjug srubs dang/ /ya mchu ze'u
54b3(mdo 'grel): ltag sga 'og ste/ /de ltar gnas ni de dag tu/ /gtsug ni bcu gsum 'byung ba yin/ /tshe'u spu de bzhin tshig grangs dang/ /che'u cho gcig grang phra mo'i/ /gnas ni bcu drug 'di dag tu/ /gtsug kyang bcu drug nyid yin no/ /an
54b4(mdo 'grel): dong? ru dang ske pa'i rtsa/ /rmang kha rnga mar gnas gnyis gnyis/ /de ltar gnas brgyad ldan pa ru/ /gtsug ni rnam pa'ang brgyad yin no/ /mchu sgros de yis so gnyis te/ /gnas ni gsum po 'di dag tu/ /gtsug ni gsum po 'byung ba
54b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de phyir dgu bcu drug gsal nas/ /de ltar brtan zhing dag ba dang/ /smad pa dag kyang bshad pa yin/ /gtsug rnams kyi ni khyad par gyi/ /'bras bu 'byung ba mnyan par bgyi/ /ya mchur gnas pa'i gtsug gis
54b6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /bdag po'i blon po gsod par byed/ /mchu sgros steng dang g.yas kyis ni/ /bdag po'i pha ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yi g.yon na yod pas ni/ /zhon pa po yi ma 'chi byed/ /mchu ltas gong du gtsug byung na/ /bdag po'i
54b7(mdo 'grel): rigs dang bcas pa bsreg / snang por? la ni g.yas pa yis/ /'tsho ba'i sgo ni 'phags par byed/ /gang gi ma/ /bur? tshos gnyis ka la/ /gtsug 'khyil ba ni snang gyur na/ /de? yi bdag po'i bu blu? mo?/ /rta yis za bar 'gyur
55a1(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /rta gdong 'gram dang sna gdong la/ /gang gi gtsug ni snang gyur ba/ /rta de'i bdag po yul du ni/ /dgra bos gsod par 'gyur ba yin/ /gang gi rta la mche stan du/ /gcug 'khyil ba ni gnas byu? la
55a2(mdo 'grel): pa ? dgang? la 'di 'dra'i rta yod ba/ /de'i rigs rtag tu du bar 'gyur/ /gang gi rta yi mu 'gram gnyis/ /gtsug ni gsal por snang gyur pa/ /de lta'i gtsug can bcangs gyur na/ /des ni rigs ni gnyis su 'gyis/ /gang gi
55a3(mdo 'grel): gtsug ni smin ma yin/ /bar du gnas par snang gyur pa/ /rta de khro gnyer can zhes bya/ /nye du mdza' bshes rnams la gnod/ /gang gi mur gong gnyis su ni/ /gtsug ni re re snang gyur pa/ /de yi rigs kun zad byed cing/ /bdag
55a4(mdo 'grel): po'i 'phongs pa skyed byed yin/ /'gram slang rtse'u chung dgag ma ni/ /tshe'u spu 'am ske rtsa chig grang phra/ /mchan gnyis dag tu gtsug 'khyil ba/ /spu ni g.yon du 'khyil gyur na/ /de yi rta dang bdag po ni/ /mda' char gyis ni
55a5(mdo 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi rta yi rna ba'i rtse/ /gnyis kar gtsug ni snan gyur na/ /gsang 'phel bayi nyes pa yis/ /de yi bdag po 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi rta la rna rtse ru/ /gnas pa'i gtsug ni snang gyur dang/ /ze'u
55a6(mdo 'grel): ldad la ni yod pa'i rta/ /bdag po'i don grub ma yin no/ /gang gi rta yi srol gong dbus/ /gtsug 'khyil ba ni snang gyur pa/ /de yi bdag po bza' ba dang/ /btung ba re ba 'grub mi 'gyur/ /an dong ru ni gtsug 'khyil
55a7(mdo 'grel): ba na/ /rta ni gang la snang gyur pa/ /bdag po 'am bu 'am dul spyod mkhan/ /gang yang rung la gnod pa skyed/ /gang gi ze'ur gtsug byung ba/ /rta de phongs pa dang bcas par/ /bdag po'i rigs rgyud bcas brlag pa'am/
55b1(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi gtso bo la gnod par 'gyur/ /rta dang nor ni brlag byed cing/ /rgyal po'i yul 'khor bcas 'chi dang/ /don kun 'jig cing gdug pas na/ /skyes pa'i tshe ni nyid na bskrad/ /lag gis rig dang mig gis mthong/ /thag rings
55b2(mdo 'grel): su ni spang bar bya/ /de ni dgra la sbyin pa 'am/ /gzhan gyi yul 'khor dag tu skyur/ /gang gi ze'u ltag gtsug yod pa/ /de yi bdag po kha 'am ni/ /sems can mi sdug pa zos shing/ /g.yul du dpung dang bcas par 'chi/ /sga 'og
55b3(mdo 'grel): gtsug gis bdag po 'chi/ /gsal shing skyon de 'chi bar 'gyur/ /nyes pa brtan cing nor brlag pa 'am/ /yang na mtshon gyis 'chi bar byed/ /gang gi gtsug ni snying ga 'am/ /dpung sna dag tu yod gyur pa/ /rta de bdag po 'khor
55b4(mdo 'grel): bcas par/ /g.yul du 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /pus mo'i gtsug gis g.yul du ni/ /'khrul cing dpung bcas dgra bos gsong/ /rgyal po rkun ma chad pa mas/ /bdag po'i rigs ni brlog par byed/ /gang gis tshig grangs gnyis
55b5(mdo 'grel): la ni/ /gtsug ni gnas par snang gyur na/ /de yis bdag po gnyen bcas pa/ /lcags sgrog gis ni bcings bar 'gyur/ /gang gi tshe'u'i tshe rnams su/ /gtsug 'khyil ba ni snang gyur pa/ /bcing dang gsong ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/
55b6(mdo 'grel): de yis bdag pa brlag par 'gyur/ /mtshan khung gtsug ni yod pa'i rta/ /g.yul du myur du 'chi 'gyur zhing/ /de yi bdag po dag kyang ni/ /bde dang ldan par mi gnas so/ /mtshan khung gcig gis nyes pa chung/ /gnyis
55b7(mdo 'grel): kas snang par gyur pa yin/ /rtsibs logs gtsug gis bdag po ni/ /phyogs dang bcas par zad par 'gyur/ /lte bar gtsug ni 'khyil gyur pa/ /gang zhig gis ni rta la snang/ /de yi bdag po dags rgyud bcas/
56a1(mdo 'grel): nad kyis yongs su gdungs par 'gyur/ /smad khang gtsug ni yod gyur ba'i/ /bdag po chung ma mi rigs spyod/ /rlig par gang gi gtsug 'khyil ba/ /rta de'i bdag por gyur pa ni/ /bu med tshe ni thung gyur te/ rtan
56a2(mdo 'grel): lta na mi sdug yin/ /rta gang gi ni drug mod yi/ /dbus na gtsug ni snang gyur pa/ /'dul spyod mkhan gyi de zhon te/ /gal te g.yul du 'jug gyur na/ /rta de nyid dang lhan cig tu/ /zug rdu yis ni 'chi bar byed/ /rnga rtsar gang gi rta
56a3(mdo 'grel): la ni/ /gtsug 'khyil bdag yod gyur ba/ /'di ni rtsa gnas 'jigs byed yin/ /bdag po'i sgro bsdug par byed/ /rkub kyi phyogs dang spu dag dang/ /'breg ? gnas par gyur ba ni/ /bdag bo'i lto ba'i nad skyed cing/ /gar yang
56a4(mdo 'grel): bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rkub tsas rkub kyi sted dag tu/ /gang gi gtsug ni yod? gyur ba/ /de ni rtug 'bru la zhes bya ste/ /bdag bo'i rigs ni rlog byed yin/ /sre long bar ni gtsug 'khyil ba'i/ /rta ni rtag tu lam
56a5(mdo 'grel): 'jug 'gyur/ /bdag po g.yog dang bcas pa ni/ /mtshon gyis 'chi bi nyid du 'gyur/ /chi ga grang gtsug la sogs pa yi/ /bshad 'bras phyi rkang la'ang sbyar/ /de ltar mi shis bshad nas ni/ /shis bdag kyang bshad par
56a6(mdo 'grel): bya/ /gang gi kha 'gram dag tu gtsug/ gsal ba'am nya phyis dbyibs 'dra gnas/ /rta mchog de yi bdag po ni/ /zas thob don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbral bar gang gi gtsug 'khyil ba/ /g.yas su 'khyil ba gnyis
56a7(mdo 'grel): yod ba/ /de yi bdag po g.yul du ni/ /rgyal zhing bu tsha rnam par 'phel/ /gang gi gtsug ni dpral ba na/ /mi mnyam gsum ni yod gyur ba/ /rgyal rigs kyis ni de 'dra rnyed/ /dgra bo'i sa la dbang byed 'gyur/ /mchod sbyin
56b1(mdo 'grel): legs par byed pa dang/ /rgyal chen yon kun gtod par 'gyur/ /gang gi dpral bar gtsug 'khyil gsum/ /gong nas gong du brtsegs pa ni/ /g.yon du mi 'khyil mnyam zlum yod/ /de ni rta yi rin chen yin/ /des ni rgyal pos stengs
56b2(mdo 'grel): su/ /dgra rnams las ni nges rgyal 'gyur/ /gang gi dbral bar gtsug dag ni/ /phyogs bzhir bzhi ni yod gyur ba/ /gang la de 'dra'i rta yod pa/ /de ni myur du sa bdag 'gyur/ /g.yul du rtag tu rgyal ba dang/ /nor ldan bu dang tsha bo 'phel/ /
56b3(mdo 'grel): rin chen tshogs kyang rnam par 'phel/ /dgra rnams kyi ni spyi bor gnas/ /gang gi dbral mtshams gtsug g.yas 'khyil/ /kha 'bus pa'am 'khyil ba yod/ /de ni lan gcig g.yul zhugs nas/ dgra las rgyal de bzlog par 'gyur/ /rna rtsa
56b4(mdo 'grel): kho nar gtsug 'khyil ba/ /rta ni gang la yod gyur ba/ /de ni dgos pa zhes bya ste/ /bdag bo'i mchod sbyin 'phel byed yin/ /lkog ma ru ni gnas pa'i gtsug/ g.yas su 'khyil cing rab gsal yod/ /lha yi nor bu zhes de bya/ /'dod
56b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /mgul ba rkang pa kha ru ni/ /nya phyis 'dra ba'i gtsug yod pa/ /yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ste/ /rta dang gra bo 'jigs byed yin/ /gang gi rdog mthar nya phyis 'dra'i/ /gtsug 'khyil gsal zhing g.yas su 'khyil/ /rgyal
56b6(mdo 'grel): rigs kyis ni de 'dra ba/ /rnyed na dgra bo'i spyi bor gnas/ /gang gis brang la legs gnas pa'i/ /gtsug ni gsum po g.yas 'khyil cing/ /gsal zhing nya phyis dbyibs 'dra ba/ /spu ni gyen du ltas ba snang/ /des ni g.yul du dgra bsad naS
56b7(mdo 'grel): bde bar ldog par 'gyur ba yin/ /gdal brang la gtsug bzhi ni/ /g.yas su 'khyil pa yod pa dang/ /de bzhin yid 'od gtsug yod pa/ /de ni dpal gyi shing zhes bya/ /dpal shing zhes bya 'di nyid ni/ /don sgrub byed pa'i rta yin te/ /de yis
57a1(mdo 'grel): g.yul las rgyal ba dang/ /bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur/ /dpung ba la ni gtsug yod cing/ /de yang nya phyis dbyibs 'dra ba/ /de ni dpung rgyan can zhes bya/ /bdag po'i 'dod pa gter byed yin/ /rgyu'i lhag na
57a2(mdo 'grel): gang gi gtsug/ g.yas su 'khyil ba yod gyur pa/ /de ni 'od dpag can zhes bya/ /'bru dang nor rnams 'phel byed yin/ /nor gyis tshi ma bar byas nas ni/ /bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar byed/ /dpal shing pad+ma g.yung drung dang/ /sa lu dbyig
57a3(mdo 'grel): pa rgyal mtshan dang/ /dga' ba 'khyil dang 'khor lo gshod/ /dud dang rdo rje ral gri gzhu/ /nya dang zla ba zla phyed dam/ /dar dang de bzhin gtun shing 'dra/ /mtshan ma de 'dra rab gsal ba'i/ /gtsug 'khyil rta ni gang dag gi//
57a4(mdo 'grel): brad dam dpral bar yod gyur ba'i/ /rgyal bo de ni rgyal srid brtan/ /de ltar smad dang shis pa yi/ /gtsug ni yang dag bshad pa yin/ /gtsug las lhag pa'i spu yod pa/ /bdag po'i nor dang 'bru skyed byed/ /sngar bshad pa ni
57a5(mdo 'grel): snang gyur na/ /gnas las 'bras bu 'byin pa yin/ /legs thos the tshom gyur pa yis/ /slar yang pha la smras pa ni/ /yan lag brgyad bo 'di dag las/ /'bras bu sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba/ /rgyal po'i 'bras bu byed pa ni//
57a6(mdo 'grel): rta yi lus la brten par mthong/ /gal te rta las dge mi dge/ 'bras bu rgyal pos thob gyur na/ /rgyal po de yi rang lus las/ /byung ba'i mtshan nyid don ma mchis/ /bu yis de skad smras pa dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /dka' 
57a7(mdo 'grel): thub can gyi drang srong gis/ /rgyal po'i mtshan ma gang mthong ba/ /de yi 'bras bu gsal bar ni/ /rta yi mtshan nyid kyis ston 'gyur/ /bdag bo bsod nams can la ni/ /mtshan nyid bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bdag po smad par bya ba
57b1(mdo 'grel): la rta yang chung bar skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po 'dren pa'i las can la/ /rta yang mtshan nyid 'dren mar 'byung/ /tshe ni gnas dang 'brel pas?/ /gnas skabs? ji bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rkan gyi mdog ni ma dren ma yi/ /le'u'i nang du sngar bshad zin/ /glo bur ba yi 'bras bu ni/ /ltas ni le'u nang nas ston/ /de
57b2(mdo 'grel): ltar gtsug du shis mi shis/ /brtan dang brtan min mtshan nyid ni/ /ji ltar dris pa ma lus par/ /nga yis legs par bshad pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ gtsug brtan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //
57b3(mdo 'grel): legs thos la sogs bu kun dang/ /gcer bu'i rgyal tshogs slob ma rnams/ /na tshod shes la mtshar skyes nas/ /pha la de rnams kyis dris pa/ /rta yin tshod ji ltar shes/ /'di yi tshe ni ji ltar bshad/ /so rnams su ni mtshan ma dang/
57b4(mdo 'grel): pags pa spu ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /na tshod gnas su phyin ma phyin/ /ci ltar shes par 'gyur ba lags/ /gang gis na tshod shes 'gyur ba'i/ /mtshan ma ji ltar shes par gyis/ /de skad dris tshe drang srong mchog/ de nyid shes pas slar smras
57b5(mdo 'grel): pas/ /rta/ yin tshod shes pa ni/ /mtshan ma las kyi gnyer rnyed 'gyur/ /la la gzhon pa'ang rgas 'dra dang/ /rgas pa'ang gzhon pa'i tshul du snang/ /de bas rta las kha cig ni/ /shin tu rmongs par byed pa yin/ /dus ni brtag cing
57b6(mdo 'grel): bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten thams cad ma lus khyab/ /nyin mtshan dang ni zla ba dang/ /lo dang dus drug bcas par ni/ /dus kyi mtshan nyid ldan pa ru/ /dus 'di shes par bya ba yin/ /gang gi so sogs la rim bzhin/ /dus ni dus
57b7(mdo 'grel): kyi grangs su 'gro/ dus las mtshan ? gsal gyur la/ /mtshan ma las kyang dus shes bya/ /rta ni skyes nas du lon pa/ /mtshan ma las ni shes par bya/ /mkhas pas mtshan ma bstan nas ni/ /legs par shes nas brtan par?
58a1(mdo 'grel): legs par brtag par gyur ba yis/ /gzung ba de ni de bzhin yin/ /myur bar ltas bsam shes pa/ /de ni log par 'dzin par 'gyur/ /legs ltas ma rmongs par gyur ba/ /mtshan mdus ni ston pa yin/ /de las
58a2(mdo 'grel): 'bad cing mkhas pa dang/ /bstan bcos don mthong yang dag shes/ /mtshan ma shin tu des rtag la/ /dogs pa med par bstan par bya/ /mdun po steng dang 'og dag la/ /skyes pa drug drug yin shes bya/ /de nas rta yi mche ba
58a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /steng 'og gnyis la bzhi yod do/ /'grams so steng dad 'og gnyis na/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa yin/ /de ltar so bsdus kun gyi spyi/ /bzhi bcu yod par shes par bya/ /mdun so'i 'og ma ci lta bar/ /steng so de ltar mi mngon te/ /rta yi so
58a4(mdo 'grel): la mtshan ma ni/ /me long gzugs brnyan lta bur mngon/ /zla ba'i rim gyis skyes pa yi/ /mtshan ma lo gcig yin par 'dod/ /lo gnyis nas ni go rim bzhin/ /so so'i kha dog las shes bya/ /de nas lo gsum nas brtsams te/ /so
58a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar ni 'dod pa yin/ /lo lnga'i bar du so dag ni/ /'byung zhing skye bar shes bar bya/ /de'i rjes la so ris kyi/ /cha nas na tshod shes bar bya/ /gnag dang ser dang dkar ba dang/ /mchid bu sbrang bu'i mo dag 'dra dang/ /dud dang gtun gyi
58a6(mdo 'grel): dbyibs 'dra dang/ /de nas so ni mgul ba dang/ /de rjes de ni 'byung ba ste/ /'di ni mtshan ma bsdus pa yin/ /mtshan ma rnams ni go rim bzhin/ /re re las ni rab bshad bya/ /de las thog mar zla re ni/ /lon pa'i mtshan nyid shes
58a7(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /rdo rdog? pags pa shin tu phra/ /yan lag dang ni rmig pa mnyen/ /dpral ba mtho dman khyer ba dang/ /lus gug rtsol ba chung ba dang/ /mdun so'i dbus ma gnyis zlum pa'i/ /rte'u zla gcig lon shes bya/ /lus kyi tshul
58b1(mdo 'grel): ni mdzes pa dang/ /mdun so gnyis ni gsal bar gnas/ /dregs bas 'gro ba'i tshul can dag/ de ni zla ba gnyis lon yin/ /sha ni rgyas zhing 'byes pa dang/ /sra zhing brtan par gnas pa dang/ /mdun so dag mi rno ba dang?/ /spu ni rtsub par skye ba
58b2(mdo 'grel): dag/ rta la mkhas bas rte'u de/ /zla ba gsum lon shes par bya/ /skyes ba'i spu ni byi ba dang/ /mdun so gnyis ni rdzogs pa yi/ /rte'u zla ba bzhi len bar/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya/ /mdun so gnyis ni rdzogs par dang/ /bar
58b3(mdo 'grel): ma dag kyang skye ba yi/ /rte'u gang yin de nyid ni/ /zla lnga lon bar shes par bya/ /gang tshe ri mo dud dmar 'dra/ /shin tu phra bar snang gyur ba/ /mdun so la ni yod gyur cing/ /so mdza' las ni gyen du 'grang/ /de tshe rte'u zla drug bar/ /the
58b4(mdo 'grel): chom med par shes par bya/ /spu ni mi mnyam gyur ba dang/ /mdun so bar mar ri mo snang/ /lus dang rmig pa brtan gyur cing/ /kun nas mgrin par gyur ba dang/ /mdun so tha ma rdol gyur ba/ /de tshe zla ba bdun ba yin/ /mdun so rdzogs par
58b5(mdo 'grel): gyur ba dang/ /'gram so cung zad skye ba dang/ /rnga ma'i chogs kyang legs skyes ba/ /zla ba brgyad par shes par bya/ /mdun so bar ma legs rdzogs shing/ /der yang ri mo snang gyur la/ /rdog ma'ang mi mnyam par snang ba/ /de tshe zla ba dgu
58b6(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /rdog ma'ang rnam par gyes ba dang/ /mdun so bar ma'ang dkar ba dag/ gang yin de ni mkhas pa yis/ /skyes nas zla bcu lon shes bya/ /'grams so rdzogs par gyur ba dang/ /rlig pa dag kyang 'chad bdag/ de lta bu yi
58b7(mdo 'grel): rta'u yi/ /zla ba bcu gcig lon shes bya/ /gang gis so ni thams cad kyang/ /dkar ba nyid du snang ba dang/ /ba spu 'jam zhing ring ba yis/ /lus la khyab par gyur ba yi/ /rte'u mtshan ma 'di dag gi/ /lo gcig rdzogs
59a1(mdo 'grel): par shes par bya/ /gang tshe so ni mdog ser zhing/ /dung dmar dag duAng snang gyur ba/ /rdog mang de ni rnga ma ring/ /spu yang 'byi bar 'gyur ba dang/ /gnyid kyang che bar snang ba dang/ /krags pa gzi mdangs 'phel?
59a2(mdo 'grel): gyur ba/ /mtshan ma 'di dag ldan pa yi/ /rta ni lo gnyis lon shes bya/ /lo gnyis gsum 'am de bzhin du/ /bzhi'am yang na lnga yi tshe/ /mche ba bzhi ni skye 'gyur te/ /'di la nges ba mi snang ngo/ /rte'u lo gnyis lon pa la//
59a3(mdo 'grel): rlig pa'i 'bras bu gcig snang ste/ /gnyis nas ldan mnyam gyur te/ /gzhan du mi shes pa nyid yin/ /rlig pa dag ni gnyis ka yang/ /gang zhig mir skyes de go bzlog/ rang bzhin rdzogs par gyur ba ni/ /rlig pa rang gi gnas
59a4(mdo 'grel): su phyin/ /bu skyes bar yang 'gyur ba dang/ /lam du 'gro ba'ang de sngan thub/ /don kun yang dag sgrub byed cing/ /nor dang dga' dang bde 'thob byed/ /mche ba skye ba'i dus dag gi/ bya ba 'di ni byed la bshad/ /de yan chad ni mche ga
59a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rlig pa rtal mi skye'o/ /lo gsum pa la mdun so gnyis/ /lo bzhi ba la bar ma ste/ /lnga pa la ni tha ma dag/ 'byung zhing skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /phyed dang gsum na mdun so? ni/ /gnyis 'byung bar ni des ba yin/ /de'i skyes
59a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ /lo gsum par ni shes par bya/ /phyed dang bzhin de yin ni/ /bar ma byung bar shes pa yin/ /de nyid skyes bar gyur ba ni/ /lo bzhi par ni shes par bya/ /phyed dang lnga dang mdun so yi/ /tha ma dag ni 'byung
59a7(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /de nas tha ma skyes gyur ba/ /lo lnga bar ni de shes bya/ /so 'byung ba dang skyes gyur kun/ /rdzogs pa'i rta ni lo lnga ba/ /bzhon ba las ni de 'das shing/ /mchog tu lus ni rgyas pa dang/ /bags pa rnga rdog sdug pa dang//
59b1(mdo 'grel): dbang bo dang zhing dga' ba dang/ /nus pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ /dar la bab la gnas gyur cing/ /khu ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ /skad kyang yongs su rjes 'gyur te/ /ji ltar skyes ba lo bcu drug/ lo lnga pa yi rta de 'dra/ /de tshe dar la bab shes
59b2(mdo 'grel): bya/ /las rnams kun ni nus par 'gyur/ /de rjes bu ni the tshom dag/ skyes par gyur bas dri ba dris/ /so ni mi 'byung bar shes na/ /ji ltar 'byung zhing skye ba lags/ /de ni bdag la bshad pa'i rigs/ /drang srong gis yang slar smras ba/ /dper
59b3(mdo 'grel): na 'bras bu skye ba na/ /me tog lung las 'chad par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sa ni skye gyur ba/ /g.yo zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang zhig gzhan par gyur ba'i so/ /ltung ba skye ba lta na cig pa/ /de ni go re ma ji bzhin du/ /thams cad da yis
59b4(mdo 'grel): bstan par bya/ /'o ma 'byung ba'i so srab cing/ /thung zhing brngam? la mi mnyam lhod/ /rtsa ba phra zhing rtse mo sbom/ /ma so rtse mo zlum pa dang/ /de bzhin kha dog nag nag can/ so rten chung zhing snyi ba dang/ /so rtse ri mo nag po dang/ /nag
59b5(mdo 'grel): nog can gyis mtshon pa yin/ /'di ni dang por skyes ba yi/ /so yi mtshan nyid gyur pa yin/ /rtse mo rno zhing rtsa ba sbom/ /legs gnas so skyus mnyam pa dang/ /dkar zhing snum lar ? ba dang/ /sra zhing thags ni bzang ba dang/ /steng ni
59b6(mdo 'grel): lcod zhing de bzhin dbus/ /gsal bar skyes pa de 'dra'i so/ /rim gyis yongs su rdzogs gyur pa/ /nas dang 'bru ni za bar nus/ /de ltar 'gyur dang skyes pa'i so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /nag po mdun sor chags lo
59b7(mdo 'grel): drug/ bdun pa la ni bar ma dang/ /brgyad pa la ni tha ma ru/ /chags pa la ni mngon par stan/ /ser po dgu par mdun so ste/ /bcu ba la ni bar ma do/ /lo ni bcu gcig lon ba la/ /tha mar de ni chags par bstan/ /dkar cha
60a1(mdo 'grel): la ni bcu gnyis na/ /bdun so bar mar bcu gsum na/ /tha mar lo ni bcu bzhin/ /gnas par de ni bstan pa yin/ /mchid bu lo ni bco ldan/ /mdun ? dag la gnas pa yin/ /bcu drug par ni bar ma la/ /bcu bdun
60a2(mdo 'grel): ba ni tha mar 'gro/ spang mdog lo ni bco brgyad na/ /mdun so bar mar bcu dgu na/ /nyi shu tshen tha ma ru/ /de ni gnas par 'gyur ba yin/ /dud 'du nyi shu rtsa gcig na/ /mdun sor nyi shu gnyis na dbus/ /nyi shu gsum na tha ma ru/ /de/
60a3(mdo 'grel): ni gnas par rab tu bshad/ /gtun 'dra nyi shu rtsa bzhin/ /mdun sor rtsa lnga'i tsha na dbus/ /tha ma dag dang ldan par ni/ /lo ni nyi shu drug na 'byung/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun la mdun so/ /rtsa brgyad pa la bdan ste/ /nyi shu dgu la tha ma dog/
60a4(mdo 'grel): yongs su 'gul bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lo sum cu na mdun so ste/ /sum cu gcig na bar ma yin/ /sum cu gnyis na tha ma ni/ /'byung ba 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de nas gnas kyi dbye ba yis/ /mtshan ma rnams ni shes par gyis
60a5(mdo 'grel): snying po'i cha yi phyi rol gnas/ /so yi rtse mor mngon gnas yin/ /gnag dang ser dad dkar po las/ dkar bo yin na mthil dbus skye/ /rta yi so rtsar chags pa ni/ /nye ba'i lus zhes bya ba yin/ /'ching bu sbrang bu du mdog 'dra//
60a6(mdo 'grel): thel gyis dbus la brten pa yi/ /nad gi snying po'i tsha nas ni/ /so rtse'i bar brten pa yin/ /gtun 'dra so rten dag las ni/ /brtsams te skye ba yin par bshad/ /de ni mdzod dang zung bzhi dang/ /shin tu zlum pa'i khyad par gyis/
60a7(mdo 'grel): rma 'dra dang ni bcas mtshan ma/ /dbyibs ni rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /sbrad bu'i mdog can gru bzhir 'gyur/ /mching bu nyid ni 'jog par gnas/ /dud dang gtun 'dra nyid dag ni/ /shin tu zlum bor gnas pa yin/ /rta
60b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi ni so la chon/ /ngo bo nyid kyis chags pa yin/ /dper na shing las skyes lo ma/ /gzhon tshe dmar phor gnas pa yin/ /rgyas pa'i tshen sngon por 'gyur/ /de yi rjes la ser po ste/ /skams shing mi sdug gyur pa na/ /smin cing lhung bar gyur
60b2(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /de bzhin rta yi so dag gi/ chon ni rim gyis yal ba yin/ /de las gzhan yang mtshan ma ni/ /so so zhing gis rab sbyar bya/ /la la lung ? mdog can la/ /kha cig 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu'i mdog/ /ba cig lcags ni bcag pa 'dra//
60b3(mdo 'grel): la la? dngul rdo 'dra ba ni/ /nag po drug nas dgu yi bar/ /ri mo sol gnas pa yin/ /de che nyams dga' stobs ldan zhing/ /sha ni rgyas par gyur pa dang/ /rnga ma dang ni rdog ma snam/ /sbu mdog shin tu gsal ba dang/ /ma zhum 'cher zhing 'gros
60b4(mdo 'grel): bzang dang/ /mthong na dga' ba nyid du ni/ /shugs dang spro bar ldan pa dang/ /grims shing lang? 'tsho dag la gnas/ /pad+ma'i ge sar 'dra ba 'am/ /gser ram sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra na/ /ba ser ba lar sbrang du yi/ /mdog 'dra de yi dbus na ni//
60b5(mdo 'grel): grags ma'i dbyings 'dra chags pa dang/ /'dam bu'i shun pa'i mdog 'dra ba 'am/ /cung zad sngo zhing ser bar ni/ /ring bor so yi ngos la chags/ /ser bo mdun so le sogs par/ /de ltar dgu ba yan chad gnas/ /ser bo'i mtshan ma ldan pa'i rta
60b6(mdo 'grel): sha yis rgyas shing stobs dang ldan/ /mdangs ldan de bzhin kha dog bzang/ /brtan zhing dga' bar byed pa yin/ /'bras ni grus pa lta bu dang/ /de bzhin mu tig mdog can la/ /thel dang dbus ni mnyam zhing zlum/ /de bzhin zho yi mdog
60b7(mdo 'grel): can du/ /dkar bo rnam pa tha dad par/ /bcu gnyis sogs par mdun sor gnas/ /dkar po'i mtshan mar ldan pa la/ /phyi rol mtshan ma 'di 'byung ste/ /bags ba sha ni lhod pa dang/ /stobs ni yongs su bri ba dang/ /kha dog dag kyang
61a1(mdo 'grel): nyams pa dang/ /dpral bar ser bar 'gyur ba dang/ /lus kyi stobs dang mgyogs pa dang/ /spro bdag ni 'bri bar 'gyur/ /brang gi stobs ni zang pa'i phyir/ /phrag sor gnyer ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ / /ba cig yungs
61a2(mdo 'grel): kar dkar 'dra dang/ /la la sbrang rtsi 'dra ba dang/ /kha cig mchid bu nag po 'dra/ /dma' zhing zlum pa'i thig le chags/ /mching bu mdun so la sogs par/ /bco lnga yan chad 'byung ba yin/ /mig dang phrags so 'phral ba dang//
61a3(mdo 'grel): rgyu dang mchan khud dag dang ni/ /rnga rtsa'i gnas ni gang yin bar/ /spu dkar gnyer ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rta yi sbyor ba 'khrig pa dang/ /'dre ba dag kyang spong byed cing/ /'gros dang skad kyang chung ba dang/ /nyam da'am lam du bub bar
61a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /lo ni bcu bdun pa dag la/ /phyi rol mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung/ /ser dang nag dang dmar ba'am/ /sprad bu'i dbyibs 'drar sbrang bu'i mdog/ bco brgyad nas ni nyi shu'i bar/ /rta la 'di 'dra 'gyud bar 'gyur/ /de la gnyed ma
61a5(mdo 'grel): spu dkar ni/ /slar yang 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/ /rta yi spyod pa 'khrig pa dang/ /'dre ba'ang rnam par 'dor bar 'gyur/ /dud ni dung gi mdog 'dra bar/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes bya ste/ /zlum dang zla ba phyed 'dra bar/ /so yi ngos la
61a6(mdo 'grel): 'phrad du chags/ /rta de nyi shu rtsa gcig nas/ /rtsa gsum pa yi bar yin no/ /de ni pags 'thug mdog 'gyur zhing/ /mnyam po nyam chung reg na rtsub/ /gnyer mngar ni spu dkar skye/ /rna ba dang ni mjug ma lhong/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum
61a7(mdo 'grel): pa mi rta/ /'di 'drar 'gyur ba shes par gyis/ /so yi dbus su bu ga byung/ /da ni btun 'drar shes par bya/ /mdun so la sogs nyi shu ni/ /rtsa bzhi yan chad 'byung shes bya/ /'di yi tshigs rus gang yin dang/ /tshe'u spu
61b1(mdo 'grel): bus mo mi sdug cing/ /sgrog mkhar gug par 'gyur ba dang/ /zhum zhing le los 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gnyid che bar ni 'gyur ba dang/ /rtsa yang 'dor par 'gyur pa yin/ /rta ni nyi shu drug lon pa/ /'di 'dra bar ni shes bar bya/ /so mdog mi 'dug
61b2(mdo 'grel): gyur nas ni/ /de yi rjes la 'gul bar 'gyur/ /spu ni gshor bar 'gyur ba dang/ /'byi zhing 'gros ni zhen pa dang/ /mig gyur mig ni 'gros pa dang/ /mchi mar bcas shing dman par lta/ /mtshan ma 'di yis rta dag ni/ /nyi shu dgu par
61b3(mdo 'grel): yin shes bya/ /sha yis gnas nas rim bzhin du/ /so rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ /'brel ba chad cing gyes pa dang/ /rta rgas mig ni zhum pa dang/ /mdangs bral sems khong chung ba dang/ /nyal bar dga' zhing sems zhum dang/ /kha yi
61b4(mdo 'grel): dbugs ni dri mi zhim/ /rta yi kha nas kha chu 'jag/ mig la rgyun tu 'dzag pa dang/ /zos pa dka' pas 'ju bar 'gyur/ /gang chi sum cu gnyis lon pa'i/ /rta ni las la sbyor mi nus/ /ji ltar glang bos brgya nyi shu thub/ /rnga mo bod bu
61b5(mdo 'grel): nyi shu lnga/ /ba glang 'di dag nyi shu ci/ /rtsa bzhis lhag pa nyid yin la/ /ra lug lo ni bcu gnyis te/ /rte'u lo ni nyi shu yin/ /mi dang glang po mnyam pa ltar/ /de bzhin rta'i lo sum cu gnyis/ /tshe yi mthar thug gyur pa'i rta//
61b6(mdo 'grel): rtswa yi me ltar 'chi bar 'gyur/ /na tshod lo yi dbye ba yis/ /ji bzhin rab tu bstan pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ na chod brtag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas shal hi ho tra'i bu rab
61b7(mdo 'grel): tu ltod par gyur pa dang/ /mdza' las rgyal gyis yongs dris pa/ /rta yi cho ni shes bya ste/ /legs ldan bdag la bka' stsol cig/ sha li ho tra gzi brjod che/ /pha yi bu la slar smras pa/ /gang gi so ni gyis ba dang/ /so
62a1(mdo 'grel): rtsa 'byung bar gyur ba dang/ /mig ni gnas skyong mchi ma 'dzag/ zhum zhing rtsa ba ltod pa dang/ /rna rtsa dang ni lus kun kyang/ /rab tu ltong bar gyur ba dang/ /gzi mdangs med cing sems khong chung/ /nyal bar dga' zhing
62a2(mdo 'grel): blo zhum dang/ /kha'i dbugs dri ni mi zhim dang/ /kha las kha chu 'jig pa'i rta/ /de ni dang po'i gnas skabs las/ /lhag par 'tsho ba ma yin no/ /gang zhig chigs ni mi sngag dang/ /chig grang tshe'u gug pa dang/ /sra long pa yang yo
62a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /'gros lhong le lo che gyur ba/ /gnyid ni shin tu che ba dang/ /so yi mdog ni mi sdug pa/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid ldan pa'i rta/ /gnas skabs gnyis las lhag mi 'tsho/ /pags 'thug kha dog mi gsal dang/ /dbang bo'i stobs
62a4(mdo 'grel): zhen reg na rtsub/ /rna ba rnga ma zhum gyur ba/ /gsum las lhag par mi gnas so/ /mi sdug skad ni sman pa dang/ /gang zhig so ni sbom pa dang/ /dbugs 'byin rgyun ring mi bstan pa'i/ /rta de bzhi las lhag ma'i 'tsho/ /mig ni tshul
62a5(mdo 'grel): khengs pa dang/ /cung zad zhum par gyur ba dang/ /lus kun brtan pa chung ba'i rta/ /lnga las lhag par mi 'tsho'o/ /gang zhig dar la babs pa yi/ /mtshan nyid gzhon pa'i tshen yod/ /de na gnas skyabs drug thob ste/ /rta dang
62a6(mdo 'grel): 'dra bar gyur ba yin/ /stobs dang spro ba'i yon tan ldan/ /skad gsang dman par spyod pa ni/ /rta de gnas skabs bdun thob na/ /srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin/ /stobs ldan snying stobs phun sum tshogs/ /dri mi zhim par
62a7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i rta/ /de ni gnas skabs brgyad du ni/ /phyin nas srog dang 'bral ba yin/ /chad dang stobs dang snying stobs dang/ /gzi mdangs brtan pa rgya chen ldan/ /rlog pa 'byar bar gyur ba gang/ /gnas skabs dgu nas 'chi bar
62b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rta gang rtag tu dga' zhing spro/ /lta stangs sdug cing skams chags chung/ /stobs ldan snying stobs phun sum chogs/ /rlig 'bras zlum zhing mi 'phyag rta/ /de ni gnas bskabs bcu pa ru/ /phyin nas srog 'dor gyur ba yin/ /snying stobs
62b2(mdo 'grel): kha dog mdangs mtshan nyid/ /ldan zhing 'gros bzang skad gsang snyan/ /phun tshogs stobs ldan dregs bar ldan/ /dus ba che zhing chigs sbom la/ /mdog bzang sha 'tshams kun tshogs pa/ /tshe yi mthar phyin 'gyur ba yin/ /shi la
62b3(mdo 'grel): ho tra'i mdo gnas las/ tshe shes bar bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //sha li ho tra dbang po thul/ /mchog dad mchog min de nyid shes/ /bu yi thu'o mdza' las rgyal/ /nye bas sod ste yongs dris ba/ /dri ni yid
62b4(mdo 'grel): 'ong dge ba dang/ /de bzhin dri gang mi dge ba/ /de rnams kyi ni 'bras bu dag/ cir 'gyur ba ni bshad du gsol/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras ba/ /'di dag thams bcad rab bshad kyis/ /thos nas bzung la bcang
62b5(mdo 'grel): bar gyis/ /'o thug sbyin sreg du ba dang/ /de bzhin utpal dmar po dang/ /tsandan a gar 'dra ba dang/ /bye'u rug pa ardza ka/ sbrang rtsi chad dang 'dra ba dang/ /de bzhin chad gi dri 'dra dang/ /sa la gsar du char bab dri/ /de bzhin sna ma spang
62b6(mdo 'grel): spos dang/ /utpal pad+ma'i ge sar dang/ /ha ri bata? pad+ma'i rtsa/ /a mra bi ba ka bita/ /ba na sa 'bras smin 'bra dang/ /ni ba ardzu ka dam+ba/ /ba ta la dang a sho ka/ dug mo nyungs dang pan ngan/ /su nA ga yi dri 'dra dang/ /tsim+ba ka dang
62b7(mdo 'grel): dam? pa'i/ /lo ma rgya spos dri 'dra dang/ /dpyid ka'i nags kyi tshogs 'dra dang/ /glang bo'i dngul gyi dri 'dri dang/ /gang zhig drin zhim gyur pa'i/ /me tog 'bras bu ldan pa dag/ de rnams dang ni dri mtshungs pa'i/ /rta mchog de ni ba/?
63a1(mdo 'grel): shis so/ /rtag tu rab tu dga' ba dang/ /kun gyi yid du 'ong ba dang/ /don kun yang dag sgrub byed cing/ /skal ldan rigs ni 'phel byed yin/ /ci tsam yid 'ong dri yod pa/ /de tsam yid 'ong don sgrub byed/ /tshe rings nang ni
63a2(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ /nor dang dga' dang bde bskyed/ /g.yul las rtag tu rgyal byed cing/ /grags dang bu dang tsha bo skyed/ /de ltar dge ba'i dri dag ni/ /bshad nas cig shos mnyam par gyis/ /nya ni rul bar gyur ba dang/ /mang kun yi dri 'dra
63a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bshad dang gci ba'i dri bcas dang/ /de bzhin sgog pa'i dri bcas dang/ /byi la rnga mo phag dang ni/ /'ug pa'i dri dang 'dra ba dang/ /gang zhig khyi rlig dri 'dra ba/ /dge ba'i dri la rten ma yin/ /nyes pa 'di dag ldan pa yi/ /rta de
63a4(mdo 'grel): shis ba ma yin no/ /rgyal bo'i don mi 'grub pa dang/ /de bzhin bkra mi shis pa yin/ /ring du 'tsho bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /las rnams kun las smad pa yin/ /da ltar shis dang mi shis pa'i/ /dri rnams rab tu bzhad pa yin
63a5(mdo 'grel): sha li ho tra'i mdo gnas las/ /dri brtag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu ba'o// //sha li ho tras bu la ni/ /rta yi skad gsangs mtshan nyid bshad/ /srog ces bya ba'i rlung shugs kyis/ /lte ba'i rtsa nas byung gyur te//
63a6(mdo 'grel): lus la gdos par gyur nas ni/ /bar phyin 'tsher ba zhes bshad do/ /shin tu 'jam zhing rting ring la/ /klong che 'dril zhing rgyun mi 'chad/ /'tsher bar byed pa'i rgyal byed rta/ /rgyal pos yang dag rgyal ba thog/ rtsub cing nyam chu klong
63a7(mdo 'grel): chung chad/ /ngar ngar pa dang 'dzar bar ni/ /mgo bor phyin te 'tshor ba yi/ /rta ni sngags pa ma yin no/ /dud dang rnga chen seng ge stag shing rta gling bu khyu mchog sgra/ /dar dur glang po ku ra ra/ /'brug dang rdza rnga'i sgra
63b1(mdo 'grel): 'dra zhing/ /chu bo 'dra ba'i sgrar ldan pa'i/ /de ni rtag tu 'phel byed ster/ /spyad ki bya rgod rnga mo dang/ /gyi la ce sbyang snod chag sgra/ /khyi dang khwa sbre'u 'ug pa dang/ /shing dang rdo dang 'dra ba dang/ /ser ba yi ni sgra 'dra ba/ /rta yi tha ma sdig ldan
63b2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /skad zad pa yi rta rnyed na/ /myur du nyams pa thob bar 'gyur/ /'thur du kha bltas 'tshor ba'i rta/ /de ni bdag po'i phung khral lo bskyed/ /g.yon logs ltas te 'tsher bdag/ rigs rgyud nyon mongs byed pa yin/ /bkra mi
63b3(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i rdzas dag ni/ /mthong nas mang du 'tsher byed ba/ rta de mi shis bskyed pa ste/ /bdag bo'i sdug bsngal byed bar bshad/ khong bu ltar 'tsher gang yin pa/ /de ni bkra mi shis bar bshad/ /bkra shis pa yi rdzas mthong na
63b4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig 'tsher bar byed pa'i rta/ /bdag bo rnam par 'phel byed cing/ /nor dang 'bru ni rgyas yang bshad/ /g.yas logs su ni blta ba'am/ /reg cing 'tsher byed gang yin pa/ /rta de zhon na rgyal po ni/ /sa rnams las ni rgyal
63b5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /mang ba 'tsher bar byed pa na/ /de yi 'tshar ba gsal gyur gang/ /rta de rjes sgrog zhes bya ste/ /bdag po'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /gcig pu 'cher bar gyur ba yang/ /mang po'i lta bur mngon gyur ba/ /rta de
63b6(mdo 'grel): gtid ring 'tsher zhes bya/ /bdag bo'i rnam rgyal 'phel byed yin/ /gang zhig 'tsher ba thos nas ni/ /rta gzhan 'tsher bar byed pa dag/ /des ni rgyal bo'i rta brgyad stong/ /'bod par byed pa nyid yin no/ /gzhan yang
63b7(mdo 'grel): 'tshor ba thos nas ni/ /rta gang phyi nas 'tsher byed pa/ /rtad zhon par gyur nas ni/ /mdza' o 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /rgan dang byis pa nang ba dang/ /lcod can dal dang skom pa dang/ /bkres tshe 'chor bar gyur pa yi/ /rta snang?
64a1(mdo 'grel): brtag par mi bya'o/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ /skad gsangs rtog pa'i le'u ste sum cu ba'o// //rta yi tshe yi de nyid shes so/ /rig byed yan lag mthar phyin la/ /'gros kyi bya ba shes pa la
64a2(mdo 'grel): the tshom skyes ba gar dgar dris/ /legs ldan sa yi bdag po rnams/ /g.yul du shugs mgyogs rta la ni/ /rga shing brtan byas rtsom byed la/ /rta la gces bar 'dzin pa yi/ /mchog pas dga' ba skye gyur la/ /mgyogs
64a3(mdo 'grel): pas shin tu yid rton 'gyur/ /rta ni di ltar mi mchod pa/ /mgyogs shugs med na rga mo 'gyur/ /'gros 'debs myur bar 'gro ba la/ /zhon na dga' ba skyed par byed/ /sa thag ring du 'gro ba na/ /'gro sa bde ba ni sngags pa yin/
64a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal po dang ni rgyal bu dang/ /bud med skyid de ba yin pas/ /bzhon pas bskyod pa'i nad rnams ni/ /de 'dras 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'gros kyi tshul ni sna tshogs las/ /shis dang mi shis 'bras bu 'byung/ /legs
64a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'gros kyi tshul dag ni/ /rta la gang yod bdag la gsungs/ /ga rga'i tshig de'i rdzas la ni/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /mdor na ne'u le sreg pa dang/ /rma bya dang ni mtshungs par 'gro/ ji ltar ne'u le'i rkang pa ni/ /
64a6(mdo 'grel): myur du 'dor bar byed pa ni/ /bar 'tshams med pa lta bur mngon/ rang gi spyi bo chung zad 'gul/ /mgo mgrin seng ge ltar 'degs zhing/ /rgyab dang lus ni brtan par gnas/ /mjug tsos rga mchigs mi 'gul zhing/ /rnga ma
64a7(mdo 'grel): ? 'gul bar mi byed gang/ /de ni ne'u le'i 'gros can du/ /blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /'khrul pa med cing g.yo ba med/ /lam du ma yengs byed pa dang/ /zhon pa'i mi ni stan bzang dang/ /gru la gnas pa snyam sem zhing
64b1(mdo 'grel): gang gi shugs ni 'dor ba na/ /zhon pa spu rtse tsam mi 'gul/ /lam rings su ni mod gyur kyang/ /chad par 'gyur ba med pa dang/ /lam gyi doms pa med ltar 'gro/ dbyibs ni legs par gyur pa'i rta/ /me ma dag la ni reg pa ltar//
64b2(mdo 'grel): lam du myar du 'gro ba dang/ /seng ge lta bur lus 'degs zhing/ /mchu yis nam chod rko ba 'dra/ /sa la rtog par byed pa bzhin du/ /lus ni 'degs pa ltar byed dang/ /zhon pa po ni rga skyed pa/ /gong ma sreg gi 'gros bsten yin/ /gang
64b3(mdo 'grel): zhig mog drang la 'khums dang/ /mgo dang ske mgrin rab tu skyod/ /bdag po'i sems dang rjes mthun par/ /lam du mnyam par ltar ba dang/ /rtag par lam du mi dub cing/ /mchu yi nang du mi nub la/ /brtan zhing ma 'chol
64b4(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i rta/ /rma bya'i 'gros la brten pa yin/ /gsum po 'di dag 'gros kyi ni/ /gtso bo yin pas shis pa 'thob/ /de las gzhan pa'i 'gros gang yin/ /phal cher smad par bya ba nyid/ /'gros kyi mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs//
64b5(mdo 'grel): rta mchog rnyed par gyur na ni/ /rgyal po dgra las rgyal 'gyur zhing/ /lam du dub par mi 'gyur ro/ /'gros bzang rta la bdag po yis/ /lhag par dga' ba bya ba yin/ /de bas rta yi bstan bcos ni/ /shes pas 'gros ni rtag
64b6(mdo 'grel): par bya ? phag dang ma he rnga mo dang/ /khyi spre'u rus spal glang seng 'gros/ /gang yang byi la ltar 'gro ba/ /rta de mi shes yin zhes bya/ /che'u tshe chig grang dpung ba brla/ /'degs par dka' zhing 'gros zhan la/ /la bums shing
64b7(mdo 'grel): ? la 'gro ba dang/ /rgyab ngan bzhon par mi bde dang/ /goms spangs 'jog nyes bu la bas 'gro/ de ni yongs su gtsang bar bya/ /dbugs rgod slar bsdu dka' ba dang/ /lam ni thung dus rtag tu dub/ /snying stobs chung
65a1(mdo 'grel): de rta mkhan gyis/ /dgra yi bsam pa grub de spang/ /rta gang mgo bo 'degs pa dang/ /rmig pa mtho bar 'degs pa dang/ /bdag po dga' bar 'gro byed pa/ /'gros de mchog ni yin par bshad/ /mgyogS
65a2(mdo 'grel): shugs mda' ltar rgyug byad cing/ /lus kun dub ba med pa dang/ /brdud cing ring du rnyob byed pa/ /'gros de mchog ni yin par bshad/ /rkang 'jog lhag chad mi snyoms shing/ /de bzhin myur ches bul ches pa/ /shin tu 'dus dang
65a3(mdo 'grel): shin tu dgye/ /'gros kyi nyes pa 'di drug yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las 'gros kyi/ /bzang ngan shes par bya ste/ /le'u gsum cu so gcig pa'o// //sha li ho tra yid gzhungs pa/ /tshangs pa me yi
65a4(mdo 'grel): sgal 'dral/ /lus kyi 'phel ba'i bya ba ni/ /mdza' las rgyal gyis yongs dris pa/ /thog ma bar dang tha mar ni/ /lus 'phel bar ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /'gros dang 'gros gzhan bcas par ni/ 'di dag shes par 'tshal lags so/ /ni ji srid rgyu ba dang/ rten du ji ltar gyur
65a5(mdo 'grel): bdag/ 'di dag shes par 'tshal lags so/ /du yiS de skad bri ba dang/ /sha li ho tra slar smras pa/ /'di ni nam mkha' sa dang ni/ rlung dang/ me dang/ chu dang/ sa rnams snang gi/ sems zhes bya ba drug pa dang/ 'dres ba rgod ma'i mngal du zhugs shing/ /gcig tu
65a6(mdo 'grel): gyur ba las lus su 'brel pa yongs su rdzogs pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dus yongs su smin cing tshang pa na mngal gyi dri ma dang bral ba'i tshul gyis skye zhing 'byung ba na/ sha ma'i dri mas lus la gos cing/ /lus dang
65a7(mdo 'grel): sems nyon mongs pa las lus bde bar gnas pa na grang ba dang/ /tsha ba dang phrad pa'i tshor ba bde sdug bdag nyid kyis mngon par shes par 'gyur ro/ /de la rgyu gang gis 'byung ba chen po lnga dang nang gi bdag nyid
65b1(mdo 'grel): drug pa phan tshun 'dres bar gyur ba ste/ /sa bon dang 'bras bu'i tshul du nyams pa med par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rta de de ltar byung ba na/ shing ltar rim gyis 'phel bar 'gyur zhing/ /yon tan du ma dang ldan par 'gyur bo/ /de bzhin
65b2(mdo 'grel): bu sred pa'i dbang gis/ dbang po yul la 'jug par nus pa dang/ /rlung 'thor bas dbus na phan tshun du khyab pa na/ /lus kyi 'gros dang goms pa'i shugs rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'gros gang dang gang gis dang por ma'i rjes
65b3(mdo 'grel): su 'brang zhing zas 'dod par gyur ba de ni lus 'phel ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du gcig bu rgyu zhing rjes su 'brang ba'i 'gros kyis 'gro bar byed pa dang/ rim gyis 'phel bar gyur ba na yang/ lus dang rjes su mthun pa'i
65b4(mdo 'grel): stobs dang/ 'gros dang/ rgyug ba dang/ brtse ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ dkyu? ba dang/ 'gros dam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa de ni dang po gcig tu rgyu zhing rjes su 'breng ba zhes bya'o/ /de la rkang ba 'jog pa'i 'gros ni
65b5(mdo 'grel): rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'di lta ste spob zhing 'gro ba dang/ gzhogs snyam pas rjes su 'gro ba dang/ gzhogs dud cing rjes su 'gro ba dang/ spyod pa gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /de dag ni rang bzhin gang yin pa de nye bar
65b6(mdo 'grel): bshad par bya'o/ /snga ma gnyis dang phyi ma gnyis/ /rkang pa mnyam par 'gro byed cing/ /rang gi lus ni spo ba dag/ de ni spong ba'i 'gros yin no/ /rtsi ba logs gnyis ni mnyam gnas shing/ /res kyis nye bar
65b7(mdo 'grel): gnas byed la/ /rim gyis mig la nye bar 'degs/ /de ni gzhag mnyam 'gro ba yin/ mig sprug 'khrul ba med par ni/ /lus ni dud cing rgyu byed la/ /spyod pa gcig gis mi 'gro ba/ /gzhogs dus 'gros ni de
66a1(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /gang zhig yan lag re mos yis/ /'jog cing 'degs par byed ba dang/ /rkang pa gsum ni shas cher 'degs/ /rta ni sbyong pa gcig 'gros yin/ /de bzhin du ri gdags dang/ ma he
66a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ byi la dang/ khyi dang/ dom dang/ stag dang/ ne'u le dang/ glang po che dang/ khyu mchog dang/ rnga mo dang/ bre'u dang/ bong bu dang/ ra dang/ lug dang/ e ne ya dang/ sa la dang/ sbyang ki dang/ gzhan yang de lta bu'i
66a3(mdo 'grel): rnam pa dag kyang/ /lus mchog dang/ bar ma dang/ tha ma'i dbye ba'i tshad kyis/ /rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi lus 'phel ba'i rnam par dbye ba bshad pa yin no/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ /lus 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i
66a4(mdo 'grel): le'u ste sum cu so gnyis pa'o// //thub mchog sha li ho tra las/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris ba/ /legs ldan rgyug pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /mnyan ba ru ni 'tshal lags so/ /'dir ni skyon gang
66a5(mdo 'grel): yon tan gang/ /'di rnams rnam pa du ru grags/ /mtshan nyid gang dag yin pa dag/ 'di dag thams cad shes par 'tshal/ /de skad smras tshe drang srong mchog/ sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /khyed kyis yid la gang
66a6(mdo 'grel): gnas pa/ /de ni bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /rgyug pa med par rta rnams ni/ /rtsig pa shing 'dra bem po yin/ /rgyal po'i sde tshogs gsum po ni/ /sgrub la de ni gtso bo yin/ /de bas rgyug pa'i mtshan nyid
66a7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /bzhi bcu dag tu shes par bya/ /dang por gtang ba'i don du ni/ /nyes pa nyi shu lnga shes bya/ /yang dag bzhag par bya ba yi/ /yon tan bco lnga nyid du bshad/ /de lta bu mi rgyug pa ni/ /zlum? po? dag?
66b1(mdo 'grel): tu nye bar sbyar/ /rang bzhin legs par shes bya ste/ /gzhan du de ni don med 'gyur/ /brdeg na lam byed dang po ste/ /brdeg byed gzhan la dgos par dang/ /ske ba bcu dang snga ma skyod/ /mi sdug lta zhing 'bri tshugs blta/ /mgo
66b2(mdo 'grel): ma dud rna ba mi nyam dang/ /sdig dang rdeg bar gyur na'ang/ /mgo ni mi brtan gyur pa dang/ /'dre dus mi gsal de las gzhan/ /dbyig pa la sta brko byed dang/ /so ni sgra dang bcos pa 'cha'/ /gom pa bsdud dang 'khyor ba
66b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bcing dang khro ba de las gzhan/ /gzhan yang bcings pas rmongs pa dang/ /rked skyod brten par mi gnas dang/ /dogs bcas yan lag 'khyor ba dang/ /yan lag rengs dang yan lag rtsub/ /lus ni brtan par
66b4(mdo 'grel): mi gnas dang/ /de bzhin gom ba mi brtan dang/ /dbyibs mi mnyam dang dbyibs ni sdug/ 'di dag rta ni ngan par bshad/ /'di dag rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /bshad pa nga las bzung bar gyis/ /gang zhig rdeg na slar
66b5(mdo 'grel): rdeg pa/ /brdeg na lan byed yin shes bya/ /gang zhig rdeg par byed pa la/ /dogs 'dod dog pa can zhes bya/ /ske ba rang dkar 'jog pa ni/ /sge ba cu rta yi tha ma yin/ /rnga ma rkyang dang sbrug byed cing/ /yang yang skyong ba rda sprugs
66b6(mdo 'grel): yin /rtag tu rdeg par 'dod pa ni/ /mi sdug rta zhes de bshad do/ /gang zhig slabs kyang cung zad tsam/ /mi stong sems kyis stong par 'dug/ de ni lta bar sdug pa ste/ /ngas ni 'bri tshugs lta zhes bshad/ /gang zhig rtag tu
66b7(mdo 'grel): sa'i?/ /blta/ /mgo dud ba ni yin zhes bya/ /stegs ma bzhus par gyur ba na/ /khros pas rna ba 'chol bar 'jog/ de ni rna ba mi mnyam yin/ /rang bzhin gyis yod ma gtogs so/ /gang zhig spyi bo rtag tu skyod/ /de ni mgo ni brtan
67a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya /gang zhig brda'? ni mi dran pa/ /de ni 'di dus mi gsal yin/ /lcags la sogs pa gcig gis kyang/ /gnod med dbyig? pa la'ang sdang yin/ /lag pa gnyis kyis sa brkob/ /de ni rko byed
67a2(mdo 'grel): ces bshad do/ /khro bas so ni 'cha' byed pa/ /so sgra 'cha' zhes bya bar bshad/ /rta gang 'dul bar byed pa yi/ /rjes su cung zad mi 'jug cing/ /gom pa la lar sdud pa dang/ /la lar yang nis 'khyor byed pa/ /mi mnyam pa yi
67a3(mdo 'grel): 'gros can te/ /gom pa sdud cing 'khyor ba yin/ /ro stod ro smad gdong ba 'am/ /yang na lus kyi bar dag tu/ /gang zhig bcings na myur du 'khrug/ bcings na khro ba'i rta ru 'dod/ /gang zhig thag pas bcings na ni/ /bcings
67a4(mdo 'grel): pas blo gros rmongs gyur yin/ /ro smad kyi ni lus phyed 'gul/ /bskyod pas rked pa bskyod byed yin/ /'di ni bdag la rdeg snyam ste/ /'dul sbyong mkhan la sngar brdeg byed/ /de ni dog pa can zhes bya/ /ra ro bltar yan
67a5(mdo 'grel): lag kun/ /phan tshun 'chol bar 'gro byed pa'am/ /gzer bcas lta bur byed pa'i rta/ /de ni yan lag 'khyor zhes bya/ /yan lag kyang ni 'khyor byed cing/ /yang dang yang du rengs pa dag/ de ni yan lag rengs yin pa'am//
67a6(mdo 'grel): yang gi? rtag tu lus mi 'gyur/ /gang gi yan lag rab sre zhing/ /bdzag kyang tshor ba med pa dang/ /dga' bas bya ba la 'jug pa/ /yan lag rtsub par de bshad do/ /gang gi lus kyi dbyibs ngag ni/ /tshul gcig tu ni mi mngon
67a7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /lus gyi ngar? sprug? bar byed gyur pa/ /de ni brtan mi gnas zhes bya/ /rta gang dang bor gzhan du 'gro/ de ? rjes la'ang gzhan 'gro ba/ /'gros ni brtan nas med pa'i phyir/ /de ni gom mi brtan zhes bya/ /gang zhig ? ni
67b1(mdo 'grel): 'jum pa 'am/ /gang zhig lus ni mi nyam pa/ /de ni dbyibs mi nyam zhes bya/ /lam du 'jug byed 'os ma yin/ /rgyab ni shin tu ring gyur cing/ /lus ni rnga mo dang 'dra ba/ /dbyibs mi sdug par shes bya ste/ /bslab dang mdzes pa med pa yin//
67b2(mdo 'grel): 'di dag skyon can yin pas na/ /mkhas bas skyon ni shes par bya/ /de ni yon tan bstan pa yi/ /mtshan nyid dag ni bshad bya ste/ /rna ba mjug mrgal tshigs rnams/ /yon tan che zhing yid gzhungs la/ /yid gzhungs sems ni da
67b3(mdo 'grel): nyid las/ /nges par sbyong ba nyid yin no/ /lus la yengs pa med nyid dang/ /yon tan kun dang ldan pa dag/ yengs ma dag dang bral ba nyid/ /ma yengs zhes bya gnyis ba yin/ /ro stod mchog tu thel ka che/ /shugs kyis yongs su rgyug
67b4(mdo 'grel): byed cing/ /lte bar lta bar byed ba 'di/ /yon tan gsum par shes par bya/ /mkha' la 'gro ba ltar byed cing/ /rgyug pa la ni mngon dga' la/ /bar 'tshams med pa ltar rgyug ba/ /yon tan chen po bzhi pa yin/ /dang po dbus dang tha
67b5(mdo 'grel): ma du/ /cha mnyam par ni mngon rgyug cing/ /dman dang bar ma'ang ma yin par/ /rta'i yon tan lnga pa yin/ /rab tu thung min ring ma yin/ /yengs pa dag ni med par ni/ /rta ni gang zhig rgyug byed cing/ /rtag tu legs gnas drug pa yin//
67b6(mdo 'grel): gang zhig dang bor zhon pa na/ /drang bor gzhu 'dom brgyar 'gro zhing/ /shugs kyis myur du rgyug byed ba/ /yon tan de ni bdun par bshad/ /rkang pa 'dor ba mkha' la ni/ /'gro bar med du snang byed cing/ /sa yi char ni cung zad snang/ /yon
67b7(mdo 'grel): tan de ni brgyad par 'dod/ /rta ni gang zhig yan lag la/ /reg pa tsam gyis rgyug byed cing/ /bskul ba tsam gyis sems shes pa /yon tan dam pa dgu ba yin/ /gang gi gdong ni tshad ldan par/ /mdzes par rgyug na'ang snang gyur ba/ /srab ni
68a1(mdo 'grel): legs par tshor gyur ba/ /de ni bzhin bzangs yin zhes bya/ /ma 'tshol bar ni 'gro byed cing/ /mkha' la 'gro ba ltar snang ba/ /mtshan nyid gang gis ma zhen pa/ /de ni yon tan bcu gcig ba/ /bya ba la bskul
68a2(mdo 'grel): che na ni/ /myur du ldang zhing 'jug byed la/ /tshig gis myur du go byed ba/ /yon tan mchog de bcu gnyis pa/ /nga rgyal med par ldang byed cing/ /'bad pa med par ldog pa dang/ /yon tan gang gis yon tan dang/ /ldan zhes bcu gsum
68a3(mdo 'grel): ba yin no/ /'phong mkhan? bya ba dag gis ni/ /mda' yis bsnan bar gyur na yang/ /zhum pa med par 'gro byed pa/ /yon tan bcu bzhi pa yin no/ /yon tan gang gis shugs kyis ni/ /bya dang 'dra bar 'gro byed cing/ /shugs
68a4(mdo 'grel): kyis rgyun gyis rgyug byed ba/ /yon tan 'di ni bco lnga ba'o/ /de ltar yon tan yang dag bshad/ /mtshan nyid cung zad ldan pa 'ang rung/ /yon tan 'di dag yang dag ldan/ /rta mchog gang zhig thog mthar ni/ /yon tan rtag tu mi
68a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /legs par rgyug par byed pa yi/ /rta de rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /khyed la rgyug pa de ltar bshad/ /gzhan dag dris pas ci zhig bya/ /sha la ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ rgyug ba brtag pa'i le'u ste sum cu so
68a6(mdo 'grel): gsum pa'o// //legs ldan gra ma can zhes pa/ /'di ni gang zhig rgyu gang lags/ /mtshan nyid gang gis de shes bya/ /de yi gso ba ji lta bu/ /de ltar bu yis dris pa na/ /shal hi tra drang srong
68a7(mdo 'grel): chos/ /don gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i tshig/ gra ma can mtshan nyid 'di smras/ /gra ma rtser byar 'os pa ste/ /des na ngo tsha 'jigs sogs yin/ /de rnams gang zhig byed pa ni/ /gra ma can zhes de bshad do/ /de bas 'jig med ? la ngan
68b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ba rtsa mang rtsub cing mi bsrun ba/ /'bras bu'i gra ma dang 'dra ba'i/ /nyes ba 'dzin pas de skad bshad/ /de bas nyes pa 'di ldan pa'i/ /rta yang gra ma can zhes bya/ /rta gang gtum zhing ni bsrun ba/ /khro bar gyur ba gang zhig yin/ /de
68b2(mdo 'grel): kun gra ma can yin te/ /de ni rang dbang 'gyur ma yin/ /chas na 'drug? cing rdzas mthong skug/ 'gyur zhing rtsi bsrun byed ba dang/ /bzhon du mi btub ba dang ni/ /zhon nas phrag par byed pa dang/ /'khrug cing ring nas sos 'debs la/ /za zhing
68b3(mdo 'grel): ltud par byed pa dang/ /lcag gis bzhus kyang 'dug byed cing/ /phra ba yang dang yang du brdag/ 'dul spyod mkhan yang skyur byed yin/ /'gre ba lta bur byed pa dang/ /khal ni legs par bkal gyur kyang/ /sa gzhir skyur bar byed pa dang//
68b4(mdo 'grel): 'dul sbyong mkhan la gnod bya'i phyir/ /mgal me skor ba lta bur 'khor/ /rgyab ni glang po ltar bsgyur zhing/ /yang dang yang du sprug pa dang/ /so dang lag yab dag gis 'debs/ /shing yang ltung bar byed pa dang/ /g.yang du yang dang
68b5(mdo 'grel): yang skyung byed/ /bgrod bya las ni gzhan du rgyug/ dogs pa med par ldog pa dang/ /lan 'gas gzhan duAng 'gro bar byed/ /ra dang ri dags ltar mchod zhing/ /bar bar du ni 'dul byed skyur/ /chu dogs shing
68b6(mdo 'grel): dang khron ba dang/ /grog srol du yang rgyug cing 'dzer/ /rta khyu'i nang na mi 'dug cing/ /dpung gzhan gyi ni nang duAng 'gro/ rab tu 'bad pas kha sgyur yang/ /zlog par nus pa ma yin la/ /rta bres las ni mi
68b7(mdo 'grel): 'byung zhing/ /byung dang 'jug du mi 'dod la/ /srog 'phrog las ni gang dang gang/ /yid du mi 'ong las gang yin/ /de dag lhag par byed 'gyur zhing/ /brdungs kyang phan pa med pa ni/ /de ni gra ma can zhes bya/ /de yi mtshan nyid 'di nyon cig/ zhung ?
69a1(mdo 'grel): zhur ni yo ba dang/ /kha dang po mtshan yo ba dang/ /rta gang dpral ba gos 'dra dang/ /rlig pa shin tu 'phyang ba dang/ /ri mo chen po yod pa dang/ /ya mchu nag cing rkan yang nag /gang zhig mchu ltag zhom pa dang//
69a2(mdo 'grel): ser skya dmar ser mdog can dang/ /gang gi mche ba mi mnyam zhing/ /gdong la gnyer ma yong ba dang/ /mig nag ser ba nyid dang ni/ /mig sbom khra yi mig 'dra dang/ /bya rgod mig 'dra mkhur chog chung/ /gang gi yam chu thung ba dang/ /mgo?
69a3(mdo 'grel): bo rna ba rab tu che/ /'gram ba yang ni zhum pa dang/ /sbal pa'i byi la'i mig 'dra zhing/ /ri bong mdog 'dra mdangs rtsub dang/ /rmig pa gcig ni dkar ba 'am/ /yang na rmig pa gsum dkar la/ /bshad pa'i mdog 'dra du ba'i mdog/ phrag so la
69a4(mdo 'grel): ni gnyer ma chags/ /'di dag dang ni gzhan mang po/ /mtshan ldan gra ma can du 'dod/ /de bas 'di dang rigs can rta/ /gnas dang slob sbyong bya ba dang/ /de bzhin rgyug pa'i bya ba rnams/ /rte'u nas brtsams so sor bya/ /bya ba'i khyad par gzhan
69a5(mdo 'grel): yang ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya/ /rlung med gnas ni rab dben pa/ /spyod yul bde bar bzhag par bya/ /de rjes reg na bzod 'gyur la/ /de nas bya ba gzhan dag bya/ /bdug sbos zas dang skom bcas dang/ /sman rnams cho ga ci bzhin
69a6(mdo 'grel): bya/ /ganda? pa tra bu rtse shel/ /kar bi ra'i me tog ni/ /'o mar bcas dang ka lat+tha/ /skol ba der ni til thal? ba/ /ko ke lak+Sha swa dzi ka'i/ /thal ba dang ni bcas pa gzhug /skol ba dar ba dang bcas par/ /nyi ma bdun gyi bar du bzhag/
69a7(mdo 'grel): 'di ni 'di la? zhag bdun par/ /tshog bzhin du btung ba sbyin/ /de ltar tung bas dbang gyur na/ /rta ni reg pa la sogs po zad/ /ba gcin dang ni rgong ma'i gcin/ /yungs kar de bzhin rna spabs dang/ /pi pi ling rtsa nag chur bcos/ /ha
69b1(mdo 'grel): re nu ka che ba gsung/ /tsan dan dang ni ldan ba ru/ /btags te dben par sba bar bya/ /'di yis zla tshigs dag tu ni/ /rta la mig sman bsku bar bya/ /des ni rang bzhin gyis gso dka' / /gra ma can ni zhi bar bya/ /dom dang gzigs sngar khyi'i dus pa/ /ba lang
69b2(mdo 'grel): 'gram pa yungs kar dang/ /rma bya'i mkhris pa ldan pa ni/ /bdug pa gram can sel yin/ /rta bres su ni rtag pa ru/ bdug pa 'di ni gdul bar bya/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /khyad par du ni bdug pas bdug/ /des na reg dang sgra dang ni//
69b3(mdo 'grel): gzugs ni bde bar brten bzod 'gyur/ /gang dang ? byed du bcug /de de rjes su mthun par byed/ /rkan dang kha 'gram dpral ba dang/ /ma rkan smin ma'i 'og dang ni/ /rta yi mig la'ang pi pi ling/ /rtsa ba tsha ba gsum gyis sku/ /'di yi? lus? ni thams
69b4(mdo 'grel): cang kyang/ /ba yi lci bas yang yang bsku/ /'di yi yan lag nang rol ni/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni kha ras? bsku/ /e la u shir? sra rtsi pog /ru rta tsan dan a ka ru/ /na ga ge sar til mar bcas/ /bdag pas rta la rab tu bdug /rta ni nyal bar gyur ba na//
69b5(mdo 'grel): bdug pas yang yang bdugs na ni/ /sgra dang reg dang gzugs dag ni/ /nges par bzod par 'gyur ba yin/ /je srid nges par zhi gyur bar/ /cho ga 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /de tshe 'khrug par mi byed cing/ /rta rdzi la ni gnod mi byed/ /gan na gnas la
69b6(mdo 'grel): mi sdang zhing/ /khro ba med par rtswa rnams bra/ /rna ba 'jums par mi byed cing/ /'dul sbyong mkhan la mngon par dga' / /lam du zhugs par chas pa na/ /'dar zhing 'jigs par mi 'gyur la/ /bring na sems ni dul gyur zhing/ /tshig gis bsdigs
69b7(mdo 'grel): na'ang 'jigs par 'gyur/ /ci dga' bar? ni khyer na yang/ /log par byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po gzhan la brdeg na yang/ /de ni 'jig pa skye bar 'gyur/ /de ltar gra ma med pa'i rta/ /bzod pa can du bshad pa yin/ /don du
70a1(mdo 'grel): pa gdon gyi nyes pa dang/ /rta yi drung? nad nyes pa dang/ /yul gyi nyes pa btang snyoms bzhag/ mi bsrung 'grogs bdag las kyang/ /rta ni sems shes mi 'gyur las/ /gra ma can du 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas nyes pa 'di
70a2(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ /zhi ba'i thabs 'di yin par 'dod/ /gang la cho ga 'di dag ni/ /byas kyang gram ma zhin/ /de tshe 'brog stong dag tu spang/ /de la bltos par mi bya'o/ /gang tshe mi 'am rta gzhan gyi/ /phyi nas snyeg par byed par 'gyur/ /de tsha rlig pa phyung ba yis
70a3(mdo 'grel): 'di yi sems 'khrug zhi bar bya/ /gra? ma can ni legs dul yang/ /g.yul du gzhug par mi bya ste/ /gal te 'di yi rang bzhin nyid/ /las kyi dbang gis gsal byed srid/ /gang zhig gram can zhi nas/ /la lar mi srun byed gyur na/ /dang
70a4(mdo 'grel): po de ni breng tshul gyis/ /nye bar legs par sbyar bar bya/ /sha li ho ta'i mdo'i gnas las/ gra ma can brtag pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //bu sngon nga ni rta bres su/ /gnyid log pa na rta dor btag /da ni khrob
70a5(mdo 'grel): ches khyab bas/ /de la dmod pa btab par gyur/ /bkra mi shis dang rnam kun du/ /spang bar bya bar nyid gyur cing/ /bdag po chung mar bcas pa'i yang/ /rigs ni rlog pa nyid gyur cig /da yi dmod pa'i dbang gis ma /nyes pa cha dang
70a6(mdo 'grel): ldan par ni/ /rta rnams 'gyur ba nyin yin la/ /'di'i ming ni shes par rtsis/ /shis pa gzhan dang ldan gyur kyang/ /rta yi tha chad de spang bya/ /so yis? kha khengs kha dog nag /de bzhin so ni mi mnyam lhag/ yo zhing 'gul la chags pa
70a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /so gyes ba dang mi chad dang/ /nya? byis 'dra dang zur gsum dang/ /skyes tshe so yod nyin mo skyes/ /ze'u ltag bus mo ze'u dang/ /snying ga na ni btsug yod dang/ /yan lag mtshan rlig char skyes/ /mtshan che yan lag lhag pa
70b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /thig le chags shing gsum po 'chang/ /'doms ni spre'u'i spu 'dra la/ /mi sdug g.yo zhing sdom 'dra la/ /sdig pa 'dra ba'am rlig pa med/ /khra dang lug dang kang ka? dang/ /nya dang spre'u byi ba 'dra/ /dmar ser phag dang byi la dang/ /bya rgod lug
70b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i mig 'dra zhing/ /de bzhin ma he khyi'i mig 'dra/ /bya rog mig 'dra mig gcig ser/ /pags pa bsregs pa'i dri 'dra dang/ /khra ba mi sdug de bzhin blun/ /yi dags kyis zin shakra can/ /spu sbom de bzhin ral pa can/ /'phral
70b3(mdo 'grel): ba bskus 'dra dog ma gnag /rkad bkra mi legs mi nang dang/ /rngam rdzog ma med pa ni/ /bkra mi shis par skye ba dang/ /rlig pa'i spu mdog gzhan pa dang/ /de bzhin mag bo'i mdog mi mthun/ /rgyab du zhon la gnod byed dang/ /de bzhin rta
70b4(mdo 'grel): dre'u'i sbu 'dra dang/ /rdog ma grum phum 'dres pa dang/ /kha 'gram mtshangs? gnag? pa dang/ /de bzhin mgo dang lce nag dang/ /rkan dang mchu rtag mchu gnag dang/ /mngal nas gnyis skye mang po ske/ /nyes pa chen por rab tu bshad/ /rwa can
70b5(mdo 'grel): na gsum rmig pa gnyis/ /rkang lnga bu man g.yang bzhir ldan/ /drug po 'di dag mchog tu ni/ /mi shes nyes chen ldan par bshad/ /rta yis so ni mi chang ba/ /bdag po bu dang bcas pa dang/ /chung ma dpun zlar bcas pa dang/ /rtu yi thams cad
70b6(mdo 'grel): gsang bar byed/ /se ni lhag par gyur pa'i rta/ /de yis bdag po ma ring bar/ /nyon mongs cha dang phrad byed nas/ /yid du mi 'ong las kyis gsong/ /'o gso rtag cing so byes par/ /gang zhig skyes par gyur pa ni/ /so skyes de yi rigs kyi mchog
70b7(mdo 'grel): dang? por mi thogs rlog par byed/ /so dang bcas par nyin mo skyes/ /thams cad zad par byed pa yin/ /chu zheng chad? kyi grangs las ni/ /lhag par gang zhig gnas gyur ba'i/ /yan lag yod pa'i rta yis ni /nor ni lhag par 
71a1(mdo 'grel): nyams byed yin/ /lo lnga'i bar du rlig pa med/ /rgod ma la yang mi 'jug ba/ /dbang 'phel gang yin rta de ni/ /rigs ni rlag par byed par bshad/ /gang gi rlig pa mdog mi thun/ /thig le yis ni khra bor gyur//
71a2(mdo 'grel): de ni rlig pa thig le can/ /bdag bo'i rigs ni rlog byed yin/ /pags pa bsregs pa'i dri 'dra ba/ /me yis tshig par byed pa yin/ /rta mi gnag la rkan gnag pa/ /myur du mtshon gyis gsod par byed/ /gang gi rkan la gnyer ma ni/ /gsuM
71a3(mdo 'grel): 'am bzhi dag yod gyur pa/ /de ni rkan nag nyes pa yis/ /dgos pa med pa'i rtar 'gyur ro/ /mdog nas dud pa'i mdog can dang/ /dngul rdo cig pa'i mdog ltar 'tshar/ /rta de'i rkan kun nag na yang/ /mdog dang mthun pas nyes pa med//
71a4(mdo 'grel): kha dog brgyad po rnams kyi ni/ /cung zad dmar zhing gnyer ma gsal/ /dkar dang dmar mdog skye ba dang/ /seng ge dur pa'i mdog rjes 'dra/ /dmar dang ser dang sngo sangs kyi/ /rkan nag pa ni sngags ma yin/ /ri mo shin tu dma' ba yis//
71a5(mdo 'grel): rmig pa gnyis su snang gyur te/ /ba lang rmig pa 'dra bar ni/ /gang gi rmig pa snang gyur pa/ /bdag po'i lus dang yid kyi ni/ /mi zad sdug bsngal gnyis skyes nas/ /ring po mi thogs dus kyis ni/ /de dang lhan cig 'chi bar 'gyur//
71a6(mdo 'grel): rdog ma'i mthar ni rten pa'i dra/ /mtho bo'i tshig dang 'dra ba'am/ /rgyu shug skyu ru ra 'dra ba 'am/ /a 'bra'i rus pa 'dra ba ni/ /gang gi rta la snang gyur ram/ /ra yi rtsen rwa 'dra gnas/ /sha mdzer gzhang 'brum 'dra pa ste/ /ra ni rnam pa de bdun
71a7(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rwa can de ni skyes gyur pa'i/ /grong khyer ring por mi thogs brlag/ /rna ba gsum pa'i rta gang yin/ /de yang rwa can dag dang mtshungs/ /rta yi tha ma 'di gnyis ka /yul mdza' gzhan du spang bar bya/ /pus mo 'am tshe'u sku?
71b1(mdo 'grel): dang nye bar/ /rkang pa 'dra ste rgad? lnga pa/ /rwa can lta bu de'i mod la/ /spangs pa kho na bsngags pa yin/ /ze'u 'am brgyab du gtsug yod pa/ /rigs ni gtso bo gsod byed yin/ /mi shis gzhon bya ma yin te/ /de bas 'di dge tha chad rta/ /mdog ni gang yang
71b2(mdo 'grel): rung ba la/ /lce nag par ni gyur pa'i rta/ /khyim de mi shis shes bya ste/ /rta de thams cad zad byed yin/ /gang gi kha 'gram gnag pa yi/ /rta ni bdag po gsod byed yin/ /rta yi tha chad sha bkra can/ /bdag po nor dang 'bral byed yin/ /stag 'dra
71b3(mdo 'grel): kha dog gzhan pa yi/ /mdog gi sna tshogs gyur pa dag /de ni mi shis sdug bsngal ni/ /thams cad skye bas spang bar bya/ /stag dang 'dra zhing rjes mthun la/ /spre'u'i mig dang 'dra ba'i rta/ /de 'dra ba yis bdag po ni/ /sor mos smyo bar byed pa dang/ /khyim
71b4(mdo 'grel): nas byung ba 'am sbyug pa 'am/ /log pa'i chad pa thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdog kun dkar ba la/ /rdog ma nag po yod pa ni/ /rta de rdog nag ces bya ste/ /g.yul du bdag po gsong byed yin/ /bong bu ltar ni khra bo'i rta/ /'khor ling dma' bar
71b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa dang/ /shis min tshe 'phel byed min la/ /las rnams kun la smad pa yin/ /mchu nag pa yi bu dang ni/ /rta rnams dug gis gsod par byed/ /rlig nag gsod dang 'ching byed la/ /pho mtshan nag par gyur pa yis/ /chung ma mna' ma rgyug
71b6(mdo 'grel): mo dang/ /de bzhin du ni bran mo rnams/ /'di dag thams cad brlag par ni/ /rta de la ni zhon pas 'gyur/ /rta gang rmig par bcas par skye/ /mtshe bar byung bar gyur pa dag /gang dag du ni byung gyur pa/ /rigs de yongs su gtugs pa yin/ /sems
71b7(mdo 'grel): med bcing dang gsod ba dang/ /blun pas rang sems med par 'gyur/ /'jigs pa chen po nye bar ni/ /byed pas ring du spang bar bya/ /gang zhig gshin po la bsdos dang/ /rta gang gshin pas khyer ba yi/ /rta de yi dags kyis khyer yin/ /rtag tu nyes pa
72a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad skyed/ /dag? po 'phel ba dang 'dra zhing/ /za ma'i gzugs can ma ning yin/ /rgyab du zhon la gnod byed ba yi dags kyis khyor bzhin du spang/ /gnyis sam mang po tsha mar skyes/ /bu dang bcas pa yongs su sbang//
72a2(mdo 'grel): so yi le'u so'i nyas pa mag ba'ur mig gis nyes pa dang/ /gcug? gi 'bras bu ? pas ni/ /gtsug ngan 'bras bu bcas zhes bya/ /dpral bar chags pa zhur dang 'dra/ /'dres pa'i le'u gang bshad pa/ /num can dang rlig pa nag/
72a3(mdo 'grel): mgo nag la sogs par bshad pas/ /'di yi 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni/ /'di ru rgyas par ma bshad de/ /der ni spang bya gang yin pa/ /'dir yang 'bras bu de dang 'dra/ /de nyid tshe yi ga nas skabs la/ /bab la nyes pa'i 'bras 'byin
72a4(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /nyes chen shin tu nyes che ba/ /rtag tu 'bras bu 'byin byed yin/ /shin tu bzang ba'i mtshan nyid kun/ /ldan na nyes ba chen po 'ang bcad/ /shin tu nyes chen ldan pa ni/ /nam yang bcad par mi bya'o/ /gal te yon tan gzhan ldan
72a5(mdo 'grel): yang/ /shin tu nyes cher ldan pa'i rta/ /khyim du skad cig tsam gyis na/ /mkhas pas bzhag par mi bya'o/ /reg pa yis kyang rtad ni/ /phung khrol dang ni phrad par 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ nyes pa chen po
72a6(mdo 'grel): brtag pa'i le'u sde sum ? lnga pa'o// //sha li ho tra bdag nyid che/ /legs thos kyis ni rta rnams kyi/ /snying stobs shes par bya ba dris/ /drang song gis de de la smras/ /dpa' zhing gcang sbra che ba dang/ /bdag po la gus
72a7(mdo 'grel): bzhin dgo? la/ /stobs dang snying stobs mgyogs dang ldan/ /de mchod gter ma la dga' zhing/ /rang gi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ldan/ /de bzhin zhi ba'i rang bzhin can/ /'dul byed dbang skyur ldog rkyen pa'i/ /rta ni lha yi snyed stobs can/ /gcod?
72b1(mdo 'grel): spra la dga' 'dul ba dang/ /skad snyan lam ni rnal mar 'gro /rig byed dgra la rab tu dga' / /rgol ma la ni rgyab kyis phyogs/ /khrus la dga' zhing de bzhin zhi/ /drang song snying stobs can du bshad/ /dpa' zhing stobs che tsham chom med/ /de bzhin
72b2(mdo 'grel): 'thab mo la dga' zhing/ /sha dang chang la dga' ba ni/ /lha min snying stobs can de yin/ /dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing/ /glu rnams la ni shin tu mos/ /g.yul 'gyed la spro de bzhin zhi/ /dri ba'i snying stobs la brten yin/ /gnyid la dga' zhing khro la
72b3(mdo 'grel): brtag/ rtag tu gcig pur gnas pa dga' / /stobs che spro ba che ba yi/ /rta ni rlung gi snying stobs can/ /chu yi gnas la dga' ba dang/ /rtag tu chu dang phrad par 'dod/ /phal cher til la dag 'gyur pa/ /yi dags 'tshun lha'i snying stobs can/ /ri la
72b4(mdo 'grel): 'jog na mi skyo zhing/ /stobs ldan 'tsher zhing 'gro ba dang/ /ril la kha zas mngar la dga' / /gnod sbyin snying stobs can du bshad/ /mi brtan khro zhing gdug ba dang/ /char dang sbyar chad sha la dga' / /gdong ni mi sdug par snang ba/ /srin po'i snying stobs
72b5(mdo 'grel): la brten yin/ /mi brtan rtsub cing dri ma can/ /rtag tu mi gtsang la sbyong cing/ /zhum cing khang stong dag la dga' / /sha za'i snying stobs la brtan yin/ /blun zhing lam log 'grol dga' / /rgod ma yi ni phye bzhin rgyug /rtag tu rtswa za la dga' ba/ /dud
72b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro'i snyed stobs dag dang mtshungs/ /rlung dang grang lhags tshad pa bzong/ /bdag po la dga' skad snyan cing/ /sems khongs chud cing le lo can/ /mi rgyu'i snying stobs la brten yin/ /ske mgrin btud cing 'jigs ba can/ /rtag tu gnas pa'i stong
72b7(mdo 'grel): par dga' / /mi gcang la ? dang tshul can/ /sren bu'i snying stobs la brten yin/ /shugs chen rgyun tu ltos ba dang/ /yongs su 'khor ba'i dang tshul can/ /rga lnga ma la ni rab dgar ba'o/ /rta ni 'dab chags snying stobs can/ /dpa' ?
73a1(mdo 'grel): zhing 'jigs pa nyid du ni/ /dus dang dus su gnas 'gyur zhing/ /rgod ma la ni rab dga' ba/ /'chi ba yis ni shin tu 'jigs/ /brdeg pa lan ni rab tu 'khrug /rtsod dang khyim du gnas la dga' / /byas ba tshor ni
73a2(mdo 'grel): stobs dang ldan/ /mi yi snying stobs can de yin/ /lha dang drang srong gnod sbyin klu/ /dri za dang ni snying stobs dag /mnyam par gyur pa'i rta gang yin/ /las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags/ /mi dang yi dags lha ma yin/ /bya dang mtshung pa
73a3(mdo 'grel): bar ma yin/ /de las gzhan pa'i snying stobs can/ /rta ni tha ma yin par bshad/ /kun tu snying stobs gtso bo ste/ /snying stobs la ni thams cad gnas/ /shil ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las snying stobs brtag pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug ba'o// //
73a4(mdo 'grel): bu dag gzi mdangs rnam pa lngar/ /rtal dus su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gar phyir 'di dag 'byung ba yi/ /bdag nyid yin bas rnam lnga 'dod/ /mdog dang spu/ ba rdzas dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni dbyibs dag la/ /mig gis bzung bya
73a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan gang yin/ /gzi mdangs kyi ni sgrar bshad do/ /re zhig rdzas ni yon tan bzhi/ /kha dog gzugs ni dkar la sogs/ /rta ni kha dog tha dad kyang/ /sbu kha ring po las kyang snang/ /gzi mdangs phra zhing dong bas
73a6(mdo 'grel): na/ /nye ba nyid na mngon pa yin/ /mdangs ni med ba tsam de la'ang/ /med par yang ni dmigs ma yin/ /rlung dang de bzhin nam mkha' dang/ /me dang de bzhin sa dang ni/ /chu nyid kyi ni mtshan nyid dag /gang yin
73a7(mdo 'grel): de ni mnyam par gyis/ /rlung gis gzi mdangs smad ba yin/ /nam mkha' yi ni 'bring du shad/ /me dang sa dang chu yin ni/ /mtshan nyid gsum po rdag tu shes/ /mi brtan rtsub cing mdog la gnod/ /de bzhin cung zad
73b1(mdo 'grel): dkar bar snang/ /rta yi spu kha la gnod pa/ /rlung gi gzi mdangs de smad bya/ /shin tu dang zhing nam mkha' ni/ /sprin dang bral ba/ /mdangs can zhi bar gyur pa dag /de ni nam mkha' can zhes bshad/ /rta rnams phal ched rtag bu'i//
73b2(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' i gzi mdangs can du snang/ /de ni mi smad stong bya dag /min par gyur pa nyid yin no/ /gzi mdangs ldan zhing 'od can 'dra/ /de bzhin min 'bar ba 'dra/ /me i gzi mdangs bsngags pa ste/ /bsod nams kyis ni rta las 'byung/ /snum
73b3(mdo 'grel): zhing chu yi mdog ldan pa/ /dge bskyed de ni chu yi yin/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing shin tu brtan/ /sa yi gzi mdangs nyid yin la/ /rtag rtag tu sa yi ni/ /gzi mdangs bsngags par gyur pa yin/ /smad pa'ang bsngags par bya ba yi/ /gzi mdangs
73b4(mdo 'grel): yun rings gnas gyur pa/ /bdag pos bde dang sdug bsngal gyi/ /'bras bu yun rings myong bar 'gyur/ /gtsug dang kha dog 'bras bu ni/ /shis pa dang ni mi shis gang/ /zhar la byung bar gyur ba gang/ /gzi mdangs su ni rjes su 'gyur//
73b5(mdo 'grel): dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni/ /sprin gyis khabs par byed pa yin/ /de bzhin rta la gzi mdangs kyis/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni khebs par gyur/ /gnyid log las langs khrus byas dang/ /rnam kun skom 'thungs zas zos pa'i/ /rta la rta mkhan
