73b6(mdo 'grel): dag gis ni/ /gzi mdangs nye bar brtags par bya/ /shi la ha tril mdo'? gnas las/ /gzi mdangs brtag pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //sha li ho tra? drang srong che/ /rig byed yan lag mthar phyin pa/ /rta bres
73b7(mdo 'grel): gnas na 'dug ba na/ mdza' las rgyal sogs bu rnams dang/ /bla mal gus slob ma rnams/ /rta sbyod shes la yongs dris pa/ /legs ldan rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa'i/ /sa gzhir ri yi phrad bas bskor/ /grong brdal 'byung
74a1(mdo 'grel): gnas yul dag dang/ /nags tshal rnams kyis nyer mdzes bar/ /rang dgar rgyu ba'i rta rnams ni/ /khyed kyis bgo bsha' mdzad la gsan/ /de rnams kyis ni 'byung lugs dang/ /rigs dang nye ba'i rigs rnams dang/ /yul gyi
74a2(mdo 'grel): rtags ni 'byung ba dang/ /kha dog spyod pa gzi mdangs shugs/ /so sor rigs shes rnam brtag ba/ /bdag cag la ni bshad du gsol/ /dog sa'i gnas kyi shes bya dang/ /rta rnams skye ba nyid dang ni/ /yul mthar yon tan cher ldan dang/ /yul
74a3(mdo 'grel): dbus yon tan chud par ni/ /'gyur bas de phyir de thams cad/ /legs ldan gyis ni bshad par rigs/ /de nas legs ldan drang srong mchog /bu rnams la ni slar smras pa// /gzugs dang skye gnas kha dog dang/ /snying stobs spyod pa mdangs dang
74a4(mdo 'grel): bang/ /gzi mdangs dbyibs dang dri dang ni/ /bde dang mi bde skad rnams te/ /rigs las byung ba 'di dag kun/ /ji lta bar ni smras pa yin/ /thog ma kho nar sbrul pa na/ /lha yul du ni rgod ma byung/ /mdog 'dres gnag dang dmar ba dang/ /dung
74a5(mdo 'grel): kha sngo sangs skya'o dang/ /khra dang ljang ba rnams yin te// /de dag yul yul dag tu bgos/ /rta mchog de dag rnams kyi ni/ /bdag po yang ni de snyed de/ /brgya byin zla ba nyi ma dang/ /rlung lha dang ni chu lha dang/ /me lha dang ni nor bdag rnams/ /rta
74a6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi ni bdag por gyur/ /lha yi rta yi 'byung gnas te/ /sa steng phyogs phyogs dag tu bgos/ /lha yi mchog gi rgod ma ni/ /de ltar rjes su sprul pa yin/ /dbang po che la mdog 'dres pa/ /gzhan dag go rim ji bzhin no/ /de yi bu
74a7(mdo 'grel): dang tsha 'o yis/ /sa gzhi thams cad khyab pa yin/ /la la rgya mtsho la gnas te/ /de bzhin gzhan dag sen dur brten/ /nas gling tho gar la gnas zhing/ /gzhan dag nor can dag tu'o/ /sha kha bru zhag na du ra/ /drang srong can dang nyams dga' 
74b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /mnya' dka' gur shig li rka /nya dang me cha tig tig gi/ chu bo brgya ba wis sha/ zla ba'i cha zhes bya ba dang/ /ko shi ka dang sbyangs cang/ /gam ga de bzhin sa srung dang/ /chu bo cher ldan de dag dang/ /rus sbal can dang kha ba can/ /ba lang shing rtam
74b2(mdo 'grel): la ya/ /sbos dang ldan dang du ni ro ca co can na'ang gnas pa yin/ /grong khyer bzang dang dpa' bo'i sde/ kha che'i 'brog gi cha dang ni/ /lnga len sgra dan a ma baShtsa/ /ri khrod mdza' 'kho ba naS kyi yul/ /yul dbus rgya mtsho bcu ba dang/ /dngul rdo'i ri dang
74b3(mdo 'grel): ni sha dang/ /shar gyi mdza' dang bu ling ga? khi dang pa dang ke shi ka /phyogs dang mi yi yul kun na/ /sa la rta ni brten pa yin/ /yul de rnams kyi khyad par gyis/ /dbye ba gsum du 'gyur ba nyon/ /dbyangs can kyi ni byang phyogs su/ /der ni
74b4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig skyes gyur pa/ /sna tshogs 'byung gnas las byung ba/ /spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhes bya/ /yang na lho phyogs cha du ni/ /shar du 'ba' pa'i chu dogs nas/ /de ni stobs dang gzi mdangs sogs/ /tshar kyang bar ma yin zhes bya/ /sa rdul can
74b5(mdo 'grel): dang ri rod dgo /so ra bra la sogs pa'i rta/ /gzi mdangs stobs dang lus kyi tshang/ /snying stobs dman pa yin shes bya/ /rta yi rigs dang dbye ba ni/ /yul ni so so las byu dag/ rigs dang skye ba'i tshul dag ni/ /yul las lnga bcu rtsa bzhir 'gyur//
74b6(mdo 'grel): de las gzhan yang dog pa yi/ /yul las skyes ba rab bshad bya/ /ma dang tha yis bsten pa yi/ /nyes pas yom na med 'gyur zhing/ /rigs bzang yin yang phal tshor ni/ /lus ni mi sdug pa dag snang/ /dper na la lar mi dag ni/ /sgur bo
74b7(mdo 'grel): da ngan mi bu bung? yod/ /de bzhin rta yar lus byar ni/ /mi sdug par ni shes par bya/ /lus dang mgyogs tshul stobs rnams ni/ /dman pas rtag gzhan dag tu gyur/ /yul ni bzang bor skyes na yang/ /yon tan med ba dag kyang yod/ /pha ?
75a1(mdo 'grel): yi skyon dang ni/ /ston ka skyes par gyur pa dang/ /de 'dra gzhan las byung ba ni/ /de dag dang ni 'di bar bshad/ /de bzhin pa bar ma dag ni/ /lus kyi yon tan ldan gyur kyang/ /legs par skyes par ma gyur ba//
75a2(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid de dang ldan pa min/ /rigs las byung ba'i mang po dang/ /'dus pa dag tu bstan pa'ang min/ /mdza' las rgyal la sogs pa yi/ /bu yi pha la yang dras pa/ /rgyu ni mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing/ /mngal las dus gcig skyes gyur ba//
75a3(mdo 'grel): dbyibs dang yon tan mtshungs gyur cing/ /rlung gi shugs 'drar mnyam par ni/ /sngon tshe tshangs pa nyid kyis ni/ /rta rnams sprul par byas pa yis/ /de ltar yon tan mnyam pa las/ /ci phyir de dag tha dad gyur/ /'bi yi rgyu ni gang yin
75a4(mdo 'grel): ba/ /khyed kyis bdag cag la bshad rigs/ /de ltar bu yis bskul ba dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /dper na chu ni ro gcig par/ /mkha' las bab kyang sa rnams kyis/ /khyad par dag gi bzang ngan gyi/ /ro ni sna tshogs mang
75a5(mdo 'grel): por gyur/ /de bzhin tshangs pas tshul gcig par/ /rta rnams sprul par byas mod kyi/ /lha rnams la ni gos pa las/ /lhag pa gang yin sa gzhi 'dir/ /rgyal bo rnams la byin gyur ba/ /rta des yi khyad par gyis/ /rigs dang skye
75a6(mdo 'grel): gnas med dag ni/ /khyed par mang por gyur pa yin/ /sha li ho tri'i mdo'i gnas las/ rigs brtag pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //shil ho tra rta bres na/ /'dug tshe dri za'i rgyal po dang/ /mdza' las rgyal
75a7(mdo 'grel): bo gnyis ka na/ /dul dang ldan pas dris gyur pa// /legs ldan rta ni bzang po yang/ /spyod pa dan pa snang ba dang/ /dam tshig mi shes ldan gyur kyang/ /kha cig rang bzhin bzang po mchis/ /der ni rgyu dag gang lags pa/ /yang
75b1(mdo 'grel): dag pa rin gsungs zhes dris/ /ston ka btsos pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag par ni bka' stsol cig /de gnyis kyis de dris pa na/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /lung la goms byas shes rab ni/ /nam yang slu bar byed ma yin/ /lus dang mdog dang
75b2(mdo 'grel): stobs ldan pa/ /tshul ngan ring du gyur pa yin/ /la la lus ni gtsang gyur kyang/ /snying stobs mi nyams gyur pa yis/ /phyin ci log gi snying stobs can/ /lus ni btugs par ston par bshad/ /de ni shes rab sman pa yi/ /skye bo phal chen rmongs bar
75b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur?/ /skye ba nyid dad gces pa dang/ /shis dang mi shis mi rtogs 'gyur/ /de bas dbyibs legs snying stobs ldan pa dang tshul bzang ba'i de bam? ni/ /snying sa ? dang tshul su byar ni/ /sun 'byin byed pa de spang bya/ /de ni da yis bshad bya yis/ /khyad par mnyan pa nyid du gyis//
75b4(mdo 'grel): dbyibs legs pa dang pa pa 'ba? dang/ /gzi mdangs stobs dad ma yengs dang/ /'phel ka che zhing sems bzang la/ /dang la bab cing mdangs bzang la/ /dbang bo brtan zhing dga' ba dang/ /snying stobs mgyogs byed ldan pa yi/ /de 'dra ba yi rta dag ni//
75b5(mdo 'grel): yul rang dus la dag 'gyur par/ /rtswa dang chu mang dus su ni/ /pha dang ma ni 'dus gyur pa'ang/ /de tshe skyes gyur rte'u ni/ /yon tan kun dang ldan pa yi/ /rta ni de dag nyid kyis na/ /yon tan de nyid skye bar 'gyur/ /'dod bcas pa dang 'dod bral ba'am//
75b6(mdo 'grel): dron du gnyer dang do ? gsar/ /gzhon dang shin tu rgan pa dang/ /rte'u dang rta rgan nyid kyis ni/ /lus dang snying stobs dang tshul rnams bzang ngan 'dres pa nyid du 'gyur/ /khro dang 'khrug par gyur pa dang/ /'jigs dang skrag par byed pa dang/ /gcong can
75b7(mdo 'grel): ? ni nyam chung dang/ ngal dang sems ni dub pa dang/ /skye bar byed pa'i rta gang yin/ /las la 'khor pa mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni mdangs stobs dman 'gyur zhing/ /las rnams kun la nus pa chung/ /rtag tu na zhing rgyun du rbeg /gang zhig rnyog can gyur 
76a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rta/ /pha dang ma yi rgud pa yis/ /stobs chung gzi mdangs zhan par 'gyur/ /de ltar skye bar gyur pa'i rta/ /las rnams 'grub par mi byed do/ /rgun mdza' tshad pa'i thog ma ru/ /dpyid dus srog chags rnams la phan/ /thun
76a2(mdo 'grel): mong dus su gyur pa'i tshe/ /lus gzungs snyoms par gyur pa'i rta/ /rgod ma lo bzhi lon pa dang/ /rta pho lo brgyad lon pa dang/ /'dus gyur pa las gyur pa'i rta/ /rtag tu las rnams kun la bsngags/ /de ni yon tan kun ldan zhing/ /nyes pa kun
76a3(mdo 'grel): dang bral ba yin/ /lus kyi phyi nang dag gi ni/ /yon tan ldan zhing kun sbyor nus/ /mdza' las rgyal gyis yang smras pa/ /tha mal ba dang nad bcas gnas/ /ston kas ni gang dag lags/ /gsor rung gsor mi rung bdag /gang lags the tshom skyes
76a4(mdo 'grel): lags kyis/ /drang srong chen po des gsungs shig /mdza' las rgyal de de skad 'dri ba na/ /legs ldan gyis ni slar smras pa/ /'bras bu bzang dang ngan pa yi/ /phun tshogs ston ka'i tshe na gnas/ /'bras bu'i phun tshogs mthun bas na/ /rta la'ang
76a5(mdo 'grel): ston ka pa zhes bshad/ /rang bzhin de 'drar gyur pa yi/ /ston ka rnam pa bzhi ru mthong/ /rang bzhin la gnas de bzhin spom/ /phra dang dmar ba'i ston ka pa'o/ /rang bzhin la gnas mchog yin te/ /phra dang sbom pa zhan pa yin/ /rte'u ston
76a6(mdo 'grel): ka dmar po ni/ /spang bar bya bar gyur pa yin/ /phra dang spom pa phrad pa las/ /spom ba'am yang na phra bar 'gyur/ /phal cher gang gi mtshan nyid gang/ /de las lhag par mi 'gyur ro/ /skye gnas snying stobs lus kyi ni/ /mtshan nyid dang ni rtags
76a7(mdo 'grel): dag las/ /'di rnams kyi ni las dag kyang/ /thams cad rim bzhin bshad par bya/ /rgod ma'i sems stobs nye ba dang/ /lam du zhugs par gyur pa yis/ /khur dang gom pa dag gis ni/ /de ni tsha bas gdungs gyur cing/ /bkres dang
76b1(mdo 'grel): skom pas nyes pas na/ /mngal nas khrag ni 'dzag par gyur/ /zla ba drug ni bzlas pa na/ /sha ni khrag tu 'gyur ba yin/ /mngal de'i tshil ni gang yin ba'ang/ /phra mo cam zhig yod med 'gyur/ /bum? khra shin srab pa ru/ /skye ba ston kha dmar po yin/
76b2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni longs spyod mi rung zhing/ /las rnams nus pa'ang ma yin no/ /mngal ni chags par gyur ba'i rta/ /zas kyi bya bas 'phel mi 'gyur/ /rtsub cing rno bzab dang/ /de bzhin lam du zhugs pa dang/ khung gyis dub par byas pa dang/ /bcings dang rta pho
76b3(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar dang/ /der ni mngal chags gyur pa yi/ /khrag zang log par 'gyur ba yin/ /ji ltar char med sman rnams ni/ /skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin la/ /'dab ma me tog 'bras bu sogs/ /'phel bar 'gyur ba'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin log par
76b4(mdo 'grel): gsos pa yis/ /rta yi mngal ni skams bar 'gyur/ /de ni sbeg cing nyam chung ba'i/ /rte'u dus ni 'das par byed/ /dus las 'das pa'ang nyam chung zhum/ /yan lag mtshang skye bar 'gyur/ /rte'u de ni stabs zhan zhing/ /dbang bo zhan par skye bar 'gyur
76b5(mdo 'grel): khrag chung snying stobs dman ba ru/ /dus su de ni las skye/ /de ni rus pa'i ston ka bar/ /shes byed yi las nyon cig /rte'u de ni mar ram ni/ /yang na 'o mas gso bya zhing/ /stobs skyed pa ni gzhan dag gis/ /phra ba'i ston ka gso bar bya/ /ma ni
76b6(mdo 'grel): 'bras cha? yu sha dang/ /de bzhin khu ba sna tshogs dang/ /da bzhin btung ba sna chags dang/ /bsku dang 'jam rtsis brta 'bar bya/ /yang na rte'u zla drug pa/ /bsku dang 'jam rtsi 'bras chan khu/ /tshad dang ldan pas go rim bzhin/ /de bzhin lhag par bya ba dang/
76b7(mdo 'grel): me stobs skyes pa sbyin par bya/ /kha ra'o mar sbyar ba la/ /mar ni tshad tsam bcug ba sbyin/ /rte'u lo gnyis lon pa la/ /kha zas sbyin par bya ba yin/ /lug gi sha dang rma bya'i sha/ khyim bya bya yi sha rnamS dang/ /nya dang rus sbal sha rnams las//
77a1(mdo 'grel): sha khu dang ni kha zas ba/ /sna sman dgongs ka btung ba dang/ /bsku dang 'jam rtsi rtsa yis kyang/ /lus kyi lus gzungs brtas bya/ /zla drug bar du bya bar bshad/ /de nas sa 'dir bskyang bya zhing/ /lus dang srog kyang
77a2(mdo 'grel): bsrung bar bya/ /sor ni nyi shu bzhi la khru/ /khru bzhi la ni gzhu gong? ste/ /gzhu 'dom brgyad stong dag la ni/ /las la sbyor ba'i dpag tshad yin/ /der ni dang por rte'u dag /rim pa 'di dang ldan par bskyang/ /'dom ni sum brgya nas brtsams te/ /
77a3(mdo 'grel): dpag tshad bar du rim gyis bkri /dgun zla 'bring dang tha chung tshe/ /de las nyis 'dab bya ba yin/ /dbyid zlar ba gsum 'gyur te/ /dpyid zla 'bring po dpag tshad med/ /de yi rjes la dpag tshad ni/ /gcig tsam zlum pos bskor bar bya/ /bya ba'i
77a4(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba 'di nyid ni/ /nyam chung ba la bya ba yin/ /nas dang ma sha mar 'o mas /bsku dang 'jam rtsi rtswa rnams dang/ /shin tu bsnum pa'i btung ba yis/ /gang tshe gnyis ka bltas byas la/ /de bzhin rgod ma sbom gyur kyang/ /sgom po bskyed
77a5(mdo 'grel): ba nyid yin te/ /sbom zhing mngal ni lce ba'i phyir/ /de ni dus su skye mi 'byur/ /de ni yang yang ma zhu ltar/ /dus min par ni skye bar 'gyur/ /rte'u'i tshil ni tshor 'gyur zhing/ /sha yi tshigs ltar gnas pa yin/ /de ni ldang dang brtse mi nus//
77a6(mdo 'grel): lci zhing khur gyis non ltar 'gro/ /sbal ba ltar 'gro sbom pa dang/ /lus ni snyoms par skye bar 'gyur/ /sbal pa skrangs par gyur pa ltar/ /brtan par 'gro bar 'gyur ma yin/ /tshil gyis snying ni khyab gyur cing/ /mi rtsub rtsa ba bsten ma yin//
77a7(mdo 'grel): tshil ni lhag par gyur pa na/ /lus kyi brtse dang 'degs par dka' / /'di ni tshil ches yin shes bya/ /de la las ni 'di phan no/ /pi pi ling dang bca' sga dang/ /hang sta pi pi ling tsi tra/ /'di dag bkol ba'i mang dag ni/ /nad par zas
77b1(mdo 'grel): kyi sngon du sbyin/ /tshad tsam rte'u de la ni/ /spang ba'i phyir ni sbyin par bya/ /de la ma yi 'o ma ni/ /mi blud ra yi 'o ma sbyin/ tshon mo'i 'o ma lci bas na/ /de phyir ra yi 'o ma blung/ /'o ma spyod bar byed pa yi/ /btung ba rgod ma la sbyin bya/ /kha ba dang ni bska ba dang//
77b2(mdo 'grel): tsha ba sbyin bas de sbyang bya/ /de la til mar mdzom? rtsi dang/ /de nas slar yang gnas pa bya/ /zla ba drug gi bar du ni/ /rte'u de la yang dag spyang/ /gzhu 'dom stong ni song nas kyang/ /de nyid tsam du bzlog par bya/ /de yi rjes la 'dom bzhi stong/ /de snyed
77b3(mdo 'grel): 'gro zhing bzlog par bya/ /zas dang bstung ba nyid kyis ni/ /lus ni legs par ma khrad bar 'gyur/ /lus dang yan lag rkang pa brtan/ /legs gnas dbang po dga' ba dang/ /gang tshe nad med yin bde ba/ /de che las la sbyar bar bya/ /de ltar
77b4(mdo 'grel): sbom phra shes byas la/ /de nas las rnams sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni dmar por gyur pa dang/ /sbom phra dag kyang bshad pa yin/ /rta mchog gi ni ston kha dang/ /rang bzhin la gnas bshad par bya/ /sngar ni nga yis rta rnams kyi/ yon tan kun ldan
77b5(mdo 'grel): gseb dang ni/ /rgod ma yon tan de ldan zhing/ /na tshod stobs ni phun tshogs pa/ /srog chags thams cad bde ba'i dus/ /dbyid ngo me tog dri can la/ /phan tshun 'dod pa bskyid pa'i tshe/ /rgod ma 'khril pa'i don du 'gro/ /ngar ni mngal du chags
77b6(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /rta yi nyams mnyem bzang po yin/ /mngal du chags pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /nas dang ma sha mar gyis gos/ /sman pa bsten du mi bzhug cing/ /skar khung dra ba can du bzhag /gom pa dal gyis 'gro bya zhing/ /dben pa'i phyogs su
77b7(mdo 'grel): bsgrub bar bya/ /khang pa skar khung can der ni/ /gzhi mnyam stan dang bcas par bya/ /rte'u la ni phar pa'i phyir/ /'di dag thams cad yang dag spyad/ /yungs kar dang ni chu dag dang/ /pu shel ci dang shug pa dang/ /bas shing 'bras bu zhib btagS
78a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /phye ma yin ni bdug bas bdug /de ltar lags bar bsrung gyur na/ /rte'u dus kyi bzang por skyes/ /lus kyi stobs ni phun tshogs zhing/ /shin tu 'byes ba legs par 'dus/ /lus gzungs thams cad rgyas ba dang/ /yan lag
78a2(mdo 'grel): mdzes shing blta na sdug /mgyogs shing gtsug ni dge ba dang/ /mkhrigs shing gram can min dang/ /pags sra ba spu snum pa dang/ /'gro legs gzung bar sla ba dang/ /lus kyi yon tan kun ldan zhing/ /mtshan nyid thams cad bsdags pa dang/ /
78a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang 'jog par byed pa na/ /rtag tu mnyam pa med par dpa' / /ston ka dag ba zhes 'di bshad/ /rten bzang bo yin bar stan/ /rkang ba bstan zhing 'gros che la/ /lus kyi 'phel ka tshe zhing legs/ /rtag tu khal gyi sbyor ba dang/ /las rnams len
78a4(mdo 'grel): des sbyor nas/ /de ni slob dbon dam pa yis/ /rags pa'i rang bzhin ston dkar bshad/ /de ni bkra shis rta yin te/ /rgyal po'i bzhon bar de nyid bshad/ /de ni g.yul ngor rab tu bsdags/ /rtag tu rgod ma'i gseb du bzang/ /de ni byang zhing dpa' ba
78a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /mtshong sbyin la yang rta de bzang/ /rtag tu tshangs ba smra ba yis/ /rta mchog ces ni de bshad do/ /de ni rtag tu bzhon par bzang/ /skye dgu skyed pa yin par bshad/ /'di yi las rnams bshad pa ste/ /gzhan yang mngal can zhes bya'o/ /rta
78a6(mdo 'grel): yi mchog tu gyur pa 'di/ /las la skyid lug 'gyur ma yin/ /ston ka ba ni bzhi po 'di/ /mtshan nyid grangs ni du ma yin/ /sbom dang rang bzhin la gnas rang/ /dmar dang de bzhin phrab ste/ /rnam pa bzhi po gso ba dang/ /gzhan yang pags ba
78a7(mdo 'grel): la sogs ba'i/ /rang bzhin gang yon bshad bar bya/ /pags srab mdangs snam phun tshogs la/ /ba spu snum zhing gnyer ma snyoms/ /gsang ba'i phyogs ni mdzes ba dang/ /gtsug ni bzang bor gang gyur dang/ /blo ldan byang zhing mgyogs
78b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /smad kha gnyen cing tshor ba can/ /shin tu 'byar bar gang gyur pa/ /bag pa bzang bor de bshad do/ /yan lag tshad dang ldan pa dang/ /lus kun legs bar snyoms pa dang/ /dbang zhing dmar ba'i mdzeg rdes? can/ /mig dmar lta na sdug pa dang/ /mdangs
78b2(mdo 'grel): ldan yid ni gzhungs pa dang/ /blo dang dran pa'i yon tan ldan/ /khrag gi mtshan nyid bzang ldan lta/ /mtshan dang kha dang rkan dmar ba'o/ /so snum mig ni legs pa dang/ /ba spu rnga ma'i mngas snum zhing/ /de bzhin brum phum 'jams la snus/ /rdog ma ring zhing
78b3(mdo 'grel): bzang ba dang/ /lce ni 'jam zhing yangs pa dang/ /pad+ma 'dra zhing lus tshugs ni/ /shin tu mdzes shing sha yis rgyas/ /rkan dang ma rkan mig dmar zhing/ /stobs che gzugs ni bzang ba dag /sham khregs pa zhes bya bar bshad/ /gsod khrom me tog mdog
78b4(mdo 'grel): 'dra zhing/ /zlum la chil gyis rgyas zhing bzang/ /sha che tshil ni che gyur pa/ /tshe mkhregs ba yi rta zhes bya/ /kha dog dkar ba 'am sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /mdangs gsal snyoms shing 'phreng ba yi/ /so 'am mche ba yod gyur la/ /mtshan ni shin tu legs gyur cing/
78b5(mdo 'grel): gang gi rus ba legs skyis shing/ /'byes la brtan par gyur pa dag /khur gyis zhum ba med gyur pa/ /de ni rus mkhrigs rta yin no/ /rkang ni mar gyi snying po 'dra/ /sra zhing lci la mkhregs par snang/ /sha yi phyi dang nang dag ni/ /shin tu snum par
78b6(mdo 'grel): snang ba dang/ /mig gi mdangs? bzang nag pa dang/ /gang gi ba spu snum gyur cing/ /stobs dang mdangs kyi yon tan ldan/ /da ni rkang mkhregs pa zhes bya/ /snum zhing bskal dri ba med/ /ma zhing ba ril shing 'o ma 'dra/ /gang la de 'dra'i khu ba yod//
78b7(mdo 'grel): de ni da yis bshad kyis nyon/ /sra zhing stobs ldan dregs ba bong?/ /rgya cher dga' zhing mgyogs dang ldan/ /rgod ma shin tu tshim byed cing/ /mdangs snum 'gros ni myur ba dang/ /dkar ba'am yang na mdog rjes dkar/ /shad pa gnang dang tshol
79a1(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /rkang dang rus pa pags pa dang/ /lus la gang gzhan yong ba rnams/ /thams cad rgyus pas sgrel ba yin/ /'di ni mkhregs bar gyur ba yi/ /stobs dang gzi mdangS? mgyogs par ldan/ /lus kyi yan lag kun
79a2(mdo 'grel): legs 'brel/ /tshigs legs las rnams thams cad byed/ /'di ni rtsa rus sra ba yin/ /snying stobs brtan la da nyon cig /dpa' zhing g.yul du dpa' mi bgo /blo dang dran pa'i yon tan ldan/ /mdog snum de bzhin mdangs dang ldan/ /pho mtshan
79a3(mdo 'grel): ldan zhing tshor ba che/ /chu zheng gab par gyur pa yi/ /yon tan thams cad ldan bdag /snying stobs bstan pa'i rta yin te/ /rdo rje mkhregs ba 'dra zhing grims/ /sa kun la ni thogs med cing/ /las rnams kun la bsngags pa yin/ /'khrugs zhing
79a4(mdo 'grel): tshim bar byas na yang/ /khong 'khrugs dga' bar 'gyur ba med/ /'di dag sra bar yang dag bshad/ /de rnams kyis ni yon tan nyon/ /pags mkhregs srab cing mtshan legs skye/ /mgyogs ba dag dang ldan pa yi/ /khrag bzang mdangs dang ldan
79a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /yid gzhungs par ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sha mkhregs stobs dang ldan ba dang/ /rta ni gzugs bzang 'gyur ba yin/ /tshil mkhregs par ni gyur pa'i rta/ /lam gyi pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /rus mkhregs stobs dang ldan pa dang/ /dpangs mtho
79a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin kun byed nus/ /rkang mkhregs par ni gyur pa'i rta/ /stobs dang gzi mdangs phun tshogs 'gyur/ /khu ba mang bar gyur ba'i rta/ /bu mang stobs che 'dod mod med/ /rtsa rgyus mkhregs par gyur ba'i rta/ /gnyid srab dal ba med par 'gyur/ /
79a7(mdo 'grel): snying stobs che ba bdag nyid brtan/ /bdag nyid thul cing thams cad byed/ /de ltar ston ka zhes bya dang/ /mkhregs par gyur pa'ang bshad pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ ston ka ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //
79b1(mdo 'grel): dka' thub brtul zhugs yang dag grub/ /changs ba'i gzi ldan thul bar dga' / /shes dang rnal 'byor bsam gtan dang/ /sgom ba la goms sdig bral la/ /sha li ho tra'i bu legs thos/ /thos ba phun tshogs dul bar ldan/ /dri ba'i tshig 'di don mchog
79b2(mdo 'grel): ldan/ /sha li ho tra la dris pa/ /legs ldan sngar ni rgyal bo la/ /rta las mchog gyur dpung gzhan med/ /rta yis thob par mi nus pa'i/ /gnas kyang rgyal pos thob ces gsungs/ /de la rtag par rta yod kyang/ /gal te rgyal po gzhan las ni//
79b3(mdo 'grel): yul gzhan las ni byung ba yi/ /rta dag nyo bar 'dod gyur la/ /gang la rin ni ci lta bu/ /yin pa de la rtogs par 'dod/ /de dron ma lus shes 'gyur ba/ /khyed kyi don gyis shes par 'tshal/ /bdag nyid chen po legs thos kyis/ /de la gnyen
79b4(mdo 'grel): bskur byed pa na/ /drang srong chen pos nyo tshong gi /rtag pa 'dis ni smras pa yin/ /gal te rton yod gyur kyang/ /rta gzhan nyo bar 'dod gyur na/ /rta nyung ba 'am 'on te ni/ /bzhon pa zad tshe smos ci dgos/ /rgan yang 'khor los sgyur ba yi/ /rgyal po la
79b5(mdo 'grel): 'os mtshan nyid rdzogs /mtshan nyid don gyi 'bras 'dod pas/ /rab tu 'bad de nyo bar bya/ /rta gang g.yul du mi shis yod/ /yon tan gzhan dag ldan gyur na/ /rgyu ba'i yon tan ldan pa'i phyir/ /de'ang 'bad pas nyo bar bya/ /dam tshig ngan ba'i
79b6(mdo 'grel): gnas skabs 'das/ /rta yang nyo ba nyid du bya/ /dper na mi shis nyes bral ba'i/ /nyin zhag 'das na lan dang mtshungs/ /lha yi snying stobs gzi mdangs ldan/ /mgyogs zhing rigs stobs la gnas na/ /mtshan nyid cung zad ldan na yang/ /rta ni
79b7(mdo 'grel): blang bar bya bar 'os/ /dang po lus kyi mtshan nyid dag /bzang dan gang yin yan lag ni/ /re re nas sngos brtag par bya/ /de yi rjes lan tshor brtag /lus brtag nas ni tshe tshang te/ /ci sring nas ni 'chi ba brtag /de rjes rin thang gdab bya ste/
80a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan du bzang bo ngan par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rigs dang shes pa dang/ /mtshan nyid bzang dang ngan pa dang/ /mdog dang gtsug dang 'gros kun dang/ /de las gzhan ci'ang rung ba dang/ /chu zheng gi ni tshang dag dang/ /de bzhin rgyu ba'i
80a2(mdo 'grel): 'gros dang ni/ /rgyug tshe lus kyi mtho dman dang/ /de bzhin sdug dang mi sdug dang/ /bzhon che snying nye snying ring dang/ /skye gnas bcas par shes par bya/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ba dang ni/ /sra snying dag gi rang bzhin dang/ /rta yi nang na rgyu ba na/ /snying
80a3(mdo 'grel): stobs dang tshul gzi mdangs dang/ /nad med nad dang bcas pa rnams/ /rta 'dod pa yis rtag tu brtag /rin thang dag ni ci tsam gyis/ /sa i ci tsam chod gyur pa/ /de ni rab tu bshad bya yis/ /ngas smras pa la mnyan par gyis/ /rta mkhan dang ni rta rdzi
80a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rta la goms dang 'gros mthun dang/ /rigs mtho skam chags med cing dul/ /blo zab bstan bcos shes pa dang/ /gso ba legs par shes pa dang/ /nad gso ba la mkhas pa dang/ /lan 'debs pa la mkhas pa dang/ /long yod par ni
80a5(mdo 'grel): brtag par bya/ /skar ma nyin zhag shis pha dang/ /gza' ni bzang po la bab tshe/ /rgyal po'i blon po 'am rgyal po nyid/ /grong khyer gyi ni phyi rol gyi/ /shar dang byang gi phyogs su ni/ /sa phyogs mnyam zhing gtsang bdag /thag thog med cing bgrod bar
80a6(mdo 'grel): bar/ /kun tu mnyam par gyur pa yis/ /chu zheng mnyam zhing shar du yangs/ /rin thang spyod pa gtsang mar gnas/ /chur ni gzhu 'dom nyis brgya pa/ /zheng du de yi brgyad cha du/ /rke nas 'dzin par byed pa yi/ /mi rnams kyang ni bzhag par bya//
80a7(mdo 'grel): myang po las ni mchog dang 'bring/ /tha ma sde tshoms gsum du bya/ /de rnams mtshan nyid ngan pa yi/ /nyes dang rigs las rin thang gdab/ /nyo bya nyung zhing mnyam gyur na/ /cha mnyam pa yi rin thang gdab/ /so song yongs su brtags nas ni/ /
80b1(mdo 'grel): rin thang so sor gdab par bya/ /de bzhin bslabs pa bya ba dang/ /ma byang ba yi mtshan nyid ni/ /zhon de 'bad pas rtags nas ni/ /rin thang gdab pa nyid du bya/ /sgra chen skye bo mang po yi/ /thal mo ca co bsdigs byas pas/ /sems kyi rang bzhin brtag bya
80b2(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /'jam pa yis kyang reg pa brtag /blo bur glang chen 'brug sgra dag /grags las snying stobs brtag par bya/ /gzi mdangs dang ni mi mthun phyogs/ /ngang tshul dang ni dul bdag /re re nas ni shar phyogs sam/ /byang du kha ni bstan byas
80b3(mdo 'grel): la/ /gdong ni mthar thug yongs su ni/ /bskor zhing brtag pa nyid du bya/ /ci nas 'tshong dang nyo ba dang/ /mchog dang dga' ba gyur pa ni/ /rta 'dul mkhan dang 'tshong kha bas/ /de ltar rin ni nges par bcad/ /nyo ba dang ni 'tshong ba dang/ /lag gangs
80b4(mdo 'grel): dang por go byas la/ /de yi 'og tu thams cad kyi/ /mdun du gnas te gsal bar bya/ /rtal brdzun gyis slu byed na/ /rigs brgya nges par klog 'gyur bas/ /'tshong ba'am nyo bar byed pa la/ /bslu bdag tu mi bya'o/ /gal te rin thang gsal
80b5(mdo 'grel): byas nas/ /rta mi stod dam mi len na/ /gang zhig 'gal bar gyur pa ni/ /de la chad pas ci rigs bcad/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gnas las/ nyo tshod brtag pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //gnas dang po rdzogs sho// //
80b6(mdo 'grel): sha li ho tra bde la gnas la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /rjes su btung bar chang dag ni/ /ci 'dra bar ni blud par bya/ /nad kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra ba/ /sman ni ci 'dra dang sbyar sbyin/ /ngo ni gzhan du gyur pa na/ /chang gis nang ni
80b7(mdo 'grel): gang zhig bskyed/ /'dir ni chu sbubs tshad ci tsam/ /de bzhin chad ni ci 'dra blud/ /rjes su btung ba'i cho ga 'di/ /smra mchog khyed kyis bstan du gsol/ /bu yis de skad dris pa na/ /sha la ho tras slar smras pa/ /mdo ma'i
81a1(mdo 'grel): tshigs ni gnyis pa las/ /sman pa yi ni sor tshad kyis/ /chur ni sor yang bcu drug la/ /zheng du sor gnyis chu sbubs bya/ /zlum zhing rtse mo rta sna 'dra/ /'jam zhing shin tu sra ba la/ /du ga mthe bo sho ba tsam ni/ /rtsed?
81a2(mdo 'grel): mo'i phyogs su bya ba yin/ /ya so'i gseb du gtang na ni/ /g.yon phyogs su ni gzhug par bya/ /bde zhing drang por bzhag nas ni/ /mgo bor slar yang bdag byas la/ /chu sbubs mtshan nyid de 'dra ba/ /sum cha nye bar gzung nas ni/ /
81a3(mdo 'grel): sor bzhir kha yi nang spongs la/ /gnod pa med par blud par bya/ /rings par sbyin par mi bya zhing/ /nyung nyung yang dang yang mi sbyin/ /de 'dra'i tshul gyi chu sbubs dang/ /rta la btung ba blud par bya/ /'o ma char las gyur pa'i nang/ /nam yang
81a4(mdo 'grel): chu sbubs kyis ni sel/ /de bas chu dang 'o ma ni/ /chu sbubs dang ni blud mi bya/ /chang ni 'bu zhugs rul pa dang/ /skyur zhing mdog nyams spyi bag can/ /gsar dang tshig dang shun pa chags/ /snyigs mar gyur pa smad pa yin/ /gang tshe
81a5(mdo 'grel): rta ni skyur ba 'am/ /spyi bag can gyi chad blud na/ /de tshe khrag dang mkhris pa ni/ /tha mal pa gnas 'khrug par 'gyur/ /tshig cing nyams pas bad mkhris dang/ /rlung yang skyed par byed pa yin/ /dri ma zhim zhing rul pa yis/ /rlung
81a6(mdo 'grel): dang bad kan mkhris pa dag /gnas nas skyong bar byed ba dang/ /rgyal dang rmongs bag skyed par 'gyur/ /rlings dang chang gi snyigs ma dang/ /'bu dang bcas pa byin na ni/ /rta yi nad bzhi rnams pa ni/ /lus gzungs ngag kyang
81a7(mdo 'grel): ? khrug? par 'gyur/ /ngo dang mthu med chad gzhon dang/ /blud na rlung ni 'khrug par byed/ /de bas shas cher sngar gyur pa/ /kha dang tsha ba'i ro ldan pa/ /sgyur dang lan tshwa cher mi bro/ /bskab ? bsdags par gyur pa yin/ /
81b1(mdo 'grel): chad ni ro drug rjes 'jug bas/ /yon tan drug dang ldan pa yin/ /mdog bzang dri ni bzang ba dag/ gsol ba rnams la bsdags pa yin/ /ro rtsa rlung ni nad sel cing/ /dri med stobs kyang 'phel byed yin/ /ngal ba sel cing yi gar 'gro /phyi rol bsil
81b2(mdo 'grel): byed yon tan ldan/ /lus kyi nad gi tsha byed cing/ /zhu rjes kyang ni chab yin/ /bad kan smug dang skem bsel/ /khrag kyang dang bar byed pa yin/ /gcin sri ba dang tshad 'khru ba/ /phan zhing rlung ni bde rgyu byed/ /rtas byed 'ju byed mchog yin zhing/ /mdog kyang
81b3(mdo 'grel): gsal bar byed pa yin/ /me drod nyams pas zos rjes la/ /chang 'thungs me drod skyed par byed/ /rta yi nad ni thams cad la/ /phal cher chad ni phan pa yin/ /chad ni khar sbrang rtsi dang/ /sbyar ba btung bar blud gyur na/ /khong pa'i me drod skyed byed cing//
81b4(mdo 'grel): kha yi ljan ldin spyod bar byed/ /bur ma yang ni khyad bar du/ /ro tsa byed cing rlung mkhris skyed/ /kha zhing bska pa'i ro ldan pa/ /zhu rjes tsha bar gyur pa yin/ /zhu rjes tsha zhing rtsub pas na/ /bad kan sbyong bar byed pa yin/ /de bzhin tsha zhing rtsub pas na/ /mkhris
81b5(mdo 'grel): pa rlung ni 'khrug par byed/ /khar bsil zhing rtsub pas na/ /drod po min pas rlung skyed byed/ /nimpa gseng khrom pri yang ku/ /bla sgang pi pi ling gdab dang/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /btung ba dpyid kyi dus su bsdags/ /shing mdar gser khrom pi pi ling//
81b6(mdo 'grel): pri yang ku dang bcas sga btab/ /bu ram dang sbyar btung ba blud/ /sos ka'i tshe na bsngags pa yin/ /thad shing dang ni bca' sga dang/ /lan tshwa dang ni til mdang? pi pi ling phye btab pa yi/ /rjes su btung bar byar che bsdags/ /shu ti bca' sga? bi pi ling/ /tsi ta
81b7(mdo 'grel): ka dang na le sham/ /khar dgun 'bru dang sbyar ba'i/ /rjes su btung ba ston tshe bsdags/ /'tsho byed sde tshan pi pi ling/ /shing mdar dang ni ma nu dang/ /gser khrom rgyam tsho dang sbyar ba'i/ /btung ba dgun gyi dus su bsdags/ /zi rar? ni
82a1(mdo 'grel): bying? dag /tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka/ lce myang? tsha dang sprang rtsi btab/ /btud bad kun gyi dus su bsdags/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan rnams/ /rnam pa du mar 'khrugs gyur ba'i/ /gso ba nye bar bstan pa la/ /rjes su
82a2(mdo 'grel): btung blud par bya/ /nyi ma shar ma thag du ni/ /dang po gdong ni bkrus nas kyang/ /khong pa dag gyur rta rnams la/ /rjes su btung ba klung bar bya/ /chu ni grang mo dag gis kyang/ /gdang du nye bar blugs byas la/ /rtsa ni yud tsam byin nas kyang/ /khrus
82a3(mdo 'grel): byas rjes la/ bzas sbyin/ /so so'i me stobs so so'i nad/ /so so'i rang bzhin las spags te/ /dus ni so sor blud khyas nas/ /de phyir so sor btung bar bshad /zos ba'i rjes la brung bya bas/ /rjes su gtung ba zhes kyang bshad/ /zos pa'i rjes
82a4(mdo 'grel): la btung bar ni/ /'bras chang dangs ma 'ba' zhig bsdags/ /skom du chad ni blud gyur pa/ /zas ni yi ga 'byed byed cing/ /stobs ni 'phel bar byed pa dang/ /nad rnams sel bar byed ba yin/ /ltogs dang shin tu dub pa dang/ /lus kyi khong tsha dran pa
82a5(mdo 'grel): nyams/ /gdon nad can dang dug gis phog /tal chang ni blud mi bya/ /chang blud pa yi rta la ni/ /nam yang mnye bar mi bya'o/ /de ltar me drod tshul las ni/ /rjes su btung ba blud par bya/ /rjes su btung ba lan tshwa ltar/ /bu ram yang ni sbyin par bya/ /pi pi
82a6(mdo 'grel): ling dang bca' sgra ni/ /der ni srang bzhi gzhug par bya/ /til mar phul gang nyid dang bsre/ /btung ba snga dro blud par bya/ /chang gi nyes pa las gyur ba'i/ /nang ni snang gyur gang yin la/ /gso ba ru ni bshad pa yin/ /sman gyis slar ni bco bar bya/ /
82a7(mdo 'grel): rjes su btung ba'i don du ni/ /legs thos kyis ni yod smras ba/ /gang gis dus su gang sbyin zhing/ /tshad dang sman ni gang dang bces/ /btung ba sman ni gang du sbyin/ /chang dangs chang snying sbyar ba'i chang/ /de bzhin dgun chad la sogs pa/ /gang tsho sbyin
82b1(mdo 'grel): pa bdag la gsungs/ /bu yis de skad dris ba dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /dgun che nas chang/ /sbyin bya zhing//dgun smad dus su nas chang blud/ /dbyid ni sprad chad sbyin bya zhing/ /sos ka cha dngangs sbyin par bya/ /dbyar gyi dus su chad rnying sbyin/ /ston ni
82b2(mdo 'grel): dgun chad sbyin par bya/ /zla phyed dus dang sman sbyor ba/ /gang zhig blud bya de bshad bya/ /snga dro khong ba sbyangs pa la/ /chang gi dngas ma phul gang dang/ /de bzhin til mar phul byed dang/ /khang dkar po srang bcu dang/ /cha ba gsum ni srang gcig dang/ /la na
82b3(mdo 'grel): tshwa yang ni srang gcig dag/ rta ni chen po la sbyin bya/ /de yis de la thob par 'gyur/ /bar ma la ni brgyad cha dang/ /de la rnam par dbye bar bya/ /pi pi ling dang na le sham/ /pa ra chu dag bu co shel/ /bcad sla dang ni shing kun dag /srang gcig dang ni
82b4(mdo 'grel): yin par bshad/ /sngar bshad pa yi tshad las ni/ /phul gang nyid ni 'di la sbyin/ /lan tshwa kha ra til mar ni/ /sngar bshad ba yi phyed du 'dod/ /chang blud rjes la 'o ma ni/ /'bad der yongs su spangs bar bya/ /de bzhin 'o ma blud rjes la/ /chad
82b5(mdo 'grel): sbyin bar yang mi bya'o/ /chang 'thungs rjes la skom blud pa 'am/ /zas kyi rjes la blud pa'ang rung/ /zas ni dus rnams kun tu sbyin/ /skom ni phyi dro blud par bya/ /skom blud rjes la rtsol grags pa/ /rnam pa kun tu par bar bya/ /zla phyed dus su gang
82b6(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa/ /de ni ci bzhin sngar bsad yin/ /shal ho tra'i gnas bdun ba las/ /rjes su btung ba bstan pa'i le'u'o// //shal ho tras thub mchog la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /sman ba mchog gis rta rnams
82b7(mdo 'grel): la/ /ro drug po ni dgos par gsungs/ /ro drug po ni dgos pa la/ /'di la shas cher lan tshwa ni/ /sbyor ba kun la rab shes te/ /lus ni brtas par byed ba dang/ /kha zab len pa nus pa dang/ /lto bar phyin par gyur pa na/ /legs ?
83a1(mdo 'grel): ci 'gyur rgyu de gsungs/ /de skad dris tshe legs ldan ni/ /sha li ho tras slar smras ba/ /rta ni rlung gi shugs ldan zhing/ /rlung shas lhag par che ba yin/ /rlung 'joms pas ni ro drug las/ /lan tshwa rta la mchog tu bsngags/ /
83a2(mdo 'grel): mdangs ni rnam par 'phel byed cing/ /sbyor ba kun dang rjes mthun la/ /ljang pa shas cher mdar bas na/ /'ju dka' bar ni bshad pa yin/ /de bas lan tshwa phan gyur cing/ /rta rnams brtas par byed pa yin/ /gzhan yang lan tshwa'i yon tan rnams//
83a3(mdo 'grel): da yis bshad kyis de nyan gyis/ /'drul zhing drod ni skyed byed la/ /zas 'ju lus rgyas byed ba'i mchog /drags na bad kan skyed byed cing/ /lus kyang lhod par 'gyur bar bshad/ /ran pas kha ni sbyong byed cing/ /stobs bskyed mdog ni dag byed
83a4(mdo 'grel): yin/ /gang zhag rlung nad kyis nyen dang/ /gang zhig rtsa dang 'gras pa dang/ /gang yang yid mi bder gyur dang/ /gnyid ni med par gyur pa dang/ /gang zhig me drod nyams ba'am/ /gang zhig me drod mi snyoms dang/ /lus zungs rnams la gnod
83a5(mdo 'grel): byas pas/ /bslas kyang tshon por ma gyur dang/ /de la tshang ldan lan tshwa ni/ /byin na nang rnams sel byed yin/ /lan tsha 'ba' zhig byin pa 'am/ /chad dang sbyar te byin par bya/ /lan tshwas pho ba'i me drod ni/ /bskyed cing mdog stobs 'phel
83a6(mdo 'grel): byed yin/ /lus ni rnam par rgyas byed cing/ /zas kyang mang du za bar nus/ /de ltar lan tshwa'i yon tan ni/ /bshad nas so so'i dbye ba bstan/ /rgyam tsha dang ni kha ru tsha/ /rgyam mtsho'i tsha dang mtsho tsha dang/ /yab k+Sha ra sro hi ka /tsa ru cha ni bdun
83a7(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /bul tog brgyad pa nyid yin no/ /'di ni lan tshwa'i tshogs su 'dod/ /kun la rgya mtsho mchog yin te/ /de nas rim gyis yon tan chung/ /'di rnams sbyor ba'i tshad dang ni/ /dus kyang las nyan bar gyis zas dang rjes ??
83b1(mdo 'grel): ba la/ /de yi khub dang sbyar bya/ /snga dro'am yang na phyi dro'am/ /yang na khrus byas dus su ni/ /rtag tu lan tshwa byin gyur na/ /me drod rnam par 'phel byed yin/ khreg dang rgan dang shin tu gzhon/ /de bzhin skom gyis gdungs pa dang/ /mkhris pa khrag gi nad
83b2(mdo 'grel): bcas dang/ /gang yang bad kan gyis nyen dang/ /gcin ni khrag 'dra 'byung ba yi/ /nang ni gang tsheg sogs gyur pa/ /de tshe btang na thams cad la/ /khong par gnod pa bskyed par byed/ /lan tshwa'i sbyor nyes khor par ni/ /khrag gi nad ni sog bar byed/ /
83b3(mdo 'grel): mkhris pas yang ni bskyed byed yin/ /bad kan yang ni sdud par 'gyur/ /khrag dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i/ /tsha ba snying gi skyed par byed/ /de ni rming bag skye 'gyur te/ /rtags 'dis sbyor nyes yin shes bya/ /snying ga tsha zhing kha nas ni/ /kha chu sbu ba
83b4(mdo 'grel): dang bcas 'byung/ /chu la mngon par dga' ba dang/ /rtag tu 'thung bar 'dod par 'gyur/ /nyam chung bshad ba sri ba dang/ /lce yang 'byin par byed par 'gyur/ /rtswa la sred pa chung ba dang/ /sal lce yis 'degs bar byed/ /kun tu dbugs rgod lus rdul zhing/
83b5(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i tshe bas gdungs pa dang/ /snying ga bsrag par mnyam sems zhing/ /de yi kha yang skam par 'gyur/ /mgo bo 'gugs shing ske bar 'jogs/ /mdog nyams lus ni bcag par 'gyur/ /lan tshwa las gyur nad de 'drar/ /shes par byas
83b6(mdo 'grel): nas gang song tsam/ /tshu lo spang dang blugs pa dang/ /'dam gyis yongs su bsku bar bya/ /chu bsil kha ra dang sbyar ba'i/ /btung ba re la blud par bya/ /chu drang la ni spang bar bya/ /'thung du gzhug par mi bya'o/ /'bras chang grang mo 'o ma dang/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi
83b7(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar byin/ /pa ru sha ka dgun 'bru dang/ /gis lu'i 'bras bu kha te dkar/ /sgrang rtsi dang ni bsres pa yis/ /sman gyi char bu de la byin/ /sngar bshad ba ni gang yin pa/ /kha sbyar cho ga de yang bya/ /nas dang 'bras ni drug cu pa/ /ba gcin dang ni sbrul?
84a1(mdo 'grel): pa byin/ /yang na 'bras chen ba la dang/ /skyur rtsabs dang ni sbyar ba byin/ /phal cher mngar zhing rlung 'joms pa'i/ /sman gyis gda' ba' i cho ga bya/ /khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba yi/ /mdar ba'i sman gyis 'jam rtsi
84a2(mdo 'grel): btang/ /gal te khrag ni shas che bas/ /lus ni shin tu lci gyur na/ /rtal gtar ka byas gyur na/ /bde ba des bar thob par 'gyur/ /dang pa dur ba khrung khrung dang/ /chu bya gzhan dang 'ol bya dang/ /rma bya khyim bya sreg pa yi/ /shal sha khu byas te
84a3(mdo 'grel): sbyin/ /gnas ni bde zhing bser bu rgyu/ /bsel zhing chag chag btab par bzhag /utpal brgyad pa durba dang/ /rta smra brit+ta rdzun/ /rtswa yi phyed du sbyin byas na/ /des ni bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i gnas bdun pa las / lan
84a4(mdo 'grel): tshwa'i skyon dang yon tan bstan ba'i le'u'o// //legs thos thos pa phun tshogs pas/ /sha li ho tral dris bas/ /khyed ni rta yi tshe'i rigs byed/ /yan lag brgya/ kyis de nyid mkhyen/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba ni/ /chu la
84a5(mdo 'grel): rag ni lus pa lags/ /'gro ba 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur dang/ /de ltar gang zhig gnas pa yi/ /sems can ro la rnam bar brten/ /ro yang chu las byung bar bshad/ /mchog tu rta ni ro kun gyi/ /bdag cag chu ni srog tu bshad/ /'di ni rta yi
84a6(mdo 'grel): khong pa na/ /gnas tshe nad ni ci ltar skyed/ /zas kyi nang du ro gang zhig /chu yis rnam par rgyas par byed/ /sman ba mchog las 'di dag gi /des ba bdag ni mnyan par 'tshal/ /bu yis de skad dris ba dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa//
84a7(mdo 'grel): lags thos 'di dag thams cad ni/ /yang bdag nyid du mnyan par gyis/ /chu dang shing ni mang ba dang/ /rlung mang than pa med gyur pa/ /de ni brlan can yin shes bya/ /rta la mchog ni yin bar
84b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /gang na shing dang chu nyung zhing/ /rlung g chu nyung zhing/ /rlung tu pa/ /yul de skam sa tsan zhes bya/ /rta la rtag tu bzang ma yin/ /rlan can skam pa 'dres ma ni/ /de ni thun mong yin par bshad/ /de ltar rnam ba gsum po yi/ /yul las goms par 'gyur ba yin/ /yul ni yon tan
84b2(mdo 'grel): mang ba las/ /bu yis yon tan chen pa 'gyur/ /chu yi yon tan chu las ni/ /sman rnams kyis ni yon tan 'byung/ /sman gyi yon tan rdzogs gyur na/ /lus kyi yon tan chen po bskyed/ /de phyir sta yi lus 'dzin pa/ /gtso bo yul ni yin
84b3(mdo 'grel): bar bshad/ /bsil zhing 'tsho byed rlan par byed/ /shin tu 'phra zhing brtag ba dang/ /khyab cing re yi gnas gyur la/ /yang zhing snum pa bcud len 'gyur/ /chu ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /dgos ba'i gtso yin rigs drug ldan/ /de las
84b4(mdo 'grel): cha ? chu mchog yin te/ /de ni rlung dang 'dre par 'gyur/ /sdud cing phyogs kyi gtsor gyur la/ /rang bzhin gyis ni mkha' la gnas/ /chu la ro gang mi snang ba/ /de ni yul las rtag par bya/ /ro ni gang yang mi bro zhing/ /gtsang zhing dangs la dri/
84b5(mdo 'grel): med gam? 'dres bla la bsil zhing yang/ /chu de nang bzhi gsum sel yin/ /skom pa 'joms shing ge tsang byed cing/ /gzhan yang 'di dang 'dra mchog yin/ /de las bzlag pa sar gnas pa/ /smad de khrag dang nyes gsum bskyed/ /rdzing
84b6(mdo 'grel): bu'i tshu ni drum bskyed ? khron pa'i chu yis mkhris pa bskyed/ /chu bal can ni bad kan bskyed/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yis nyes kun bskyed/ /'bru can lci zhing 'ju dka' la/ /nyi ma'i zer dang ma phrad dang/ /yul phyogs nyes pa'i khyad par gyis/ /
84b7(mdo 'grel): gnod bcas de ni smad pa yin/ /chu 'o rdzing dang rdzing ? yi/ /chu ni dgun gyi dus su bsngags/ /g.yar chu bsil mo gang yin pa/ /de ni sos ka'i dus su bsngags/ /khron pa'i chu ni dbyar che ba spags/ /ston gyi chu ni thams cad bzang/ /
85a1(mdo 'grel): kha ra'o? ma dang bsres pa/ /dgun gyi dus su bsngags pa yin/ /sa phyogs dkar las bska dang ser las tsha/ /dmar bas khab skya las lan tshwa can/ /gro bo las gyur gnag las mngar bag can/ /'byung bar
85a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhes bstan bcos mkhan rnams 'chad/ /'di ni log par blud pa las/ /chu yis khod par nad bskyed de/ /than par ring du lam zhugs dang/ /khur lci ba yis nyen pa dang/ /shin tu dub par gyur pa yis/ /rdul zhing skom gyis nyon
85a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /lto stong gnas dang ngal ma gsos/ /mnyes shing sman gyi sbyor ma rdzogs/ /chu la spangs pa'i mod la ni/ /gang che blun pos chu blung na/ /de tshe gnod pas bskyod pa yis/ /chu ni mang du 'thungs gyur zhing/ /dbugs ma ston bar 'thungs
85a4(mdo 'grel): ba las/ /snod las lhag par gyur pa de/ /dbugs phyung bar ni gyur pa na/ /rlung gis kun tu bskyod par byed/ /de tshe rtsa gang lte ba dang/ /'brel dang snying gal brten dang/ /lto bar chu ni rgyu ba'i tshe/ /gang tshe 'phral du chus rgyas 'gyur/ /rlung du sbyi
85a5(mdo 'grel): kyod gyur cing/ /de yi lto la rgyas byas las/ /mchin pa mkha' ma'i nad bskyed cing/ /lto dbos? kyang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'am/ /log par blud pa las byung ba'i/ /'chi ba nyid kyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /da yi lto bskrangs gyur ba
85a6(mdo 'grel): 'am/ /chu yis dam rdzings 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi lus la skrangs 'gyur zhing/ /khong par chu yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de yi skom dang mi zhi zhing/ /sbu yang 'byi bar 'gyur pa yin/ /gom pa lci zhing stobs chung la/ /ldang bar
85a7(mdo 'grel): dka' zhing rtseg par 'gyur/ /gcin rtug sri bar 'gyur ba dang/ /rtag tu 'dug pa la dgar 'gyur/ /mig ni dmar zhing zhum pa dang/ /lte bar dgra yang 'khrig par 'gyur/ /shin tu skrag par 'gyur ba dang/ /mdog dang
85b1(mdo 'grel): dbang bo zhan par 'gyur/ /de ltar nad bzhi shes byas la/ /gso ba'i las ni brtsam par bya/ /lto ba til mar gyis byugs ba/ /gso ma'i lo ma'i dugs kyang bya/ /shi ta ba la nim+ba dang/ /a ru ra sha pa tal/ /snam kar bi ra'i rtsa/ /btags pa
85b2(mdo 'grel): dar ba dang sbyar ba/ /lan tshwa lnga bo btab pa ni/ /snga dro rtal blud par bya/ /des ni skyu ru chu 'bras dang/ /rus skrad cha yid mu rdzing sel/ /stobs dang kha dog gzi mdangs dang/ /rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin/ /ha re nu ka bri yang ku/ /dgun
85b3(mdo 'grel): 'bru chu dag spong spos dang/ /dza ti ga ra bi ta'i rtsa/ /chu yi nang du bsgol bar bya/ /bu ba de ni lan tshwar bcas/ /snga dro'i tshe na blud par bya/ /yang dang yang du ngal sos la/ /zhag gsum gyis chod mang du sbyin/ /gal te des bder ma gyur na/ /de las
85b4(mdo 'grel): chu ni gnod byas la/ /chu yi dmu rdzing gso ba las/ /bshad pa'i cho ga 'di la btang/ /phag dang bya rog pri sha ta/ /ni'u le khyim bya 'ug pa'i sha /khu bar bcas ba byin gyur na/ /des de 'tshe ba med bar 'gyur/ /sha bu shin tu mi skyur zhing/ /
85b5(mdo 'grel): snum zho pi pi ling btab pa/ /zir dang ni bca' sga dang/ /tshwa yang ran ba dang sbyar bya/ /de dang sbyar ba'i 'bras chan ni/ /drug cu pa snying las byas sbyin/ /zas 'di dang ni 'jam rtsi dag /zhag re yis ni ci mang btang/ /zhag re zhing na lus kun la/ /snum
85b6(mdo 'grel): gyis legs bar bsku bar bya/ / nas zin 'o ma'am sha khuAm/ /bcas pa'i zas kyang sbyin par bya/ /de ni gtsang zhing rlung med ba'i/ /gnas ni bde bar bzhag par bya/ khi ban+dzi ka ku la dang/ /sha sha ben bu mon sran rde'u/ /rtsa yi don du sbyin
85b7(mdo 'grel): bya zhing/ /du rbid kyang ni blud par bya/ /de 'dra bas ni chu yi nad/ /sel cing bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gnas bdun pa las/ chu shor ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u'o// //legs thos thos pa phun sum tshogs/ /rta yi 
86a1(mdo 'grel): khang par byin nas ni/ /pha yi rkang pa la btud de/ /'dri ba'i tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /sla ba'i rdzas kyi nang na ni/ /'o ma mchog ni yin par bshad/ /rgyu ba'i 'gro ba mang dang ni/ /'o ma'i bdag nyid la brten lags/ /de phyir
86a2(mdo 'grel): yon tan kun 'o ma/ /ro nges phan tshun nyid khyab na/ /rta yi khod par phyin pa na/ /nad du ci phyir gyur pa lags/ /de skad smras tshe legs ldan gyis/ /dris pa kun gyi lan smras pa/ /'o ma yon tan grangs med cing/ /rdzas rnams kun gyi dam pa
86a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /lus can dang ni lhan cig tu/ /byung bas skyes nas brtsams te go bas/ /ro rnams kyi ni mchog yin zhing/ /tsho 'phel byed pa nyid kyang yin/ /de phyir 'o ma mchog yin no/ /gzhan yang 'di yi yon tan yang/ /ba dang ra dang bud med dang/
86a4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin ma he nyid dang ni/ /phan glang rnga mo rta'i 'o ma/ /de bzhin lug gi brgyad pa yin/ /'di dag thams cad mngar ba dang/ /snum zhing bsil ba yin par bshad/ /rtas byed khong snum phan ro rtsa/ /blo skyed bcud kyis len 'gyur yin/ /'tsho
86a5(mdo 'grel): byed yin zhing ngal? ba dang/ /dbugs mi bde dang nyon mongs sel/ /khrag mkhris nad ni zhi byed yin/ /tshogs rnams bde bar byed pa yin/ /'di ni lhag par rta rnams la/ /blung na srog ni 'phel byed 'gyur/ /skom dad 'phel cing me drod
86a6(mdo 'grel): bskyed/ /sbeg? cing nyam chung la mchog yin/ /rlung 'khyil lto ba'i nad rnams dang/ /dbugs mi bde la mchog tu phan/ /tshad par 'khru dang rims dang tsha/ /skrangs pa dang ni sbrum ma dang/ /mngal gyi nang dang gcin sri ba'i/ /nad la'ang
86a7(mdo 'grel): shin tu bsngags pa yin/ /bshad ba sri? bar byed pa dang/ /de bzhin rlung gi nad kyang sel/ /sna sman lde gu lus sbed dang/ /rta yi cho ga rnams la bsngags/ /klugs dang de bzhin dug la yang/ /thams cad du ni 'o ma bzang/ /na
86b1(mdo 'grel): tshod la 'jug tshe la phan/ /stobs bskyed pa'ang bstan na grub/ /gso ba'i sbyor ba dus dang ni/ /goms dang nang tshul legs brtags nas/ /legs par btang na rta yi nad/ /thams cad 'o mas sel bar 'gyur/ /ba yi 'o ma'i bsil bcud len/ /zhu rjes mdung
86b2(mdo 'grel): zhing phan ba che/ /rlung mkhris sel cing khong snum byed/ /'tsho byed brtas byed mchog yin no/ /ma yi 'o ma 'ang de 'dra las/ /skra dang tshad la khru dag la phan/ /ma he'i 'o ma shin tu lci/ /ba yi bas kyang de bsel cing/ /snum che gnyid med la phan gyi/ /mi drod nyams
86b3(mdo 'grel): par byed pa yin/ /rnga mo'i tsha zhing lan tsha bro/ /gzhang 'brum skrang dang lto nad sel/ /lug gi lci ba zhing bad kan skyed/ /mngar zhing snum shas tsha ba yin/ /rta yi 'o ma zhu rjes tsha/ /yang zhing phan par byed pa yin/ /ban glang 'o ma tsha zhing zhi ma/ /yang zhing lud
86b4(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad sel/ /bud med 'o ma mngar bcas snum/ /mig nad rnams la phan pa yin/ /skyes nas sgoms sas lus brtas byed/ /mngar bas bad kan 'phel byed yin/ /bsil bas snum bskyed byed yin/ /grang bas bu ba 'phel bar byed/ /'di
86b5(mdo 'grel): dag lci dang yang ba dang/ /'dres na bus pa 'dren par byed/ /yang na snum dang ldan par ni/ /bya ba de dag rnams la sbyin/ /sos ka'i tshe? na ma he mchog /dgun ni lug gi 'ang bsngags pa yin/ /ba yi? 'o ma dbyar gyi tshe/ /rta la byin na bsngags pa yin/ /ra dang
86b6(mdo 'grel): ma he dpyid tshe bzang/ /rwa ra yang 'o ma dang 'drar bshad/ /mar gsar ro rtsa 'khru spyod cing/ /bskal bad kan sel byed yin/ /zho ni snum skyur dre ba bsre/ /'khru spyod lus ni brtas byed yin/ /dkrugs pa skyur ba nyes chung zhing/ /me drod skyed cing bad kan
86b7(mdo 'grel): sel/ /dar ba dang rlung sel byed yin/ /skra dang gzhar 'brum dag la phan/ /'di ni blung nyes nyes pa yis/ /'o mas khod pa'i nad skyed yin/ /tshad las ches pa 'am dus min par/ /'o ma 'thungs na gnod pa skyed/ /chang 'thungs 'o ma 'thungs pa'am/
87a1(mdo 'grel): 'o ma'i rjes la chang 'thungs pa'am/ /rta ni rtsol grags byas gyur nas/ /gal te 'o ma blud pa las/ /de rjes rjen pa zos gyur na/ /'o ma ma zhur gyur pa des/ /bad kan gnas las skyod gyur nas/ /de rjes snying la gnod par byed/ /
87a2(mdo 'grel): bad kan g.yos par gyur ba na/ /me drod nyams par byed pa'i rta/ /lto ba spo bar gyur pa dang/ /de bzhin 'khru bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyab rengs rgyu long rgyas ba dang/ /nad dang bcas pas 'gul ba yin/ /snying ga tsha zhing rdul ba dang/ /kha nas kha chu 'byung
87a3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /nad kyis gdungs shing nyam chung ba/ /shin tu shas cher 'khru bar 'gyur/ /yan lag kun tu 'khrums pa dang/ /mdog mi sdug cing yid mi bde/ /mgo yi g.yung ni lci ba dang/ /sems khong chud pa nyid kyis 'dug /'o ma las gyur
87a4(mdo 'grel): nad 'di ni/ /shes par bya la gso brtsam/ /de yang gso dpyad las bshad pa'i/ /sman dang kha zas sbyin pas bco/ /sha li ho tra'i gnas bdun pa las/ /'o ma'i yon tan ma stan pa'i le'u'o// //mang thos sha li ho tra la/ /
87a5(mdo 'grel): leD thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /legs ldan rta la khyad par du/ /mar blud ba dang dus gan tshe/ /byin na phan gyur cho ga de/ /yang dag bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /rta yi la ni byas gyur ba/ /sbyor bzhon pa 'am sbyor gyur te/ /rgan dang khal gyis dub pa dang//
87a6(mdo 'grel): lam rings su ni zhugs pa dang/ /rlung dang de bzhin mkhris pa dang/ /bad kan gyi ni nad rnams la/ /mar ni ji ltar rtsal bgyi ba/ /'di ni bdag la bka' stsol cig /bu yis de skad dris pa dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /ma bsams 'tsho ba'i
87a7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi/ /bdud rtsi mar ni yin zhes 'chad/ /de yi dus su btang gyur cing/ /tshad ldan byin pa shin tu bsngags/ /mar ni ci srid legs 'khrus pa/ /de srid bar du rta la byin/ /de ni dus tshigs rnams la ni/ /dri ma spyad zhing? blud?//
87b1(mdo 'grel): bsrung dang nad gzhan sbyang phyir yang/ /rta la mar ni sbyin par bya/ /mdze nang dmar rigs bshad 'gags dang/ /'bu nad nges par sel ba yin/ /nang gzhan la yang phan byed cing/ /'di yis khrag ni skyed mi byed/ /gang tshe sdong bu tshe mar gyur/ /twaM
87b2(mdo 'grel): ni sna tshogs za gyur pa/ /de tshe mar ni blung bya zhing/ /lan tshwa yin chad bu byin/ /sman pa mchog gis de bzhir du/ /ston kyi zla ba gnyis pa la/ /rta rnams nad ni med bya'i phyir/ /slar yang mar ni blud par bya/ /rta la mar ni blud gyur na/ /khong pa'i 'bu ni ring
87b3(mdo 'grel): po dang/ /rdo dang g.yan pa la sogs pa'i/ /nang ni nam yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /dbyid kyi dus la bab pa na/ /che dang kha ba byin par bya/ /des ni nang med g.yan pa sel/ /tshe 'phel mdog bzang stobs 'phel 'gyur/ /mar blud pas ni bkra shis shing/ /de
87b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin lus ni gdab byed cing/ /'dis ni blo gros gsal byed cing/ /bcud len du yang 'gyur ba yin/ /btsas ba rnams dang de bzhin du/ /srod chags rgan po rnams la'ang phan/ /gcod can la'ang 'di phan zhing/ /gzhan yang drung mkhris
87b5(mdo 'grel): las gyur dang/ /khrag las gyur pa'i ? nad rnams dang/ /rta gang lus gzungs zad pa dang/ /gzhon dang de bzhin rgal pa dang/ /gang yang lung pa dbugs mi bde/ /dug 'thungs dug mdangs phog pa dang/ /de bzhin rig pa'i dug rnams la/ /mer
87b6(mdo 'grel): ni gsar pa'am rnying pa'ang rung/ /'di la phan par the tshom med/ /gseb la khu ba 'phel bya'i phyir/ /mar ni legs par blud par bya/ de las skyes pa'i rte'u ni/ /snying stobs tsho zhing lus ma khrang 'gyur/ /dbyar gyi zla ba dang po la/ /rtswa yi rta ni shin
87b7(mdo 'grel): tu 'khru/ /de tshe rta srangs slas gyur pa/ /btung bar mar ni blud par bya/ /snga dro zas ni zhu ba ni/ /byin pa de ni mchog tu bsngags/ /sman pa mkhas pas me tog dang/ /gom pa la sogs legs brtags la/ /ci rigs ba yi sbyor ba
88a1(mdo 'grel): yis/ /mar gyi tshad ni bskyed par bya/ /yung ba'i phye dang sbyar ba yang/ /de bzhin sa? rdzi ka sbyar ba'i/ /mar ni rta la blud pa'i tshe/ /bca' ba dang ni bza' ba dang/ /lan tshwa sbyin par mi bya yi/ /rtswa ni 'ba' zhig sbyin par bya/ /chu yang tsha zhing
88a2(mdo 'grel): dro ba dang/ de la blud dang bsrung ba dang/ /mar ni 'thungs par gyur pa la/ /nyer spyod thams cad dron po bya/ /zhag gsum 'am ni zhag lnga'am/ /yang na zhag ni bdun nyid dam/ /zhag dgu yi ni bar dag tu/ /ji srid khrus kyi bar du sbyin/ /tshad chungs bar
88a3(mdo 'grel): ni byin gyur ba'i/ /mar gyi 'khru bar byed minus/ /de bas ci srid legs par ni/ /'khrus kyi bar du sbyin par bya/ /cho ga 'di 'dras rten gyur kyang/ /'on kyang 'khrus par ma gyur na/ /'di ni legs par 'khrus gyur pa/ /de yi bar du sbyin par
88a4(mdo 'grel): bya/ /rta ni mchog tu gyur pa la/ /mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis sbyin/ /zas kyi nang du de yi byed/ /sna sman la ni srang bzhi btang/ /'di las bzhi cha phri ba ni/ /bar ma'i tshang du shes par bya/ /snga ma de yi phyed gang yin/ /chung ba la ni sbyin par bya//
88a5(mdo 'grel): gal te des kyang mi la ?/ /sa rdzi kar ded sbyar sbyin/ /gal te rta spangs sUm gyur cing/ /stobs dang bza' stobs chung gyur pa/ /de tshe mang nag ma chung bar/ /de ni legs par gso bar bya/ /nad thug chang dang lan tshwa bcas/ /zhag gsum bar du
88a6(mdo 'grel): blung par bya/ /de nas rim gyi mo dod kyi/ /stobs ni legs par bskyed par bya/ /btung ba de ni ci rigs par/ /sbyin zhing chu ni cung du blung/ /de nas 'di la 'jam rtsi ni/ /btang ba'i tshul gyis lus brtas bya/ /de la mngar ba'i kha zas ni/ /dgongs
88a7(mdo 'grel): kha'i dus su sbyin par bya/ /khyim bya'am ni rma bya 'am/ /phag gmar 'am ma he 'am/ /sreg pa'o la bya barta? ka /ka ba ni tsa la dad bcas pa/ /shin tu tsho min sbeg pa min/ /rgas pa med pa'i sha sbyin bya/ /de yi khubs lus rgyas zhing//
88b1(mdo 'grel): stobs dang spro ba rtsol pa che/ /dga' zhing sran mi che ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad nus par 'gyur/ /cho ga 'di yis rta la ni/ /mar ni mang po blud gyur na/ /mdog mdangs stobs dang ldan gyur cing/ /nad med par ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /til mar
88b2(mdo 'grel): legs par byin gyur pa/ /yon tan 'di dang 'dra ba yin/ /rta yi til mar 'thungs gyur na/ /nad med stobs dang ldan par gyur/ /dbyar ni lan tshwa dang sbyar sbyin/ /dbyad mthar 'o ma dang lhan cig /dgun tshe skyur ba dang sbyar ba/ /dgun sman 'bras
88b3(mdo 'grel): bu gsum dang bcas/ /de phyir ni chang dang ldan bya zhing/ /sos ka chu dang ldan pa sbyin/ /til mar blung bar gyur pa'i rta/ /chu drang nang du sbed par bya/ /cho ga 'di yi snum dag zhi/ /legs par blud par gyur ba'i rta/ /las la bkol yang mi snod cing/ /
88b4(mdo 'grel): nad med par yang 'gyur ba yin/ /til mar zhi bar gyur rjes la/ /chu gang brung na bsngags pa yin/ /sha li ho tra grub pai gnas bdun pa las/ mar blud pa'i cho ga'i le'u'o// //ha yi bstan chos la mkhas pa/ /
88b5(mdo 'grel): gzi brjid rnam par 'byung gyur pas/ /nye bar 'dug par gyur pa la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba rnams/ /dro dang bsil ba'i rang bzhin can/ /gso ba'ang de yi bdag can du/ /legs ldan khyed kyis
88b6(mdo 'grel): thams cad gsungs/ /khog? dang mkhris pas nyen rnams kyi/ /nad gyi gso ba lan mang bshad/ /de la bsil ba'i gso ba yi/ /rnam pa du ma'ang khyed kyis gsungs/ /rlung dang bad kan dag gi nad/ /lci zhing gnod pa mar gyur la//
88b7(mdo 'grel): gso? dka' par ni snang gyur na/ /de yi gso ba ci 'dra lags/ /dugs kyi rnam pa du zhig mchis/ /dros pa'i mtshan nyid ci lta bu/ /tshad mche dang chung gyur dugs/ /mtshan nyid khyed ni ci ltar bzhed/ /dugs mi bya ba'i nad gang lta?
89a1(mdo 'grel): dugs kyi yon tan gang zhig lags/ /tsha zhing rdul gyur gso ba dag /yang dag gtso bos bdag la gsungs/ /de nas legs ldan de yis ni/ /ji skad smras ba dris gyur pa/ /dugs kyi cho ga rnam par 'brgyad/ /rims?
89a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin khyed kyis mnyam par gyis/ /snum gyi dugs dang ral gso ma/ /byed ma dang ni 'dren ma dang/ /rdug pa gsum dang go bra dang/ /lcags leb dang ni rdza ma'i dugs/ /gci ba'i dugs kyis bcad pa'i snum/ /'o ma de bzhin sha khu ni/ /sha za
89a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang rlan can dag /sman spyod legs par btab gyur pa/ /khron pa 'am rdzing bu gzhong ba ru/ /legs par bsros pa blug par bya/ /snum gyi dugs su bya ba 'di/ /sna tshogs sman dang sbyar bya ste/ /shi kru dang ni titkar/ /ba su ro hi e
89a4(mdo 'grel): ran dang/ /ba spu nye'u shing spu rdzi ka /ku be rak+Shi dur byid dang/ /gzhan yang tshul 'di de 'dra ba/ /de rnams lo ma so sor ni/ /chu ni mang pa dang bkol la/ /dro bar na ba blug par bya/ /'di ni gso ma'i dugs yin zhing/ /ki shu ki yi me tog dang
89a5(mdo 'grel): glang po rta dang rnga mo yi/ /rtug pa dang no 'o ma zho/ /gso ma'i lo ma gcig tu bsdus/ /'dres ma'i dugs zhes bya ba yin/ /gso dang skyur rtsabs nas du spangs/ /kun nas legs par brtsir nas kyang/ /de la arka'i lo ma 'am/ /er Nar?
89a6(mdo 'grel): yi lo ma gding/ /sla da'am? sa slang la rdos pa'i/ /bye mtshan de der bsre bya/ /de nas de yi thub por bya/ /lag pa gnyis ni mnyes nas kyang/ /yang dang yang du dugs bya ba/ /? ma bo'i dugs su de bshad de/ /ba lang po dbu ra'i rtug
89a7(mdo 'grel): ba? /'o ma dang ni bsres pa bskol/ /gos kye nad bcug rab tsha min/ /rtug pa gsum gyi dugs zhes bya/ /la phug cham chom brdungs nas ni/ /'o ma'i nang du bcug nas bskol/ /'o ma dag kyang der bcug ste/ /de btags nas
89b1(mdo 'grel): ni gong bur bya/ /gyo mo me mdag 'dra steng bzhag /gyo ma'i dugs de ci rigs pa/ /khre dang 'bras dang gro rnams ni/ /phye mar btags la'o nar sbyar/ /la phugs er N+Ta'i 'bras bu/ /ga gon gso ma'i sa bon dang// phabs dang ma sha til
89b2(mdo 'grel): rnams ni/ /yungs kar rnams ni cher btags la/ /phye ma de ni 'o ma dang/ /chang bsres lan tshwa bro byas la/ /de yis mang du bgos ba yi/ /ras ma yin kyang rab dkris la/ /de ni lcags leb rab tsha ba/ /kun tu nye bar sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni lcagS
89b3(mdo 'grel): leb dugs yin te/ /rlung gi nad ni 'joms byed yin/ /lcags leb la ni ji ltar byas/ /bum pa yis kyang de bzhin bya/ /bum pa'i dugs su bya ba 'di/ /brgyad pa bum pa'i dugs su bshad/ /'di ni so so'i bya ba dang/ /da yis khyed la bstan pa
89b4(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rdza bum chen po gso ma bcos/ /sbubs kyi dugs kyang byed du gzhug /'di ni rlangs pa'i dugs yin te/ /reg na bde bar byed pa yin/ /bum pa'am rdza ma dag du ni/ /gos ma dang ni 'bru yi rigs/ /sna tshogs pa ni btsos pa
89b5(mdo 'grel): yis/ /rlangs pa'i dugs ni so sor bya/ /dkri ba'i dugs zhes bya ba ni/ /gong bu'i dugs kyang yin bar bshad/ /til dang ma sha zad ma phags/ /nas dang gro dang ku lat+tha/ /la phug e raN+DI sa bon/ /de bzhin ga gon gso ma yi/ /sa
89b6(mdo 'grel): bon yungs kar zangs? shing dang/ /sa lar dang ru rta dang/ /shu ti dang ni po son cha/ /ra sna rgya spos chu srin sen/ /de bzhin rlung 'joms pa yi sman/ /phye mar zhib tu btags par bya/ /snum ni bzhi po gzhug bya zhing/ /sbrang rtsi kho dang
89b7(mdo 'grel): 'o ma gzhug? /de ltar snum rab ldan sbyar la/ /lan tsha btab la btso bar bya/ /chos nas gor bur gyur ba ni/ /gong bu'i dugs zhes bya ba bar bshad/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur na/ /tshil dang smin bur bcas gang yin/ /de
90a1(mdo 'grel): la? ? bu'i dugs byas yin/ /'di ni shin tu bsngags pa yin/ smar ni phan tshun sbyar ba'am/ /de bzhin nyi ma me drod kyis/ /gang byir rdul ni 'byin byed pas/ /de phyir dugs zhes bya bar bshad/ /'di yis
90a2(mdo 'grel): lus 'di mnyen byed cing/ /'gags pa 'byin par byed pa yin/ /zhu ba'i phyir ni 'byin byed cing/ /'thas pa zhu bar byed pa yin/ /skrangs bzhi bar byed pa dang/ /rlung ni bde bar rgyu bar byed/ /nad ni tshar gcod par byed cing/ /de
90a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin gso ba'i grogs kyang byed/ /smin par bya ba'i nang na ni/ /nang 'jig byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /dper na shing la snum bskus shing/ /dkri zhing bsros na dbug pa sla/ /de bzhin dus tshogs thams cad du/ /legs bar sbyar
90a4(mdo 'grel): na lus bde byed/ /'jam dang drag po'i sbyor ba na/ /nad kyi tshod las dpags te bya/ /legs par bskus la dugs bya yi/ /rtsub por nam yang dugs mi bya/ /dper na shing ni rlan med par/ /bsros na 'jig par 'gyur ba yin/ /
90a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin lus ni snum med par/ /dugs byas na ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /nad gang sbum dang dugs rnams kyi/ /lus la zags par byas gyur pa/ /de ni sbyangs pa sa gsal bar bya/ /rna ba mjug mang ku dang ni/ /rlig pa mtshan gyi bar dag
90a6(mdo 'grel): tu/ /gang tshe dngul bar gyur ba dang/ /kha ni yongs su bskams gyur pa/ /lus ltod nyams ni mi gsod pa/ /de tshe dugs 'gyur yin zhes bya/ /mnyen zhing yang ba nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin zug gzer zhi ba dang/ /nad 'di rnam par
90a7(mdo 'grel): gsal gyur ba/ /rta'i dugs legs pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /gang gi sbu ni 'byi gyur zhing/ /khrag dang 'dra ba'i gcin 'byung na/ /skom dang dang ni smongs bag skyed/ /nyal ba la ni mngon par dga' / /'dud bas nyen par gyur pa ni//
90b1(mdo 'grel): dugs drag pa ni yin par bshad/ /dugs ni chungs par gyur pa yis/ /nad ni zhi bar byed gyur te/ /nad ni skyed par gyur na yang/ /gnas de las ni phyin ma byas/ /de bas 'di la nad shugs ni/ /shin tu drag po skyed par byed/ /'di las gnyen
90b2(mdo 'grel): pa mi 'byung gi/ slar zhing rengs ba skyed par byed/ /dugs drag pa la lan brgyar ni/ /bcin pa'i mar gyis bsku bar bya/ /'o ma can shing khu ba dang/ /'o ma zho dang zho ga chu/ /til dang de bzhin gzhan gyi chus/ /legs par bskus la blug
90b3(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /dugs chungs pa la slar yang ni/ /cho ga gzhan du dugs bya'o/ /dugs drag chungs par gyur pa 'am/ /tshad las lhag par sbyar gyur na/ /nang gzhan dag kya bskyed byed cing/ /'di yi lus la gnod par byed/ /khong tsha skrangs par
90b4(mdo 'grel): gyur ba dang/ /lus kyang tshig bar 'gyur ba yin/ /shin tu tshig ba 'am tshos min pas/ /las ni nam yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /tshad par 'khru dang rims kyis thebs/ /pags nang can dang lus zungs zad/ /dmu rdzing dbugs
90b5(mdo 'grel): mi bde gcin nad/ /khrag dang mkhris pa'i nang yod dang/ /gseb ni mang po dub pa dang/ /sbrum ma dang ni btsas ma thag/ zla drug lon par ma gyur dang/ /gnong ba can dang snang ba dang/ /de bzhin glo bur ba yi nad/ /gang yang sprul gyiS
90b6(mdo 'grel): zin pa dang/ /dug mangs phog par gyur ba dang/ /gyen du rlung bzlog skyug ba dang/ /lung pa can dang khong pa na/ /bu yod pa la dugs mi bya/ /'di dag la ni dugs byas na/ /'chi ba'am rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur/ /shin tu min drang
90b7(mdo 'grel): min pa yi/ /dus su rta la dugs bya bsngags/ /gnas skabs gzhan du gyur pa dang/ /sos ka ston tshe bya dgos na/ /tsha dang dus ni legs brtags la/ /ci nas gnod par mi 'gyur bya/ /sha li ho tra'i grus pa'i gnas 
91a1(mdo 'grel): bdun pa las/ dugs kyis cho ga'i le'u'o// //dur byid ganda bi ra di/ /pi lu par+Na ba la gnyis/ /ganda ra ba'i rtsa ba dang/ /sa ha tsa ra'i rtsa ba dang/ /igna man+tha bilba dang/ /gze ma dang ni te ru ka /de 'dra'i
91a2(mdo 'grel): sman gyi rtsa ba rnams/ /bsdus te chu bre bzhi nang bkol/ /legs par tshos par gyur pa na// /sman pas slar ni dpog par bya/ /des rtsags sman khu dang mnyam pa'i/ /til mar 'o ma nyid 'gyur gzhug /der ni thang shing ta ru ba/ /sbang sbos chu
91a3(mdo 'grel): dag rdo drag dang/ /tsan dan spang spos ru rta dang/ /aM shu ma ti a ga ru/ /ba la ra sna shing mngar dang/ /pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha ni/ /sman ni re re srang phyed kyi/ /tshad du mkhas pas gzhug par bya/ /der ni slar bskol sbyar ba yi/ /til mar
91a4(mdo 'grel): 'di yi nus pa nyon/ /rta ni rlung gis nyen pa'am/ /glang po shin tu rtsegs pa 'am/ /'di yis dbang po brtas par 'gyur/ /bud med mo shaM gyur bdag /'di la'ang de ni blud par bya/ /'di yiS dre mo'ang bu chags na/ /mi yi bud med smos ci dgos/ /'di dag
91a5(mdo 'grel): tshogs bar gyur blud la/ /de rjes chang ni zlud gyur na/ /rlung gi gzir gyis nyen pa dang/ /mi bzang? sna ba'i gzer dang ni/ /snying nad dang ni snying gnyer dang/ /mngal 'jigs nyam chung rnam sel yin/ /de bzhin sna nad kha nad dang/ /gzhogS
91a6(mdo 'grel): phyed kyi nad la'ang phan/ /don grub ces bya'i til mar 'di/ /khyab 'jug gis ni bstan pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i grub pa'i gnas bdun po las/ don grub ces bya'i til mar gyi le'u'o// //rta yi de nyid la mkhas pas//
91a7(mdo 'grel): bu dang spob ma la smras pa/ /nad gang la ni ma rtsa dag /go rim ci bzhin bya'o zhes/ /gso ba'i gnas su bstan pa ste/ /me btsa' btab pa'i thabs bshad bya/ /de la re zhig me btsa' la/ /dgos pa'i cha byad brjod bya ste/ /
91b1(mdo 'grel): lcags leb ngan da'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs/ /chur chag phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad/ /'dab ma'i chung ni sor brgyad la/ /zheng du sor ni bzhi par bya/ /yu ba'i sboms ni mtheb sor tshad/ /shin tu zlum zhing sra bar brdung/ /sreg par byed pa'i
91b2(mdo 'grel): cha byad kyang/ /lcags leb dang ni 'dra bar brdung/ /de yi rtse mo zhing sor gnyis/ /byang chub shing lo 'dra bar bya/ /she ba li 'bras ltar gug pa'i/ /sor ni bco brgyad tshad du bya/ /lcags nag las ni rab zlum pa'i/ /rtse mo bkug pa'i
91b3(mdo 'grel): bzhar spyad bya/ /'dzam bu'i tshig gu yu ba 'jam/ /sor ni bco brgyad tshad du bya/ /'jam bu'i tshig gu 'dra ba la/ /zlum zhing legs pa nyid du bya/ /thur ma sor ni bcu drug pa'o/ /mar me'i rtse ltar zlum pa ni/ /spu sregs pa yi che spyad
91b4(mdo 'grel): 'di/ /lcags las legs par brdungs par bya/ /lcags de me yi mdog 'dra bas/ /bsregs pa'i gnas cha shes byas la/ /'jam bu'i tshig gu 'dra ba yis/ /dbyibs ni du mar bsreg par bya/ /tshigs kyi cha yi phyogs su ni/ /
91b5(mdo 'grel): dbyibs gang bya ba ni nyon cig /cha bzung bar ni gnas pa las/ /dad por bri ba nyid du 'dod/ /pir ram yang na btsag gam ni/ sa dkar gyis ni bri bar bya/ /de nas thur ma bsregs pa yis/ /gnas der sbu ni sreg bar bya/ /bsregs
91b6(mdo 'grel): pa byed tshe cho ga las ni/ /gzhan du dbyibs 'di 'gyur srid la/ /de bas me tsa'i las la ni/ /dang por mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /shin tu grang dang tsha ba yi/ /dus su me yi las mi bya/ /grang ba'i tshe na rtsa rgyus ni/ /rengs shing 'thaS
91b7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba yin/ /nad 'di 'thas par gyur pa dag /me yi las kyis sel mi nus/ /de bas grang bas nyen gyur rta'i/ /nang mi sel bas de mi bya/ /shin tu cho cho khong tsha dang/ /rmongs bag mgo 'khor dbugs rgod bskyed/ /sos?
92a1(mdo 'grel): ka dbyar gyi tshe na ni/ /srog ni nges par zad par byed/ /de bas snga dro'i tshe na ni/ /shin tu drang min tsha min pa'i/ /mo'i las tshad tsam byas gyur pa/ /rta yi bde ba bskyed pa yin/ /'dug pa la ni legs bcings la/ /phyogs gcig
92a2(mdo 'grel): du ni skyel bar bya/ /thag ba sru zhing sbom pa yis/ /lag ba gnyis ni gdam par bya/ /phyi rkang gnyis kyang bcings nas ni/ ma snang 'gyur ba med par bya/ /zhags pas nang nas bsdams te bsdus/ /'dis ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /a bcu dag
92a3(mdo 'grel): kyang bcing bya zhing/ /sna ba gang bkyang legs par gdam/ /bsdams te legs par bzhag nas ni/ /de rjes las ni brtsam par bya/ /gnas ni mnyam zhing rtswa sgram par/ /bags pa 'jam po bting bar ni/ /thag pa 'jam zhing sra ba la/ /sbomS
92a4(mdo 'grel): su 'theng sor dag ni tshad/ /skyus su 'dom drug yod pa dag /bcing ba'i don du bya ba yin/ /brag so nas ni btab ma yin/ /ro stong legs par bsdams nas ni/ /nang nas bcug ste tshe'u tshe nas/ /ro snang du ni bsdam par bya/ /bzlog nas byin
92a5(mdo 'grel): pa nas dkri bya/ /de ltar legs par bsdams nas ni/ /stobs dang ldan paS leD par gnan/ /rtsib? ma phab ste legs bzhag la/ /de yi rngam nas da zung bya/ /de nas legs par dgab pa yis/ /mig gi mthong ba med par bzhag /lus ni shes
92a6(mdo 'grel): cher mi btsir zhing/ /chu so dang ni mchan khung dang/ /dku yi bar ni legs bsrungs la/ /de laS grub pa'i las kyang bya/ /snying ga kha dang sman ka ru/ /chu ni yongs su blug bar bya/ /dbugs byung snyan pa'i tshig smras pa/ /de rjes sreg
92a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i las rnams bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bsreg bya yis/ /gnas dang dbyibs ni bshad par bya/ /mchu ltag gong du 'brang du ni/ /ri mo gsum ni bya ba yin/ /sna gdong dang ni mkhur tshos suAng/ /mnyam par phyed
92b1(mdo 'grel): du bya ba yin/ /mchu sgros dang ni mchu dag tu/ /ri mo zlum po dag kyang bya/ /'bram lhang rtag tu thig le yi/ /ri mo cung zhig bya ba yin/ /'dzam bu'i tshig gus 'bras bar ni/ /bya rog rjes ni mnyam po bya/ /sna ba mig gi pha rol tu/ /zlum po dag
92b2(mdo 'grel): kyang bya ba yin/ /mu skong dang ni utpal 'dab/ /de bzhin bya rog rjes gnyis bya/ /sna rtsa ru ni snum nas ni/ /sa tha li yis thig le bya/ /rtse'u chung gnyis su zlum po'i nang/ /ri mo gsum dag bya ba yin/ /phrag so gnyis su sin ji yi/ /'dab ma lta
92b3(mdo 'grel): bur bri bar bya/ /dpung mgor dga' ba 'khyil ba dang/ /shing de? ris lta bu bya ba yin/ /nam tshong du ni thig le ris/ /yang na zlum po bya ba yin/ /snying ga yi ni phyogs dag tu/ /nam yang sreg par mi bya'o/ /bus gong dang ni dpung pa ru/ /
92b4(mdo 'grel): chu srin so 'dra bya ba yin/ /yang na chu srin so'i 'og tu/ /ri mo ring bur bya ba yin/ /dpung po gnyis kyi bar du ni/ /thig le lta bu'i ri mo bya/ /lag dang? chi? ga dang? phra mo ru/ /thig le 'am yang na 'khor lo bya/ /byin pa tshe'u tshe dag la ni//
92b5(mdo 'grel): thig le thor bur bya ba yin/ /dgu gnyis su ni bya rog rjes/ /yang na utpal thig le bya/ /sgal tshig dor ba'i rgyab du ni/ /mnyam zhing chung ni 'gro ba yin/ /ri mo gsum dag bya ba ste/ /drug mdor yang ni gsum po bya/ /yang na drug
92b6(mdo 'grel): mdo'i gnam? bu ni/ /bya rog rjes ni bya ba yin/ /yang na lag pa drang ba'am/ /mar me yi ni rtse 'dra bya/ /long du bya rog rjes 'dra 'am/ /utpal yi thig le bya/ /lto bar ri mo brgyad pa 'am/ pad+ma yi ni dbyibs 'dra bya/ /yang na drug
92b7(mdo 'grel): dang ni spu ram?/ /dang/ /lta ba yongs su spang bar bya/ /dbyi stengs su ni g.yu rung ngam/ /dga' ba 'khyil ba'am pad+ma bya/ /yang na ri mo mdzes pa 'am/ /zlum pa nyid du bya ba yin/ /? rtsa dor la 'jug tsos su/ /bya rog
93a1(mdo 'grel): rjes sam utpal bya/ /tshigs kyi mtshams su legs brtags la/ /dga' ba 'khyil ba'am zlum po 'am/ /lo ma bdun pa lta bu ni/ /kun tu gnod pa med par bsreg /dpyi yi 'og gi cha ru ni/ /chung ni rengs pa'i ri mo bya//
93a2(mdo 'grel): yang na zla ba lta buAm/ /chu srin gyi ni so 'dra bya/ /brla yi phyi dang nang du ni/ /ri mo 'phreng du bya ba yin/ /sre long tshigs su mkhas pa yis/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi 'dab 'dra bya/ /ro stod kyi ni cha bzhin du/ /ro smad du yang bya ba yin/ /de bzhin mkhas
93a3(mdo 'grel): pas skrangs pa dang/ /rmar gyur pa yi nad la yang/ /dga' ba 'khyil dang chu srin gyi/ /so 'dra ba ni bya ba yin/ /nad kyis nyen par gyur pa la/ /dbyibs ni de 'drar bsreg par bya/ /cha du dbyibs 'di gsal mngon zhing/ /legs par
93a4(mdo 'grel): gnas pa dris nas ni/ /ri mo snyoms par gnas pa la/ /mkhas pas legs par sregs par bya/ /ta la'i snying po dang 'dra ba'am/ /bilba'i snying po 'drar gyur ba 'am/ /legs kpar bsreg bar gyur pa ste/ /mdag? zhan smad par gyur
93a5(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /bsregs drags na ni shar 'phrul zhing/ /shin tu rting ring rma mtsho dka' / /sdug bsngal dag kyang skye 'gyur zhing/ /yan lag sdud mi shes par 'gyur/ /bsregs chung bas ni 'di yi nang/ /legs par gsal bar mi
93a6(mdo 'grel): nus shing/ /rma yang myur du mi 'tshol/ /las su mi rung nyid du 'gyur/ /rta ni legs par bsregs pa'i rma/ /sha ni chu bur 'dras khyab cing/ /cung zad 'dzag pa 'dra ba dang/ /nad kyang rab tu zhi bar byed/ /skrangs pa rnams ni
93a7(mdo 'grel): zhi 'gyur zhing/ /skam pa slar ni skyed bar byed/ /rma ni sbyong bar byad pa dang/ /'tsho ba cing snag ni zad bar byed/ /gzer ni sel bar 'gyur ba dang/ /rlung ni bde bar rgyu bar byed/ /rmen bu skye bar mi byed cing/ /ska yang 'chad par
93b1(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /gyod pa rnams ni mnyen 'gyur zhing/ /lhod pa rnams ni sra bar byed/ /khrag ni mang du 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de btsa' nyid kyis zhi bar byed/ /rmig mthil tsha dang dugs la ni/ me nyid kho na bde skyed yin/ /de la sogs dang gzhan pa yi//
93b2(mdo 'grel): yon tan mes bsregs legs las byung/ /kha zas dang ni btung ba dang/ /sna sman dang ni 'jam rtsi dang/ /sman chu blugs dang bsku ba dang/ /dugs dang yongs su mnye ba dang/ /dkri ba'i tshul ni sna tshogs sam/ /yang dag gtar ga'i las rnams
93b3(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /nad gcong bde bar mi snang zhing/ /nad ni shin tu 'phel gyur na/ /bdag po la ni dris nas kyang/ /me yi las ni brtsam par bya/ /me'i las byas pa'i 'og tu ni/ /gang dag bya ba de bshad bya/ /tshig grags gyur ba yang dang yang/ /mar gyis
93b4(mdo 'grel): legs par bsku bar bya/ /til dang 'o ma'i lde gu 'am/ /mar gsar gyis kyang bsku bar bya/ /gzhan yang gang dag bsil gyur pa/ /'di la nye par sbyar bar bya/ /ma tshig rma ni red gyur la/ /snum ni dron po btang bar bya/ /de bzhin sman chu dro ba dang//
93b5(mdo 'grel): bsku ba dag kyang dron po bya/ /dugs kyis las dad de bzhin du/ /dril phyis dag kyang bya ba yin/ /de yis nad zhir ma gyur na/ /slar yang de la bsreg par bya/ /bsregs nas yang dang yang du ni/ /de la mar ni blugs par bya/ /de nas nyin
93b6(mdo 'grel): zhag gsum na ni/ /brtags la 'drul bar gyur na ni/ /chu ni dro 'jam dag gis ni/ /blugs shing legs par bkru bar bya/ /mar dang sbyar ba'i til gyis ni/ /ldai? gu yis kyang bsku bar bya/ /me yis skrangs par gyur pa la/ /rgyam tsha dang
93b7(mdo 'grel): sbyar lde gus bsku/ /de yi 'og tu mar dang ni/ /yug rnams sbyar ba bsku ba bya/ /de ltar bsil bcos kyis bcos na/ /me yi nad ni sel bar 'gyur/ /legs ldan sha li ho tra yis/ /de skad rjes bstan smras pa yin/ /sha li ho ?
94a1(mdo 'grel): grub ba'i gnas bdun pa las/ me btsa'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u'o// //garga ne? sha da'i rgyal po/ /mdza' o bzang dad ka ri tas/ /mas btang sbu gu'i chog rnams/ /shal to tral dris ba/ /mas btang
94a2(mdo 'grel): sbu ga sman dang ni/ /brdar ba yi ni tshod dag dang/ /sman du zhugs pa'i nad rnams ni/ /gso ba dang bcas rgyas pa dag/ rta la ci ltar bgyi ba ni/ /legs ldan khyed la shes bar 'tshal/ /de rnams de skad smras pa dang/ /sha li ho tras slar
94a3(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ /rta ni snum zhing sgo lnga nas/ /yongs su brtas par byed pa yin/ /mar dang til mar zhag dang rkang/ /kha dang sna dang mtshan mjug ma/ /bags pa las ni zhugs pa yis/ /thabs ni bde bas de rtas byed/ /stobs bskyed ro tsa'i tshe
94a4(mdo 'grel): byed rnams/ /sbyar ba 'am yang na ma sbyar ba 'am/ /sbyor ba legs par btang ba'i snum/ /rta ni 'tsho bar byed pa yin/ /bza' dang rjes su btung ba dang/ /kha bkang kha ba yi snum yin no/ /de bas 'jam rtsir btang gyur pa'i/ /snum gyis
94a5(mdo 'grel): khong snum stobs bskyed cing/ /brtas byed mgyogs dang ro ca dang/ /de bzhin mdog ni bzad bar byed/ /'jam rtsi rta yi gso byed kyi/ /mchog yin par bshad pa yin/ /'jam rtsi sbu gu'i tshad dang rdzas/ /ngas bshad pa las mnyan pa
94a6(mdo 'grel): bgyi/ /lcags dang shing dang ri dags dang/ /bya rnams kyi ni chu sbubs dang/ /sha mi ser ldeng sh+ri mi sha/ /shing sha pa dang hin tu ki /da ba 'o ma can tsan dan/ /shing ni 'di brgyad bsngags pa yin/ /dad pa bya rgod ku dra ba/ /rma bya
94a7(mdo 'grel): pa? ri bla ba dang/ /dur pa ba la mnga' gu ste/ /bya yi mchog ni de brgyad yin/ /bod bu ma he rnga mo dang/ /de bzhin glang dang ba man dang/ /g.yag dad ru ru glang po che/ /lgang pa mchog tu 'dod pa yin/ /gser dang de bzhin
94b1(mdo 'grel): dngul dang ni/ /'khar bar gan zha nye dang/ /ro nye zang? ba dang lcags rnams ni/ /lcags kyi rigs ni brgyad du bshad/ kha dang ra lug ma he yi/ /lgang pa dbug gu dang nyer bshad/ /shing rnams las ni tsan dan mchog /phyugs kyi nang na glang po mchog/
94b2(mdo 'grel): pa ri bla ba bya yi mchog/ lcags rnams mchog ni gser yin no/ /tsan dan grags ldan tshe la phan/ /bkra shis bsil sman rnams kyi mchog /pa ri bla ba'i 'jam pa dang/ /bsil pas mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /bsol byas sbu gu ni/ /lci zhing 'jam
94b3(mdo 'grel): la sra ba yin/ /de ni rta'i nad sel ba yin/ /phan pa dam pa yin par bshad/ /gser las byas pa'i sbu gu ni/ /'jam zhing myur du chud pa dang/ /myur du 'byin par byed pa dang/ /lci bas rta las phan zhing bzang/ /de na gas med 'gyur ba med/ /zlum zhing shin
94b4(mdo 'grel): tu bde ba bya/ /de dag rnyed par ma gyur na/ /'od ma lcang ma dag la bya/ /'jam zhing 'bu yis ma zos la/ /gzhug pa la gnod mi bskyed bya/ /'od ma'i nang nas nag po ni/ /sbu gu'i rgyun ni bzang bar bshad/ /sha ni shin tu gzhon min pa/ /bde bar 'gro
94b5(mdo 'grel): bar byed pa yin/ /sa rang ga yi sgar? pa ni/ /sgang pa rnams kyi dam pa yin/ /sbu gu sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /'jam zhing gag ba dang bcas pa/ /zheng du sor drug gis 'khyud pa/ /rtse mo rim gyis phra ba bya/ /rtse mo sna ma'i me tog ni/ /kha 'bus 'dra
94b6(mdo 'grel): zhing bug chung/ /mthe'u chung gi rtse mo'i tshad/ /'di yi tshad ni yin par bshad/ /sman pa las rnams grub 'dod pa ga /de lta bu yi sbu gu yi sa/ /cho ga bzhin du zos 'thungs la/ /'jam rtsi'i las ni sbyar bar bya/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub
94b7(mdo 'grel): mo yis/ /bkag pa yis ni bcug nas kyang/ /chud nas rtse mo bkag pa yis/ /rtse mo yongs su btang bar bya/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pas ni/ /lgang pa rtsir bas snun par bya/ /kha nas snum btang tshang gang yin/ /mas btang ba la gnyis? 'gyur
95a1(mdo 'grel): bya/ /srang ni drug cu rtsa bzhi 'am/ /bzhi bcu brgyad dam sum cu gnyis/ /bcu drug dang ni de yi phyed?/ /de ltar rim bar bzhag ba ni/ /mchog dang bar ma thab la/ /mas btang ba ni yin par bshad/ /'jam rtse sbu gu sped? pa
95a2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /tshad de rnam pa bzhi yin te/ /sor bzhi sor gsum sor gnyis dang/ /sor gcig pa ni yin shes bya/ /zla drug lon pa'i rte'u la/ /sor cig nang du btang bar bya/ /snum ni srang bzhi yin par bshad/ /snum? tshad de ni go log bya/ /lo gcig
95a3(mdo 'grel): lon la sor gnyis te/ /'jam rtsir snum ni srang brgyad btang/ /lo gnyis lon la sbu gu'i rtser/ /sor gsum nang du gtab bar bya/ /de yi 'jam rtsir btang ba'i snum/ /srang ni bcu drug btang bar bya/ /lo lnga yan chad snum tshod ni/ /gong du ji
95a4(mdo 'grel): skar bstan bar bya/ /sbu gu nang du gzhug pa'i tshe/ /thams cad la yang sor bzhi yin/ /rtsa ba lnga la nyis rgyam tsha/ /yungs kar bcas pa bskol ba 'am/ /me dang lan tshwa dang bcas pa/ /dbyar gyi tshe na mas btang bya/ /pi pi ling dang
95a5(mdo 'grel): bca' sga dang/ /'bru sgyur dang ni yungs kar dag / lan tshwa bro zhing snum dang bcas/ /dgun gyi dus kyi mas btang yin/ /til nag dangni shing nag rang/ /thar shing dang ni sa ra la/ /ka ra bi ra utpal/ /shug ba tsan dan bu shel
95a6(mdo 'grel): rtse/ /shar ba yi lde gur bcas/ /'o ma dang sbyar so gar bsngags/ /nang dang bcas pa'i rnams la ni/ /ji skad bshad pa'i gda' la bya/ /mgo ni thur du g.yangs gyur na/ /lgang pa med la brtsir drags na/ /zhu ba'i gnas
95a7(mdo 'grel): la 'das pa ni/ /snum ni gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de las 'di ni rmag? bag dang/ /sems myos khong tsha skye bar 'gyur/ /snum ni zlog par byed pa'am/ /yang na dus ring zhig ni 'byung/ /des na mgo bo rgyab nas ni//
95b1(mdo 'grel): lag pas cung zad brdeg par bya/ /? zhing mnyes par byas nas ni/ /'jam por gyur nas gtab par bya/ /dub par gyur pa 'am skom gyis gdungs/ /ltogs dang shin tu nyam chung ba'i/ /mas btang byar mi rung ba yin/ /gal te rmongs pas
95b2(mdo 'grel): btang gyur na/ /de yis bde ba bsgrub 'dod kyang/ /sdug bsngal nyid ni bskyed par byed/ /'jam rtsi byar ni mi btang la/ /gal te blo chung bas gtong na/ /snum ni myur du ldog 'gyur zhing/ /de yis phan ba byed mi 'gyur/ /de ltar nyes bar gur pa'o?/
95b3(mdo 'grel): gcin rtug bsal ba'i sbyar ba bya/ /der rjes? 'dzam rtsi legs btang na/ /de yi don ni sgrub par byed/ /dub la sogs par mas btang byas/ /slar ni byung rung ma byung rung/ /de yis phan ba mi byed de/ /nad ni skyed par byed pa yin/ /smyo dang lung ba
95b4(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde/ /lkogs nang dang ni gnya' rengs dang/ /'khrul ded ni rlung 'khyil dang/ /de bzhin snying nad bzhi po dang/ /mjug ngo rgyab rengs lto spos pa'i/ /nad rnams de la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mas btang las gyur nang 'di rnams/ so
95b5(mdo 'grel): song 'byung yang gyur ba la/ /gso ba la ni ji skad bstan/ /cho ga byas pas gsal par bya/ /legs par 'dug par 'gyur gal/ /rnga ma g.yas su bzung bya la/ /lag pa g.yon pas bcug nas ni/ /g.yas pa yis ni btsir
95b6(mdo 'grel): por bya ? nor shin tu ? min par/ /rgyun gyis rjes su 'bab bar btang/ /lan cig btang bar bya ba 'am/ /yang na dus ni gnyis su btang/ /dus gsum du ni mi btang zhing/ /bag med par ni mi bcir ro/ /rgyab ni bku she ste btang
95b7(mdo 'grel): ? na/ /de las snum ni snyon? pa par 'gro/ /bde bas nad rnams bsod nas ni/ /slar yang bzlog par 'gyur ba yin/ /rlung ni mang du 'byin byed cing/ /nad ni slar yang 'jug par byed/ /'jam rtsi btang bar gyur ba la/ /rgyab mnye? sen mo sa? 
96a1(mdo 'grel): 'brug par bya/ /til mar 'jam rtsi btang gyur na/ /sa? zhag gis ni bsku bar 'dod/ /til mar dro bzhing tsha bas na/ /rta yi 'khrig pa skyed par byed/ /de bas sked pa'i log gnyis su/ /sa zhag gis ni bskus ba mdags//
96a2(mdo 'grel): 'jam rtsi btong bar byed ba na/ /gal te rlung ni zhugs gyur na/ /'jam rtsi dang ni 'dres pa yi/ /rkang ni de ru gnas par 'gyur/ /de bas shin tu mi spong zhing/ /drag du rtsir bar mi bya'o/ /'jam rtsi phyed tsam btang bas na/ /gal te rta ni
96a3(mdo 'grel): dbugs stong na/ /sbug gu myur du dbyung bya zhing/ /rlung dgag ba ni mi bya'o/ /rlung de btang bar gyur pa na/ /rta ni gnyam du legs bzhag la/ /de nas snum gyi lhag ma yis/ /'jam rtsi gnyis pa btong bar bya/ /gang phyir rjes mthun
96a4(mdo 'grel): btong bas na/ /de phyir 'dzam rtsi yin par bshad/ /'jam rtsi zung du ma gyur bas/ /btang ba na tshe dang stobs 'phel byed/ /mkhris pa can la lan gsum btang/ /bad kan can la lnga 'am bdun/ /de bzhin rlung nang can la ni//
