96a5(mdo 'grel): dgu 'am yang na bcu gcig btang/ /nad bu can la ci srid du/ /nad na zhi gyur bar du btang/ /nad ni ma g.yos skyed byed cing/ /skyed pa rnams ni 'byin bar byed/ /nad med gyur pa rnams la yang/ /zla ba phyed cing rtag tu
96a6(mdo 'grel): btang/ /nad med pa la btang gyur na/ /stobs dang mdog ni mchog tu skyed/ /zla phyed tshigs su ltag bar yang/ /'jam rtsi btang bar gyur na ni/ /de yis yid ni bde 'gyur zhing/ /stobs sogs yon tan 'phel bar
96a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de ni legs bar 'jug bya'i phyir/ /rjes su btang ba blung par bya/ /da yis pho ba'i drong skyed cing/ /rlung ni bde bar rgyu bar byed/ /'jam rtsi btang bar gyur pa na/ /sman chu blud ma mcho tu bsngags/ /de nas 'jam
96b1(mdo 'grel): rtsi gong ma yi/ /cho? ga yang dag bshad par bya/ /sngar bshad pa yi rdzas las ni/ /sbu gu 'jam zhing 'bra ba bye/ /bdag mig med cing kha sgo phra/ /dpangs su sor ni bcu drug pa/ /rtsa ba 'khor lo gnyis dang bcas/ /'jam zhing bcings
96b2(mdo 'grel): par bde bar bya/ /'di ni tshad chen srang brgyad de/ /gzhan dag la ni de'i phyed/ /mtshan ni sbubs nas phyung nas kyang/ /dbu gar? gu? de ru gzhug bar bya/ /de nas rta ni legs bzhag la/ /de nas sngar bshad tshul du ni/ /lgeng ba lags
96b3(mdo 'grel): par bcer bar bya/ /de 'dra'i mas btang gong ma ni/ /gcin nad can la btang bar bya/ /tshig? 'di 'dras rta la ni/ /gcin nad slar yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /lhag ma lus sam phyi'i log 'gyur/ /mes btang/ bas ni gnod skyed do/ /
96b4(mdo 'grel): de bas rta ni legs bzhag la/ /dang por legs par gzab par bya/ /sman ba blo dang ldan pa yis/ /na tshong stobs dang dus tshigs dang/ /rang bzhin goms ba kun btags la/ /snum bta'? ci rigs dugs bya'o/ /ba yi mar
96b5(mdo 'grel): ram yang na ni/ /til mar shin tu dang bskol/ /rta yi gso ba thams cad la/ ba yi mar ni mchog yin no/ /ston skyes til ni nag po la/ /lag bas btser ba'i til mar yang/ /'jam rtsi dang ni sku ba la/ /rtal phan bar
96b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba bsngags/ /'jam rtsi btang ba'i dus su ni/ /kha nas btang bar mi bya'o/ /rta ni skyon med shes byas la/ /lto ba ran 'drangs legs gnas la/ /tshad ni legs par brtags nas ni/ /mar gyi 'jam rtsi btang bar bya/ /
96b7(mdo 'grel): phyir de nyin zhe ltos stongs la/ /rta yi thas ni ben? par sbyin/ /'grangs zin pa la gtag mi bya/ /ltogs la 'jam rtsi me btang ngo/ /gal te rmongs bas btang gyur na/ /mas btang de las gnod 'byung ste/ /de ni rno bas ma byin/
97a1(mdo 'grel): par/ /zas ni 'byin par byed pa yin/ /'khru ba bskyed par 'gyur ba dang/ /de bzhin mi bzang sbyor bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe lo stong 'gyur ba la/ /'jam rtsi btang bar gyur na ni/ /de yi khong ba stong pas na/ /rta spangs
97a2(mdo 'grel): dang ni ma 'dres par/ /slar yang don med 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /nang kyang bskyed par byed pa yin/ /de bas rta spangs btang gyur cing/ /lto ni zas dang bcas ba las/ /tsha dang kha dang dro ba yis/ /'jam rtsi tshad tsam btang bar bya/ /'jam rtsi
97a3(mdo 'grel): rku ba las btang gyur kyang/ /chog legs na rim gyis ni/ /lus kyis steng bod? thang ka ru/ /rnam par khyab par byed pa yin/ /mdog kyang kha dog skyed byed cing/ /nang kyang sel bar byed pa yin/ /dbang po gsal zhing dga' ba dang//
97a4(mdo 'grel): lus zungs rnams kyang 'phel byed cing/ /me drod skye zhing brtan pa dang/ /gcin rtug bde bar 'byung ba yin/ /mngal ni legs par byed pa dang/ /lus kyang brtan par byed pa yin/ /'di ni 'jam rtsi btang gyur pa/ /legs
97a5(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /'jam rtsi btang drags ma legs las/ /phyen dang rtug pa 'gags 'gyur zhing/ /de bzhin gcin nang 'byung ba dang/ /rlung 'khyil lto ni sbo pa dang/ /mtshan gyi nang rnams 'byung 'gyur
97a6(mdo 'grel): la/ /? rig? gyur pa'i rgyu las ni/ /de bzhin me drod mi mnyam dang/ /ngal rkyen rmongs bag rnams kyang 'byung/ /de bas 'jam rtsi'i las rnams ni/ /shin tu legs par bya ba yin/ /de bas drags par ma gyur
97a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /snum gyi 'jam rtsi? btang bar bya/ /'jam rtsi btang bar gyur pa'i rta?/ /bkol ba la sogs spang byar bya/ /'jam rtsi gtong ba'i dus su ni/ /sban pas ma g.yeng nying du brtags/ /'jam rtsi btang ba'i rjes la ni/ /
97b1(mdo 'grel): pho ba'i me drong bskyed pa'i phyir/ /len tshwa bca' sga shing kun dang/ /na le sham sbyar chad blud bya/ /rjes su btung ba 'di nyid ni/ /nad par za ma zos tshe byin/ /dus ni ji srid byin gyur pa/ /de srid bar du khong rtsub bya/ /khong rtsub gyur par shes nas ni/ /
97b2(mdo 'grel): de la bcos pa'i thabs kyang bya/ /de yi nyin zhag gnyis pa la/ /snga dro kha zas byin pa phen/ /phyi dro khrus byas rjes la ni/ /sha khu dang sbyar kha zas ni/ /snum dang lan tshwa bro ba byin/ /de stobs tshe ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de nas zas skom 'o mar bcas//
97b3(mdo 'grel): sbyin zhing chang blung pas rta bya/ /rta ni legs par rtas gyur nas/ /las rnams kun la legs par bya/ /tsher ma chen po las skyes dang/ /lcug ma las skyes rtsa ba skyes/ /lba? pa rtsa las byung ba ste/ /rtsa ba lnga pa rnam lnga yin/ /lnga pa'i 'og ma
97b4(mdo 'grel): drug pa dang/ /de bzhin bdun pa 'khru gcod byed/ /balbi? agni man+tha dang/ /so? na ka dang ka ma ri/ /pa ha ma te 'di dag ni/ /rtsa ba lnga pa chen por bshad/ /bri ha ti gnyis a raN+Ta/ /aM shuma ti ba su ka /rtsa ba lnga pa chun ngu ru/ /gnyis
97b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ni shes par bya/ /bri kA da ni sle tres dang/ /bi da ri dang sha ri pa/ /i dza sh+ri ga lcug ma las/ /skyes pa lcug ma yin zhes bya/ /bya zan pa sh+ri ya dang/ /kar ma ti tri kaN+Ta/ /'di ni rtsa ba las byung ba'i/ /rtsa ba lnga ba bzhi bar bshad/ /
97b6(mdo 'grel): ku sha 'jag ma 'jam? bu dang/ /kun dza mu la dar ba ni/ /'di ni rtsa las byung ba yi/ /rtsa ba lnga pa lnga pa yin/ /ko sha pha la pa ru na/ /sha kru bi ra ha ru dang/ /rta ru zhes bya lnga pa ni/ /lnga pa'i phyi ma'i drug pa yin/ /sri rtag bar ni ba la gnyis//
97b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin su na sna ba gnyis/ /'di ni gcod byed lnga pa ste/ /bdun pa yin par rab tu bshad/ /rlung byed tsan dan tsi tra ka /sa ra de bzhin shing mngar dang/ /ku sha nas sha ma dang/ /baM? dza yan ti tra? ba na hi/ /dong ka ni ma pha lu ti /de bzhin?
98a1(mdo 'grel): ga bur sle tres dang/ /de bzhin sapta sarni dang/ /ma ha nimpa'i 'bras bu dang/ /nas dang rgya shug ku lad dang/ /'di ni 'jam rtsi'i sman sde tshan/ /'di dag thams cad sdus nas ni/ /chu bri bzhi nad? me chung la/ /legs par mchogS
98a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i srang brgya ni/ /rta ni mchog gyur pa la btang/ /bar ma rnams dang chung ngu la/ /bzhi bcas phri ba btang bar bya/ /sman khu de ni slangs nas kyang/ /bzhi cha lus kyi bar du bskol/ /yungs kar sha ra yu dra dang/ /pi pi ling dang bca' sga? dang
98a3(mdo 'grel): na le sham dang byi dang ka /sa ral dang thang shing dang/ /sug smel ru rta ha re nu/ /bya gran kha sha ma dang/ /hi ti pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /de bzhin yungs kar ser po dang/ khu tsi shel dang bong ba dang/ /de bzhin du ni ga ru rnams/ /chang dang
98a4(mdo 'grel): til mar gcin dang ni/ /de bzhin lan tshwa rnams dang ni/ /po son cha dang gzhan yang ni/ /'bras bu gsum yang gzhug par bya/ /de ni gcig tu spags nas kyang/ /mkhas pa yis ni gnas skabs su/ /rta ni ltos par gyur
98a5(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /ni ru ha ni btang bar bya/ /lgang pa tsha dang kha ra pa'i/ /khu ba la ni spangs te btang/ /rta yi nang dang tshe dang ni/ /goms dang stobs dang dus tshong rnams/ /legs par brtags la bzhag nas kyang/ /sman ni sbyor ba legs par
98a6(mdo 'grel): btang/ /lo gsum lon pa ni ru ha/ /srang lnga yongs su btang bar bya/ /rte'u dang rga na dang gzhon nu la/ /bzhi char dbye bas sbyangs pas bya/ /mchog la sman khu bre do ste/ /bar ma de la bzhi cha 'dri/ /chung ngu la ni de yi byed/ /'di ni
98a7(mdo 'grel): tshad gyi the sa ya yin/ /dang po reg na bde ba dang/ /de bzhin rno bro tsha bro btang/ /nad kyi tshul ni brtags nas kyang/ /gong nas gong du bskyed par bya/ /de nas nad ni ma rungs dang/ /gnas gsum dag kyang rjes rtag la/ /nad kyi
98b1(mdo 'grel): tshul las ci rigs par/ /sman gyi sbyor ba bya ba yin/ /ni ru ha yi rje thogs la/ /'o ma'i 'jam rtsi bde skyid yin/ /khar sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/ /shing mngar dang ni ma tu ka /shug pa btsod dang su shel rtse/ /tsan dan pa bla ge sar dang/ /tang thal dang ni dgun 'brum
98b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /sha ri ba dang til rnams dang/ /lo ma drang dang sbyar ba mi/ /'o ma'i 'jam rtsi bsil mo btang/ /'di yis khod par bde 'gyur zhing/ /lus yang yi ga 'byed pa dang/ /gcin rtug bye na ni 'gags 'gyur pa/ /legs par sel bar byed pa yin/ /sams
98b3(mdo 'grel): gsal ba dang bkres gyur pa/ /ne ru he legs mtshan nyid yin/ /sems bde snying stobs che ba dang/ /rta yi gzi mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lus la gnas pa'i rlung lnga yang/ /rjes su mthun par rgyu bar byed/ /rlung gi nad ni 'khyil ba dang/ /de bzhin 
98b4(mdo 'grel): rtug skam nad rnams dang/ /gzhan yang de 'dra ba yi nad/ /mas btang drag pos sel bar bya/ /pags nad sel cing dbang po gsal/ /de bzhin rim gyis sel byed de/ /nam mkha' dangs pa'i zla ba ltar/ /rta de skyon med par snang yin/ /ne ru ha nyes mtshan
98b5(mdo 'grel): nyid ni/ /nad ni brtan par gnas pa dang/ /lus lci zhum par gyur pa dang/ /phyen dang rta spangs 'gags pa dang/ /tsha bas che brlon par 'gyur ba dang/ /gcin 'gags spos par 'gyur ba yin/ /ne ru ha ni drags gyur na/ /rta yi rtug pa bde? 'gyur zhing//
98b6(mdo 'grel): khang pa gzur? gyis khyab pa dang/ /lus kun na bar byed pa yin/ khrim shin tu gsal grags pas/ /rlung ni rab tu 'khrug par byed/ /de las sbeg dang mdog ngan dang/ /dbang po shin tu zhum 'gyur ba'i/ /mrongs sing 'khrug pa nyid dang ni/ /
98b7(mdo 'grel): lus songs par yang 'gyur ba yin/ /dkar ba 'am ni chu la bab zhig pa'i/ /bad kan 'khru bar 'gyur ba yin/ /'di yis nad gzhir 'gyur ba yin/ /yid bde bar ni mi 'gyur ro/ /chu 'thungs pa'am khrus byas pa'i/ /de bzhin 'grangs par
99a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa dang/ /rlung ni gyen du bzlog pa dang/ /shin tu 'khrul bar byed pa dang/ /rta gang 'jigs pas nyen pa dang/ /gcod chen nad kyis btab ba dang/ /khur gyis shin tu dub pa dang/ /rte'u dang de bzhin gseb dang ni/ /khyad par du ni
99a2(mdo 'grel): sbrum ma dang/ /dug gis nyen dang chang 'thungs dang/ /du ba bcings 'khrul par 'gyur ba dang/ /lung pa dbugs mi bdes nyen dang/ /khrag dang mkhris pas nyen pa dang/ /ston dang sos ka'i tshe na ni/ /mas btang ba ni btang mi bya/ /
99a3(mdo 'grel): 'di yis phan pa mi skyed kyi/ /gnod pa mi zad skyed par byed/ /de nas mas btang byas pa yin/ /rta ni rlung med gnas su bzhag /ske rengs kyis ni btab gyur na/ /rjes su gso ba 'di bya ste/ /sa mdag ra shu ti dang/ /ru rta rgyas
99a4(mdo 'grel): tsha sbyar ba yis/ /bskus nas de yi rjes la ni/ /rde dang gseg mas dugs bya'o/ /sna sman gyi ni las rnams dang/ /me bca' yi ni las kyang bya/ /'o ma dang ni sha khu dang/ /sbyar ba'i zas ni sbyin par bya/ /gzhang kha na bar gyur pa dang/ /de yi
99a5(mdo 'grel): gso ba bshad par bya/ /bsil sman gyi ni lde gu dang/ /'dam la sogs pa bsku bar bya/ /mjug ma mtshan dang mgo bo dang/ /rna ba mjug ma tshigs kun bsku/ /kha zas bu ram mar dag dang/ /sbyar ba grang mo byin na phan/ /mar dang sbrang
99a6(mdo 'grel): rtsi rgun 'brum dang/ /khar dang sbyar sbyin bya zhing/ /gnas ni bsil bar bzhag par bya/ /de nas bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /gcin ni gal te 'gag gyur na/ /de la gso ba 'di bya ste/ /mngar ba'i sman dang sbyar ba yis/ /'o
99a7(mdo 'grel): ma'i 'jam rtsi de la btang/ /sman pas rta ni snum bcos dang/ /dugs byas nas ni du ha btang/ /mngar ba'i sman dang sbyar ba ni/ /'jam rtsi nye bar btang bar bya/ /tsha ba gsum dang sbyar ba yi/ /reng bu rno zhing tsha ba dang/ /lan tshwar ?
99b1(mdo 'grel): pa? tshan nas btang/ /des ni gcin 'gags sel bar byed/ /kha zas mar dang 'o ma dang/ /sbrang rtsi pi pi ling bcas byin/ /yang na phyed dang gsum ri dang/ /pi pi ling sbyar sbyin par bya/ /sman de dag dang chad dang sbyar/ /rjes su btung ba sbyin par bya/ /
99b2(mdo 'grel): 'bras mchan sa lu 'o ma dang/ /zhong sbyar kha? zas spyin na bsngags/ /ci nas 'dir ni 'der 'gyur ba'i/ /me bca' yi ni las kyang bya/ /gal te lus ni rengs gyur na/ /de la gos ba 'di bya ste/ /zas dang bsku dang btung ba dang/ /sna sman dang ni 'jam
99b3(mdo 'grel): rtsi btang/ /rtug pa gsum gyi dugs dag kyang/ /'di la legs par sbyar bar bya/ /gtang ka yin lis bya zhing/ /rlung med pa yi gnas su bzhag /sbyon 'byung po'i gtor ma dang/ /bdug pa dang ni mig sman dang/ /sbyin sreg gi ni las bya zhing/ /
99b4(mdo 'grel): bram ze dge sbyong tshim par bya/ /gzhan yang spyo ba gso ba las/ /bshad pa'i chog rnams kyang bya/ /de bzhin nad kyi khyad par gzhan/ /byung na'ang ci rigs gso bar bya/ /sha li ho tra'i grub pa'i gnas bdun pa las/ /mas btang ba'i cho
99b5(mdo 'grel): ga bstan ba'i le'u'o// //thub mchog sha li ho tra la/ /legs thos dul ba dang ldan pas/ /rkang pa la ni mgo sdugs te/ /dri zhing skul ba'i tshig gis smras/ /khyed kyis brtse pa'i phyogs dang ni/ /gnod par gyur pa
99b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang gsungs/ /gcags spyad kyi ni dbye ba yang/ /rnam pa drug tu yongs su gsungs/ /rtsa phug drags dang rgyus pa dang/ /tshigs la gnod gyur las nad gyur/ /'di dag gi ni mtshan ma dang/ /gso ba bdag la bka' stsol cig /
99b7(mdo 'grel): de nas bu yis dris gyur pa'i/ /legs ldan gyis ni slar smras pa/ /nad dang rus pa rgyus pa la/ /gnod 'gyur gsum po gsor mi rung/ /tshigs par gnya' bar rtsa'o cher/ /gnod par gyur pa gsor rung yin/ /bstan bcos
100a1(mdo 'grel): las rnams legs mthong zhing/ /rang bzhin brten la laS ma? byang/ /lag pa shin tu gams? gyur pa/ /de yis nam yang gnod mi skyed/ /rta rdzi las byung nyes pa yang/ /nag pa spyod lam 'tshol ba
100a2(mdo 'grel): las ?/ /nad kyi tshul ni byung gyur pa/ /de ni gso bar sla ba yin/ /gtsags bus bcad dam phug pa na/ /sman pa'i nyes pa las nad gyur/ /de yis dbang po ma tshang ba/ /'che ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /sman par ro? nad bu can/ /
100a3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du ba dang tsha bas nyen/ /smyos sam shin tu 'khrug gyur pa'am/ /rmongs pas 'khrul par gyur pa'am/ /ngo tshas?  'khums sam 'dar gyur tam/ /las la the tshom bcas pa dang/ /rgan po 'am yang na byis pa
100a4(mdo 'grel): 'am/ /yid mi bde ba'am 'jigs gyur pa/ /dam pa la ni mi bsten pa'am/ /gang zhig smongs par gyur pa yi/ /thos pa nyung zhing nga rgyal che/ /bde skyid mi sbyong? nor la sdang/ /glen zhing don ma yin la mkhas/ /sman
100a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan mi bzod cing smad do/ /yul la skam zhong khro la gdug /rtag tu rang gi don la brtson/ /bdag po'am ni bla ma dang/ /de bzhin legs par spyod pa na/ /'jom pa med cing dor mi lta/ /ngo tsha dang ni 'jigs pa spangs//
100a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis gso yang/ /rgyal po'i mdzod ni stongs par byed/ /de 'dra'i sman pa nam yang ni/ /rta yi gnas su gnyen mi byed/ /de 'dra'i sman pa 'drigs ldan pas/ /rta la mtshon gyis gnod pa skyed/ /tshad las
100a7(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i gnas nor ba 'am/ /steng dang 'og tu gnod gyur pa'am/ /phug grag pa 'am ma phug pa/ /rtsa ni blo ngan des mi shes/ /de bas phug ni drag pa yis/ /gnod ba bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /thag ni
100b1(mdo 'grel): phug grags ma byung na/ /dbugs mi bde dang lud pa skyed/ /'dug pa na ni na? 'gyur zhing/ /yan lag nyams dang gcong chen skyes/ /sha snying rma ni 'khrul ba dang/ /khong tsha sgrangs pa mi bzod skyed/ /sbu yang gshor bar 'gyur ba dang/ /rtsa rgyus
100b2(mdo 'grel): kyi ni nad skyed byed/ /nad 'dis srog ni 'phrog byed de/ /'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mtshan gyis gnad du phog gyur pa/ /dper na me dang gnas lcags sam/ /dug 'thungs las ni gsod pa ltar/ /rta ni srog ni zad byed yin/ /de bas
100b3(mdo 'grel): lus dang nad tshul dang/ /yul dang goms pa na chod stobs/ /dus tshigs lus rnams legs brtags la/ /sman pas khrag ni dbyung par bya/ /rtsa ni phugs drags ma phug pas/ /gnyis ka la ni nyes pa 'byung / /legs par
100b4(mdo 'grel): phugs na nad 'byin cing/ /sdul de las thar bar byed/ /gal te rtsa ni rang gnas su/ /ma rgyas gsal bar mi gnang ba'am/ /gnas min par ni phugs gyur pa/ /de las gnod pa skyed par 'gyur/ /rus ba rgyus pa gnad rnamS
100b5(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /mid pa dang ni rtse'i lha dang/ /de bzhin tshegs kyi sbral mtshams su/ /gtsags bu'i las ni spangs par bya/ /rtse'u lhang gnas su rtsa bcad na/ /de yi lus ni skabs 'gyur zhing/ /rtsa ba nas bcad shing lta bu/ /de ni 'chi bar
100b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba yin/ /tshigs kyi mtshams las rta la ni/ /gtar ka byas pas rtsa bcad na/ /de yis tshigs ni sgrangs 'gyur zhing/ /rtag tu 'theng ba nyid du 'gyur/ /mtshon gyis gang gi gnad du ni/ /rtsa pa cad de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur//
100b7(mdo 'grel): gang gis gtsags bu'i rtse yis ni/ /rgyus pa la ni gnod gyur pa/ /de yis 'theng por 'gyur ba 'am/ /'phral du dbang bo nyams par 'gyur/ /rus pa phug na chu ser ni/ /ser po slo ba 'dzag par 'gyur/ /glang po'i sna dang 'dra
101a1(mdo 'grel): bar ni/ /yan lag de ni 'khums par 'gyur/ /mid pa rkan la phug gyur na/ /de las gnod ba mang 'gyur te/ /rlung gis rgyas par 'gyur ba dang/ /yang na 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas nad dang rus tshigs su
101a2(mdo 'grel): byung pa gsum po gsor mi rung/ /gsor rung pa ni bshad pa gsum/ /de yi gso bar bshad par bya/ /de la phugs grags gyur pa na/ /snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bya/ /snum ni bzhi pos bskus nas ni/ /khrag ni slar yang skyed par bya/ /
101a3(mdo 'grel): khrag 'phel 'gyur pas na ba dang/ /cha bas gdungs par gyur na yang/ /'am bsil sman khu ba yis/ /bsku zhing yongs su blugs par bya/ /gnas dang kha zas bzang po dang/ /mngar bag dag gis de bsal bya/ /sman khu
101a4(mdo 'grel): bsil ba'i 'jam rtsi yang/ /sman pas sgrims te bya ba yin/ /bcag pa dang ni sman chu blugs/ /dus gnyis su ni ba ba yin/ /ji ltar 'ju bar gyur ba'i tshod/ /shes nas 'o ma'i btung ba skyed/ /chu la til mar blug pa dang//
101a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhi ljang pa sbyin par bya/ /de yi 'og tu 'di la ni/ /sna sman gyi ni las kyang bya/ /shin tu khrag mang byung gyur na/ /gdon bsrung pa yi cho ga'ang bya/ /'o ma'i 'jam rtsi bar bya zhing/ /de bzhin nas chag kha zas sbyin/ /
101a6(mdo 'grel): sman pas 'di la nas thug dang/ /nya sha yi ni sha khu sbyin/ /gtsags bu las byung nad rnams kun/ /sngar ni rnam par bshad pa yin/ /de las bshad pa'i bso ba ni/ /byas na'ang bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra
101a7(mdo 'grel): grub pa'i gnas bdud pa las/ /gtsags bu las gyur pa'i nad bstan pa'i le'u'o// //sha li ho tras bde gnas la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /rta bya'i cho ga ma lus ba/ /don gyi yang dag
101b1(mdo 'grel): shes par 'tshal/ /'o ma'i 'jam rtsi'i yon tan dang/ /'jam rtsi gzhan yang bstan du gsol/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /'di dag thams cad ma lus par/ /ngas bshad pa las shes bar gyis//
101b2(mdo 'grel): thog mtha mar bcas pa yis/ /rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis po dang/ /nad dang rgya shug ku lat+tha/ /ta bal yang ni bskol bar bya/ /yang na pi da ri la sogs/ /sman gyi sde tshan bsdus nas ni/ /chur bskol pa yi khu ba dag /tshad bzhan
101b3(mdo 'grel): du ni btang par bya/ /sman khu der na thal sman dang/ /gcin dang de bzhin zho kha chu/ /bu ram shing khu 'o ma dang/ /chad dang sbyar ba'i chad rnams ni/ /srog chags kun gyi sha khu ni/ /sman pa mchog gis gcig tu bsdu/ /de las
101b4(mdo 'grel): rta yis rlung nad ni/ /gso ba'i sman gyis spyad bar bya/ /gcin rnams kyis ni bad kan sel/ /thal sman de las lhag pa yin/ /bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ /de bzhin 'o ma sna tshogs ni/ /khrag dang mkhris ba sel byed cing/ /
101b5(mdo 'grel): rlung ni bde bar byed pa yin/ /nas kyi tshigs ni gsum sel ba'i/ /lde gu nga las nyan par gyis/ /shing mngar dang ni thang shing dang/ /sa ra la dang yungs kar dang/ /ru rta sug smel ha re nu/ /rgya spos dang ni bca' sga dang/ /da sna b+hya
101b6(mdo 'grel): ? bar dang/ /pi pi ling dang shu thag dang/ /de bzhin lan tshwa lnga po dang/ /ba son cha yi 'bras bu dang/ /til mar dang ni sbyar ba dang/ /'khru ba'i don duAng sbyin par bya/ /ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa yis/ /btab pa'i
101b7(mdo 'grel): tshe? ? nyid bya ste/ /dus su rtogs par gyur pa la/ /sman pas ni ru ha btang bya/ /de ni lan tshwa dang bcas pa/ /rnam pa gsum ni btang bya ste/ /dang po 'jam po nyid du bya/ /de nas phyir zhing rnon po bya/ /tshan? las?
102a1(mdo 'grel): bzhi chas chung ba dang/ /dro zhing lan tshwa chung 'jam pa/ /nad ni gdul bar dang por gyi /mas btang ba? ni 'di bya'o/ /tshad las bzhi chas b+hag gyur cing/ /che dro lan tshwa dang ldan ba/ /bdul? zin pa'i nad la ni/ /btang na da?
102a2(mdo 'grel): ni 'byin bar byed/ /sman ni mdang po dang ldan zhing/ /'o ma mar dang sbyar 'dad/ /sbrang rtsi legs bar btab pa dag /nad bsal zin nas sbyin par bya/ /sbyang byas gnyis pa byas pa yin/ /dangs ma rlung ni sbyon med byed/ /zhu?
102a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i gnas gyi mkhris bad kan/ /legs par sel bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lus kyi rlung ni lnga po yang/ /bde bar rgyu bar byed pa len/ /ji ltar thal sman bsrags nas ni/ /dri ma 'byin par byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin sbyangs bas nad
102a4(mdo 'grel): kyi tshogs/ /gting nas sel bar byed pa yin/ /sbyangs pas nad ni bsal gyur cing/ /khong ba dag bar gyur pa la/ /'jam rtsi legs par btang na ni/ /zla rgyas lta bur lus 'phel 'gyur/ /dug dang rgan po gzhon nu dang/ /chang
102a5(mdo 'grel): 'o ? ? par /chu ? yang? dang khu byas dang/ /de bzhin rtsub bag zos ba dang/ /gcod can dag dang rlung yang 'khyil/ /de bzhin skrangs pa reng pa dang/ /lud pa dpugs mi bde dmu rdzing/ /yid la mas btang las mi bya/ /gang la ni ru ha
102a6(mdo 'grel): gtong ba ni/ /rta de la ni nang par dag /lto stong nyid du bzhag nas ni/ /de nas legs btang nad gsal byas/ /'jam rtse cho ga'i tshul las ni/ /sngar bshad lta bur btang bar bya/ /nad dang bcas par gyur pa la/ /brta ba dag kyan?
102a7(mdo 'grel): bya ba yin/ /chad bzhin 'dzam rtsi btang ba dang/ /'o ma'i 'jam rtsi'ang btang bar bya/ /snum 'thungs ba las gang bshad pa'i/ /cho ga dang ni btung ba blung/ /snum gyi cho gas ro stod kyi/ /nad ni sel bar byed pa yin/ /de bzhin lus
102b1(mdo 'grel): gyi ro smad kyi/ /nang ni 'jam rtsi yel bar byed/ /sgeg dang gzhon cu rgan po'i dang/ /rta gang stobs ni zad pa dang/ /las chen ngag la sbyar ba dang/ /de bzhin lus bzung zad pa dang/ /ro smad kyi ni nad nams dang/ /nad ni tshags su zhugs
102b2(mdo 'grel): ba de/ /'di dag gis ni nyid gyur ba/ /'jam rtsi btang na bde ba thob 'gyur/ /khyad par du ni sos ka sbyar/ /'jam rtsi'i tshad tsam btang byas te/ /'di ni sbyor ba rjes mthun pa'i/ /'jam rtsi stobs ni skyed byed yin/ /rta yi bcud kyi
102b3(mdo 'grel): len dang ni/ /ro tsa rtas byed nyid du 'gyur/ /snga dro khrus byas skom blud la/ /bza' dang bca' ba byin gyur nas/ /sngar bshad ba yi cho ga yis/ /legs par btang na bde 'thob byed/ /rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis khu ba/ /de las rjes su
102b4(mdo 'grel): btung phyir blud/ /ram nye k+ti ra ka ko la/ /bi dza ka dang ri sha ba/ /ma sha mud ga bar ni nyis/ /me dang de bzhin sla gre dang/ /stag chor pa dang mu du ku /na ga ge sar pa ta ka /pri yang ku dang ga du ra dang/ /'o ma can shing shun spang spos
102b5(mdo 'grel): pad+ma'i rtsa ba sdong bur bcas/ /ka she ru ka sh+ri ga ta/ /ka ra bi ra utpal/ /bu shel rtse dang bseng phrom dang/ /tsan dan dang ni ba las/ /sha ri ba dang pa ti dang/ /ti la nag dang ni btsod dang ni/ /shug pa sri sna shar ba/ /'di
102b6(mdo 'grel): rnams lde gu bskol ba'i chu/ /'o ma dang ni legs sbyar ba/ /tshags kyis legs par btsags pa la/ /kha ra dang ni sbrang rtsi btang/ /pa sil zhing snyigs ma med gyur pa/ /mar dang lhan cig bsres nas rmi/ /bshang gci
102b7(mdo 'grel): rnam bar brel gyur gshar shar du bstan te mgo steg nas/ /drang por bzhag par gyur pa la/ /rnga ma g.yes nas bzung nas ni/ /blo dang ldan bas ma btabs bar/ /lan grangs gsum 'am lan lnga btang/ /'o ma'i 'jam?
103a1(mdo 'grel): rtsis gsal ba'i nang/ /sos ka sbyar tshe gsal ba mchog /mkhris pa las byung nad rnams dang/ /de bzhin rta yi khrag nad dang/ /ring nad 'ongs dang las kyis dub/ /dbugs rgod mgo 'khor gyur pa dang/
103a2(mdo 'grel): lus kyi phyi nang tsha ba dang/ /rims kyis btab dang snum pa la/ /'o ma'i 'jam rtsi btang gyur pa/ /lus kyi me drod skyed byed yin/ /rta gang mkhris pa can dang ni/ /mkhris pa rjes 'dres nad rnams sel/ /de bas tsha ba sel ba 'di/ /dus
103a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kun tu bsngags ba yin/ /sha li ho tra'i grub pa'i gnas pa las brta ba dang/ /'o me'i 'jam rtsi'i le'u'o// //sha li ho tra drang srong mchog /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /rta rnams la ni sna tshogs snum/ /
103a4(mdo 'grel): zas dang skom dang btung pa dang/ /de bzhin rjes su btung ba la/ /mang du ci phyir sbyin par bgyi/ /'jam rtsi yi ni las rnams la'ang/ /ci phyir mar dang til mar dang/ /sna sman gyi ni las rnams la/ /ci phyir snam ni bsngags pa lags//
103a5(mdo 'grel): snum 'thungs sbyang? ba nyes pa yis/ /nang du ci phyir gyur pa lags/ /khyad par mkhyen pa khyed kyis ni/ /'di dag so sor bstan du gsol/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /'di dag thams cad ma
103a6(mdo 'grel): lus par/ /ngas? bshad pa las shes par gyis/ /rta ni me dang rlung bdag can/ /las rnams kun las myur du 'gro/ /bskal pa chung du byas gyur kyang/ /rtsol ba chen po byas bar 'gyur/ /ma goms pa yi yul du ni/ /
103a7(mdo 'grel): rtag tu gnod par 'gyur ba yin/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang ldan bas/ /de phyir rtag tu snum bcos 'phrod/ /cho ga bzhin du snum byin na/ /stobs dang me drod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de ni rlung dang gcin rtug rnams/ /bde? bar
103b1(mdo 'grel): rgyu bar byed pa yin/ /don de'i phyir na gso pa la/ /snum ni rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /las ni ring por zhugs pa dang/ /yul khams du mar phyin pa yis/ /lus ni nyam dang gnas gyur cing/ /shing dang 'dra bar gyur ba'i rta/ /de la
103b2(mdo 'grel): mar dang til? mar dang/ /gang zhig kun tu bskus na ni/ /lus ni mnyan par gyur pa dang/ /las rnams kun la stobs ldan 'gyur/ /gang zhig rtag tu snum bskus pa/ /gnas ngan nyal ba ngan pa dang/ /bcings pa dang ni brdegs pa yis/
103b3(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal thams cad mnags bus 'gyur/ /dper na shing ni chus brlan na/ /myur du kun tu rgyas par 'gyur/ /rtsa ba nyid nas zugs nas ni/ /rgyas shing me tog 'bras ldan 'gyur/ /de bzhin rta la snum bskus dang/ /blugs ba
103b4(mdo 'grel): ba de ba skyed byed de/ /ba spu'i bu ga las zhugs nas/ /sha dang tshil ni rgyas par 'gyur/ /rtsol ba drag gyur nad la ni/ /zhun mar kho na bde skyed yin/ /snum 'thungs gyur pa'i lus la ni/ /rlung ni nam yang 'khrug mi 'gyur/ /de bas
103b5(mdo 'grel): rlung gi nad la ni/ /snum bskus pas ni bsngags pa yin/ /rta la mar ni blud gyur na/ /stobs dang lus zungs 'phel par 'gyur/ /pho ba'i ma drong skyed byed yin/ /stobs skyed re? tsa tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /dbang po gzi mdangs kha dog
103b6(mdo 'grel): gsol/ /du ? rmongs? ? gsel mchog yin/ /de yi phyir na rta la ni/ /mar blung pa ni mchog tu bsnags/ /zas kyi gong du snum byin zhing/ /rjes su btung ba'ang snum dag ni/ /tshang dang ldan pa nyid du ni/ /phyi dro'i? cho'ang? sbyin
103b7(mdo 'grel): pa ? ? du g.yan ba'ang sol byed yin/ /mchog tu rlung yang zhi byed la/ /bad kan lus gyur nad kyang ni/ /'di yis sel bar byed pa yin/ /bkres ba dang ni skoms pa dang/ /sdug bsngal kun la'ang spran? tshar 'gyur/ /
104a1(mdo 'grel): de bas rtag tu zas rjes la/ /snum ni nye bar glud par bya /sos? ka'i tshe ni til mar ni/ /cha gnyis dang sbyar chu sbyin bya/ /des ni dug pa mi 'byung zhing/ /lus pa dbugs mi bde mi 'byung/ /lus la nad kyi sam
104a2(mdo 'grel): tshugs shing/ /las rnams kyis ni zhum mi 'gyur/ /de bas chu dang sbyar ba yi/ /til mar byin pa bsngags pa yan/ /snum gyi sbyar ba thams cad las/ /'jam rtsi mchog ni yin par bshad/ /rta ni rlung gi bdag nyid can/ /'di ni
104a3(mdo 'grel): rlung sel byed mchog yin/ /'jug che rtsa yi sgo nas ni/ /lus kun la ni khyab par byed/ /des ni tshig rnams thams cad 'ang/ /rgyus pa bkur ni khyab par byed/ /de dag dang ni 'brel ba'i nad/ /thams cad nye bar sel bar
104a4(mdo 'grel): nus/ /ro smar? 'phra bar 'gyur ba dang/ /mjug to yangs par byed pa yin/ /gcin rtug 'gags pa'ang sel byed cing/ /lus kun bde bar byed ba yin/ /stobs dang gzi brjid 'phel bar byed/ /de bas 'jam rtsi khyad
104a5(mdo 'grel): bar 'phags /gcin nang rnams ni sel byed cing/ /ro tsa lgang? pa'i sgo sbyong byed/ /mngal gyi nad ni spyod byed cing/ /gsab kyi khu ba 'phel bar byed/ /khu ba zla mtshan skyon sel bas/ /mngal 'dzin par yang byed pa yin/
104a6(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma btang ba'i snum gdam/ /gseb kyi gcin nang rnams la mdags /rta yi sna nas sbum? btang ba/ /mig gi mthed stobs 'phel bar byed/ /rna ba mig dang sna nang dang/ /de bzhin du ni mgo nad rnams/ /rta la sna
104a7(mdo 'grel): sman btang na ni/ /nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nam tshod phan chad nad rnams dang/ /lkog ma ske dang mgor gtogs ba/ /sal cing yid ni bde ba dang/ /zas 'ju bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /ro stong stobs
104b1(mdo 'grel): ni che ba dang/ /rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi phyir ni rta la ni/ /sna sman? mchog tu bsngags pa yin/ /til mar gyis ni rta yi ni/ /rlung sel stobs ni skyed bar byed/ /shin tu tsha min dro ba min/ /
104b2(mdo 'grel): ni rlung 'joms mchog yin no/ /'di ni yi ga 'byed ba dang/ /gzi 'phel me yi stobs skyed byed/ /rta yi mdog ci? bzad byed cing/ /lus kyang mnyen par byed ba yin/ /myur du 'ju bar shes bya ste/ /til mar yon tan de dag ldan/ /
104b3(mdo 'grel): mar gyi tshe ni 'phel bar byed/ /nad kun 'jigs par byed pa yin/ /bcud kyis len dang ro tsar byed/ /snum rnams kyi yang mchog yin no/ /bsil zhing mngar ba snum pa dang/ /gdan 'joms dug ni sel ba dang/ /goms na srog ni
104b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin byed yin/ /de bas snum ni thams cad las/ /mar ni mchog tu gyur ba yin/ /phag dang brlan can chu na rgyu/ /sha za ba yi zhag dang rkad/ /snum mchog yin zhing stobs skyes pas/ /gso ba'i la ni kun la btang/ /zhag
104b5(mdo 'grel): ni kun gyis nang nas kyang/ /phag gi zhag ni mchog yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa sel byed cing/ /tas par byed ba'i dam pa yin/ /chu dang rlan can las byung ba/ /gang de dbugs mi bde ba sel/ /'bras bu za ba'i mkhris ba sel
104b6(mdo 'grel): lo ma zad? yi bad kan 'joms?/ /pa ba gling ma he? ra dang ni/ /de bzhin rta zhag rkang nyid de/ /zhag rkang bzhi po 'di dag gis/ /mkhris ba dang ni bad kan sel/ /shin tu stobs che'i rkang dan zhag /thams cad rlung nasd can la phan/ /de ltar
104b7(mdo 'grel): sman bas rlung gi mchog /bzhi bo khrig? par btang bar bya/ /sna sman gyis ni sbyo ba dang?/ /nyes pa rab tu bshad bya ste/ /chu spubs srid du? ser bcu pa/ /zhing du sor ni phyed dang gnyis/ /khong stod tshigs? ni gcig pa yin/ /
105a1(mdo 'grel): mdo ma las ni bya ba yin/ /tse mo rta yi sna 'dra ba/ /'jam bor byas na sna sman btang/ /phad na bal gtsang spangs ba yis/ /til mar pa tshir ti btang bar bya/ /ci skad bshad ba'i nad rnams sam/ /nad
105a2(mdo 'grel): med gyur pa'i rta la yang/ /tshang shes pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /ji skad bshad pa bzhin du btang/ /snga dro lto ni bkris gyur tshe/ /mkha' la sprin ni med ba na/ /sna ni drang por bzhag byas la/ /khar ba'i spubs las nas ru blugs/ /dbugs
105a3(mdo 'grel): phyud bas ni ma gnod bar/ /rgyun ni phra mor btang bar bya/ /mdo la snum ni blug gyur na/ /lung ba dpugs mi bde ba skyed/ srol? kod zhugs pas 'dzer byed cing/ /mig dang sna nas chu 'dzag 'gyur/ /mgo ni yon por bzhag
105a4(mdo 'grel): btang na/ /ro stod kyi ni tshigs rnams dang/ /bu ga rgyuas pa rtsa rnams su/ /go rims tsam pa zhin 'gro mi nus/ /gyen rgyu snum gyis bkag bas na/ /rta yi bu ga thams cad nas/ /rgyun lam 'gags par 'gyur pa yis/ /
105a5(mdo 'grel): ro steng kyi ni nad rnams skyed/ /snams 'dzag mog ba'i nad dang ni/ /gnye'u rengs lkog ma'i nang rnams dang/ /lus pa dbugs mi bde gcod can/ /nang rnams 'di yis skyed bar byed/ /tsha dang rlung bcas kha char 'bag khrus
105a6(mdo 'grel): byas zas skom zos? da'i bshud/? /skom gyis nyen par gyur pa na/ /sna spyan btang bas nad bskyed 'gyur/ /chog nyes pa 'di dag las/ /sna sman nye bar bsrung bar bya/ /sna sman btang zhing lus sbyus? dang/ /rta la snum ni
105a7(mdo 'grel): ? dmung ba dang/ /'jam rtsi btang bar gyur ba la/ /chu yis gang ba'i gnod ltar bsrungs/ /mchod dang rgyugs ba nyid dang ni/ /brtsol dang mi 'phrod za ba dang/ /khrus dang char dang rlun las ni/ /bsrung zhin kun tu
105b1(mdo 'grel): gdam bar bya/ /snum ni dri ma sel byed cing/ /nad ni 'gogs par byed ba yin/ /brtag par gnas ba skyon byed cing/ /g.yos ba rnams ni 'byin bar byed/ /de'i nad ni gsal gyur pas/ /mi stobs bri bar gyur ba na/ /nyam chung de
105b2(mdo 'grel): yis khas zas ni/ /lci ba myur du 'ju mi 'gyur/ /de bas las kyi rtsol pa dang/ /kha zas lci pa sbyin pa dag? /dang por snum ni 'thungs pa la/ /rtag tu spang bar bya ba yin/ /rtsol ba byas la hsadlud? gis nad/ /rnam ba du mar 'byung 'gyur
105b3(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /brad dang drug mdo rgal chigs rongs/ /sna chags mgo bo'i nad rnams dang/ /khung pa dbugs mi bar gcod can/ /lus ni skem bar 'gyur ba'am/ /'chi ba ru ni 'gyur ba dag /snum 'thungs rtsol ba sbyar las 'byung/ /
105b4(mdo 'grel): 'khru zhing rlung ni 'khyil ba dang/ /de bzhin skyid? nas rnam bzhi dang/ /gzhan yang lpags pa'i nad rnams dang/ /lus gzungs zad bar 'gyur ba 'am/ /khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad rnams dang/ /bar rkan gyi ni nad rnams 'byung/ /de
105b5(mdo 'grel): bas snum 'thungs gyur pa'i rta/ /legs pa kho nar bsrung? bar bya/ /snum ni legs bar btang gyur cing/ /spyod lam legs bar bsrung gyur na/ /nad rnams kun dang bral ba dang/ /yon tan thams cad rgyas par 'gyur/ /gnod
105b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur zhing/ /las rnams la ni zhum baN?/ /snum gyi sbyor ba legs 'gyur ba/ /srog ni gnad la gnas par 'gyur/ /lus kyi me stobs 'bar ba yis/ /kha zas snyoms par 'ju bar 'gyur/ /'di yis
105b7(mdo 'grel): lus gzungs rnams dang ni/ /stobs dang lus kyis yon tan 'phel/ /lus rgyas 'gyur ba med pa dang/ /mdog kyang gsal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gcin dang rtug ma 'phyen rnams kyang/ /'de ba kho nad 'byin bar 'gyur?
106a1(mdo 'grel): snum ni legs par btang gyur pa/ /mtshan ma 'di las shes par bya/ /snum chungs bas ni dri ma dag /'byin par dka' zhing nad dang bcas/ /yan lag skad zhing rgyu ba bul/ /lus gcin gcin ni dmar ba dang//
106a2(mdo 'grel): kha chu 'dzag cing bzhan ras ngan/ /me drod chung zhing nyam chung 'gyur/ /snum sbyar nyes par 'gyur ba yi/ /rta yi tshul ni 'di yin te/ /rta spangs 'grem par byed pa'am/ /yang na sla zhing med du 'dzag /'gro zhing 'dzag par byed pa'i/
106a3(mdo 'grel): shin tu 'tshor bar byed pa yin/ /spu ni shin tu bshor ba dang/ /pags pa'i mdog ni mi sdug 'gyur/ /de ni khong rtsub shes byas la/ /snum ni slar yang sbyin bar bya/ /kha zas rtsub bag zos pa 'am/ /shugs ni bkag par 'gyur
106a4(mdo 'grel): ba yi/ /rlung gi gnas las skyed gyur nas/ /lus kun tu ni khyab par byed/ /tshigs dang rgyas pa rtsa dang ni/ /bu ga rnams la'ang gnod par byed/ /de na rtag tu snum byin yang/ /nad ni bsal bar nus ma yin/ /nad ni rab tu
106a5(mdo 'grel): bsal ba la/ /lus kyi me tog? skyed bar byed/ /me drod 'bar zhing khong snun na/ /rtag tu nang med de nyid du 'gyur/ /de bas ji skad bshad pa yi/ /tshogs rta la snum sbyin bya/ /snum ni legs par btang gyur na/ /yon tan kun dang ldan
106a6(mdo 'grel): par bshad/ /sha li ho tra'i grub pa'i gnas te bdun pa las/ snum legs par btang ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i le'u'o/ //rta yi tshul gyi de nyid shes/ /rta yi bstos la mkhas shing/ /rta yi tshe yi rig byed
106a7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /rta la phan bar rtag dga' ba/ /sha yi ho tra 'bad nyid zug tshangs pa nyi ma me'i gzi can/ /dka' thub kyi ni gcod byas la/ /legs thos the tshom skyes gyur nas/ /de yi rkang gnyis la btud dang?/ /'dri ba'i tshul ? 'di dag
106b1(mdo 'grel): sgras/ /khyed gis lta yi bstan bcos su/ /jug du lus kyi gso ba dang/ /de bzhin rte'u gso ba dang/ /mtshon dang bsrung ba'i cho ga dang/ /dug gi gso ba nyid dag ni/ /yan lag drug ni legs gsungs na/ /byed kyis bcud kyi len
106b2(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /ra? tsar bya ba bka' ma gsal/ /rta ni khu ba mang gyur na/ /'gres yang rtsal ba che bar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin de dag nyid kyis ni/ /rgod ma rnams lang mos pa med/ /rgyu de nyid kyis blo ldan pa/ /gzhan gyis rta ltar byed ces
106b3(mdo 'grel): bshad/ /de bsal lar mil yang/ /rta ltar byed pa nyid ces zer/ /rta la de nyid mkhyen gyur pa/ /ro tsa ba ni ci ltar 'gyur/ /bcud kyis len gyis sbyor ba dang/ /de dag gi ni rgyu nyid kyang/ /legs ldan blo gros mchog gyur ba/ /khyed
106b4(mdo 'grel): las yongs su shes par 'tshal/ 'di ltar yongs su dris? pa na/ /legs ldan drang srong gis smas pa/ /legs thos 'di yi rgyu yi tshul/ /rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa yin/ /re zhig rta yi bcud kyi len/ /thog ma kho nar bshad par bya//
106b5(mdo 'grel): de ni cha 'phel blo skyed cing/ /skra dkar gnyer ma 'jig byed la/ /dpal ldan mdog dang kha dog skyed/ /na tshod 'thog pa'i dam pa yin/ /dbang bo gsal zhing mdangs skyed byed/ /dge zhing tshim la mgyogs par byed/ /de'i
106b6(mdo 'grel): rgyud dang bya ba la/ /thabs ni ? las shes par gyis/ /bcud kyi sbyor ba khyad 'phags pas/ /bcud kyis len ces bya bar bshad/ /lus gzungs rgyas par byed pa dang/ /nad rnams 'ju bar byed pa yin/ /dus dang dus tshigs
106b7(mdo 'grel): ? lo dang/ /yul dang stobs ni ci bzhin dang/ /rta yi khong po dag gyur la/ /snga dro'i chon blud par bya/ /bse zhing 'bras bu'i khu ba dang/ /'bras bu gsum gyi khu bar bsre/ /lcags phye dang ni sbyar bdag /pho ba'i me?
107a1(mdo 'grel): drod legs rtags la/ /shin tu bsil bzhag bcu'i bar/ /ma yengs par ni 'di la blud/ /nyer spyod dang ni kha zas dag /kun kyang bsil chos nyid du bya/ /'bras mchan 'o ma dang bcas zhing/ /sbrang
107a2(mdo 'grel): rtsi mar ni btab pa byin/ /de nas bse zhing 'bras bu'i khu/ /cha ni rim gyis skyed nas kyang/ /sngar bshad pa yi chog yis/ /zhag bcu'i bar du blud par bya/ /de ltar blud par gyur ba yi/ /rta ni snyoms bag skye bar 'gyur/ /
107a3(mdo 'grel): zhu bar gyur nas 'o ma ni/ /sbrang rtsi dang sbyar btung ba blud/ /de yi rjes la brag zhun gyi/ /khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar blud/ /me stobs la sogs brtags nas ni/ /de ni zla byed bar du sbyin/ /'ol bya gong mo sreg sha khu/ /
107a4(mdo 'grel): drug cu ba yi 'bras chan byin/ /kyi ra bul ka sle tras dang/ /bal bi dar 'bras bu gsum/ /bkol ba khu ba grang mo ni/ /zhag bcu'i bar du blud par bya/ /sbrang rtsi kha ra dang bcas pa'i/ /'bras bu
107a5(mdo 'grel): gsum gyi lde gu byin/ /nye bar spyod pa 'di yis ni/ /stobs dang stobs min shes par bya/ /sbyor ba 'di dag rta rnams kyi/ /bcud len cho gar yongs su bshad/ /nye bar spyod pa bsil ba dang/ /rtswa yang mngar po
107a6(mdo 'grel): bsngags pa yin no/ /cho gar ldan pa'i mar byin gyi/ /til mar lan tshwa sbyin mi bya/ /gnas ni bsal zhing bde ba dang/ /'jam zhing dben pa byed du gzhug /sman gyis dus kyi nyis 'gyur ram/ /yang na de ya gsum 'gyur
107a7(mdo 'grel): du/ /'jam rtsi? btang ba'i sbyor ba ltar/ /rta ni 'bad de bsrung bar bya/ /de ltar legs par sbyong pa yi/ /rta la bcud len byin gyur na/ /sngar bshad ba yi yon tan dang/ /de 'drar gzhan yang thob par
107b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rta rnams kyi ni ro tsa ba'i/ /chog yang dag mnyan bar gyis/ /ro tsa ba yi cho ga yi/ /dri ba khyed kyi legs par smras/ /ro tsa bar ni byed pa yi/ /rgyu ni 'di tsam nyid yin no/ /rta ni su yang rung ba la/ /ro tsa
107b2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni bya ba min/ /sbeg dang rgan dang nyam chung dang/ /stobs chung khu bzang pa dang/ /rgod ma dang ni sbyor 'dod la/ /ro tsa ba yi cho ga bya/ /de rnams yon tan bcas 'gyur gyi/ /lhag ma rnams la de
107b3(mdo 'grel): ltar min/ /khyod la yang dag bshad ba yi/ /yon tan 'di ni rim gyis nyon/ /yid bde shugs ni che ba dang/ /sbro ba che zhing khu ba mang/ /'jug dga' bu skyed pa la bzang/ /bu ni mang po nyid skyed
107b4(mdo 'grel): byed/ /lus drang mdzes shing mdangs ldan pa/ /ro tsa las byung yon tan yin/ /de bas rta 'am gzhan dag la/ /ro tsar bya ba de nyid nyon/ /legs par snum btang sbyang byas pa'i/ /khong pa dag
107b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur rta yin/ /khu ba legs bar 'phel byed pa'i/ /btung ba 'di ni blud par bya/ /'o ma dang ni bir ti/ /dzi da ka da ri sha ba/ /ma sha pirta? ram nye ba/ /ut+ma gupta nye'u shing/ /mung+ga sri tag bir+Na?
107b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /sa dang? ma du ka /me dang shu gan? pa nyid/ /rtso ra ka dang bcas pa dang/ /bskol ba'i khu ba grang mo ni/ /kha ra dang ni sbrang rtsir bcas/ /lde gu dang sbyar btung ba ni/ /snga dro'i tshe na blud par bya//
107b7(mdo 'grel): btul ba 'di ni zhu ba dang/ /'o ma slar yang sbyin par bya/ /bde bar gnas che ljang pa ni/ /sngar zhing dus su byung ba sbyin/ /de yi rta ni nyams brtas shing/ /rgod ma la yang gda' bar 'gyur//
108a1(mdo 'grel): pad+ma dang ni ku mu dang/ /dri zhim pa yi sdong bu dang/ /sun da ri ka bi da ri/ /utpa la da dang pa yasmya?/ /pa ta ri dmar po dang/ /sha lu ka yi sdong bu dang/ /ka she ru dang pad+ma'i rtsa/ /
108a2(mdo 'grel): 'bro go dang ni ma ga ta/ /sriM ka ta ka dang bcas pa/ /cha mnyam byas te sman khu bskol/ /de yi khu ba grang mo ni/ /khor dang ni sbrang rtsir bcas/ /at+ma gupta'i me tog dang/ /'bras bu dang bcas ? 'dra
108a3(mdo 'grel): blud/ /re zhu rjes la bskom blud cing/ /skom gyi rjes la kha zas byin/ /ma sha snum bsal legs par btsos/ /phyi dro legs par sbyin par bya/ /sa lu'i 'bras chan ri dags dang/ /bya yi sha
108a4(mdo 'grel): khur bcas pa sbyin/ /rtswa yang mngar po byin na phan/ /gnas ni mnyam zhing bde bar gzhag /'di yis shin tu dregs bod zhing/ /rta yi rigs ni 'phel bar byed/ /yang na sbyor ba 'di nyid dang/ /ba gzhon
108a5(mdo 'grel): rte'u rgan pa yi/ kha yar gyis ni 'o mar sbyar/ /rta de la ni blud par bya/ /'di yis rta ni dregs bod zhing/ /lan mang 'jug par nus phar 'gyur/ /sman 'di rnams kyi khu ba dang/ /'ol ba'i sha khu
108a6(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa/ /rta la blud par gyur pa ni/ /des kyang ro tsa nyid du byed/ /bsil na shin tu chags 'dod cing/ /rgol ma la yang mngon dgar 'gyur/ /at+ma gubta? pha ma'i rtsa// /btags
108a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i lde gu bsil po ni/ /'o ma dang sbyar blud na yang/ /shin tu ro tsar 'gyur ba yin/ /karka ta ka rgya mtsho'i lbu/ /de ni gtun nang brdungs nas ni/ /shin tu zhib par gyur pa dang/ /til ma dbang ni
108b1(mdo 'grel): gcig tu bsre/ /ahma gupta'i 'bras bur bcas/ /zas kyi rjes la sbyin par bya/ /bi da ra yi sngang bu ni/ /til mar dang bskol byin pa bsngags/ /ut+tsa ta yi phye ma btags/ /sbrang rtsi khar dang sbyor ba/ /
108b2(mdo 'grel): sna nas btang dang btung ba dang/ /'jam rtsir btang ba'ang bsngags pa yin/ /bskol nas zhag bdun bzhag pa yis/ /til mar gyis kyang bskur bar bya/ /skam pa'i srog chags lnga dang ni/ /rtsa ba sdong bu
108b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu dag /bsil zhing yon tan dang ldan pa/ /tshul 'di 'dra ba gzhan gang yin/ /de dag thams cad gzhan gang ni/ /ro tsa skyed pa'i mchog yin no/ /ra yi 'o ma nya dang mar/ /de bzhin mar yid
108b4(mdo 'grel): sha khu ni/ /g.yos su legs par byas pa dag /kha zas mchog ni sbyin par bya/ /rgyas dang bsdus pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /sbyor ba lngar ni bstan pa las/ /ro dang zhu rjes dus kyi cha/ /mkhas bas legs so
108b5(mdo 'grel): par brtag par bya/ /zas su ljang pa byan pa dang/ /chang blud pa dang bsku ba dang/ /utu? ta dang bi dang/ /at+ma gupta?  'bras bu ni/ /rtag tu 'di la sbyin bya yin/ /zhag gcig shin tu drag mi bya/ /ma stabs
108b6(mdo 'grel): gnas ni ci 'dra dang/ /nad gzhi 'dus tshigs ci bzhin du/ /lus kyi nyams ni ci yod pa/ /legs par brtags te bya ba yi/ /sngar ni ci sgang bstan pa yin/ /brta ba'i cho ga rnams kyang bya/ /rgod ma la ni
108b7(mdo 'grel): gso ba dang/ /mngal skyon sbyangs ba'i las rnams bya/ /'di ni bcud len dam pa dang/ /ro tsar byed pa nyid yin te/ /rta la gang dag dgos pa yi/ /dril pa ma lus bstan pa yin/ /legs thos kyis
109a1(mdo 'grel): ni yang smras pa/ /bdag la the tshom gzhan mchis te/ /rta la dangs ma skyon med pa/ /rim gyis lus zungs la 'jug na/ /ro tsa ba yi yon tan ni/ /zhag gcig nas 'byung khyod kyis bshad/ /
109a2(mdo 'grel): lus zungs rnams kyi mchog gyur pa/ /khu brgyud ni gang zhig gis/ /'phral du 'phel bar 'gyur bar bshad/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /ji ltar shing la chu blud na/ /de ni me tog 'bras bu la/ /nyin zhag
109a3(mdo 'grel): de nyid kho na la/ /khyad par gyur par snang ba yin/ /de bzhin sman gyi bcud rnams ni/ /'phral du nus pa bskyed pa yin/ /bu ram shing gi rtsa ba dang/ /bar dang rtse mo bye brag yod/ /de bzhin me tog 'bras bu sogs/ /
109a4(mdo 'grel): zhu rjes so sor gnang ba yin/ /yon tan nus pa tha dad pas/ /rdzas kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs yin/ /sbyor ba'i yon tan dbang gis na/ /'phral dang dus gzhan nus pa 'byin/ /'di ni mngon sum yin shes bya'o/ /rgyu dris
109a5(mdo 'grel): pa yang mnyan par gyis/ /dur byid dang ni de 'dra gzhan/ /mod la 'khru bar byed pa yin/ /'o ma mthas par 'gyur ba dang/ /po son cha yi 'bras bu dag /'phral du 'khru bar byed ba dang/ /thal sman gyis kyang 'phral sreg byed/ /til
109a6(mdo 'grel): mar mar gyis 'phral snum byed/ /ma sha 'phral du 'dul bar byed/ /chang gis 'phral du dregs pa skyed/ /'o mas 'phral du srog skyed byed/ /bse shing gi ni 'bras bu yis/ /la la smra ni 'phral du skyed/ /de dang 'dra ba
109a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag kyang/ /nus pa mod la 'byin pa yod/ /ra yi rdzas ni khyad par can/ /mngon sum gtan tshigs 'di dag gis/ /rdzas kyi zhu rjes nus ba ni/ /'phral du skyes par mngon pa yin/ /ro tsa byed ba'ang
109b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ /'phral du khu ba 'da' phel bar byed/ /sngar bshad pa yi sman rnams kyang/ /sbyor legs 'bras bu 'phral du skyed/ /'di ni slob ma min pa dang/ /log 'jug bu la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /smod par byed pa rnams dang ni/ /
109b2(mdo 'grel): sdig can la ni mi sbyin no/ /sha li ho tra grub pa'i gnas bdun pa las/ ro tsa bar byed pa bstan pa'i le'u'o// //rta yi chu sbubs gyur nad dang/ /blud bya blung mi bya nyid dang/ /gso ba'i gnas
109b3(mdo 'grel): ni yang dag nyid/ /legs ldan gyis ni bstan du gsol/ /bu yis de skad smras pa dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /gang tshe rta la 'o ma chu/ /chu sbubs sbyin gyur de yi tshe/ /nyes skyed 'o ma dang bcas pa/ /tsha
109b4(mdo 'grel): skyed mgo bor zhugs pa na/ /spos bdug mgo'i sbyar ba yis/ /des ni bsal bar nus ma yin/ /skam par gyur che chu yi tshad/ /legs par shes par nus ma yin/ /de bas chu dang 'o ma ni/ /chu sbubs las ni sbyin mi bya//
109b5(mdo 'grel): chu dang 'o ma de dag kyang/ /sman dang bcas par bskol ba ni/ /chu sbubs las ni sbyin mod kyi/ /ci nas gnod mi 'gyur bar bya/ /gang tshe chad dang 'o mchu/ /sbubs las blung pa'i shugs drags na/ /sbyor ba nyes par 'gyur ba'i rgyus//
109b6(mdo 'grel): mang la mang du zhugs gyur pa/ /de tshe lce dang lkog ma'i sbubs/ /shin tu bkod na drags bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin shin tu 'thor ba yis/ /srol gong du yang 'jug par 'gyur/ /de yi gyon rgyu'i rlung ni/ /myur ba'i
109b7(mdo 'grel): nad kyis lus snod byed/ /de las lung ba 'byung ba na/ /lkog mar gnas pas gnod skyed byed/ /gyen rgyu'i shugs kyis bskyod pa na/ /mgo bor yang ni byin par byed/ /de yis mchi ma 'dzeg 'gyur zhing/ /
110a1(mdo 'grel): mgo 'deg bar yang dka' ba yin/ /lce ni nag bor 'gyur ba dang/ /lung bar lu zhing skam par 'gyur/ /mig nyis rnam par 'gyur ba dang/ /sa la 'gre zhing 'dar bar 'gyur/ /pa la sha yi mdog 'dra
110a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /snabs ni sna nas 'dzag par byed/ /sna ba chags cing yid mi bde/ /lus ni dngul zhing zhum bar 'gyur/ /chu sbubs las ni gyur ba'i nad/ gso bar shin tu bka' ba yin/ /'chi bar 'dra ba yin na yang/ /
110a3(mdo 'grel): de la phan 'gyur gso dpyad bya/ /dang por mar gyis bskus nas ni/ /shin tu bsil ba'i sman chu blud/ /ta la'i 'dab ma'i rlung ga yab bam/ /goS ni gsheD paS g.yang ga bya/ /mar bskus nas ni sman bsil ba'i/ /lde guAm 'dam
110a4(mdo 'grel): gyis bsku bar bya/ /de 'phral tsha dang dbugs mi bde/ /rdul dang dub ba dang dral 'gyur/ /de nas dung ba bdugs pa yis/ /cung zad bder gnas gyur bya la/ /thang shing dang ni sa ra la/ /shing mngar dang ni
110a5(mdo 'grel): ga dur dang/ /pri yang ku dang tsan dan dang/ /de bzhin tam la bar+Ni dang/ /nag bus pa sngon yang/ /dug mo nyungs dang bya ma ka /sh+re ba ra dang spang spos dang/ /rdo dreg gla slang ma du li/ /shing rtsa dang ni smyigs rkang dang//
110a6(mdo 'grel): id+gu? de'i shing gu gul dang/ /ra sna ga bra ldong ros dang/ /bu shel tse dang ba la ka /sman ni 'di rnams cha mnyam du/ /legs bar sbyar bar bya ba yin/ /gzhan yang de 'dra 'dug pa la/ /bsngags par gyur pa
110a7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang brdul/ /rlung las gyur ba'i nad la ni/ /snum dang sbyar te brdul bar bya/ /bad kan gyi ni nad kun la/ /barta ki yi khu ba sbyar/ /kha ra mar dang sbyar ba yi/ /lkog ma bde ba'i sman yang sbyin/ /
110b1(mdo 'grel): sbu gu mdo la khong stong las/ /cha gnyis pa ni tshe tshad yin/ /bzhi chas phri ba bar ma ste/ /phyed phri ba ni tha ma yin/ /de nas rdza bum blangs nas ni/ /der ni me mdag gzhug par bya/ /kha bkag pa yi dbus su ni/ /
110b2(mdo 'grel): ser gcig pa yi bu ga btong/ /spu gu'i bu ga mnyam byas la/ /sbu gu bum pa'i bu gar sbyar/ /dos la bum ga phra gtad de/ /de las de ni bud par bya/ /'dab ma der ni bdug pa de/ /bcug la dud pa bdug du
110b3(mdo 'grel): gzhug /sman pa mchog gis du ba ni/ /legs par de la bdug bar bya/ /bdud pa bdug pa'i tshe tshad yin/ /grangs brgya'i bar du brtul ba yin/ /bar ma bzhi pas phri ba ste/ /phyed phri ba ni chung tshad yin/ /
110b4(mdo 'grel): rma la dud bas bdug gyur na/ /nang sel bar ni 'gyur ba yin/ /gang tshe sna nas ljan ljin ni/ /spi bag mang bo 'dzag 'gyur zhing/ /sgra ni 'byin par nus 'gyur ba/ /sbyang ba legs bar shes par bya/ /du bas
110b5(mdo 'grel): mgor song nad dang ni/ /rkan dang lkog mar gnas par yang/ /sel cing bu ga bad kan gyis/ /khengs pa'ang sbyong bar byed pa yin/ /rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed cing/ /so yi stobs kyang 'phel bar byed/ /dbang bo rnams dang lus
110b6(mdo 'grel): zungs dag /dangs zhing smon med byed pa yin/ /rlung gi tshil ni sel byed cing/ /sems gsal yig 'byed par byed/ /lhod pa rnams ni dam byed cing/ /gyong ba mnyen par byed pa'ang yin/ /gseb dang lam rings nas 'ongs
110b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /shin tu rgan dang sgom gyis nyen/ /zas rtsu bzos dang yongs su dub/ /khrag dang mkhris pa na ba dang/ /chu yi dmu rdzing can dang rtags/ /snum btang ba dang dug zos dang/ /rbeg dang 'jigs pas nyen pa dang/ /chang 
111a1(mdo 'grel): 'thungs pa dang nyam chung dang/ /'o ma 'thungs bar gyur pa yi/ /rta la nam yang dud mi 'dug /lkog nad nam tshod yan chad nang/ /lud pa snabs kyi nad rnams dang/ /skyigs bu mgo bo'i nad rnams
111a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /chu sbubs las gyur nad rnams dang/ /bad kan las gyur nad dang ni/ /de bzhin rlung gi nad rnams dang/ /pus tshigS nad rnaMs la yang/ /dud pas bdug pa bsngags pa yin/ /rta yi kha zas zos gyur cing/ /bsil bar gnas
111a3(mdo 'grel): la dud pa btang/ /dud pas nad ni bsal ba dang/ /sman pas rlung 'joms kha zas byin/ /'bras chan sbrang rtsi dang sbyar cing/ /'o ma bca' sga btab pa sbyin/ /pi tsu marda'i khu ba dang/ /bskol ba'i mung+ga nyid byin cing/ /
111a4(mdo 'grel): de la rtswa yi don du ni/ /dur ba nye bar sbyin par bya/ /legs ldan sha li ho tra yis/ /de skad ces bstan smras pa yin/ /sha li ho tra grub pa'i gnas de bdun pa las/ sbubs la gyur pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u'o/ /grub pa'i
111a5(mdo 'grel): gnas zhes bya ba gnas bdun pa rdzogs so// //rig byed rig byed yan lag mkhas/ /snying stobs ldan zhing dbang po thul/ /gso dang rig pa'i las la mkhas/ /rta yi bstan bcos pha mthar phyin/ /sha
111a6(mdo 'grel): la ho tra thub mchog la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /rta ni 'chi bar 'dod gyur pa/ /nad dang bcas par gnas gyur cing/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis bar dag gis/ /mtshan nyid legs ldan las rtogs 'tshal/ /'di
111a7(mdo 'grel): ni na tshod gang gi tshe/ /nad ni gang dang gang dag gi /rta ni 'chi ba nyid 'gyur ba'i/ /mtshan nyid de ni bdag la gsungs/ /de nas sha li ho tra yis/ /legs thos dris don slar smras pa/ /rta yi nges par 'chi
111b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur rtags/ sha yi mig can gyis shes dka' / /rim gyis brgyud de shes gyur pa/ /bshad kyis mnyan de bzung par gyis/ /mchu ltag sor ni bzhi pa la/ /der ni ri mo brtags byas te/ /khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /
111b2(mdo 'grel): de las 'chi bshes par bya/ /mi yi lag pa dang 'dra bar/ /rta rnams kyi ni mchu ltag brtag /gang la tshe ni yod gyur ba/ /de nyid bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /mchu lhag dbus mar ri mo ni/ /gyen du sor gcig gang la
111b3(mdo 'grel): yong/ /de ni lo gcig nyid la ni/ /kha nad kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de 'dra ba yi ri mo gnyis/ /sor gnyis pa ni snang gyur na/ /rta de nyid ni lo gnyis na/ /lce rengs kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'di 'dra ba'i ri mo
111b4(mdo 'grel): bzhi/ /mchu ltag du ni 'phred du snang/ /lo gsum nad ni 'gro ma nad kyis/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /'di 'dra'i ri mo dbus na dma'/ /rta gang la ni yod gyur pa/ /rta de lo bzhi lon pa na/ /'gram lkog nad
111b5(mdo 'grel): kyis mchi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi g.yon na ri mo ni/ /rtse mo yon po sor gnyis yod/ /rta de nyid ni lo lnga nas/ /ri dags glal gyi nad kyis 'chi/ /mchu ltag dbus na ri mo ni/ /sor gnyis tshad ni yon po yod//
111b6(mdo 'grel): gang yin de ni lo drug nas/ /a ba ti ga'i nad kyis mchi/ /gang gis ri mo 'di 'dra ba/ /sor phyed khar ni chung gyur pa/ /rta de lo ni bdun nyid na/ /gri shi'i nad kyis gdungs nas 'chi/ /ri mo de 'dra sor gsum
111b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ /rta ni? gang la snang gyur pa/ /rta de la brgyad lon nas ni/ /rim gyis nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi ri mo 'di 'dra las/ /dbus na nas 'dra sbom po yod/ /rta de nyid ni lo dgu na/ /rlung gi gzer?
112a1(mdo 'grel): gyis srog zang 'gyur/ /ri mo mchu ltag dang mnyam pa/ /gyen tu byung ba dbus na gnas/ /rta de lo ni bcu pa na/ /ske rengs kyis ni brlag par 'gyur/ /gang la ri mo 'di 'dra gnys/ /mchu
112a2(mdo 'grel): ltag dbus na gnas gyur pa/ /lo ni bcu gcig lon pa na/ /rlung 'khyil nad kyis srog zad 'gyur/ /gang la de ni sor gnyis las/ /cung zad che ba'i ri mo yod/ /rta de lo ni bcu gnyis na/ /gyen du log pa'i rlung
112a3(mdo 'grel): gis gsod/ /ri mo chur ni sor phyed pa/ /sbom po nas dang 'dra ba yod/ /rta de lo ni bcu gsum na/ /dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis 'chi/ /steng dang thad kar ri mo ni/ /mchu ltag dbus na gnyis gnyis yod/ /
112a4(mdo 'grel): yang na bya rog rjes 'dra ba/ /gnyis ni rta gang la yod pa/ /rta ni lo ni bcu bzhi na/ /'byung po'i nang kyis dus byed 'gyur/ /de yi bdag po'i nor dang 'bru/ /nyams par byed pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gang gi ri mo til
112a5(mdo 'grel): tsam ni/ /gyen du 'greng zhing dbyibs legs la/ /drang zhing gsal bar gyur pa dang/ /lta na sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ /gang gi mchu ltag dbus na yod/ /de ni gang gi khyim na 'dug /de ni myur du rgyal po yis/
112a6(mdo 'grel): drin skyabs nor dang 'bru 'phel 'gyur/ /rta de gang na gnas gyur de/ /grong khyer rgyal srid 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i rta ni rnyed gyur na/ /mchod cing yongs su bskyang bar bya/ /de ni de 'dras lo bco lnga/
112a7(mdo 'grel): bde ba kho nar sen nas ni/ /rta rdzi yis ni snang byas pa/ /de rjes srog ni 'dor bar 'gyur/ /gang la mchu ltag ri mo ni/ /'di 'dra dkar po snang gyur pa/ /de yang lo ni bco lnga nas/ /ba la sha yi nad
112b1(mdo 'grel): kyis 'chi/ /gang gi mchu ltag dbus na ni/ /ri mo sor ni gsum pa yod/ /de ni lo ni bcu drug na/ /lo legs nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ de lta bu yi rta de ni/ /bdag po mdza' bo'i nor 'phel 'gyur/ /gang la 'di 'dra'i ri mo ni/ /snyam
112b2(mdo 'grel): po gsum ni mchu ltag nas/ /de yang lo ni bcu drug na/ /rmig skrangs kyis ni dus byed 'gyur/ /de lta bu yi rta de ni/ /rtag tu bdag po'i don sgrub 'gyur/ /bu mang bar ni 'gyur ba dang/ /rta ni pha ma 'phel bar 'gyur//
112b3(mdo 'grel): steng gi char gnyis 'og mkhar gnyis/ /ri mo rta ni gang la snang/ /de ni lo ni bcu bdun na/ /mtshon gyis 'chi ba thob par 'gyur/ /de lta bu yi ri mo ni/ /gyen du lta ba gang la yod/ /rta de lo ni bco brgyad
112b4(mdo 'grel): na/ /khrag nad kyis ni srog zad 'gyur/ /ri mo gyen du lta zhing mnyam/ /snum ba bzhi ni gang la yod/ /rta de lo ni bcu dgu na/ /gcin 'gag pa yis dus byed 'gyur/ /ri mo mnyam zhing rings pa lnga/ /
112b5(mdo 'grel): gang gi mchu ltag mnyam yod pa/ /de yang lo ni nyi shu na/ /pag? nad kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang la rta phyis 'on ste nang/ /'dra yod de ni gseb kyi mchog /lo ni nyi shu rtsa gcig na/ /kha nang kyis ni
112b6(mdo 'grel): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi mchu lhag ri mo ni/ /cung zad gug pa yang gyur pa/ /de ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis na/ /klad nad kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mchu ltag lcag skyu 'dras brgyan pa /rgyal po la gceS dpal yon can//
112b7(mdo 'grel): ? rtsa gsum na/ /brang tsha ba yis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dus sbal chu srin 'dra gang yod/ /de yang rgyal po'i rjes mthun yin/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi na/ /rna ba'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rta ni gang
113a1(mdo 'grel): gi mchu lhag na/ /pad+ma'am utpal 'dra yod ba/ /bdag po'i nor ni rtag tu bskyed/ /lo legs par yang byed pa yin/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa ldan/ /gzhong 'dra'i nad kyis dus byed 'gyur/ /?
113a2(mdo 'grel): ni bskar bcas yod pa/ /bdag po'i nor dang bud med skyes/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa drug na/ /snum nad kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ba dan bcas pa ga la yod/ /bdag po la brten nor gter 'gyur/ /lo ni nyi shu
113a3(mdo 'grel): rtsa bdun la/ /sbrul gyis bzung ste 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang la mchod sdong 'dra ris yod/ /bdag po mchod sbyin gyis 'byor 'gyur/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad na/ /gzer nas kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
113a4(mdo 'grel): gang la ri mo blugs gzar 'dra/ /mchu ltag dbus na nye bar skyes/ /de yi bdag po mchod sbyin byed/ /sbyin stong rtag tu 'gyed par 'gyur/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa dgu na/ /mgo nad kyis ni dus byed 'gyur/ /g.yung
113a5(mdo 'grel): drung ris dang rin chen 'dra/ /gang gi mchu ltag nyid na snang/ /rta mchog de ni bdag po yi/ /dbal ni mchog tu 'phel bar byed/ /bu dang tsha 'o 'phel bar byed/ /bde bar rnam par rgyal bar byed/ /gang la 'di 'dra'i
113a6(mdo 'grel): rta yod pa/ /rgyal po de ni rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /bdag po tshim zhing bde ba dang/ /nor rnyed pa ni tshim byas nas/ /de ni lo ni sum cu na/ /khong pa'i srin bu'i nad kyis 'chi/ /'khor lo 'am rdo rje lta bu'i dbyibs/
113a7(mdo 'grel): rta gang gi ni mchu ltag nas/ /rta de rgyal po'i gzhon par 'gyur/ /bdag po'i rtag tu bde skyid byed/ /rgyal bos de ni zhon gyur na/ /dgra yi tshogs ni kun las rgyal/ /rta de sum cu rtsa gcig na/
113b1(mdo 'grel): nad med par ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang la mchu ltag dbus na ni/ /zla ba kham pa 'am nyi 'dra yod/ /rgyal po gang la'ang 'di 'dra yi/ /rta yod de ni 'byor chen yin/ /lo ni sum cu rtsa gnyis na/ /bde bar 'dug bzhin dus
113b2(mdo 'grel): byed 'gyur/ /gal te ri mo rtsub bam chad/ /dum bu yon bo yod gyur na/ /de ni bsngags ba ma yin gyi/ /drang zhing mdangs snum bsdags pa yin/ /de ltar tshe ni shes bya ba/ /nga yis khyod la bshad pa yin/ /de
113b3(mdo 'grel): dag shes kyang brjod mi bya/ /brjod na nyes par 'gyur ba yin/ /nye ba dang ni 'tshong ba dang/ /gso dpyad tshe'ang brjod mi bya/ /sha li ho tra'i mdo'i gsang ba'i gnas brgyad pa las/ ri mo las na tshod dang tshe brtag
113b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i le'u'o// //nad ni shin tu mi bzad bas/ /rta rnams zad par gyur pa na/ /bzhi nas brlag par 'gyur ba yin/ /bzhon ba'i sde las nyams par 'gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po rkam po rtsa/ /ganda ra dang ma traka/
113b5(mdo 'grel): sin du so ba'i ra dang ni/ /lho phyogs pa yi gtso bo sogs/ /rgyal bo dang ni gling bar ba'i/ /mi rnams gang dag yin pa dang/ /lus kyi skye bo thams cad kyang/ /rta yi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas nyen/ /sha li ho tra drang srong tshe/ /
113b6(mdo 'grel): de ni gnas su nye bar lhags/ /nyi ma lta bu'i gzi brjid can/ /de la dul bas phyag byas nas/ /rta yi tshul la brten nas ni/ /thams cad kyis ni dris gyur pa/ /sna tshogs nad kyis nyen gyur pa/ /rta rnams
113b7(mdo 'grel): shin tu ma rungs gyur/ /srog dang bral gyur nye ba na/ /de rnams kyi ni skyabs khyed lags/ /khyed ni rta yi de nyid mkhyen/ /ci nas de dag 'tsho gyur pa/ /de dag khyed kyis bstan par mdzod/ /de nas shin?
114a1(mdo 'grel): li ho tra yis/ /mi dbang 'khor bcas la smras pa/ /sems ni sdug bsngal gyis brdungs zhing/ /'jig rten 'di nas log nas ni/ /'jig rten gzhan du 'gro gyur ba/ /srog sbyin pa yi thabs
114a2(mdo 'grel): med do/ /de yi srog ni shes bya dang/ /'chi 'dod pa ni shes bya dag /shes la goms pa'i mig ldan las/ /sman pa yis ni shes par bya/ /blo med bstan bcos mi shes pas/ /gso bar nus pa ma yin no/ /gang zhig dus
114a3(mdo 'grel): las 'das gyur pa/ /de la sman pas byed med de/ /sems can kun la 'chi ba ni/ /bcos su med pa bdun na bstod/ /sems can kun gyi dus min 'chi/ /nad las byung bar gyur pa ni/ /sman dang sbyor ba rnams dang
114a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /sngags rnams kyis kyang bzlog par bya/ /gang zhig sngon gyi las kyis ni/ /tshe ni nges par zad gyur pa/ /de la lha sogs bcas pas kyang/ /bzlog par nus pa ma yin no/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba bzlog pa dang/ /
114a5(mdo 'grel): nad rnams bsal bar bya ba la/ /tshe yi rig byed yan lag brgyad/ /rtag tu nus dang ldan par bshad/ /nad rnams zhi bar byed pa dang/ /de bzhin tshor ba gsal gyur pa/ /'di dag sman ba'i las yin gyi/ /tshe yi bdag po
114a6(mdo 'grel): sman pa min/ /'chi ltas kyis ni zil gnon pa/ /'chi bar 'gyur gyis srog yod min/ /'chi ltas med par gyur na ni/ /de la 'chi ba yod ma yin/ /gang tshe dus la bab pa na/ /de tshe 'chi ltas mang du 'byung/ /dus
114a7(mdo 'grel): ni go bzlog gyur ba dang/ /rgyal po'i skyes skar mi 'phrod dang/ /sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa 'am/ /de bzhin rgyal po'i sdig spyod las/ /log par spyod bar gyur pa las/ /ltas ni mang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'chi ltas kyi ni
114b1(mdo 'grel): mchan nyid dang/ /nang ni sna tshogs de las 'byung/ /mi zang tshul can du min/ /srog ni 'jigs par byed bor 'byung/ /de tshe gso ba bsngags bcas pas/ /don ni ci bzhin byed mi nus/ /sman rnams kyis kyang nad kyi tshogs/ /legs par
114b2(mdo 'grel): sel bar byed mi nus/ /de tshe lha tshogs mchod pa dang/ /sdom pa gnas dang zhi ba'i las/ /sngags dang sbyin sreg gtor ma yis/ /nang kyis tshogs rnams zhi bar bya/ /yams kyi nang ni zhi bya'i phyir/ /sngar bshad pa yi zhi
114b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i las/ /byas pas bsrung zhing 'tshe ba bsal/ /des ni sna tshogs nad gzhi 'gyur/ /sman bas gang zhig mthong gyur na/ /rta ni nges par brlag 'gyur ba'i/ /tshe zad pa yi rtags dang ni/ /mtshan ma yang dag bshad par bya/ /
114b4(mdo 'grel): nad ni mi zad kyis nyen cing/ /srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba na/ /mtshan ma gang zhig snang gyur pa/ /de 'di ba las shes bar gyis/ /gang zhig ske bsdams lung ba lu/ /kha chu dang ni mchi ma mdzag /dku ni stod par snang
114b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /nang de'i mtshan ma ngan pa yin/ /gang gi lus kun skrangs pa dang/ /rmen bu mang po 'byung ba dang/ /gas shing 'dzag par byed pa dang/ /de la dring 'byung 'gyur te/ /bya rgod tshang gi dri 'byung ba/ /de ni ci nas 'tsho mi 'gyur
114b6(mdo 'grel): rnam g.yab par mi byed cing/ /so yang krig krig 'chab par byed/ /sems rmugs shin tu yid mi bde/ /mgo yang sprug par byed mi nus/ /mtshan dang lto ba skrangs gyur pa/ /rta de 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba chag cing zas mi za?
114b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin ris dran cing rdam 'byin/ /'dar dang mgo 'khor gyis nyen ba/ /skad mi 'byin cing 'dug mi tshugs/ /sems khang chud cin mchims dkrugs/ /tshe zad par ni shes par bya/ /kha nas chu sngon 'dra ba yi/ /
115a1(mdo 'grel): kha chu rgyun tu 'dzag pa dang/ /rta spangs rgyun mi 'chad par 'khru/ /gcin ni khrag dang 'dra bar 'dzag /sman pa mkhas bar gyur ba yis/ /de ni 'chi dang 'drar shes bya/ /rta gang sgra ni mi thos dang/ /
115a2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig mi 'phrod la brten la/ /kha zas dang ni bral gyur pa/ /de yang 'chi ba 'drar shes bya/ /shin tu 'khru zhing za mi byed/ /rgyab rengs yid mi bde dang ldan/ /gang zhing skur ni ltar byed pa/ /de yang sreg zad gyur pa yin/ /gang
115a3(mdo 'grel): zhig rtswa ni mi za bar/ /rgyun tu so ni 'cha' byed la/ /rkang bas sa ni brko byed pa/ /de yang 'chi bar 'gyur shes bya/ /gang gi kha dang sna nas ni/ /khrag ni rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /rdzi ma dmar bor snang gyur la/ /nye bar
115a4(mdo 'grel): gyur kyang mthong mi nus/ /mig ni dmar zhing 'tshum par byed/ /gcin ni khrag 'dra 'byung 'gyur la/ /sems khongs tshud par gyur pa dag /de 'dra 'tsho bar 'gyur ma yin/ /gang gi mig ni ser gyur cig /'khrul pa'i mig
115a5(mdo 'grel): gis lta ba 'am/ /rkang pa la ni rtog byed pa/ /rta de'ang 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang gi mig ni dmar gyur cing/ /dkar po'i cha ni mi mngon la/ /rab tu g.yogs par gyur ba gang/ /de yang myur du ma rungs 'gyur/ /'gro
115a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshen rnam par 'khyor/ /rkang pa 'jug par mi nus shing/ /'tshe'u tshe 'khums bar byed pa dang/ /gnye'u rengs gyur de mi 'tsho/ /rtsibs logs dag ni re re yis/ /yang dang yang du 'gro byed cing/ /gsus che mchu 'phyang
115a7(mdo 'grel): lce nag bas/ /'gro bar byed pas de mi 'tsho/ /'gro bzhin du ni lci ba dang/ /dku la yang dang yang du blta/ /kha nas btang bar gyur pa rnams/ /sna nas 'byung bar byed pa dang/ /mig gis mthong bar mi nus shing/ /rnam dug
115b1(mdo 'grel): kyang rengs gyur ba/ /de ni 'chi ba dang 'dra bas/ /sman gyi sbyor bar mi bya'o/ /gang zhig rlung 'khyil drag tu sbo/ /yang dang yang du drag tu 'khru/ /'khru ba ring du 'byin byed cing/ /'khrus nas slar yang sbob dang/ /gcin dang rtug bzang gyur
115b2(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /chwa ni za bar mi byed pa/ /de yang 'chi ba dang 'dra bas/ /sman gyi sbyor bar mi bya'o/ /gang gis rdog ma 'thor gyur cing/ /skur ni lta bar byed pa dang/ /lce kan kha dang mchu gnag cing/ /'gram pa mthas par gyur pa dang/ /pags ba
115b3(mdo 'grel): spu dang lus dri dang/ /'jig rten pha rol 'gror shes bya/ /khra yi tshad 'dra sha rul ba 'am/ /mda' sgro sregs pa la tu yi/ /dri ni gang la yod gyur pa/ /de yang 'chi bar shes par bya/ /gang la sdo dang g.yan pa sogs/ /pags nad byung
115b4(mdo 'grel): bar gyur pa na/ /pags ba nag po nyid 'gyur zhing/ /spu yi tshogs kyang byi nas ni/ /chu ser shas ni che ba yi/ /khrag ni 'dzag bar byed gyur pa/ /de mthong nas ni zla gsum nas/ /lhag mi 'tsho bar shes par bya/ /lus
115b5(mdo 'grel): ni rtog tu rengs ba dang/ /kha nas kha chu'i rgyun mdzag cing/ /yang dang yang du sgra 'byin pa'i/ /'jig rten pha rol par shes bya/ /rta gang kha skams lce dang ni/ /rkan dang mchu ni nag por 'gyur/ /mi ro lta bu'i dri 'byung ba/ /de
115b6(mdo 'grel): yang ? dang 'dra shes bya/ /gang gi 'brus lkog mar dang ni/ /rab skrangs mgo bo'i nad kyis btag /kha chu mdog ni du ma 'dzag/ /de yang 'tsha ba dang 'drar bshad/ /gang zhig lung du? mi bzod lu/ /gang du gnas par rnam par 'dres/ /dbugs mi
115b7(mdo 'grel): bde zhing? 'dzag pa/ /de 'dra ba yang 'tsho? mi 'gyur/ /zad byed nad kyiS btab gyur kyang/ /yid bde lta bur byed gyur pa/ /gang la mtshan nyid 'di yod pa/ /de yang 'chi bar shes par bya/ /mdog dang stobs dang skad gsang nyams/ / 
116a1(mdo 'grel): mig dang sna dang lus skrang zhing/ /rna ba mjug ma bskyong mi shes/ /de yang 'chi ba shes par bya/ /gang zhig mgo dang de bzhin du/ /ro stod bskyod par gyur pa dang/ /lud pa lu tshi kha nas ni/ /khrag ni 'gyur bar byed pa dang/ /lus skrangs gcin
116a2(mdo 'grel): ni dmar ba 'byung/ /de yang ro dang 'dra ba yin/ /rta gang gcin mang sna tshogs pa'i/ /mdog can mang du 'byung 'gyur la/ /rtswa ni ci yang mi za ba/ /de yang ro dang 'dra ba yin/ /snying ga skrangs pa dang bcas pas/ /shin tu mi bzang lud pa lu// sman pa mkhas bas
116a3(mdo 'grel): mthong gyur na/ /'di ni mi 'tsho zhes bstan bya/ /rta gang ske ni yang yang skyod/ /'dar zhing mig ni dmar ba dang/ /lus lci yan lag rengs gyur pa/ /de yang 'chi bar 'gyur zhes bya/ /gang gi bu ga'i sgo skya zhing/ /mchu ltag skrangs par gyur pa dang/ /mig ni thur
116a4(mdo 'grel): du 'gebs shing 'gro/ sbu ni shin tu gshor gyur pa/ /yid mi bde bas rings du 'dug /phrag so'i steng ni skam por snang/ /gnye'u rengs kyis kyang btab gyur pa/ /rta de'ang 'tshe bar 'gyur ma yin/ /rtsol ba chung zhing chu nyung 'thung/ /zas kyang za bar mi byed
116a5(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /rta spangs gcin ni mang gyur pa/ /de yang ro dang 'dra shes bya/ /gang zhig tshul ni 'di 'dra ba'i/ /'chi ltas snang bar gyur pa na/ /de yang legs par snang gyur na/ /gzhan du 'gyur bde ma yin/ /nad pa gang dag lus 'jam zhing/ /mdog dang spyod pa mang 'gyur la/ /mig dang spyod pa skyon med na/ /thams cad du yang spyod pa yang/ /ro drang dus ni ci bzhin shes/ /gcin rtug gnod pa med par 'byung/ /sa la 'gre bar gyur nas ni/ /slar yang chur 'jug par mi byed/ /sman gyi sbyor ba byas
116a6(mdo 'grel): pa na/ /phan dang gnod pa'i khyad par snang/ /da ni gso ba'i las rnams la/ /grub pa'i 'bras bu yod pa yin/ /de ltar gsor rung gsor mi rung/ /shes nas gso ba'i las rnams brtsam/ /de ltar shes nas gang spyod pa/ /sman pa des ni las grub
116b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /gso ba'i bya ba byas kyang ni/ /'tsho bar mi 'gyur 'chi 'dod pa// /de la sman gyi sbyor ba ni/ /yon tan skyed par 'gyur ma yin/ /'chi ltas kyi ni mtshan nyid 'di/ /yon tan med la sbin mi bya/ /bu dang slob ma yon tan gyi/ /snod ldan rnams la sbyin bar
116b2(mdo 'grel): bya/ /'chi ltas byung ba gsang ba ni/ /nam yang su la'ang brjod mi bya/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas de brgyad pa las nad kyi 'chi ltas bstan ba'i le'u'o// //sha li ho tra drang srong che/ /rta yi khang pa la dga' ba/ /thos ldan bu ni
116b3(mdo 'grel): legs thos kyi/ /tshig ni 'di skad smras par gyur/ /nad dang ldan pa'i 'chi ltas rnams/ /'di dag legs par thos lags na/ /nad med rnams kyi 'chi ltas kyang/ /go rim bzhin du bstan par mdzod/ /de skad dris tshe legs ldan ni/ /sha li ho tras slar
116b4(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ /nad med rnams kyi 'chi ltas kyang/ /legs thos des par mnyan par gyis/ /rta gad nad ni med bzhin du/ /lus kyi nyams ni 'gribs pa dang/ /yid mi bde zhing sems khongs chud/ /phyin ci log tu snang gyur la/ /'tsher yang log par 'cher
116b5(mdo 'grel): byed cing/ /log pa kho nar mthong par byed/ /dbugs kyang de 'dra snang gyur cing/ /lus ni de ltar mi sdug 'gyur/ /de mthong na ni skran pa yi/ /'chi bar nges par shes par bya/ /mang du za yang nyon mongs byed/ /kha chu mang du 'dzag byed la/ /gcin
116b6(mdo 'grel): dang tug pa nyung gyur pa/ /de yang myur du brlag par 'gyur/ /nyi ma'am yang na mar me 'am/ /zla ba 'am ni chu nang du/ /gang gi grib ma mi mngon pa'am/ /yang na mun pa'i nad du ni/ /shin tu rings dam thung bar snang/ /de yang myur du 'jig
116b7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'gro bar byed pa na/ /grib ma rgyab tu phyogs gyur pa'i/ /yang na nyis 'gyur snang gyur pa/ /rta de'ang 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /phag gam de bzhin rnga mo 'am/ /khyi dang 'dra ba snang 'gyur zhig/ /mi sdug rnga dang mi
117a1(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba'i/ /grib ma gdal snang 'gyur ba/ /de yang yun ring nad kyis ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba kho na yin/ /shin tu dangs pa'i tshul yang/ /gzugs rnyan snang bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /skyon dang bcas par snang
117a2(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /de yang myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang gi gmo ni stong smad dag /mi 'dra bar ni snang gyur la/ /rtswa nyung za zhing chu la dga' / /de yang myur du srog 'jig 'gyur/ /gang gi mig ni mchims khengs/ /de bzhin dbang po phog par 'gyur/
117a3(mdo 'grel): gang gis lus ni shin tu zhum/ /skom gyis gdungs ba lta bur snang/ /sbrang bu rnams ni 'dus nas kyang/ /rgyun tu tshor ba mi bzang skyed/ /de lta bu yi rta de ni/ /srog zad par ni shes par bya/ /gang zhig rna bsam thos shing/ /dbang po nyams par
117a4(mdo 'grel): snang gyur la/ /rtswa yang nyung du za byed pa/ /de yang myur du 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /gang gi rna ba rengs sa nas ni/ /shin tu 'greng bar snang pa dang/ /yang dang yang du 'dug byed cing/ /dran pa yang yang dang yang du stor/ /mig kyang ling thog dag gis ni
117a5(mdo 'grel): khebs pa lta bur snang gyur pa/ /shin tu ltong par snang ba dang/ /rnam par skyod par mi shes la/ /rnyogs can tshad ni chen por snang/ /de yang myur du ma rungs 'gyur/ /gang zhig shin tu skrag pa ltar/ /rgyu sdud 'gug par snang ba dang/ /
117a6(mdo 'grel): lce yang srang zhing rengs gyur pa/ /de yang myur du 'chi par 'gyur/ /spangs bar gyur pa ma yin yang/ /shin tu sgrangs pa ltar scang? la/ /rta ni gang la snang bar 'gyur/ /de ni yun rings 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig pad+ma dkar 'dra ba'i/ /mig
117a7(mdo 'grel): ni rnam par khyab ltar snang/ /rab rib yod kyang mthong gyur pa/ /de yang myur du 'chi par 'gyur/ /mong la stobs dang ldan gyur zhing/ /sbyod pa la yang thags thogs med/ /de nas myur du lus zhum pa/ /de yang myur du 'chi bar 'gyur//
117b1(mdo 'grel): gang zhig khrus ni byas mong la/ /dad pa snying ga skams gyur zhing/ /lus kun rlon par gnas gyur pa/ /de ni zla phyed las mi 'tsho/ /gsos kyang ltas par ni byed kyi/ /'grib pa tshabs cher snang gyur la/ /stobs dang mdog ni med gyur ba/ /de yang yun rings 'tsho
117b2(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ /byin 'phur bar gyur ba na/ /yun rings blta zhing 'bred 'dod la/ /dran pa nyams kyang dga' dga' ltar/ /yang dad yang du 'tshe bar byed/ /rta de tsha ni thug zin bas/ /ring por thub par 'gyur ma yin/ /bu ga'i tshogs rnams skams gyur zhing/ /blo
117b3(mdo 'grel): yang shin tu 'gribs par 'gyur/ /lus kyi khrag kyang 'gribs gyur cing/ /spyi bag yod kyang 'byar mi btub/ /lus las dri ni ma zhim 'byung/ /skad gsang mdog kyang nyams gyur ba/ /lus kyi kyang ni tsha grang dang/ /'jam rtsub tshor bar ma gyur ba'am//
117b4(mdo 'grel): phyin ci log du byed gyur pa/ /rta de'ang 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /zas dang spyod tshul thams cad la/ /thams cad du ni 'gyur ba ston/ /blo dang ldan pas de lta bu/ /sems nyams par ni shes par bya/ /mtshan mar snang ba 'di dag gis/ /nyams par 'gyur
117b5(mdo 'grel): bar shes par bya/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /nad med pa'i 'chi ltas bstan pa'i le'u'o// //sha li ho tra drang srong mchog /bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med pa/ /thos ldan bu ni legs thos kyis/ /dul
117b6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pas dres gyur pa/ /pho nya 'ongs dang li dang ni/ /khyim du 'jug tshe shes bya dang/ /nang la mthong bar gyur pa dang/ /las ni rtsom par gyur pa na/ /shis dang mi shis mtshan nid dag /'di ni legs ldan bstan pa'i rigs/ /bu yis de skad
117b7(mdo 'grel): bris pa dang/ /sha la ho tras slar smras pa/ /'di ni rta'i pho nya yis/ /mtshan nyid nga yis bshad par bya/ /nad pa 'am zhum pa'am rtags can nam/ /yang na gos ni dri ma can/ /sdang dang gdug pa'i las can dag /pho nyar 'ongs pa mthong gyur
118a1(mdo 'grel): na/ /sman pa mchog gis na ba yis/ /rta de 'chi bar shes par bya/ /nad pa'i don du pho nya ni/ /rta dang rnga mo mi la ni/ /zhon te 'ongs par mthong gyur na/ /rta de 'chi bar shes par bya/ /pho nyar bud med 'ongs pa 'am/ /
118a2(mdo 'grel): mgor regs skra 'ching ral ba can/ /gos ni rdul can gyon pa'am/ /yang na nag gam rnyog can gyon/ /mthong na sman pas rta gso'i phyir/ /der ni 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /gang zhig gong dmar rlogs pa yis/ /lus ni kun nas dkris gyur cing//
118a3(mdo 'grel): sman pas dris par gyur pa na/ /med ces bya ba'i tshig smra dang/ /so 'dar ba dang de bzhin du/ /sen mo phan tshun 'dar byed la/ /skra dang kha spu rgyun med par/ /shin tu spug cing nyed byed pa'i/ /pho nya 'ongs par mthong gyur na/ /sman pa der mi 'gro mi
118a4(mdo 'grel): bya/ rtswa dang shing dang rdo ba dag /gcod dam bcog bar byed pa'am/ /yang na bcog cing nyed ba 'am/ /skra dang thal ba 'thor byed ba/ /de lta bu yi tshul ston pa/ /yongs su spang bar bya ba yin/ /thal ba phyag dar sel phub dang/ /gyo mo 'dir bar
118a5(mdo 'grel): byed bzhin du/ /pho nya 'ongs par gyur na ni/ /de ni don ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /skyes bu lag na 'khar thogs na/ /khros pa'am shin tu zhus pa'am/ /yang na mig ni mchi mas khengs/ /gos dang 'phreng ba dmar po thogs/ /gang gi pho nya 'di
118a6(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba// /rta ni de ru 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /sna bcas yanlag nyams pa dang/ /yang na cung zad tshigs gyur ba/ /kha nas mi shis tshig smra ba'am/ /yang na yid la mi dge sems/ /sman pa nyams tshe yongs gyur na/ /de yang gnes par brlag
118a7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /shi 'o tshig go nyams so zhes/ /gtam ni sgrog par byed pa 'am/ /mi shes pa ni gzhan smra ba/ /pho nya nges kyang 'chi 'dod ston/ /pho nya gang gi mdun na ni/ /mtshun gtor byed pa'i rdzas thogs pa'am/ /shing rta chags
118b1(mdo 'grel): gyur mthong na ni/ /de yang spang bar bya ba yin/ /gang gi mdun na chu yin no/ /bum pa chag pa mthong gyur pa/ /nad pa de ni 'chi 'dod cing/ /'jig rten gzhan du 'gro shes bya/ /sogs phub mnya'i rus pa/ /skra dang sha dang sen mo so/ /shib ma gtun dang
118b2(mdo 'grel): mchil lham dang/ /thal ba dang ni phyag dar dang/ /rtswa dang shing dang sol ba dang/ /bong ba la yang reg byed dang/ /shi dang sngon po'i gos gyon pa 'am/ /mi ro'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'am/ /bcom dang nyams dang brlag ba dang/ /tshigs dang chags dang de bzhin
118b3(mdo 'grel): shing/ /de la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang/ /mthong dam thos sam reg gyur pa/ /pho nya 'ongs pa'i thog mar ni/ /snang bar gyur na de mi 'tsho/ /pho nya 'ongs par gyur pa na/ /rta yi tshul ni dris pa'i tshe/ /nan gyis mi shes smrar bcug pa/ /de 'dir brtag
118b4(mdo 'grel): par bya ma yin/ /po nya 'ongs par gyur pa'i tshe/ /ro ni yid du mi 'ongs pa 'am/ /yang na bshang ba 'am gci ba yi/ /dri ma blo bur byung gyur pa'am/ /dri ba'i tshe na byung gyur na/ /sman bas de ni spang bar bya/ /gso ba'i gnas su song ba dang/ /nad pa mthong
118b5(mdo 'grel): bar gyur pa dang/ /las ni rtsom par byed pa dang/ /mtshan ma mthong bar bshad par bya/ /smod mo 'debs pa 'am brdeg pa 'am/ /bzlog pa'am ni smod pa'am/ /gos dang gtsug tor stod g.yogs dang/ /phyugs dang bya yi tshogs rnams dang//
118b6(mdo 'grel): shing rta dang ni glang po che/ /de 'dra 'jigs par 'gyur pa dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dag/ bsgreng ba 'gyel bar mthong ba dang/ /snod ni gang bar gyur ba dag /mngon sum du ni chags gyur pa/ /bcom dang yid du mi 'od dang/ /mchil
118b7(mdo 'grel): ma thal ba 'thor ba dang/ /lam ni 'gegs par thong gyur na/ /nad pa yin ni srog zad 'gyur/ /'jug tshe bum pa gang dang me/ /rgun 'bru'i 'bras bu mar dang ni/ /khyu mchog bram ze rin po che/ /lha ni phyir 'byung mthong gyur na/ /sman pas
119a1(mdo 'grel): der ni na ba yi/ /rta de 'tshor mi 'gyur shes bya/ /thal bas gang ba'i snod dang ni/ /kun nas chag bar gyur pa dang/ /nyam chung ba 'am chag gyur pa/ /thal ba phub ma sol ba dag/ khyim gang du ni 'jug mthong na/ /der ni rta
119a2(mdo 'grel): de 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /zas dang skom dang sman rnams ni/ /de bzhin longs spyod gzhan dag ni/ /ral byed pa ltar byed na/ /rta de 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nad pa'i gnan gnas pa dag /phan tshun spyod par byed pa na/ /shin tu rmongs pa ltar 'jug
119a3(mdo 'grel): na/ /de yi srog kyang rnyed par dka' / /dud pa sol ba 'thor byed dang/ /de bzhin khri ni bcog pa dang/ /speng pa 'am yang na mi snyan smra/ /yang na snod ni bcog pa 'am/ /gso ba las ni zlog byed pa/ /gal te sman pas mthong gyur na/ /der
119a4(mdo 'grel): yang nad ba de yi ni/ /srog zad gyur bar shes par bya/ /thal bas bskus ba 'am chig pa 'am/ /'dam gyis bskus par gyur pa 'am/ /smon pa 'am rdza mkhan mthong gyur na/ /de ni 'chi bar ston pa in/ /skyes bu gdol pa mthong ba
119a5(mdo 'grel): dar/ /yang na til mar gyis bsku mthong/ /shin tu nyams par mthong gyur na/ /de yang ma rungs gyur shes bya/ /blo bur nas ni dring ba/ /byung na de ni 'chi gar 'gyur/ /sman pa yi ni mngon sum du/ /bram ze'i khyim nas chu yi ni/ /mar
119a6(mdo 'grel): snod thogs te song gyur na/ /de yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ma yin/ /gang zhig a rtsom de bzhin du/ /mjug ma nyed cing phyi byed na/ /de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong na yang/ /srog zad par ni shes par bya/ /sman gyis rnam pa thams cad du/ /nad
119a7(mdo 'grel): ni bsal bar ma nus pa/ /gang yin de ni myur ba ru/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar shes par bya/ /de ltar mi shes gyur pa yis/ /mtshan nyid rgyas par bstan pa yin/ /de na gzhan yang shis pa dag /bshad kyis nga las mnyan par gyis/
119b1(mdo 'grel): gcang zhing kun spyod pa zad dang ldan/ /sa phyogs yid 'ongs nyams dga' bar/ /pho nya 'ongs gyur mthong na ni/ /las grub bar ni shes par bya/ /bcu bzhi tshes dgu ma yin dang/ /de bzhin bcu bzhi ma yin zhing/ /mtshan phyed dang ni nyi ma gung/ /dus sum yin na ba min
119b2(mdo 'grel): shis shing snod pa med pa yin/ /yul dad dus su ci bzhin 'ongs/ /sman pas der ni 'ongs pa las/ /las grub par ni shes par bya/ /lam du 'gro bar gyur ba na/ /shis pa'i mtshan ma bshad par bya/ /zho dang 'bras bu ma gnang dang/ /skyes bu dregs dang
119b3(mdo 'grel): bar ldan pa dang/ khyu mchog dang ni bum pa gang/ /mthong na 'grub par ston pa yin/ /rgyal po dang ni ded dpon dang/ /de bzhin gdugs dkar mthong ba dang/ /bram ze lag pa khengs pa dag/ mthong na las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /na chung dga' 
119b4(mdo 'grel): ston byed pa dang/ /de bzhin rin chen mthong ba dang/ /phyugs cig btags par gyur pa dang/ /de bzhin me ni 'bar pa dang/ /dri dang phreng ba shis pa dang/ /bud med bzang dang rgod ma dang/ /sa ni 'degs par byed pa dag /mthong na las ni 'grub
119b5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /bud med rin chen rnams kyis ni/ /rgyan gyis brgyan cing bkra shis smra/ /'bras bus gang pa'i snod dang ni/ /chang dang sbrang rtsis gang ba dang/ /dri dang sgra ni yid 'ongs dang/ /gos dkar ro ni mngar ba dang/ /mthong dam thos na blo ldan pas//
119b6(mdo 'grel): don grub par ni shes par bya/ /phreng bas rab yid 'ong ba/ /de bzhin zas skom bzang po dang/ /shing rta mi dang bcas pa dag /mthong na dge bar bshad pa yin/ /rgyal mtshan sgeng bar gyur ba dang/ /ba dan gyis rgyan mthong ba 'am/ /glang po ra ro mthong
119b7(mdo 'grel): byur na/ /blo ldan grub par shes par bya/ /lha dang de bzhin bram ze dang/ /skyes pa bud med chos dang ldan/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang ba dang/ /sa ra la dang rma bya dang/ /yungs kar dang ni sa la'i shing/ /de bzhin g+hi haM nyid dag ni/ /li du mthong na sman pa
120a1(mdo 'grel): yis/ /don grub par ni shes par bya/ /gang na khyu mchog bzang po ni/ /lam kha na ni snang gyur na/ /de ni rnyed pa dang bcas par/ /bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /shing rta sa yis gang pa ni/ /ba bzhi yis ni drangs gyur pa 'am/ yang na
120a2(mdo 'grel): 'bru yis gang gyur ba/ /mthong na don ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /shin tu bde legs sgra dang ni/ /mi ni lag na pad+ma thogs/ /gang zhig bram ze dge sbyong mchod/ /brgyan cing yid la re ba rdzogs/ /de las gang yang rung ba ni/ /mthong na don ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /khyim
