120a3(mdo 'grel): du 'jug tshe bum pa gang/ /mtshan ma sna tshogs kyis brgyan dang/ /de bzhin bud med rgyan can dag /mthong na las ni 'grub bar 'gyur/ /dri zhim mdog ni bzang po dang/ /de bzhin ro ni mngar zhing gtsang/ /bya dang ri dags mi rnams kyi/ /sgra skad snyan pa thos ? dge/
120a4(mdo 'grel): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dag/ /'jug pa'i tshe na mthong gyur na/ /blo ldan don grub shes par bya/ /dung dang rdza rnga rnga bo che/ /sgra ni snyan cing sgra che dang/ /glu gar rol mo'i sgra dag dang/ /snyan pa'i sgra ni skor phyogs 'gro/ gnas su 'jug tshe thos gyur na/ /blo
120a5(mdo 'grel): ldan don 'grub shes par bya/ /mdza' bo chu lha skem byed dang/ /nyi ma zla ba rgya mtsho che/ /dga' byed dang ni khyab 'jug dang/ /tshangs ba lha chen mi thub dang/ /brgya byin dang ni rnam thos sras/ /tha skar gnyis dang tshogs dang rlung/ /ming ni sgrog par byed pa
120a6(mdo 'grel): dag /don grub par ni ston ba yin/ /dad par byed dang rdzas mthun pa dang/ /nor ni mang po bsags pa dang/ /las kyi mdza' ni grub pa dang/ /de bzhin dge bar smra ba dang/ /dbugs 'byin byed cing nyug ba dang/ /de bzhin sman ni thung ba dang/ /grub pa'i phyir
120a7(mdo 'grel): ni byed pa dang/ /der ni nad mang 'gyur rtags yin/ /sman rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba dang/ /de bzhin dga' ba thob pa dang/ /sman ni sna tshogs sbyor ba dag /byed bar mthong na 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /dge ba thams
120b1(mdo 'grel): cad 'dod gyur pa/ /ltas 'di las ni nad med pa'i/ /don grub bar ni 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar pho nya'i gnas skabs su/ /rtags ni 'di dag bstan pa dag /nad kyis btab par gyur pa yi/ /gsor rung mi rung ston pa yin/ /lam dang khyim du 'jug pa na/ /
120b2(mdo 'grel): nad pa mthong bar gyur pa na/ /las ni rtsom par gyur pa'i tshe/ /'dis ni 'grub dang ma 'grub ston/ /'chi ltas gsang ba 'di dag ni/ /yang dag nyid du shes par bya/ /'di dag thams cad gang gi ni/ /yang dag shes te sman pa'i mchog /legs ldan sha li ho tra
120b3(mdo 'grel): yis/ /de skad rjes bstan smras? ba yin/ /shal de ho tra'i gnas brgyad pa ste/ /gsang ba'i gnas las/ /pho nya la sogs bltas bstan pa'i le'u'o/ /rta'i tshe'i rig byed rdzogs so// //sha li ho tra thub chen la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris
120b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ /legs ldan chos rnams thams cad mkhyen/ /bstan bcos kun gyis pha mthar byon/ /gsang ba dang ni bcas pa'i gnas/ /legs ldan gyis ni sngar gsungs gang/ /khyed kyis drin gyis legs par ni/ /de nyid mnyan par 'tshal lags so/ /blo?
120b5(mdo 'grel): ldan de skad 'dri ba dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras ba/ /gsang ba las rab rnyed dka' dang/ /phye ma til mar slan mar dang/ /bcud kyi len ni bzang po dang/ /ro tsa ba yi mchog gyur ba/ /gdod nas gnas shing bslab bya ba/ /bshad kyis bu yis mnyan par
120b6(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /pi pi ling dang bca' sga dang/ /byi dang ka dang lan tshwa rnams/ /btsu mar dang btol?/ /a ru ra dban le sham/ /ba ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /yungs kar shing kun ne tsi tra ka /thal shing dang ni pa la sha /dug mo nyungs shun cu ka dang/ /ar ka'i rtsa
120b7(mdo 'grel): ba 'ong ba dang/ /sapta par+Na shing tsha dang/ /hi jo ba ti dzi ba ti/ kaN+Ta ka ri pwi ha ti/ /a mra'i tshig gu sru sru'i rtsa/ /de bzhin spang spos katpa la/ /sa'u 'blu? dang ni tan+ti ka /shu dag ru rta sgar bu dang/ /byi tsher ba dang ser po gnyis/ /dur bying tik+ta ro hi ni//
121a1(mdo 'grel): nas 'khus thal baststsi ka /he ra na ka byi lce pa/ /shu ti dang ni ma nu dang/ sle tre dang ni bi sho la/ /bi pi ling rtsa dbyi mong dang/ /de bzhin ha ri pi pi ling/ /rgya shug dang dra ban+ti/ /a sh+ra gaNdra dan bya dang/ /a dza mo dang zir? lnga/ /so ma
121a2(mdo 'grel): kur rtsi la la pung/ /nye'u shing dang dug mo nyungs/ /de bzhin gi rka ti shi ka/ /ta ma la ga ga pra'i rtsa/ /ka ra ta dang bu nimpa/ /parba ta dang gla sgang dang/ /pri yang ku dang ba lu ka /bris tsi ka la son ka /gzem dang ni g.yar ma rnams/ /de dag cha ni mnyam
121a3(mdo 'grel): byas pa/ /phye ma zhib mor btags par bya/ /phye ma dang ni srang gcig dang/ /char sbyar ba ni blud par bya/ /yang na zho kha chu 'am ni/ /chu tshan dang ni sbyar ba blud/ /de yis rta ni gang zhig gi// me drod nyams dang ma snyoms dang/ /khongs pa'i srid bu rnams
121a4(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /zad byed chad par 'khru ba sel/ /ba gcin dang ni sbyar nas kyang/ /de la blung par 'gyur na ni/ /'di la rta yi skoms dang dag /mchog tu sel bar byed pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gzhung bsgrub pa/ /rta yi stobs skyed byed pa yin/ /gsang ba'i
121a5(mdo 'grel): gnas de brgyad pa las /skye ma bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /shing kun pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /tin+ti li ka se'u 'bru dang/ /star bu rgya mtsha kru trug dres/ /sa tha gla sgang g.yer ma dang/ /shing cha sug smel g.yer ma
121a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ka rka ta sra ho su sha/ phyi dang ka dang kha ru tsha/ /shu dag thar shing dur byid dang/ /dug mo nyungs dang por ba dang/ /sa thang ma nu ga bra'i rtsa/ /ya pak+Sha ra pu tse shel/ /'di dag tsha ni mnyam byas nas/ /phye ma zhib mo nyid du btags/ /phye ma
121a7(mdo 'grel): khyor gang tshad dang ni/ /sbyar ba rta la blung gyur na/ /rlung dang bad kan nad rnams dang/ /de bzhin me drod nyams pa dang/ /nad kun sel cing stobs skyed la/ /srin bu'i nad ni sbyod bar byed/ /til mar yang na mar sbyar ba'i/ /phyed ma snum can
121b1(mdo 'grel): me drod skyed/ /mkhris dang bad kan las gyur par/ /kha ra sbrad rtsi dang sbyar sbyin/ /rlung las gyur pa'i nad rnams dang/ /gnye'u rengs dang lkog nad dang/ /kha'i nad ni thams cad la/ /sbrang chad dang sbyar sbyin na phan/ /sbeg dang zang byed can la ni/ /sha khu dang ni
121b2(mdo 'grel): sbyar te sbyin/ /gal te 'di dag ma rnyed na/ /dar ba 'am chu tshan dang sbyar sbyin/ /sman pa yi ni rta'i gnas dang/ /nye bar rtag tu 'di bzhag bya/ /tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i phye/ /sha li ho tras bshad pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /
121b3(mdo 'grel): tsha ba gsum pa la sogs pa'i phye ma bstan pa'o// //tsha gsum pi pi ling mu la/ /shu dag ci tra 'bras bu gsum/ /thal sman gnyis dang lan tshwa lnga/ /de bzhin zir lnga dang bcas/ /khyi lce ba dang ser bo gnyis/ /khyi lce ba dang gla sgang dang/ /dbyi
121b4(mdo 'grel): mo ha ti pi pi ling/ /la la bud dang bong da dkar/ /murba dang ni dug mo nyungs/ /de bzhin dug mo nyungs shun pa/ /thang shing dang ni sa khris dang/ /nim+ba dang ni ro tsa ka /sro mar rtsa so ban dza/ /ru rta dang ni pa rbat/ /g.yer ma shing kun sgog skya dang/ /de bzhin rta
121b5(mdo 'grel): sga nyid dang ni/ /zur pa kaN+Ta? ka ri dang/ de bzhin byi dza su ra'i khu/ /'di dag cha mnyam bsdus nas ni/ /phye ma zhib mo nyid du btags/ /sbrang rtsi dang sbyar gong bu 'am/ /chang dang sbyar te blud par bya/ /yang na mar ram til mar ram/ /ba gcin kan rtsi dang
121b6(mdo 'grel): sbyar blud/ /bad kan gyis ni nad kun la/ /sbrang rtsi dang sbyar sbyin na phan/ /mkhris pa'i nad ni thams cad la/ /mar ram kha ra dang sbyar sbyin/ /rlung gi nad ni thams cad la/ /mar ram til mar dang sbyar spyin/ /gcin srib dang zag gu la/ /ba gcin kan
121b7(mdo 'grel): mi? dang sbyar blud/ /chags glugs dang ni lus zhus dang/ /khyad par du ni sbeg nad dang/ /zang byed kyis ni btab pa yin/ /rta la smon gyi mchog yin no/ /nad rnams kun las rnam grol zhing/ /skyon kun dang ni bral bar 'gyur/ /shugs ni rlung
122a1(mdo 'grel): dang mnyam pa dang/ /stobs ni klang po dang 'dra 'drar 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i phye ma gnyis pa'o// //ha bu sha dang lce myang tsha/ /rus rta shu ni bir?
122a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ shu dag e raN+Ta'i sa bon/ /ras sna bca' lga nyungs dkar dang/ /thang shing a ja mo da dang/ /na ba tshigs bus 'phul thal ba lan tshwa rnams/ /phye mar byas pa mar dang ni/ /til mar dang skol dam pa 'di/ /rta ni rlung gis nyen pa dang/ /'jam
122a3(mdo 'grel): rtsi btang na stobs skyed yin/ /phye ma 'di dang sbyor ba yin/ /snum gyi 'jam rtsi gzhan yang 'gas/ /nad med ltas byed ro rtsa byed/ /nad gyis gdungs la dal ba sel/ /sman pa mkhas pas 'jam rtsi yi/ /las rnams kun la 'di sbyar bya/ /sha
122a4(mdo 'grel): li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ ha su sha lo sogs pa'i phye ma pa'o// //byi dang ka dang ser po gnyis/ /lce myang tsha dang rtsa ru tsha/ /ba tha ba tho la'i lo ma/ /nimpa'i lo ma tsi tra ka /pi pi ldi dang bca' sga rnams/ /phye mar
122a5(mdo 'grel): btags pa 'di sbyin na/ /snying nang khong ba'i srin bu sel/ /me drong skyed cing smin byed yin/ /nad kun rnam par zhi byed cing/ /bad kan dang ni mdze nad sel/ /rta yi me drod nyams pa la/ /lus kyi me drod stobs 'phel byed/ /shal ho tra'i gsang ba'i
122a6(mdo 'grel): gnas brgyad pa las/ /phyi dang kal sogs pa'i phye ma'o// //'bras bu gsum dang ser po gnyis/ /de bzhin tsha ba gsum dang ni/ /gla sgang te dzo ba ti dang/ /murba ha ri pi pi ling/ /yungs kar pi bi ling rtsa pa/ /pa la ka dang pu
122a7(mdo 'grel): tse shel/ /phyi tsher skre lo kru drug dres/ /dug mo nyungs kyi mkhon? dang/ /bi tsu nar dang pa to la/ /tra bin ti dang dur byid dang/ /bris tsi ka li zir nang/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba thar shing dang/ /g.yer ma dang ni byi dang ka/ shing shun ru rta shi skru? dang/ /yang?
122b1(mdo 'grel): marga bi sha la/ /shu dag dang bcas phye mar sbyar/ /sman gyi sbyor ba 'di nyid ni/ /rta la bdud rtsi dang 'dra yin/ /rlung nad bad kan nad rnams dang/ /de bzhin rlung mkhris 'dres pa dang/ /de bzhin nad khrag can dang ni/ /g.yan pa skra ba sel ba yin/ /khyad par du
122b2(mdo 'grel): yang snying nad dang/ /lud pa me drod nyams la bsngags/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i phye ma'o// //g.yer ma shing kun a ru ra/ /ma nu dang ni lan tshwa brgyad/ /nas skol khu ba dang sbyar sbyin/ /
122b3(mdo 'grel): nad gzhi gsum skyes gzer rnams 'joms/ /gnas brgyad pa las gzer 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i phye ma'o// //pi tsu mar dang pa to le/ /kaN+DTa ka ri bi ha ni/ /sle tres dang ni 'bras bu gsum/ /g.yar ma chu dang lhan gi cig bskol/ /de
122b4(mdo 'grel): gtsags pa yi khu bar ni/ /mung+ga legs par gtso bar bya/ /de ni legs par chos pa dang/ /thabs nas slar yang phogs nas ni/ /der ni tsha ba gsum po dang/ /lan tshwa dag kyang tshad tsam gzhug /mar dang til mr zhag sbrang rtsi/ /de dag thams cad
122b5(mdo 'grel): gcig tu bsre/ /tsha yi phye ma dag dang ni/ /mung+ga 'i khu ba sbyar bar bya/ /de nas tsha ba'i kha zas te/ /rtal cho ga bzhin du sbyin/ /de ni bad rlung sel byed cing/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'joms/ /snying nad zhi bar byed pa dang/ /skrangs pa dag kyang sel bar
122b6(mdo 'grel): byed/ /mgo don? ni nad dang sna nad rnams/ /nges par sel bar byed pa yin/ /lkog nang rnam par spyod byed cing/ /mchog tu me drod nyams la phan/ /gnas brgyad pa'i las tsha ba'i phye ma dad bsres pa zhes bya ba ste phye ma'i le'u'o// //til mar
122b7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin mar cha mnyam/ /zhig dang rkang ni ci rnyed dang/ /de bzhin skyur yang ci rnyed dang/ /'dir ni zho ni bzhi 'gyur gzhug /der ni sman ni 'di dag rnams/ /lde gur btags pa bzhug par bya/ /shu dag ras sna shing mngar dang/ /'tsho byed dang ni rdzi?
123a1(mdo 'grel): ban+ti/ /a shu ma ti ni dag ni/ /ba la ba sgi ba spru ba/ /'di dag dang skol snum chen po/ /stobs dang nad med skyed par byed/ /rlung las skyes pa'i nang brgya bcu/ /'di yis sel bar the tshom med/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad
123a2(mdo 'grel): pa las snum chen po'o// //kaN+Ta ka ri'i rtsa ba dang/ /'bras bu bsres ba srang brgya ni/ /chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskol/ /bzhi tsha lus par gyur pa dang/ /de las bre gang lus pa ru/ /mar ni bre gang dang bsres bskol/ /go rim bzhin du bshad
123a3(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /smin gyi lde gu 'di yang gzhug /pi pi ling rtsa byi dang ka /ha te pi ling tsi tra ka /kha ru tshigs 'khrus thal ba kha ru tsha/ /ra na shu dag tsha ba gsum/ /'di bcu mar gyi dud pa lnga/ /sel cing legs par gso bar bya/ /nad kun sel ba
123a4(mdo 'grel): byed pa dang/ /snum de bde bar skyed byed yin/ /gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ kaN+Ta ka ri'i sman mar ro// //yud dang sgyer pa shu dag bcas/ /nimpa byi tshir pa rba ta/ /sle tres dang ni khyi lce ba/ /pu tse shel ni cha mnyam byas/ /de la 'bras bu
123a5(mdo 'grel): gsum dang ni/ /tik+ta tsan dan pi pi ling/ /dug mo nyungs dang ga bur dang/ /ri shi ba gnyis dzi ba ga /lde gur btags pa dang bsres pa'i/ /mar bskol gyur pa de yis ni/ /rta yi mkhris pa sel byed yin/ /gzhang 'brum khong tsha zhi bar byed/ /jo dang
123a6(mdo 'grel): g.yan ba rnams dang ni/ /me ba la dang ni dmigs la yang/ /'di ni rtag tu bsngags pa yin/ /dbyar tshe rta la rtag tu phan/ /sha li ho tra gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ tsha ba'i sman mar ro// //a shwa gand+ha'i rtsa ba dag/ /'bras bu yal ga srang brgya
123a7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskal/ /de nas sman khud dang ni/ /mar ni bre gang bskol bar bya/ /til mar mar dang mnyam pa dang/ /nyo ma bzhi 'gyur de ru gzhug /tsan dan dang ni bca' sga dang/ /a ka ru ang rgya shug dang/ /dgu na 'bru pang rtsa 'bras bu
123b1(mdo 'grel): gsum/ /sna ma'i lo ma sha ri ba/ /kaN+Ta ka ri pri ha ti/ /na ga puShpa pa sbru ba/ /sa 'khris na pa r+Ni gnyis/ /shing tsa gan dang pa tra dang/ /pad+ma ge sar lde gu ni/ /btags pa der ni bzhugs par bya/ /'di yis rta ni sbeg pa dang/ /rlung gis nyam thag gyur pa dang/ /
123b2(mdo 'grel): zad byed kyis ni btag pa dag sha skyed pa'i mchog yin no/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang pa'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /a shwa gand+ha'i snan mar ro// //bong mur ba pu tse shel/ /gla sgang shing tsa pa to dang/ /sapta par+Ni pa to la/ /bi tsu mar dang byi tsher ma
123b3(mdo 'grel): par+Na ta dang 'bras bu gsum /sel po gnyis dang 'dra yan ti/ /tsan dan dmar po ma ru ka/ rtswa mkhris dang ni pi pi ling/ /nye'u shing shug pa bu shel tse/ /dod kha dang ni sle tres rnams/ /dug mo nyungs kyi sa bon btsas/ /srang re cha mnyams sbyar la gu/ /
123b4(mdo 'grel): nim+ba pa to la dang bcas/ /kaN+Ta? ka ri ba sha kha/ /srang ni lnga'i tshad du byas/ /skyu ru ra ni bre gang bcas/ /cho ga bzhin du bkol nas ni/ /sman khu mar khur dang bsres la/ /me ni chung dus btse bar bya/ /tik+ta chen po zhes bya ste/ /'di ni gu gul dang bcas pa
123b5(mdo 'grel): 'am? yang na 'ba' zhig sbyin byas na/ /yon tan bdud rtsi dag dang mtshungs/ /lus kyi me drod skyed par byed/ /gzi mdangs stobs ni 'phel byed yin/ /mdze dang khrag mkhris nang rnams sel/ /lus rgyas par yang byed pa yin/ /sha skyed mdog ni bzang
123b6(mdo 'grel): byed cing/ /nang kun sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /sha li ho tra gsang pa'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /tik+ta chen po'i sman mar ro// //rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis nim+ba/ /sle tres a ta ru sha ka/ /dong kha dang ni pa ho la/ /'bras bu gsum ni cha mnyam bya/ /
123b7(mdo 'grel): cham? tshom brdungs la chu nang bskol/ /sman khu bzhi cha lus pa ru/ /de dang mnyam pa'i zhun mar dang/ /sman ni 'di rnams dang bcas bskol/ /khyi lce gcig dang pa rba ta/ /sha ri ba gnyis tsan dan dang/ /tik+ta dang ni pu rtse shel/ pa tha dad ni
124a1(mdo 'grel): bcas pa dang/ /bal bu dang ni bu shel tse/ /utpal sngon po shug pa dang/ /pi pi ling rtsa byi dang ka /te dzo ba ti tsi tra ka/ /bor ha ti pi pi ling/ /dug mo nyungs shun po son dang/ /ser po gnyis dang pi pi ling/ /na le sha ma dang bcas
124a2(mdo 'grel): sga dang/ /thang shing zhes bya thams cad ni/ /cha mnyam der ni gzhug par bya/ /me chung gis bskol chos pa dang/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i snod du gzhug /tik+ta chen po'i sman mar 'di/ /rta yi sman gyi mchog tu bshad/ /lung pa dbugs mi bar dang mdza/ /lca ba
124a3(mdo 'grel): 'bras kyi phreng ba dang/ /bad kan gyi ni nad rnams dang/ /de bzhin sna snag gyur pa dang/ /bad kan nad ni gzhan dag la'ang/ /'di ni shin tu mngags pa yin/ /'di ni nad kun sel byed cing/ /gzi mdangs stobs ni bskyed pa dang/ /brtan zhing lus ni sra bar
124a4(mdo 'grel): byed/ /dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang/ /yid kyang dga' bar byed pa yin/ /khrag dang mkhris pa sel byed cing/ /gcong chen rims dang lud pa 'joms/ /pags pa la gnas nad rnams dang/ /gang yang khrag la gnas pa la/ /rus pa rkang la zhen pa rnams//
124a5(mdo 'grel): mar 'di yis ni sel bar byed/ /nang kyi rgya mtsho brgal 'dod la/ /gzings dang 'dra ba mar 'di yin/ /tigta chen po'i sman mar gnyis pa'o// //sh+ri sha dang ni yan lag lnga/ /cha mnyam srang ni brgya ru bya/ /chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus
124a6(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa dang/ /de rnams sman khu de dang ni/ /mar nibre do bskol bar bya/ /sman ni 'di dag nyid kyi ni/ /lde gu der ni gzhug par bya/ /pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum/ /phris lci ka li 'bras bu gsum/ /shu ti dang ni thang shing dang/ /spang spos dang ni ba lu dang/ /bya
124a7(mdo 'grel): kra na ka sh+ri ka ta/ /tsitra ka dang na ku li/ /btsod dang dzi ba ni ya dang/ /ha ti pi pi ling tsan dan/ /gan dang ba tra ru rta rnams/ /med gyur byas bcug me chung bskol/ /rta gang rlung nad can dang ni/ /de bzhin mkhris pa'i nad yod dang/ /bad kan snying
124b1(mdo 'grel): gar 'khyil gyur pa/ /de rnams kyi ni sman mchog yin/ /sh+ri sha la sogs sman mar 'di/ /nad kun sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /sha li ho tra gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /sh+ri sha la sogs pa'i sman mar ro// //sh+ri sha
124b2(mdo 'grel): yi ni lo ma ni/ /chu skol de yi khu ba dang/ /mar ni tshad bzhi skol ba ru/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /de bzhin ha ti pi pi ling/ /lde gur sbyar ba dang bsres bskol/ /mdze yi nang ni thams cad dang/ /dug sel me drod skyed mchog yin/ /
124b3(mdo 'grel): rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur dang/ /khong tsha khrag gi nad rnams sel/ /dbyar gyi tshe na byin gyur na/ /'di ni bdud rtsi dang 'dra yin/ /sh+ri sha la sogs pa'i sman mar gnyis pa'o// //myur ba dang ni 'bras bu gsum/ /tsi tra ka dang shu
124b4(mdo 'grel): dag dang/ /bca' sga dang ni ser po gnyis/ /pa tha shing tsha pa rba ta/ /na le sham dang gla sgang dang/ /de bzhin na ga ge sar dang/ /tsan dan dang ni sha ri ba/ /rgya spos dang ni ba lu ka / bo da ha ri pi pi ling/ /danda dang ni dra pan+ti/ /ro ha ni dang tsa dra ka/ /dbyi
124b5(mdo 'grel): mo dur ba khyi lce ba/ /cha mnyam sbyar te chu dang ni/ /mar dang me ni chung dur btso/ /tshos te mar ni lung pa dang/ /de ni de las dbab par bya/ /'di blud rta ni mgyogs pa dang/ /lus stobs rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lcags par rtogs pa'i nad kyi
124b6(mdo 'grel): tshogs/ /rdo la sogs dang bral bar 'gyur/ /rlung nang mdze'i nad rnams dang/ /mkhris pa'i nad dang lus rengs dang/ /de bzhin dbugs mi bde kun dang/ /nad ni sna tshogs gzhan yang sel/ /'di ni nad 'joms mchog yin zhing/ /bkra shis par
124b7(mdo 'grel): yang byed pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas de brgyad pa las/ /mur ba la sogs pa'i sman mar ro/// //nim+ba pa to la 'bras bu gsum/ /ser po gnyis dang pu tse shel/ /phyi tsher ba dang parba ta/ /dra bin da dang sle tres rnams/ /'di dag cha ni
125a1(mdo 'grel): mnyam byas la/ /brdungs pa chu nad bskol bar bya/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur pa ru/ /sman 'di dag gi lde gu gzhug/ tsan dan pi pi ling bla sgang/ /ri sha pa gnyis dzi pa ka/ /kaN+Da ka ri ti lta dang/ /dug mo nyung kyi sa bon rnams/ /cha ni mnyam
125a2(mdo 'grel): par sbyar byas nas/ /de bzhin du ni mar khu dang/ /'o ma snum dang mnyam bcug la/ /me ni chung ngus btso bar bya/ /'di ni tik+ta chen zhes bya/ /mdze dang rims dang me dpal dang/ /'brum bu dang ni 'bras nang dang/ /de ni pags nad gzhan dag kyang/ /khrag mkhris
125a3(mdo 'grel): nad rnams sel bar byed/ /sman pa mkhas pas 'di nyid ni/ rta la nye bar blud par bya/ /dpyid dang dgun gyi tshe na ni/ /sna sman 'jam rtsir btang na phan/ /dbyar gyi tshe na khyad par du/ /sman 'di rab tu mngags pa yin/ /sha li to tra gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/
125a4(mdo 'grel): tik+ta can gyi sman mar ro// //dur byed chen po brdungs nas ni/ /chu bri bzhi yi nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang/ /de ru mar khu bre gang blugs/ /ram nye khyi ra ka ko yi/ /ri sha ba gnyis dzi pa ka /ba la a ti ba la dang/ /de bzhin k+Sha ra pi da ri/ /
125a5(mdo 'grel): med ma hA med dang/ /shing mngar dang ni sha ri ba/ /cha ni mnyam por byas nas kyang/ /de ni lde gu btags par bya/ /mar der bcug nas dkrugs nas ni/ /me ni chung dus ngal gyis btso/ /de ni tshos bar shes pa na/ /de las phab ste btsags par bya/ /snum
125a6(mdo 'grel): 'di rtag tu btungs pa dang/ /'jam rtsi yi ni las la sbyor/ /rgyun tu byin na mo sham yang/ /bu skyed par ni nus pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /sha ma dur byid kyi sman mar ro// //nimpa dang ni pa to la/ /skyer pa tsan dan
125a7(mdo 'grel): pu tse shel/ /khyi lce ba dang mal su/ /pa rba ta nisrang ro dang/ /skyu ru ra ni bre gang bcas/ /chu bal can gyi chu las ni/ /chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus dang mar bre gang/ /gla sgang rtsa khris shing mngar dang/ /tsan dug dug mo nyungs la pud/ /pi pi
125b1(mdo 'grel): ling dang bcas bskol ba'o/ /mar gyis sna mig sna nad 'joms/ /rgyu blud rims dang nad dang ni/ /me dpal la sogs sel bar byed/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ nimpa la sogs pa'i sman mar ro/ /nimpa to la'i lo ma dang/ /sle
125b2(mdo 'grel): tres dang ni kaN+Ta ka ri nyid/ /cha mnyam srad ni nyi shur byas pa dag /chu ni sman gyi bcu drug nang du bskol/ /sman gyi khu ba bzhi cha lus ba dang/ /sman khu de dang mnyam pa'i mar dang bskol/ /der ni tsha ba gsum ni srang gsum dag/ zhib du btags pa'i phye ma
125b3(mdo 'grel): gzhug par bya/ /de ni legs par tshos par shes pa dang/ /gu gul dang sbyar rta la blud par bya/ /yang ni de dang mar bsres 'ba' zhig sbyin/ /des ni mdze yi nad kun sel bar 'gyur/ /khrag mkhris rdo dang de bzhin g.yan pa dang/ /'brum bu 'brum phran
125b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin shu ba ni/ /sel cing rta yi mdog dang stobs ni skyed/ /nad kyi tshogs 'joms bdud rtsi dang 'dra yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ bdud rtsi la tu'i sman mar ro// //ka rany+dza dang ba sha ka /sbo ta khyim gyi dud pa dang/ /
125b5(mdo 'grel): ka pit+tha dang dong ka dang/ /yug snam dang ni pad+ma dang/ /ka ra bir bo nga dang/ /ro hi da dang sle tres dang/ /bre ha ti yi 'bras bu ni/ /ra thug gi ni gcin dang btags/ /'di dag srang gnyis sbyar ba la/ /mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol/ /mar dang mnyam pa'i
125b6(mdo 'grel): 'o ma gzhug /bskol ba'i sman mar stobs chen yin/ /mdze yi nad ni thams cad la/ /rtag tu bskus dang blud nang na/ /sha tshil rus pa skyed byed cing/ /pags par zhugs pa'i khrag sbyong byed/ /mdze nad 'dzag par byed pa yin/ /thams cad zhi bar byed
125b7(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /legs ldan sha li ho tra yis/ /de skad rjes bstan smras pa yin/ /sha li to tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ ka rany+dza la sogs pa'i sman mar gyi le'u'o// //de nas gzhan yang til mar gyi/ /le'u nges par bshad bya ste/ /
126a1(mdo 'grel): sra par ni srang brgya ni/ chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur pa ni/ /khu ba de ni thab la dbog/ /sman lu de dang mnyam pa yi/ /til mar nye bar gzhug par bya/ /kany+dzi rang skyur nyis 'gyur gzhug /de la sman ni
126a2(mdo 'grel): 'di dag gi /lde gu nye bar gzhug par bya/ /ra sna ba la gzem dang/ /lce myang tsha dang shing kru dang/ /sra sa ra na'i rtsa ba dang/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa par bcas/ /tsi tra ga dang bca' sga dang/ /shu ti dang ni thang shing dang/ /pos shing 'bras bu bo nga dang//
126a3(mdo 'grel): pi pi ling yang srang re ni/ /cha ni mnyam por sbyar nas kyang/ /phye ma zhib mo 'thag tu bzhug /me ni chung du dang btsos te/ /snum de snod ni bzang por gzhug /'di ni sna sman bsku ba dang/ /'jam rtsi btung bdag la bsngags/ /rta ni rlung nad kyis bcom
126a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ mi 'am yang na glang pos rung/ /lus 'theng yun ring nad kyis btab/ /nges par bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /rta gang bu ni mi 'chags pa/ /'di yis nges par mngal skyed 'gyur/ /pho min skyes pa nyid 'gyur zhing/ /mo sham yang ni bu skye
126a5(mdo 'grel): byed/ /'di yis 'od ba khyab 'jug rigs/ /rabs chad bu ni yid 'od skye/ /sra sa ta'i til mar 'di/ /nad kun 'jig par byed pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ sra pa ta yi til mar ro// //sra sar na'i rtsa ba dang//
126a6(mdo 'grel): yal ga lo ma bcas srang brgya/ /rtsa ba bcu ni de yi byed/ /chu bre bcu drug nang du bkol/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang/ /thab las slar ni dbog par bya/ /sman khu de yi nyis 'gyur gyis/ /kany+dzi rang skyur gzhug par ni/ /de la nye bar gzhug par bya//
126a7(mdo 'grel): sman ni 'di rnams srang re la/ /lde gur byas la de ru gzhug / bos shing 'bras bu bca' sga dang/ /tsatri ka dang lce myang tsha/ /pra sa ra yi rtsa ba dang/ /de bzhin pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /thang shing dang ni shu ti dang/ /me da tsakra hwa gan dang/ /e raN+Ta'i rtsa dzi bin+ta/ /
126b1(mdo 'grel): ru ta shu dag sa ha car/ /bo son cha ni bzang po dang/ /de bzhin mang du sra ba dang/ /so ban dza na ser po gnyis/ /a shwa gand+ha ha su sha /ba ma seng khrom smyig rkang dang/ /sh+re ya se ni cha mnyam gzhug /'di ni bsku dang sna sman dang/ /btung dang 'jam rtsi dag la btang//
126b2(mdo 'grel): rlung gi nad ni thams cad dang/ /de bzhin nad gzhan kun sel byed/ /smyo dang 'byung po brjed byed dang/ /de bzhin gdon nad sna tshogs dang/ /zha'o me dpal gyis thebs la/ /til mar bsten pa bde thob 'gyur/ /skam dang rus pa'i nad rnams la/ /til mar
126b3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni btang bar bya/ /rgod ma bu ni mi 'chags pa/ /'di blud na ni bu 'chags 'gyur/ /rgod ma dang ni rta pho yi/ /rlung nad brgyad cu sel bar byed/ /gnyer ma 'dus shing na tshod rgas/ /slar yang lang tsho thob par 'gyur/ /sra sa ra yi til mar 'di/ /rta la
126b4(mdo 'grel): phan byed mchog tu bshad/ /tshe dang stobs ni skyed byed cing/ /dran pa 'ang sems gsal dpal skyed byed/ /rus pa chad dang rtsa chad la/ /til mar 'di yis sna sman btang/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ pra sa ra'i til mar gnyis
126b5(mdo 'grel): pa'o// //sle tres chu yi nang bskol la/ /khu ba bzhi cha'i til mar gzhug /'o ma de dang mnyam bcug la/ /sman 'di dag gi lde gu gzhug /pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum/ /tsi tra ha ti pi pi ling/ /shu dag rus pa byi dang ka /skyer pa dang ni lce myang tsha//
126b6(mdo 'grel): pra sa ra ni pa la dang/ /ra sna gze ma ha sus pa/ /bcug la me ni chung ngus btso/ /de bzhin bca' sga gzhug par bya/ /'di yis sna rengs rlig sbos dang/ /lus rengs sked pa na ba dang/ /de bzhin rgyab ni rengs pa dang/ /rlung nad pa la sha dang ni/ /rlung las
126b7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i mig nad la/ /khyad par du ni rtag tu btang/ /sle tres la sogs til mar ni/ /tshangs pas mngon tshe bshad pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas brgyad pa las/ sle tres la sogs pa'i til mar ro// //shu ti ra ga dong ?
127a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bcod dang ru rta lce myang tsha/ /thang shing dang ni ba la gnyis/ /ser po gnyis dang tsan dan dmar/ /sle tres kyi ni khu ba dang/ /til mar 'o ma dang bcas bskol/ /'theng pa'i nad ni thams cad la/ /bsku dang sna sman 'jam rtsi
127a2(mdo 'grel): btang/ /gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /shu ti'i til mar do/ /pi pi ling dang po son cha/ /bilpa shing mngar shu ti dang/ /ru rta de bzhin ma nu dang/ /tsi tra ka dang thang shing ni/ /btags te til mar 'o ma ni/ /nyes 'gyur bcug te bskol bar bya/ /
127a3(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum rlung ni 'khyil ba la/ /'jam rtsid btang ba'i mchog yin no/ /gzhang 'brum pa dang gzar nad dang/ /gcin sri pa dang za gu dang/ /rked pa ba rla yi nang rnams dang/ /sbeg pa dang ni spos nad dang/ /khrag 'dzag pa dang gzhang kha skrangs/ /rlung
127a4(mdo 'grel): 'khyil ba ni sel par byed/ /de la sogs pa'i nad rnams la/ /'jam rtser btang na sel 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i gnas de brgyad pa las/ pi pi ling la sogs pa'i til mar ro/ /'tsho byad shing mngar ma nga? dang/ /pi pi ling dang po son tsha/ /shu dag
127a5(mdo 'grel): nga sna ba la dang/ /bilba nyi shu shing shu ti ni/ /btags pa'i lde gu til mar dang/ /'o ma nyis 'gyur bcug ste bskol/ /til mar 'di ni 'jam rtsi ru/ /btang na rlung nad sel bar byed/ /gsang ba'i gnas las 'tsho byed la sogs pa'i til mar
127a6(mdo 'grel): ro/ /ma sha'i rtsa ba srang brgya ni/ /dus su skyes pa btung bar bya/ /chu pre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur ba dang/ /sman gyi khu ba de dang ni/ /til mar bre bzhi bsres pa ru/ sman 'di dag ni srang gnyis pa/ /mnyam byas lde gu bcug
127a7(mdo 'grel): ste bskol/ /bcod? dang a shwa gand+ha? dang/ /rgyam tsha dang ni shing mngar dang/ /nim+ba'i rtse ba shu ti dang/ /ra sna yang ni bcug ste bskol/ /me chung la bskol til mar 'dis/ /rlung gi nad kun sel byed cing/ /lus rengs pa yi nad rnams ni/ /rab tu 'joms
127b1(mdo 'grel): par byed pa yin/ /rlung las gyur pa'i nang brkyad cu/ /thams cad 'di yis sel bar byed/ /gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /ma sha'i til mar ro/ /ra sna la sogs bshad bya yis/ /legs thos ma yengs nyan bar gyis/ /ra sna'i rtsa ba lo ma dang/
127b2(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu yal ga srang brgyad ni/ /brdungs te chu bre bcu drug dang/ /bskol la bzhi cha lus pa na/ /de yi khu ba bre bzhir ni/ /til mar bre do gzhug par bya/ /nga sna de nyid lde gu byas/ /srang? bcu deng ni gzhug bar bya/ /der ni 'o ma bzhi 'gyur dang/ /blo
127b3(mdo 'grel): ldan sman pas sbyor bar bya/ /kha ra srang ni bco lnga dag /srang bcu nye bar gzhug par bya/ /kha ra rnyed par ma gyur na/ /bu ram nyis 'gyur gzhug par bya/ /me ni chung ngus bskol nas ni/ /u dum+ba ra'i snod nang bzhag /til mar 'dis ni rlung gyur na/
127b4(mdo 'grel): brgyad nus sel bar byed pa yin/ /ra sna'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du/ /ha sa ? ra'ang de dang 'dra/ /sna sman bsku dang btung ba dang/ /'jam rtsi'i las la'ang bsngags pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ ra snal sogs pa'i til mar ro/ /'bras
127b5(mdo 'grel): bu gsum dang na le sham/ /bca' sga ldong ros bab la dang/ /nag chur dung bying gla sgang dang/ /de bzhin a ka'i? lo ma dang/ /thang shing dang ni ser po gnyis/ /spang spos dang ni tsan dan dmar/ /'di dag srad re'i tshad byas ba/ /ba gcin dang ni lhan cig bskol/
127b6(mdo 'grel): yungs mar dang ni sum cu dang/ /dug ni srang gcig gzhug par bya/ /lcags kyi snod du me chung gis/ /rim gyis de ni bskol bar bya/ /til mar 'di yis rta yi ni/ /lus kyi nang rnams sel bar byed/ /g.yan pa dang ni rkang shu dang/ /de bzhin 'brum bu sna
127b7(mdo 'grel): tshogs ni/ /bskus pa yis ni sel byed cing/ /gnyen par yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /gang zhig rma rang gyur pa dag /de la'ang sman 'di mchog yin no/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyang ba las/ dug gi snying po can gyi til mar ro/ /ru rta? rgya?  cha?
128a1(mdo 'grel): ser po gnyis/ /ka ra bi ra na le sham/ /na ta man ta ni shal/ /skam pa'i la dang sra rtsi pog /yungs kar gla sgang pa to la/ /nim+ba spang? ma skyer khaN+Ta/ /byi dang ka ni cha mnyam bya/ /'di dang til mar ba gcin ni/ /nyis 'gyur bcug la
128a2(mdo 'grel): bskol bar bya/ /til mar ska bar gyur pa'i tsha/ /rnying mar bcas pas bskus na ni/ /sngo dang g.yan pa'i nad rnams dang/ /mdze nang lo mang lon pa 'joms/ /rkang shu dang ni sha bkra yang/ /lan gcig bskus pas sel bar byed/ /mdze yi nad ni bco
128a3(mdo 'grel): brgyad dang/ /dbang po'i thos babs la tur 'joms/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ ru rta la sogs pa'i til mar gyi le'u rdzogs so// //ra sna ba la sle tres dang/ /ba sru ba dang e ran dang/ /shi sku bca' ?
128a4(mdo 'grel): sga thang shing dang/ /a shwa gand+ha nye'u shing ba/ /rtsa ba lnga po a ru ra/ /sa ha tsa ra sru sru'i rtsa/ /chu dang bskol ba'i sman khu 'di/ /gu gul bcas pa 'am de gcig pu/ /snang rtsi dang ni sbyar byas pas/ /ske rengs rgyab rengs mjug do'i nad/ /gzhang
128a5(mdo 'grel): 'brum ro stong nad rnams dang/ /sna snag 'byung ba sel bar nges/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ ra sna la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu ba'o/ /bla sna bo da pa tha dang/ /shu thag dang ni a ru ra/ /pu tse shel dang khyi lce ba/ /thang shing dang ni parba
128a6(mdo 'grel): ta/ /pi pi ling rtsa byi tsher ba/ /sle tres dang ni bca' sga dang/ /ba to la yi lo mar bcas/ /sman khu bzang po bskol bar bya/ /me drod bri dang rims bcas dang/ /sems khong chung dang lkog nad dang/ /gzhong 'dra skrangs nad lud ba dang/ /ma zhu'i rlung
128a7(mdo 'grel): dang stobs zad pa'i/ /rta yi nad la btang gyur na/ /nad kun sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman khu'o/ /sh+riM ga ta ka sh+ri sha yi/ /shun pa arga'i rtsa ba dang/ /a shwa gand+ha ra sna dang/ /sral
128b1(mdo 'grel): ra yi rtsa ba dang/ /cha ni mnyam par sbyar byas la/ /gtun gyi nang du 'thengs? te bskol/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur ba dang/ /dro 'jam rta la blud par bya/ /brang gi nad ni thams cad la/ /sman khu 'di ni mchog tu bsngags/ /gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /
128b2(mdo 'grel): sh+riM ga ta ka la sogs pa'i sman khu'i le'u'o/ /sman khu'i le'u rdzogs so// //rta ni ma zhur gyur pa dag /rtswa nyung za zhing yid mi bde/ /byin pa gnyis ni 'thed gyur zhing/ /nyam thag pa yi gcin rtug gtong/ /yang na byin pa skrangs ba
128b3(mdo 'grel): 'am/ /rma yi nad ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /spong dang nga rgyal med 'gyur zhing/ /rmongs bag ma zhu las byung skye/ /de la ci srid nang nga ni/ /nyam chung gyur par myur bar bzhag /shin tu na na na bzhi gsum/ /sel ba'i sman khu dro 'jam blud/ /rta la smyung ba byas
128b4(mdo 'grel): rjes la/ /dus mthun zas dang skom byin te/ /zhag lnga'am zhag bzhi bar du ni/ /rjes su btung ba blung par bya/ /de yis nad byang ma gyur na/ /nang stobs skyes la sman ba yis/ /zhag bdun gyi ni rjes la ni/ /gtar ka nye bar gtang bar bya/ /rna ba mur
128b5(mdo 'grel): 'gram rtse'u chung dang/ /zang gi rtsa la gtar ka gdab/ /byin pa rkang pa tshe'u tshe yi/ /rtsa las 'theng 'gyur gtar ka gdag /shi la ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ ma zhu ba sbyang ba'o/ /de nas rta yi so sor btung/ /khyad la yang dag bshad par
128b6(mdo 'grel): bya/ /ardza? mo ngal la pung/ /pi pi ling dang tsi tra ka /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ /bca' sga yang ni cha mnyam sbyar/ /'di dag gi ni phye ma dag /chu tshan dang sbyar blung bar bya/ /btsod dang sbrang rtsid dang ki /ser bo gnyis dang lo ma bdun/ /bri yang ku dang kha ra
128b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /yungs kar dmar dang pi pi ling/ /'di dag cha ni mnyam byas na/ /bu ram chang dang ba sbyar blung/ /'di ni rta yi lto ba na/ /gnas pa'i nad rnams sel byar byed/ /gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ so sor btud pa'o/ /pi pi ling dang na le sham?
129a1(mdo 'grel): bca' sga shu dag byi dang ka /shing kun g.yer ma ci tra ka /danba dang ni bu ce shel/ /chang dangs dang ni sbyar ba ni/ /so sor btung ba blud par bya/ /gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /so sor btung ba gnyis pa'o/ /pi pi ling dang lan
129a2(mdo 'grel): tshwa dang/ /shu dag dang ni shing tshar bcas/ /a dza mo dang go snyong? dang/ /tsi tra ka dang na le sha ma/ /chang dang sa dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rjes su btung ba blung par bya/ /'di yis rlung nad bad kan gyi/ /nad rnams sel bar byed ba yin/ /gsang ba'i gnas te
129a3(mdo 'grel): brgyad pa las/ rjes su btung ba'o/ /lus kyi rtsa ba mjug khung yin/ /sman blud der ni rab tu gnas/ /'di yi rkang mthil spyi bo'i bar/ /lus kun brtas par byed pa yin/ /khur chen dang ni bkres dang skoms/ /chang dang de bzhin rlung? rnams ni/ /rta
129a4(mdo 'grel): yis rab tu rnags nus shing/ /rtsa med na yang sems mi zhum/ /rta ni sha tshil rus pa brtan/ /gom pa shin tu yangs pa dang/ /lus ni mdzes bar gnas ba dang/ /rgyab dang rkang pa sra bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar shing ni rtsa ba nas/ /chu yis brlan par gyur pa na//
129a5(mdo 'grel): lo 'dab la sogs rgyas par 'gyur/ /rta yi 'jam rtsi'ang de dang 'dra/ /lus la gnas pa'i rlung lnga po/ /srog dang gyen tu thur sel dang/ /me dang snyam gnas khyab byed rnams/ /rjes su mthun par rgyu bar 'gyur/ /nga tshe thur sel rlung gi ni/ /med
129a6(mdo 'grel): snyam gnas skyed bar byed/ snyam gnas kyis kyang khyab byed bsten/ /nges kyang gzhan dag brtan par byed/ /de ltar gong nas gong du ni/ /'di dag rim gyis rjes mthun gnas/ /dper na sos ka'i nyi ma yis/ /sa la gnas pa'i chu tshogs kyi/ /gzi
129a7(mdo 'grel): mdangs slangs par gyur nas ni/ /nam mkha' i dos la gnas pa yin/ /rta la 'jam rtsi legs btang ba/ /de dang 'dra bar shes par bya/ /ji ltar leb rga na rtsis bsgyur ba'i/ /tshon ni 'dag chal gyis sal ltar/ /de bzhin mas btang ni ru ha/ /?
129b1(mdo 'grel): lam nas zhugs gyur pas/ /mgo nas rkang pa'i bar gyi ni/ /nad rnams sel bar byed pa rin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ mas btang ba'i las kyi yon tan bstan pa'o/ /sna sman gtong pa'i sbu gu ni/ /sor bcu ru ni bya bar bshad/
129b2(mdo 'grel): yang na steng nas blung bya ste/ /de yang ras bal nyid la gzeg /snga dro lto stong gyur pa yi/ /rta yi lus ni drang bor bzhag /'phral du blung kyis rgyun tu min/ /dbugs dbyung tshe na spyang par bya/ /sna sman btang brtsol ba dang/ /chu 'thungs pa las bsrung bar bya/ /gsang
129b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i gnas las/ sna sman btang ba'i cho ga'o/ /ru rta yung ba pi pi ling/ /bca' sga shing khun skyer khan dang/ /pri yang ku dang ra sna ni/ /lha cig sbyar te btags par bya/ /sman khu de la ra sna ni/ bzhi cha slar yang gzhag par bya/ /sna sman 'di ni gnye'u rengs dang/ /
129b4(mdo 'grel): sna rtsa'i nang la btang bar bya/ /de ni 'theng dang brang kha na/ /'gram pa dang ni brla rongs dang/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i/ /nad kun sel bar byad pa yin/ /gsang ba'i gnas le ru rta la sogs pa'i sna sman no/ /bu ram bca' sga'i rab 'am/ /pi pi ling dang
129b5(mdo 'grel): rgya mtshar sbyar/ /sna sman btang na 'gram pa snang/ /dpung pa mgo yi nad rnams dang/ /lkog nad dang ni rna ba'i nad/ /rgyab rengs sel bar byed pa yin/ /gsang ba'i gnas las bca' sga la sogs pa'i sna sman do/ /pi pi ling dang bca' sga dang/ /rgyam cha
129b6(mdo 'grel): bri ha ta'i 'bras bu/ /ba gcin dang ni sbyar ba dag /sna sman du ni btang bar bya/ /sna sman 'di yis rengs pa'i nad/ /cung zad rnyings par 'gyur ba yin/ /gsad pa'i gnas las pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sna sman no/ /bri ha ta ya 'bras bu ni/ /chu dang bcas pa
129b7(mdo 'grel): zhib tu btags/ /sna sman sbyang bar btang gyur na/ /ni ra na ka'i nad sel 'gyur/ /gsang pa'i gnas las bri ha ta'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'i sna sman no/ /sh+ri sha ni dang dzi bin+ta/ /shu dag ra sna thang shing dang/ /a ra sha dang bcas pa ni/ /ba gcin gyi
130a1(mdo 'grel): ni nad du bskol/ /rlung las gyur pa'i nad brgyad cu/ /sel bar byed par the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i gnas las sh+ri sha la sogs pa'i sna sman gyi le'u'o/ /a shwa gand+ha shu dag dang/ /gnye'u shu ti ru rta thang shing dang/ /a ba? dang
130a2(mdo 'grel): ni a su sha /sen ru ba ra ser po gnyis/ /chu yi nang zhu bskol nas ni/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur pa ni/ /rlung nad can gyi rta rnams la/ /mas btang ba yi sbyor ba bya/ /rlung nad sked pa'i tshigs gnas dang/ /de bzhin brla la brten pa la/ /rus pa
130a3(mdo 'grel): la gnas de thams cad/ /myur du sel bar byed pa yin/ /mdog dang stobs ni skyed byed de/ /rta yi 'jam rtsi'i mchog gyur yin/ /sbyor ba 'di yis lam rings su/ /bskol yang gnod pa med par 'gyur/ /'di byas gyur na rta de ni/ /rang
130a4(mdo 'grel): gi lus stobs bri mi 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ a shwa gand+ha la sogs pa'i 'jam rtsi'o/ /a buShpa dang lce myang tsha/ /tsi tra ka dang dbyi mong dang/ /shu ti ru rta shu dag dang/ /thang shing dang ni yungs kar rnams//
130a5(mdo 'grel): sman gyi phye mar? byas pa yis/ /'jam rtsi'i sbyor ba byas gyur na/ /rlung gi nad ni brgyad cu dang/ /mkhris pa'i nad ni bzhi ba cu dang/ /bad kan nad ni nyi shu dag /'jam rtsi 'di yis sel bar 'gyur/ /sha la ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas
130a6(mdo 'grel): las/ a bu sha la sogs pa'i 'jam rtsi'i/ /rta la phan par 'dod pa yis/ /ru rta brgyad par bshad par bya/ /ru rta shu ti shing mngar dang/ /e raN+Ta dang thang shing dang/ /skyer pa dang ni ha pu shing/ /bo son cha yi 'bras bu ni/ /cha
130a7(mdo 'grel): mnyam nyid du bsdus nas kyang/ /phye ma zhib mor btags nas ni/ /phye ma de las srang gcig cig /mar ram til mar dang sbyar la/ /'jam rtsi rta la btang gyur na/ /rlung mkhris pa yi nad rnams sel/ /khu ba zad dang gcod chen dang/ /rlung?
130b1(mdo 'grel): nad smad du zhugs pa dang/ /rlig skrangs gcin ni sri ba dang/ /rlung nad kyis ni sems bcom la/ /dus dang mthun pa'i snum dang ni/ /byin na phan par 'gyur ba yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas las/ ru rta'i brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jam rtsi'o//
130b2(mdo 'grel): pi pi ling dang bca' sga dang/ /na le sham dang dur byid dang/ /bri ta ta yi 'bras bu dang/ /gur gum de bzhin ga bur dang/ /gla rtsi dang ni rgya spos dang/ /de bzhin smig rkang nyid dang ni/ /skyer pa rnams ni cha mnyam byas/ /phye mar zhib du btags par bya/ /
130b3(mdo 'grel): de las 'jam rtsi'i sbyor ba ni/ /byas te rta la btang gyur na/ /rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad rnams ni/ /'jam rtsi 'di yis sel bar byed/ /gsang ba'i gnas las/ pi pi ling la sogs pa'i 'jam rtsi'o/ /sha kha ra ni srang gcig dang/ /ma du ka ni srang
130b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis dang/ /de bzhin mar ni srang lnga dang/ /'o ma las kyang srong bcu drug /'o ma'i 'jam rtsi 'di btang na/ /mkhris pa'i nad rnams sel bar 'gyur/ /khrag dang mkhris pa zhi byed la/ /stan? dang sos ka'i tshe na bsngags/ /gsang ba'i gnas las/ 'o
130b5(mdo 'grel): ma'i 'jam rtsi'o/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ 'jam rtsi'i le'u'o/ /phye ma mar ni kha ra 'am/ /bu ram dag dang sbyar byas la/ /chu 'dra dag dang bskyos pa ni/ /nang par rta la byin gyur na/ /ngal dang stobs dang dbug mi bde//
130b6(mdo 'grel): gcin 'gags pa yi nad rnams ni/ /'di yis 'phral du zhi byed cing/ /stobs kyang skyed par byed pa yin/ /sbeg dang gtseng chen gyis nyen dang/ /nyam chung lam gyis dub pa la/ /'o ma mar dang phyer byas pa'i/ /lde gus de la sbyin par bya/ /yang na phye
130b7(mdo 'grel): mar pi pi ling/ /kha ra dang sbyar sbyin gyur na/ /sems ni gsal par 'gyur ba yin/ /mkhris nad ngal ba sel bar 'gyur/ /lus kyis sbom pa nyis 'gyur bas/ /rtag tu rta la 'di sbyin bya/ /snga dro khrus byas chu 'thungs nas/ /phye yi lde gu sbyin par bya// 
131a1(mdo 'grel): gang gis khong par rlung zhugs dang/ /lus la mkhris pas nyen gyur pa/ /de la btung ba dang sbyar sbyin/ /rlung mkhris nad rnams sel bar byed/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad ba las/ phye ma'i lde gu'o/ /ya
131a2(mdo 'grel): bak+Shar tsha ba gsum/ /ser po gnyis dang tsitra ka /ka ra bir dkar rtsa ba/ /lce myang tsha dang bcas pa dang/ /arka'i rtsa ba pi sha la/ khang pa'i dud pa yungs kar bcas/ /de bzhin sa rdzi? k+Sha ra/ /dug ni cha phyed dang bsres pa/ /rang skyur dang ni
131a3(mdo 'grel): btags nas kyang/ /grib ma la ni skam par bya/ /ba gcin dang ni sbyar nas kyang/ /snga dro mdze can rta la sbyin/ ldan ldin rnam par sbyar nas kyang/ /thal sman gyis kyang dril phyis bya/ /phyi ba dang ni bsku ba dang/ /zhag bdun gyi ni bar du bya/ /'di
131a4(mdo 'grel): yis 'bus zos sbrul gyis zin/ /g.yan pa sngo dang 'brum phran dang/ /de bzhin pags pa'i nad gzhan dang/ /sdig pa dang ni de bzhin du/ /srog chags gdug pas zin pa dang/ /rkang nad gsor ni mi rung rnams/ /nges par sel bar byed pa yin/ /
131a5(mdo 'grel): thal sman gyi ni sbyor ba 'di/ /drang srong rnams kyis sngon tshe bshad/ /'di yis rma reg rtag tu ni/ /sbyang bar byed par the tshom med/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /arka'i thal sman no/ /nas tshig 'khus thal cho ga bzhin/ /byin
131a6(mdo 'grel): ba de yi yon tan gang/ /de ni nga yis bshad par bya/ /nges bshad pa las mnyan par gyis/ /chen po la ni srang gcig byin/ /cha gcig phri ba bar ma la/ /tha ma la ni srang phyed byin/ /yang thal la ni zho gnyis so/ /dbyar tshe til mar dang sbyar ba//
131a7(mdo 'grel): rtag tu sbyin par bya ba yin/ /dus kun tu ni mar bcas par/ /byin par gyur ba rab tu bsngags/ /'di yis sgrangs pa drug dang ni/ /mdze nad khong pa'i srin bu dang/ /rlung 'khyil ba dang sbos nang dang/ /gzer gyi nang dang gzhang 'brum dang/ /pho ba yin nad
131b1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ /kha yi nad rnams ma lus dang/ /shu ba'i nad rnams sel ba yin/ /de ni tshad tsam byin gyur na/ /stobs skyed mdog ni gsal bar byed/ /rta la nas tshig 'khus thal ba/ /bcung len mchog ni yin par bshad/ /rta gang rtag tu 'di 'thung ba
131b2(mdo 'grel): de ni rtag tu nad med 'gyur/ /de ni rlung gi nad rnams dang/ /mkhris pa dang ni bad kan dang/ /ldan pa dang ni 'dus pa dang/ /de bzhin glo bur ba yi nang/ /khrag las byung ba'i nad rnams sel/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ nas tshig 'khus
131b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i thal ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas gzhan yang lan tshwa yi/ /cho ga dam pa bshad par bya/ /lan tshwa yi ni yon tan rnams/ /bshad kyis de ni nyan par gyis/ /rgyam tsha rta la phan pa'i mchog /rlung dang bad kan sel bar byed/ /de yis snying nad ma zhu ba'i nad
131b4(mdo 'grel): rnams sel par byed pa yin/ /rta ni nad med par 'gyur zhing/ /rnga thog? kyang ni legs par skye/ /pho ba'i nad rnams 'byung mi 'gyur/ /jos pa myur du 'ju 'gyur zhing/ /bde ba kho nar smin par byed/ /lan tshwas rta yi gcin rtug dag /byed ba kho nar 'byung bar
131b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /lan tshwa rta yi tshe yin par/ /dus ni rtag tu bsngags pa yin/ /sman pas dgun stong dgun smad tshe/ /lan tshwa snga dro sbyin par bya/ /dpyid dang sos ka dbyar dang ston/ /phyi dro'i dus su sbyin par bya/ /rta ni mchog tu gyur pa la/ /lan tshwa srang drug sbyin par bya//
131b6(mdo 'grel): bar ma la ni srang bzhi sbyin/ /chud pa la ni srang gsum sbyin/ /dbyar gyi tshen lan tshwa ni/ /nimpa'i lo ma dang sbyar sbyin/ /dgun gyi tshe ni dgun tha yi/ /lo ma dang bcas sbyin par bya/ /pa to la yi lo mar bcas/ /dgun smad dang ni dpyid dus sbyin/ /sos? ka dang ni ston
131b7(mdo 'grel): gyi tshe/ /mar dang? sbyar ba sbyin par bya/ /lan tshwa yi ni sbyar ba 'di/ /bu la nga yis bshad pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ lan tshwa'i cho ga'o/ /tshangs pa drag po khyab 'jug ni/ /bad kan mkhris pa rlung dag can/ /?
132a1(mdo 'grel): rten bar byed ba dang/ /gcig la gcig ni ma 'dres gnas/ /de la tshangs ba bad kan te/ /drag po mkhris ba yin par bshad/ /khyab 'jug rlung gi bdag nyid can/ /de ltar tshul ni rnam gsum yin/ /sa la bcos mas gnas pa yin//
132a2(mdo 'grel): tshangs pa la sogs lha gsum po/ /lus can rnams kyi brtan pa'i rgyu/ /a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /ba ru dang 'bras bu gsum/ / 'di yi yon tan rnams dang ni/ /sbyor ba'i khyad par bshad par bya/ /rkeng pa brla yi nad sel cing/ /lus zad thams cad dang bar
132a3(mdo 'grel): byed/ /mdog dang stobs ni skyed pa'i mchog /de bzhin gnas gsum sbyor bar byed/ /'dis ni me drod skyed byed cing/ /smin dang brtas byed mchog yin no/ /de bas rlung dang mkhris pa dang/ /bang nad 'khrugs par gyur pa na/ /'bras bu gsum skol
132a4(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba yis/ /nad ni sbyod bar byed pa yin/ /a ru ra ni cha gcig ste/ /ba ru ra ni de'i nyis 'gyur/ /skyu ru ra ni ba ru ra'i/ /nyis 'gyur kho na gzhug par bya/ /sman ni bre gang dag dang ni/ /chu ni bre bzhi bskol bar bya/ /bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang/ /sman
132a5(mdo 'grel): khu de ni thab las dbog /tshags kyis legs par gtsags nas ni/ /dus kyi cho ga shes pa yi/ /ma stobs che chung brtags bas la/ /rta la nye bar blung par bya/ /rlung nad can la til mar sbyin/ /mkhris pa can la mar sbyar blung/ /bad kan can la
132a6(mdo 'grel): sle tres dang/ /pi pi ling dang sbyar ba blung/ /mig gi nad dang rlig skrangs dang/ /rma dang rus nad 'khums pa dang/ /rdo? dang g.yan pa 'brum phran dang/ /'brum bu lto? yi nad rnams dang /de bzhin lto nad gzhong 'dra dang/ /lkog nad 'bras kyi phreng ba
132a7(mdo 'grel): la/ /zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig par/ /blung na bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i gsong ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ 'bras bu gsum gyi sbyor ba'o/ /legs thos thos pa phun tshogs bas/ /sha li ho tra la dris pas/ /a ru ra ni gang nas skyes//
132b1(mdo 'grel): rigs ni du zhig ro du mchis/ /skye gnas rnam ba dur shes bgyi/ /ming dang kha dog mtshan nyid dang/ /rta yi nyes ba gang dang gang/ /sel 'gyur thub mchog khyed kyi gsungs/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang/ /sha li h+ro tras slar smras ba/ /brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thung pa ni/ /
132b2(mdo 'grel): thigs pa sa la lhung bar 'gyur/ /de las rigs dang yon tan ni/ /thams cad dang ldan sman skye 'gyur/ /bsil dang bdud rtsi'i thigs las byung/ /yon tan gsum ldan a ru ra/ /lan tshwa nyid ni ma gtogs pa/ /ro lnga dang ni ldan bshad de/ /bska dang mngar? dang
132b3(mdo 'grel): tsha ba dang/ /kha dang skyur bar grags dang ldan/ de ltar ro lnga bshad nas ni/ /de yi ming ni bshad par bya/ /rnam rgyal 'phel ba zhes bya dang/ /skem byed de bzhin bdud rtsi dang/ /nag po dang ni 'jigs med dang/ /'tsho byed ces ni ming du grags/ /rnam rgyal sku ba la
132b4(mdo 'grel): tur? zlum/ /'phel byed shin tu zlum pa yin/ skem byed rus pa che zhing dkar/ /bdud rtsi rtse mo sbom pa yin/ /'tsho byed gser gyi mdog can da?/ /'jigs med zur ni lnga ba yin/ /nag po zung gsum pa nyid de/ /rigs ni bdun du shes par bya/ /'jigs
132b5(mdo 'grel): med rta yi rkang pa yi/ /nad la rtag tu btang par bya/ /'phel byed dang ni bdud rtsi dag /rtag tu lta ba'i lus la btab/ /nag po spyod bar byed par bshad/ /'tsho byed stobs ni 'phel bar byed/ /skam byed mig gi nad la btang/ /rnam par rgyal ba 'khru bar byed/
132b6(mdo 'grel): de ltar rigs dang mi dag gi/ /rnam pa bdun du bshad ba yin/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur dang/ /khyad par du ni bad kan nang/ /mngon du 'phro byed a ru ra/ /skyur bas rlung ni sel bar byed/ /mngar dang kha bas mkhris ba sel/ /tsha dang bska bas bad kan
132b7(mdo 'grel): sel/ /de bas nyes gsum 'joms zhes bshad/ /rta la ji ltar sbyin bya ba/ /de yi nges ba mnyan par gyis/ /ba gcin nang du zla ba gcig /a ru ra? ni bzhag par bya/ /dang po'i zhag ni rdog ma lnga/ /gnyis pa la ni bcu sbyin bya/ /zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bar/
133a1(mdo 'grel): lnga lnga yis ni skyed par byas/ /nim pa yi ni khu ba dang/ /seng ldeng khu ba dang btags la/ /lcags kyi snod kyi nad bcug ste/ /mtshan mo bkab ste dben bar bzhag /lde gu btad ba'i tshad gang yin/ /snum gyi tshab kyang de? tsam du/ /
133a2(mdo 'grel): sman pa mchog gis sbyin bya yis/ /snum mangs skyon ni yod shes bya/ /shu ba g.yan pa 'brum bu dang/ /mdze nad rkang shu 'bras dang ni/ /nang ni rkang la zhugs pa dang/ /gzhang 'brum dang ni sha bkra dang/ /de bzhin rta yi rkang pa'i nang/ /a ru ra yis
133a3(mdo 'grel): sel bar byed/ /dbyar che rgyam tsha dang bcas sbyin/ /ston ni kha ra a ru ra/ /dgun ni bca' sga dang bcas pa/ /dgun smad kha ru tsha dang bcas/ /sbrang rtsi dang sbyar dpyid tshe sbyin/ /sos ka bu ram sbyar ba sbyin/ /de 'dras me yis shing bsngags ltar/ /nad
133a4(mdo 'grel): kyi tshogs rnams zang bar byed/ /gnad dang rus pa tshigs gnas dang/ /drug mdo dang ni gnas pa'i nang/ /rlung mkhris las ni gyur pa dang/ /de bzhin bad kan las gyur dang/ /khrag las gyur ba'i yan lag gi /nang ni sna tshogs gnas pa sel/ /
133a5(mdo 'grel): blo dang stobs des dbang po yi/ /tshogs kyi kha ni mjed pa yin/ /rlung dang mkhris ba bad kan gyi/ /nad rnams kha ni 'jums ba byed/ /gcin dang de bzhin rtug pa dang/ /dri ma rnams ni sbyong byed ba/ /a ru ras ni rta yi ni/ /nad ni ma lus 'joms
133a6(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ /sha li ho tra gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ /a ru ra yi cho ga'/ /sha li ho tra thub mchog la/ /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /gu gul ji ltar byung gyur cing/ /rang bzhin mchan nyid ci 'dra lags/ /tshad dang tshul ni ji tsam
133a7(mdo 'grel): zhig/ nad ni gang la btang bar bgyi/ /bu yis de skad dris pa dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /bdud rtsi bsrubs par gyur pa'i cha/ /thigs pa phra mor 'thor gyur ba/ /jam+bu'i? chu bo grub pa dang/ /dri zas rtan pa'i gnas su bab/ /de las rtsa ba rgyas
133b1(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /shing ni chen por skyes par gyur/ /de yi khu bcud 'dzags gyur pa/ /gu gul zhes ni bya bar grags/ /bska?  zhing tsha la kha ba ste/ /zhu rjes dngar po min par bshad/ /smin pa dzam bu'i gser 'dra zhing/ /smin pa g+hi wang lta buAng yin/ /de 'dra'i ser mdog
133b2(mdo 'grel): rten 'ong yin/ /de las zlog pa sman par 'ong/ /zhag bdun ba gcin dang sbyar ba/ /zhag pa dun 'bras bu gsum dang sbyar/ /zhag bdun mar dang sbyar rten pa/ /rjes su mthun pa btang bar bya/ /rlung gi nad la mar dang sbyar/ /bad kan nad lab gcin sbyar/ /mkhris pa
133b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu gsum sbyar btang/ /'di dag tshul ni rnam gsum yin/ /sos kha dang ni dbyar gyi tshe/ /mar dang sbyar te sbyin par bya/ /ston gyi tshe ni dgun stod ni/ /'bras bu gsum khu dang dang sbyar btang/ /dgun smad dang ni dpyid kyi tshe/ /ba gcin dang sbyar sbyin par bya/ /dang
133b4(mdo 'grel): po srang ni phyed sbyin zhing/ /srang phyed kyis ni rim bzhin skye/ /srang lnga dag gi tshad byas pa/ /tshe tshad kho na yin par bshad/ /rta la snga dro blung na ni/ /phyi dro kha zas sbyin bya ste/ /shin tu snum zhing yongs su byas/ /sha ni de la sbyin par bya/ /chu ni nye bar bskol ba dang/
133b5(mdo 'grel): ljang pa skam pa sbyin pa bsngags/ /rta ni tshan po nyid la ni/ /mthar gyis drug cu rtsa bzhi sbyin/ /bar ma la ni bzhi bcu brgyad/ /nye bar sbyin pa nyid du bya/ /chud du la ni srad sum cu/ /rtsa gnyis kyi ni tshad du sbyin/ /'di ni rta yi nad gzhi gsum/ /'khrugs par gyur
133b6(mdo 'grel): pa bsngags pa yin/ /tshigs bskrangs pa dang snyan? dang ni/ /de bzhin rma yi nad rnams dang/ /lus rengs yan lag skangs pa dang/ /skrangs dang gzhan kha'i nad rnams dang/ /lto ba yi ni nad rnams dang/ /de bzhin bad kan nad rnams dang/ /'theng ba'i nad ni thams
133b7(mdo 'grel): cad la/ /'dze mad bad kan las gyur dang/ /rta gang me drod nyams pa dang/ /de bzhin 'byung ba mi snyems dang/ /mtshan dang rlig pa skrangs pa dang/ nad rnams sbyor bar byed pa yin/ /rgod ma rte'u shor ba la mi chags/ /gang zhig rtag tu bu 'chi dang/ /gang zhig rtag tu
134a1(mdo 'grel): rlung gi gnod/ /nod ma de la'ang sman pas byin/ /lus kyi stobs dang goms pa dang/ /ma drod cha tshud? shes byas la?/ /nyam stobs brtan cing gzugs dregs gda' o/ /khur dang sdul rten nus bal/ /byin na bde ba nyid 'gyur gyi/ /gzhan la
134a2(mdo 'grel): bcud kyi len mi 'gyur/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad ba las/ gu gul gi cho ga'o/ /sha li ho tra drang srong mchog /legs thos kyis ni yongs dris pa/ /sgog skya ji ltar byung bar gyur/ /'di yor ni du ru bshad/ /ro mtshang zhes ji ltar
134a3(mdo 'grel): gdags/ /bcud kyi len du ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang zhig dang ni sbyar gyur na/ /sman gyi bya ba byed pa lags/ /nad ni gang la sbyin par bgyi/ /ci ltar na ni lus rgyas bgyi/ /bu yis de skad dris ba dang/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /lha dang lha min dag gis ni
134a4(mdo 'grel): gnas su bdud rtsi byung bar gyur/ /de byung pa dang lha rnams ni/ /thams cad 'bad de skud? bar byed/ /de tshem la phan 'dod pa/ /mkha' lding gis ni phrog par gyur/ /de ni shugs kyis sod ba ni/ /bdud rtsi thigs ba sal lhang/ /mi gtsang pa yis rmos
134a5(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /phyogs su lhung bas dri bar 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi las ni byung bas na/ /de bas bcud kyi len nyid yin/ /snum zhing bstan la ro lngar ldan/ /tsha zhing stobs ni skyed par byed/ /lci zhing ro tsha byed pa ste/ /skyur ba'i ro dang bral pa yin/ /de bas dom? tshang ba
134a6(mdo 'grel): zhes du? dang srod rnams kyis bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig rlung gi shugs kyis ni/ /yan lag 'byung 'am 'khums gyur tam/ /gang yang shin tu 'theng ba dang/ /gang zhig lam du dub 'thengs gyur/ /gang yang 'khyor zhing 'gro ba dang/ /byin pa rgyab
134a7(mdo 'grel): drug mdo dang/ /dpung pa pus mo rnams su ni/ /nang ni zhugs par gyur pa dang/ /rtsa rus sha dang rus? pa dang/ /rtsa la nad kyis khyab gyur pa/ de la sgog skya las lhag pa'i/ /stobs ldan sman gzhan yod ma yin/ /rta ni lho ba'i nad kyis nyen/ /sog skya chang
134b1(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar ba ni/ /cho ga bzhin du byin gyur na/ /myur du de las thar bar 'gyur/ /rlung 'khyil ba la sogs pa'i nad/ /khod pa la brten mi zad dang/ /skran dang mchin pa mkhal ma'i nad/ /me drod nyams par gyur pa'i nad/ /shin tu gso dka' thams cad kyang/ /
134b2(mdo 'grel): 'di yis nye bar sel bar byed/ /mngar dang tsha dang kha ba dang/ /bskra dang de bzhin lan tshwa ste/ /de ltar ro lnga dang ldan zhing/ /ro skyur gcig po med pa yin/ /'di la sa bon dngar ba yi/ /mtshan nyid yod par bshad pa yin/ /rtsa ba tsha ba nyid yin las/ /lo ma kha
134b3(mdo 'grel): ba yin par bshad/ /sdong bu'i ro ni bska ba yin/ /sdong bu'i rtse mo lan tshwa can/ /sbyor ba ji bzhin byas pa yis/ /'di yi yon tan bshad par bya/ /rlung gi nad la mar dang ni/ /sha khu dang sbyar btang bar bya/ /mkhris pa can la 'o ma dang/ /legs par bskol te
134b4(mdo 'grel): sbyin par bya/ /rang kyur kany+dzi dang sbyar ba'i/ /spo dang bshad ba 'gags pa sel/ /khongs pa'i srin bu rnams la ni/ /ba gcin dang ni sbyar ba blud/ /bad kan la ni 'bras bu gsum/ /khu ba dang sbyar blud par bya/ /'di ni sbegs pa'i rta rnams dang/ / rlung nad can dang sems   nyams dang/ /rta gang khrag dang nyams stobs bzang/ /de rnams brta ba'i mchog yin no/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde sel cing/ /nad kun 'joms par byed pa yin/ /til mar dang sbyar bar rlung 'joms/ /mar dang sbyar bas rlung mkhris sel/ /'o ma bu ram
134b5(mdo 'grel): shing khur sbyar/ /khrag dang mkhris pa sel byed yin/ /me drod nyams pa rgyam tsho dang/ /tshad dang sbyar te sbyin par bya/ /'on kyang sras ka ston gyi tshe/ /sgog skya sbyin par mi bya'o/ /gal te rmongs pas ster gyur na/ /rta ni nye bar gsod pa yin/ /zhu rjes kha dang
134b6(mdo 'grel): bdan? bas na/ /bad kan dang ni mkhris pa? sel?/ /rgod ma mngal ni chags byed cing/ /gseb kyi khu ba 'phel bar byed/ /rlung nad kyis ni nyen pa dang/ /tshigs su byung ba'i sman mchog yin/ /sgog pa las ni snum nyis 'gyur/ /bya ba sbyor ba la rab bsngags/ /snod ni
135a1(mdo 'grel): bzang bo'i nang bcug ste/ /shin tu dben pa'i gnas su sba/ /lo gcig lon bar gyur ba'i tshe/ /dri ni gang tshe byung gyur ba/ /de tshe dus kyi khyad par dang/ /rta yi stobs dang me drod dang/ /rang bzhin dang ni goms pa dag /shes par byas la legs bar
135a2(mdo 'grel): btang/ /nyin zhag bzang la lus sbyang par/ /gtar ka sbyang sogs kyis byas la/ /bcud kyi len gyi sbyor ba 'di/ /rta rnams la ni bya bar bshad/ /rta yi mchog ni rtag tu ni/ /de la srang ni nyi shu sbyin/ /bar ma la ni bco lnga ste/ /tha ma la ni bcu gnyis sbyin/ /
135a3(mdo 'grel): phag? dang de bzhin ma he dang/ /yang na byi'u gong ma sreg /rma bya dang ni ri dags sha /mar btab g.yos ni legs byas la/ /kha zas bzang po dang sbyar ba/ /byin bas lus ni brtas par bya/ /bcud kyi len kyi dam pa 'di/ /rta ni mang zhig brten bcas pa/ /shin
135a4(mdo 'grel): tu nyam nga la sbyar yang/ /lus ni 'bri bar 'gyur ma yin/ /sgog pa dag ni tshe la phan/ /stobs skyed kha dog bzang byed cing/ /lus 'di rgyas par byed bas na/ /ro rnams kyi ni mchog yin no/ /'di ni legs par bsten gyur na/ /na tshod rgas bar gyur ba yang//
135a5(mdo 'grel): shin tu gzhon pa nyid 'gyur zhing/ /nus pa kun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /legs ldan sha li ho? tra yis/ /rjes bstan de skad snus? pa yin/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te brgya dang las sgog skya'i cho ga rdzogs so// //sha li ho tra drang srong mchog /
135a6(mdo 'grel): nyi ma dang ni gza' snyam pa/ /rta gang na ni 'dug pa na/ /legs thos kyi ni yongs dris ba/ /rta la go cha bkon pa ni/ /ci 'dra ba zhig bgyi ba gsungs/ /de bzhin yan lag gcig bar ni/ /shing rta la sbyar bdag la gsungs/ /g.yul du dgra dang lhan cig ni/ /
135a7(mdo 'grel): 'thab ba na ni gnod med pa/ /rta yi las kyi cho ga mkhyen/ /'di ni khyed kyis bshad du gsol/ /legs thos kyi ni tshig thos nas/ /sha li ho tras slar smras pa/ /na tshod kyis ni che ba yis/ /skyes bus sngar ni smras pa yin/ /sum cu ma lon par ma yin/ lnga po
135b1(mdo 'grel): 'bri ba chung ngu yin/ /grangs ldan rnams kyi mi yi chad/ /de ltar sngar ni bshad pa yin/ /shing rta ba yang rta yi ni/ /bstan bcos shes shing legs par bya/ /mda' gzhu ral gri la sogs pa'i/ /mtshon cha yi ni thabs la mkhas/ /legs par go bgos yan lag bde//
135b2(mdo 'grel): de lta bu dag rta la skyon/ /rta ni rigs bzang legs btags la/ /'thab pa brtsed mo'i tshul du spyad/ /'di yi dbang po'i khur po ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad bar bya/ /dang bor cho ga srang tshad ni/ /brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yin par bshad/ /las gcig la ni rjes
135b3(mdo 'grel): bsngags pa/ /de yi srang tshad sum cur bshad/ /mgo bo 'gebs pa legs brdungs pa/ /srang tshad sum cu rtsa lngar bshad/ /brla 'gebs ba ni srang brgyad dang/ /de bzhin bcu ni yin par bshad/ /lkog ma dang ni rmig pa sogs/ /bsrun bzhin rgyas par byed pa ni/
135b4(mdo 'grel): thams cad srang ni lnga bcu ste/ /rta mchog la ni de ltar bya/ /bar ma la ni brgya yis 'bri/ /chung ngu la ni brgya lnga bcu/ /ci nas g.yul du shugs drags bas/ /'gro bar mi 'gyur de ltar bya/ /ral gri srang tshad nyi shu lnga/ /g.yon logs su ni gdags par bya//
135b5(mdo 'grel): gzhu nyid srang ni nyi shu lnga/ /de nyid du ni gdags par bya/ /g.yas ngos su ni mda' yi tshogs/ /brgya po srang ni nyi shu gsum/ /tshad du phyin pa gdags par bya/ /phub dang de bzhin thag pa yi/ /tshad ni 'dir ni ngas ma byas/ /mdung la'ang tshad de? cig yod gyur pas//
135b6(mdo 'grel): 'di 'dra gdags zhes de la smras/ /rta yi rgyab du sgab bya pa/ /ri dags ri'i bal sha raM? ga /spu gzhan 'jam pa las byas pa/ /sra zhing shin tu 'jams pa bya/ /shin tu legs par brtags pa la/ /sna tshogs mdog ni brgyan bar bya/ /de yi 'brel thag dang bcas
135b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ /srang ni sum cu'i tshad du bya/ /gdong brgyad srang? ni nyi shu lnga/ /legs par brlas ba gdags par bya/ /glo naM sdims par byed pas na/ /rgyab tu gnod skyed mi 'gyur bar/ /lugs la shin tu 'jam pa yi/ /srang bu kha ni legs par bya/ /yang na pags bra? 
136a1(mdo 'grel): nyes pa'am/ /ra ba la dkar po la byas pa'am/ /dar ram gso mngar la byas/ /gzhan yang mdzes shing sra la 'jam/ stan dang cha byad legs gnas pa'i/ /rdzas kyi gzo ni du ma bya/ /de bzhin gdong gzin srang tshad ni/ /bcu dag rna ba'i bar nas
136a2(mdo 'grel): gdags/ /gdong ni legs par bsrung byed pa/ /shin tu lags pa nyid du bya/ /g.yar ka shin tu snyan pa ni/ /srang re yi ni tshang byas pa/ /sra zhing lus ni bstan pa dag /rna ba'i nges nas gdags par bya/ /de ltar thams cad rtags nas ni/ /de rjes rtal? zhon par
136a3(mdo 'grel): bya/ /g.yul du rta yi bskur bya ba'i/ /khur dag bdag gis bshad pa yin/ /sha la ho tra gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ go chal sogs pa'i khur bstan pa zhes bya'o// //de nas shing rta dang sbyar ba'i/ nges pa nga yis bshad par bya/ /
136a4(mdo 'grel): rta ni gang gi mchu ltag na/ /shin tu shis pa'i mtshan ma yod/ /ba dan bzang po 'am zla brgyas/ /nya dang rgyal mtshan yod gyur pa/ /rta de rtag tu bsngags pa yin/ /de 'dra'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i/ /rta ni sa ster shis par bshad/ /ngang tshul bzang zhing bu
136a5(mdo 'grel): bzang la/ /skad ni dud dang 'dra gyur pa/ /rta nge rgyal po la shis bas/ /rigs mthun shing rta la sbyar bya/ /mdog dang tshad ni mtshungs gyur cing/ /stobs ldan nyon mongs bzod pa shis/ /'thab pa'i tshe ni mi skrag cing/ /'dres pa na yang mi 'then la//
136a6(mdo 'grel): mda' dang dbyeg pa mdung sogs kyis/ /rgyab pa na ni sran che ba/ /de 'dra ba yi rta dag ni/ /g.yul gyi dus su bsdags pa yin/ /rna bar bzlas pa'i tshen ni/ /mig las mchi ma 'byin byed cing/ /sna sbubs shin tu rgyas byas nas/ /nyi ma la yang lta bar
136a7(mdo 'grel): byed/ /rkang pa g.yas pas la ni/ /yang dang yang zu? rdeb? par byed/ /'di ni skye ba dran ba yi/ mtshan nyid dang ldan mchog tu bshad/ /de las zhan pa'i rta dan ngag /shing rta la yang sbyar mi bya/ /legs thos rnam pa thams cad du/ /rna ba ra bzlas la brtag
136b1(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /sngon tshong yis ji ltar thos/ /rna bar bzlas pa gang gis ni/ /rta ni shin tu rigs ldan byung/ /don med mi 'gyur de mnyam gyis/ /shing rta yan lag kun ldan zhing/ /'khor lo legs par brtags pa dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng
136b2(mdo 'grel): shin tu rdzogs pa nyid du sbyar/ /legs par sbrel zhing shin tu phyis/ /nyi ma lta bur gzi mdangs ldan/ /rigs dang mtshan nyid bzang ba yin/ /rta bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /kha lo bsgyur ba bzang bor bcas/ /'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra sgogs ba/ /shing rta de?
136b3(mdo 'grel): ni legs gnas ba /shar phyogs su ni kha bstan bzhag /g.yas su bskor zhing bkra shis dang/ /shis par brjod pa legs par bya/ /de ni rna ba g.yas pa ni/ /sngags kyi tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /khyod ni dri za'i rigs su skyes/ /rigs sun par ni
136b4(mdo 'grel): ma byed cig/ /khyed ni dngul las byung gyur zhing/ /dpal mo'i lag tu gnas na 'phel/ /me yi bu nyid khyod dran byos/ /ko sdu pa'i nor bu 'ang sngon/ /'o ma'i mtsho las bdud rtsi'i phyir/ /lha dang lha min gyis bsrubs tsha/ /dang po u tsa sra ba byung//
136b5(mdo 'grel): de las khyed skyes dran par gyis/ /shugs mchog ston de nga yis ni/ /dgra dpung ma lus las rgyal gyis/ /tshangs pa dang ni zlu ba dang/ /chu lha yi ni bden tshig dang/ /nyi ma yi ni gzi brjid dang/ /de bzhin drang srong dka' thub dang/ /stobs bzang gi ni changs
136b6(mdo 'grel): spyod dang/ /de bzhin rlung gir shugs nyid dang/ /ma nyid kyi ni nus mthu yis/ /rta khyod rgyal ba skyed gyur cig /'thab pa'i chan rta khyod kyi/ /gal te log bar 'gro 'gyur na/ /bram ze ba ma gsong 'dra yi/ nyes nga khyod kyis thos pad 'gyur/ /
136b7(mdo 'grel): gal te g.yul yas rgyal byung na/ /bdag po'i bde ba nyid skyed byed/ /oM nam/ A de tya ya lu? pa ya ga ga ga swAhA/ /rta yi rna ba g.yas par ni/ /'thab pa'i tshe na brjod gyur na/ /skye ba ngan pa tsam gyis ni/ /don med nyid du 'gyur ma yin/ /de 'dra'i
137a1(mdo 'grel): stobs dang snying stobs ldan/ /rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rtar zhugs/ /go bgos mtshon char ldan brtson ba/ /yul 'khor 'jigs pa las skyabs bya/ /sha li ho tra gsang ba'i gnas te brgyad pa las/ shing rta sbyar ba'i cho ga'o/ /
137a2(mdo 'grel): de nas rnam par bzlas bya ba/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngon gyi skye ba dran byed pa/ /shin tu nges par bshad bar bya/ /bu yi mtshan nyid 'di dag ni/ /dang po ngang las mnyan bar gyis/ /sbram na so brgya bla de nas/ /soms ba ru na sa tsa/ /o? dzaspa tse?
137a3(mdo 'grel): mo ba su rgyas/ /ma ni nam ta pa pa tata/ b+ha tra sa b+h+ra ma tsarye na/ /pa ba nas ba le na tsa/ /sa b+ha be na phu ta shas/ /ba rad+ha satra ma rung ga ma/ /oM ya ya ya ya/ /ga ga ga ga swAhA/ 'di ni bdag nyid chen po ni/ /rta yi snying por gyur ba yin/ /g.yul gyi dus su
137a4(mdo 'grel): dran bya yi/ /gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/ /legs bar rtags shing go bgos la/ /'dra ba la rtag zhon nas ni/ /'ga' zhig rang gi don gyi phyir/ /rmongs bas bdag nyid skyob byed kyi/ /legs thos rta yi lus yan lag /legs par srung ba mi byed na//
137a5(mdo 'grel): de tshe sdig can dmyal ba ni/ /yun rings du ni 'chod bar 'gyur/ /rta yi spu ni ci snyed pa'i/ /dmyal bar de tshe gnas par byed/ /rta la go zhing ma bskon yang/ /bdag nyid go gyon zhon gyur pa/ /mang du bshad pas ci zhig bya/ /de 'dra'i sdig pa yod ma
137a6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rta ni legs par bsrung bar bya/ /dka' thub yon tan kun gyi gter/ /rta tshe'i rig byed la mkhas ba/ /legs ldan sha li ho tra yis/ /'di skar ces bstan smras pa min/ /sha li ho tra'i gsang ba'i gnas te
137a7(mdo 'grel): brgyad ba las/ rnam par bzlas ba bstan pa'o/ /drang srong chen po sha li ho tras yang dag par bsdus ba'i rta'i tsho'i rigs byed mdza' dag rjes su bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyas ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsarya/ d+harma sh+rI b+ha dra/
137b1(mdo 'grel): bud+ha sh+rI shan+ti dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba chen bo dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cir zhus te gtan la phab ba'o// //dpal ldan rgyal po'i rgyal ba che/ /mi dbang mnga' bdag ces grags pa/ /brtsod ba'i dus su 'khrungs gyur kyang/ /dam pa'i
137b2(mdo 'grel): spyod ba kun dang ldan/ /khyed ni thams cad mkhyen dang cing/ /khyed la bzod dang bden sogs mnga' / /khyed la yon tan kun gnas ba/ /khyod nyid ston par 'os pa dang/ /khyed la mkhas dang rgyal phran gzhan/ /bram ze slong mo ba rnams kyis/ /rang re gser gyi dbang
137b3(mdo 'grel): phyug tu/ /rgyal chen khyed ni gcig tu bsgrags/ /mi dbang rgyal po dgyes pa dang/ /gso dpyad kyis gzhan phan gdags phyir/ /bka' yis bskul bas gzhung rgyas 'di/ /bong kyi rang skad spyod yul byas/ /chos ldan gzhung lugs la mkhas bas/ /sa rnamS
137b4(mdo 'grel): legs par skyong mdzad cing/ /yon tan phun tshogs kun ldan pas/ /skye dgu yun ring rkyang bar mdzod/ /drang srong shes pa rgya mtsho'i pha mthar phyin/ /mngon shes lnga ldan yon tan phun tshogs pa'i/ /sha li ho tras tshangs pa las thos nas/ /rta yi tshe'i rig byed
137b5(mdo 'grel): gang brtsams te/ /yul mtho sa gtsang 'dzam gling dkyil sgang na/ /mi rje lhas mdzad pur rgyal btsan po gdung/ /byang chub sems pa'i sprul pa'i rgyud du 'khrungs/ /mdza' bzhi'i rgyal po gzhan las khyad par 'phags/ /mkhyen pa'i gting phyin gso dpyad
137b6(mdo 'grel): kun la'ang mkhas/ /sa yi bdag po seng ge'i gzi byin gyis/ /rgyal phran glang chen myos pa'i dregs 'phrog pa/ /mi dbang bkra shis lha lnga btsan gyi bags/ /gsang sngags pha rol phyin dang bden ba yi/ /lung dang rig pa'i bstan bcos kun la mkhas/ /skye 'gro
137b7(mdo 'grel): dam pa mi dang mgyogs 'gro yi/ /tshe yi rig byed kun kyang zhugs slad du/ /sman la snying brtse bag yod khrel la sogs/ /gtong la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan/ /mi shes brda' sbrod sgra bsgyur lots+tsha bas/ /lha mi skal ba can gyis mchod pa'i
138a1(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /rin chen kun la yod kyang bzang po med/ /rin chen sngon 'gro bzang pos mdza' brgyan pa/ /gus pa sngon 'gro'i bka' yis rab bskul bas/ /sgra dang mtshan ma'i bstan bcos la mkhas pas/ /rgya gar mkhan po
138a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas zhing dpal dang/ /rta dpyad sha li ho tras bsdus pa bsgyur/ /'di ni dbang po'i rdo rjes sdebs tshul du/ /tshigs bcad phye dang bdun du byas pa'o// //sman dpyad gces grub ces bya ba le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa bzhugs// //
138a3(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha sar/ bod skad du/ sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba// //bam po dang po'o/ /sman dpyad kyi gzhung 'di la le'u bsdus pa sum cu rtsa gcig yod de/ rgyud kyi le'u dang/ sman gyi sde tshan gyi le'u dang/ zas kyi le'u
138a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'chi ltas kyi le'u dang/ rims kyi le'u dang/ 'khru ba'i le'u dang/ khrag lud pa'i le'u dang/ gcod chen po'i le'u dang/ skran gyi le'u dang/ dmu rdzing gi le'u dang/ gcin snyi ba'i le'u dang/ /mdze nad kyi le'u dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ mtshan
138a5(mdo 'grel): par rdol ba'i le'u dang/ skya rbab kyi le'u dang/ skyigs bu dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i le'u dang/ /lud pa'i le'u dang/ skyug pa dang/ skems pa'i le'u dang/ gcin sri ba'i le'u dang/ rtug skam gyi le'u dang/ smyo byed dang/ brjed byed kyi le'u
138a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ rlung nad kyi le'u dang/ chang nad kyi le'u dang/ me dpal gyi le'u dang/ skrangs pa'i le'u dang/ rma gso ba'i le'u dang/ mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u dang/ dug gso ba'i rgyud kyi le'u dang/ sman bcud kyi len dang/ ro tsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u
138a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ byis pa'i rgyud kyi le'u dang/ las rnam lnga'i le'u dang/ cho ga'i le'u rnams so/ /bgrod par dka' bas bsrungs pa'i bus/ /kun phan kun mkhyen phyag btsal te/ /yang dag phan pa gces grub 'di/ /nyi mas bsrungs pas bshad par
138b1(mdo 'grel): bya/ blo chung ngu gang dag tshe'i rig byed kyi rgya mtsho brgal bar mi nus pa de dag gis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ rgyud kyi gzhung 'grol bar 'di byas so/ /tshe 'din pa'i rig byed 'di ni/ /tshangs pas mtho ris su bshad do/ /rim gyis yul ka shi'i rgyal pos mi
138b2(mdo 'grel): rnams la bshad do/ /de la rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ 'di'i yan lag ni mig sman dang/ lus gso ba dang/ gdon bsal ba dang/ mtshon zug rngu dbyung ba dang/ dug las bsrung ba dang/ tshe bsrung ba dang/ byas pa bsrung ba dang/ khu chu 'phel bar bya ba'o/
138b3(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba chen po'i yon tan gyi rang bzhin can gyi mi ni/ nad kyi gzhi yin te/ de yang lus kyi nad dang/ sems kyi nad dang/ glo bur gyi nad dag/ lhan cig skyes pa'i nad rnams yin par 'dod do/ /de la lus kyi nad ni rims dang/ mdzel? sogs pa'o/ /
138b4(mdo 'grel): sems kyi nad ni khro ba la sogs pa'o/ /glo bur gyi nad ni gnad pa las byung ba'i nad do/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i nad ni bkres pa dang/ skom pa dang rga ba la sogs pa'o/ /dus ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste mig 'dzum pa'i yud tsam la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
138b5(mdo 'grel): can no/ /de'i rgyun gyi rnam pa dbye ba ni/ dus tshigs rnam drug tu bshad de/ de la dbyar zla tha chung dang/ ston zla ra ba gnyis ni dbyar gyi dus so/ /ston zla 'bring po dang/ ston zla tha chung gnyis ni ston gyi dus so/ /dgun zla ra ba dang/ dgun zla 'bring po gnyis ni
138b6(mdo 'grel): dgun gyi dus so/ /dgun zla tha chung dang/ dpyid zla ra ba gnyis ni dgun smad kyi dus so/ /dpyid zla 'bring po dang/ dpyid zla tha chung gnyis ni dpyid kyi dus so/ /dbyar zla ra ba dang/ dbyar zla 'bring po gnyis ni sos ga'i dus so/ /nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ba
138b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ lho phyogs su 'gro zhing lam gnyis su 'jug pa'i phyir/ de la char 'bab pa grang ba'i dus dang/ tsha ba'i dus su gyur pa'o/ /char 'bab pa dang/ grang ba dang/ tsha ba'i dus su mkhris pa dang/ bad kan dang/ rlung rnams gsog cing/ ston ?
139a1(mdo 'grel): dpyid dang dbyar 'khrug par gyur te/ nad kyi grangs dang/ dus kyi grangs rim bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/ /rlung nad ni phye 'breng kyi dus dang/ kha? zas zhu ba'i mjug tu ldang ngo/ /mkhris pa'i nad ni nyi ma'i gud dang/ nam phyed dang
139a2(mdo 'grel): kha zas 'ju ba'i tshe ldad do/ /bad kan ni zas zos ma thag dang/ srong dang/ snga dro ldang ngo/ /de bzhin du gnyis kyi cha 'dus pa dang/ gsum gyi cha 'dus pa'i bye brag gi nad gzhi 'khrug pa sbyar bar bya'o/ /nad gzhi dang/ lus zungs dang/ dri ma'i gnas
139a3(mdo 'grel): kyi lus ni lus zhes bya ste/ de dag cha mnyam na ni nad med do/ /shas che chung du gyur na ni nang du 'gyur ro/ /de la nad gzhi ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams so/ /lus zungs ni bdun te/ dang sa ma dang/ khrag dang/ sha dang tshil dang/ rus pa
139a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ rkad dang/ khu chu rnams so/ /dri ma ni phyi sa dang/ gcin dang/ rngul la sogs pa'o/ /rlung ni grang ba dang/ yang ba dang/ cha phra? ba dang/ mkhrang? pa dang/ rtsub pa dang/ mi brtan pa dang/ stobs che ba dang/ dbugs rgyu bar byed pa dang/ ngag
139a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar byed pa dang/ legs par 'jog pa dang/ bskyod pa dang/ dri ma 'byin pa rnams kyi bye brag dang ldan pa'o/ /mkhris ba ni skyur ba dang/ ro tsha ba dang/ drod tsha 'u ra ru ru byed ba dang/ 'jug par byed pa dang/ mdangs bskyed pa dang/ bzhin
139a6(mdo 'grel): mdog dmar ba'i rgyu byed pa'o/ /bad kan ni mdar ba dang/ lan tshwa'i ro bro ba dang/ 'jam pa dang/ lci ba dang/ shin tu 'byil ba'o/ /rlung ni gzhang dang/ sgu ngo dang/ 'dong mo'i bar gyi nang na gnas so/ /mkhris pa ni long ga'i nang na gnaS
139a7(mdo 'grel): so/ /bad kan ni pho ba dang/ lkog ma dang/ mthong ga dang/ mgo dang tshigs rnams kyi nad na gnas so/ /nad gzhi rnams nor bar byung na/ gnas de nyid kyi cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /tshabs che bar gyur na yang bye brag phyed par byas la/
139b1(mdo 'grel): cho ga bya ba bsgyur te bya'o/ /mngar ba la sogs pa ro rnam pa drug po rnams kyang/ nad gzhi de dag gi bye brag las nad med pa'i rgyu gang yin pa rtag tu bza' bar bya'o/ /de ltar ma byas na nad du 'gyur ro/ /tsha ba dang kha ba dang/ bskab rnams kyis ni rlung 'khrug par
139b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /tsha ba dang/ sgyur ba dang/ lan tshwa rnams kyis ni mkhris pa 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /mdar ba dang/ skyur ba dang/ lan tshwa rnams kyis ni bad kan 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /nad gzhi de dag zhi bar bya ba'i phyir de dag las ldog ste/ zos na nad
139b3(mdo 'grel): yod pa rnams ni sos par 'gyur ro/ /nad med pa rnams la ni bd ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /ro mngar ba ni mig la phan te/ lus zung 'phel bar byed do/ /skyur ba ni phyi sa bshad ba 'khru bar byed/ snying la phan pa dang/ zas 'ju ba dang/ tshod par byed
139b4(mdo 'grel): cing drod skyed par byed do/ /lan tshwa ni 'khru ba dang/ tshos par byed ba dang/ 'ju ba dang/ sha slo bar byed do/ /tsha ba cing tshos par byed do/ /kha ba ni rims dang/ skom pa'i nad sel cing tshos par byed do/ /kha ba ni rims dang/ skom pa'i nad sel ba dang/
139b5(mdo 'grel): drod bskyed pa dang/ 'khru bar byed yi ga 'byed par byed do/ /bska ba ni sha na bar byed pa dang/ sha 'bri ba dang/ rtug skams su byed/ 'khru ba gcod rma btso bar byed do/ /sman ni ro dang nus pa dag/ zhu ba rnams kyi rten yin pas na gtso bo yin no/ /ro
139b6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang/ /phyi ma phyi ma la/ snga ma snga ma ldan par yod pas na/ phyi ma phyi ma la gtso bo yin no/ /de la nus pa ni ro zhu bar ma gyur pa'i bar ma la byas te/ rdzas la gnas shing brten la/ grang ba dang tsha ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /yang na rjes
139b7(mdo 'grel): kyi mthu nyid la yang bya'o/ /ro rnams ni bya ba'i 'og tu mngar ba dang/ tsha ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi nad na snga ma ni lci/ phyi ma ni yang ngo/ /sman pa dang/ sman dang/ nad pa dang/ nad g.yog dang/ 'di bzhir ldan pa ni gso ba'i yan lag
140a1(mdo 'grel): yin te/ de dag dang mi ldan pa ni mi 'grub pa yin no/ /de la sman pa'i yan lag ni sman dpyad kyi yi ge kha ton tu bslabs shing don shes pa dang/ sman gyi las shes pa dang/ lag gsong ba dang/ gtsang zhing re ba med pa'o/ /nad
140a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i yan lag ni nor dang ldan pa dang/ tshe ma zad ba dang/ snying stobs dang ldan pa dang/ rang nyam dang ldan pa gsor rung ngo/ /sman gyi yan lag ni sa bzang po nas skyes pa dang/ ro che ba dang/ mchog tu gyur pa dang/ dus su legs par ?
140a3(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /nad g.yog gi yan lag ni gtsang zhing re ba med pa dang/ yi rang ba dang/ bag yod pa dang/ stobs dang ldan pa'o/ /sman btang ba'i las bya na/ yul dang/ dus dang/ na tshod dang/ me drod dang/ goms pa dang/ rang bzhin dang/ sman
140a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ lus dang/ snying stobs dang/ nyams stobs dang/ nang dang 'di rnams mthong nas gdod? bya'o/ /de la yul ni chu mang ba/ nags ri can ni gsher ba'i phyogs zhes bya ste/ bad kan dang rlung gi nang bskyed do/ /skams ni chu nyung zhing shing
140a5(mdo 'grel): nyung ba'i yul ta/ khrag las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad bskyed do/ /yul skam gsher gyi cha 'dren ma ni nad kyang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/ /na tshong kyang rnam pa gsum ste/ byis pa dang/ bar ma dang/ rgan bo'i/ /de la lo
140a6(mdo 'grel): gcig gi bar du 'o ma dang/ kha zas kyi 'tsho ba nas/ lo bcu drug gi bar du ni byis pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lo bdun cu'i bar du ni bar ma zhes bya'o/ /de phan chad ni rgan po zhes bya'o/ /de'i rim pa bzhin du bad kan dang/ mkhris pa dang/ rlung
140a7(mdo 'grel): shas che bar 'gyur te/ grangs bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/ /byis pa dang rgan po la ni thal sman tsha ba dang/ me btsa' dang/ gtar ka lta bu'i spyad drag po mi bya bar dpyad 'jam po bya'o/ /lus kyi bye brag kyang rnam pa gsum du 'dod de/ /lus skem? pa
140b1(mdo 'grel): la ni sha bskyed par bya'o/ /sha che ba la ni sha dbri ba'i sman bya'o/ /lus kyi sha ran pa la ni mi 'gyur bar bsrung ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /nyams stobs ni la la sha che la/ nyams stobs chung ba yang yod/ /la la sha skem la nyams stobs dang ldan pa yang
140b2(mdo 'grel): pas na/ sran yod pa dang/ rtsol phod pa dang/ sgyur dgar zhing sra ba rnams las nan tan du rtogs par bya'o/ /snying stobs ni mi 'gyur bar byed pa ste/ sdug bsngal bar gyur tam/ ma thos par gyur na/ de dang ldan pas sro shi ba dang/ ha cang dga' 
140b3(mdo 'grel): bar mi 'gyur ba ni/ snying stobs dang ldan pa'i mi yin no/ /goms pa ni gang la zas dang/ skom la sogs pa rang bzhin gyis mi mthun pa yin yang/ bde ba nyid du 'gyur ba de ni goms pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /mi rlung gi rang bzhin can ni/ lus
140b4(mdo 'grel): skem zhing rtsub pa dang/ skra srab pa dang/ sems rgod pa dang/ lus rgod pa dang/ smra ba mang ba dang/ rmi lam na nam mkha' la ldang ba yin no/ /mi mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can ni/ /dus la ma bab par skra dkar ba dang/ sha mdog dkar ba dang/ rdul snyi ba
140b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ spro thung ba dang/ sems rno ba dang/ rmi lam du me 'bar ba mthong ba yin no/ /mi bad kan gyi rang bzhin can ni/ sems brtan pa dang/ lus grims pa dang/ khu? mar ba dang/ skra snum pa dag/ rmi lam na chu dag/ dkar bag rmi ba yin no/ /nad

140b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ mkhris pa dang/ rlung rnams re re nas shas che bar gyur pa dang/ shas mnyam par gyur ba 'di bzhi las me'i drong kyang shas chung ba dang/ shas che ba dang/ drod ma snyoms pa dang/ drod snyoms pa dang/ rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ go rim bzhin? du so
