145a1(mdo 'grel): ni bad kan dang/ mkhris pa sel to/ /'bras zhag drug cus smin pa dkar bo ni ro mngar la bsil zhing lci ba yin te/ nad gzhi gsum 'joms par byed do/ /'bras zhag drug cus smin pa shan lpags nag bo ni/ snga ma las ro dang/
145a2(mdo 'grel): zhu pa'i mthu cung zad tsam gyis chung ngo/ /khre rgod ni rtsub pa yin te/ skem par byed cing rlung bskyed la/ bad kan dang/ mkhris bsel to/ /khre dang ci tsi dang ko ra du sha rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar bshad do/ /nas ni bsil ba yin te/ 'phyen cha zhing phyis
145a3(mdo 'grel): mang la/ mkhris pa dang bad kan sel bar byed do/ /gro ni bsil zhing lci la mngar ba yin te/ ro tsa bar byed pa rlung sel to// //mon sran sde'u ni/ bska zhing mngar ba yin te/ yang la bad kan dang mkhris pa dang/ khrag nad sel
145a4(mdo 'grel): to// //mon sran gre'u ni snum zhing lci la drod che ste/ 'dzag sgo dgu'i dri ma mad? ba dang/ ro tsa bar byed cing rlung sel to/ /mon sran dkar po ni/ ro tsa bar mi byed cing/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa sel la/ rlung gis nyam thag par byed do// //
145a5(mdo 'grel): rgya sran ni dbugs mi bde ba dang/ skyigs bu dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ bad kan dang/ khu chu dang rlung sel lo/ /mon sran na gu ni/ bsil ba yin te/ khrag lud pa'i rims sel zhing/ phyi sa 'gags bar byed do/ /mon sran can ni/ nyal bo la zhan bar
145a6(mdo 'grel): byed cing khrag gi nang dang/ bad kan dang/ mkhris ba sel la/ rlung bskyed par byed do/ /sran chung ni bsil zhing ro mngar te/ phyi sa 'gag par byed cing/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa sel to/ /sran chung ni sran cung dang 'dra bar bshad do/ /ce sran yang de dang
145a7(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba las/ lhag par rlung bskyed bar byed do/ /til ni thal ba'i ro bro ba dang/ mngar zhing kha la drod che ste/ nyam stobs dang/ mkhris pa bskyed do/ /spyir na gang bu can sna tshogs rnams ni/ bsil zhing rtsub pa yin te/ nyam stobs 'bri bar phyed do/ /da ni shing?
145b1(mdo 'grel): bye brag bshad de/ ra sha ni ha cang bsil ba yang ma yin/ ha cang lci ba yang ma yin/ ha cang snum pa yang ma yin te/ nad gzhi bskyed bar mi byed cing sel bar byed do/ /lug sha ni mang shing bsil la/ lci ba yin te/ phyi sa 'gag pa dang/ sha skye bar byed do/ /ma he'i sha ni?
145b2(mdo 'grel): snum zhing lci ba yin te/ gnyid 'ong bar byed la/ khu chu mang bar byed cing/ sha skye bar byed do/ /phag shin lci ba yin te/ ro tsa bar byed cing rlung sel la/ rdul snyi par byed do/ /ri bong gi sha ni me drod bskyed cing/ bad kan dang mkhris pa sel la/ rlung ni bskyed brir mi
145b3(mdo 'grel): byed de tha mal pa'o/ /khar go sol gyi sha ni bsil ba yin te/ nad gzhi gsum sel zhing/ phyis dang gcin sri bar byed do/ /rma bya'i sha ni rlung sel zhing/ rna ba gsang ba dang/ mig rno ba dang/ sha mdog bzang ba dang/ skad snyan ba dang/ khu chu 'phel bar byed do/ /bya
145b4(mdo 'grel): gag gi sha ni/ snum zhin lci la drod che ba yin te/ rlung sel cing ro tsa bar byed do/ /sreg pa'i sha ni/ ha cang lci ba yang ma yin/ ha cang drod che ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mngar ba yang Fma yin te/ nad gzhi thams cad sel to/ /'ur pa dang/ co?  ga dang/ brta ka rnams
145b5(mdo 'grel): kyi sha ni/ drod bskyed cing 'dus pa'i nad sel to/ /mchil pa'i sha ni/ 'dus pa'i nad sel cing/ bad kan dang/ khu chu 'phel bar byed do/ /gong ma sreg gi sha ni bsil zhing yang pa yin te/ bad kan dang/ khrag lud pa'i nad sel to/ /phug ron gyi sha ni
145b6(mdo 'grel): bsil zhing lci ba yin te/ khrag lud pa'i nad? sel to/ /phug ron sngon po dang/ thi ba'i sha ni de las cung zad tsam gyis yang ngo/ /chu bya rnams kyi sha ni/ snum zhing drong che la lci ba yin te/ ro tsa bar byed cing rlung sel to/ /de dag gi nang na/ bya dang ba'i sha
145b7(mdo 'grel): ni ro tsa par? byed cing/ shas cher rlung sel to/ /nya sha ni snum la drod che zhing/ lci ba yin te/ rlung sel cing mkhris pa'i nad dang/ khrag lus pa'i nad bskyed de/ /chu'i srog chags bu lu ki dang/ rus sbal dang/ karka Ta rnams kyi sha ni rlung dang/ mkhris pa sel
146a1(mdo 'grel): zhing/ ro ca bar byed do// //da ni ldum dang sdang kyi bye brag bshad de/ ldum ka ka ma tsi ni/ nad gzhi gsum sel to/ /ka la ma ni nu zho 'thel ba dang/ ro tsa bar byed do/ /tsi ge ri ni bang kan dang/ rlung sel to/ /yungs kar gyi lo mas ni
146a2(mdo 'grel): nad gzhi thams cad bskyed do/ /rgya sne'u dang/ sne'u tshul li dang/ sne'u rgod dang/ mon sne'u dmar ru dang/ 'di rnams ni rlung dang/ bad kan sel zhing/ phyis bde bar 'byung ba dang/ khrag lud pa'i nad med par byed do/ /la phug rjen pa ni nad gzhi? bskyed
146a3(mdo 'grel): par byed do/ /btsos? pa ni rlung dang/ bad kan sel to/ /la phug gzhon nu ni nad gzhi thams cad sel zhing/ snying dang lkog ma la phan no/ /karko Ta ka dang/ bArta ka dang/ pa to la dang/ karbe la ka dang/ 'di rnams ni/ mdze dang gcin nad dang/ dbugs mi?
146a4(mdo 'grel): bde ba dang/ lud pa dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan sel to/ /kushma? sa? Da ni/ nad gzhi thams cad sel zhing/ snying la phan te chu so sbyong ngo/ /ka ling ka'i 'bras bu dang/ ku ba ni mkhris pa sel zhing/ rlung bskyed do/ /gru sa dang/ ga gon ni/ rlung dang/

146a6(mdo 'grel): ni lci zhing bsil te/ khrag lung pa'i nad sel zhing/ ro tsa ba dang/ nu zho 'phel bar byed do// //da ni shing tog gi bye brag bshad de/ bal po se'u ni phyi sa sri bar byed cing/ 'khru ba gcod/ rlung sel la/ bad kan dang mkhris pa dang yang
146a7(mdo 'grel): mi 'phrod pa ma yin no/ /skyu ru ra ni de dang 'dra ba las/ zos pa'i rjes la ro mngar bar 'gyur zhing/ nad gzhi 'jig pa dang 'khru ba dang/ ro tsa bar byed do/ /kha lung ni skran dang/ rlung dang/ bad kan dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lung ba rnams sel to//

146b2(mdo 'grel): skye bar byed la/ bad kan dang mkhris pa sel te/ phyi sa sri zhing sbo bar byed do/ /tindu ka'i 'bras bus ni/ bad kan dang mkhris ba sel to/ /rgya shug gi shing tog ni/ rlung dang mkhris pa sel to/ /bilba'i shing tog ni/ rlung bskyed cing thur du mi 'byung bar
146b3(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /pi ya la'i shing tog ni rlung sel to/ /shing ta la dang/ rA jA da na dang/ chu shing gi 'bras bu dang/ pa na sa dang/ na li ker rnams kyi shing tog ni/ mngar zhing snum la lci ba yin te/ khu chu dang sha skye bar byed do/ /rgun dang/ ma d+hu ka dang/ bra

147a1(mdo 'grel): rno ba yin te/ snying na bsel zhing/ rlung dang 'phrod do/ /tsha khang ni/ de dang 'dra ba las cung zad tsam gyis mthu chung ngo/ /rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa ni lci ba yin te/ kha zas 'drul bar byed do/ /nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba ni/ dug dang/

147a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i chu ni yang pa yin te/ nad gzhi sel zhing snying la phan te/ dug sal to/ /char pa'i chu sa gzhi dang/ snod sna tshogs tha dad pa dang/ phrad pa las ni/ de'i ro'i bye brag dang/ mthu yang tha dad par 'gyur ro/ /'bab chu ni rtsub pa yin te rlung bskyed do/

149b5(mdo 'grel): rims nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rims nad ni nad do cog gi rgyal po yin par bshad do/ /de bas na 'dir/ de gso ba'i cho ga 'di thog ma kho nar bshad de/ rims ni thog ma lha chen po drag po zhes bya ba la/ drang srong shes nyen can zhes bya bas

149b7(mdo 'grel): du? bad kan gsum 'dus pa'i rims dang/ glo bur gyi rims dang/ rims rnam pa brgyad du gyur to/ /de la rims thog mar byung ba'i thabs ni/ kha zas kyi nyes pa dang/ 'dug nyal la sogs pa'i gnas pa'i nyes pa las nad gzhi rnams so po ?
150a1(mdo 'grel): nang du zhugs te/ khong pa'i drang phyi rol tu bton pa de dang/ dangs ma dang 'dus shing gnas par gyur pa ni rims bskyed par byed do/ /de la rlung las gyur ba'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ lus grang zhing 'dar ba dang/ mgo
150a2(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba dang/ sla ba dang/ ba spu langs pa dang/ glal? zhing bya rmyang byed pa dang/ mgo po dang// rkang pa dang/ brla dang rtsib logs na zhing/ byin snying skyur ba dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ mig dang pags pa'i mdog dang/ sen mo dang/ phyin
150a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ gcin rnams mdog gnag cing khar ro bska ba bro ba dang/ 'gram pa na ba dang/ dbugs mi bde zhing lung pa 'gogs su mi btub ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ lus shin tu tsha ba dang/ khong pha tsha ba
150a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ brgyal ba dang/ rdul 'byung ba dang/ kha'i ro tsha bar bro ba'am/ mgo 'khor ba dang/ sla ba dang/ sna'i nad dang/ kha'i nad dang/ mchu dang lkog ma rnams su 'brum pa 'byung ba dang/ khro zhing shin tu khro ba dang/ bsil ba
150a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa dang/ mig dang/ sen mo dang/ pags pa'i mdog dang/ phyi sa dang/ gcin rnams kyi mdog ser ba dang/ sgregs pa'i ro kha ba dang/ 'khyu ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud
150a6(mdo 'grel): pa lu ba dang/ cham pa dang/ mchil ma mang ba dang/ yig 'chus ba dang/ skyug ba dang/ gnyid che ba dang/ lus lci ba dang/ dang ga mer mer por gyur pa dang/ slong bar gyur pa dang/ /bar na ngar ba bro? ba dang/ grang 'brum 'byung ba dang/ mig dang
150a7(mdo 'grel): sen mo dang/ pags ba'i mdog dang/ phyi sa dang/ gcin gyi mdog skya? ba dang/ dro ba 'dod pa rnams yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ skom dang che ba dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ lkog mngar/ kha
150b1(mdo 'grel): sgam pa dang/ sbu langs pa dang/ gnyid mi 'ong ba dang/ skyug ba dang/ tshigs dang/ klad pa rab tu na ba rnams yin par bshad do/ /rlung dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi mtshan ma ni/ snyom pa dang/ slod par gyur pa dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ tshigs
150b2(mdo 'grel): dang /klad pa na ba dang/ lus lci ba dang/ lus grang ba dang/ lud ba dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ lus rdul ba rnams las rtogs par bya'o/ /mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims kyi tshul ni/ phyed grang phyed tsha ba dang/ yig 'chus pa dang/
150b3(mdo 'grel): rdul 'byung ba dang/ lu ba dang snyom pa dang/ khar ro kha ba bro dang/ rmongs pa dang/ sgyid lug pa dang/ skom dang che ba rnams yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang/ bad kan gsum 'dus pa las/ rims nang du gyur pa'i tshul ni/ tshigs dang rus pa dang/ klad pa na ba dang/
150b4(mdo 'grel): byed grang phyed tsha ba dang/ snyom pa dang/ yig 'chus pa dang/ mgo 'khor ba dang/ lkog ma dar dar brer? ba dang/ rna bar zug pa dang/ mig dmar zhing yon par gyur pa dang/ kha nas mkhris pa dang/ khrag 'byung ba dang/ skyug pa dang/ skom dang che ba dang/
150b5(mdo 'grel): nub mo gnyid mi 'ong ba dang/ lce tshig pa bzhin nag por gyur zhing/ reg na rtsub pa dang/ lus kyi mdog sngo bsangs su gyur cing/ 'brum bu dmar po 'thon pa dang/ 'dzag sgo rnams nas 'brum bu 'byung ba dang/ skyug pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba
150b6(mdo 'grel): rnams yin te/ rnam pa 'di dag thams cad tshang bar gyur na gsor mi rud ngo/ /tshad par gyur na gso dka' bar bshad de/ glo bur gyi rims ni/ snang pa dang/ sngags drag po spyod pa dang/ dmod pa dang/ gdon gyis btab pa las gyur ba dang/
150b7(mdo 'grel): sems 'khrug pa'i gdud pa las mkhris pa'i rims tsha bar 'gyur te/ de yang 'dod pa dang/ mya ngan dang /'jigs pa dang/ /bro pa rnams las sems 'khrugs te/ rims su gyur te/ /de dag lta bu las rims su gyur nas ni nad gzhi rlung dang 
151a1(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa dang/ bad kan gsum gang byung ba las rims su gyur pa de dag so so'i mtshan mas bstan to/ /rims nad gso pa'i thabs ni/ rims thog ma byung ma thag tu nyams stobs la mi gnod par smyung ba'i cho ga bya'o//?
151a2(mdo 'grel): rlung dang dal ba dang/ khro ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ lud pa lu ba dang /blo rdol ba rnams la rims su gyur pa la ni smyung ba'i cho ga mi bya'o/ smyung bar bya ba'i tshad ni bkres shing skom par gyur pa dang/ phyi sa dang gcin tshul bzhin du 'byung bar gyur ?
151a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ lus yang bar gyur na smyung ba'i cho ga legs pa yin no/ /smyung ba'i cho ga ha cang drags na ni skem pa'i nad dang/ snyom pa dang mgo 'khor ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ ngal ba'i nang du 'gyur ro/ /de la bad kan dang rlung gi rims
151a4(mdo 'grel): la ni skom du chu skol pa dren po blud do/ /mkhris ba dang/ chang dang/ dug las gyur pa'i rims la ni skom pa'i khu ba grang mo blung do/ /bca' sga dang/ ba le ka dang/ ldum bu skrol dang/ pu shel tse dang/ gla sgang dang tsan dang rnams skol
151a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i khu ba grang mo blud na yang skom pa dang skyug pa dang/ rims dang/ lus tsha ba sel to/ /smyung pa'i cho ga byas pa'i rjes la/ kha zas smin ba ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan so so'i chos par byed pa'i sman gang yin pa'i khu ba las gzhi
151a6(mdo 'grel): blangs pa'i thug pa phan zhing 'phrod par blud do/ /yang na 'bras yos btags pa'i thug pa sla ba bca' sgas btab pa blud do/ /yang na rlung gi rims la ni/ sa lu'i chan ri dags dang/ ri bya'i sha khu bcad dang bcas pa sbyin no/ /nges zhi
151a7(mdo 'grel): bar ma gyur na/ zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu chos par byed pa'i sman dang/ zhi bar byed pa'i sman blud do/ /zhag bdun gyi snga rol rims gsar bu byung pa'i tshe/ sman btang ba ni sman de nyid kyis nang gzhi shin tu skyed par byed da/ /de la rlung
151b1(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i rims la ni chos par byed pa'i sman bilba la sogs pa rtsa ba lnga skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na bi bi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ sle tres dang/ bca' sga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khub blud do/ /yang na sle tres dang /kla spang dang/ gyi tser dang/ bcas
151b2(mdo 'grel): sga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i su ba blud do/ /yang na skyu ru ra dang/ gla sgang dang/ rtsa pa lnga pa dang/ sle tres dang/ 'u su'i 'bras bu rnams lhan cig skol pa'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na rtsa mkhris dang/ gla sgang dang/ sle tres dang/ ba la ka dang/ brig tI rnam gnyis
151b3(mdo 'grel): dang /gzem rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na s+thi ra dang/ ka la shi dang/ bca' sba rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud na rlung nad la phan no/ /yang na thal tres dang/ pi pi ling dang/ rgun dang/ shu ti'i 'bras bu dang/ ta de nu pa rnams lhan
151b4(mdo 'grel): cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na thang shing dang/ bri k+Sha da na dir/ sman ra sna dang/ sgron shing dang/ e la ba lu ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i lu ba blud do/ /yang na/ sle tres dang/ aM shu ma ti dang/ rgun dang pa tya la ka rnams lhan cig skol pa'i khu ba
151b5(mdo 'grel): blud do/ /yang nang sna dang/ shing mngar dang/ dod ka rang/ ti pa la dang/ shal ma li dang/ ba la rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na khyi lce ba dang/ rkun dang shi ri sar ni dang/ thal tres dang/ sle tres rnams lhan cig skol ba'i lu ba blud do//
151b6(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams ni rlung las gyur pa'i rims sel par byed do/ /gong nas thal tres zhes smos pa man chad kyi sbyor ba lnga po 'di dag kun gyi zhu pa ni bu ram dang spang par bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni/ tshos par byed pa'i sman skyu ru ra dang
151b7(mdo 'grel): rgun dang/ ba la ka dang/ rtsa mkhris rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do /yang na bu tsa shal dang/ rgun dang/ nampi dang/ shing mngar rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /mang na am bra dang/ rtsa mkhril ba dang/ bya tsher pa dang smo lo rnams
152a1(mdo 'grel): lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na dug mo nyung dang/ pu tse shal dang/ gla sgang dang/ shing mngar rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na gser phrom dang/ me tog utpa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ thal tres dang/
152a2(mdo 'grel): sle tres rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba khar dang sbyar pa'am/ yang na skro lo skol ba'i khu ba grang ba blud na mkhris pa'i rims sel to/ /yang na khyi lce pa dang/ skro lo dang/ ba la ka dang/ pu tshe shel dang/ rtsa mkhris dang/ byi tsher rnams
152a3(mdo 'grel): lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyor zhing blud na mkhris pa'i rims sel to/ /yang na pu tse she la dang/ rtsa mkhris dang/ byi tsher rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud na mkhris pa'i rims
152a4(mdo 'grel): sel to/ /yang na bu tse shel dang/ katbal dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ gla sgang rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na gong du sman gyi sde tshan bshad pa'i skabs nas smos pa/ thal tres la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang/ utpal sogs pa'i sde tshan
152a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis so sor skol ba'i khu ba khar dang sbyar ba so sor blud do/ /yang na gla sgang dang/ a ru ra dang/ rgun dang/ pu tso shel dang/ dong ka dang/ skra lo rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na bu tse shel btags te kha ra dang sbyar te btang na mkhris
152a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i rims nang sel to/ /yang na bu tse shel dang/ byi cher dang/ rtsa mkhris dang/ rtsa sh+ya ma dang/ skro lo dang/ ba sha ka rnams lhan cig skol te bsgrangs pa'i khu ba khar dang sbyar te blud na/ khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims sel to//
152a7(mdo 'grel): bad kan las gyur pa'i rims la ni/ chos par byed pa'i kha lung gi rtsa ba dang/ bca' sga dang/ sle tes dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba nas tshig 'khrus pa'i thal pa dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde
152b1(mdo 'grel): tshan sngar bstan pa rnams skol ba'i khu ba nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar ba blud do/ /yang na bu ce shel dang/ a ru da dang/ dbyi mo dang/ dbyi mo dang/ thang shing dang/ yung rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na am ba ta dang/ pu ca shel dang/ mun dang
152b2(mdo 'grel): a rany+dza dang/ a ri ta dang/ ku la ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud ngo/ /yang na bca' sga dang/ bong da dkar po dang/ ru rta dang/ thang shing dang/ byi tsher dang/ gla sgad rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na tsha ba gsum zhes bya ba/ bca' 
152b3(mdo 'grel): sga dang/ pi pi ling dang/ ma le sham rnams dang/ sman na gtam la dang/ shi ri par+Ni dang/ sgron shing dang/ sle tres rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na nA ge ga sar dang/ yung dang/ skyer pa dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ pu tse shel dang/ dug mo
152b4(mdo 'grel): nyung lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud ngo/ /yang na bca' sga dang/ byi tsher dang/ ba sha ka dang/ gla sgang rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na dong ga dang/ dug mo nyung kyi shun lbags? dang/ mu rba dang/ bye'u rug pa dang/ ke'u ka rnams lhan cig
152b5(mdo 'grel): skol pa'i khu pa blung ngo/ /sman gyi sbyar ba bdun po 'od dang kyang/ bad kan gyi rims sel to/ /yang na nim pa dang/ bca' sga dang/ sle tres dang/ thang shing dang/ li zung pa dang/ rtsa mkhris dang/ ma ru dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bri ha tI rnams lhan cig kol
152b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i khu ba blud na bad kan gyi rims sal to/ /yang na sa pta? par+Ni dang/ sle tres dang/ nima pa dang/ stag ma rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud na pad kan gyi rims sel bar byed do/ /rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis
152b7(mdo 'grel): 'dus pa'i rims la ni chos par byed pa'i sman/ kaN+Da ka ri dang/ bal dang/ ra sna dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ sle tres dang/ rtsa sh+ya ma rnams skol ba'i khu ba blud na sel bar byed do/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum dang/ sha ma li dang/ ra sna dang/ dod ka dang/
153a1(mdo 'grel): ba shi rnams lhan cig bskol ba'i khu ba blud na/ rlung dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rims myur du sel to/ /yang na shing mngar dang/ thal tres dang/ rgun dang/ tsan dan dang/ me tog ma b+hu ka dang/ utpa la dang/ taM?
153a2(mdo 'grel): pa la dang/ shug pa dang/ gseng phrom dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ pad+ma'i ze ba dang/ ba ru sha ka dang/ pu shel tso rnams chu bzang po'i nang du skol te/ bsgrangs la zhag yon par byas pa'i nang du/ 'bras so brdos la phub ma bsal
153a3(mdo 'grel): te btags pa dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ khar dang sbyar te blung na/ rlung dang/ mkhris pa'i rims dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ skom pa'i nad dang/ brgyal ba dang/ smyug bro ba dang/ mgo 'khor ba dang/ khrag lung pa'i nad rnams sel to/ sprin la rlung
153a4(mdo 'grel): bab pa bzhin no/ /rlung dang bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims la ni/ tshos par byed pa'i sman pa'i sman bi pi ling dang/ rgun lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs te sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud do/ /yang na dong ka la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan sngar
153a5(mdo 'grel): bstan pa rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba go snyod btags pa dang/ bu ram dang sbyar te blud do/ /yang na thang shing dang/ skro lo dang/ brgi dang/ gla sgang dang/ shud ba dang/ 'u su'i 'bras bu dang/ katpal/ /a ru ra dang/ bca' sga dang/ rtswa bu
153a6(mdo 'grel): tika rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ shing kun dang/ sbrang rtsi shas bskyed de sbyar ba 'thungs na/ bad kan dang/ rlung gi rims dang/ skyigs bu dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lkog nang lha gor dang/ lud pa dang/ skem pa'i nang
153a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ mchil ma mang du 'byung ba rnams sel to/ /shing la thog shog 'bab pa bzhin no/ /bad kan dang/ mkhris pa gnyis 'dus ba las gyur pa'i rims la ni/ tshos par byed pa'i sman shing mngar dang/ /bal dang/ a ra sha dang/ ba
153b1(mdo 'grel): tol dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ 'di rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na myur du sel bar byed do/ /yang na yung dang skyer ma dang/ gla sgang dang/ bu shel tso dang/ shing mngar dang/ dod ga rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs te/ sbrang rtsi
153b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ sbyar te blung na/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa'i rims med par byed do/ /nad gzhi rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rims gso ba'i thabs ni/ gnyis shas chel/ gcig shas chung na gang shas chung
153b3(mdo 'grel): ba de'i stobs bskyed par bya'o/ /gcig shas che la gnyis shas chung na/ gang shas che ba'i stobs dbri bar bya'o/ /yang na gang shas chung bde'i stobs bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar shas che chung mi mnyam pa la ni/ mdor na gang shas che ba'i stobs
153b4(mdo 'grel): ni dbri/ gang shas chung ba'i stobs ni bskyed de/ ci nas kyang stobs mnyam zhing cha mthun par bya'o/ /gsum char shas mnyam du 'khrug pa la ni/ thog mar bad kan gzhi la ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu mkhris pa gzhil ba'i cho ga bya'o//
153b5(mdo 'grel): de nas rlung gzhil pa'i cho ga bya ste/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis nad gzi gsum las gyur pa'i rims gzhom par bya'o/ /de la gsum 'dus pa'i rims la ni tshos par byed pa'i smand+ham ka dang/ /'bras bu gsum dang/ thang shing dang/ shug
153b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ tsan dan dang/ bu shel tsa dang/ pu tso shel dang/ shing pa ru sha ka rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na rtsa ba gsum dang/ gla sgang dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ pu tsa shel dang/ pa to la dang/ ha ri sta dang/ dug mo nyung dang/
153b7(mdo 'grel): rtsa mkhris dang/ sle tres dang/ pa ta rnams lhan cag skol ba'i khu ba yang nang gzhi gsum las gyur pa'i rims sel to/ /gsum 'dus pa'i rims de'i mjug tu sna drung du skrang bar gyur na de ni gso dka' ba yin te/ gtar te khrag dbyung
154a1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ sman gyis bsku ba dang/ mar btung bas gzhil bar bya'o/ /nad gzhi gsum 'dus pas/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems kyi spyod pa rnams ro bzhin du bya pa mi byed par bsdus nas/ srog la thug pa'i nad rong 'byin?
154a2(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ba bskyed par byed de/ rong 'byin pa'i nad de mi la thebs par gyur na/ shi ba'i khongs su bcug ste/ so shi bsngo bar dam bcas nas/ snod chur bying ba bsnyeg ba bzhin du/ bang bya stod la myur tu nyams su blang zhing gso bar bya'o//
154a3(mdo 'grel): de la gso ba'i thabs ni/ shing tog kha lung gi khu ba shing kun dang/ bca' sga dang/ sman ro tsha ba dang/ kha ba dang/ rno ba dag dang/ sbyar ba'i khu ba btsags pa slar dran par ma gyur gyi bar du khar blugs so/ /shing ma d+hu ka'i snying po dang/
154a4(mdo 'grel): rgyam tsha dang/ shu dag dang/ na le sham dang/ pi pi ling rnams cha mnyam la tshu'i nang du bdar te/ btsags nas snar blugs na yang slar dran par 'gyur ro/ /shi ri sha'i 'bras bu dang/ pi pi ling dang/ na le sham dang/ rgyam tsha dang/
154a5(mdo 'grel): sbyar khaN+Da dang/ gyi sku dang/ ldor ros dang/ shu dag rnams cha mnyam la/ ba gcin gyi nang du bdar te/ bcags nas mig tu bskus na yang dran par 'gyur ro/ /gang cho ga de ltar byas te/ yang na slang dran par gyur pa de ni 'phral ba 'am/ rkang pa
154a6(mdo 'grel): gnyis kyi rting par lcags kyi thur mas bsreg go/ bya g+h+ri dang/ byi tshor dang/ b+ha gi dang/ li zur ba dang/ bu bran shing dang/ ma nu rnams lhan cig skol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang/ bad kan dang/ ror 'byin pa'i nad rims rmong du zhi bar byed do//
154a7(mdo 'grel): kha lu ba dang/ shing lka sma b+hi dang/ bilba dang/ bya gri dang/ pA thA dang/ e raN+Da'i rtsa ba rnams skol ba'i khu ba lan tshwa dang ba gcin dang sbyar te blud na yang ror 'byin pa'i nad dang/ lto sbo zhing rtul ba'i nad sel to/ /ka ra bi dang/ ma nu dang/ e
154b1(mdo 'grel): raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ ba sha ka dang/ sle tres dang/ sngar bshad pa'i rtsa ba lnga pa chen po zhes bya pa/ bilba la sogs pa dang/ rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu zhes bya ba/ priSh+Na par+Ni la sogs pa dang/ lnga tshan che chung gnyis bsdus pa'i ming ni/ rtsa ba bcu ba zhes bya ste/
154b2(mdo 'grel): bcu bo de dag dang/ li zur ba dang/ bu bran shing dang/ byi tsha ra dang/ b+ha rgi dang/ bu na sna ba dang/ 'di rnams cha mnyam la ba gcin gyi nang du skol te 'thungs na yang dran pa sor chud par 'gyur zhing/ ror 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i rims tshangs chen po dang/
154b3(mdo 'grel): ngal ba'i nad tshabs chen po yang myur du sel bar byed do/ /ka ralba? dang/ kru trug tres dang/ btsod dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ bilba dang/ ku la ka dza dang/ bri ha tI rnam gnyis dang/ ka ra bI dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ 'di rnams skol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang/
154b4(mdo 'grel): ror 'byin pa'i nad kyi rkyen gyis mid pa 'gags shing sgra dang ngar por gyur pa yang sel bar byed do// //da ni rims ldang bub gyi dus mi 'dra bar bshad de/ dangs ma la sogs pa lus zungs bdun gyi gnas rnams rlung la sogs pa
154b5(mdo 'grel): nad gzhi gsum po rnams zhugs pa las rims ldang dub can du gyur te/ de yang rgyun chags kyi rims dang/ rtag pa'i rim dang/ nyin re ba'i rims nyi ma gnyis shing lan gcig gi ldang ba'i rims dang/ nyi ma gsum zhing lan gcig ldang ba'i rims dang/ rnam pa lngar
154b6(mdo 'grel): ? te de dag gso ba'i thabs ni/ chos par byed pa'i sman shing nim pa dang/ a ru ra dang/ sle tres dang/ gla sgang dang pa to la dang/ dug mo nyungs kyi 'bras bu gsum dang/ pa tha sha ka sha mas cha mnyam ste lhan cig sbyar ba dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ bu shel tse dang/ 'u su'i 'bras bu dang

159b4(mdo 'grel): ba ni rims nad can gyi kho zas kyi bye brag bshad de/ rims nad can la ni/ /bzas 'bras ma lu shun lpags dmar po la sogs ba dang/ 'bras zhag drug cus smin pa bzang ngo/ /tshor ma dang/ khu bcung du ni/ sran chung dang/ mon sran tsan dang/ mon/
159b5(mdo 'grel): sran sde'u dang/ rgya sran dang/ mon sran na gu bzang ngo/ /bya na dang/ khu bcud ni/ ri bong dang/ dge ba dang/ 'u ra ba dang/ bya bar tir dang/ brta ka dang/ gong ma sreg rnams kyi sha bzang ngo/ /tshod ma ni shing ba to la'i lo ma dang/ brta ka dang/ ka rko ta la sags
159b6(mdo 'grel): bya ba ? do/ /de la cho gar bsrung? ba'i mod ni/ rims na ba'am/ rims byang nas/ nyams ma brtas kyi bar du/ /bzas lci ba dang/ bsil ba dang/ chu grang mo dang/ nyin bar nyal ba dang/ mgo mi 'thub ste ngal bar gyur ba rnams shin tu bsgrims te spang bar
159b7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /rims la nad brlab nyan 'byung ba mgo 'khor ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ skyug pa la sogs par gyur na/ rims nyid la gnod bar mi 'gyur ba'i so so'i sman gang 'os ba rnams kyis de dag bsal bar bya'o/ /rims
160a1(mdo 'grel): drag po 'byung du mi btub cing cho ga gzhan gyis ma slon pa la ni/ sman chen po lus la gdags pa dang/ sman gyi khu ba 'am/ sngags chus khrus bya ba dang/ zhi ba'i cho ga dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ gtor ma sbyin pa dang/ dka' ?
160a2(mdo 'grel): spyad pa dang/ grub pa'i sngags kyi cho ga rgyas par bya ba rnams kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rims nang byung ba'i mtshan ma ni/ kha zas 'dod pa dang/ mog g.ya' ba dang/ sbrid pa 'byung ba dang/ lus yang ba dang/ rdul 'byung ba dang/ /bar 'gyur
160a3(mdo 'grel): ba 'byung ba rnams la rtogs par bya'o/ /rims nad gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so// //'chi ltas kyi le'u bshad pa/ nad pa zad par ma shes te/ gya tshom du sman gyi las byas na/ ngal gyi snon de las sto bar thad
160a4(mdo 'grel): do/ /de bas na phrin pa dang/ 'chi ltas dang/ mtshan ma 'di gsum las tshe rtogs par bya'o/ /de 'chi ltas ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i dang tshul dang/ lus kyi mdog dang/ dbang po dang/ spyod ba'i chul rnams 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni/
160a5(mdo 'grel): mdor na sman pa mchog gis 'chi ltas su rig par bya'o/ /de la dbang po rnams don rnams la log par 'dzin la/ sman pa dang/ mja'o bla ma la sdang zhing/ dgra la dga' bar gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /nam thang
160a6(mdo 'grel): ba la sprin dang/ 'ja' dang/ glog mthong zhing/ gzhal med khang dang/ bzhon pa rnams kyis nam mkha' khebs par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skar ma lha mo sgrib med ces bya ba dang/ skar ma gong cug dang/
160a7(mdo 'grel): dgu tshigs mi mthong ba dang/ sa chen po gom pa brgyad khor khor yug tsam du chung dur mthong ba de ni/ sog gi dbang po 'das zin pa yin no/ /nyin par skar ma me 'bar ba 'dra ba mthong ba dang/ nyi ma'i mdog kha dog sna tshogs
160b1(mdo 'grel): su mthong ba dang/ rlung la gzugs yod par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni nges par 'chi bar bstan to/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i ngos la bu gu dod? por mthong ba dang/ mar me shi ba'i dri snar mi tshor ba de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /me long la sogs pa la bdag gi
160b2(mdo 'grel): gzugs brnyan yan lag mtshang bar mthong dam/ yang na ye med par mthong ba dang/ sems can sna tshogs kyi cha byad mthong na de ni gshin rje'i khyim na gnas pa yin no/ /mig g.yon pa khung du bros pa'am/ lce nag por gyur tam/ sna'i dbyibs
160b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur tam/ mchu nag por gyur cing dbyibs nyams sam/ /ba mnam por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya'o/ /mig dmar por gyur pa dang/ mig dmar bar gyur ba dang/ mig mi 'gyur ba dang/ mchims gang ba dang/ ya yor gyur ba dang/
160b4(mdo 'grel): smin ma zhum pa dang/ ya yor gyur ba de ni ror gyur par shes par bya'o/ /bzhin gyi mdog dmar ba dang/ gnag pa dang/ ser ba dang/ sngo sangs su gyur pa dang/ ngo tsha med pa dang/ mdog mi sdug par gyur pa dang/ dran pa nyams pa gang yin pa de'i tshe
160b5(mdo 'grel): ni 'das zin par shes par bya'o/ /mgo bo la ba lang gi lci ba'i phye mas stug por khabs pa lta bur snang ba dang/ bskra shi ba dang/ sen mo dang/ so mdog mi sdug par gyur cing zho byung bar agyur na/ de ni tshe zad par shes par bya'o/ /dpral rtsa
160b6(mdo 'grel): ser skya dang/ dung ka dang/ dmar ba dang/ snga sangs dang/ nag po dang/ dkar po lta bur gyur pa gang la snang ba ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral ba la shig 'gro ba dang/ gtor ma bya rog mi 'dod pa dang/ ha cang gnyid che ba dang/ ha cang
160b7(mdo 'grel): gnyid? med par gyur ba de'i tshe ni ring por mi thub bo/ long bu dang/ bus mo lha nga dang/ dpral ba dang/ phrag pa dang/ mkhur chos dang/ 'gram pa dang/ mur 'gram gyi sha lhod pa dang/ sha 'phyang bar gyur ba gang yin pa de ni srog ring por mi 'ogs?
161a1(mdo 'grel): bar spong bar 'gyur ro/ /sha bros la skad kyi gdangs tsha? bar gyur ba dang/ nyam stobs yod bzhin du skad zhom par gyur ba dang/ skra mtshams bye ba gang yin pa de/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi zhags pas zin par shes par bya'o/ /kha zas
161a2(mdo 'grel): zos kyang sha bros pa dang/ kha zas ma zos kyang nyam skya ba dang/ bzhin gyi mdag snum bar gyur tam/ kha dog gzhan du gyur ba de ni srog gi dbang po 'das zin pa yin no/ /glo bur du dri mi zhim pa dang/ dri mi zhim pa zhig tu gyur tam/ sbrang ma sngon po
161a3(mdo 'grel): 'khor bar gyur na de 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /da ni mtshan ma'i bye brag bshad de/ rmi lam du lus snum gyis byugs ba dang/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba dang/ phag dang/ ma he dang/ gcan gzan dang/ bong bu dang/ rnga mo la zhon pa rmi lam mi bzang
161a4(mdo 'grel): ngo/ /bud mad skra bshig cing gos nag po dang/ dmar bag gyon pas bcings te rgod bzhin du lho phyogs su khrid pa rmis na mi 'dod pa yin no/ /gshin dog dang/ mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba la sogs pa dang phrad pa dang/ da dag
161a5(mdo 'grel): dang 'bab pa dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'bru mar 'thung ba dang/ 'ji bas lus byugs te gar byed pa rmis na mi bzang ngo/ /ri dang/ brag la sogs pa las lhung ba dang/ bcing ba dang/ gzhan gyis thub ba dang/ bya rog la sogs pas
161a6(mdo 'grel): mchus btsugs ba dang/ lhung pa rmis na mi dge'o/ /lha ste'i shug to dang/ rgya skyegs kyi shing dang/ grog mkhar dang/ shing pa ri bat+ta? rnams la 'jegs pa dang/ 'bru mar dang/ shing bal dang/ 'bru mar btsir ba'i tshigs ma dang/
161a7(mdo 'grel): lcags rnyed pa rmis na mi rung bar 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam na bag ma len pa dang/ me tog dmar po'i phreng ba thogs shing gos dmar bag gyon pa dang/ chus khyer ba dang/ sha btsos pa za zhing rmi ba ni mi 'dod pa yin na/ /rmi lam du
161b1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa 'di lta bu dang/ gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs de 'dra bdag mthong na/ min ba ni nad kyis 'debs bar 'gyur ro/ /na ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro// //da ni mtshan ma bzang po'i bye brag bshad de/ /lha dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal mtshan dang
161b2(mdo 'grel): gdugs dang/ khyu ba dang/ me tog pad+ma dang/ rgyal po dang/ me tog dkar po dang/ gos dkar po dang/ chu dang ba dang/ me 'bar ba dang/ mdza' bo gson bo dang/ mi dge zhing des pa dang/ bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong zhing rmis na bzang ngo//
161b3(mdo 'grel): rmi lam du khyu ba dang/ rta zhon pa dang/ ril 'dzeg pa dang/ shing 'o ma yod pa dang/ 'bras bu yod pa la 'chag pa dang/ me long dang/ sha rjen pa dang/ me tog gi phreng ba rnyed pa dang/ chu chen po las brgal ba rmis na/ min bas ni nor rnyed par 'gyur/
161b4(mdo 'grel): nad pa zhig na ni nad myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// //da ni phrin pa'i bye brag bshad de/ phrin pa rigs ngan nam/ yan lag mtshang pa 'am/ mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba la sogs pa'am/ zhags pa dang/ dbyig pa lag na thogs shing/
161b5(mdo 'grel): rgod bag tu gyur ba dang/ gos dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ rnying ba gyon pa dang/ khyed reng can dang/ 'di rnams mi 'dod pa yin par bshad do/ /phrin pa lag pa nyed pa dang/ /mchim zag pa dang/ mgo lus mar gyis byugs pa dang/ rtswa shing gcod pa dang/
161b6(mdo 'grel): bud med dang/ ma ning phrin par 'ong ba dang/ bud med kyi rtsig gi ming dang/ ldan pa sna la sogs pa dang/ ma ning gi rtsig gi ming dang ldan pa/ mig la sogs pa la lag gis nom pa dang/ pho mtshan gyi phyogs su lag pas nom pa dang/ bong bu dang/ rnga mo
161b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ ma he zhon te 'ongs pa dang/ bldad cing du khar smra ba 'di dag ni mi rung ba yin no/ /de dag las ldog pa ni dge ba yin no/ /sman pa nad pa'i gan du 'gro bar chas pa na/ glang po che'i skad thos pa dang/ 'brug sgra dang/ rnga sgra la sogs pa thos pa dang/
162a1(mdo 'grel): rin po che dang/ me tog gi phreng ba dang/ sha rjen pa dang/ gdugs dang/ bum pa gang ba la sogs pa mthong na bzang ngo/ /sman pa chas te 'gro ba na/ pho'i ming dang ldan pa/ bya dang ba dang/ phug ron la sogs pa g.yon logs na gan?
162a2(mdo 'grel): shing snang la/ mo'i ming dang ldan pa skyung ka dang/ ri skyegs la sogs pa/ g.yas logs na gnas shing snang ste/ nad ba'i khyim gyi nang du 'gro ba'i tshe legs par bsun/ bya ba de don du 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /rta babs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang
162a3(mdo 'grel): shing 'am can dang/ 'bras bu dang/ me tog yod pa'i shing mthong ba dang/ g.yas logs sam g.yon logs nas byas phur ram/ 'dug cing skad snyan ba sgrog ba thams cad kyang dag pa yin no/ /khyi dang/ wa g.yas phyogs su song na dge'o//
162a4(mdo 'grel): srog chags go d+ha dang/ sbrul dang/ klu sbrul mthong ba ni dus thams cad du mi 'dod ba yin no/ /de ltar sman pa gang gis bsgribs te/ legs par brtags shing bye brag phyed bar byas nas/ las nges par rtsom ba de'i grags pa ni/ dge ba
162a5(mdo 'grel): mang po tshogs ba'i nang du me tog gi phreng ba rnying ba bzhin du mdzas par 'gyur ro/ /'chi ltas kyi le'u ste drug pa rdzogs so// //da ni 'khru ba gso ba'i le'u bshad bar bya'o/ /de la 'khru ba ni kha zas mi 'phrod pa dang/ ha
162a6(mdo 'grel): cang lci ba dang/ ha cang snum ba dang/ ha cang rtsub pa dang/ ha cang tsha bza zhing 'thung ba dang/ ha cang mang du za ba dang/ ha cang nyung du za ba la sogs pas/ me drod med par byas nas/ nad gzhi shas rnyed ba las/ 'khru bar 'gyur te/ da yang nad
162a7(mdo 'grel): gzhi gsum re res gyur ba dang/ kun 'dus pa las gyur ba dang/ mya ngan las gyur ba dang/ 'jigs? pa las gyur ba dang rnam pa drug yod de/ de dag gi mtshan ma yang bshad par bya ste/ de la rlung las gyur ba'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma
162b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ phyi sa'i mdog rtsa dmar ba dang/ dbu ba can dang rtsub pa dang/ nyung du nyung bar 'gyur ba dang/ yang dang yang du 'byung ba dang/ be'u snabs su 'byung ba dang/ 'khreg pa dang/ sgra dang bcas su 'byung ba rnams so/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma
162b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ phyi sa'i mdog ser ba dang/ dmar ba dang/ nag pa dang/ sngo ba dang/ ljang gu khar 'dug ba dang/ shin tu mnan pa dang/ sla ba dang/ gzhar ?tsha 'ur 'ur bor gyur cing/ 'brum pa 'byung ba dang/ skom dang che bar gyur ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las
162b3(mdo 'grel): gyur ba'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/ phyi sa'i mdog dkar ba dang/ dri bshul ba dang/ bska ba dang/ snum pa dang/ grar ba dang/ cher mi 'khreg pa dang/ yi ga 'chu ba dang/ brang tsha zhing kha nas chu 'byung ba rnams yin no/ /nad gzhi gsum char 'dus
162b4(mdo 'grel): pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma ni/ phyis phag tshal 'dra ba dang/ mar dang/ 'bru mar 'dra ba dang/ sha bkrus pa'i khu ba 'dra ba rnams yin te/ gso dka' bar shes par bya'o/ /phyis sbrang rtsi 'dra ba dang/ mar dang 'bru mar 'dra ba dang/
162b5(mdo 'grel): mchin pa'i dum bu 'dra bar 'byung ba dang/ 'o ma 'dra ba dang/ sha brdungs brdungs pa 'dra ba ? tshon sna tshogs su 'dug pa dang/ dri shin tu dku ba dang/ zhag tshig tshig po yod pa ni mi 'tshe/ gzhang khar 'brum pa 'byung ba dang/ gzhang phyir byung ba
162b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ sha zad pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nang bla brnyan gyis thebs pa dang/ me drong nyams pa dang/ thar zug tu lto gang ba dang/ mkhal rkang na ba rnams kyang mi 'tsho ba'i mtshan ma yin no/ /'jigs pa dang/ mya ngan gnyis las
162b7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i 'khru pa'i mtshan ma ni/ rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i mtshan ma dang/ 'dra lar? shes bar bya ste/ de gnyis la yang rlung bsal ba'i cho ga bya zhing/ dga' ba bskyed ba dang/ snying mal du dbab par bya'o/ /de ltar 'khrub rnams pa ?
163a1(mdo 'grel): po thams cad kyang/ smin pa dang/ ma smin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ de la 'khru ba smin pa la ni/ smyung ba'i cho ga dang/ skyug ba'i cho go rim bzhin du bya'o/ /'di'i skom dang/ zas ni bca' sga dang/ ? skol
163a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i khu ba dang/ kha zas yang ba'i bag dge'o/ /'khru bam smin pa bcad sngas na/ skran dang/ mdze la sogs pa'i nang du 'gyur te/ de la 'khru ba ma smin pa ni/ byi sa chu'i nang du btang na zhabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khru ba smin pa ni ? nang du btang na
163a3(mdo 'grel): steng du 'ong zhing khyer bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'khru ba ma smin pa la ni smyung ba'i cho ga dang/ skyug pa'i chog go rim bzhin du bya'o/ /'di'i sgom dang/ zas ni bca' sga dang/ ba la ka skol ba'i khu ba dang/ kha zas yang ba'i bag dge'o/ /'khrus ma smin pa
163a4(mdo 'grel): gcad ba sdas na/ skran dang/ mdze la sogs pa'i nang du 'gyur te/ de bas na thog mar a ru ras bkrus la phyis bcad ba'i cho ga byas na bzang ngo/ /de la bcad ba'i thabs ni/ pi pi ling la sogs ba'i sde tshan sngar bshad ba rnams skol ba'i sman
163a5(mdo 'grel): gyi khu ba las gzhi blangs te/ 'bras thug dang/ khu bcung byas ba'am/ dang ba'i thug ba blud do/ /de la dar ba'i thug pa ji ltar sbyar ba'i thabs ni/ 'og nas zhib tu ston to/ /yang na yung la sogs pa'i sde tshan nam/ shu dag la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol
163a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i khul las gzhi blangs la/ 'bras thug byas te/ blung na 'khrub ma smin bzhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na bca' sga dang/ bong da dkar po dang/ shing kun dang/ gla sgang dang/ dug mo cud dang/ kru trug tris rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ gla sgang
163a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ te dza ba ti dang/ ba tha dang/ pi pi ling dang/ dug mo rnams ltan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang/ shu dag dang/ bu tse shel rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ tsabs ru tsha dang/ shu dag dor/ a ru ra dang/ ba
163b1(mdo 'grel): thA dang/ byi dang ka dang/ bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sug smel dang/ dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang/ sha ba ra'i gseng 'phrom dang/ yud dang/ skyer ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang/ bo dang dkar po dang/ bca' ?
163b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ blang skad rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ smin bar byed pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba drug po 'di dag las gang yang rung bskol ba'i khu ba blud do/ /yang na/ sman gyi sbyor ba 'di dag las/ gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ chug tsang ma skol ba'am
163b3(mdo 'grel): chad dam rtsabs skyur po'i nang du btab ste blud do/ /yang na/ tshab gsum dang/ bong da dkar po dang/ shin kun dang/ shu dag dang/ kha ru tsha dang/ a ru ra rnams zhib tu btags ba'i phye mchu skol ba'i nang du btab ste blud na 'khru ba ma smin pa tshabs
163b4(mdo 'grel): chen po sel bar byed do/ /yang na/ shu dag dang/ bi lba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bca' sga dang/ ? dang/ go snyod dang/ ku la ka dang/ byi dang ka rnams zhib tu btags ba'i phye mchu sgol ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na 'khru ba 'chad do/ /da ni 'khru ba smin
163b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i cho ga bshad de/ de la pho ba'i drong chung ste/ 'khru ba smin pa yang dang yang du 'byung bar gyur pa la ni/ gcod sman gyi cho ga smyur te bya'o/ /de la gcod pa'i sman ni ldum bu sa mang ga dang/ shing shalma li'i lom dang/ gsed 'phrom dang/ ba tha dang/
163b6(mdo 'grel): d+ha thA dang/ d+ha ta ka'i me tog rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ shing wang ko dang/ gand+ha pri yi ku dang/ me tog pad+ma dang/ ti ri tra dang/ bilba'i shing tog gi shegs ma rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ shing dir g+ha brin+ti'i shun lpags dang/ bca' 
163b7(mdo 'grel): sga dang/ shing mngar rnams ltan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang/ bal po se'u dang/ gseng 'phrom dang/ d+ha ta ki dang/ gand+ha ma lig lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags
164a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phye ma/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na 'khru ba smin pa gcod bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'khru ba smin pa la/ gla sgang skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blung ngo/ /de bzhin du ?
164a2(mdo 'grel): phro ma la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang/ am pashta? la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa yon tan chen po 'di gnyis las/ gang yang rung ba gcin skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud do/ /yang na taM pa la dang/ me tog pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang/
164a3(mdo 'grel): shing ro tsha ba'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu sol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/ pad+ma'i bre ba dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na gcod par 'gyur ro/ /shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde chen sngar bshad pa zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas phya sreg ba'i kho
164a4(mdo 'grel): pa bkang la/ snod kha bcang ba'i nang du btsos pa'i khu ba las bsgrangs pa/ sbrang rtsi dang/ kha ra dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ dmu rdzing sel bar byed cing/ 'khru ba gcod do/ /yang na rtsa ba lnga pa dang/ ba la dang/ bilpa dang/ 'u su'i 'bras bu dang/ utpa la
164a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ btsa' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs pa'i 'bras thug pa la po se'us skyur bor byas pa'am/ yang na/ khar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ /rgun la sogs pas mdar bar byas pa blud do/ /yang na katpal dang/ bod nga dkar po dang/
164a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ btsa' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba las gzhi blangs ba'i 'bras thug pa la po se'us skyur bor byas pa 'am/ yang na/ khar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ rgun la sogs pas mngar bar byas pa blud do/ /yang na katpal dang/ bong nga dkar po dang/
164a7(mdo 'grel): gla sgang dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blung na/ mkhris pa las gyur ba'i 'khru ba sel to/ /yang na utpal dang/ d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang/ bca' sga dang/ bal po se'u'i shun lpags
164a8(mdo 'grel): rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ ldum bus mang ga dang/ utpal la dang/ pad+ma dang/ gsang phrom dang/ chu shing gi 'bras bu'i khu ba dang/ til rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ gla sgang dang/ rtsa mkhris dang/ skyer khaN+Da
164b1(mdo 'grel): rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ ? rtsa ba dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ gsed phrom dang/ utpa la dang/ bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ pa tha dang/ bye tsher dang/ bca' sga dang/ shing wang kho dang/ 'dzam bu'i shing tog gi rus pa dang/ katpa la
164b2(mdo 'grel): rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ bilba dang/ skyer pa'i shun lpags dang/ byi tsher dang/ ba la rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ d+hata ki dang/ bong da dkar po dang/ bca' sga dang/ dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang/ 'bras bu dang/ skyer khaN+Da rnams
164b3(mdo 'grel): lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ kotpa la dang/ shing mngar dang/ gseng phrom dang/ bal po se'u'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ shing wang kho dang/ d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang/ ldum bu sa mang ga dang/ pad+ma rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/
164b4(mdo 'grel): dug mo nyung go shun wags? dang/ skyer ba dang/ pa tha dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba bcu ba'ang dag las gang yang rung ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ 'bras bkrus ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar
164b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i nang du btags te/ 'thungs na mkhris pa las gyur ba'i 'khru ba sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba'i 'khru ba yod bzhin du/ mkhris pa dang mi 'phrod pa'i kha zas zos bas/ /brag 'khrugs bar byas nas/ khrag las gyur ba'i 'khru ba tshabs
164b6(mdo 'grel): chen por gyur pa yin ?/ khrag lung pa'i nang sel pa'i chog myur te bya'o/ /de la khrag lud pa'i nang bsal ba'i cho ga ni/ da tung ba dang/ kha zas dang/ mas btang ba kun la yang/ ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /ba ya sya dang/ thal des dang/ gsed
164b7(mdo 'grel): phrom dang/ /? dang/ shing mang? rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma'o ma grang mo dang/ sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag nad las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/ /pog dang/ rgya shug dang/ shing dzam+bu dang/ pi ya la dang ?
165a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ a rdzun rnams las gang yang rung ba'i shun bags zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ 'o ma dang/ sbrang rtsi sbyang ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang/ khrag nad las gyur ba'i 'khru ba sel to/ /utpa la dang/ a
165a2(mdo 'grel): mang+ga dang/ chu shing gi 'bras bu dang/ pad+ma'i ze ba rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ til dang/ sha ba ra'i gsed phrom dang/ shing mnga' dang/ sa maM ga dang/ thal tres dang/ utpa la rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ utpa la dang/
165a3(mdo 'grel): shalma la'i shun lpags dang/ shing dmar dang/ sha ba ra'i gseng phrom dang/ til rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba 'di dag gsum las/ gang yang rung ba btogs pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i nang du btab
165a4(mdo 'grel): ste/ 'thungs na yang khrag nang las gyur pa'i 'khru ba sel to/ /tsan dan dkar bo 'am/ gand+ha pri yaM ku gnyis las/ gang yang rung ba'i phye ma/ 'bras bkrus ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang/ /bar sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag

165a6(mdo 'grel): yang na shing mngar dang/ utpal dang/ chu srin gyi sen mo dang/ khar rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba btang ngo/ /khrag tshad dang/ phyes thal bsnal zhi byung ba la ni 'o ma yi nang du 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma btab pa'am/ yang na 'o ma
165a7(mdo 'grel): bzhos ma thag pa dron mo ci ran par 'thungs te lan mang du 'khrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan las gyur ba'i 'khru bas gnod par gyur ba la na/ kha zas sman bu ti ka dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ bilba dang/ kru trug tres dang/ dar
165b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ bal bo se'u dang/ shing kun rnams dang/ legs par sbyar ba'i khu bcung dang ldan pa bza' bar bya'o/ /dbye mong dang/ bod da dkar bo dang/ du rta dang/ ba tha dang/ pu ? shel rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ a rur dang/ gla sgang dang bca' sga dang/ /
165b2(mdo 'grel): bilba dang/ karka ti ka rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ kru trug tres dang/ pi pi ling dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ pi pi ling chen po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba rnams dang/ byi dang ga dang/ shu dag dang/ shang shing dang/ 'u su'i 'bras bu dang/ tsha ba
165b3(mdo 'grel): gsum po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba 'di bzhi las gang yang rung ba lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba blud na yang bzang ste/ me drod dang/ nyams stobs bskyed do/ /yang na a ru ra dang/ kru trug tres dang/ pa tha dang/ shu dag dang/ pi pi ling
165b4(mdo 'grel): gi rtsa ba dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ bca' sga rnams skol ba'i khu ba dron mo 'am/ yar na de dag gi bye ma'i sman byas na/ bad kan las gyur ba'i 'khrub sel to/ /shing aM ko ta'i rtsa ba dang/ skyer bar rnams las srang rod btags te/ char ba'i chus
165b5(mdo 'grel): brdzis la zha gnyis tsam de gyur byas te/ mas btang na 'khru ? thams cad kyang sel bar byed do/ /bilba dang/ gla sgang dang/ d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang/ ba nA dang/ bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma dang/ chu shing gi 'bras bu'i khu ba rnams cha mnyam la bu ram rdang/
165b6(mdo 'grel): dar ba sbyar ba'i nang du ? rab ste 'thungs na yang 'khru ba gcod do/ /da ni rlung las gyur bI 'khru ba'i chog bshad de/ khrag dang/ phyi sa byung ba'i rjes la rlung gi mthus phyis 'gegs te/ be'u snabs dbu ba 'dra bar 'byung zhing/ 'khreg ba'i nad kyi ming
165b7(mdo 'grel): ni be'u? snabs su 'byung zhing 'khrag la zhes bya ste/ de la ni me drong chen po zhig na/ kru trug tres dang/ bilba 'o ma dang/ skrol ba'i khu ba/ bu ram dang/ til mar? dang sbyar te nang bar 'thungs na/ phyis 'gags pa bde bar 'gyur ro/ /'o ma skol te
166a1(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i nang du/ pi pi ling gi phye ma'am/ yang na na le sham gyi phye ma btab ste/ zhag gsum gyi bar du 'thungs na be'u snabs su 'byung zhing 'khreg ba yun ring du yon pa yang sel to/ /til mar dang/ mar dang/

166b1(mdo 'grel): rlung dang mkhris pa dang/ bad kan gsum so so las gyur ba dang/ kun 'dus ba las gyur pa rnam pa bzhir gyur te/ de dag mtshan ma dang/ gso ba'i thabs ni 'khru ba dang 'dra'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i pho ba'i me drod 'khrugs par gyur ba'i mtshan ma dang/

168b7(mdo 'grel): par bya'o/ /sha zad pa dang/ nyam stebs zad pa dang/ byis pa dang/ rgad po dang/ skem pa'i nang yod pa la ni/ skyug sman dang/ bkru sman byar mi rung ste/ khrag 'byung ba bcad pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la khrag 'byung ba bcad pa'i cho ga ni/ btol dang/ sna ma'i//
169a1(mdo 'grel): me tog dang/ nimpa dang/ tsan dan rnam gnyis dang/ shug pa rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ mon sran sde'u dmar ru dang/ ba sha ka dang/ gseng phrom dang/ sa nag po dang/ ma da yan ti ka rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/

169a6(mdo 'grel): gcod do/ /sang ldeng dang/ sapta par+Na dang/ partha dang/ shalma li dang/ ko bi da ra rnams kyi me tog gi bye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lung ba sel to/ /u dum ba ra dang/ taM pa la dang/ a ? ra dang/ 'bra go dang/ rgun rnams
169a7(mdo 'grel): kyi 'bras bu smin pa las gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lung pa'i nang sel to/ /ku shanma pa'i 'bras bu rlon pa shun lpags bshus la nang gi sa bon rnams kyang bor te/ bar gyi sha khi tshad du btubs la/ brdos
169b1(mdo 'grel): bsrang brgyad ba hwaD srang brgya dang zhun mal? zang po srang sum cu rtsa gnyis lhan cig tu skol ba'i nang du/ dri gsum zhes bya ba/ shing tsha dang/ gand+ha pa tra dang/ sug smel rnams dang/ 'u su'i 'bras bu dang/ na le shaM dang/ 'di rnams la srang phyed phyed dang/ pi pi ling
169b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ bca' sga dang/ go snyod dang rnams las srang gnyis gnyis dang/ 'di rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma btab ste bsgrangs la/ sbrang rtsi zhun mar gyi phyed dang sbyar te zos na yang khrag lud pa'i nang sel to/ /glo rdol ba dang/ glo gcong zang byang
169b3(mdo 'grel): kyi nang dang/ dbugs ming dpa' i nad dang/ snying stong lngar ba dang/ thibs byed ces bya ba dang/ rims dang/ skom pa'i nang dang/ lud pa dang/ skyug pa rnams kyang 'joms par byed la/ glo la phan zhing/ sha skye ba dang/ ro tsa ba dang/ nyam stobs
169b4(mdo 'grel): bskyed pa dang/ sha mdog bzang ba dang/ skad snyan par 'gyur ro/ /rgun dang/ 'o ma bzhi pa zhes bya ba/ sa la par+Ni dang/ pri shaM par+Ni dang/ mung+ga bar+Ni? dang/ ma sha pa r+Ni rnams dang/ ba la dang/ bca' sga dang/ gze ma dang/ nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang/ 'di
169b5(mdo 'grel): rnams las gang yang rung ba 'o ma dang skol te 'thungs na yang khrag nang sel to/ /khar dang/ e ya ba lu ka dang/ rtswa durba dang/ tsan dan rnam gnyis dang/ gla sgang dang/ shug pa dang/ me tog utpa la'i gzem dang/ btsong dang/ pu shel tse rnams
169b6(mdo 'grel): kyi phye ma cha mnyam ste/ ra'i mar dang/ 'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang/ char pa'i chu'i nang du skol te/ mar gyi nyi tshe lus pa las btung ba dang dang/ mas btang ba dang/ lus bsku ba dang/ snar blugs pa gang yang rung ba byas na yang khrag lud pa'i
169b7(mdo 'grel): nad sel to/ /bi da ri dang/ shing mngar dang/ me da rnam gnyis dang/ din ta li'i shing tog dang/ bal po se'u dang/ nye'u shing dang/ ldum bu ka ko li dang/ kha lung gi shags ma dang/ 'di rnams cha mnyam ste zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ mar
170a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang/ chu'i nang du sbel te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ci ran par zos na/ rims sel cing phyis 'gags pa dang/ lto klo ba dang/ zug cing na ba 'joms par byed de/ lud ba dang/ khrag lung ba nad
170a2(mdo 'grel): med par byed do/ /sna nas khrag 'byung ba la ni/ dung dang/ btsag dang/ d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang/ shing mngar rnams gang yang rung ba'i phye ma bcags pa bud med gyi nu zho dang sbyar te/ snar blugs na gcod par 'gyur ro/ /bal po se'u'i khu ba dang
170a3(mdo 'grel): rtswa du rba'i khu ba dang/ shing log kog gi tshig gu dang/ kun dong gi khu ba 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba snar blugs na yang sna khrag zag pa gcod do/ /khrag lung ba zur du byung pa la ni/ khrag chang kyi cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /khrag
170a4(mdo 'grel): lung pa po mtshan nas 'byung ba la ni/ mkhris pa las gyur ba'i gcin nad kyi cho ga rgyas par 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bya'o/ /khrag lung pa bud med kyi mo mtshan las 'byung ba la ni/ 'o ma kha ra dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud na phan te zhi bar
170a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /yang na bcag yug snam/ shing 'dzam bu'i lo ma dang/ utpa la'i rtsa ba rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i nang du btab ste/ 'thungs na yang mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag 'chang par
170a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /yang na sman a nanda dang/ gand+ha pri yaM ku dang/ tsan dan dang/ nA ga ge sar rnams gang yang rung ba'i phye ma chang dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mon sran sne'u dmar ru'i rtsa ba'i
170a7(mdo 'grel): phye ma/ sbrang rtsi dang/ skyer khaN+De rnams 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te/ dkrugs la 'thungs na yang/ mo mtshan nas 'byung ba'i khrag gi rnam grangs thams cad sel bar byed do/ /yang na ldum bu bu na sna ba dang/ sha lu ka dang/ sran
170b1(mdo 'grel): chung dang ? a lam bus rnams las gang yang rung ba bcos bas mo mtshan la dugs byas na yang na ba sel to/ /yang mung+ga bar ni btags te/ til mar dang btsos pa'i nang du/ srin bal lam/ shing bal smyugs la mo mtshan phyi nang du bzhag na yang khrag
170b2(mdo 'grel): gcod cing/ 'jam la bde bar 'gyur ro/ /spyir na khrag lung ba'i nang yong ba la naM?/ chu grang mo'i nang du 'jug ba dang/ lung la chu grang mo thugs par sogs pa dge ba yin te/ kha zas kyangs lu dang/ mon sran sde'u la sogs ba dang/ ri dags
170b3(mdo 'grel): dang bya'i sha/ bsil ba'i bag rnams bzang ngo/ /khrag rgyas pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so// //de nas gcong chen po gso pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la gcod chen po'i nang ni/ nang gzhi bzhi las 'byung ste/ de
170b4(mdo 'grel): yang brtsal drags ba dang/ zad phyed kyi nang dang/ phyis dang/ gcin 'gags pa dang/ dus su mi za ba dang 'rgyu 'di bzhi las 'byung ngo/ /de'i mtshan ma ni/ skad 'gags pa dang/ lung pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang yi ga 'chus pa dang/
170b5(mdo 'grel): rims dang/ klad ba na ba dang/ thal gong na ba dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ snying na ba dang/ mkhal rked na pa dang/ khrag dang/ bad kan skyug ba dang/ rnam ba bcu gcig po 'di rnams yin no/ /mtshan ma de dag gis nyam thag par gyur la/ sha zad
170b6(mdo 'grel): cing nyam stobs med par gyur pa ni ngor bar bya'o/ /de ma yin ba gzhan ni sman dang/ ldan pa zhig na cho ga smyur te bya'o/ /kha nas rnag 'dra ba dang/ bad kan dmar pa dang/ sngo skya dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngon po dang/ ser po 'byung la dbugs mi bde ba
170b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ lung bas dgar te nyam thag pa dang/ skad 'gags pa ni mi 'tsho'o/ /kha zas phal cher phyis dang/ gcin 'ba' zhig tu gyur la/ sha skam zh+ng lus zungs zad de/ phyis khong na yod pa tsam gyis/ srog zungs byas ba gang yin pa de la
171a1(mdo 'grel): ni khong na yod pa de mi bkru bar rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o/ /nyam stobs yod la gcod chen po na ba la ni/ gso ba'i las skyug sman dang/ bkru sman dang/ sman snang blugs pa dang/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang/ 'jam rtsi
171a2(mdo 'grel): nas btang ba'i las 'di lnga bya'o/ /lus kyi sha zad pa la ni las lnga po 'di dag byas na/ de dag nyid dug dang 'dra bar 'gyur te byar ma rung ngo/ /gcong chen po na ba'i kha zas na/ 'bras sa lu dang/ 'bras zhag drug cus smin pa dang/ gro dang/
171a3(mdo 'grel): nas dang/ mon sran sde'u la sogs pa dge'o/ /skom du ni chang bzang ngo/ /bya nang ni/ bya dang ri dags kyi sha nang de dang 'phrad pa'i rnams rung ngo/ /de'i sman ni pi pi ling dang/ rgun dang/ kha ra rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang/ mar sprang rtsis sbyar ba'am/ yang
171a4(mdo 'grel): na a shwa ga nd+ha dang/ pi pi ling dang/ kha ra rnams kyi phye ma sgrang rtsi dang/ zhun mar dang sbyar ba zos na gcod chen po sel bar byed do/ /yang na bu bran shing dang/ rgun dang/ pi pi ling dang/ a ru ra dang/ bra go dang/ byi tsher rnams lhan cig tu sbyar
171a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ bu ram dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ 'bras yos dang/ kru trug tres dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bca' sga rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ ma nu dang/ li zur ba dang/ ra mnye ba dang/ kha ra dang/ byi'u rug pa rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi

171b1(mdo 'grel): ma sman ni/ lud pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ yig 'chus pa dang/ mcher pa na ba dang/ rims dang/ skem pa'i nang dang/ pho ba'i me drong chung ba rnams sel zhing snying la phan te/ 'khru ba dang/ skran dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ skyug pa rnams sel to//
171b2(mdo 'grel): bca' sga dang/ pi pi ling dang/ na le sham dang/ nA ga ge sar gyi me tog dang/ shing tsha dang/ sug smel dang/ 'di rnams mas kyi rim bzhin du/ tha ma'i cha re res bskyed pa dang/ de rnams bsdoms pa'i tshad dang/ mnyam pa'i kha ra dang/ 'di rnams

171b4(mdo 'grel): dang po'i cha nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyi bskyed de/ btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyi sbyar ba'i phye ma ni/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lung pa sel zhing yi ga 'bye bar byed do/ /nye'u shing dang/ pi da ri dang/ a shwa gand+ha dang/
171b5(mdo 'grel): a ru ra dang/ purna Na ba dang/ ba la dang/ a ti ba la dang/ na ga ba la dang/ gze ma rnams kyi phye ma/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na/ zad byed kyi gcong chen po zad par byed do/ /brag zhun dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ drug mar cing dang
171b6(mdo 'grel): lugs kyi phye ma rnams sbyar te zos la/ kha zas su 'bras can dang/ 'o ma ldan par zab gang yin pa de'i gtsang chen po ni myur du 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrang rtsi dang/ drub mar cang dang/ byi dang ga dang/ brag zhun dang/ lcags kyi phye ma dang/ mar
171b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ a ru ra rnams sbyar ba za zhing/ kha zas mthun zhing 'phrod pa za ba ni/ gcong chen po mi zad pa sel par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gcod chen po'i nang yod pas/ kha ra dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gsar sbyar ba 'am/ yang na mar dang/ sbrang rtsi cha mi
172a1(mdo 'grel): mnyam par sbyar ba zos la/ kha zar su 'bras chan dang/ 'o ma dang ldan par zos na sha brta bar 'gyur ro/ /sman nir gun+ti'i rtsa ba dang/ po ma dang bcas bar brdungs pa'i khu ba mar de'i bzhi cha dang/ lhan cig tu skol?
172a2(mdo 'grel): la/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran bar 'thungs na/ gcod chen po'i nad kyis lus zungs zad par gyur pa las slar nyam stobs bskyed cing brta bar byed de/ nad ngo cog kyang sel to/ /mnu dang/ li zur ba dang/ rgun dang/ ba la dang/ me
172a3(mdo 'grel): tog utpa la dang/ pi pi ling dang/ dzha ta dang/ dzi ban+ti dang/ shing mngar dang/ bya gti dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ byi tsher dang/ dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang/ gze ma rnams cha mnyam ste btags pa'i phye ma/ mar de'i bzhi 'gyur dang/

172a5(mdo 'grel): te 'thungs na/ gcod chen po'i mtshan ma rnam pa bcu gcig dang ldan pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /ra'i mar dang/ ra'i 'o ma dang/ ra'i zho dang/ ra'i gcin dang/ ra'i ril ma'i khu ba 'di rnams lan tshwa rnam pa lnga dang skol te/ mar nyi
172a6(mdo 'grel): tshe lus pa las/ ngan par 'thungs la de'i rjes la/ ra'i 'o ma 'thungs na gcod chen po sel to/ /nas las byas ba 'i kha zas zos la/ ra'i 'bar nyal te/ ra'i 'o ma 'thung zhing pa'i ril ma dang/ gcin gyis lus dril ba dang/ khrus
172a7(mdo 'grel): byar na yang zad byed kyi gcong chen po sel to/ /til mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis/ 'o ma de'i bzhi 'gyur dang/ shing mdar gyi phye ma srang gcig dang/ skol te 'o ma du nas til mar btsags te/ dang zhing dri ma med par byas la/ yang 'o ma
172b1(mdo 'grel): bzhi 'gyur dang/ shing mngar gyi phye ma srang gcig dang/ skol te 'o ma du nas til mar bcags la/ 'o ma dang/ shing mngar gyis snga ma bzhin du bsnan zhing/ skol ba de lta bu'i tshul du shin tu bsgrims te lan brgyar skol ba'i til mar gyi btung ba dang/
172b2(mdo 'grel): snar blugs pa dang/ lus bsku ba dang/ mas btang ba rnams byas na/ gcong chen po dang/ snying na ba dang/ rlung nang dang/ skya rbab rnams sel cing/ na mchod yan cad kyi nang dang/ smyo byed dang/ khrag lung pa'i nang dang/ me dpal rnams med par byed
172b3(mdo 'grel): do/ /bilba la sogs pa rtsa ba lnga pa dang/ gla sgang dang/ ba la dang/ lo ma rnams bzhi ste/ sa la par+Ni dang/ sri shan par+Ni dang/ mung+ga par+Ni dang/ ma sha par+Ni rnams dang/ ldum bu rit+thi dang/ pi pi ling dang/ li zur ba dang/ a ru ra dang/ tshi ba ka dang/ zad
172b4(mdo 'grel): rtsi ba dang/ sle tres dang/ rgun dang/ pun sna ba dang/ med dang/ dzi ban+ti dang/ ka ka na si ka dang/ me tog utpa pa dang/ sug smel dang/ dzad dang/ bu ban shing dang/ bu tsha rto dang/ bi tsher dang/ tsan dan dang/ byi da ri dang/ gze ma dang/ bya d+h+ri dang/ ma nu rnams
172b5(mdo 'grel): las srang re re dang/ skyu ru ra 'bru lnga brgya dang/ 'di rnams chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis pa de lta bu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du skol te/ chu bzhi cha gcig lus pa bcags pa/ khu ba'i nang du/ til mar dang/ zhun mar phyed ma/ srang bcu
172b6(mdo 'grel): gnyis dang/ kha ra sred lnga bcu blugs te/ yang skol la/ byog tu rung pa tsam du gyur te/ chos nas phyung la/ bsgrangs pa'i nang du/ pi pi ling gi phye ma srang gnyis dang/ smyig rkang srad bzhi dang/ sbrang rtsi srang drug dang/ dri sna bzhi zhes bya ba/
172b7(mdo 'grel): shing tsha dang/ gand+ha pa tra dang/ sug smel dang/ nA ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam pa sbyir srang gcig dang/ 'di rnams sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu'i ming ni/ drang srong tsya pa na'i sman zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran bar zos na/ snying na ba dang/ dbugs mi
173a1(mdo 'grel): bde ba dang/ skoms pa'i nad dang/ lung ba dang/ dreg dang/ zad byed kyi gcod chen bo rnams kyis nyam thag pa sel cing/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ skang snyan pa dang/ ro tsa bar byed de/ smar bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro/ /shing
173a2(mdo 'grel): ka pit+ta'i 'bras bu dang/ byi shal gnyis las srang bco lnga bco lnga dang/ skyu ru ra rlon pa krang sum cu rtsa gnyis/ skam na srang bcu drug dang/ a ru ra de'i phyed dang/ pi pi ling dang/ el ba lu ka dang/ gser phro ma dang/ byi dang/

173a5(mdo 'grel): 'chus pa rnams sel to/ /gcong chen po'i nang la rims la sogs pa'i nang bla gnyan gzhan zhig byung na/ gsor rung ba gang yin pa de dag so so'i gso ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /mdor na skem pa'i nang gcong chen po yong pa la ni
173a6(mdo 'grel): lus bkur ba dang/ dri bala sogs pas lus brta zhing/ nyam stobs bskyed bar bya'o/ /gcong chen po gso ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //skrin kha zas kyi nyes pa dang/ 'dug nyal la sogs pa gnas pa'i nyes
173a7(mdo 'grel): pa las rlung la sogs pa shin tu 'khrugs nas/ khong pa'i nang du skran phur ma lta bur 'dug pa rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/ lnga pa de dag gi gnas ni/ blo g.yas g.yon dang/ snying ga dang/ chu so rnams yin no/ /gzhan gang de'i mtshan
173b1(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ gso ba'i thabs dang bcas pa yang bstan par bya ste/ de la skran no cog ni/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ gcin sri ba dang/ rlung gi shes? che ba dang/ rgyu ma 'khrugs pa dang/ lto sbo ba dang/ sgregs pa mang du 'ong ba'i mtshan ma rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o/ /de
173b2(mdo 'grel): la rlung las gyur ba'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/ zur cing gzer ba dang/ lto sbo ba dang/ phyi sa dang/ gcin 'gags pa dang/ skran nyid 'phar ba dang/ gnas 'pho ba dang/ che chung du 'gyur ba dang/ ltag pa dang/ mgo bo dang/ za 'gram du zug pa dang/ ru shing na ba

173b4(mdo 'grel): bstan to/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i skran gyi mtshan ma ni/ mchil ma mang ba dang/ yi ga 'chus pa dang/ brang tsha zhing kha nas chu 'byung ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lung pa dang/ kha zas 'jur mi btub pa dang/ skran nyis sa zing phyir rlo ba dang
173b5(mdo 'grel): skyug pa rnams yin no/ /'dus pa las gyur pa'i skran gyi mchan ma ni/ skran nyid mi zad par na zhing/ tsha 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa dang/ rdo bzhin du sra zhing phyir rlo ba dang/ sems dang/ lus dang/ me'i drong nams par byed pa rnams yin te/ gsor mi
173b6(mdo 'grel): rung ngo/ /bud med kyi khrag skran ni/ mngal rlug pa dang/ bu byung ba dang/ zla mtshan 'dzags pa las 'gyur te/ skran nyid na zhing tsha ba 'ur 'ur bor 'dug ? sgrub ma dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de la skran gyis nyam thag ste/ rus sbal bzhin du phyi rol tu rlo zhing
173b7(mdo 'grel): rtsa mngon la nang mang po bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang thegs shing/ snying ga dang/ lte ba'i phyogs dang/ rkang lag skrangs te mi bzod par gyur ba ni sbang bar ba'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skran la ni/ thog mar sman mar blud do/ /de'i 'og tu phye
174a1(mdo 'grel): ma'i sman dang/ lus snum gyis bsku ba dang/ dug dang/ bkru sman drag ba mas btang ba dang/ 'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams kyis gso bar bya'o/ /de la sman mar ni byi dang ga dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/
