174a3(mdo 'grel): shu dag dang/ pu tse shel dang/ a ru ra dang/ kru trug tres dang/ byi dang ga dang/ tsha ba gsum po rnams kyi phye ma/ zho gnyis gnyis/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'o ma de dang mnyam pa dang/ chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ mar
174a4(mdo 'grel): nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang/ rlung las gyur pa'i skran na ba dang/ bcan du sel cing skyigs bu dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ srin bu dang/ mcher pa'i nang dang/ lud pa rnams sel to/ /bca' sba dang/ dbyi mong dang/ kru
174a5(mdo 'grel): trug tres dang/ pi pi ling dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma srang re re/ sman tsi ri dang/ bilba skol ba'i khub dang/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus par byas pa ni skran dang/
174a6(mdo 'grel): rtug skam dang/ skya rba ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ pho ba'i nad dang/ lung pa rnams sel cing/ rims dang/ cham pa drag po dang/ mcher pa'i nad dang/ gzhang 'brum rnams zhi bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /shing kun dang/
174a7(mdo 'grel): stang pu dang/ cha ba gsum dang/ bye'u rug pa dang/ sug smel dang/ shu dag dang/ cabs ru tsha dang/ kha ru tsha dang/ 'u su'i 'bras bu dang/ go snyod dang/ nas tshigs 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ bal po'i se'u dang/ ma nu dang/ a dza
174b1(mdo 'grel): gand+ha? dang/ li zur pa dang/ kru trug res dang/ la la phung rnams kyi phye ma/ mar dang/ zho mar dang bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus par byas ba ni/ rlung las gyur pa'i skran dang/ zug cing nang dang/ lto sbo ba'i nang rnams sel to/ /spa ma'i
174b2(mdo 'grel): 'brus bu dang/ sug smel dang/ kru trug tres dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ dbyi med dang/ la la bud dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ go snyod dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams kyi phye ma/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang/ la phug lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu bskyur por gyur pa/
174b3(mdo 'grel): zho dang mar 'o mar ldan pa'i nang du skal te/ /mar nyi tshe lus pa'i skran dang/ zug cing na ba dang/ phyis 'gags pa sel cing/ mngal gyi nyes pa dang/ bas 'jur mi btub pa dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ snying na ba dang/ rtsib
174b4(mdo 'grel): logs ni ba rnams med par byed do/ /mar dang sbyor ba'i sman bstan pa 'di dag nyid zhib tu btags te chu skol pa dang/ zho kha chu dang/ chang dang/ rtsabs skyur po dang/ cha rnams las gang yang rung ba dang/ sbyar te 'thungs na yang/ skran dang/ zug cing
174b5(mdo 'grel): na ba la sogs pa sel bar byed do/ /shing kun dang/ shu dag dang/ tsa bas ru tsha dang/ bca' sga dang/ la la phud dang/ a ru ra dang/ kru trug tres dang/ ru rte rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du/ dang po'i cha res bskyed de btags pa'i phye ma chang la sogS
174b6(mdo 'grel): pa gong du smos pa gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thugs na/ skran dang/ lto sbo ba dang/ dmu rdzing sel te/ thug cing na ba dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud pa 'dzoms par byed la/ po ba'i drod bskyed par bshad do/ /shing
174b7(mdo 'grel): kun dang ? lung dang/ star bu dang/ bal pa'i se'u dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ tsa bas ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma chang bzang po dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rlung las gyur pa'i skran sel to/ /tsa basru tsha dang/ kha ru tsha dang/ star pu dang/ nas
175a1(mdo 'grel): tshig 'khus? pa'i thal ba dang/ shing kun rnams kyi phye ma/ zho kha chu la sogs ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ skran dang/ zug cing na ba dang/ phyis 'gags pas nyam thag ba bde bar byed do/ /byi dang ga dang/ ?
175a2(mdo 'grel): ha tI dang/ dan+ta'i rtsa ba dang/ snu ha k+Shi ra dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis mar srang brgyad dang/ chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol la/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las nyin re srang phyed phyed sha khu dang
175a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar te 'thungs pas/ thur du bkrus pas/ kha zas sha dang ldan par zos na/ skran dang/ rtug skam dang/ mdze dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ me'i dong nyams pa dang/ dmu rdzing rnams med par 'gyur ro/ /shing nye rong dang/ snum ha k+Shi ra dang
175a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ dbyi mor dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye re re dang/ rgya mtsha srang phyed dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma mar srang brgyad dang/ chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa'i ming ni d+hi bindu'i mar zhes bya ste/
175a5(mdo 'grel): 'di las nyin re zhing zho gnyis gnyis 'thungs la/ chu skol ba dron bos phul te/ thur du bkrus na/ skran no cog dang/ dmu rdzing thams cad 'joms par byed do/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran yod pa la ni// thog mar bu tshang rto la
175a6(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i sman mar dang/ ma hA tik+ta zhes bya ba'i sman mar dang/ ba sha ka la sogs pa'i sman mar rnams las gang yang rung ba btang ste/ lto 'jam por byas pa'i rjes la bkru sman btang nas de'i 'og tu bcud mas btang bar bya'o/ /n+ya
175a7(mdo 'grel): gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sdo tshan dang/ utpal la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pa rnams las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba dang/ mar gyi nang du sman 'tsho byed ces bya ba sna bcu sngar bstan pa rnams kyi phye ma btab ste skol la/ mar nyi
175b1(mdo 'grel): tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i khrag lung pa'i skran sel to/ /a ru ra'i phye ma mar a ru ra'i bzhi 'gyur dang/ skyu ru ra skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du btab ste/ skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs
175b2(mdo 'grel): na yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skran myur du sel to/ /yang na mkhris pa'i skran yod pa la ni 'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu pa'i nang du shing nye rong gi phye ma btab ba blud dam/ yang na kha ra dang/ kam byi la'i sbrang rtsis sbyar pa btab ste/ thur du bkru bar bya'o//
175b3(mdo 'grel): bad kan las gyur pa'i sman ni dugs dang/ bcing ba'i dugs dang/ sman mar btung ba dang/ bkru sman rnon bo dang/ 'jam rtsims btang ba rnon po dang/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba rnon po dang/ sngar rlung skran gyi cho gar bstan pa rnams kyis kyang
175b4(mdo 'grel): gse bar bya'o/ /drod bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman bca' sga dang/ pi pi lang dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ kru rdug?  tres dang/ dbyi mor dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye ma srang re re mar dang 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang/ chu mang
175b5(mdo 'grel): gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa'i ming ni srang drug pa'i mar zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran bar 'thungs na yang/ bad kan las gyur pa'i skran sel to/ /pho ba'i nang dang/ skya rbab gyi nang dang/ mcher pa'i nang dang/ lung ba dang/
175b6(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde ba dang/ rims 'joms shing skrang ba dang/ rtug skam med par byed do/ /dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dang/ mar gyi nang du drod bskyed ba zhes bya pa'i sman rnam ba drug po gong du smos pa'i rnams btags pa'i
175b7(mdo 'grel): phye ma mar nyi tshe lus pa 'am/ yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa dang/ sbyar ba'i mar sngar bshad pa las ran par 'thungs na yang/ bad kan las gyur ba'i skran sel to/ /kha du tsha dang/ kru trug tres dang/ shing kun rnams kyi phye ma/ ?
176a1(mdo 'grel): ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang me'i drong bskyed do/ /tsabs ru tsha dang/ la la phud kyi phye ma dang/ der ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang bad kan dang/ rlung dang 'phrod/ bud med kyi mngal gyi khrag las skran du chur? bzla ba bcu 'das nas
176a2(mdo 'grel): bu ma yin te/ skran yin par gyur na/ sman mar blud pa dang/ dugs byas bas lto 'jam por byas pa'i 'og tu/ snum ba'i cho ga bya ste/ bkru sman btang ngo/ /shu ti dang/ ci ri bil ba'i shun lpags dang/ thang shing dang/ brgi dang/ pi pi ling
176a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi phye ma/ til mar skol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang/ mngal gyi khrag las gyur pa'i skran sel to/ /til skol ba'i nang du/ bu ram dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ zhun mar dang/ brgi rnams kyi phye ma btab ste 'thungs na yang khrag
176a4(mdo 'grel): gi skran sel to/ /bud med zla mtshan mi 'byung ba la ni/ skyu ru ra skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du shing kidshu? ka'i thal ba blugs la skol te yang blud do/ /yang na nas tshig 'khus pa'i khu ba dang/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma chang dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang
176a5(mdo 'grel): khrag gi skran sel to/ /khrag gi skran khong du grum ste mngal gyi khrag drag tu 'byung zhing mi chod pa la ni/ khrag lung ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa dang/ rlung nad sel ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa rnams kyis bcad cing/ nab yang zhi bar bya'o/ /rlung
176a6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa las gyur pa'i nad 'byang du mi btub ba la ni/ smun pa sngon byed pa mthong zhing goms pas lag pa'i rtsa gtar zhing/ bad kan dang/ rlung las gyur pa'i skran la me btsa' gdab par bya'o/ /skran can la ni 'dor na/ kha zas
176a7(mdo 'grel): lci? ba dang/ bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i bag spang zhing/ me'i drod dang/ nyam stobs rtag tu bsrung bar bya ste/ kha zas dang/ btung ba rnams tshabs che chung las dpag cing bza' bar bya'o/ /skran gso ba'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so// //
176b1(mdo 'grel): de nas dmu rdzid gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dmu rdzing ni me'i drod chung ba dang/ kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos bas nang gzhi 'khrugs nas/ lus rdul ba dang/ chu grang mo 'thungs te rtsa dang 'dzag sgo rnams 'gags pa las/ dmu rdzing gi nad ma rungs
176b2(mdo 'grel): ba rnams brgyad skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing gi mtshan ma ni/ ltor zug cing na ba dang/ rdol la thug pa ltar na ba dang/ sgra 'byung ba dang/ rkang lag dang/ rlig pa skrang ba dang/ gnyer ma nag po 'byung zhing rtsa mngon par
176b3(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba rnams yin par bshad do/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba'i dmu rdzing gi mtshan ma ni/ lto sha reg na 'jam pa dang/ rims kyis 'debs ba dang/ rdul 'byung ba dang/ skom dad tshe ba dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ mgo 'khor ba dang/ rtsa sngon po dang/
176b4(mdo 'grel): ser bos g.yogs par 'dug pa rnams yin par bshad do/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing gi mtshan ma ni/ mchil ma mar ba dang/ lus lci ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ gnyid che ba dang/ skrang ba dang /yi ga 'chus pa dang /rims
176b5(mdo 'grel): kyis 'debs ba dang/ 'byang dka' ba dang/ lto 'khrang ba dang/ pags pa stug pa dang/ rtsa mdog dkar pos g.yogs pa rnams yin par shes par bya'o/ /'dus pa las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing ni/ bud med kyi dbang du bya ba'i phyir skra dang sen mo la
176b6(mdo 'grel): sogs ba byin te zos pa dang/ 'babs par byed pa dang/ lus ma rung bar byed ba'i dug las kyang 'byung ste/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin bar shes bar bya'o/ /dmu rdzing glo g.yas phyogs su 'byung ba la ni/ mchin pa'i dmu rdzing zhes
176b7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su 'byung ba ni/ mtsher ba'i dmu rdzing zhes bya ste/ 'di gnyis ka yang bad kan dang khrag 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no/ /kha zas bya sgro dang/ bu 'dres ba zos
177a1(mdo 'grel): te/ rgyu ma 'gags te phyis mi 'byung ba las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing snying ga dang/ lte ba'i bar gyi nang du dmu rdzing skye ba ni 'byung dka' ba yin te gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing zhes bya'o/ /kha zas zug rngu dang bcas pa
177a2(mdo 'grel): ba zos nas rgyu ma nang nas brtol te/ kha zas kyi khu ba phyir zags pa las nad du gyur te/ lte ba'i 'og tu zug cing na ba byung ba'i ming ni/ rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing zhes bya ste/ de'i mtshan ma ni/ chu sor zug ba'i mtshan ma la sogs ba
177a3(mdo 'grel): sngar bshad pa dang 'dra'o/ /chu'i dmu rdzing zhes bya ba ni/ snum bag 'thungs sam/ skyug sman nam/ bkru sman btang ba'i rjes la/ chu grang mo 'thungs ba las nang du gyur na/ lto ba'i phyogs su zlum zhing cher gyur te/ mdog snum la lto
177a4(mdo 'grel): rkyal pa gang ba bzhin du gyur pa yin no/ /dmu rdzing rnam pa brgyad po 'di rnams kyi nang du/ rgyu ma brdol ba'i dmu rdzing dang/ gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing gnyis ni gsor mi rung ngo/ /lhag ma gzhan ni gso dka' bar bshad de/ de dag
177a5(mdo 'grel): las kyang chu'i dmu rdzing du gyur pa ni spang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur ba'i dmu rdzing la ni/ sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma dang/ skol ba'i sman mar blud ba dang/ dugs bya ba dang/ snum bag gi bkru sman
177a6(mdo 'grel): btang ma lto zhi bar gyur nas/ lto phyir mi skye bar ras kyis bcing ba dang/ nang de dang 'phrod pa'i sman sbyar bas lto bskus pa'i steng nas/ pags pa drod che zhing spu 'jam la ma rul ba la lig to byas pa 'am/ de med na dar srin bal can gyi
177a7(mdo 'grel): lig to'am/ lug lpags kyis bcings pa'i dugs byas la/ kru trug tres kyi phye ma dang/ til mar lhan cig skol ba'i 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang/ sman s+thi ra la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dang/ sbyar bab bkru sman drag
177b1(mdo 'grel): poms btang ba dang/ kha zas 'o ma dang/ khu bcud dang/ sha khu gang yang rung ba dang ldan par bza' ba rnams rim bzhin du bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba'i dmu rdzing la ni/ thog mar 'jam rtsi sman ro mngar ba'i phye ma dang mar skol ba 'thungs la/
177b2(mdo 'grel): de'i 'og tu shing nye rong dang/ 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma mar gyi nang du skol ba'i bkru sman btang ngo/ /yang na shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba mar dang skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa sbrang rtsi dang/ khar dang sbyar bas/ bkru sman drag po
177b3(mdo 'grel): mas btang ba bya ste/ de yang sngar 'jam rtsims btang ba dang ldan par bya'o/ /'jam rtsi mas btang ba ni/ n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ sman gyi sde tshan de nyid kyi phye ma dang/ til mar dang lhan cig tu skol te/ til mar
177b4(mdo 'grel): nyi tshe lus ba bcags ba btang ngo/ /de nas 'bras kyi 'o thug skabs bcing ba'i dugs byas te/ /ba zas kyang sman s+thi ra la sogs ba'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang skol la/ 'o ma nyi tshe lus ba dang ldan par bza' o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i dmu
177b5(mdo 'grel): rdzing la ni thog mar 'jam rtsi pi pi ling la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i sman mar sngar bshad pa btang nas dugs byas pa'i 'og tu/ shing snu hag shi ri dang/ skol ba'i mar gyi bkru sman btang ngo/ /de nas sman mu ska ka la sogs ba'i sde tshan skol/
177b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i khu ba til mar dang/ ba gcin dang/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma rnams dang/ sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang bar bya ste/ 'jam rtsi mas btang ba'i tshig yang bya ste/ 'jam rtsims btang ba na sman gyi sde tshan gong ma nyid skol ba'i
177b7(mdo 'grel): khu ba'i nang du/ til mar dang/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma lhan cig tu skol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa btang ngo/ /de nas phabs dang/ la phug gi sa bon dang/ yungskar rnams sbyar ro bas bcing ba'i dugs bya'o/ /kha zas ni rgya sran gyi
178a1(mdo 'grel): khu bcud dam/ 'o ma tsha ba gsum dang ldan bas dpag cing bza' o/ /'dus pa las gyur ba'i dmu rdzing la ni/ rlung las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing la sogs gong du smos pa rnams kyi chog sngar bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang
178a2(mdo 'grel): sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang na 'di la ni/ bo ga dang/ shi ki ni'i phye ma dang/ mar lhan cig tu skol ba'i bkru sman yang btang ngo/ /mtsher ba'i dmu rdzing can la yang/ 'jam rtsi dang/ dugs dang/ bkru sman la sogs pa'i chog byas la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i
178a3(mdo 'grel): gru? mo'i nang gi rtsa yang gtar par bya'o/ /byi dang ga dang/ kru trug tres dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ phye dang/ shu dag rnams tsha ma cham du brdungs la mar gyis bskus te/ snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bsngos nas/ zhib tu btags la 'o ma dang sbyar te 'thungs na
178a4(mdo 'grel): yang/ skran dang/ mtsher pa'i dmu rdzing sel to/ /yang na le sham dkar bo skol ba'i khu ba/ rgyam tsha dang/ kru trug tres dang/ pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang/ sbyar ba'am/ yang na na le sham dkar bo skol ba'i khu ba shing bal sha'i thal ba dang/
178a5(mdo 'grel): nas tshig 'khus ba'i thal ba dang sbyar te blung do// ro hi ta ka dang/ ya ru ra'i bye ma ba gcin nam/ chu'i nang du spangs te/ 'thungs na yang dmu rdzing thams cad dang/ mtsher ba'i nang dang/ gcin snyi ba'i nad dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ srin bu
178a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ skran sel to/ /yang na rgya mtsho'i nya lci bas bsregs pa'i thal ba'o ma dang sbyar te tshor ran par btung bar bya'o/ /yang na 'tsher ba'i dmu rdzing la/ bi bi ling gi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar te blud do/ /mcher? pa'i dmu rdzing gso ba'i cho gar
178a7(mdo 'grel): bstan ba de thams cad ni/ mchin pa'i dmu rdzing la yang btang bar bya'o/ /yang na mchin pa'i dmu rdzing la ni /lag pa g.yas pa'i gru mo'i nang gi rtsa gtar par bya'o/ /dmu rdzing rnams la ni phyi sa la sogs ba lto'i? dri ma
178b1(mdo 'grel): shas che bas ni/ bkru sman lan mang du bya bar bstan to/ /de nas de'i 'og tu dmu rdzing gi spyi'i cho gces ba yang bstan par bya ste/ dmu rdzing la ni ye raN+Ta'i mar 'o ma dang/ ba gcin gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te lan mang du gtung bar bya'o/ /yang na til
178b2(mdo 'grel): mar shing kun dang/ swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang/ sbyar ba'am/ sman dzyo ti ka'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba blud do/ /mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'o ma mar gyi brgyang 'gyur gyi nang du/ snu ha k+Shi ri srang gcig dang/ shing nye rong gi phye ma srang drug skol la/
178b3(mdo 'grel): mar nyi tshe las bar byas te/ btsags pa las ran bar 'thungs na yang/ dmu rdzing dang/ skran sel to/ /'bras bu gsum dang/ bya rnu dang/ bog dang/ shi drod dang/ shu dag dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ sba ma'i 'bras bu dang/ bu tso shel dang/ shing nye rong
178b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ pi pi ling gi phye ma pa gcin dang/ chu skol ba dron mo dang/ sha khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang/ skran dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ mtsher ba'i nad dang/ mdze dang/ gzhang 'bru ma dang/ khrag tshang dang/ skrad pa 'or
178b5(mdo 'grel): thab? rnams kyis nyam thag pa thams cad sel to// sman big sha la dang/ shing khi ni dang/ danda'i rtsa ba dang/ shing nye rong dang/ shing dod dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ yung dang/ byi dang ga dang/ kaM bi lye ka rnams kyi phye ma/ ba gcin dang sbyar te 'thungs
178b6(mdo 'grel): na yang dmu rdzing? sol to/ /zhag bdun gyi bar du kha zas dang/ skom bzhin mi bza' mi btung bar/ ma he'i gcin dang/ 'o ma sbyar ba 'ba' zhig btung dam/ yang na zla ba gcig gi bar du kha zas dang/ skom gzhan mi bza' mi btung bar /rnga mo'i
178b7(mdo 'grel): 'o ma 'ba' zhig 'thungs na yang/ skrang ba 'ong thabs su spang ba dang/ dmu ? sel to/ /yang na dmu rdzing can la pi pi ling gi phye ma shing snu ha'i 'o ma zags pa'i nang du/ spangs pa las cir na bar btung ngo/ /yang na dmu rdzing zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ ?
179a1(mdo 'grel): smod dang/ danda'i rtsa ba dang/ gru trug tres dang/ byi dang ga dang/ tsha ba gsum rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na thang shing dang/ kru trug tres kyi phye ma 'o ma dang/ sga skol ba'i khu ba gnyis las gang yang rung ba dang/
179a2(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'am/ yang na dbyi mong dang/ bca' sga'i phye ma 'o ma dang/ sga sgol ba'i khu ba gnyis las gang yang rung ba dang sbyor te btung bar bya'o/ /nas tshig 'khus ba'i thal ba dang/ swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang/ kru trug tres dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/
179a3(mdo 'grel): sha dong dang/ lan tshwa rnam lnga rnams kyi phye ma mar khu dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ skran dang/ dmu rdzing thams cad sil to/ /dmu rdzing ngo cog gsal ba'i phyir/ sman byi sha la dang/ shing ki ni dang/ dan+ta'i rtsa ba dang/ shi dod dang/ byi tsher
179a4(mdo 'grel): rnams gyi phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar te btang bar bya'o/ /mdor na dmu rdzing ro cog ni/ phal cher nang gzhi mang po 'dus ba las byung bas na/ de'i phyir dmu rdzing ngo cog la/ rlung la sogs pa'i nang gzhi rnams zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /
179a5(mdo 'grel): rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing dang/ chu'i dmu rdzing dang/ gzhang 'gags pa'i dmu rdzing 'di gsum la ni/ sman pa chog shes bas so shi rdo ba dang dam bcas la lta dbug ba dang/ dral ba'i cho ga yang bya'o/ /dmu rdzing rnams kyis nyam thag ba'i kha zas su ni/
179a6(mdo 'grel): 'bras sa lu rnams dang/ nas dang/ mon sran sde'u dang/ 'o ma dang/ srog chags rnams skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams nyam stobs las dbags te thal bzhir btung bar bya'o/ /dmu rdzing can la ni/ chu btung ba dang/ nyin par gnyid log ba
179a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ khams lci ba dang/ bad kan bskyed ba'i bag dang/ drag shul gyi bag mi bya'o/ /bzhon ba la zhon ba rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /dmu rdzing gso ba'i le'u ste bcu ? rdzogs so// //de nas gcin snyi ba'i nad
179b1(mdo 'grel): gso ba bshad par bya ste/ kha zas mi 'phrod bzos pa dang/ 'dug nyal la sogs ba gnas ba'i nyes pa las/ gcin snyi ba'i nad rnam ba nyi shur 'gyur bar bshad de/ de yang gcin snyi ba'i nad du gyur na/ shin tu mang chos par gyur pa ni/
179b2(mdo 'grel): gcin snyi ba'i nad yin no zhes/ drang srong thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad des thog mar 'debs pa'i mtshan ma ni/ so la sogs pa shin tu dri ma che bar 'gyur ba dang/ rkang lag tsha ba dang/ lus kyi mdog dmar por gyur
179b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ khar mngar ba bro ba rnams yin no/ /de la bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni/ chu 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba dang 'dra ba dang/ chang 'dra ba dang/ 'bras phye 'dra ba dang/ phye ma 'dra ba dang
179b4(mdo 'grel): bskab? dang/ 'breng ba dang/ lan tshwa 'dra ba dang/ dbu ba 'dra ba dang/ khu chu 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang rnam pa bcu'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni/ ljang ser zhes bya ba dang/ sngon po dang/ btsong kha dang/ thal kha dang/
179b5(mdo 'grel): khrag 'dra ba dang/ scur? ba chos pa zhes bya ba dang rnam pa drug go /rlung las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi ming ni/ mar khu dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang/ sbrang rtsi 'dra ba dang/ glang po che'i gcin 'dra ba dang/ zhag 'dra ba zhes bya ba dang rnam pa bzhi'o/ /
179b6(mdo 'grel): gcin snyi ba'i nad bar dge thams cad kyi mtshan ma ni/ so so'i ming du snom pa'i don bzhin du lta'o/ /de la bad kan las gyur pa rnams ni gso sla bar bshad do/ /rlung las gyur ba rnams ni/ gsor mi rung bar mthong ngo/ /mkhris pa las
179b7(mdo 'grel): gyur? pa rnams ni/ kha zas dang/ sman gyis gas? tsam du 'dzeg nus so/ /de las bad kan las gyur ba'i gcin snyi ba'i nad yod pa la ni/ sman la la phung? dang/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang/ sla tre sa dang/ a ru ra rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ nga tha ?
180a1(mdo 'grel): skyer pa dang/ byi dang ga dang/ yung dang/ ardzun dang/ byi tsher rnams lhan ci tu sbyar ba dang/ byi dang ga dang/ yung dang/ skyer pa dang/ a ru ra dang/ rgya spos lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ shings la dang/ /a rdzun dang/ kang ma pa
180a2(mdo 'grel): dang skyer pa dang/ la la phud rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ can dan dkar po dang/ a ka ru dang/ ru rta dang/ thang shing rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ katpa la dang/ gla sgang dang/ pa tha dang/ ti ri ta dang/ a ru re rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba
180a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ aM ba shtha dang/ seng ldeng dang/ skyer pa dang/ agni man+tha dang/ 'bras bu gsum bo rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba bdun po 'di rnams las/ gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la/ sbrang rtsi dang shas cher sbyar
180a4(mdo 'grel): te blud do/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gcin snyi ba'i nad yod pa la ni/ pa To la dang/ nim+ba'i lo ma dang/ sle tre sa dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ gla sgang rnams lhan cig tu sbyor? ba dang/ a ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ bu shel tse dang/ ni la ba ri dang/
180a5(mdo 'grel): gla sgang rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang/ shug pa dang/ bla sgang dang/ a ru ra dang/ dug mo nyung rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ u di tsya deng/ d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang/ gser 'phrom dang/ ka li ya ka rnams lhan cig tu
180a6(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba dang/ utpal la dang/ bu shel tsa dang/ gseng phrom dang/ ardzu na dang/ tsan dan dkar po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba lnga po 'di rnams las gang yang rung bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te blud? dang?/ /
180a7(mdo 'grel): gcin snyi ma'i nang la/ rlung gtso bor gyur la/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa gnyis las/ gcig grogs su gyur na/ gang grogs su gyur ba rtogs par bya ste/ bad kan grogs su gyur ba la nad dang 'phrad ba'i sman ro tsha zhing drod che ba'i mthu
180b1(mdo 'grel): dang ldan ba rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang/ sman gyi khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa las ci ran par blud do/ /mkhris pa grogs su gyur pa la ni/ de dang 'grod ba'i sman ro mngar zhing bsil ba'i mthu dang ldan ba rnams ?
180b2(mdo 'grel): ma/ mar dang/ sman gyi khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa ci ran par blud do/ /sle tres slon pa'i khu ba btsir ba 'am/ skam bo skol ba'i bsgrangs pa la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang gcin snyi ba'i nang thams cad sel
180b3(mdo 'grel): to// skyu ru ra rlon ba btsir ba'i khu ba 'am/ skam pa btsos pa'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du yung gi phye ma dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang/ thang shing dang/ skyer pa dang/ gla sgang rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba
180b4(mdo 'grel): 'am/ yang na dug mo nyung gi shing sabtar+Na? dang/ skyer ba dang/ kru trug tres dang/ 'bras bu gsum bo rnams bskol ba'i khub bsgrangs ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'thungs na/ gcin snyi ba'i nad sel to/ /shing sa kha dang/ sbu ska ra dang/ kaM pi ka rnams kyi
180b5(mdo 'grel): phye ma zho gnyis gnyis sgyu ru ra'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsir sbyar te 'thungs na yang gcin snyi ba'i nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ brag zhun sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'am/ lcags kyi phye ma sbrang
180b6(mdo 'grel): rtsi bar sbyor ba'am/ a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ sman gyi lde gu gcin snyi ba'i nang bzlog pa'i phyir bza' bar bya'o/ /gser phrom dang/ sug smel dang/ kru trug tres dang/ danda'i rtsa ba dang/ ba tha dang /gand+ha ba tra dang/ shing tsa dang/ nA
180b7(mdo 'grel): ga gre sor dang/ gla ba dang/ mo nu dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ rtsa mkhris dang/ thang shing dang/ dug mo hung dang/ bi shal dang/ bong da dkar po dang/ bargi dang/ ru rta dang/ mu rwa dang/ gand+ha pri yaM ku dang/ byi dang ka dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang// 
181a1(mdo 'grel): bu tse shel dang/ dbyi mong dang/ pi pi ling dang/ rtsa ba dang/ la la phud rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis chu phul gang la srang brgyad du brtsis ba phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du skol te/ chu bzhi cha gcig lus nas bsgrangs
181a2(mdo 'grel): te btsags la/ sgrang rtsi sman gyi khu ba gdus pa de'i phye dang sbyar nas/ bum pa mar snod du byas pa'i nang du blugs te/ kha bcad la zla ba phyed kyi bar du nas kyi nang du bzhag pa'i sbrang chang 'di las nyin de bzhin srang gnyis gnyis 'thungs na yang
181a3(mdo 'grel): gcin snyi ba'i nad sel zhing/ pho ba'i nang dang/ skya rbab kyi nad dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ mdze dang/ yi ga 'chus pa rnams 'joms bar byed do/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad yod pa'i kha zas ni/ tshod ma kha ba'i bag dang/ skam sa na gnas pa'i ri
181a4(mdo 'grel): dags sha bkra'i sha dang/ bya sha dang/ nas las byas pa'i kha zas dang/ mon sran sde'u dang/ 'bras sa lu dang/ zhag drug cu smin pa rnams dge'o/ /skom du ni bu ram dang/ rgun chang dang/ seng ldeng gi snying po la sogs ba skol ba'i khu ba
181a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ sbrang chang dang/ rtsa ku sha skol ba'i khu ba dang/ 'bras bu gsum skol ba'i khu ba rnams gcin snyi ba'i nang la bsngags pa yin no/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad kyi rkyen gyis pho la mig rnams mang po 'byung ste/ thog ma 'byung ba'i tshe ni rtsa nas khrag
181a6(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar bya'o/ /phol mig smin pa ni brtol la rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /gcin snyi ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// //sman dpyad gces pa grub pa zhes bya ba bam po bzhi ba'o/ /de nas mdze nad
181a7(mdo 'grel): gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mdze nad ni sdig can dang/ kha zas ngan bzos te nad gzhi gsum 'khrugs nas/ pags ba dang/ sha dang/ khrag dang/ chu ser rnams ma rung bar gyur pa la/ mdze nad rnam pa bco brgyad du 'gyur te/ mdze
181b1(mdo 'grel): nad u dum+ba ra zhes bya ba/ u dum+ba ra'i 'bras bu 'dra ba dang/ sha gzi gu zhes bya ba rung gi kha dog 'dra ba dang/ ka ka na zhes bya ba'o ma se'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra ba dang/ pags pa shul grub ces bya ba glang po che'i pags pa 'dra ba dang/ pad+ma dkar po zhes/
181b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba rang gi ming gi mdog 'dra ba dang/ ri dags ri sha'i lce 'dra ba zhes bya ba rtsub po dang/ rma kha brgya pa zhes bya ba rma mang po dang/ khyab ba rdul med ces bya ba dang/ pags pa myags ba zhes bya ba pags bzang pa dang/ rkang pa zhigs pa zhes bya ba rkang pa
181b3(mdo 'grel): ser ga mang po 'gas pa dang/ mdze nad rnam ba bcu po 'di dag ni gsor mi rung ngo/ /lhag ma brgyad ni gsor rung ba yin te/ mdze nad gya mo 'dra ba zhes bya ba mdog gnag cing rtsub pa dang/ med bal zhes bya ba rma kha chen po dang/ 'brum bu phra mo zhes
181b4(mdo 'grel): bya ba sha sman 'dra zhing/ mdog sngo skyar 'dug pa dang/ shu ba zhes bya ba 'brum bu mang po phyogs gcig nas 'bung ba dang/ sha bkra zhes bya ba ku ba'i me tog 'dra ba dang/ thig le zhes bya ba mchog snum zhing 'byar dka' ba dang/ g.yan pa zhes bya ba 'brum bu
181b5(mdo 'grel): mdog dkar zhin dmar ba dang/ rkang shu zhes bya ba 'brum bu 'dzag pa rnams so/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i mdze ni/ mkhrang zhing mdog sngo skyar 'dug pa dang/ dmar zhing rtsub la mi bzad par na ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba'i mdze ni lus tsha zhing shin tu
181b6(mdo 'grel): mya gsal khrag 'dzag pa yin bar bshad do/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad ni lus rul zhing bags bstug la g.ya' zhing mdog snum pa dang dkar zhing lci ba yin no/ /de la nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa'i mdze nad kyi mtshan ma ni tshul thams cad dang
181b7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa 'am/ nang bla gnyan mang pos thebs ba gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya'o/ /mdze bo cog ni phal cher nang gzhi gsum char 'dus ba dang/ khrag rgyas ba las 'byung bar bshad bas na/ mdze nad can tshabs chen po nyam stobs yod la sngar yang snum
182a1(mdo 'grel): bcung btang ba la ni rtsa gtar zhing khrag dbyung bar bya'o/ /mdze nad tshabs chung du la ni zhal zhal gdab pa dang/ sdab rus gzhib pa dang/ ku bas khrag drang ba dang/ srin bu pang pu 'jib tu bzhug go /nad gzhi ci 'dra ba las skyug
182a2(mdo 'grel): sman dang/ bkru sman yang btang ngo/ /mdze nad gtar ga byar mi rung ba dang/ tshor ba med pa bem bam po la ni sman mu ka'i thal ba dang/ til gyi sogs ma'i thal ba la sogs pas gdab bo/ /mdze tshor ba med pa bem bem por gyur pa dang/ pags pa
182a3(mdo 'grel): mkhrang por 'dug ba dang/ 'byar du mi btub pa rnams la ni/ mda' dug la sogs bas sngags dang ldan par bya ste/ khus la bsku bar bya'o/ /pa to la dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang /a riShDa dang/ sle tres dang/ d+ha ba ni dang/ ba sha ka dang/ ka
182a4(mdo 'grel): rany+dza rnams btags pa'i phye ma dang/ chu mar gyi gzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags ba'i ming ni rdo rje can zhes bya ste/ de las ran par 'thungs na mdze nad sel to/ /kha ba chen bo ci skrigs zhes bya ba'i mar ni/ rtsa mkhris dang/
182a5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu gsum dang/ pu shel tse dang/ ba Tha dang/ a riSh+Ta dang/ gla sgang dang/ phyi tsher dang/ shing mngar dang/ thal tres rnam gnyis dang/ pu tse shel dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ sle tres dang/ pi pi ling dang/ shug pa dang
182a6(mdo 'grel): shu dag dang/ pi sha la dang/ dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang/ ba sha ka dang/ murba dang/ pa To la dang/ dong ka dang/ skro lo dang/ bod da dkar po dang/ yung dang/ ba mkhal dang/ nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma spyir mar gyi bzhi cha
182a7(mdo 'grel): gcig dang/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba mar gyi nyis 'gyur dang/ chu mar gyi brgyad 'gyur dang/ 'di rnams mar dang skol te mar nyi tshe lus bar byas nas btsags te/ de las ran bar zos na yang rlung dang mkhris ba las gyur pa'i nad drag po dang/
182b1(mdo 'grel): mdze dang/ 'bras dang/ skya rbab rnams sel cing/ rims dang smyo ba dang/ 'bras kyi phreng ba rnams med par byed do/ /mkhris pa dang/ khrag shes che ba'i mdze nad la ni/ mar pa To la'i phye ma dang skol ba 'am/ skyer ba'i phye ma dang skol ba 'am/ ser
182b2(mdo 'grel): ldeng gi phye ma dang skol ba 'am/ nim pa'i phye ma dang skol ba mar blung do/ /yang na sman a barta ka'i phye ma srang brgyad mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ chu srang brgya'i nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ci ran par rtsabs dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs
182b3(mdo 'grel): la sman khong du zhu ba'i 'og tu zas su ko dra ba'i chan bza' bar bya ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin de bzhin tshe ga de ltar byas pa'i 'og tu zhag gsum gyi bar du sman mi btang bar mthun zhing 'phrod pa'i kha zas zos la/ yang zhag bdun gyi bar du
182b4(mdo 'grel): sman gyi cho ga snga ma ltar bya ba de lta bur ma sos kyi bar du byas na/ mdze dang/ skran dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ mtshan par rdol ba'i nang rnams las thal bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na dzi ti ka'i 'bras bu dang/ sna ma'i me tog dang/ tsha ba gsum pa rnams btagS
182b5(mdo 'grel): la/ 'bru mar dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na ldong ros dang/ na le sham btags pa'i til mar dang/ shing arga'i lo ma dang/ lus bskus na yang mdze nad cog sel to/ /a ru ra dang/ ka rany+dza dang/ yungs kar dang/ yung dang/ bal guny+dza dang/ rgyam
182b6(mdo 'grel): tshwa dang /byi dgag rnams lhan cig tu btags la/ ba gcin dang sbyar te lus bskus na yang mdze nad sel to/ /ru rta dang/ e raN+Ta dang/ e da ga dza rnams lhan cig tu til mar ram/ ba gcin dang sbyar te lus bskus na yang mdze nad thub bo//
182b7(mdo 'grel): gser phrom dang/ skyer khaN+Da dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ phra puN+Da rnams kyang bsku ba'i rnam grangs su bshad do/ /ru rta dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ yungs kar dang/ byi dang ga dang /e da ga dza rnms lhan cig tu btags la/ rtsabs dang sbyar te bskus na
183a1(mdo 'grel): yang shu ba dang/ mdze thig le zhes bya ba sel to/ /mu zi dang/ ba bla dang/ ldong ros dang/ ru rta dang/ sman ka li dang/ pu shel tse dang/ gand+ha pa tra rnams btags la/ chu dang sbyar te bskus na yang/ sha kra la sogs ba
183a2(mdo 'grel): mdze nad do cog sel to/ /gand+ha pa tra dang/ na le sham dang/ nag tshur dang/ ru rta dang/ ldong ros rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang sbyar la/ khar ba'i snod kyi nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du bzhag ste lus bskus na yang sha kra dang/ sha gzi gu med
183a3(mdo 'grel): par byed do/ /mu zi dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba 'am/ chu shing gi thal ba 'am/ shing kha ra'i me tog gi thal ba gang yang rung ba til mar dang sbyar te lus bskus na yang sha bkra sel bar byed do/ /sman dku na ti rma bya'i mkhris pa

183a6(mdo 'grel): dza dang/ arga dang/ rgyam tshwa rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang/ shing smu ha'i lo ma dang/ til mar gyi nang du skol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa'i nang du mda' dug cung zad tsam btab ste lus bskus na yang shu ba dang/ rkang shu la sogs pa
183a7(mdo 'grel): sel to/ /btsong dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang /rgya skyegs dang/ yung dang/ ldong ros dang/ ba bla dang/ mu zi rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang sbyar te nyi tshan gyi drod kyis sros pas lus bskus na yang g.yan ba sel bar byed do//
183b1(mdo 'grel): sman ka ka na si ka dang/ u dum+ba ra dang/ nimpa dang/ gla sgang dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ byi dang ga rnams kyi phye ma nimpa skol ba'i khub dang sbyar te 'thungs ni yang pags pa'i nyes pa'o cog sel to/ /sre tres skol ba'i khu ba dang/ 'bras bu gsum skol ba'i

183b4(mdo 'grel): dang sbyer te 'thungs la kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par zos na yang mdze las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ba ku ci'i phye ma mar sar dang sbrang rtsir te zos la/ de'i rjes la dar ba 'thungs shing/ kha zas kyang dar ba dang spags te zos na mdze nad kyi 'jigs pa med do/ /til dang/
183b5(mdo 'grel): mar dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ go bye dang/ kha ra dang/ rnam pa 'di bdun cha mnyam ste sbyar ba'i ming ni bdun cha mnyam ba zhes bya ste/ de las ci ran par zos na ro tsa zhing yid gzhungs par byed la/ mdze nad sel te 'di
183b6(mdo 'grel): la cho ga bsrung ba med do/ /byi dang ga dang/ kru trug tres dang/ kha ra dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ lcags kyi so dog dang/ pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang sbyar te zos na mdzad nad de tsog shin tu tsha bas tshe ba yang sel bar 'gyur te/ a ru ra dang/ til dang/
183b7(mdo 'grel): bo bye rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang sbyar te brdzis pa zos na yang mdze nad sel to// go bye dang/ phyi dang ga dang/ so mar ci ka rnams kyi phye ma bu ram dang brdzis pa 'am/ phyi dang ga dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang brdzis
184a1(mdo 'grel): pa thos na yang/ mdze dang/ srin bu dang/ gcin snyi ba'i nang dang/ rma 'khyims pa dang/ mtshan bar rdol gyi nang rnams sel bar byed do/ /pags pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba la dug mo nyung gi phye ma mar khu dang sbyar ba yang btung bar bya'o/
184a2(mdo 'grel): yang na til dang/ so mar dza ka'i phye ma cha mnyam ste sbyar ba cho ga bsrungs bzhin du lo gcig gi bar du bza' 'o/ /seng ldeng dang/ brag zhun dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ zhun mar dang/ byi dang ga rnams sbyar te zos la/ cho ga bzhin du bsrungs na/ skrad mdze
184a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ skrang ba'i nad ring po mi thogs par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ser ldeng gi rtsab bsegs pa'i khu ba bum pa'i nang du bzags pa/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang/ mar dang/ sgrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na yang mdze nad sel zhing sman bcud kyis len du
184a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro// seng ldeng skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa/ sbrang rtsi dang/ skyer khaN+Da dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang/ byi dang ga'i phye ma mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis sbyar te zos na yang mdze nad sel to/ /seng ldeng skol ba'i khu bas lus bsku ba
184a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ lus dril ba dang/ khrus bya ba dang/ btung ba dang/ kha zas g.yo ba'i chu la sogs pa spyad cing rtag tu 'thungs na mdze nad pags pa'i nyes pa thams cad sel to/ /ji ltar seng ldeng mdze nad bzlog pa'i tshe gar sbyar ba bzhin du /shi sha pa dang/ dod ka
184a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ a riSh+Ta dang/ skyer pa dang/ shing ro hi ta ka dang/ a sa na rnams kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /mdze nad can la ni kha zas su 'bras sa lu dang/ ko dra ba dang/ gro dang/ nas dang/ mon sran sde'u la sogs pa gang bu can rnying pa rnams dang/ tshod ma ro kha
184a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i bag dang/ ri dags skams na gnas pa'i shing dang/ sbyar ba rnams phan zhing 'phrod pa yin no/ /mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas gzhang 'brum dang/ mtshan bar rdol gyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de nas gzhar?
184b1(mdo 'grel): 'brum ni nang gzhi gsum re re las gyur pa dang/ kun 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ /brag nad las gyur pa dang/ thog ma nas lhan cig skyes ba dang/ rnam ba drug yod de/ gzhang ka'i gnyer ma gsum yod pa'i gnas su 'byung bar rig bar bya'o/ /de la rlung
184b2(mdo 'grel): las gyur ba'i gzhar 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/ 'brum bu chung zhing ma rgyas pa dang/ skam pa dang/ rtsa dmar zhing sngo skyar 'dug dang/ snum bag med cing rtsub pa dang/ 'brum bu rnams mthong man yod cing mi mnyam pa dang/ na zhing 'gag par byed ba la
184b3(mdo 'grel): sogs pa rlung gi tshul thams cad dang ldan rna ba yin no// mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing ser la gnag ste reg tu mi bzod cing/ 'jam la khrag 'dzag cing chu ser can la mgo 'khor zhing lus tsha ba la sogs
184b4(mdo 'grel): pa mkhris ba'i tshul rnams dang ldan pa yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/ mdog dkar ba dang ser skyar 'dug dang/ 'byar dka' ba dang/ snum zhing 'byil ba dang/ 'brum bu che zhing tshor ba med pa dang/ bad kan gyi tshul
184b5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang ldan pa yin no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i gzhar 'brum dang /thog ma nas lhan cig skyes pa'i gzhar 'brum gyi tshul ni/ thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa yin no/ /khrag las gyur pa'i gzhar 'brum gyi mtshan ma ni/ mdog
184b6(mdo 'grel): dam par zhing khrag 'dzeg ba yin par bstan to/ /de la nang gi gnyer me'i gnas su 'byung ba dang /nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur ba dang/ thog ma nas lhan cig skyes pa 'di gsum ni spang bar bya'o/ /lhag ma gzhan rnams ni gso dka' bar bshad do/
184b7(mdo 'grel): gzhad 'brum can la nang sla thabs skyug pa dang /mor mod ba'i nad dang /du shing na ba dang/ skom dang che ba dang/ rims dang/ snying na ba dang/ tshu son ba dang/ khar 'brum pa 'byung ba dang/ gzhar kang 'brum pa phre'u 'byung ba dang/ sha zad ba rnams ?
185a1(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /yang na gzhar 'brum ni rnam ba gnyis su 'dus te/ gzhar 'brum skam ba ni bad kan dang rlung gnyis 'dus pa las gyur pa yin no/ /ma bros pa dang/ khrab nang 'dus ba las gyur pa ni/ gsher zhing 'dzag pa yin
185a2(mdo 'grel): par shes par bya ste/ de la thog mar gzhar 'brum skam po'i chog bshad par bya ste/ gzhar 'brum zhi bar bya ba la/ ba lang go lce ba'i dugs dang/ zan dron gyi dugs dang/ la phug gi dugs dang/ shu ta'i dugs rnams gang yang rung ba bya zhing /gso
185a3(mdo 'grel): ma skol ba'i khu ba blugs pa dang/ sprul nag po dang/ byi la dang/ rnga mo dang/ phag dang/ srog chags dza du ka rnams gang yang rung ba'i tshil bsregs pa'i dur pas bdug pa dang/ yang na yud gi phye ma shing snu ha'i 'o ma dang sbyar te bsku ba dang/ yang
185a4(mdo 'grel): na pi pi ling dang/ yang gi phye ma pa lang gi mkhris pa dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na swa rdzi ka'i thal ba dang/ danda'i? rtsa ba dang/ lung ga la'i rtsa ba dang/ kru trug tres rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang/ pi pi ling dang/ shing shing sha'i sa
185a5(mdo 'grel): bon dang/ shing arga'i 'o ma dang/ ru rta dang/ rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ yung dang/ bya gag gi rtug ba dang/ 'o ma se'i 'bras bu dang/ pi pi ling rnams kyi phya ma ba gcin dang sbyer ba dang/ bsku ba'i sman rnam ba 'di gsum ni/
185a6(mdo 'grel): gdon mi za ba yin te/ gang yang rung bas bskus na gzhang 'brum med par byed do/ /danda'i rtsa ba dang/ a shwa mar dang/ nag tshur dang/ phyi dang ga dang/ ba bla dang /kru trug tres dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma/ shing arga'i 'o ma dang/ til mar
185a7(mdo 'grel): gyi nang du skol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus la btsags bas bskus na yang gzhar 'brum sel te/ /yang na/ a ru ra/ bu ram dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na a ru ra zhag gcig gi bar du ba gcin gyi nang du spangs ba 'am/ yang na/ a ru ra dang bi bi ling mar
185b1(mdo 'grel): gyi nang du brngos ba'am/ yang na a ru ra dang/ shing nye rong dang /dan da'i rtsa ba rnams sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/ /yang na /go bye btags pa'i phyi dang /dar ba sbyar ba 'am/ yang dar ba dang /phye kru trug tres/ /la la phung btags pa'i phye mar dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na
185b2(mdo 'grel): dar ba dang/ phye bca' sga dang/ bilba dang sbyar ba nan tan du byas te btung ngo/ /yang na rdza ma kru trug tres kyis bskus pa'i nang du zho mnan de langs nas/ zho lam dar ba gang yang rung ba btung ngo/ /yang de nyid kyi cho ga bzhin du/ pi rga dang/ po ta dang/
185b3(mdo 'grel): sle tres rnams kyis rdza ma bskus pa'i nang du zho mnan la/ zho 'am dar ba gang yang rung ba btung ngo/ /yang na dbyi mong dang/ kru trug tres phye ma chang dang sbyar te/ rtag tu 'thungs na gzhang 'brum sel to/ /yang na bca' sgo dang/ kru trug tres rnams kyi phye
185b4(mdo 'grel): ma bu ram dang/ chang dang sbyar te btung ngo/ /yang na gzhar 'brum can la/ da nda'i rtsa ba dang /go bye dang/ kru trug tres dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ 'di rnams cha mnyam pa dang/ rgyam tsha cha nyis 'gyur rnams snod kha sbyar gyi nang du brdos la/ tshig
185b5(mdo 'grel): mar gyur ba'i phye ma kha zas gzhan dang sbyar zhing bza' bar bya'o/ /til nag po zho gnyis gnyis nang par bzhin zos la/ chu grang mos phul na yang gzhang 'brum zhi bar 'gyur zhing/ so brtan la sha skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mar dang/ shing pa la sha'i thal ba'i khu ba
185b6(mdo 'grel): mar gyi tshi sum 'gyur gyi nang du/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma skal te/ mar nye tshe lus pa las ran par 'thungs na yang/ the tshom med par gzhar 'brum 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu gsum dang/ rtsa ba bcu dang/ kru tru /tres dang/ danda'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phye
185b7(mdo 'grel): ? re re chu phul gang la srang brgya 'du? brtsis ba phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du skol to/ chu bzhi cha gcig lus pa btsags la/ bu ram srang brgya dang sbyar te/ mar snod kyi nang du blugs la/ izla ba gcig gi bar du mnan pa'i ming ni/ danda'i rtsa ba'i chang zhes 
186a1(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ 'di las ran par 'thungs na/ gzhang 'brum dang/ yig 'chus pa dang/ rtug skam dang/ pho ba'i nang dang/ skya rbab kyi nang rnams sel to/ /bi shal dang/ ka bit+tha dang/ kru trug tres dang/ pa tha rnams las srang gnyis gnyis dang
186a2(mdo 'grel): a ru ra dang/ skyu ru ra srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma chu phul brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi nang du skol te/ chu bzhi rtsa gcig lus pa bcags la/ bu ram srang brgya dang sbyar te/ mar snod kyi rdza mar blug la/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du
186a3(mdo 'grel): mnan pa'i ming ni/ 'bras bu'i chang zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par 'thungs na pho ba'i nang dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ skran sel to/ /gzhar 'brum na zhing 'khru ba la ni/ rlung las gyur pa'i 'khru ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum
186a4(mdo 'grel): na zhing phyis skam ste 'byung du mi btub ba la ni/ rtug skam gyi cho ga 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du lan mang du bya'o/ /shu ti dang/ bilba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ kru trug tres dang/ shu dag dang/ shing mngar dang/ thang shing dang/ mnu dang/ li zur ba dang/
186a5(mdo 'grel): ru rta dang/ po? son cha rnams btags pa'i phye ma rtil mar dang/ 'o ma til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skal la/ til mar nye che lus par byas te/ btsags pa las ran par 'jam rtsis mas btang na/ rlung dang 'phrod cing/ byas bel snabs su
186a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba dang/ gzhar 'brum dang/ gzhar na ba dang/ gcin 'gag ba rnams sel to/ /pu tse shel la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang/ rtsa ba bcu sngar bshad ba 'di gnyis las gang yang rung ba dang/ bo son tsha dang/ shing mngar dang/ shu ti dang/ ru rta
186a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ gand+ha pri yang ku dang/ gla sgang dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma/ mkhris pa dang/ rlung gang las gyur pa'i nad kyi skabs dang sbyar te/ mar dang/ til mar gnyis las gang 'os pa zhig dang/ 'o ma chu'i nang du skol te/ mar rim/ til mar nyi tshe yus
186b1(mdo 'grel): bas/ bkru sman drab khoms btang bar bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum na ba la khrag 'dzag par rtogs na khrag lung pa'i nang kyi cho ga bzhin du bya zhing/ thog ma sman dang/ kha zas la sogs pa kha ba'i bag las sbyar zhing zos na /me'i drod bskyed cing nad gzhi chos
186b2(mdo 'grel): par byed do/ /khrag nang kyi gzhang 'brum can la tshos bar byed pa'i sman pu shel tse dang/ ya ri ta dang/ skyed pa'i shun lpags rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa 'am/ yang na bca' sga dang/ tsan dan dang/ rtsa mkhros dang/ bya cher?
186b3(mdo 'grel): rnams skrol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa blud do/ /yang na skoms pa'i nang dang khrag nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ nim+ba'i shun lpags dang/ dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang/ skyer khaN+Da dang/ pod dkar po rnams kyi phye ma/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'bras bskus pa'i khu ba dang
186b4(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba blud do/ /sa mig dang/ utpal dang/ chu shing gi 'bras bu dang/ ti rid dang/ til dang/ tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang gzhang 'brum khrag 'dzag pa sel to/ /yang na khrag nad kyi gzhang 'brum can la/ kha zas pa'i
186b5(mdo 'grel): 'o ma dang ldan par bza' zhing /sman dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ bu ram gyi sbub rnams sbyar ba'am/ yang na slen ma yung ka'i phye ma/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'bras bslus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na pad+ma ze ba sbrang rtsi dang/ mar sar dang
186b6(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'am/ /yod na pad+ma'i ? ro dang sbyar ba zos na/ gzhang 'brum khrag 'dzag pa bde bar 'gyur ro/ /dpyi mo'i lo ma dang/ pa'i khu'i lo ma dang/ na la sham rnams las srad re re dang/ pi pi ling dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba srang gnyis gnyis dang/ dri sna
186b7(mdo 'grel): ? zhes bya ba/ shing rtsa dang/ sug smel dang/ gand+hu pa tra dang/ nA ga ge sar rnams dang/ pu shal tse dang/ 'di rnams las zho gnyis gnyis dang/ bca' sga srang gsum dang/ bu ram sman spyir bsdoms pa'i sum 'gyur dang/ 'di rnams sbyar te ri lur
187a1(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i ming ni/ bal bu'i ri lu zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par zos la/ chad dang/ khu ba cud dang/ sha khu dang/ 'o ma dang/ zho kha chu dang/ rtsa bas rnams la gang yang rung bas nad gzhi gang shas che ba dang sbyar te phul na/?
187a2(mdo 'grel): drod bskyed cing gzhang 'brum thams cad dang/ skyug pa dang/ snying na ba dang/ lung pa dang/ skran dang/ rims rnams sel to/ /cho ga de rnams kyis kyang zhi bar ma gyur na/ sman pa mkhas shing sngon byed pa mthong bas/ nad pa rkang pa dgug cing/
187a3(mdo 'grel): bcing ba la sogs pa ci nas kyang gzhar ltar snang ba'i thabs byas te/ 'brum bu ga la 'dug pa brtag na/ rwa 'am/ lcas kyi sbugs 'jam po/ /ba'i nu sor gyi dbyibs 'dra ba/ kha'i sboms sor bzhi/ srid du song lnga yod par byas la/ glo
187a4(mdo 'grel): logs su bu chen po gsum tsam byas te/ rkub tu brdzangs la/ glo'i bu gud 'brum bu gal yod pa'i thad kar gtad de/ 'brum bu sbubs kyi nad du byung ba la/ rlung dang/ bad kan las gyur pa'i gzhar 'brum zhig yin na/ 'brum bu mtshon
187a5(mdo 'grel): gyis bcad la/ 'gro lcags kyis bsreg go /yang na mi bcad par bsreg go /yang na/ gzhang 'brum rnam pa drug po gang yang rung ste/ 'brum bu gang gi nad du byung ba la/ sman mu ka ka'i thal ba phrad dar sbyar bas bsku par bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum ?
187a6(mdo 'grel): la ni mdor na gang ci yang rung ste/ mi'i stobs bskyed pa dang/ rlung dang 'phrod pa'i sman dang/ kha zas dang/ btung ba gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig las chabs che chung dang sbyar zhing btang bar bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum can gyis ni nad gzhi so so'i 'khrug par 'gyur
187a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i kha zas dang/ stan mkhrad po la 'dug pa dang/ tsog tsog pur 'dug pa dang/ phyis dang/ gci na phro bzhin du ? nags pa dang/ rta la sogs pa zhon pa rnams spang bar bya'o// //da ni mtshan par brdal ba'i bye brag bshad par bya ste/ rkub kha
187b1(mdo 'grel): nas sor gnyis kyi tshu rol gyi glo log su nyam thag par byed pa'i phol mig 'byung ste/ de brdol ba'i ming ni mtshan bar brdol ces bya ste/ de yang rnam pa lnga yod par bshad do/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i phol mig gi ming ni rma kha brgya pa zhes bya ste/ mdog
187b2(mdo 'grel): dmar la mi bzad par zug cing na ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i ming ni/ rnga me mgrin zhes bya ste/ mdog dmar la me 'bar ba bzhin du tsha ba yin par bshad do/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i ming ni/ kun tu 'dzag pa zhes bya ste/ mdog dkar la g.ya'
187b3(mdo 'grel): ba yin par bshad do/ /nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i ming ni/ dur 'khyil ba zhes bya ste/ thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa yin no/ /kha zas zug rdu dang bcas pa zos te/ gcin ni 'od ba'i sbubs su zug pa las gyur pa'i ming ni/ log par song
187b4(mdo 'grel): ba zhes bya ste/ 'di rnams las nang gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ zug rngu zug pa las gyur pa gnyis ni spang bar bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni gso dka' ba yin no/ /de la phol mig dang po byung ste ma smin pa la ni/ de'i nyen 'khor 'am rtsa nas khrag
187b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba dang/ nan rtsis bsku ba dang/ nad bzhi gang las gyur pa dang/ 'phrod pa'i sman skol ba'i khu ba grang dro gang 'os pas/ steng du blugs pa dang/ til mar dang/ nad dang 'phrod pa'i sman sbyar bar bsku zhing mnye ba dang/ bsku sman btang ba'i bar du
187b6(mdo 'grel): tshog rim bzhin du bya'o/ /brdol bar gyur pa'i cho ga yang bshad par bya ste/ dang por brdol ba'i rma zabs ci tsam yod pa dang/ srol gang logs su byung ba/ lcags kyi thur ma 'jam pos brtag pa dang/ rma'i srol gang gyur par dral ba dang/ sman
187b7(mdo 'grel): mu ska? ka la sogs pa'i thal bas gdab ba dang/ bsreg pa la sogs pa go rim bzhin du mthar gyis byas nas/ rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du /nang gzhi gang las gyur pa dang yang sbyar zhing mthun mthun sman bya'o/ /de la rma gis ba'i cho ga ni/ dod ??
188a1(mdo 'grel): yung dang/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ gcin 'dzeg pa'i rma mtshan bar brdol la bskus na/ rma sbyong zhing mi mched par 'gyur ro/ /shing nye rong dang/ te dzo ba ti dang/ danda'i rtsa ba
188a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ btsod dang/ yud dang/ skyer ba dang/ skyer khaN+Da dang/ nim+ba'i lo ma rnams sbyar bas bskus na yang rma 'khyims pa sel to/ /mtshan bar brdol gyi nang la/ ka ra bi ra dang/ yung dang/ danda'i rtsa ba dang/ khang ka'i li dang/ rgyam cha dang/ kru
188a3(mdo 'grel): trug tres dang/ kha lung dang/ arka dang/ dug ma yungs rnam/ skol ba'i khu ba dang/ til mar gyi nang du/ sman de dag nyid kyi phye ma skol la/ til mar nye tshe lus pa btsags pa rma la bskus par bya'o/ /mtshan bar rdol gya nad yod pa'i
188a4(mdo 'grel): mas ni/ rma sos ba'i 'og tu yang lo gcig gi bar du phyugs zhon pa dang/ nyal pa dang/ stobs 'gyed pa dang/ brtsal ba dang/ kha zas lci ba rnams shin tu bsgrims te spang bar bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum dang/ mtshan bar brdol
188a5(mdo 'grel): gsol ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so// //de nas skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ skya rbab kyi nad ni/ kha zas la sogs pa rno ba dang/ skyur ba dang/ lan tshwa dang/ sngon ma goms pa'i kha zas dang nas?
188a6(mdo 'grel): zhag rnams las/ ha cang mang du zos pa las/ skya rbab kyi nang du 'gyur te/ de yang nad gzhi gsum so sor nas gyur pa dang/ kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan
188a7(mdo 'grel): ma mi lus kyi mdog gnag la/ rlun gi mtshan ma dang/ rlung nad kyis bla gnyan rnams dang yang ldan pa yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma ni/ mkhris pa las pa rnams 'byung zhing/ mig dang/ pags pa dang
188b1(mdo 'grel): phyi sa dang/ gcin cams ser ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma ni/ mdog dkar la bad kan las gyur pa'i nad rnams dang ldan pa yin no/ /nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skya rbab kyi mtshan ma ni/ thams cad kyi mtshan ma
188b2(mdo 'grel): dang ldan par shes par bya'o/ /de la skya rbab kyi nad yod la/ khrag zad pa dang/ glo 'grams pa dang/ sha zad pa dang/ skyug pa dang /skam pa la sogs pa'i bla gnyan yod pa dang/ mdog ser zhing snang ngo cog dkar por mthong ba ni/ 'chi bar 'gyur ro/
188b3(mdo 'grel): skya rba bgyi nad thams cad la/ dang por ni sman mar btung bas khong 'jam por byas la/ de'i 'og tu nad gzhi dang sbyar zhing/ gyen du skyug pa dang/ thur du bkru ba'i sman rnon pos sbyar bar bya'o/ /de'i sman mar ni mur ba dang/ pu tse shel dang/ yud dang /byi
188b4(mdo 'grel): tshe? ra? dang/ pi pi ling dang/ tsan dan dang/ skra lo dang/ khyi lce ba dang/ dug mo nyung dang/ rtsa mkhris dang/ ba tol dang/ gla sgang dang/ thang shing rnams kyi gye ma no gnyis gnyis/ mar srad sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol to/
188b5(mdo 'grel): mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las/ ran par 'thungs na/ skya rbab dang/ rims dang/ 'brum bu dang/ skrang ba dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ khrag lud pa'i nad rnams sel to/ /'bras bu gsum dang/ sle tres dang/ bshad ka dang/ bu tse shel dang/ rtsa mkhris dang/
188b6(mdo 'grel): nimpa rnams skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang/ skya rbab kyi nad dang/ mig ser dang can du sel to/ /yang na skya rbab kyi nad yod pa la/ a ru ra dang/ ba gcin dang sbyar ba btung zhing/ kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par bzang bar bya'o/ /yang
188b7(mdo 'grel): na lugs? kyi phye ma ba gcin gyi nang du yun ring du spangs pa bza' zhing 'o mas dbul lo/ /'bras bu gsum dang/ kru trug tres dang/ gla sgang dang/ byi dang ga dang/ tsha ba gsum rnams kyi phye ma dang/ lcags kyi bye ma dang/ sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i
189a1(mdo 'grel): tshad dang mnyam pa dang/ 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar te zos na yang/ skya rbab dang/ mig ser dang/ skrang ba dang/ gcin nad sel to/ /til dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang/ drub mar cad rnams kyi phye
189a2(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ lcags kyi phye ma/ sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa dang/ 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te ma brdzis pa las/ ran par zos na yang/ skya rbab kyi nang drag po dang/ skrangs ba sel to/ /mig ser gyi nad ni/ skya rbab kyi nang yal bar
189a3(mdo 'grel): bor ba las/ mkhris pa 'khrugs nas/ mig ser gyi nang du 'gyur pas na/ de yang skabs 'dir bshad de/ de'i mtshan ma ni/ mig dang lus kyi mdog ser ba yin no/ /mig ser chen po zhes bya ba yang/ mig ser gyi nang las bor bor nas/
189a4(mdo 'grel): tshabs chen por gyur pa las 'byung ste/ de gnyis la ni snum pa'i bkru sman btang ngo/ /ba la dang/ yung dang /nimpa dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ shing mngar rnams cha mnyam ste/ btags la 'o ma dang/ ma he'i mar dang/ skol nas mar nyi tshe
189a5(mdo 'grel): lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mig ser gyi nang sel to/ /sle tres dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ skyer pa dang/ nimpa rnams gang yang rung ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ nad par bzhin rtag tu 'thungs na yang/ mig ser gyi
189a6(mdo 'grel): nad sel to/ /lugs kyi phye ma dang/ yud dang/ skyer pa dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ pu tse shel rnams kyi phye ma/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang sbyar te zos na yang/ mig ser gyi nad sel to/ /skyu ru ra dang/ lcags kyi phye ma dang/ tsha ba gsum
189a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ yud rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang/ kha ra dang sbyar te zos na/ mig ser tshabs chen po yang myur du sel to/ /pi pi ling dang/ pi pi ling chen po dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ kru trug tres dang/ la la phud dang/ na le sha za dang/
189b1(mdo 'grel): rgyam tsha dang/ phyi dang gdang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ 'u su'i 'bras bu dang/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang /go snyod dang/ nu shing gi 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma srang re re dang/ shing nyi rong gi phye ma dang/ til mar srang brgyad brgya dang/ skyu ru ra'i khu bsrang dgu bcu
189b2(mdo 'grel): rtsa drug dang /bu ram srang lnga bcu dang/ 'di rnams lhan cig tu skol ba'i ming ni/ sman gyi lde gu dge ba zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par zos na yang/ skya rbab dang/ mig ser dang /gzhang 'brum dang/ sbyar ba'i dug rnams sel cing/ gcin nang dang/ mdze dang/
189b3(mdo 'grel): rims dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ bo gzhi nang rnams med par byed la/ sman bcud kyi len du yang 'gyur ro/ /mig ser gyis nyam thag pa ni/ sman dron bu shi ba'i khu ba'i mig bzang ngo/ /yang na yud dang btsag dang/ skyu ru ra'i phye ma zhi ba mo sgyur bas
189b4(mdo 'grel): kyang bsku bar bya'o/ /yang sman ka rko ta ka'i rtsa ba'i phye ma 'am/ dza li ni la 'bras bu'i phye ma snar blugs so/ /yang na mig par gyis nyam thag pa la/ ar+Na dang/ pi pi yid gi phye sbyar ba snar blugs so/ /nad ljang gu kha zhes bya ba ni /rlung dang mkhris pa la 'byung ste/
189b5(mdo 'grel): de'i mtshan ma ni/ lus kyi mdog ljang gu khar 'dug pa dang/ sngo sangs dang/ ser ba dang /rims kyis 'debs pa dang /skom dang tshe ba dang /me'i drod chung par byed cing/ sgying lug pa dang/ snyom pa rnams yin te/ skya rbab kyi mang yod pa la 'gyur ro/ /de ni kha
189b6(mdo 'grel): sa? dang/ skom mngar dgu dang/ rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba'i sman rnams kyis thug par 'gyur te/ mig ser dang/ skya rbab kyi nad kyi cho gar bstan pa bzhin du/ nang ldang khu kha 'di la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa rdzogs
189b7(mdo 'grel): ?/ /de nas skyigs bu'i nad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ skyigs bu dang/ dbugS mi bde ba la ni/ rlung mkhris pa'i nang las 'das te/ bad kan gyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa las/ skyigs bu dang/ rlung?
190a1(mdo 'grel): mi bde ba drag po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis re re la yang rnam pa lnga lnga yod do/ /de la skyigs bu'i nang rnam pa lnga ni/ skyigs bu chen po zhes bya ba/ /sgra che zhing shugs drag la/ gnad la gnod pa dang/ skyigs bu'i nad zab mo zhes bya ba/
190a2(mdo 'grel): lte ba'i phyogs nas ljang zhing sgra zab du 'byung ba dang/ skyigs bu'i nad btung ma zhes bya ba/ skyigs bu gnyis gnyis btud cing shugs drag tu 'byung la/ mi bzad par na zhing mgo 'dam par byed pa dang/ skyigs bu chung ngu zhes bya ba shugs dal la/ brang
190a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ nam tshod nas ldang zhing 'byung ba dang/ skyigs bu zas las 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ ha cang mang du zos zhing 'thungs bas rlung gi gnas dog par gyur pa las 'byung ba rnams yin te/ 'di rnams kyi nad na skyigs bu chung ngu dang/ zas las 'byung
190a4(mdo 'grel): ba zhes bya ba gnyis ni gso sla ba yin no/ /lhag ma rnams ni srog gcod par bshad do/ /dbugs mi bde ba rnam pa lnga la/ sgra chen po zhes bya ba/ dbugs che zhing ran pa dang/ snying dang/ lta ba rnams log par bsgyur zhing/ snga ma pa zhes bya
190a5(mdo 'grel): ba gyen du lta zhing/ dbugs drag tu 'byung la/ myos par byed cing/ snying dang/ rtsib log su brug pa dang/ /skabs su la chad pa zhes bya ba/ dbugs skabs skas su 'chang cing /drag tu 'byung ba gang yin pa dang/ rmugs byed ces bya ba/ cham
190a6(mdo 'grel): pa drag pos 'debs shing/ snying myos la/ nam langs pa'i tshi lhag par tshabs tsha bar 'gyur ba dang/ dbugs chung ngu zhes bya ba mi dga' ba las 'byung la/ dal zhing gnod ba mi byed pa rnams yin te/ de dag gi nad na dbugs chung ngu zhes bya
190a7(mdo 'grel): ba ni gso sla ba yin no/ /rmugs byed ces bya ba ni/ kha zas dang/ sman gyis so tsam du 'jog nus so/ /lhag ma rnams ni 'chi bar byed pa yin te spang bar bya'o/ /de la skyigs bu'i nad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis thebs pa la ni/
190b1(mdo 'grel): dang por til mar gyis lus bsku ba dang/ dugs byas na bzang ngo/ /nyam stobs yod pa la ni gyen du skyug pa dang/ thur du bkru bas sbyang bar bya'o/ /ring cing nyam chur ba la ni zhi bar bya ba'i sman bya bar bshad do/ /skyigs gu'i nad gso ba'i cho ga ni/ rgya shug gi
190b2(mdo 'grel): tshig gu dang/ skyer khaN+Da dang/ 'bras yos rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ bu tse shel dang/ btsag lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ skyu ru ra dang /khar dang/ bca' sga rnams lhan cig sbyar ba dang/ nag chur dang/ pog dkar po lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang
190b3(mdo 'grel): shing pa Ta la'i 'bras bu dang/ me tog lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bra gro'i yal ga'i thor to dang lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba rnam pa drug po 'di rnams las gang yang rung ba/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar la sman gyi lde gur byas te zos na/ skyigs
190b4(mdo 'grel): bu'i nad sel to/ /shing mngar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba dang/ pi pi ling khar dang sbyar ba dang/ bca' sga bu ram dang sbyar ba 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba snar blugs na yang skyigs bu'i nad sel to/ /sbrang ma'i rtug pa bud med kyi nu zho 'am/ le brgan rtsi'i
190b5(mdo 'grel): khu ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na tsan dan dkar po bud med kyi nu zho las bdar te/ snar blugs na yang skyigs bu'i nad sel to/ /yang na skyigs bu'i nad zhi bar bya ba la/ ldong ros dang /ba lang gi rwa dang/ ru rta dang/ sra rtsi'i pog dang/ rtswa ku sha
190b6(mdo 'grel): rnams las gang yang rung ba mar dang sbyar te/ snod kha sbyar gyi nang du bsregs la/ 'u'i nad nas dung ba drang shing/ kha snar brdubs na yang skyigs bu'i nad sel to/ /mar bzang po srang gnyis bzhu ste/ chos bar byas la/ rgyam tsha srang gcig dang sbyar ba 'am
190b7(mdo 'grel): yang na nas tshig 'khus ba'i thal ba/ mar bzang po bzhus te chos par byas pa'i nang du btab pa 'thungs na yang skyigs bu'i nad kyis nyam thag ba sel to/ /dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba'i cho ga ni/ byi tsher dang/ pi pi ling dang/ rgun dang/ bu bran?
191a1(mdo 'grel): shing dang/ a ru ra rnams zhib tu btags la/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang sbyar te zos na/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lud pa dang/ rlung nad rmugs byed rnams sel to/ /bu ram dang/ na legs dang/ yung dang rla rna dang/ rgun dang bi pi ling
191a2(mdo 'grel): rnams btags la/ til mar dang sbyar te zos na yang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad drag po sel to/ /yang na sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ shing mngar gyi phye ma sbyar te bza' bar bya'o/ /a ru ra dang/ rtsa mkhris dang/ pi pi ling dang/ byi
191a3(mdo 'grel): char rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar te zos na yang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/ /shing ram b+ha dang/ kunda dang/ shi ri rnams kyi me tog dang /pi pi ling rnams btags la/ 'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang dbugs mi
191a4(mdo 'grel): bde ba'i nad sel to/ /yang na skyigs bu'i nad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad la ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ bca' sga'i phye ma/ chu skol ba dron mo dang sbyar te btud par bya'o/ /yang na bca' sga dang/ kha ra dang ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ kha ru tshwa rnams kyi phye ma chu skol
191a5(mdo 'grel): ba dron po dang sbyar te btud par bya'o/ /yang na shing tsha dang/ sug smel dang/ za la ka dar li zur ba dang/ bca' sga dang/ dzi bandi dang/ manu dang/ dztata dang/ bca' ba dang/ a ga ru dang/ pi pi ling dang/ gla sgang dang/ byi'u rug pa dang/ sbang spos
191a6(mdo 'grel): rnams cha mnyam ste btags pa'i phye ma dang kha ra sman de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i brgyad 'gyur dang sbyar ba'i phye ma'i sman ba ? na/ skyigs bu'i nad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel zhing/ lud pa dang/ rims dang/ snying na ba dang/ rtsib
191a7(mdo 'grel): logs su zug ba rnams med par byed do/ /rma bya'i rkang pa 'am/ sgro'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba bsregs pa'i thal ba/ mar dang/ sgang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na byi thur gyi sha bsregs la/ mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ zos na yang skyigs ?
191b1(mdo 'grel): nad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/ /skyigs bu'i nad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis shin tu nyam thag pa'i skom du ni/ rtsa ba bcu pa skol ba'i khu ba 'am/ thing shing skol ba'i khu ba 'am/ chang rnams las ran par 'thung bar bya'o/ /skyigs bu'i nad dang/
191b2(mdo 'grel): dbugs mi bde ba'i nad yang pa? la/ sman pas tshabs che chung la sogs pa'i bye brag shin tu phyed par bya ste/ bad kan dang rlung sel ba'i/ ba zas dang/ btung ba'i cho ga sbyin par bya'o/ /skyigs bu'i nad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste
191b3(mdo 'grel): bco lnga pa rdzogs so// //de nas lud pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ lud pa ni nad gzhi gsum re re las gyur pa dang/ glo 'grams pa las gyur pa dang/ nad khong skams las gyur pa dang/ rnam pa lnga yod de/ de dag kyang rlung rnam pa
191b4(mdo 'grel): la po/ dbugs rgyu bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang/ dag 'byung bar byed pa dang/ legs par 'jog pa dang/ skyong pa dang/ dri ma 'byin pa zhes bya ba rnams 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/ snying ga dang/ brang dang /phrag ba dang/ lkog ma la sogs pa nad 'dru zhing/ rko
191b5(mdo 'grel): ba ni lud pa zhes bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur ba'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ snying na ba dang/ klad pa na ba dang /rtsib logs su zug pa dang/ lud pa skam zhing 'gogs su mi btub pa dang/ skad 'gags pa rnams yin par bshad do/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
191b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma ni/ skom dang che ba dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ /bar tsha bro ba dang/ skyugs pa'i ro tsha zhing mdog ser la/ tsha ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i lung pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lus lci zhing mchi lam mang du 'ong ba dang/ cham pas 'debs shing yi
191b7(mdo 'grel): ga la chus ba rnams yin no/ /glo 'grams pa las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lud pa khrag tu 'ong ba dang/ du shing na ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ glo las rnag 'byung ba rnams yin no/ /nad khong skom las gyur pa'i lud pa'i mtshan ma ni/
192a1(mdo 'grel): khud pa khrag dang/ rnag tu 'byung zhing/ nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las byung ba yin no/ /de rnams kyi nad na glo 'grams ba las gyur pa'i lud pa ni kha zas dang/ sman la sogs pas so tsam du 'jog nus so/ /nad khong skems
192a2(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i lud pa ni mi 'tsho'o/ /lhag ma gsum po rnams ni gsor rung ngo/ /de la gso ba'i chog ni/ bca' sga dang/ byi tsher dang/ bu bran shing dang/ rgun dang li zur pa dang/ khar rnams btags pa'i phye ma/ til mar dang sbyar te zos na/
192a3(mdo 'grel): rlung las gyur pa'i lung pa mi bzad pa sel to/ /li zur ba dang/ bu bran shing dang/ pi pi ling dang/ ga bra'i rtsa ba dang/ gla sgang dang/ byi tshar rnams kyi phye ma/ bu ram dang/ til mar dang/ sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu 'di'i ming ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ste/ rlung
192a4(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i lud pa sel to/ /kon ti dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ tshab gsum dang/ byi dang gdang/ ru rta dang/ shing kun rnams kyi phye ma mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu 'di ni lud pa'i nad dang/ skyigs bu'i nad la bsngags pa yin no/ /mkhris pa
192a5(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i lud pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ pi pi ling dang/ khar dang/ smyig rkang dang/ 'bras yos dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ rgun rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ shing mngar dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ murba dang/ rgun dang/ bca' sga rnams kyi phye
192a6(mdo 'grel): ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ bra go dang/ smyig rkang dang/ gzem rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar la/ sman gyi lde gur bya ste bza' bar bya'o/ /bad kan las

192b6(mdo 'grel): mar srang brgyad dang/ til mar srang brgyad dang/ pi pi ling gi phye ma srang brgyad dang/ lhan cig tu me mi tshe bar yang snyol te/ nu nur bo skya bas drang du rung ba tsam du gyur ba phyung ste bsgrangs pa'i nang du/ sbyar rtsi srang brgyad blugs te/ sbyar ba'i sman
192b7(mdo 'grel): bcud kyi len 'di las nang ra bzhin a ru ra 'bru gnyis gnyis/ sman gyi lde gu dang bcas te zos na ba lung ba la nad thams cad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad dang/ nad khong skems rnams sel cing/ pha ba'i nad dang yig 'chus ba dang/ skyigs bu'i

193a3(mdo 'grel): ram dang 'o ma sbyar ba 'thungs te/ thabs de ltar zhag gsum gyi bar du byas na yang lud pa'i nad thams cad sel to/ /lud pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// //de nas skyug pa'i nad dang skom pa'i nad gso ba bshad
193a4(mdo 'grel): par bya ste/ de la skyug pa'i nad ni nad gzhi gsum 'khrugs pa re re las gyur pa dang/ gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ mi sdug cing yid du mi 'ong ba dang/ rul zhing myags pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang reg pa dang/ bsnam pa dang gtam
193a5(mdo 'grel): thos pa dang/ bsams pa rnams las gyur pa dang/ rnam pa lnga yod de/ de dag gi mtshan ma bstan par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skyugs pa'i ro ska zhing dang la mdog gnag pa dang/ dbu ba can dang/ shugs drag
193a6(mdo 'grel): cing na ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skyugs pa tsha zhing ser ba dang/ dmar ba dang ljang gur 'dug la/ lus tsha ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skyugs pa 'byil zhing ro mngar la grang zhing ska
193a7(mdo 'grel): ba rnams yin no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan par shes par bya'o/ /mi sdug cing yid du mi 'ong ba las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ dul ba dang/ mi sdug pa dang/ sems gdungs pa la sogs pa/ thog ma
193b1(mdo 'grel): bskyed pa'i rgyur smos pa de dag nyid las rtogs par bya'o/ /de la skyugs pa khrag dang bcas par 'byung zhing /zhag tshig tshig po yod la sha zad de nyam chung ba dang/ nad bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang thebs pa ni mi 'tsho ste/ spang bar bya'o/ /skyug nad thams
193b2(mdo 'grel): cad ni ma zhu ba'i gnas pho ba las 'byung bas na/ rlung las gyur pa'i skyugs pa ma gtogs par dang por smyung ba'i cho ga byas la des ma zhi na phyis bkru sman btang ngo/ /rlung las gyur pa la ni dang por de dang 'phrod pa'i sman gyis zhi bar bya'o/ /de la bkru
193b3(mdo 'grel): sman ni a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te lde gur byas pa'am/ yang na bkru sman zhim zhing yi gar 'ong ba gzhon yang btang bar bya'o/ /nyam stobs yod pa la ni/ skyug sman dang/ bkru sman bya'o/ /ring cang nyam chung ba la ni/ zhi bar bya ba'i sman btang
193b4(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga ni/ rgyam tshwa dang/ mar sbyar ba btung ba 'am/ yang na rgyam tshwa dang/ kha ru tshwa dang/ tsabs ru tsha ba dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o//
193b5(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i nad zhi bar bya ba la ni/ ba la dang/ btsag gi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'am/ pu shel tse'i phye ma 'bras bsgrus pa'i phyi ma dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na pu shel tse'i phye/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba grang mo dang sbyar
193b6(mdo 'grel): te btud par bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i skyug pa'i nang yod pa la ni/ phyi dang ga dang /'bras bu gsum dang/ nim+ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na byi dang ga dang gla ba dang/ bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te bza' bar
193b7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /shi ra phe la dang /sla tres dang/ murba rnams las gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na murba'i phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ rlung las gyur pa dang/ bad kan las
194a1(mdo 'grel): gyur ba dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams kyi skyug pa'i nad sel to/ /pi pi ling dang/ na le sham dang/ ldod ros rnams kyi phye ma dang/ de rnams spyir bsdoms pa'i tshed dang mnyam pa'i 'bras yos kyi phye ma dang/ sbrang
194a2(mdo 'grel): rtsi rnams ka bit+tha'i 'bras bu dang/ kha lung gi 'bras bu skol ba'i khu ba grang mo'i nang du blugs te 'thungs na yang/ skyug pa'i nad sel to/ /rgya shug gi tshig gu dang/ pi pi ling dang/ skyu ru ra rnams kyi phye ma dang/ lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ 'bras yos
194a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ bca' sgra rnams kyi phyi ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ rtsa sh+yam ka dang/ skyer khaN+Da dang/ gla sgang dang/ rgya shug gi rus pa rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sbrang ma'i rtug pa dang/ kha ra dang/ pi pi ling rnams
194a4(mdo 'grel): kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ na le sham dang/ ka pit+tha dang/ bal rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ shing tsha dang/ sug smel dang/ gand+ha pa tra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba rnams pa drug po 'di
194a5(mdo 'grel): rnams las gang yang rung ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ sman gyi lde gur byas pa zos na yang skyug pa'i nad sel to/ /skyug pa'i nad ring du lon ba la ni/ dge ba zhes bya ba'i sman mar dang/ 'o ma'i sman dang ro tsa bar byed pa'i smar dang/ sha'i khu bcu ba la
194a6(mdo 'grel): sogs pa rlung sel pa'i cho ga rnams bya'o/ /skom pa'i nad kyang/ nad gzhi gsum so so las gyur pa dang/ zas ma zhu ba las gyur ba dang/ glo 'grams ma nang? khong skem du gyur pa las 'byung ba dang/ rnam pa lnga yod de skom pa'i nang do cog
194a7(mdo 'grel): gi gzhi ni/ shas tsher rlung dang/ mkhris pa gnyis yin pas na/ skom pa'i nang la thog mar de gnyis bsal ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la skem pa'i nang yod pa'i skom du ni/ sbrang rtsi char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba 'am/ de ma rnyed na chu tha mal ba dang sbyar
194b1(mdo 'grel): ba btung bar bya'o/ /yang na bong ba bsregs pa chur bcug ba'i khu ba 'bras brdos pa'i phye dang/ sbrang rtsi khar dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/ /yang na kha ra dang/ nA ga ge sa dang/ pi pi ling dang/ tha be dang /bal po se'u rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde
194b2(mdo 'grel): bu 'am pi pi ling dang/ shing 'o ma can gyi myu gu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde dgu gang yang rung ba la zos na yang skom pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na shing ba ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang/ ru rta dang/ 'bras brdos pa'i phye dang/ utpal sngon po dang/
194b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu gsum rnams kyi bye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i ri lu khar bzhag na yang skom pa'i nad myur du sel to/ /rgun dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ 'o ma dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams kyi nad du shing mngar dang/ utpala'i phye ma blugs te 'thungs na yang skom pa'i
194b4(mdo 'grel): nang gdon mi za bar byed do/ /'o ma dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ rgun chad dang/ bu ram chad dang/ bu ram chab dang/ sbrang chab dang/ star bu'i khu ba dang/ rtsa bas skyur po rnams gang yang rung ba/ khar yun ring du bzhag cing/ phyir phon yang rkan
194b5(mdo 'grel): skams pa sel bar byed do/ /skyug pa'i nang dang/ skom pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //bam po lnga pa'o/ /de nas gcin sri ba'i nad gso ba'i le ru bshad par bya'o// //gcin srib la sogs pa'i nad ni/ kha zas la sogs
194b6(mdo 'grel): ba shin tu rno bza? zhing 'thung ba dang/ shin tu mang bar za zhing 'thungs pa'i gnod ba las gcin sri ba'i nad rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur te/ de las rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba'i nad ni shin tu mi bzad par na ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur
194b7(mdo 'grel): pa ni gcin nyid tsha rab tu 'ong ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur ba ni chu so'i? phyogs lci ba bem por 'dug cing skrang ba yin no/ /nad gzhi kun 'drus pa las gyur ba ni ma rungs ba yin no/ /khrag nad las gyur ba ni gcin khrag tu 'od ba yin no//
195a1(mdo 'grel): khu chu las gyur pa ni khu chu 'gags pa las 'byung ba yin no/ /gcin rde'us 'gags pa ni rlung gis khu chu dang bad kan bsgongs nas rdo 'dra bar gyur pa yin no/ /gcin bstus pa ni chu so lgang pa'i kha mi bzad par na zhing rde 'u ?
195a2(mdo 'grel): zhig pas gcin 'gags par gyur pa yin par bshad do/ /de dag gso ba'i thabs ni sman mar dang/ til mar gyis lus bsku ba dang/ sman mar btung ba dang/ dugs bya ba dang/ bkru sman drag po mas btang zhing/ de'i rjes la 'jam rtsi
195a3(mdo 'grel): mas btang ba rnams bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri ba la ni/ rtsa ku shal sogs pa'i sde tshan nam/ sman ti ri la sogs pa'i sde tshan gang yang rung ba skol ba'i khu bas bcos pa'i sha khu dang ldan par kha zas bza' o/ /mkhris pa dang
195a4(mdo 'grel): khrag nad las gyur pa la ni/ skyu ru ra skol ba'i khu ba'i nad du skyed pa'i rtsa ba'i phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi blugs pa'am/ yang na el ba lu ka'i sa bon dang/ shing mngar dang/ skyer pa rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba'i nang du btab pa btung
195a5(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i gcin sri bzhi bar bya ba la ni/ sug smel zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma/ ba gcin dang/ chang dang/ chu shing gi khu ba btsir ba rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /khra chu
195a6(mdo 'grel): 'gags pa las gcin sri bar gyur ba la ni/ brag zhun sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i sman gyi lde gu bza' bar bya'o/ /yang na ro tsa bar bya ba'i sman gyis lus gzungs bdun brtas la/ na chung bzod me dang nyal po bya'o/ /gcin sri
195a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i nang rnams la/ le brgan rtsa'i sa bon btags pa'i phye na/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na brag zhun dang/ sru sru dang/ pi pi ling dang/ sug smel rnams kyi phye ma/ sbrang rtsi dang/
195b1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /rgun dang/ kha ra'i phye ma zho kha chu dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na 'o ma skol ba'i dron mo bu ram dang sbyar ba las ji tsam nus pa 'thungs na yang gcin sri ba'i nad sel to/ /kha ra dang/ nas tshig/
195b2(mdo 'grel): 'khus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar te zos na yang gcin sri ba'i sna grangs thams cad sel to/ /shi bu'i rtsa bskol ba'i khu ba'am/ yang na sman ro tsha zhing drong che ba'i bag gang ci yang rung ba zos shing 'thungs na rde'us 'gags pa sel bar byed do//
195b3(mdo 'grel): gze ma dang/ e raN+Da dang/ ha re nu ka dang/ sug smel dang/ shing mngar dang/ pi pi ling dang/ sru sru'i rtsa ba rnams skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ brag zhun gyi phye ma btab ste/ 'thungs na yang/ gcin bstus pa dang/ rde'us 'gags
195b4(mdo 'grel): pa myur du sel te/ /sman ka ta bang ka'i rtsa ba btags pa'i phye ma char la sogs pa dang sbyar te/ 'thungs na yang rde'us 'gags pa sel to/ /sman pa ru na'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags skol ba'i khu ba btsags pa'i nad du/ de nyid kyi phye ma
195b5(mdo 'grel): btab ste sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na bca' sga dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ a ru ra dang /ka li ya ga rnams kyi phye ma/ zhi kha chu dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang rde'us 'gags pa nang shin tu drag po yang myur du sel
195b6(mdo 'grel): to/ yang na sman bi ra tar? la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i thabs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyang sbyar bar bya'o/ /cho ga de dag gis kyang zhi bar ma gyur na/ so shi brdo bar dam bcas la /rde'u 'byin pa shes pas dral te
195b7(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar bya'o/ /da ni pho mchan gyi nad bshad par bya ste/ pho mtshan gyi nad ni/ sen mos bsnad pa dang/ rmos? zin pa dang/ drag shul las rma byung ba dang/ bud med mi gtsang ba dang nyal ba la sogs pa/ nad ?
196a1(mdo 'grel): rnams las 'byung ngo/ /de yang rnam ba lnga yod par bshad do/ /rlung las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad ni/ pags pa 'gags shing na la/ ye bgrang ba dang/ mdog sngo skyar 'dug cing rtsub ba
196a2(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba ni tsha zhing mdog dmar ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur ba la ni g.ya' zhing ma brang ba yin no/ /khrag nad las gyur pa la ni khrag 'dzag cing 'brum bu nag po 'byung la/ shin tu tsha ba yin no/
196a3(mdo 'grel): nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur ba ni/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan par yin no/ /de rnams kyi nad na srin bu zhugs pa ni pho mtshan zhig par 'gyur ro/ /'di rnams la thog mar ni pho mtshan mar gyis bsku zhing
196a4(mdo 'grel): dugs byas la/ pho mtshan gyi rked du gtar ka bya'o/ /yang na srin bu pad+ma 'jib tu gzhug pa dang/ yang skyug pa dang/ thur du bkru ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad la ni/ bra buN+Da'i ka dang/ shing
196a5(mdo 'grel): mngar dang/ sgron shing dang/ a ga ru dang/ thang shing dang/ ra sna dang/ ru rta dang/ sman bri shtsi ba rnams lhan cig tu bdar te bsku ba dang/ skol pa'i khu ba dron mos blug par bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba'i
196a6(mdo 'grel): pho mtshan gyi nad la ni/ skyer khaN+Da dang/ utpal dang/ bcod dang/ pu shel tso dang/ btsag dang/ shing mdang dang/ shug pa rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar bas bsku'o/ /yang na 'o ma dang/ nu grang mo rnams gang yang
196a7(mdo 'grel): rung bas steng du blugs so/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i pho mtshan gyi nad la ni/ shing d+ha ba dang/ thar mas dang/ shing sa la rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu
