196b1(mdo 'grel): bas blug na bzang ngo/ /pho mtshan la rna gzhugs na/ pho mtshan zad par byed pas na/ ci nas kyang rnag tu mi 'gyur bar sman gyis bsku ba dang/ sman gyi khu ba la sogs pas steng du blugs pa rnams kyis bsgrims te bsrung bar
196b2(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /rnag 'jug pa lta na gtar ka myur te byas la/ rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du byas te/ me tog ku mu da dang/ utpa la dang/ ka la lha ra dang/ pad+ma rnams kyi phye mas gdab bo/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum mar dang lhan cig tu
196b3(mdo 'grel): snod kha sbyar gyi nad du brdos pa'i tshigs mas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na skyer khaN+Da dang/ shi ri sha'i phye ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ a ru ra'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba/ gang yang rung bas bskus na pho mtshan gyi nang thams cad sel
196b4(mdo 'grel): to/ /pho mtshan gyi nad 'dus pa las gyur po dang/ khrag nang las gyur pa gnyis ni so zhi brdo bar dam bcas la/ nad gzhi rnams kyi shas che chung bye brag phyed par byas nas/ gang shas che ba dag gzhil ba'i cho ga ba'o/ /da
196b5(mdo 'grel): ni rlig blugs kyi nang bshad par bya ste/ rlig rlugs kyi nad ni gzhi gsum gyis rlig pa'i 'bras bu dang/ pags pa ma rung bar byas pa las/ rlig rlugs kyi nad rnam pa bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs
196b6(mdo 'grel): kyi nad ni/ rlig pa lgang ba rlung gis gang ba 'dra ba yin to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa ni/ u duM ba ra'i shing thog 'dra bar dmar ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni mkhrad zhing zlum ba yin no/ /khrag nad las gyur pa ni mkhris pa'i
196b7(mdo 'grel): mtshan yang de 'dra'o/ /tshil rgyas pa'i nang du gyur ba ni che ma 'jam mo/ /gcin las gyur pa gdab bzhin du 'dug pa yin no/ /rgyu ma rlugs pa las gyur ba ni/ rlung gis rlig pa'i 'dab du rgyu ma'i ltab ma mthar gyis
197a1(mdo 'grel): phul nas rlig pa rkyal pa bus pa bzhin du ring por 'gyur ba yin te/ rlig rlugs kyi nang de ni mi 'tsho'i/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nang la ni/ sman mang btung zhing bsku ba dang/ dugs
197a2(mdo 'grel): kyis bdug pa dang/ sman gyi khu bas blugs pa dang/ snum pa'i bkru sman btang ba dang/ bkru sman drag bo mas btang ba dang/ 'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams bya bar bshad do/ /de la snum gyi bkru sman ni/ 'o ma dad?/
197a3(mdo 'grel): e raN+Da'i mar skol te sbyar ba nyam stobs las dpags te btung bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa dang/ khrag nad las gyur pa la ni/ srin bu pad pa rlig pa las khrag 'jib tu gzhug pa dang/ sman pa sil bas bsku zhing/ sman
197a4(mdo 'grel): gyi khu ba gud mos steng du blugs na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bad kan las gyur pa la ni/ sman drong che ba btags pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba srin pos bsku zhing skyer pa'i rtsa ba skol ba'i khu ba gcin dang sbyar ba btung baM ra
197a5(mdo 'grel): bya'o// tshil rgyas ba las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs kyi nad la ni/ dugs bya ba dang/ byi'u dug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan bzhi tu btags te chu dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /gcin las gyur ba la ni/ dang por rlig pa dugs
197a6(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i rjes la rlig pa'i 'og gi srubs nas brtol te re zhig rna rtsi mi sbyar bar gce 'us bsu zhing ring du 'dzag tu gzhug go/ rgyu ma rlugs pa las gyur pa'i rlig rlugs da dung tshabs chen por gyur pa la ni/ bsreg pa
197a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ rlung sel ba'i sman rnams bya'o/ /bsreg gcig la ni bsregs pa'i 'og tu rna la cho ga ji ltar bya ba bzhin du bya'o/ /gcin sri pa'i nad sel ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //de nas su chag skam
197b1(mdo 'grel): gyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rtug skam gyi nad ni/ dri ma 'byin ba zhes bya ba'i rlung lod ka na gnas pa 'khrugs te shes che bar gyur pas phyi sa bskams nas thur du 'ong ba'i lam 'gags te gyen du 'khyil bar gyur ba ni rtug
197b2(mdo 'grel): skam gyi nad bskyed par bshad do/ /de'i mtshan ma ni snying dang mkhal sked dang/ rtsib logs na ba dang/ lgang pa chu so skrang ba dang/ lto sbo ba dang/ skad 'gag cing/ lkog nad lha 'or du 'gyur ba dang/ rims kyis 'debs shing
197b3(mdo 'grel): skyug pa dang/ mig ldongs shing 'on bar 'gyur ba dang/ skom pa'i nad la sogs pa nad kyi sna grangs 'di rnams skye bar 'gyur te/ /rtug skam gyi nang yod pa la ni dang por lus skam gyis bsku zhing dril ba dang/ dugs byas la sman gyi reng
197b4(mdo 'grel): bus gzhug pa dang/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang/ sman mar btung ba dang/ 'jam rtsims btang ba dang/ bkru sman btang ba'i las rnams bya'o/ /de la sman reng bu mas btang ba'i cho ga ni po son cha dang/ khyim gyi du ba dang/
197b5(mdo 'grel): tsa bas ru che dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ bu ram rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin gyi nang du/ khaN+Da tshos pa tsam du skol te reng bu mthe bo tsam du bas nas mar gyis bskus te mas btang na phyi sa 'byung bar 'gyur la lto sbo zhid na ba yang sel to/ /yang
197b6(mdo 'grel): na khyim gyi du ba dang/ pi pi ling dang/ po son cha dang/ yungs kar dang/ bu ram rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin gyi nang du khaN+Da tshos pas tsam skol te snga ma bzhin du reng bur byas pa yang bzang ngo/ /yang na shing kun dang/ shu dag dang/
197b7(mdo 'grel): ru rtas dang/ swa rtsi ka'i thal ba dang/ tsobs ru tsha rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du dang po'i cha gnyis kyis bskyed de btags la tshu skol ba dron bo dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang lto sbo ba dang/ zug cing na ba dang/ snying nab dang/ skran rnams
198a1(mdo 'grel): sel to/ /shing nye rong cha gnyis dang/ pi pi ling cha bzhi dang/ a ru ra cha lnga rnams btags te de rnams sbyar ba bsdoms pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i bu ram gyi nang du khaN+Da tshos pa tsam du skol la ril lur
198a2(mdo 'grel): byas ba de ni phyi sa 'gags pa'i nad sel par byed do/ /kha zas su ni nas rjen pa khram khrom du btags pa'i chan 'o ma 'am sha khu dang ldan pa 'am/ gzhan yang gang de dang 'phrod pa'i kha zas rnams bza' bar bya'o/ /da lta
198a3(mdo 'grel): rlung gi g.yos phyis 'gags par 'gyur ba las mkhris pa dang bad kan bla gnyan du gyur pa la ni de gnyis la phan pa'i sman mas btang ba rnam gnyis bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'i phyis 'gag pa'i nang na chu sor zug par byed do/
198a4(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa las gyur pa ni lte ba'i phyogs tsha ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni snying na ba dang/ dang ka mer mer po dang/ kha nas chu 'byung bar byed do/ /nad bzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad
198a5(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa yin te spang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i phyis 'gag pa'i nad la ni/ la la phud dang/ shing kun dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ kha ru tshwa dang/ a ru ra rnams kyi phye mchang zhim po
198a6(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar te 'thungs na sel bar byed do/ /yang na kha ru tshwa dang shu dag dang/ go snyod dang/ na le sham rnams yas kyi rim bzhin du/ snga ma snga ma las nyis 'gyur du bskyed de btags pa'i phye ma kha lud gi khu ba dang sbyar te
198a7(mdo 'grel): brdzis pa'i ril bu zos na yang rlung las gyur ba'i phyis 'gag pa'i nad sel to/ /yang na rlung las gyur pa'i phyis 'gag pa'i nad la/ tshwa dang star bu dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ la la phud dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ kha ru tshwa
198b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ tsabs ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma/ kha lung gi khung dang sbyar te ri lur byas pa bza' bar bya'o/ /ldum bu se yab dang/ a ru ra dang/ shing kun dang/ ma nu dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ kha ru tsha dang/ tsabs ru tsha rnams kyi phye ma nas btsos pa'i khu ba dang
198b2(mdo 'grel): sbyar te 'thungs na yang rlung las gyur pa'i phyis 'gag pa dang skran dang/ rlung nad/ rmugs byed rnams sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i phyis 'gags pa'i nad la ni/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang/ bi da ri'i khu ba dang/ khyi lce ba'i/ bu
198b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ rgun gyi khu ba rnams las gang yang rung ba kha ra dang sbyar te 'thungs na de ma thag tu sel to/ /yang na skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i 'bras brngos pa'i phye ma dang/ khar sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba btung ngo/ /bad kan
198b4(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i phyis 'gags pa'i nad la ni/ shu dag dang/ gla sgang dang/ kru trug tres dang/ a ru ra dang/ pu tse shel rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na bilba la sogs pa'i sde tshan skol ba'i khu ba dron mo nas
198b5(mdo 'grel): tshig 'khrus pa'i thal ba dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o// //da ni snying na ba'i bye brag bshad par bya ste/ snying na bal ni/ rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi gsum so so las gyur pa dang/ kun 'dus pa las nad du gyur pa dang
198b6(mdo 'grel): srin bu'i nyes pa las gyur pa dang/ rnam pa lnga yod de/ thams cad kyang zug cing na ba yin no/ /bye brag tu na srin bu las gyur pa ni/ snying g.ya' zhing na/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/ tsang shu bsres pa'i nad du/
198b7(mdo 'grel): til mar dang/ rgyam tsha blugs te btung par bya'o/ /yang na til mar skol ba bag cin dang sbyar te 'thungs na/ spran dang/ zug cing na ba dang/ lto sbo ba yang sel to/ /yang na a ru ra'i 'brum bu lnga bcu'i phye ma dang/ kha ru
199a1(mdo 'grel): tsha srang gnyis/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las ngan par 'thungs na snying na ba dang dbugs mi bde ba dang/ sban? rnams sel to//
199a2(mdo 'grel): bca' sga dang/ kha ru tsha dang/ shing kun dang bal po se'u dang/ star bu rnams kyi phye ma chu skol ba dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang dbugs mi bde ba dang/ snying na ba sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba'i snying na ba la ni/ sman
199a3(mdo 'grel): bsil ba'i khu ba la sogs pas lus pa blugs pa dang/ sman bsil ba'i lde gus bsku ba dang/ sman mngar nag gi bkru sman btang ngo/ /yang na bu tso shel gyi phye ma'am/ shing mngar gyi phye ma gang yang rung ba kha ra chu dang sbyar
199a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i nang du blugs te btung ngo/ /sman stir la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phyi ma/ mar dang/ chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang/ 'o ma dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ rgun gyi khu ba gsum las gang yang rung ba mar gyi tshad dang
199a5(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa'i nang du skol te/ mar nya tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i snying na bsal to/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/ pi pi ling dang/ li zur ba dang/ shu dag dang/ ra sna dang/
199a6(mdo 'grel): bcang? sga dang/ a ru ra dang/ ma mu rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin bsros pa dang/ sbyar ba btung dam/ yang na sman de dag nyid ba gcin dang sgol te bzhi cha lus pa btung bar bya'o/ /nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i snying na ba ?
199a7(mdo 'grel): ni/ thog mar ? pa'i cho ga byas la de'i 'og tu nyam stobs dang sbyar zhing/ rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan gang shes che ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /srin bu las gyur pa'i snying na ba la ni/ byi dang ga dang/ ru rta'i phye ma ba gcin dang
199b1(mdo 'grel): sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /rtug? skam gso ba'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu ba rdzogs so// //de nas smyo byed dang/ brjed byed kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la smyo byed kyi nang ni gzhan gyis ngan du byas ba dang/ /ba zas
199b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ skom mi gtsang bzos shing/ 'thungs pa dang/ 'jigs shing sdangs pa dang/ mya ngan gyis gdungs nas/ yid dang/ blo dang/ dran pa log cing 'khrug pa yin no/ /de yang rnam pa lnga yod par bshad de/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i
199b3(mdo 'grel): smyo byed kyi mtshan ma ni/ rang nyid la tsham rngam bya cing rdeg pa dang/ du ba dang/ rgod pa dang/ glu len pa rnams yin par shes par bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ khro ba dang/ bsal ba 'dod pa dang/ sdigs pa dang/ snyings pa
199b4(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa rnams yin no/ /gang kan las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ gnyid che ba dang/ smra ba nyung pa dang/ 'ung med la dga' zhing steg pa dang/ kha zas mi 'dod pa rnams yin no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur ba ni mtshan ma thams cad dang
199b5(mdo 'grel): ldan te/ mar? nges pa yin gyis spang bar bya'o/ /glo bur las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni/ lha la sogs pa'i gdon 'khrugs pas ngan du byas pa las gyur pa yin te/ mi ma yin pa'i shes pa dang/ shes nyen dang/ stobs dang/ tshig dang/ dpa' bal
199b6(mdo 'grel): sogs pa dang ldan par shes par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi nang la ni/ thog mar sman mar btung bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba la ni/ thog mar bkru sman btang ngo/ /bad kan las gyur pa la ni thog mar sgyug sman btang
199b7(mdo 'grel): do/ ? /de ltar so so'i cho ga sngar ba ba rnams byas pa'i 'og tu 'jam rtsims btang ba dang/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rim bzhin bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu yung dang/ skyer ba dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ shing nye rang dang//
200a1(mdo 'grel): bu dag dang/ yungs kar dang/ shing kun dang/ shi ri sha dang/ kaT b+hi dang/ shwe ta dang/ bco da dang/ tshar gsum dang/ thang shing dang/ ka rany+dza rnams kyi phye ma mar dang ba gcin gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe
200a2(mdo 'grel): lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na smyo byed kyi nad sel to/ /yang na sman da dag nyid kyi phye ma mar dang ra gcin gyi nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni/ sman gnod sel ces bya ste/ 'di zos na brjed byed
200a3(mdo 'grel): kyi nad dang/ dug sel bar byed do/ /sman pa tha dang/ a ru ra dang/ shig gru dang/ shu dag dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma srang re re dang/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis ra'i 'o ma'i nang du skol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa
200a4(mdo 'grel): btsags pa'i ming ni lce bde bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par zos na/ dran pa gsal ba dang/ yid gzhungs par 'gyur zhing 'on pa dang/ d?ig pa dang/ lkug pa rnams kyang de'i mthus sel bar byed do/ /yang na shing mngar dang/
200a5(mdo 'grel): shing kun dang/ shu dag dang/ rgya spos dang/ shar shi dang/ spog skya dang/ ru rta rnams ra gcig gyi nang du bdar te btsags pa'i khu ba snar blugs shing/ mig tu bsku bar bya'o// //smyo byed kyis thebs pha la/ thog mar ni//
200a6(mdo 'grel): bcing ba dang/ theg pa dang/ gar yang mi btang bar bsrung zhing/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsdigs la de'i 'og tu tshig 'jam pos gzham par bya'o/ /glo bur las gyur pa'i smyo byed kyi nad kyis thebs pa la ni/ sman pa gtsang zhing re ba mang
200a7(mdo 'grel): pas mchod pa dang/ gtor ma dang/ bshos dang/ mchod sbyin dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ sngags dang/ mig tu bslu ba dang/ snar blugs pa la sogs pas cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bsal bar bya'o// //da ni brjed byed kyi bye brag bshad par bya
200b1(mdo 'grel): ste/ brjed byed ni/ mun pa 'dra bas sems non nas nad gzhi shas cher ba khrugs pa las dran ba nyams shing khro bar gyur ba la brjed byed kyi nad ces bya'o/ /de yang rnam pa bzhi ste ma rungs pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur ba dang/
200b2(mdo 'grel): na mkhris ba las gyur ba dang/ bad kan las gyur ba rnams kyi mtshan ma na/ mdog gnag pa dang/ ser ba dang/ dkar ba rnams yin te go rim bzhin du sbyar ba dang/ ni mthong ngo cog kyang de dag so so'i rnam pa mthong ba yin no//
200b3(mdo 'grel): de gzhi gsum car 'dus pa las gyur ba'i brjed byed kyi nad ni/ mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ gso dka' ba yin de dag la thog mar ni bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang/ 'jam rtsims btang ba dang/ skyug sman btang ba dang/
200b4(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang ba dang/ smin snar blugs pa dang/ cho ga rnam pa lnga po 'di rnams nad gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du btang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa la ni bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang/ 'jam rtsims btang bar bya'o/ /mkhris
200b5(mdo 'grel): pa las gyur pa la ni bkra sman btang ngo/ /bad kan las gyur pa la ni skyug sman btang ngo/ /sman snar blugs pa ni so so'i sman las sbyar na kun la yang phan no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni/ gang shas che ba dang yang sbyar zhing
200b6(mdo 'grel): chos de rnams las gang 'os ? ba btang bar bya'o/ /cho ga de dag gis lus rab tu dag par gyur nas/ de'i 'og tu ni smyo byed kyi nad bsal ba'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na sman shad ka pu shi ba dang/ shu dag dang/ ru ?
200b7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi phye ma sman bram ? khu ba dang/ mar rnying pa lo du ma lon pa'i nang du skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ci ran par 'thungs na brjed byed dang/ smyo byed can sel zhing yid gzhungs par byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /mar dang til?
201a1(mdo 'grel): mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang/ 'o ma mar gyi bcu drug ni nang du 'tsho byed ces bya ba'i sman sna bcu lngar bshad ba rnams kyi phye ma srad re re skol la mar dang til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ra na bar 'thungs
201a2(mdo 'grel): na yang brjed byed kyi nang sel to/ /shing kru dang/ ru rta dang/ ldong ros dang/ go snyong? dang/ slog skya dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ shing kun rnams kyi phye mar gcin dang/ til mar gyi nang du skol ba'i mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te snar blugs
201a3(mdo 'grel): na yang brded byed kyi nad sel to/ /smyo byed kyi nang dang/ ba rjed byed kyi nang la/ chu dang/ me dang/ shing dang/ brag la sogs pa gnas ngan pa rnams ni spang bar bya'o/ /sems gsal zhing yid gzhungs par 'gyur ba'i sman bcud kyis
201a4(mdo 'grel): len ni bsgrims te rtag tu bza' bar bya'o/ smyo byed kyi dang/ brjed byed kyi nang gso ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu pa rdzogs so// //de nas rlung nang gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung nang rnam pa brgyad cu ni/ rlung 'khrugs pa las
201a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ste/ de rnams spyi'i mtshan ma ni na ba dang/ yan lag chag pa snyam byed pa dang/ zug pa dang/ yan lag 'khums ba dang/ sha skam pa dang/ drag tu btsir ba 'dra bar na ba rnams yin no/ /de la rlung nad dam po zhes bya ba ni rang
201a6(mdo 'grel): pa'ang med par lus 'gul ba yin no/ /rlung nang sbur bo gzhu 'khums bzhin du 'bug pa'o/ /rlung nad gzhogs phyed na bzhes bya ba ni/ lus kyi gzhogs phyed ril gyis na bar byed pa'o// /rlung nang lag pa la gcig 'dzes pa zhes bya
201a7(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ rlung gis phrag pa'i rtsal khums par byas pa yin par shes par bya'o rlung nang dbyi mig man cad zug pa'i da skrun ni/ brla man chad du na ste/ smyang bskum mi nus te/ rting pa las sor mo'i bar du na zhing 'gro mi shes par byas pa yin no/ /rlung
201b1(mdo 'grel): nang kha yon zhes bya ba ni/ rlung gis kha phyogs gcig tu yo bar byas pa yin par bshad do/ /rlung nad pus mo skrang ba zhes bya ba ni/ rlung dang khrag rgyas pas bus mo'i lha da skrang bar byed pa yin no/ /de la sman mar gyis lus bsku ba dang/ dugs bya ba
201b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ sman mas btang dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ snum gyis bkru sman btang ba dang/ kha zas snum pa dang/ skyur pa dang/ lan tshwa dang/ mngar pa dang/ ro tsa bar byed pa'i bag rnams ni rlung nang sel to/ /sman pa la dang/ me ri ya gang yang rung ba skol
201b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i khu ba'i nang du de nyid kyi phye ma/ til mar dang/ 'o ma lhan cig tu skol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te 'thungs na/ rlung nang kyi sna grangs thams cad sel to/ /yang na/ to le mar dang/ 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang/ sman
201b4(mdo 'grel): a shwe gand+ha srang lnga bcu skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi nang du/ spang spos dang/ shing tsa dang/ gand+ha ba tra dang/ btsod dang/ tra ban+ti dang/ byi'u rug ba dang/ dza ti dang/ ba la dang/ thang shing dang/ sti ra dang/ shing mngar dang/ ra sna dang/
201b5(mdo 'grel): sug smel dang ? ma du dang/ shu dag rang/ gzim dang/ du rta dang/ bu ti ko dang/ shu ti dang/ puDNa Na ba dang/ bri ha tI dang/ pu shel tso dang/ ba ri ri rnams btags pa'i phye ma zho gnyis gnyis lhan cig tu skol te til mar 'ba' zhig lus pa btsegs
201b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i ming ni yang ? sogs pa'i ril mar zhes pa ste/ btub pa dang/ lus bsku ba dang/ snar blugs pa dang/ mas btang pa rnam pa bzhi po dag tu sbyar na rlung nad thams cad sel to/ /til mar dang/ la phug gi khu bsrang sum cu rtsa gnyis
201b7(mdo 'grel): gnyis dang/ zho dang/ rtsa pas skyur lo dang/ kO ma rnams las re re yang/ til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bzhi 'gyur dang/ 'di rnams kyi nang du/ shu dag dang/ ba la dang/ ra sna dang/ ma nu dang/ bca' sga dang/ kru trul tres dang/ shi kru dang/ rgyam
202a1(mdo 'grel): tsha dang/ gze ma dang/ pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i til mar gyi sman yang rlung nad kyis nyam thag pa thams cad sel ba yin no/ /til mar dang/ 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis
202a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis dang/ sman bras ra ni srang brgya skol ba'i khu ba til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang/ 'di rnams kyi nang du sman ji ba ka dang/ ri sha b+ha ka dang/ med rnam gnyis dang/ bu tshad rtong dang/ ra mnye dang/ ru rta dang/ tsan dan rnam gnyis dang/ shu ti
202a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ thang shing dang/ btsong dang/ ra sna rnams kyi phye ma skol la til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa 'di las mas btang ba la sogs par sbyar na yang rlung sel to/ /til mar dang/ 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang/ gze ma'i
202a4(mdo 'grel): khu ba til mar gyi bzhi gyur gyi nang du bu ram dang/ bca' sga'i phye ma srang brgyad brgyad lhan cig tu skol la rtil mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te ran par 'thungs pa'i 'og tu 'o ma 'thungs la thur du 'khrus pa chod ba'i rjes la/ bca' sga dang
202a5(mdo 'grel): bu ra ma sbyar ba zos nas sman snga ma btang ba dang/ zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu kha zas 'o ma dang lhan cig tu zos na rlung nad mi bzang pa thams cad sel to/ /mar srang brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ sgog skya srang brgya skol ba'i khu ba mar gyi
202a6(mdo 'grel): bzhi 'gyur rnams kyi nang du dbyi mo dang/ kru trug tres dang/ pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang/ bca' sga dang/ shing kun dang/ lan tshwa rnam lnga dang/ 'di rnams las srang re re dang/ star bu srang phyed dang/ 'di rnams
202a7(mdo 'grel): lhan cig tu skol la mar nyi tshe lus pa gtsags pa'i ming ni sgog skya la sogs pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste/ 'di las ran par 'thungs na rlung nad dang/ rlung nad rkang zug ya gcig 'jas pa dang/ rlung nad gzhogs byed na ba dang/ skran las
202b1(mdo 'grel): sogs pa sel to/ /dbyi mo dang/ kha ru tshwa dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ shig gru dang/ rgyam tshwa dang/ 'o su'i 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ la phug gi khu ba dang/ sgre'u gsher gyi khu ba dang/ sha khu dang
202b2(mdo 'grel): tshwa dang/ rtsabs skyur po dang/ zhog chu dang /dar ba rnams las srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang/ 'di rnams kyi nang du skal la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa las ran par 'thungs na yang rlung nad sel to/ /rlung nyi tshe'i nad la ni/ snum rnam ba bzhi
202b3(mdo 'grel): po/ zhag dang rkang dang/ mar dang/ til mar rnams kyi sman btang bar bya'o/ /rlung yod ba'i steng du/ bad kan dang/ mkhris pa'i bla gnyan gyis thebs pa la ni re zhig bla gnyan btsan par byas te de zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga je bya'o/ /de la bad kan la ni sman
202b4(mdo 'grel): drong che zhing rno ba rnams btang ngo/ /mkhris pa la ni sman mngar zhing bsil ba'i bag btang bar bya'o/ /rlung nad rkang zug ya gcig 'jas pa dang/ rlung nang pus mor skrang ba la ni/ thog mar gtar te khrag phyung la/ de nas rlung nad sel ba'i cho ga thams cad
202b5(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /brla'i nang na bad kan dang/ tshil 'dug pa gnyis ldan pas rlung non te/ brla rings pa'i nang drag po bskyed pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni shin tu lci bar gyur cing skyid lug pa yin te/ de la ni/ thog mar bad kan sel ba'i sman rtsub po cog gi
202b6(mdo 'grel): tshog byas la/ de'i 'og tu rlung bsal pa'i cho ga thams cad bya'o// //dreg ni/ mi skyed de bar 'dug cing sdug ma myong ba las ngal ba la sogs pa drag shul gyi bag byas pas rlung dang khrag 'khrugs pa las 'byung ste/
202b7(mdo 'grel): thog ? ni gang lag gi nang na gnas la byis lus la 'jug bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung shas che ba'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ na ba dang/ rus pa grum zhing 'gas pa dang/ lus skam pa dang/ rtsub pa dang/ mdog gnag pa rnams yin bar
203a1(mdo 'grel): bshad do/ /khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing sgrar ba dang/ lhang lhang? po na ba dang/ chu ser 'jug cing 'jig pa dang/ na ba dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ mdog 'jam pa
203a2(mdo 'grel): rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur ba'i dreg gi mtshan ma ni/ cher min la/ lus g.ya' zhing rengs pa dang/ cher skrangs pa rnams yin no/ /nad gzhi gnyis gnyis 'dus ba dang/ gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i dreg gi mtshan
203a3(mdo 'grel): ma ni/ mchan ma gong du bstan pa rnams cha 'dres pa las rtogs par bya'o/ /dreg nad gzhi gcig las byung la/ gsar ba ni gso sla ba yin no/ /nad gzhi gnyis 'dus pa las byung ba/ lo gcig tshun chad lon pa ni/ kha zas dang
203a4(mdo 'grel): sman gi so cam du 'jog nus so/ /nang gzhi gsum char 'dus ba las byung la/ rma rdol cing 'dzag ste rus pa 'gas pa gang yin pa ni/ gsor mi rung ste spang bar bya'o/ /de la dreg gso ba'i thabs ni/ thog mar sman mar blud de/
203a5(mdo 'grel): nyam stobs bskyed pa'i 'og tu/ rlung ni tshe las gyur pa ma gtogs pa/ gzhan rnams la gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ngo/ /de'i 'og tu nad gzhi gang yin pa dang sbyar zhing bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang/ 'jam rtsims btang
203a6(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ skyug sman dang/ bkru sman dang/ sman snar blugs pa dang/ cho ga rnam pa lnga po sngar bstan pa 'di rnams las gang 'os btang bar bya ste/ rlung las gyur pa la ni/ sman mas btang ba'i cho ga ba'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur
203a7(mdo 'grel): pa la ni/ bkru sman btang ngo/ /bad kan las gyur pa lani skyug sman btang ngo/ /yang na rlung shas che ba las gyur pa'i dreg la ni/ bag che mar dang/ ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas bskus na sel bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na til brdos
203b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ zar ma'i phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ shu ta'i phye ma'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ e raN+Da'i sa bon gyi phye ma'o ma dang sbyar ba gang yang rung bas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na chu na gnas pa'i srog chags nya la sogs pa'i sha gang
203b2(mdo 'grel): yang rung ba zhib tu brdungs pa ste/ spong sna tshogs kyis btab la legs par btsos pas bsku bar bya'o/ /mkhris ba shas che ba las gyur pa'i dreg la ni/ shing mngar gyi phye ma mar dang/ 'o ma dang/ phye rnams sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku'o/ /yang na
203b3(mdo 'grel): 'tsho byed ces bya ba'i sman sna bcu pe rnams btags pa'i phye ma mar dang sbyar bas bsku bar re ba'o/ /bad kan shas che ba las gyur pa'i dreg la ni/ a shwa gand+ha dang/ til gyi phye ma 'am/ yang na yungs kar gyi phye ma 'am/ yang pu r+Na rna ba dang/ shi
203b4(mdo 'grel): bu'i phye ma dang/ 'di rnams gang yang rung ba/ ba gcin dang sbyar te bsku bar ba'o/ /dreg go cog la ni a ru ra'i phye ma bu ram dang sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/ /yang na sle tres bskol ba'i khu ba btung bar bya'o/ /yang na pi pi ling 'o ma dang bskol ba'i
203b5(mdo 'grel): sman bcud gyis len btung bar bya ste/ /nyin gcig bzhin du pi pi ling lnga lngas bskyed de/ pi pi ling gi grangs brgyar phyin nas/ nyin gcig bzhin pi pi ling lnga lngas ? ste/ pi pi ling lnga la thug nas yang snga ma bzhin du bskyed de/ bsol
203b6(mdo 'grel): ba dang lta bu cho ga legs bar bsrung zhing/ rtag tu btung bar bya'o/ /rlung nad gso ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig ba rdzogs so// //de nas chang nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dug la phan gnod rnam pa bcu yod par bstan pa
203b7(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa de rnams ni chang la yang yod de/ de btung nyes pa las nad gzhi rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan rnams 'khrugs nas/ chad nad drag po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de la rlung gis tshul gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ smra ba thogs
204a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ mang du smra ba dang/ smral la bskam pa dang/ tshig mi brtan zhing khral khrul ba dang/ lus rtsub cing mdog sngon por 'gyur pa dang/ dmar bor 'gyur ba dang/ myos pa rnams yin no/ /mkhris pas tshul gyur ba'i
204a2(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing ser ba dang/ khro zhing 'thab par dga' ba yin n/ /bad kan gyis tshul 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni/ smra ba nyung ba dang/ tshig 'brel pa dang/ sems pa dang/ bzhin mdog dpal skya ba dang/ rgyud zhan
204a3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams yin no/ /nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las tshul gyur pa ni de dag thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i chad nad kyi mchan ma ni/ snying dang/ klang pa dang/ rtsib log na ba dang/ lus rengs pa dang/ skyegs
204a4(mdo 'grel): bus 'debs pa dang/ lung pa lu ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las byung ba'i chang nang kyi mtshan ma ni/ skom dang che ba dang/ lus cha ba dang/ rdul 'byung ba dang/ mdog ser por 'gyur ba dang/ mi dran zhing myos pa rnams yin no/ /bad
204a5(mdo 'grel): kan las gyur pa'i chad nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ mer mer bo dang/ kha nas chu 'byung ba dang/ yig 'chus pa dang/ skyug pa dang/ lus rengs pa rnams yin no/ /nang gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i chang nang ni/ mtshan ma thams cad dang
204a6(mdo 'grel): ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i chang nang la ni/ chang snga ma 'thungs bzhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu/ chang gi nang du kha ru tshwa dang/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang/ chu nyung zad cig blugs te 'thungs na sel bar byed do/ /yang na chang gi
204a7(mdo 'grel): nang du tshwa dang kha ru tshwa dang/ na le sham dang/ zim thig le dang/ la la phung rnams kyi phye ma blugs te 'thungs na yang/ rlung las gyur pa'i chang nang drag po sel to/ /yang na rlung las gyur pa'i chang nad bsal ba'i phyir/ chang 'os kon gyi
204b1(mdo 'grel): skyo mar byas ba'i nang du/ rgya shug gi 'brum bu dang/ bal po se'u dang/ tin+ti la'i 'bras bu dang/ la la bud dang/ rgyam tshwa rnams kyi phye ma blugs te ltung bar bya'o/ /skom du ni kha lung dang/ bal po se'u skur chu'i nang du mnyes te/ tung bar bya'o/ /ri?
204b2(mdo 'grel): dags skam sa na gnas ba'i sha khu snum dang ldan pa'am/ rgyam tshwa dang/ bal po se'u dang/ sbyar ba yang btung ba dang/ kha za sa spag bar bzang ngo/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i chad nad la ni/ chang dang chu phyed mar byas la/ sbrang rtsi dang/ kha ra dang
204b3(mdo 'grel): sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /yang na sman mngar bag bskol ba'i khu ba kha ra dang sbyar ba 'am/ mon sran sde'u'i khu bcung kha ra dang sbyar ba 'am/ sman mngar bag bskol ba'i khu ba las sha btsos te bsdus pa'i khu ba rnams las gang yang
204b4(mdo 'grel): rung ba btung bar bya ste/ thams cad kyang grang mos byas pa yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i chang nad la ni skyug sman chang dang sbyar te skyug tu gzhug pa dang/ nyam stobs dang sbyar te smyung ba'i cho ga yang bya'o/ /yang na drod bskyed
204b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sman gyi phye ma chad dang sbyar ba 'am/ 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang/ sbyar ba btung zhing chog bsrung bar bya'o/ /kha zas ni nas las byas pa'i kha zas la phug skam po'i khu bcud dang/ rgya sran
204b6(mdo 'grel): gyi khu bcung gang yang rung bas spong tsha bas sha skyed de sbyar ba dang/ ri dags skams na gnas pa'i sha snum bag chung ba dang/ lhan cig tu bza' o/ /chad nad kyi rkyen gyis bskos pa'i nang dang/ rim dang/ lung pa dang/ rtsibs log na ba dang/
204b7(mdo 'grel): 'khru ba la sogs pa'i nang bla gnyan gang yang rung ste/ de dag la ni so so'i sman btang bas zhi bar bya'o/ /chang gis lus kyi sha zad par gyur ba la ni/ brku sman drag po mas btang ba dang/ 'jam rtsims btang ba dang/ snum gyis
205a1(mdo 'grel): lus bsku zhing dril ba dang/ khrus bya ba dang/ sman mar dang/ 'o ma blung pa rnams kyis brta bar bya'o/ /de la sman mar ni nye'u shing dang/ bur+Na r+Na ba dang/ shing mngar gyi phye ma mar chu mar gyi bzhi 'gyur
205a2(mdo 'grel): gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tse lus ba las ran bar btung ngo/ /yang na ba la dang/ a ti la ba/ bskol ba'i khu ba 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'thungs na zad byed kyi nad sel to/ /thu na rna ba bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du/ mar dang/ 'o ma dang/
205a3(mdo 'grel): shing mngar gyi phye ma blugs te/ bskol la mar nyi tshe lus pa btsir ba las ran par 'thungs na yang/ chang 'thungs bas mdangs med bar byas pa phyir brta zhing sor chud par byed do/ /chad nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis ba rdzogs
205a4(mdo 'grel): so// //de nas me dpal gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /me dpal ni/ lan tshwa dang/ sgyur ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ drong che zhing rno ba la sogs pa'i kha zas rtag tu zos pas nad gzhi 'khrugs par byas pa las me dpal rnam ba bdun
205a5(mdo 'grel): du shes par bya ste/ me dpal zhes bya ba ni lus thams cad du mched cing 'jug pa yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur ba'i me dpal gyi mtshan ma ni/ 'brum bu 'jam zhing mdog gnag pa dang/ skrang ba dang/ rims kyis 'debs pa dang/
205a6(mdo 'grel): gzar ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dpal gyi mtshan ma ni/ 'brum bu'i mdog ser zhing dmar ba dang/ lus tsha dang/ rims kyis 'debs pa rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i me dpal gyi
205a7(mdo 'grel): mtshan ni/ 'brum bu'i mdog dkar zhing dpal skya ba dang/ g.ya' zhing bad kan gyi rims 'debs ba yin no/ /kun 'dus pa las gyur pa'i me dpal ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ glo rdo ? las
205b1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i med pa la ni/ khrag dang/ mkhris pa gnyis las 'byung ste/ 'brum pa'i mdog gnag ba dang/ sngo skyar 'dug pa dang/ dmang ba dang/ spang ba dang ba rnags nas rdol ba dang/ lus tsha ba dang/ rims bdo bar byed ba rnams yin par
205b2(mdo 'grel): bshad do/ /me'i me dpal zhes bya ba ni/ rlung dang/ mkhris ba dag las 'byung ste/ 'brum bu'i mdog mas bsregs pa 'dra la/ nyen bskor me mdag bzhin du dmar zhing/ lus cho ba dang/ skom dad che ba dang/ 'khru ba la sogs pa'i
205b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma las rtogs par bya'o/ /me dpal rdza ba 'dra zhes bya ba ni/ bad kan dang mkhris pa las 'byung ste/ ? pa'i mdog dpal skya zhing dmar ba dang/ gnag cing 'tsher te dri mas g.yogs pa dang/ tsha zhing nya skor du chu ser gyi
205b4(mdo 'grel): 'dam zhing du 'dug pa rnams yin no/ /de la nad gzhi gsum so so las gyur ba'i me dpal ni gso sla ba yin no/ /lhag ma gzhan rnams ni gsor mi rung bar bshad do/ /lus kyi phyi nang gnyis kar byung ba dang/ tshigs kyi steng du
205b5(mdo 'grel): byung ba ni/ bdun char yang lhag par gsor mi rung ngo/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i me dpal la ni/ rtsa ba lnga'i sman lnga phugs lnga sngar bshad pa'i nad nas/ ? blta ba ma gtogs par rtsa ba lnga pa rnam pa bzhi po rnams las gang
205b6(mdo 'grel): yang rung bas lus bsku ba dang/ nad? kyi steng du blugs ba dang/ sman mar sbyar ba la sogs ba bya'o/ /yang na 'bras dang/ nas dang shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma mar dang/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol te /thug ba tshos par byas bas na ba'i steng du
205b7(mdo 'grel): bslu? bar bya'o/ /yang na 'o mas na ba'i steng du blugs par bya'o/ /yang na mar gyi snying pos steng du blugs par bya'o/ /'khris pa las gyur pa'i me dpal la ni/ sman pa buN+Da? rI ka dang/ bcod dang/ shug ba dang/ bu shel ci dang/ tsan dan dang/
206a1(mdo 'grel): shing mngar dang/ utpa la rnams kyi phye ma'o ma dang sbyar te bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad pas nad kyi steng du khu ba blugs pa dang/ bsdu ba dang/ sman mar sbyar ba rnams
206a2(mdo 'grel): byas na bzang ngo/ /yang na mar gzhu zhing 'khyeg du bcug pa de lta bur/ lan brgya'i bar du byas te/ rul bar gyur pa'i nang du/ shing mngar gyi phye ma shas tsher blug ste sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na li klu mig dang/ pu shel tsi dang/
206a3(mdo 'grel): tsan dan dang/ gla sgang dang/ mu tig dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ btsag rnams kyi phye ma/ mar dang/ 'o mar sbyar te/ bskus na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dpal sel to/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i me dpal la ni/ seng ldeng dang/ sapta par+Na dang/
206a4(mdo 'grel): gla sgang dang/ shing d+ha ba dang/ dong ga dang/ thang shing dang/ ku raN+Ta rnams bdar ba'i lde gus bskus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na shing mngar dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ bu tshang rto dang/ shi ri sha rnams bdar ba'i lde gus bsku'o/ /yang na bad kan
206a5(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i me dpal la/ sman pa ru na la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyis bsku ba dang/ khu bas blugs pa dang/ sman mar sbyar ba la sogs pa byas na bzang ngo/ /po ta la dang/ nimpa dang/ skyer pa'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags dang/ pu tse shel dang/
206a6(mdo 'grel): khyi lce ba dang/ shing mngar rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mthung na yang me dpal thams cad sel to/ /gla sgang dang/ nimpa dang/ po to la rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mthungs na yang/ me dpal lo cog sel to/ /yang na skyu ru ra dang/ pa? to la dang/ mon
206a7(mdo 'grel): sman sde'u rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar te btung par bya'o/ /mdor na me dpal la ni/ dang por skyug sman dang/ bkru sman gyi sbyang ba dang/ gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba rnams kyang bya'o/ /cho ga de ltar byas pa las kyang 'brum bu
206b1(mdo 'grel): rnam ga? te rdol ba las gyur pa la ni/ ma gso ba'i cho gang bstan pa thams cad bya'o/ /me dpal gsel pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so// //sman dpyad gces ba grub ba zhes bya ba/ bam po drug ba'o/ /de nas skrang ba'i
206b2(mdo 'grel): nad gso ba'i le'u bshad bar bya'o/ /skrang ba'i nad ni /mi zad pas/ kha zas lci ba dang/ skyur ba dang/ bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i zas zos nas/ nad gzhi rnams 'khrugs pa las skrang ba'i nad mi bzad pa rnam pa drug 'byung bar
206b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ skrang ngo tsog gi mtshan ma ni gso sla ba yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i skrang pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ skrang pa nyid phan chun ngu 'pho zhing/ gar mnan pa'i ma la shod dar 'dug pa dang/ mdog gnag cing dmar ba dang/
206b4(mdo 'grel): mi bzad par na ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i skrad ba'i mtshan ma ni/ myur du smin cing rdol ba dang/ mdog 'dzam pa dang/ ser zhing dmar ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ lus tsha bar byed pa rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i
206b5(mdo 'grel): skrang ba'i mtshan ma ni mdog snum zhing dkar ba dang/ dbal skye ba dang/ khrang ba dang/ g.ya' ba rnams yin no/ /khrag las gyur ba dang/ blo bur gyi skrang ba'i mtshan ma ni/ mkhris pa'i mtshan ma dang 'dra'o/ /kun 'dus pa las
206b6(mdo 'grel): gyur ba'i skrad ba'i mtshan ma ni/ thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la nad gzhi pho ba'i nang na gnas na ni/ ro stong skrad par 'gyur ro/ /nad gzhi long ga'i nang na gnas na ni/ ro smad du skrang par 'gyur ro/ /nad gzhi bar na gnas na ni bar du
206b7(mdo 'grel): skrang bar 'gyur ro/ /nad gzhi thams cad du bya ba na ni/ lus ril gyi sgrad par 'gyur ro/ /de la skrad pa'i nad gzhi gcig las gyur pa yin la/ nad bla gnyan gzhan gyis kyang ma thebs te/ mi nyal stobs chen bo zhig la byung na ni gso sla ba
207a1(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /lus ril gyis skrang ba dang/ mas yar mched de skrang ba ni ma rungs pa yin no/ /skrang pa'i nad la sman pas nad gzhi dang sbyar zhing nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan rnams kyis sman mar sbyar ba dang
207a2(mdo 'grel): til mar gyi sman sbyar ba dang/ bsku ba dang/ nad kyi steng du blugs pa dang/ btung ba rnams su sbyar bar bya'o/ /las rnam pa lnga po bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang/ 'jam rtsi mas btang ba dang/ skyug sman dang/ skru sman
207a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ sman snar blugs pa rnams kyang tshabs che chung dang sbyar zhing cho ga bzhin du btang bar bya'o/ /de ma yin pa skrang ba'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i spyi'i cho ga gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ thang shing dang/ a ru ra dang/ bca' sga dang
207a4(mdo 'grel): pu na rna ba rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol ba dron po dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na byi dang ga dang/ bo dang dkar po dang/ dug ma yungs kyi shub na lpags dang/ bca' sga dang/ thang shing dang/ na le sham rnams kyi phye ma chu bskol ba dron pa dang
207a5(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba 'am yang na tsha ba gsum dang/ lcags kyi phye ma dang/ nas tshig 'khus ba'i thal ba rnams kyi phye/ 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang skrang ba'i nad sel to/ /yang na pu tse shel dang/ lcags kyi phye
207a6(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ shing nye rong rnams kyi phye ma/ 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na gu gul dkar po bag cin dang sbyar ba dang/ yang na pi pi ling gi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba btung bar bya'o/ /yang
207a7(mdo 'grel): na bu ram a ru ra'i phye ma dang cha bsnyams te sbyar ba 'am/ yang na bu ram gca' sga dang cha bsnyams te sbyar ba bza' bar bya'o/ /yang na bu ram dang/ sge'u gsher tshod ran bar bza' o/ /rlung las gyur pa la ni kha zas sha khu dang
207b1(mdo 'grel): lhan cig bza' o/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba ni kha zas 'o ma dang lhan cig bza' o/ /bad kan las gyur pa la ni kha zas khu bcud rtsub pa'i bag dang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o/ /cho ga de ltar byas na skrang ba'i nad dang/ skem pa'i nad dang/ dmu rdzing dang/
207b2(mdo 'grel): smyo byed dang/ skran dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ dbugs mi bde ba rnams 'byad par 'gyur ro/ /thang shing dang/ pu na rna ba dang/ gca' sga rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na kru trug tres dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ shing nye rong dang/ thang
207b3(mdo 'grel): shing rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na yang skrang ba'i nad sel to/ /rkang 'bams nas bya ba ni tshil dang/ sha'i nad las 'gyur te/ rkang ba gnyis bum pa 'dra bar skrang ba yin no/ /de yang nad gzhi gsum la bad kan shas che ba las gyur
207b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i bye brag gis /rnam pa gsum yod de nad gzhi so so'i mtshan mas bstan to/ /de ni dus thams cad du grang zhing ser tsha la/ skam du mi btub pa'i sar skye bar 'gyur te/ lo gcig lhag ba dang/ rkang 'bam grog mkhar lta bu ni mi 'tsho'o
207b5(mdo 'grel): de la gso ba'i cho ga ni nad gzhi dang 'phrod pa'i sman gyi bsku ba dang/ dugs bya ba dang/ gtar te khrag dbyung ba la sogs ba'i cho ga dang/ skrang ba'i nad gso ba'i cho gar bstan ba thams cad kyang/ ci rigs par bya bar bshad do/ /dba' ba ni rlung
207b6(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa dang/ tshi las gyur ba dang/ bad kan las gyur pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum yod de/ de la rlung las gyur ba'i dba' ba' i mtshan ma ni/ mdog nag cing dmar ba dang/ kha dri mi zhim pa dang/ rkan skam par byed pa yin no/ /tshil las
207b7(mdo 'grel): gyur ba yi? dpa' ba' i mtshan ma ni/ 'jam zhing snum ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur ba'i dba' ba' i mtshan ma ni shin tu che zhing sa ba yin no/ /de la rid de pa la byung ba dang/ lo gcig phan chad lon pa ni/ gsor mi rung ngo/ /'bras kyi phreng ba
208a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ lkog mar bad kan dang/ tshil gnyis las skyu ru ra'i rus ba 'dra bar smin bur gyur pa mang bos bskor ba'i ming ni/ 'bras kyi phreng ba zhes bya ste/ yun ring du mi 'byang bar 'dug pa yin no/ /de la dag?
208a2(mdo 'grel): ba gso ba'i cho ga ni/ sman pas nad gzhi dang sbyar zhing/ nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan gyis dugs bya ba dang/ bsku ba dang/ lums bya ba dang/ gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba dang/ skyugs sman dang/ kru sman btang ba dang/ tshil mar
208a3(mdo 'grel): gyi sman btung ba rnams kyis dba' ba med par bya'o/ /'bras kyi phreng ba la ni/ sman sha ka ta ka'i shun lpags kyi phye ma/ til mar dang/ chu'i nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags ba 'am/ yang na nimpa dang/ a shwa ma
208a4(mdo 'grel): ra dang/ ni rgun+ti rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te snar blugs so/ /yang na 'bras kyi phreng ba ma smin pa la ni/ dral te smin bu phyung la/ rma kha sregs go /smin cing rdol ba la ni sman mu ga
208a5(mdo 'grel): ka'i thal ba'i sman sbyar bas bsku zhing sbyangs la/ zhing? gnyi ga yang rma'i cho ga bzhin du gso bar bya'o/ /yang na rting pa nas sor bcu gnyis kyi gang du byin pa dral te/ byin pa'i nang na tshil gyi rmin bu nya'i sgo nga 'dra ba 'dug pa rnams
208a6(mdo 'grel): byung la/ rma kha sregs? te rma gso ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /sha rmen ni nad gzhi gsum so so las gyur te/ khrag dang/ sha dang/ tshil rnams kyi rmin bu yin no/ /de ni nad bzhi so so'i mtshan ma las shes par bya ste/ de la khrag dang
208a7(mdo 'grel): sha gras? gyur pa'i sha rmin ni/ gsor mi rung ngo/ /sha smin gso ba'i thabs ni/ dpa' ba gso ba'i cho gar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na dral ba dang/ bsreg pa dang/ sman gyi thal bas gdab pa rnams kyang bya zhing/ ras ma
208b1(mdo 'grel): 'am lo ma sog? log par bya'o/ /skrang ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas rma gso ba'i le'u bshad bar bya'o/ /rma ni lus nyid las 'byung ba dang/ blo bur du 'byung ba'i bye brag gis
208b2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gnyis yod bar rig par bya'o/ /de la snga ma ni nad gzhi rnams las gyur pa yin no/ /phyi ma ni mtshon la sogs pas rmas pa yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur ba'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ rma'i nyen skor rtsub cing mdog dmar la sngo skyar bdag?
208b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ 'dzag pa nyung zhing 'dang ba dang/ tsher min ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur ba'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ rma dang/ nyan skor gyi mdog ser zhing dmar la sngo ba dang/ 'dzag pa cha ba dang/ lus cha pa rnams yin no/ /bad kan las
208b4(mdo 'grel): gyur ba'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ mkhrad zhing dpal skya ba dang/ chu ser skya ba 'dzag cing grang la/ ska ba rnams yin no/ /khrag nad las gyur pa'i rma'i mtshan ma ni/ mdog dmar zhing khrag 'dzag pa yin no/ /nad gzhi gnyis 'dus ba las gyur
208b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ gsum 'dus ba las gyur ba'i rma'i mtshan ma ni /gang dang gang 'dus ba de dang de'i mtshan ma 'dres pas bstan to/ /de la thog ma ma smin pa'i tshe ni/ zhi bar 'gyur ba'i nan rtsis bsku'o/ /rnags su tsha ba la ni smin gar
208b6(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /rnags? zin pa la ni brtol te 'jib ba'i sman gyis rnag dang chu ser dag par bsal nas/ rma'i? sha'u skye'i sman bya'o/ /de la rnags par bya ba'i sman ni/ til dang/ phabs dang/ zar ma dang/ ru rta rnams kyi phyi
208b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /phye? dang/ rgyam tsha rnams zho skyur po dang sbyar te/ brdzis pa'i gong bu ni smin par byed ba'i mchog yin par 'dod do/ /de la rnags su tsha ba'i mtshan ma ni tsha ba 'ur? 'ur? bor 'dug ba dang/ na zhing zug pa dang/ mdog dmar ba dang
209a1(mdo 'grel): skrad pa rnams yin bar bshad do/ /rnags ba'i mtshan ma ni grong ma smin du che ba'i mtshan ma rnams rtse gzhil bar 'gyur la/ gnyer ma 'dus shing phyogs gcig tu mthon bo cog cog por 'byung ba yin no//
209a2(mdo 'grel): rdol bar bya ba'i sman ni/ shing nye rong dang/ snu ha k+Shi ra dang/ asma ri dang/ tsi ri bil ba la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang/ kru trug tres dang/ thi ba dang/ bya gag dang/ mchil ba'i tug pa rnams kyi phye ma sbyar ba 'am/
209a3(mdo 'grel): yang na mu ska'i thal ba'i sman sbyar bas bsku ba ni rdol bar bya ba'i sman gyi nang na mchog yin no/ /'jib pa'i sman gyi rnag dang/ chu ser bsal ba'i thabs ni/ til dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ shing mngar dang/ nimpa'i lo ma dang/
209a4(mdo 'grel): yung dang/ skyer ba dang/ shing nye rong rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar te bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na nimpa ba tra dang/ til gyi phye ma sprang rtsi dang sbyar te bskus na yang rma sbyong bar byed do/ /rma'i sha'u skye ba'i sman ni/ nas rjen par btags
209a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phye ma/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ bskus na rma 'drub par 'gyur ro/ /rma rub pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skrang ba med la/ 'jam zhing snum ba dang/ lce'i mdog 'dra bar dmar ba dang/ na ba med cing 'dzag pa chad pa dang/ rlo ba
209a6(mdo 'grel): med pa rnams yin te/ rma dag par 'gyur ba'i rtag su bshad do/ /de la rlung las gyur ba'i rma la ni/ sman rtsa ba lnga ba'i sde tshan che chung gnyis cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma la ni/ shing
209a7(mdo 'grel): n+ya? gro d+ha la sogs ba'i sde tshan cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i rma la ni/ dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan cho ga thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang utpal sngon po dang kha? la dang/ skyer ba dang/ med
209b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /shing mngar dang/ tsan dan dang/ sa mang+ga dang/ d+ha ta ki rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar te bskus na yang rma'i sha'u skye bar byed do/ /yang na shing 'o ma can gyi myu gu'i phyem mar dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na 'bras bu gsum dang/ shing ba ta'i?
209b2(mdo 'grel): yal ga'i thor to dang/ seng ldeng dang/ gseng phrom rnams kyi phye ma mar dang sbyar bas bskus na rma kha 'drub par 'gyur ro/ /yang na shing ardzu na dang/ u dum ba ra dang/ a sha tha dang/ gsang phrom dang/ dzam bu'i shun lpags dang/ shing mngar
209b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ katpa la dang/ rgya skyags rnams kyi phye mas btab pa na yang/ rma'i sha'i bu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /pu tse shel dang/ bra tshil dang/ yung dang/ shing mngar dang/ nak+ta ma la'i 'bras bu dang/ lo ma dang/ ma la ti dang/ nimpa'i lo ma rnams
209b4(mdo 'grel): kyi phye ma mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tsha lus pa yang rma la phan pa yin no/ /yang na pra puN+Ta ring? ka dang/ shing mngar dang/ bu tshang rto dang/ ra mnye dang/ tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma/ shing 'o ma can bskol pa'i khu ba dang/ til mar
209b5(mdo 'grel): gyi nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa yang rma 'tsho bar byed do/ /rma kha sman gyis bskus pa'i steng du/ shing ka rany+dza dang/ pAk+Sha dang/ dzam bu la sogs pa'i lo mas glan la/ de'i steng du ras la sogs pas dkri ba ni
209b6(mdo 'grel): bzang ste/ rma sbyong zhing 'tsho bar byed do/ /rma la 'bu zhugs pa la ni byi'u rug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan sbyar bas rma kha dang/ rma'i nang bcus na phan no/ /rma sos pa'i mal shod du gyur pa la ni/ sran ma dang/ mon sran sde'u la sogs
209b7(mdo 'grel): pa sran ma'i rigs rnams kyi lo ma'i skye ma chu dang sbyar ba'am/ /yang na shing tog ko sha 'am/ shing lbang ko btags pa'i phye ma chudang sbyar bas bskus na slar gang bar 'gyur/ /rma 'khyims pa la ni/ cho ga shes pas rma'i ?
210a1(mdo 'grel): gang byung ba brtags te/ mtshon gyis dral la dag par bsal zhing/ rnag dang/ chu ser 'jib pa'i sman gyis bskus te myang ba ste/ rma ba sha'i bu skye zhing 'drub ba'i sman la sogs pa rma'i cho ga thams cad
210a2(mdo 'grel): rim bzhin du bya'o/ /rngu ba khong na yod pa'i rma la ni/ rngu ba skam bas drangs te phyung la/ rma gso ba'i sman gyi cho ga bstan ba'i rims bzhin du bya'o/ /rma rnying ring du lon pa'i rkyen gyis sha zad cing skam par gyur ba la ni/ sha
210a3(mdo 'grel): rta pa'i sman gyi cho ga yang bya zhing/ rma yang gso bar bya'o/ /rma rang pa la ni/ rma'i nyan sgor gtar zhing khrag dbyung ba dang/ skyug sman dang/ bkru sman btang/ blo bur gyi rma la/ rma byung ba'i mod la/ mar dang/ spang rtsi
210a4(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar pa sa bskus? te/ bcings la/ mkhris pa dang/ khrag gi drod tsha ba dpri zhing bsil ba'i cho ga rnams bya'o/ /rus ba chag gam/ tshigs byung ba la ni/ cho ga shes pas srad zhing/ tshigs bcug la/ mar dang
210a5(mdo 'grel): shing mngar gyis bskus te/ bcings la ras kyis dam du dkris la/ shing 'o ma can gyi shun lpags kyis mi mgul bar dbang du/ byas te/ ci nas kyang ma rnags par nan tan du bsrung bar bya'o/ /rma dang/ chas
210a6(mdo 'grel): grugs dang bur pa'i kha zas ni 'bras sa lu dang/ mon sran sde'u dang/ nas la byas pa dang/ ri dags skams na gnas pa'i sha rnams bza' o/ /zho dang/ 'o ma dang/ sgyur bag dang/ kha zas lci ba'i bag dang
210a7(mdo 'grel): nyal po rnams spang bar bya'o/ /rma gso ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga ba rdzogs so// //de nas mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mig sman gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos
210b1(mdo 'grel): bshad pa gang yin pa ni rgya ches pas na/ 'dir de dag thams cad mi bshad par cha tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/ /de la mig gi rang bzhin ni gong bur 'dug pa dang/ dmar ba dang/ dkar nga dang/ gnag pa yin no/ /de yang 'byung ba chen po sa dang/
210b2(mdo 'grel): chu dang/ me dang/ rlung rnams dang ldan par bshad do/ /gnas bung bu yin pas na nam mkha' dang yang ldan no/ /de la rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan dang/ khrag gi nyes ba rnams kyi bye brag las/ mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya ba/ drag
210b3(mdo 'grel): bo rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ de ni phal cher mi gnad do cog 'byung ba'i gzhi yin no/ /de la rlung las gyur ba'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag ba'i mtshan ma ni/ mchi ma grang ba dang/ rdu ma skam po yod pa dang/ na zhing ha re 'dug pa rnams yin par
210b4(mdo 'grel): bshad do/ /mkhris ba las gyur ba'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag ba'i mtshan ma ni/ mchi ma tsha ba dang/ rdu ma ser ba dang/ tsha ba 'ur bur por 'dug cing? rtsa dmar ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur ba'i mig nad mchim 'jog pa'i mtshan ma ni/ rdum dkar
210b5(mdo 'grel): pos logs pa dang/ mchi ma 'byar 'byar po dang/ g.ya' zhing skrang ba rnams yin no/ /khrag gi nyes ba las byung ba'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma ni/ mig dmar ning tsha ba 'ur 'ur bor 'dug la/ dmar po shar shar por 'byung
210b6(mdo 'grel): zhing/ mchim rtsa dmar ba rnams yin no/ /kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos ba dang/ dus bzhin du mi za ba'i rkyen gyis mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya ba tshabs chen bor gyur pa la ni mig nad rdung ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ mig dang klad pa'i phyed mi?
210b7(mdo 'grel): bzad? par na bar? 'gyur ro/ /de'i mtshan ma yang gong du smos pa bzhin du nad gzhi so so'i mtshan ma dang sbyar zhing rtogs par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur ba'i mig nad gso ba'i tshig ni/ kha ra dang/ gser phrom dang/ rgyam tsha rnams gyi phye ma chu 'jam tsam? 
211a1(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar te btsags pa'i khu ba 'am/ yang na kha ra dang/ bca' sga dang/ sha ba ri'i? gseng phrom rnams cho ga gong ma bzhin du byas te /mig tu blugs par bya'o/ /yang na kun+ta'i me tog dang/ shing mngar dang/ kha ra dang/ gca'
211a2(mdo 'grel): sga rnams kyi phye ma zho kha chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa 'am/ yang na bca' sga dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ shing mngar dang/ gseng phrom rnams kyi phye ma mar gyi nang du brdos pa'i khu bas mig tu blugs so/ /yang na shing mngar dang/ tsan dan
211a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ btsod dang/ gseng phrom dang/ btsag yug snam rnams kyi phye ma chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te btsags pa 'am/ yang na bilba la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol bas mig gi nang du blugs na yang mig nad mi zad par na ba sel to//
211a4(mdo 'grel): yang na e raN+Ta'i rtsa ba ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bskol te/ 'jam tsam du bsgrangs la/ mig gdangs te/ ras dkar po gtsang mas g.yogs pa'i steng du /mig 'gram logs nas rgyun ma chad par blugs pa ni/ mig sman tshags
211a5(mdo 'grel): las btang ba zhes bya ba'i mchog yin no/ /yang na pi pi ling dang/ ba la ka dang/ shing mngar dang/ rgyam tsha rnams ra'i 'o ma dang bskol te/ 'jam tsam du sgrangs pa snga ma bzhin du tshags las btang ba'i sman byas na yang/
211a6(mdo 'grel): mig nang mi bzang pa na ba sel to/ /yang na lcags sam zangs kyi snod du rgyam tsha dang zho sbyar ba 'am/ yang na zangs sam lcags kyi gtun gyi nad du khar ba'i gtun bus yung dang/ pi pi ling zhib du brdungs la zho dang sbyar te
211a7(mdo 'grel): snod de nyid kyi nang du zhag lon par bzhag pa zangs dang/ lcags kyi mig sman gyi thur mas blang zhing mig tu bskus na/ mig mi bzang par na ba sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni pra puN+Ta rI ka dang/ shing
211b1(mdo 'grel): mngar dang/ yung dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ thug pa rnams bskol ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang/ kha ras sbyar te sngar bstan pa bzhin du/ chags las btang zhing rgyun tu blugs na mig nad sel to/ /yang na tsan dan dang/ a ri shta'i lo ma dang/ shing
211b2(mdo 'grel): mngar dang/ skyer pa dang/ lce myang tsha rnams kyis phye ma chu grang mo dang sbyar te/ sbrang rtsi dang/ kha ra dang ldan pas byas la tshags las btang zhing rgyun tu blugs so/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni/ dud pa dang/ yungs kar cha re dang/
211b3(mdo 'grel): yung dang/ sgyer pa cha gnyis gnyis dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar te/ tshags las btang zhing rgyun tu blugs na/ mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa sel to/ /yang na snod kha sbyar nim pa'i khu ba bskus pa'i nang du /gseng
211b4(mdo 'grel): phrom cha bzhi dang/ dud pa dang/ yungs kar cha re rnams kyi phye ma tshig mar brngos te/ btags nas/ chu 'jam tsam dang sbyar ba yang tshags las btang zhing/ rgyun tu blugs par bya'o/ /khrag las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni/ sman
211b5(mdo 'grel): ti ri ta dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ shing mngar dang/ kha ra dang/ gla sgang chen po rnams kyi phye ma chu grang mo dang sbyar te/ tshags las btang zhing rgyun tu blugs na mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa sel to/ /gseng phrom dang/ shing mngar dang/
211b6(mdo 'grel): mdong ras dang/ skyer ba dang/ skyer khaN+Ta rnams kyi phye ma ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na skyer pa'i khu ba bsgrangs te/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba thur mas blangs la mig la la bskus na/ mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa thams cad sel
211b7(mdo 'grel): to/ /thog ma mig nad kyis btab sten ba bod pa la ni/ gseng phrom dang/ skyu ru ra khrel phur sbyang ba mar gyi nang du bsngos te/ zhib tu btags la ldong ros dang sbyar te/ chu dang brdzis pas mig gi phyi rol pags pa'i steng du
212a1(mdo 'grel): bsku'o/ /yang na mig sman tsuk+Sha? rag gtsang ma'i nang du phur la/ ba lang gi lci ba'i nang du btsos te/ chan chos rab tu gyur pa'i shun lpags med par byas te/ bskams la zhib tu btags pa'i
212a2(mdo 'grel): phye mnyal gar lan cig rgya mig tu blugs pa tsam gyis/ de ma thag tu mig nad mi bzang par bdo ba yang med par byed do/ /yang na mig na ste bod bal/ shi kru'i sa bon cha gcig dang gseng phrom cha brgyad dang/ ldong ros cha
212a3(mdo 'grel): gsum dang/ 'di rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma sbyar bas/ ras gtsang ma la zhen par btab ste/ mig g.yog par bya'o/ /yang na skyer khaN+Ta dang/ a ru ra dang/ skyer pa dang/ btsag dang/ rgyam tsha rnams lhan cig tu
212a4(mdo 'grel): chu dags mar byas la/ mig gi phyi rol pags pa'i steng du bskus na yang mig nad do cog sel to/ /mig nad rdung ba thams cad la ni/ dpral rtsa gtar te khrag phyung la/ mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i skabs su so so'i rkyen tu/ sman
212a5(mdo 'grel): gyi cho ga ji ltar bstan pa rnams kyang mthun mthun du bya'o/ /mig gi 'bras bu na gu'i steng du dkar bo'i thig le byung ba ni/ ling tog ces bya ste/ bad kan las gyur par shes par bya'o/ /mig gi sprin gyi steng du dmar po byung
212a6(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ ling tog dmar po zhes bya ste/ khrag gi nyes pa las 'byung ba yin no/ /de la ling tog dkar po zhi bar bya ba'i thabs ni/ drub mar chang dang/ me tog ma d+hu? ka'i shing gi snying po dang/ ba du ra'i che gu dang/ rgyam tsha
212a7(mdo 'grel): rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ mig la bskus na ling tog med bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na ga bur dang/ na le sham dang/ shing mngar dang/ dung dang/ ba lang gi so dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ ldong ros dang/
212b1(mdo 'grel): tsan dan rnams kyis phye ma shig gru'i khu ba dang sbyar te ri lur byas pas bskus na yang ling tog dkar po sel bar byed do/ /rgya mtsho'i sbu ba dang/ khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun pags dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ dung dang/ shi kru'i 'bras bu'i chi gu rnams kyi
212b2(mdo 'grel): phye ma chu dang sbyar te ri lur byas pas bskus na yang ling tog la sogs pa gris bzhogs pa bzhin du med par byed do/ /khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang/ ldong ros dang/ dung dang/ mching bu dang/ tsan dan dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye
212b3(mdo 'grel): ma cha bsnyams pa'i steng du /mig sman gyi thur ma bsgres pas mig byug na yang/ ling tog dang/ mig 'dzer la sogs pa med par byed do/ /tsan dan dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ a ru ra dang/ rgya skyags rnams kyi phye ma yas kyi rim bzhin du
212b4(mdo 'grel): dang po'i cha res bskyed de sbyar ba'i nang du mig sman gyis thur mas bsgres pas mig byugs na yang/ ling tog dang/ mig mdzer la sogs pa med par byed do/ /sna ma'i me tog kha ma 'bus pa dang/ rgya skyags dang/ btsag yug snam dang/
212b5(mdo 'grel): tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma cha mnyam la chu dang sbyar ba'i ri lus mig bskus na yang mig snang cing rma byung ba dang/ ling tog rnams sel zhing khrag gis rgyas pa dang bar byed do/ /ling tog dmar po la ni dung gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba
212b6(mdo 'grel): 'am/ ka ta ka'i 'bres bu rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba 'am/ rgya mtsho'i dbu ba kha ra dang/ sbyar ba rnams las/ gang yang rung bas mig byug par bya'o/ /sna ma'i lo ma'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi dang/ yung dang/ skyer pa'i phye ma dang/ skyer khaN+Ta rnams
212b7(mdo 'grel): kyi mig sman nam/ yang na pi pi ling ngas? gsol? ma'i nang du phur te/ ba lang gi lci ba'i khu ba'i nang du btsos la/ sgams pa'i phye mas mig byugs na/ mtshan mo mi mthong ba'i mig nad sel to/ /ldong ros dang/ yung dang/ stang zil
213a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ tsha ba gsum ba lang gi mkhris bas sbrus la/ sran tsam gyi reng reng po dril la/ chu las bdar ba 'am/ yang na thang shing gi phye ma/ ra gcin gyis sbang zhing bskam pa de lta bur lan grangs mang du byas
213a2(mdo 'grel): pas mig bskus na/ mig mchi mas gang ba sel to/ /yang na/ ba bla dang/ thang shing dang/ shu dag rnams kyi phye ma/ bye'u rug pa'i lo ma'i khu ba dang sbyar te/ ri lur byas la grib mar bskams pas mig bskus na yang
213a3(mdo 'grel): mig tshag rnying sel to/ /ba bla dang/ stang zil dang/ de gnyis sdom pa'i gnyis 'gyur gyi zangs rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma'i nang du /mig sman gyi thur ma bsgres pas mig byug gam/ yang na tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma
213a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ skyer khaN+Ta dang/ chu dang sbyar te bskus na yang/ mig tshag po sel to/ /mig nad rab rib du gyur pa thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan ma ni/ shin tu zi zi por gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /so so'i bye brag gzhan ni
213a5(mdo 'grel): da bshad de/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni/ ci mthong ngo cog rtsa dmar zhing g.yo ba dang/ lo long por snang ba yin no/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni/ kha dog sngon po dang/ ser por
213a6(mdo 'grel): snang zhing/ me 'bar ba dang/ srin bu me khyer dang/ glog lta bu mthon ba rnams yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mchan ma ni/ mthong ngo cog mdog 'jam zhing skya ba dang/ bstan par snang sna rnams yin no/ /'dus pa las
213a7(mdo 'grel): gyur ba'i rab rib kyi mtshan min/ mtshan ma de dag thams cad lta bur mthong ba yin no/ /khrag las gyur pa'i rab rib kyi mtshan ma ni/ mthong ngo cog shin tu dmar bar mthong ba yin no/ /mig nad rab rib ces bya ba yal
213b1(mdo 'grel): bar bor te/ tshabs chen po las gyur pa las ni/ mig nad pris g.yogs pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ de'i mtshan ma yang thog ma ni nad gzhi gang las gyur pa'i mtshan ma rab rib kyi skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra ba las/ phyir zhing 'khrul
213b2(mdo 'grel): tshabs che ba dang/ mi mthong bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /de rnams kyi nang na bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad pris g.yogs pa ni gso sla ba yin te rtsa gtad zhing khrag phyung na bzang ngo/ /de la rab rib gso ba'i cho ga ni/ a ru ra'i
213b3(mdo 'grel): tshi gu dang/ shing mngar dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ na le sham dang/ spangs ma rnams chu dags su byas pa'i ri lus bskus na mig nad rab rib rnams sel to/ /tsha ba gsum dang/ lcags kyi phye ma dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ stang
213b4(mdo 'grel): zil rnams chu dags su byas te/ legs par sbyar ba'i ri lu'i ming ni/ ri lu nag po zhes bya ste/ 'dis bskus na yang mig nad rab rib sel to/ /yung dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ pi pi ling dang/ ka ta ka'i 'bras bu dang/ yungs kar rnams
213b5(mdo 'grel): kyi phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar te/ ri lur? byas pas bskus na yan/ mig nad do cog sel to/ /bya g+h+ri? dang/ gla sgang dang/ shing thog a mra dang/ shing mngar dang/ pi pi ling dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma zangs kyi snod kyi nang du
213b6(mdo 'grel): ra'i 'o ma dang spangs pa'i ri? lus bskus na yang/ mig nad thams cad sel to/ /skang bzhi pa phyugs la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i so dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu dang/ pri ha tI'i 'bras bu dang/ gla ba dang/ rnga mo'i?
213b7(mdo 'grel): rus pa dang/ nya rus dang/ byi dang ka ra dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ ru rta rnams cha bsnyams te/ tshu dags su byas pa'i ri lu'i ming ni/ so'i ri lu zhes bya ste/ 'dis bsrus na mig nad rab rib dang/ pris g.yogs pa dang/ mig 'dzer dang//
214a1(mdo 'grel): 'brum pa byung ba dang/ rma byung ba dang/ ling tog la sogs pa sel to/ /ldong ros dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ nag tshur dang/ dung dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ skyer khaN+Ta rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i khu ba'i mig
214a2(mdo 'grel): sman gyis bskus na yang/ mig nad bris g.yogs pa dang/ ling tog dang/ mig 'dzer dang/ rab rib rnams sel to/ /shing ka pit+ta'i khu ba/ mu zi'i khu ba nyis gyur dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na skyer khaN+Ta dang/ stad zil dang/
214a3(mdo 'grel): gla sgang gi bzhi gyur gyi phye ma dang sbyar ba'i nang du mig sman gyi thur ma bsgres te/ mig byugs na yang rab rib sil to/ /yang na li shi cha gcig dang/ zangs cha gnyis dang/ stad zil cha gsum dang/ mu zi cha lnga dang/ /na ga ge
214a4(mdo 'grel): sar cha gsum dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma snod kha sbyar gyi nang du tshig bar brdos la zhib tu btags pas mig sman gyi thur ma la mgo zhing rtag tu mig byug par bya'o/ /stang zil 'am/ skyu ru ra gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar dang/ sbrang
214a5(mdo 'grel): rtsis sbyar te/ a ru ra'i snying po phyung ba'i skyin par khong du bcug la slar kha sbyar te/ bag zan gyis g.yogs nas/ rgya shug gi me'i nang du sregs la/ bag zan tshig ste dud ba chad nas slar byung ste/ bsgrangs la/ a ru ra'i khong na sman
214a6(mdo 'grel): 'dug pa btags pa'i phye mas mig sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing/ mig byug pa ni rab rib sel pa'i mchog yin no/ /yung dang/ skyer pa dang/ a ru ra dang/ spang spos dang/ ru rta dang/ pi pi ling rnams zhib tu btags pa'i
214a7(mdo 'grel): phye ma 'di'i ming ni/ sangs rgyas pa'i mig sman zhes bya ste/ snga ma bzhin du mig sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing/ mig la byugs na mig nad thams cad sel to/ /yang na stang zil dang/ spang spos dang/ gand+ha ba tra rnams kyi phyi
214b1(mdo 'grel): ma mar dang sbyar la/ sbrul nag po shi ba'i mgo bcad pa'i khar bcug la/ 'jim pas g.yogs te bsregs la/ 'jim pa tshig ste dmar por gyur nas phyung ste bsgrangs la/ de'i nang gi sman zhib tu btags ba'i phye mas mig
214b2(mdo 'grel): sman gyi thur ma la bsgo zhing mig byugs na yang rab rib sel to/ /dug mo nyung gi sa bon mar dang sbyar la/ shing pa ta'i lo ma'i nad du phur mar byas te/ chu'i nad du bskol la tshos bar gyur nas/ nang gi khu ba bsgrangs pa
214b3(mdo 'grel): mig tu blugs ba 'am/ yang na dug mo nyung gi sa bon gyi skyin bar bya skams na gnas pa'i sgo nga snga ma bzhin du bcos pa'i khu ba mig tu blugs na mig blta bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum dang/ lcags kyi phye ma
214b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba nyal khar rtag tu zos na/ mig nad do cog sel cing/ ro tsa bar yang 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ 'o ma dang/ mar gyi nang du 'bras
214b5(mdo 'grel): bu gsum gyi phye ma bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus ba las nub mo zhing ran par 'thungs na yang/ ring mo mi thogs par rab rib sel to/ /sman ra sna dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ rtsa ba bcu pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba
214b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ mar gyi nang du sman 'tshe byed ces bya ba/ sna bcu pa'i phye ma bskol to/ /mar nyi tshe lus pa las/ ran par 'thungs na yang rab rib sel to// //da ni rna ba'i nad kyi cho ga bshad bar bya
214b7(mdo 'grel): ste/ de la rlung las gyur pa'i rna ba'i nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ rna ba gnyi su zug cing na la/ 'on zhing sgra 'byung ba dang/ 'dzag pa rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa ni tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa yin no/ /bad kan las
215a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa ni rna ba'i nang skam la dri mnam pa yin no/ /de dag gso ba'i sman ni/ sman mu raM ga dang/ chu shing dang/ shi kru dang/ la phug dang/ sge'u gsher rnams las gang yang rung ba'i khu ba rgyam tsha dang
215a2(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba dron pos rna ba gang bar blugs la/ nad du chub bar bsgul zhing phyir pho na rna ba'i nad sel to/ /rgyam tsha btags pa shing arka'i lo ma ser po'i nad du phur la/ de'i phyi rol tu yang/ arga'i lo ma rim bdun gyis
215a3(mdo 'grel): g.yogs te/ me mar mur gyi nang du bcug la/ lo ma nad rim ma tshig tsam du bsregs nas/ lo ma phyi rim rnams kyang bor/ nang gi rgyam tsha yang bor la/ nang rim gyi lo ma ser po la gsher bag yod pa btsing ba'i khu
215a4(mdo 'grel): ba rna bar blugs na yang rna ba'i nad sel to/ /bilba la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang/ thang shing dang/ sgron shing rnams las gang yang rung ba'i shing bu'i thor? to ras kyis dkris te/ til mar gyi nad du smyugs la gsregs te/ 'bar
215a5(mdo 'grel): du bcug pa'i khu bzags ba dron bo rna ba ra blugs na yang rna ba'i nad sel to/ /ru rta dang/ bu bran shing dang/ shu dag dang/ thang shing dang/ shu ti dang/ shing kun dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye mar gcin dang/ til mar gyi
215a6(mdo 'grel): nad du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa dron po rna bar blugs na yang rna ba'i nad kyi nyam thag pa sel to/ /ru rta dang/ a ru ra la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba'i nad du shing mngar dang/ bu tshangs sto dang/ mon sran
215a7(mdo 'grel): sde'u dang/ 'o su dang/ phag tshil rnams bskol te/ phag tshil gyi zhag nyi che lus pa las rna bar blugs na yang rna ba na zhing sgra byung ba sel to/ /rna ba mi bzad par na zhing/ sgra 'byung la/ chu ser 'dzag pa la ni ra gcin
215b1(mdo 'grel): bsros pa dron po dang/ lce myang tsha sbyar bar rna bar blugs so/ /yang na shing ba ru na dang/ ka pit+ta dang/ a mra dang/ dzam+bu rnams kyi lo ma'i phye ma til mar dang chu'i nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus ba 'am/ yang na sna ma'i lo ma'i khu ba
215b2(mdo 'grel): rna bar blugs na/ rna ba nas rnag 'dzag pa'i na ba sel te/ thabs de ltar byas pa las kyang/ rnag skam po nang du lus pa la ni/ sngar til mar ram/ sman mar gyis sbyar zhing 'byung du btub bar bya ba'i sman snum bag blugs pa dang
215b3(mdo 'grel): dugs kyis bdug ba rnams byas nas/ de'i 'og tu skra gzhar 'jam pos rul bar bru bar bya'o/ /da ni sna'i nad kyi bye brag bshad de/ de la sna'i nad cham pa zhes bya ba ni/ nad gzhi rnam pa gsum las 'gyur te/ rlung las gyur pa
215b4(mdo 'grel): ni sna nas 'dzag pa sla ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa ni 'dzag pa'i mdog ser ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni 'dzag pa dka' ba yin no/ /nad gzhi kun 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la cham
215b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i slan ni/ mgo snum gyis bsku ba dang/ dugs bya ba dang/ snar sman blug pa dang/ skyug sman btang ba dang/ sman mar btung ba dang/ /ba zas no? tsha zhing skyur ba bza' ba la sogs pa sman pas cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na cham pa la
215b6(mdo 'grel): ni sman dri zhi mo cog snang kha sbyar gyi nad du bsregs pa'i dud pa spyi'us drangs te/ /ba snar brdub bar bya'o/ /yang na dri sna bzhi zhes bya ba/ shing tsa dang/ sug smel dang/ gand+ha? ba tra dang/ na ga ge sar rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba'i/
215b7(mdo 'grel): yang na ? ? nag po phur mang phur te/ snar snam par bya'o/ /li zer ba dang/ ta ma la dang/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma mar dang bu ram gyi nad du bskol te/ sbyar ba zos na yang cham pa dang/ glo brdol ba dang/ rtsibs logs na ba dang/ 
216a1(mdo 'grel): snying na ba dang/ mkhal rked nub? rnams sel to/ /bya g+hI dang/ danda'i rtsa ba dang/ shu dag dang/ shi kru dang/ byi'u dug pa dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma til mar dang/ chu'i nang du bskol te/ til
216a2(mdo 'grel): mar nyi tshe lus pa snar blugs na/ cham pa yal bar bor ba las sna las rnag 'dzag pa'i lung sel to// //da ni lce nang kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ do la lce nad ni rnam pa gsum ste/ rlung las gyur pa'i lce nad ni/ kha zas kyi
216a3(mdo 'grel): ro mi tsho'i zhing slo slo bor gyur pa dang/ 'gags pa dang/ shing a sha ka'i lo ma bzhin du dmar ba rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/ lce rtsub cing tsha ba 'ur 'ur bor 'dug la tsag tsag tsha ba yin no/ /bad kan las gyur ba'i mtshan
216a4(mdo 'grel): ma ni/ lce ril gyis stug po bem bem por 'dug pa yin no// /de ltar lce bem bem por gyur pa la ni/ lce bzhar zhing nad khrag dan pa phyung la nad gzhi gang las gyur ba dang sbyar te/ nad gzhi so so'i sman gyi sde tshan las snar blugs pa dang/ mkhur ba
216a5(mdo 'grel): bkang zhing phyir dbo ba dang/ lce la bsku ba rnams kyi cho ga bya'o// /de ni so na ba'i cho ga bshad de/ so nang zug cing na pa dang/ brtse ba rnams gnyis ni/ rlung las gyur pa yin te/ de gnyis la yang/ mar ram til mar rlung
216a6(mdo 'grel): sman dang sbyar ba dron bo'am/ rlung sman bskol ba'i khu ba dron pos kha bshal zhing phyir dbo pa 'am yang na pu tse shel dang/ gla sgang dang/ te dzo ba ti dang/ ba tha dang/ yung dang/ skyer pa dang/ gseng? phrom? dang/ ? rta dang/ sa mang+ga
216a7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi phye mas so drung na/ so'i drung g.ya' ba dang/ so khrag 'dzag ba dang/ zug cing na ba rnams sel to/ /bca' ldan zhing kha nas 'brum pa 'byung ba ni/ khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs pa las 'gyur te/ de la ni khrag 'byung ba dang
216b1(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang ba dang/ mar dang/ til mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ 'o ma dang/ ba gcin rnams las gang yang rung bas /ba bkang la ring du bzhag la phyir dpo'o/ /yang na sna ma'i lo ma dang/ sle tres dang/ rgun dang byi tsher dang/ skyer ba dang/ 'bras
216b2(mdo 'grel): bu gsum brnams bskol ba'i khu ba sgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas mkhur ba bkang zhing phyir pho na tsha ldan zhing bar 'brum pa byung ba sel to/ /rkan gyi phug nas lce'u chung ba 'dug pa'i skrad pa'i nad ni/ bdag na dang/ khrag 'khrugs
216b3(mdo 'grel): pa las gyur pa yin te/ /de ni brtol? la/ tsha ba gsum dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ /shu dag dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar ba khar ba zhag cing khu ba phyir da bo bas bad kan drang bar bya'o// //lkog ma'i nad
216b4(mdo 'grel): sha lu ka zhes bya ba/ lkog ma'i nad du 'brum pa rgya shug gi 'bras bu 'dra ba ril ril por 'gyur ba ni/ bad kan las gyur pa yin te/ de'i cho ga ni gtar ba'i dbyed mdzub mo btsags bu phre'u bcings pas rtol te/ snga ma bzhin
216b5(mdo 'grel): du de dang 'phrod pa'i sman mur zhing/ /phu ba phyir dbo bar bya'o/ /lkog ma'i nad ro hi ni zhes bya ba/ lkog ma'i nang du /sha lhag myu gu ltar skye pa ring po zhig 'byung ba ni/ nad gzhi gsum po re re dang/ kun 'dus pa dang/ khrag gi nyes pa
216b6(mdo 'grel): rnams las gyur ba yin te/ so so'i mtshan ma'i sgo nas rtogs par bya'o/ /de'i cho ga mchis te tsher skyes na/ srog la yang 'bab par byed pas na cho ga myur te bya'o/ /de la cho ga ni de dag thams cad la yang gtar ga bya zhing khrag phyung
216b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ nad gzhi so so gang las gyur ba'i sman sbyar bas kha na ? bzhag cing bad kan drang bar bya'o/ /de las rlung las gyur pa la ni/ rgyam tsha dang/ /kha ru tshwa dang/ tsabs ru tshwa rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir dpe gar
217a1(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /mkhris pa dang/ khrag las gyur ba la ni/ kha re dang/ rma shing gi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba kha na bzhag cing bad kan las gyur pa la ni/ khyim gyi du ba dang/ tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba khar bzhag cing khu ba
217a2(mdo 'grel): phyir dbo? par bya'o/ /sman ra sna dang/ kha ru tsha dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ khyim gyi du ba dang/ gla sgang dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ khang bzhag cing khu ba phyir phon yang /lkog ma'i nad cog 'byang bar byed do//
217a3(mdo 'grel): yang na rgyam tsha dang/ ba bla dang/ ldong ngos dang/ rgya skyag dang/ skyer pa rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ khar bzhag cing bad kan drang ba ni/ lkog ma'i nad rnams dang/ kha nad rnams sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /shing tsha dang/ su ga smel dang/ gan
217a4(mdo 'grel): d+hi? pa tra dang/ na le sham dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang/ shing pa ta'i thal ba dang/ shing ku sha'i thal ba dang/ tsha ba rnam lnga la pi pi ling dang/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ dbyi mo dang/ kru trug tres dang/ bca' sga rnams kyi phyi ma bu ram
217a5(mdo 'grel): dang chu bskol te/ chos par byas nas phyir phyung ba dang sbyar te/ ri lur byas pa khar bzhag cing/ khu ba phyir pho na yang lkog ma'i nad sel to/ /skyer pa'i rtsa ba'i shun lpags dang/ te dze ba ti dang/ pi pi ling dang/ skyer khaN+Da rnams kyi snga ma bzhin du bu
217a6(mdo 'grel): ram bskol ba dang sbyar te ri lur byas pa khar bzhag cing khu ba phyir phon yang/ lkog ma'i nang rnams dang/ khar 'brum pa 'byung ba'i nad rnams sel to/ /dug mo nyung dang/ bo da dkar po dang/ thang shing dang/ pa tha dang/ pu tse shel dang/ gla
217a7(mdo 'grel): sgang rnams ba gcin gyi nang du bskol la/ bzhi cha lus pa bsgrangs te/ btsags nas sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba mthungs na yang lkog ma'i nar sel to// //da ni klad pa'i nang kyi bye bag bshed/ rlung las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nang ni/ klad pa stong
217b1(mdo 'grel): par 'dug pa snyam byed dang/ zug cing na ba yin no/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa ni shin tu tsha pa yin no/ /bad kan las gyur pa ni lci ba bem bem por 'dug pa yin no/ /gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin no//
217b2(mdo 'grel): klad pa'i nang na srin bu yod pa'i nad ni/ g.ya' zhing bug ste na ba yin no/ /klad pa'i nang nyi ma bzhin du 'khor ba zhes bya ba nyi ma shar nas ldang ba nyi ma nub? nas zhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ klad pa'i byed na ba dang/ 'di gnyis ni rlung dang mkhris pa las
217b3(mdo 'grel): gyur par shes par bya'o/ /klad pa'i nang za 'gram du zag cing mi bzang par na ba ni/ rlung dang/ khrag dang/ bad kan las gyur pa yin te/ gsor mi rung gi spang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad la ni/ rlung nad gso pa'i
217b4(mdo 'grel): sman gyi cho ga rnams pa'o/ /yang na rlung sel ba'i sman gyi khu ba las gzhi blangs te sbyar thug ces bya ba/ 'bras dang til dang mon sran sde'u gsum bsres pa'i thug pa 'am/ 'bras kyi 'o thug la sogs pas mgo bsku zhing dugs par?
217b5(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /yang na pi pi ling dang/ ru rta dang/ shu ti dang/ utpal dang/ tsan dan rnams kyi phyi ma/ shing karko ta'i khu ba dang/ til mar gyi nang du bskol te/ til mar nyi tshe lus ba btsags pa snar blugs so/ /yang na sman gyi phye ma dang/ sman gyi khu
217b6(mdo 'grel): ba rnams ma de? dang sbyar te/ mgo bsku bar bya'o/ /yang na shing mngar dang/ ba bla dang/ ra sna dang/ rtsa ba bcu pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ mar gyi nang du sman 'tsho byed ces bya ba sna cu la sogs pa sman ro mngar ba rnams kyi phyi?
217b7(mdo 'grel): kha? bskol la/ mar mtsho? lus ba btsags pa las ran par 'bu ngas? na/ nam tshong yan cad kyi nang thams cad sel to/ /ji ba ka dang/ rbar rtsi ba dang/ rkun dang/ kha ra dang/ shing mngar dang/ ba la dang/ utpal rnams kyi phye ma
218a1(mdo 'grel): til mar dang/ 'o ma phyed ma'i nang du bskol la/ til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags te/ ran phar snang blugs na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad sel to/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad
218a2(mdo 'grel): la ni/ bal dang/ stag gi sen mo dang/ bu shel tse dang/ shing mngar dang/ utpal dang/ tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma 'o ma dang lhan cig tu btags te mgo sku'o/ /yang na 'o ma 'am/ sman bsil ba'i khu ba la sogs pas mgo
218a3(mdo 'grel): bod blugs so/ /yang na shing tsa dang/ gand+ha pa tra dang/ kha ra rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i kha ba dang sbyar te btsags te snang blugs so/ /yang na rgun dang/ khar dang/ shing mngar rnams kyi phye mo mar bang/ 'o ma'i nang mu bskol la/ mar nyi
218a4(mdo 'grel): tshe lus pa btsags te snar blugs so/ /bad kan las byung pa'i klang pa'i nang kyis nyam thag pa la ni/ sngar shing ma d+ha ka'i snying po cham chom du brdungs te bskol ba'i/ phur mas phur bas klad pa dugs kyis bdug gam/ yang na
218a5(mdo 'grel): thang shing dang/ ro hi sha dang/ sha raM ga ta dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ sgren? shing rnams kyi phye ma chu dang lhan cig tu btags pas mgo bskus la/ de'i 'og tu sman snar blugs pas/ sna nas chu ser 'byung bar bya'o/ /de la sna las chu ser
218a6(mdo 'grel): 'byung pa'i sman ni/ shu ti dang/ er tTa'i? rtsa ba dang/ shu dag dang/ rgya sbos dang/ bya g+hi'i 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma/ til mar dang/ chu'i nang du bskol la/ til mar nyi tsha lus pa sngar blugs na/ blang dang/ bad kan las gyur
218a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i mig gnang rab rib dang/ nam tshong? yin chad kyi nad thams cad sel to/ /nad gzhi gsum ga las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad yod pa la ni/ mar rnying pa btung bar bya'o/ /yang ni nad gzhi gsum la/ phan pa'i sman gyi/ cho ga
218b1(mdo 'grel): gang yin ba rnams kyang bya'o/ /srin bu las gyur pa'i klad pa'i nad yod pa la/ tsha ba gsum dang/ /rgya spos dang/ shig gru'i sa bon rnams bskol ba'i khu ba snar blugs na srin ba sel to/ /yang na shing a ba marga'i 'bras bu
218b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ yung dang/ bsha' ba dang/ shing kun dang/ byi dang ka dang/ rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang/ til mar gyi nang du bskol la/ til mar nyi tsha lus pa btsags te snar blugs na srin pu sel to/ /grang pa'i
218b3(mdo 'grel): nad nyi ma gar nas nub kyi bar du na ba dang klad pa'i phyed na ba gnyis la ni/ thal tres dang/ shing mngar dang/ ru? rta rnams kyi phye ma rtsa bas skyur po dang sbyang te mgor byug go/ yang na rlung dang mkhris pa la phan pa'i sman bskol
218b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i khu bas mgo ra blungs par bya'o/ /kha zas ni zhi ti'u la sogs pa rlung dang mkhris pa la phan ba'i kha zas bzang bar bya'o/ /sna ma'i thal pa dang/ gla sgang dang/ shing tsha dang/ ras bal gyi 'bras bu rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang/
218b5(mdo 'grel): 'am/ /? zha shing mngar gyi phye ma mar dang bskol la btsags te snar blugs na klang pa'i nad thams cad sel to/ /yang na gca' sga dang/ byi dang ka dang/ shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma/ bring gang dza bskol ba'i khu ba dang/
218b6(mdo 'grel): ma'i phyi nang du bskol pa las thegs pa drug? smar blugs? na nam chong? yan chad kyi nad thams cad sel to// /da ni sba dkar po'i rtsi bshad de/ pra buN+Da ri ka dang/ shing mngar dang/ pi pi ling dang/
218b7(mdo 'grel): utpal dang/ tsan dan rnams kyi phye ma/ skyu ru nga bskol pa'i khu ba dang/ til mar gyi nang du bskol la/ til nyin lus pa snar blugs na/ skra dkang ba dang/ skra seng ba med par byed/ /yang na sman ra ma dang/ she lu dang til dang
219a1(mdo 'grel): ba ru ra rnams kyi mar bring ga ra dza dang/ ni li dang/ ku ran d+ha dang/ sh+ri sha rnams kyi khu ba dang bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa las rtag tu snar blugs na skra dkar med par gyur/ /rma bya'i mkhris pa dang/ pad+ma'i rtsa
219a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ shing la ko dang/ ma ta yan ti dang/ stang zil dang/ utpal dang/ ni li dang/ b+hing ga ra dza dang/ nag tshur rnams kyi phye ma/ ba ru ra'i mar dang/ chu'i nang du bskol te/ ba ru ra'i mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags la zla ba gcig
219a3(mdo 'grel): gi bar du lcags kyi snod du bzhag ste/ mgo bsku zhing snar blugs na/ de ma thag tu dus la ma bab par skra dkar ba dang/ dus la bab ste skra dkar ba med par byed do/ /lcags kyi phye ma dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ 'bras rnams rtsa bas skyur
219a4(mdo 'grel): bo dang/ tshwa dang/ zho kha chu rnams gang yang rung ba'i nang du bskol bas nub mo mgo la byugs la/ nad bar 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu bas bkrus na skra nag por 'gyur ro/ /skra 'khor ling du byi ba la ni/ sman sra ha ta'i
