219a5(mdo 'grel): khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ bskus na skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'o ma se'i rtsa ba dang/ 'bras bu gang yang rung ba ba gcin dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na go bye'i khu bas byug par bya'o/ /shing ba ta'i myu gu dang/ bring ga ra dza'i phyi ma/ sle
219a6(mdo 'grel): tres kyi khu ba dang sbyar te/ nyin tshan gyi drod kyis bsros pas bsdus? na yang/ skra mi skye ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mig nad la phan par 'dod pas ni rtag tu mar btung ba dang/ 'bras bu gsum gyi sman sbyar ba dang/ gtar ga gdab pa
219a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ bkru sman btang zhing kha zas su 'bras dang/ mon sran sde'u dang/ nas dang/ ri dags skams na gnas pa'i sha bza' bar bya'o/ /mig sman gyi rgyud kyi le'u rtsa drug brdzogs so// //sman dpyad gces pa
219b1(mdo 'grel): grub ba zhes bya ba/ bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o/ /de nas dug gso pa'i rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dug ni rtsi dug dang/ sdig sprul gyi za dug dang/ rnam pa gnyis so/ /de la rtsi dug ni rtsa ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin/ /phyi ma ni sbrul la
219b2(mdo 'grel): sogs pa las byung ba yin no/ /dug la phan gnod rnam pa bcu yod/ ya nga ba dang/ ro mi bo ba dang/ cha phras te rtsar 'gro ba dang/ rtsub pa dang/ drod che ba dang/ myur ba dang/ khyab pa dang/ bad kan bsdud cing 'dren pa dang/ dri sbyor
219b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ rno ba snams yin par bshad do/ /sbrul ni mgo che ba'i rigs dang/ lus 'khyil ba'i rigs dang/ khra bo'i rigs 'di gsum gyi bye brag las ? rlung gi rang bzhin can dang/ mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can dang/ bad kan
219b4(mdo 'grel): gyi rang bzhin can dang gsum yod par bshad de/ go rim bzhin du so sor sbyar ro/ /rigs 'dres pa ni mtshan ma gnyis gnyis 'dres pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /de la sbrul mgo chen po'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/ rma kha gnag pa yin
219b5(mdo 'grel): no/ /rlung nad kyi nam grangs dang/ mtshan ma thams cad bskyed do/ /sbrul lus khyil ba'i rigs kyis zin ba ni/ rma kha che la mdog ser zhid skrang pa yin te/ mkhris pa'i nad gyi sna grangs dang/ mtshan ma thams cad skyed do//
219b6(mdo 'grel): sbrul khra bo'i rigs kyis zin pa ni/ sma dpal skya zhing/ sgang ba myur du 'jub tu mi btub la 'byil? zhing snum pa dang/ khrag 'dzag pa shin tu ska ba rnams yin te/ bad kan gyi nad kyi sna grangs dang/ mtshan ma thams cad skyed do//
219b7(mdo 'grel): rgyu skar mchu dang/ lag dang/ smin drug dang/ skag dang/ bra nyi dang/ gre dang/ chu stod dang/ khrum smad rnams kyi nyes par sal gyis zin pa ni shin tu bsgrims na 'ga' zhig 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /tshes bzhi dang/ lnga dang/
220a1(mdo 'grel): drug dang/ dgu dang/ nyi shu dgu dang/ dus tshigs gnyis te/ nam langs ka dang/ nam tshab tshub dang/ 'di rnams kyi dus kyi sbrul gyis zin pa yang mi bzang pa yin par bshad do/ /sbrul gyis ? pa
220a2(mdo 'grel): las/ skar 'byi ba dang/ lus phrugs sam/ blud na/ rjes mi snang ba dang/ shin tu grang mos kyang ba spu mi ldang zhing/ grang 'brum mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni spang bar bya'o/ /de la thog ma zin ma thag tu snying la dug mi 'dzen par
220a3(mdo 'grel): bsrung ba'i phyir smyur te mar sbyin no/ /de nas gang zin pa bcing ba dang/ brdabs ru la sogs pas gzhib cing drang ba dang/ gar zin pa chub kor du bcas pa dang/ rma kha sreg pa dang/ rma kha dang/ nyen kor nas gtar zhing
220a4(mdo 'grel): khrag dbyur ba rnams bya bar bshad do/ /de la sbrul mgo chen po'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/ nir rgun thi dang/ shwe ta'i khu ba 'thungs na sel bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na srin bu ba ra dza'i rtsa ba'i phye ma rang gi khu ba dang brdzis te skams lad slar
220a5(mdo 'grel): yang rdzi zhing skam pa de lta bur lan mang du bskol te btung bar bya'o/ /sbrul lus 'khyil ba'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/ shing pa ta'i yal ga'i thor to dang/ btsod dang/ dzi ba ka dang/ zad tsi ba dang/ kha ra dang/ taM? pal dang/
220a6(mdo 'grel): shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba 'am/ chu bskol te bsgrangs pa dang sbyar ba btung ngo/ /sbrul khra bo'i rigs kyis zin pa la ni/ ha re nu ka dang/ ru rta dang/ rgya spos dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ bu rtse shel dang/ bo nga
220a7(mdo 'grel): dkar po dang/ shing mngar dang/ khyim gyi dud pa rnams kyi phye mchu bskol ba grang mo dang sbyar te/ 'thungs na dug sel bar byed do/ /spang spos dang/ tsan dan dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ pi pi ling dang/ shing mngar dang/ na le rnam? dang
220b1(mdo 'grel): utpal dang/ ba lang gi mkhris pa rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar te btsags la mig bskus na dug gis phog ste brgyal ba slar langs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na nak+ta ma la dang/ po son cha dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ bilba'i rtsa ba dang/ yung dang/
220b2(mdo 'grel): skyer pa dang/ byi'u rug gi me tog dang/ 'di rnams phye mar gcin dang sbyar te btsags pas mig bskus na yang slar dran par 'gyur ro/ /ma yu ra ka'i sa bon dang/ shi ri sha'i sa bon dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma 'aM/
220b3(mdo 'grel): yang na nas dang/ po son cha'i sa bon dang/ pa ta rnams kyi phye ma chu dang sbyar te btsags pa snar blugs na yang slar dran par 'gyur ro/ /sman karko ta'i rtsa ba'i phye ma ra gcin gyis lan mang du bsgos la/ rtsabs dang/
220b4(mdo 'grel): lhan cig tu btags te btsags pa snang blugs na yang dug gis sems nyams par byas pa las slar dran par 'gyur ro/ /shi ri sha dang/ a ri shta dang/ nak+ta ma la dang/ ba la dang/ ko sha ta ka'i 'bras bu rnams kyi phye ma
220b5(mdo 'grel): pa gcin dang lhan cig tu btags te/ btsags pa ni dug sman gyi mchog yin te/ btung ba la sogs pa byas na dug sel bar byed do/ /a ko ta dang/ a rishta dang/ d+ha tu ra dang/ snu ha k+Shi ri dang/ ka rany+dza dang/ a sho ma
220b6(mdo 'grel): ra dang/ pu na rna ba dang/ kru trug tres dang/ pha li dang/ sna ma'i me tog dang/ dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang/ arka rnams sbyar ba yang dug sman chen po yin no/ /rgya spos dang/ na le sham dang/ ldong ros dang/ thang shing
220b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ nak+ta ma la dang/ arka dang/ yud dang/ skyer pa dang/ shi ri sha dang/ pi pi ling rnams sbyar ba yang dug sman gyin te/ dug sel bar byed do/ /sku ba ro kha ba'i sa bon ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig tu btags pa 'di ni/ 
221a1(mdo 'grel): tshangs pa'i dug sman ces bya ste/ btung ba la sogs pa byas na dug thams cad sel to/ /shi ri shi'i rtsa ba dang/ shun lpags dang/ lo ma dang/ me tog dang/ sa bon rnam pa 'di lnga ba gcin dang lhan cig tu btags pa'i sman
221a2(mdo 'grel): 'di yang dug sel ba yin no/ /btsod dang/ sug smel dang/ yung dang/ skyer pa dang/ rgya skyags dang/ spang spos dang/ shing mngar dang/ ha re nu ka rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'di yang/ dug sman yin te/ dug sel ba dang/ brgyal ba las
221a3(mdo 'grel): slar dran par byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed do/ /lan tshwa rnam pa lnga dang/ shing nye rong dang/ dan+ti mu la dang/ ba shi la dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ yung dang/ skyer pa dang/ bcod rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i dug sman dwa'i nang
221a4(mdo 'grel): du bzhag pa yang las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /tsan dan dang/ ba bla dang/ ldong ros dang/ ru rta dang/ shing tsha dang/ gand+ha pa tra dang/ sug smel dang/ gla sgang dang/ yungs kar dang/ spang spos dang/ shug pa dang/ rgya sbos dang/ gur gum
221a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ bye'u rug pa dang/ e ka hA dang/ smyig rkang dang/ spri ka dang/ shing kun dang/ ba la ka dang/ la mats+tsha dang/ shu ti dang/ gand+ha pri yaM ku rnams kyi phye ma sbyar ba'i dug sman gyi ming ni/ zla shar ces bya ste dug thams cad 'joms par byed do/ /shing
221a6(mdo 'grel): nye rong dang/ nag ge sar dang/ pa ta li dang/ pi pi ling dang/ btsod dang/ ki ni hi dang/ ldong ros dang/ go byi ta ra dang/ na le sham dang/ rgya spos dang/ yung dang/ skyer pa dang/ pog dkar po dang/ a ba ra dzi ta dang// bri ha tI dang/ shing mngar
221a7(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi phye ma ba gcin dang lhan cig btags pa'i dug sman 'di'i ming ni/ gnyi shar ces bya ste/ dug dang/ gdon thub bo/ /i shwa ra dang/ chu shing dang/ na gi dang/ tsan dra dang/ shwe ta dang/ mon sne'u dmar ru dang/ ni rgun ti rnams
221b1(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba 'am/ yang na re re yang rung ste dug gsod pa'i mchog yin no/ /rgya skyags shing gi thal ba ba chu dang sbyar te btsags la/ dri ma dang/ snyigs ma bor ba'i nang du /ha re nu ka dang/ ru rta dang/ rgya spos dang/ tsha ba gsum dang/ bye'u rug pa dang/ thal
221b2(mdo 'grel): tres dang/ gla sgang dang/ spang spos dang/ shin kun dang/ yung dang/ skyer pa dang/ shing mngar dang/ byi dang ga dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma bskol te/ gzar bu la chags su btub pa tsam du tshos nas/ rwa'i nang du bzhag pa las nang re bzhin kya shug
221b3(mdo 'grel): gi 'brum bu tsam re re 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba'am/ 'o ma 'am char pa'i chu gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na dug go mthu chen po yang sel cing/ gcong dang/ skran dang/ dmu rdzing dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ gcin snyi ba'i nad dang/ drod chud
221b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ rims rnams med par byed do/ /yang na dug 'thungs pa la/ ba lang gi gci ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i skyugs sman blud de skyug tu gzhug go/ dug sman gyi sbyor ba mang po rnams las gang gtong yang rung ste/ thog mar snying la dug
221b5(mdo 'grel): mi 'jen? par bsrung ba'i phyir/ smyur te mar blud par bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i dug dang/ mnga' dug can gyis rmas pa la ni/ yung dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar pa'i mar mchog tu bzang ste btung bar bya'o/ /zangs dang/ gser gyi phye ma
221b6(mdo 'grel): kha ra dang sbrang rtsis sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na dug sbyar ma shin tu drag po thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do/ /sdig pas zin pa la ni/ shing ta la'i lo ma dang/ nimpa'i lo ma dang/ skra dang/ ras rnying pa rnams mar dang sbyar te/ bsregs pa'i dud
221b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ yang na rma bya'i sgro 'o ma dang sbyar te bsregs pa'i dud pas bdug par bya'o/ /yang na pa la sha'i sa bon shing a rka'i 'o ma dang lhan cig btags pa'i lde gu dang/ yang na pi pi ling dang/ shi ri sha'i 'bras bu sbyar ba'i
222a1(mdo 'grel): lde gus rma khar bskus na sdig pa'i dug gis nyam thag pa sel to/ /yang na ldong ros dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ shing kun dang/ sna ma'i lo ma dang/ bca' sga rnams kyi phye ma ba lang gi lci ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te/ ?
222a2(mdo 'grel): la ri lu byas pa yang sdig pa'i dug gis nyam thag pa sel to/ /byi ba'i sos zin pa'i dug la ni /til gyi rtsa ba dang/ karko ta'i rtsa ba dang/ ti la ka'i rtsa ba dang/ girni karni ka rtsa ba rnams kyi phye ma khar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang mar dang
222a3(mdo 'grel): sbyar te/ 'thungs na byi bas zin pa'i dug sel to/ /yang na byi bas zin pa'i dug las/ ha tsa ra'i rtsa ba'i phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'am/ /yang na til ka'i me tog dam/ lo ma gang yang rung ba
222a4(mdo 'grel): 'o ma dang lhan cig tu btags te btung bar bya'o/ /yang na byi la'i sha 'a ma/ ne'u le'i sha gang yang rung ba btsos pa'i khu ba 'thungs ni/ byi bas zin pa'i dug bla gnyan gyi nang dang bcas pa yang myur du sel to/ /khyi smyon gyis
222a5(mdo 'grel): zos pa la ni/ shing a ko ta'i yal ka'i thor to dang/ rtsa ba bskol te/ gdus pa'i khu ba srang gsum gyi nang du /zhun mar srang gcig btab ste/ 'thungs na khyi smyon gyis zin pa'i dug sel to/ /yang na bu mar dang/ til btags
222a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i phye ma shing arka'i 'o ma dang/ til mar gyis sbyar te/ 'thungs na khyi so gdug pas zin pa'i dug 'tsho dka' ba yang myur du sel bar byed do/ /srog chags phra mo'o cog gis zin pa'i dug sman ni/ nas tshig 'khus ba'i thal
222a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ swa rtsi ga'i thal ba dang/ tshe ba gsum dang/ shu dag dang/ shing kun dang/ byi da ka dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ rgya spos dang/ aM brta dang/ bo ra dkar po dang/ ru rta rnams kyi phye ma/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba dang btang zhing
222b1(mdo 'grel): bsku bar bya'o/ /shing nye rong gi rtsa ba dang/ mon sne'u dmar ru'i phye ma cha bsnyams te/ mar dang sbyar ba 'thungs na yang srog chags phra mo thams cad kyi dug shin tu mthu che ba yang myur du sel lo/ /yang phug ro ni gyi rtug pa dang/ dan ti mul dang/ ?
222b2(mdo 'grel): gi so dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ shing nye rong dang/ le brgan rtsi'i sa bon dang/ slu ha shi ri dang/ kru trug tres dang/ karI kar rnams sbyar ba yang srog chags phra mo'i dug sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /tsandan dang/ shug pa dang/ ru rta dang/ rgya spos dang/ pu shel
222b3(mdo 'grel): tse dang/ pa ta la dang/ ni rgun thi dang/ thal tres dang/ shel lu rnams sbyar ba ni srog chags phra mo kha dug go cog gi dug sel ba'i sman yin no/ /ka pit+tha dang/ pa ta li dang/ she lu dang/ shi ri sha dang/ pu na rna ba rnam gnyis dang/ shwe ta rnam gnyis dang/
222b4(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams sbyar ba yang srog chags phra mo kha dug go cog gi dug thams cad sel ba'i sman yin no/ /sdig pas zin pa'i dug ma gtogs pa/ dug gis nyam thag pa gzhan thams cad la ni/ kha zas dang/ sman la sogs pa bsil ba'i tshogs rnams
222b5(mdo 'grel): ba'o?/ /dug gis pho go cog la khro ba dang/ nyi ma la 'dug pa dang/ nyin par nyal pa dang/ nyal po rnams byar mi rung ngo/ /dug gis phog pa las rim pa la sogs pa'i bla gnyan gyis nang gzhan gyis thebs ba rnams la ni/ so so'i smin gang
222b6(mdo 'grel): yin ? /? te gso bar bya'o/ /dug gis nyam thag ba rnams la kha zas kyang tsha ba bskyed par mi 'gyur ba'i rnams bza' zhing btung bar bya'o/ /dug gso ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// //de nas
222b7(mdo 'grel): spran bcud? kyis len dang/ ro tsa bar bya ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de la sman gang skra dkar ba dang/ na ba med par byed pa de ni bcud kyi len ces bya ba yin no/ /de yang na tshed dang/ pho gzhon nu'i tshe 'am/ yang na bar ma'i
223a1(mdo 'grel): tshe bsgrub par byas te/ sngar skyugs sman dang/ bkru sman dang/ khrus la sogs pas lus kyi phyi nang dag bar byas nas rtsam par bya'o/ /de la sgrub pa'i thabs ni/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ lcags kyi phye ma dang/
223a2(mdo 'grel): skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu'i phye ma rnams sbyar bas bum pa bkang la/ lo phyed kyi bar du nas kyi dkyil du bzhag pa las rgyun tu dran par zos na/ skra dkar por gyur pa med par byed do/ /yang na a ru ra dang/ pi pi ling dang/ byi dang
223a3(mdo 'grel): ga dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ khar rnams kyi phye ma dang/ lcags kyi phye ma rnams mar dang/ til mar dang sbyar te zos na rga bas mi tshugs so/ /byi dang ga dang/ sapta parna dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ lcags kyi phye ma rnams sgrang rtsi dang/ mar dang
223a4(mdo 'grel): til mar rnams dang sbyar ba ji ste mis zos nas gzhon nur gyur pa de ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/ /byi dang ka dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang/ lcags kyi phye ma rnams mang dang/ kha ra dang/ sbrang rtsi rnamS
223a5(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar te/ rgyun tu zos na yang rga ba dang/ skra dkar por gyur pa sel to/ /lcags kyi phye ma dang/ kha ra dang/ bca' sga dang/ pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma dang/ mar dang/ til mar rnams 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu
223a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i nad du blugs te/ gzar bu la chags su btub pa tsam du bskol ba yang/ sman bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro/ /lcags glebs te dmar por bsregs la 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du smyug
223a7(mdo 'grel): cing khol bcad par bya ba de lta bur lan mang du byas pa'i lcags te/ se bdar gyis bdar ba'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dang sbyar te/ zos na yang tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na skyu ru ra bskol pa'i khu ba dang/ mar sbrang rtsi
223b1(mdo 'grel): rnams cha bsnyams te/ srang brgya brgya dang/ lcags kyi phye ma srang nyis brgya dang/ 'di rnams sbyar ba lcags kyi snod du blugs te/ bzhag pa yang tshe ring bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /drub mar cang dang/ 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te zos na
223b2(mdo 'grel): yang/ gshin rje'i snga ltas skra dkar por gyur pa med par byed do/ /byi dang ga'i phye ma dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ lcags kyi phye ma rnams cha bsnyams te/ sbyar ba bum pa'i nang du blugs la/ mon sran sde'u 'i dkyil du bzhag pa las ngan
223b3(mdo 'grel): par zos na /skra mthing gar 'gyur zhing stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /taM pa la phye ma srang brgya dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi srang brgya sbyar te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du snod kyi nang du bzhag pa las/ rgyun tu zos la/ pa zas 'o ma dang ldan par
223b4(mdo 'grel): zos na/ sgra dkar po mad par byed cing/ zla ba bzhin du mdzas par 'gyur ro/ /sman ba ra hi'i rtsa ba'i phye ma srang brgya sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ mthar gyis ja zhing 'o mas phul la kha zas 'o ma dang mar dang ldan bar za zhing/ nang tan du
223b5(mdo 'grel): byas na lang tsho dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na zla ba gcig gi bar du sman bar hi zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos la/ de'i 'og tu ba ra hi'i phye ma 'o ma dang bskol te/ bsrangs la ba tsags pa 'thungs na yang
223b6(mdo 'grel): sman pa cud kyi len du 'gyur ro/ /pu na rna ba'i rtsa ba zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma srang phyed 'o ma bskol te/ phyung ba'i nang du btab ste zla ba gnyis sam/ lo gcig gi bar du rgyun tu 'thungs na yang rga ba med par 'gyur ro/ /nye'u shing dang/
223b7(mdo 'grel): sa bta par+Na dang/ pu shi lo tso dang/ pa tha dang/ ba la dang/ nag ba la dang/ bi di ra dang/ thal tres dang/ bya g+h+ro rnams kyang re re nas bu na rna ba'i chog gong du bshad pa bzhin du byas na/ yon tan de bzhin du 'gyur/ /sha skye bar 'dod pa
224a1(mdo 'grel): la ni/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du /sman a sho gand+ha'i phye ma/ til mar dang/ mar dang 'o ma dang/ chu bskal ba dron mo rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te 'thungs na kha zas 'phrod pa bza' bar bya'o/ /sman
224a2(mdo 'grel): bcud kyis len sgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ rtag tu kha zas 'bras zhag drug cus smin pa'i chan 'o ma dang/ man sran sde'i'u? khu bcud dang/ rkang 'gros dang/ ri dags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams las gang yang
224a3(mdo 'grel): rung ba dang/ sbag cing bza' bar bya'o/ /ro tsa bar bya ba'i cho ga ni/ shing mngar gyi phye ma zho gnyis mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ rtag tu zos la de'i rjes la 'o ma 'thungs na rgan po yang ro tsa bar byed do/ /mon sran sde'u srang re re cho
224a4(mdo 'grel): ga gong ma ltar byas na yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /a t+ma gupta'i sa bon dang/ gze ma'i rtsa ba dang/ kha ra rnams kyi phye ma'o ma dang sbyar ba'am/ yang na sman uts+tsha de'i phye ma kha ra dang/ 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'thungs na yang/ ro tsa
224a5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /byi da ra'i phye ma de nyid kyi khu bas lan mang du bsgos pa btags te /mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus ni shin tu ro tsa bar bshad do/ /ra dug pa'i ldag pa'i 'bras bu 'o ma'i nang du legs par
224a6(mdo 'grel): btsos te zhu bar byas pa'i nang du /til lan mang du bsgos pa zos pa'i rjes la/ 'o ma 'thungs pa gang yin pa de'i pho mtshan rtag tu bsgren mar 'gyur ro/ /yang na mon sran sde'u shun lpags bshus te/ zhib tu btags
224a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i phye ma 'o ma dang/ mar gyi nang du bskol te/ ? pa ska rab tu gyur nas phyung la bsgrangs te/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i ri lu/ shing bilba'i 'bras bu tsam du byas pa nyin gcig bzhin du zos na yang/ pho mtshan bsgren
224b1(mdo 'grel): cing/ nyal bo nus par 'gyur ro/ /'bras bye'i nang du til dang/ adma gupta dang/ mon sran sde'u rnams kyi phye mas bsres te /'o ma dang sbrus pa'i khu ba mar gyi nang du btsos pa zos na yang/ shin tu ro tsa bar bshad/ /kha zas dang /btung ba
224b2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ rol mo sgra skad yid du 'ong pa dang/ spos dang/ byug pa la sogs pa dri zhim po sna tshogs dang/ me tog dang/ phreng ba dang/ gos dang/ rgyan bzang po la sogs pa yang mi ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin no/ /sman bcud
224b3(mdo 'grel): kyis len dang/ ro tsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs// //de nas byis pa'i rgyud kyi le'u bshad bar bya'o/ /de la bud med ni dga' bar bya'o/ /gnas dam pa yin la/ bu rin thang med pa bskyed
224b4(mdo 'grel): pa yin bas/ de'i mo mtshan lan da byung na dga' ba dang/ bu 'byung ba gnyi ga med par 'gyur te/ de bas na de gso ba'i cho ga je bshad par bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa mo mtshan gyi nad kyi mtshan ma ni/ mo mtshan na ba dang/ mdog
224b5(mdo 'grel): rtsub pa dang/ yon por 'gyur pa dang/ mkhrang ba dang/ phal phal byed pa rnams yin no/ /mkhris pa 'khrugs pa'i mtshan ma las gyur pa ni/ mo mtshan tsha ba 'ur 'ur par byed ba dang/ khrag 'dzag pa dang/ rims kyis 'debs pa rnams
224b6(mdo 'grel): las rtogs par bya'o/ /bad kan 'khrugs pa las gyur ba'i mo mtshan g.ya ba dang/ grang ba dang/ bem bem por 'dug pa dang/ 'bras khu 'dra bar dkar zhing/ sbyin po 'byar 'byad po 'dzag pa rnams yin no/ /de la rlung las
224b7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad gso ba'i cho ga ni/ 'bras kyi 'o thug gi dugs sa ma/ mon sran sde'u'i chan gyi dugs sam/ yang na ras ma 'jam po/ /til mar dron po'i nang du smyugs pa nang du btsa' zhing dugs bya'o/ /mdor na
225a1(mdo 'grel): rlung las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/ sman mar btung ba dang/ dugs bya ba dang /sman mas btang ba rnams bzang ngo/ /yang na mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang/ zin thig le'i rtsa pa'i
225a2(mdo 'grel): phye ma chang dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na pi pi ling dang/ u ba kun rtsi ka'i sa bon dang/ kha ru tshwa rnams kyi phye ma chang dang sbyar te blud do/ /pha bong gi dreg pa dang /'bras bu gsum dang/ b+hargi dang/ ra sna dang/ sle tres dang/ nye'u shing dang/
225a3(mdo 'grel): yung dang/ skyer pa dang/ pu na rna ba dang/ me da dang/ 'di rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis/ mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'o ma mar gyi tshad kyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsag pa la ran par 'thungs na yang rlung
225a4(mdo 'grel): las gyur pa'i mtshan gyi nad sel zhing/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la yang bzang la/ bu chags par byed pa'i mchog kyang yin no/ /mkhris pa 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nad la ni/ khrag lus
225a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i nang bsal ba'i cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i mo mtshan gyi nas la ni/ dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi btung ba dang/ bkru ba dang/ steng du blug pa dang/ byug pa la sogs
225a6(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad bya'o/ /de ltar mo mtshan gyi nyes pa dang/ nad med par byas nas bu chag par bya ba'i thabs ni/ skyes pa snga nas sman? dang/ kha zas bzang pos lus brta zhing nyal po mi bya bar 'dug la/ bud med zla mtshan
225a7(mdo 'grel): byung nas zhag bzhi lon pa'i 'og tu khrus byas nas nyal na bu 'chags par 'gyur te/ de la zla mtshan byung nas zhag bzhi lon pa dang/ zhag drug dang/ brgyad dang/ bcu dang/ bcu gnyis lon pa'i tshe/ nyal na ? khye'ur
225b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /zla mtshan byung nas zhag lnga dang/ bdun dang/ dgu dang/ bcu gcig lon lon pa'i tshe nyal na/ bu mor 'gyur ro/ /de la skyes pa'i khu ba mngal/ bud med khrag nyung na ni khye'u ra 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'i khu ba nyung la/ bud med kyi khrag mang na ni bu mor
225b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /zla mtshan byung nas zhag bcu gsum lon phan chad ni bur mi 'gyur ro/ /de la khye'ur 'gyur bar 'dod na/ rgyam tsha 'am shing pa ta'i yal ga'i rtse mo gang yang rung ba'i phye ma 'o ma dang btags te btsags pa'i khu ba las thigs pa
225b3(mdo 'grel): bzhi mnyal ba'i snga rol tu bud med kyi sna g.yon par blugs na khye'ur 'gyur ro/ /bud med zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i tshe/ kha lung ga sa bon nam/ na ga ge sar gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar khu dang sbyar te/ bud med kyis 'thungs la
225b4(mdo 'grel): skyes ba dang nyal na yang bu chags par 'gyur ro/ /de la bu 'chags pa'i mtshan ma ni nu ma'i thor to mdog sngo skye ba 'dug gi na bu yod par shes par gyis shig de ltar ? ma mar gyur nas las drag shul can dang/ mya ngan dang/
225b5(mdo 'grel): 'tshor ba dang/ khro ba'i bag bsrung zhing/ gang yid la 'dod pa dang/ 'phrod pa rnams sbyin par bya'o/ /'jigs shing skrag pa dang/ brdegs shing snad ba dang kha zas dang/ skom ra tsha ba da dang drod cha ches pa zos shing 'thungs na
225b6(mdo 'grel): ni/ bu 'byis par 'gyur te/ de yang khrag 'dzag cing na ba'i mtshan mas shes par byas la slar gso ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de lta bu gso ba la ni/ sman gyi khu ba grang mo lus la blugs? pa dang sman gyi khu ba grang mo'i nang du 'jug pa dang
225b7(mdo 'grel): sman bsil? ba'i bag gis lus byug pa rnams bzang ngo/ /gzhan yang bu 'byil du byed pa slar gso ba'i sman ni/ sman 'tsho byed sna bcu'o ma ngang bskol te/ ba tsegs la khang? dang sbyar ta blud do/ /yang tsan dan dkar po dang/ bu tshang rto dang/ 
226a1(mdo 'grel): rgun dang/ pu shel ce? dang /kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ shing mngar dang/ rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang /sug smel dang/ btsod dang/ d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang/ kha ra rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig
226a2(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba dang/ kha ra dang/ utpal dang/ shing mngar dang/ gseng phrom dang/ tsan dang dkar po dang/ thal tres rnams kyi phye ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sman gyi sbyong ba 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba
226a3(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar te blud do/ /yang na sman gyi sde tshan sngar shad pa'i nang nas/ utpal la sogs pa'i sde tshan smos pa rnams btags la/ kha ra dang/ 'o ma dang sbyar te blud do/ /yang na n+ya gro d+ha la sogs ba'i sde tshan rnams kyi lo ma
226a4(mdo 'grel): gzhon nuAm/ yang na rnams kyi shun lpags kyi phye ma gang yang rung ba khar dpa' o mas sbyar ram sbyar te blud do/ /yang na pad+ma la sogs pa'i nub? ning nas skye ba'i rtsa ba'i sman rnams bskol ba'i khu ba btsags pa 'bras phye dang kha ras sbyar
226a5(mdo 'grel): ba 'am/ yang na rtsa ba'i sman de rnams 'o ma dang bskol te btsags la kha ra dang sbyar ba blud do/ /sbrum pa'i kha zas ni thog ma sbrum nas/ zla ba gcig dang /gnyis dang /gsum lon gyi bar du mngar bag dang /bsil ba'i kha zas sbyin
226a6(mdo 'grel): no/ /zla ba bzhil bab pa'i tshe ni kha zas mar dang ldan par sbyin no/ /zla ba lnga la bab pa'i tsha? ni kha zas zhun mar dang/ 'o ma dang ldan par sbyin no/ /zla ba drug dang/ bdun la bab pa'i tshe ni thug pa bzang po dang/ gze ma la sogs pa'i sman mar
226a7(mdo 'grel): ?/ sngar bstan pas btab pa blud do/ /zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe/ kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par sbyin zhing/ til mar dang/ shing mngar dang/ 'o ma dang bskol te til mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i bcud mas btang ngo/ /de phan chad kyi kha zas ni
226b1(mdo 'grel): thug ba dang/ rkang 'gros dang/ ri dags skams na gnas ba'i sha khu snum che bas sbag cing zos na bzang ngo/ /de nas byis pa btsas na/ de'i lte ba sor brgyad tsam lus ba bcad de/ chu dro 'jam tsam gyis byis ba bkrus la/ zhun mar dang/ sgrang
226b2(mdo 'grel): rtsi cha mi mnyam pa mang du sbyar ba cung zad tsam khar gzhug go/ de nas gser gyi phye ma dang/ shu dag dang/ sman brasti dang/ a ru ra dang/ ru rta rnams kyi phye ma zhib mo zhun mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lnga gu 'am/ yang na gser gyi phye
226b3(mdo 'grel): ma/ sman bra mhi bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ sbyar ba las nyung ngu nyung ngu rgyun tu byin na/ bu de yid gzhungs shing/ mdog bzang bar 'ong ngo/ /bud med bu ma byung ba de ni/ thog ma bu byung nas zhag gsum 'am/ zhag lnga'i bar du /tril mar ram/
226b4(mdo 'grel): mar khu chod ran par blud cing/ kha zas snum bag yod pa sbyin no/ /sha ma 'byung du mi btub pa la ni/ bi pi ling la sogs pa'i sde tshan sngar bshad ba rnams kyi phye ma chad dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na 'bras kyi rtsa ba'i phye ma zho gnyis tsam
226b5(mdo 'grel): ba gcin rtsa bas skyur bo gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te blud na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba grangs tshang ba yang/ 'byung du mi btub pa la ni/ shing ba du sha ka'i rtsa ba dang/ lang ga li dang/ ba sha ka rnams las gang yang rung ba'i phye ma mar
226b6(mdo 'grel): dang sbyar bas mo mtshan dang/ lte ba bskus na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ khu byung ba'i 'og tu bud med la nang a la ka zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ de'i mtshan min snying na ba dang/ klad pa dang /klad ba chu sor zug cing na ba yin te/ de la nas tshig
226b7(mdo 'grel): 'khus pa'i thal ba mang ram yang na chu bskol ba dron po gang yang rung ba dang sbyar ba'am yang na pi pi la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba rgya mtsha dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na lu su'i 'bras bu bskol ba'i khu ba/ bu mang
227a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ tsha ba gsum dang /dri sna gsum zhes bya ba/ shing tsha dang/ sug smel dang/ gand+ha pa tra rnams kyi phye ma dang sbyar te blud do/ /yang na bu byung ba las nad du gyur pa la ni/ rtsa ba lnga bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du
227a2(mdo 'grel): lcags dmar po bsreg pa gzhug cing /de lta bur lan mang du byas pa 'am/ yang na chang gi nang du snga ma ltar lcags bsregs pa bcug ste/ blud na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bu'i ma 'am/ nu ma smun pa'i ma mas kha zas dang btung ba lci
227a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i bag zos shing 'thungs pa dang/ dus snga phyi dang/ tshad che chung/ zos shing 'thungs pas rlung la sogs pa'i nang gzhi gsum 'khrug nas nu zho ma rung bar gyur pa las ni/ bu la nang rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la
227a4(mdo 'grel): nu zho rlung gis ma rung bar byas pa'i mtshan ma ni/ nu zho nyid ro bska zhing chu'i nang du blugs na steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ba las rtogs par bya'o/ /nu zho mkhris pa las ma rungs par byas pa'i mtshan ma ni/ nu zho ro tsha skyur/ nu zho
227a5(mdo 'grel): chu'i nang du blugs na steng du ser po shar shar bor 'byung ba yin no/ /nu zho bad kan gyis ma rungs par byas pa'i mtshan ma ni nu zho skam zhing shin tu lci ba 'byar 'byar po chu'i nang du blugs na zhabs su 'bying ba yin no/ /nu zho nang gzhi rnams
227a6(mdo 'grel): kyis ma rungs par gyur pa ma yin pa tha ma la ni/ chu'i nang du blugs na chu dang 'dres par gyur cing /mdog skya bor 'dug pa yin no/ /de la nad gzhi rnams kyis nu zho ma rung bar gyur pa'i nyes pa bsal zhing slar gso ba'i thabs ni /bu'i
227a7(mdo 'grel): ma 'am ? bslun? pa'i ma ma thog mar /mar khu blud la/ de'i 'og tu pi pi ling gi phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi nimpa bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ sbyar ba'i skyugs sman blu de /skyug tu gzhug go/ kha zas ni mon sran sde'u? khu bcud dang/ sha khu
227b1(mdo 'grel): dang ldan par sbyin no/ /yang na nu zho ma rungs par gyur pa la ni/ tshos par byed pa'i sman/ brgi dang/ thang shing dang/ shu dag dang/ pa tha dang/ bong dkar po rnams bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/ yang na dod ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba
227b2(mdo 'grel): 'am/ yang na gla sgang la sogs pa sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs pas/ sbyangs bar bya'o/ /byis pa'i rims kyis thebs pa la ni/ 'bras brngos pa'i dang/ skyer khaN+Da dang/ kha ra dang /smyig rkang dang/ shing mngar rnams kyi phye ma cha bsnyamS
227b3(mdo 'grel): te/ sbrang rtsi dang/ sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na rims thams cad sel to/ /yang na pi pi ling dang/ bo nga dkar po dang/ bu bran shing rnams btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba 'am/ yang na bong da dkar po gcig pu'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lnga
227b4(mdo 'grel): gu byin na/ rims dang /lud pa dang/ skyugs ba'i nang rnams sel to/ /'bras yos dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ shing long kog rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na skyug pa'i nad sel to/ /smyig rkang dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ sbyar ba'i lde gu
227b5(mdo 'grel): byin na yang/ byis pa'i lud ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba'i nad sel to/ /'bras yos dang /rgyam tsha'i phye ma/ kha lung gi shing thog gi phye mas sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na 'bras yos dang/ kha ra dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ mar dang /sbrang rtsi rnams
227b6(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na yang skyugs pa dang/ skyigs bu'i nad sel to/ /pi pi ling chen po dang/ d+ha ha ki dang/ gseng phrom dang/ bilba dang /ba la ka rnams btags pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'am/ yang na sman de dag nyid bskol ba'i
227b7(mdo 'grel): khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba byin na/ phyis pa'i dmu rdzing dang/ lto ba cher skyes sel to/ /sa maM ga dang/ d+ha ta ka'i me tog dang/ thal tres dang /gseng phrom rnams bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te byin na yang dmu
228a1(mdo 'grel): rdzing sel to/ /byis ba rnams kyi mig nang dang/ ku ku la zhes bya ba dang/ bong tha ka zhes bya ba la ni/ la la bud dang/ byi dang ka dang kha la dang/ ldong ros dang /skyer pa dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ btsag yug snam rnams kyi phye ma'i
228a2(mdo 'grel): mik sman blugs par bya'o/ /yang na thang shing dang/ btsag dang /gla sgang rnams kyi phye ma/ ra'i 'o ma dang lhan cig tu btsags pa'i lde gus mig gi phyi rol bskus na mig nang sel to/ /byis pa'i khar 'brum pa byung ste bca' langs pa la ni/ shing
228a3(mdo 'grel): a sho tha'i shun lpags dang/ ru rta'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde guAm/ yang na skyer pa dang/ shing mngar dang/ a ru ra dang/ sna ma'i lo ma rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bsku bar bya'o/ /sman go'u ri dang/ shing mngar dang/
228a4(mdo 'grel): nye'u shing gi rtsa ba dang/ gser phrom dang/ sa la par+Na dang/ priSh+Na par+Na dang/ ra dza da na dang/ kha ra dan/ shug pa dang/ tsan dan dang/ rgun dang/ me tag pad+ma dang/ ku mu ta dang /utpal dang/ dzi ba ka dang /zang rtsi ba dang/ me ta dang /bu tshang
228a5(mdo 'grel): rto dang/ mar nye ba dang/ thal tres rnam gnyis dang /'di rnams kyi phye ma dang/ 'o ma srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis dang/ shun lpags rnams lnga zhes bya ba/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i shun lpags dang/ u dum+ba ra'i shun lpags dang /a shwat+tha'i
228a6(mdo 'grel): shun lpags dang/ ? shun lpags dang/ ba ta'i sa'i shun lpags rnams dang/ rtsa ba lnga pa dang/ 'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba mar gyi bzhi gyur gyi nang du bskol te/ mar nyi tshe lus pa btsags pa'i ming ni/ go'u re la sogs ?
228a7(mdo 'grel): sman mar zhes bya ste/ nang rgya hi ka zhes bya ba dang /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal dang/ btsa' nang khar 'brum pa 'ong ba dang/ gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bzang ste/ ran bar blud na byis pa'i nad do cog sel to/ /byis pa mtshan mo gnyid
228b1(mdo 'grel): log tu mi btub par du zhing nur mi btub pa dang/ dri ni zhim par gyur pa dang/ lus dang rkang lag g.yo ba la sogs pa tshul sna tshogs byed de/ so 'cha' zhing sen mo 'brad par byed pa rnams ni gdon nad las gyur pa yin te/ de la ni sgog skya dang/
228b2(mdo 'grel): nim pa'i lo ma dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ smyig ma'i shun lpags lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ yungs kar dang/ nimpa'i lo ma dang/ skyig ma'i shun lpags dang /rgya skyags rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa dang/ skra dang/ lha la
228b3(mdo 'grel): phul ba'i me tog rnying pa dang /yungs kar rnams lhan cig tu sbyar ba dang/ bdug pa sbyar ba rnam pa 'di gsum las gang yang rung ba mar dang sbyar te bsregs pa'i du bas bdugs na gdon thams cad sel to/ /shing sapta par+Na'i shun
228b4(mdo 'grel): lpags dang /murba dang /pu tse shal rnams btags pa'i phye ma chu dang sbyar bas byis pa'i lus dril na yang gdon thams cad sel to/ /ma d+hu ka'i me tog dang/ shing a shwat+tha dang/ sapta par+Na dang/ pe lu ka dang /'di rnams kyi lo ma lhan cig
228b5(mdo 'grel): bskol ba'i khu ba grang mos khrus byas na yang gdon sel to/ /yang na gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir las thams cad byed pa'i sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin pa dang/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi las rnams bya ba dang /sngags kyi skud ba gdags pa la sogS
228b6(mdo 'grel): pa bya'o/ /de la sngags ni/ na mo spag ba ste/ ga ru DA ya/ na ma stam ba ka ya/ satya satya ta nu te swAhA/ byis pa'i rgyud kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas las rnam lnga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /las rnams lnga ni/ skyug sman
228b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ bkru sman dang/ sman snar blugs pa dang/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba dang/ 'jam rtsi mas btang ba rnams yin par shes par bya ste/ de dag gi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /de la skyug sman mas btang ba'i thabs ni/ thog mar
229a1(mdo 'grel): sman bas/ nad pa mar dang/ til mar la sogs pa snum bag gang yang rung ba 'jam rtsi blud la/ de'i 'og tu dugs rnam lnga zhes bya ba khyim dron por lus mes bsro ba dang/ rdo bsregs pa'i steng du chu blugs
229a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i rlangs pas bdug cing rdul gdon pa dang/ nyi chan gyis bdug pa dang/ dugs kyi sman bsros pa'i phur mas dugs bya ba dang/ gos dang/ rdo la sogs pa bsros pa'i dugs rnam pa 'di lnga gang yang rung bas lus leg? ga par
229a3(mdo 'grel): dros par byas nas gos dron po bskon te/ skyug sman btang/ rkub rten pus mor phyin tsam gyi steng du bdug ste/ eraN+Da'i sdong bu 'am/ bya sgro la sogs pa 'jam pos gre pa nas dkrug cing /skyug tu bzhug go/ de la sgyug sman ni/ pi pi
229a4(mdo 'grel): ling dang/ po son cha dang/ rgyam tsha rnams kyi phye ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ shing mngar bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba 'di ni/ skyug sman gyi mchog yin te/ dron por 'og dros kyis gzung ste/ blung la skyug du bzhug go /yang na sbyar dug
229a5(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba/ 'bras dang til dang/ mon sran rde'u gsum bsregs pa'i thug pa/ po son cha dang/ legs par btsos pa'am/ yang na po son cha'i sa bon 'o ma dang sgyar te bskol ba 'am/ yang na pi pi ling la sogs pa'i skyug
229a6(mdo 'grel): sman sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa gong du smos pa rnams po son cha'i 'bras bu lnga bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te dron por 'thungs na snying tshim par skyug par 'gyur ro/ /ku? ba ro kha ba dang/ thang shing dang /dug mo nyung gi 'bras bu dang/ kri ta ?
229a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ d+ha ma rga ba rnams kyang smyug sman yin te /so sor po son cha dang 'dra bar sbyar ro/ /de nas skyugs pa'i rjes la/ mkhris pa byung ba dang/ lto dang/ snying kha dang /mgo bo yang bar gyur na skyug sman legs pa yin no/ /'di ltar ma gyur
229b1(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ skyug sman ma legs ba yin par bshad do/ /skyug pa'i tshod ma rig ste /grags na nang du 'gyur te/ de'i mtshan ma ni/ snying gar na ba dang/ glo 'grams pa dang/ mgul pa snang pa dang/ dran ba nyams shing myos pa dang/ lus 'dar ba dang/ /brag
229b2(mdo 'grel): skyug pa rnams las rtogs par bya'o/ /de la skyug sman ni /bad kan las gyur pa'i nad dang/ cham pa drag po dang/ gcin snyi ba'i nad dang/ mdze nad dang/ lkog nad lta 'or dang /dug 'thungs pa dang/ bsud pa rnams la nyams stobs dang
229b3(mdo 'grel): sbyar te/ btang bar bya'o/ /mig nad rab rib yod pa dang/ dmu rdzing can dang/ skran dang/ skom pa'i nang dang/ rtug skam gyi nad kyis nyam thag pa dang/ sbrum pa dang/ rlung nad can dang/ skya rbab kyi nad yod pa rnams la ni/ skyug sman du btang du
229b4(mdo 'grel): mi rung po/ /bkru sman btang pa'i thabs ni/ thog mar sar dang /til mar la sogs pa snum bag gang yang rung ba'i 'jam rtsi blud la/ de'i 'og tu sngar bshad pa bzhin du dugs kyis lus bsros te skyug sman btang la/ de'i 'og tu
229b5(mdo 'grel): bkru sman btang ngo/ /bkru sman btang ba'i thabs de ltar ma byas te/ cho ga log par byas na pho ba'i nad skyed par bshad do/ /de la mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi ni/ lto snyi'o/ /rlung dang bad kan can gyi rang bzhin can gyi mi ni lto srab yin no/ /nad
229b6(mdo 'grel): gzhi rnams stobs mnyam pa'i ? ni 'bring ste/ de dag la sman gyi tshong ci rigs par dpag cing btang bar bya'o/ /de la rlung las gyur pa'i nad kyis mnyam thag pa'i mi la/ bkru sman btang ba'i thabs ni/ shing nye rong dang/ rgyam tsha dang khab?
229b7(mdo 'grel): sga rnams kyi phye ma rtsabs skyur po 'am/ rkang 'gros dang/ ri dags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha'i khu ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te/ btung bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nang yod pa la ni/ shing nye rong phye ma sman nog mngar?
230a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ khab la sogs pa mkhris ba'i nad la phan ba'i sman gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i khu ba dang sar ba'i bkru sman btang bar bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur pa'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa la ni/ 'bras bu gsus bskol
230a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i khu ba/ cha ba gsum gyi phye ma dang ba gcin gyis sbyar ba'i bkru sman btang bar bya'o/ /pi pi ling dang/ bca' sga dang/ shing nye rod dang/ nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba rnams kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu 'di ni/ bad kan las
230a3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i nod tsog gi bkru sman gyi mchog yin te/ bza' bar bya'o/ /a ru ra dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ pi pi ling rnams kyi phye ma chus bskol ba'i dron po dang sbyar ba'i bkru sman lcags mnga' zhes bya ba 'di ni nang do tsog sel
230a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i bkru sman gyi mchog yin te btung bar bya'o/ /hwag srang gcig dang/ shing nye rong gi phye ma srang gcig dang/ pi pi ling gi phye ma zho gnyis dang 'di rnams sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'i bkru sman las ren par zos na yang nod
230a5(mdo 'grel): cog sel to/ /tsha ba gsum dang /danda'i rtsa ba dang/ shing nye rong dang/ a ru ra dang/ shing dod rnams kyi phye ma dang/ dri sna gsum zhes bya ba/ shing tsha dang/ sug smel dang /gand+ha pa tra rnams kyi btab la/ bu mar dang sbyar te/
230a6(mdo 'grel): gong bur dgongs pa'i bkru sman gyis kyang nad do cog sel to/ /dmu rdzing la sogs pa la ni/ shing nye rong dang/ shing dod kyi phye ma/ shing snu ha'i lo mas lan mang du bsgos la/ bu mar dang /sbrang rtsi sbyar te/ dri sna gsum gyis
230a7(mdo 'grel): btab ba'i lde gus bkru sman btang ngo/ /de nas khrus pa'i rjes la/ bad kan byung ba dang/ bkres par gyur pa dang/ lus yang ba dang /mdangs gsal bar gyur na bkru sman legs pa yin no/ /lus g.ya' ba dang/ lus la
230b1(mdo 'grel): thig le khra bor byung ba dang/ lus lci bar gyur pa rnams ni/ bkru sman ma legs pa'i mtshan mar shes par bya'o/ /bkru sman drags ba'i mtshan ma ni/ na ba dang/ brgyal ba dang /gzhang 'byung ba dang /rlung 'jug ba dang /dran pa nyamS
230b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ sha rjen bkrus pa'i khu ba 'dra ba 'thur du 'byung ba rnams yin no/ /de la bkru sman ni/ mdze dang/ gzhang 'brum dang /srin bu'i nad dang/ me dbal dang/ dreg dang skya sbabs kyi nang yod pa rnams la btang bar bya'o/ /zang kyi nang
230b3(mdo 'grel): yod pa dang/ rid pa dang /bud med sbrum ma rnams la ni/ bkru sman btang du mi rung ngo/ /skyug sman btang ba las ha cang mang du skyug cing/ 'chad du mi btub pa la ni/ sman pas bkru sman zhim zhing yid gar 'ong ba las chung zad tsam
230b4(mdo 'grel): byin na skyug pa 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /bkru sman btang ba las ha cang mang du 'khr zhing /'chad du mi btub pa la ni/ skyug sman cung zad btab na 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /bkru sman ha cang drags pa ni/ shug pa dang/ pu shel tse dang/ nag gi
230b5(mdo 'grel): sar dang/ tsandan rnams kyis lus byugs pa dang/ lus blugs pa dang/ btung ba rnams bya'o/ /sman snar blugs pa zhes bya ba ni/ mar dang/ til mar 'am/ sman snar blugs pa yin te/ de yang mar ram/ til mar nyi tshe snar
230b6(mdo 'grel): blugs pa dang/ sman mar ram/ sman gyi til mar blugs shing/ bad kan dang /chu ser sna nas drad ba dang/ snum gyis sna'i nang bsku ba dang/ sman gyi phur ma sna gor rtsir zhing blugs pa dang/ sman gyi phye ma lce'i nang du blugs te/
230b7(mdo 'grel): snar bud pa dang /rnam pa lnga yod bar shes par bya ste/ sman snar blugs pa'i rnam grangs de dag btang ba'i thabs ni/ nang thang ba'i nyin par/ zan ma zos pa'i snga rol du lag pa gnyis drag du drung pa'i? drod kyis 
231a1(mdo 'grel): kha sna dang /gdong thams cad legs par mnye zhing bsros la/ kha sna dang/ mtshul ba'i dri ma thams cad zhag par bsal nas mgo smad de btang bar bya'o/ /sman snar blugs pa'i cho ga byed pa des mgo bkru
231a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ khro ba dang/ nyal po dang/ nyin par gnyid log pa la sogs pa mi rung ba rnams spang bar bya'o/ /de la mar dang til mar snar blugs pa'i tshod ni/ thigs pa brgyad dam/ yang na mdzub mo'i tshigs pa gnyis phan cad /lan
231a3(mdo 'grel): gcig smyugs pa la ci chags pa snar blugs so/ /ched rnam gcig ni /srang phyed snar blugs pa yin no/ /tshad rnam gcig ni nyam stobs che chung las dpags te thigs pa bzhi 'am/ drug gam/ brgyad blugs par bya ste /tshad
231a4(mdo 'grel): kyi sna grangs mang po bstan pa 'di kun kyang nad ba'i nyam stobs che chung dang sbyar zhing btang bar bya'o/ /sman mar ram/ til mar snar blugs shing /bad kan dang chu ser sna nas drang ba ni nam tshong yan chad kyi nad rnams la
231a5(mdo 'grel): btang ba yin no/ /da ni sman mar gyi 'jam rtsi dang/ bcud mas btang ba'i cho ga bshad de /sman mas btang ba'i dpyad ni/ lcags dang zangs la sogs pa gang yang rung ba las byas pa'i gce'u sring sor bcu gnyis pa la/ gnag gi mjug
231a6(mdo 'grel): snying gi dbyibs bzhin du byin gyis phra zhing zlum par byas la/ rtsa ba spom pa ni the 'ong shong tsam du bya/ thor to phra mo ni sran shong tsam la/ 'jam por byas te/ thor to phra mo logs nas sor gsum gyi tshu rol du phang lo tsam zhig gagS
231a7(mdo 'grel): byas la/ rtsa ba sbom po logs kyi khar yang sman blugs pa'i snod gnag gi lgang pa bzang po dam por gdags shing/ lgang pa mi 'bud pa'i gags ci ran pa/ kha gnyis su bcad la/ de'i bar du lgang ba'i kha bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas sman?
231b1(mdo 'grel): btang ba'i tshe/ sngar kha zas zos nas glo g.yon phyogs kyi nyal la/ rkang pa g.yon pa ni brkyang /g.yas pa ni bskums te/ gzhang kha dang/ lce'u snum gyis byugs la/ sman shu ti dang /rgyam tsha'i phye ma mar ram /til mar dang/ chu dang ldan par bskol la/ mar nyi
231b2(mdo 'grel): tshe lus pa btsags pa 'am/ sman gzhan yang rung ste/ tshad srang gnyis sam/ srang gsum mam/ srang bzhi mi nyid kyi nyam stobs dang sbyar zhing/ tshong ran pa dang/ dron por mas btang zhing/ gce'u'i rtse mo nang du bcug la/ gags la thug par byas te/
231b3(mdo 'grel): lag pa g.yon bas gce'u'i skad ba nas dam du bzung zhing/ lgang ba'i nang du rlung ma song bar byas te/ ha cang mi drag yi ngal ba dang/ bar du mi gda' mi bcad cing/ rgyun chags par lan gcig gis rdzogs par lag pa g.yas pas lgang pa btsir la
231b4(mdo 'grel): rlung nad du mi 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ sman gyi lhag ma chung zad tsam lus par bya'o/ /sman btang zin nas/ gan rkyal du bsnyal te/ rkang lag bzhi char gyen du bteg la/ lan gsum gyi bar du drag tu brkyang zhing/ bskum pa byas nas/ kha sgrub tu zlog
231b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ bdag nyid kyi rting pas rkub tshos la lan gnyis gsum du brdabs la/ de'i 'og tu mi gzhan gyis rkang pa'i mthil du khu tshur gyi lan gnyis gsum du brdegs nas/ ro smang stod nyal du gzhug go/ /sman mar gyi cho ga 'di ni zhag lon gyi bar du 'gyil
231b6(mdo 'grel): te/ phyir ma bya? ba yang mi rung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas kyang yun ring du phyir 'byung du ma btub na/ phyis 'gag pa'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du /sman gyi reng bu mas gzhug pa'am/ yang na bkru sman 'jam pos myur du 'gyur zhing spyad bar
231b7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /ji ste? phyir ma byung yang mi bde ba 'am/ lci ba'i bag med cing /tha mal bar 'dug pa la ni/ bkru sman la sogs pa btang mi dgos te/ chu bskol ba'i dron po 'thungs pas kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la mar dang phyis 'dres pa 'byung ba
232a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ sman legs ba'i mtshan ma yin no/ /phyis ma 'dres par mar nyi tshe 'byung ba dang/ lus tsha bar gyur ba ni/ sman ma legs pa'i mtshan ma yin no/ phyis ni tha mal par byung la/ lto mi bde ba'i ?
232a2(mdo 'grel): tu ma gyur na yang me'i drod che bas sman khong du zhu bar gyur pa yin te/ mi rung ba med do/ /kha zas ni sman btang nas nam bkres par gyur na/ gdong yang zhing 'phrod pa'i bag las bza' o/ /sman mas btang nas ring po ma lon par phyir byung na sman don du ma
232a3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa yin te/ yang na cho ga snga ma bzhin du bzlas te btang bar bya'o/ /de la sman mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba/ bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i gnyi ga yang/ rlung nad kyi bag yod pa la btang bar bya'o/ /zang byed kyi nad dang/ mdze nad dang/
232a4(mdo 'grel): gzhang 'brum dang/ skyug pa'i nad dang/ gcin snyi ba'i nang dang/ dmu rdzing yod pa la sogs pa la ni btang du mi rung ngo/ /bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i cho ga ni/ sngar zhag gnyis gsum gyi snga rol du /sman mar gyi 'jam rtsi mas btang la bkru
232a5(mdo 'grel): sman drag po nyid mas btang ba'i nyin par/ nyi ma dron po la snga dro nas lus snum gyis byug cing mnye ba dang/ dugs sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu dros shing/ sha grol bar byas la /nad par nas kha zas kyi bag mi bza' mi btung bar/ nyi ma
232a6(mdo 'grel): phyad yol tsam na/ sman mas btang bar bya'o/ /de la btang ba'i thabs ni gan rkyal du bsnyal la/ sman mar gyi bcung mas btang ba bzhin du gce'u dang/ lgang bar sbyar nas/ sman ha cang mi tsha ha cang mi grang par dron por byas te/ lgad pa lag pas btsir la/
232a7(mdo 'grel): ha cang mi drag mi dal ba dang/ bar du mi gda' mi bcad par rgyun chags par lan gcig gis rdzogs par btang ngo/ /dri ma byung ba'i snod dam/ khung bu yang snga nas grub du bsnyen la/ sems gud du mi g.yeng bar sman lto na 'dug pa rnams
232b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung la thug go snyam du bsam pa gtang par bya'o/ /de la dbyung ba'i tshod ni/ sman mas btang nas yi ga'i 'bru sum cu drag dal ran tsam du brjod cing zin tsam na 'byung ba'i rigs te/ /tha mal ba cog cog por 'dug la dbang bar
232b2(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas nad ma phyin tam/ ma zhag par gyur na bsnan bzod dang mi bzod mi'i nyam stobs las spags te/ bzod pa 'dra na snga ma bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bsnan te/ bkrus nas/ de'i 'og tu/ chu dron
232b3(mdo 'grel): pos khrus byas la/ kha zas sha khu dang ldan pa bzang po zos nas de'i rjes la/ lus rlung 'jug pa lta na / de'i mod la mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba cho ga sngar bshad pa bzhin du bya'o/ /'phral du rlung 'jug
232b4(mdo 'grel): da'i dogs pa mar na/ zhag gnyis sam gsum gyis gcang de/ gdong mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ngo/ /bkru sman drag po khong du btang ba des ma byung na /gyis 'gags pa'i nad dang/ zug cing na ba dang/ lta spo ba
232b5(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa'i nad mang por 'gyur te/ nyin che bas na de la ni/ du 'gyur ran? pa'i dus las yal ma thag tu 'jam rtsi smon po mas btang ba dang/ bkru sman btung ba dang/ skrag par bya ba la sogs pa'i cho ga byas na bzang ngo/ /bkru
232b6(mdo 'grel): sman drag po mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di ni/ phan yon che zhing nyen yang che bas na/ gya tshom du btang du mi rung ste/ tshe? ga de la mkhas pa'i sman pa mang po chags pas legs par dpyad cing btang bar bya'o/ /de la bkru sman drag po
232b7(mdo 'grel): mas btang ba la ni/ sman ? bu ? spong drug dang/ mar ngam til mar cha gcig dang /sman gyi phye ma srang gsum dang /rgyal tsha dang/ sbrang rtsi ci ran pa dang /'di rnams ni spyi'i cho ga yin te/ gzhi 'di rnams kyi steng du /rlung dang /mkhris
233a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ bad kan gang gi sman du btang ba las/ de dag so so'i sman 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du bsnan te/ skam gsher spyid srang nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung bar grangs bkang zhing cho ga 'og nas rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du
233a2(mdo 'grel): sbyar ro/ /de la rlung nad bsal ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba ni/ rlung sel ba'i sman gang yin pa rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ shing nye rong gi phye ma dang/ rgyam tsha bro bcom dang/ rtsabs skyur po rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te
233a3(mdo 'grel): dran bor btang ngo/ /rgya shug la sogs ba'i sde tshan dang/ rtsa ba bcu dang/ rgya sran dang/ la bug skam po rnams las sna re re yang srang gnyis gnyis lhan cig tu chu phul gang la srang brgyad du rtsis pa phul tog drug cu rtsa bzhi'i
233a4(mdo 'grel): nang du bskol te/ tshul? brgyad cha gcig lus pa btsags pa dang/ shu dag dang/ u pa kuny+dzi ka dang/ pi pi ling dang/ shu ti dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ gla sgang nams kyi phye ma/ sbrang rtsi dang /rtsa bskyur bo dang/ ba gcin rnams sbyar ba'i/
233a5(mdo 'grel): bkru smon drag ba mas btang ba yang rlung nang sel bar byed do/ /mkhris pa bsal ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i sman ni/ shing n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ bu tshang rto la sogs pa'i sde tshan
233a6(mdo 'grel): btags ba'i phye ma dang/ mar dang/ 'o ma dang/ kha ra rnams sbyar ba btang na mkhris pa sel to/ /bad kan sel ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i sman ni/ dod ga la sogs ba'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba dang /pi pi ling
233a7(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa'i sde tshan btags pa'i phye ma dang kha gcin dang sbrang rtsi rnams te btang na bad kun sel to/ /pu tse shel dang /gla sgang dang/ pu shel ci dang/ bcod dang/ ba la dang /ra sna dang/ bu na rna ba dang/ bro ha tI dang/ sle tres dang
233b1(mdo 'grel): sa la br+No? dang/ pri'Na padNi? dang/ ba ru ra dang/ gze ma dang/ po son cha rnams las phra re re re lhan cig tu chu phul drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol te/ khu ba brgyad cha gcig lus pa btsags la/ 'o ma phul brgyad dang bskol te/ 'o ma nyi
233b2(mdo 'grel): tshe lus ba'i nang du/ gand+ha pri yaM gu dang/ shing mngar dang/ sha ti dang/ dug mo nyung? gi shun lpags dang/ ba ru ra rnams kyi phye ma zho gnyis gnyis dang/ rgyam tshe dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang /srog chags skam sa na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams
233b3(mdo 'grel): ci ran pa dang/ 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag po mas btang ba 'di ni/ rlung dang mkhris ba sel ba yin te/ ro tsa bar byed cing me drod shin tu bskyed pa dang na ba dang /skran dang/ glo rdol ba dang/ gcod chen po za byed kyi nad dang/ gcin
233b4(mdo 'grel): 'gag pa dang/ phyi sa 'gags pa rnams kyang sel to/ /sbrang rtsi dang /til mar cha bsnyams la de gnyis bsdoms pa'i tshad kyi kru trug tres bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ shu te'i phye ma srang gcig dang/ rgyam tsha zho gnyi 'di rnams sbyar
233b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i bkru sman drug po mas btang ba 'di ni cho ga bsrung mi dgos te/ ro tsa bar bya ba dang/ me'i drod bskyed pa dang/ sha skye bar bya ba dang/ phyi sa 'gag pa dang/ srin bu dang/ skran rnams bsal bal dge ba yin te /gnod pa'i nyen du mi
233b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /rtsi? dang/ mar dang /'o ma dang/ til mar rnams las srang gnyis gnyis dang/ snga ma'i 'bras bu dang/ rgyam tsha zho gnyis gnyis dang /'di rnam sbyar ba'i bkru sman drag bo mas btang ba ni/ brtag par byed pa'i mchog yin
233b7(mdo 'grel): te/ ? mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i ? dams? btang ba'i tshad ni sbyir srang gsum du bya'o/ /bkru sman drag po mas btang ba'i tshad ni/ de'i brgyad du bya'o/ /chos par byed pa'i sman dang /bkru sman gnyis la ni/ sman gyi phye ma srang re re btang ngo/
234a1(mdo 'grel): yang nyam stobs kyi ji tsas nus pa dang sbyar ro/ /ji ltar shing gi rtsa ba chus bran na/ lo ma sngo zhing snum pa skye ba de bzhin du me la yang mar gyi 'jam rtsi'i bcud mas btang ba dang /bkru sman drag po mas btang
234a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i cho ga 'di dag ltar btang na/ mdog snum zhing nyam stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /las rnams lnga'i le'u ste sum cu pa rdzogs so// //da ni cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /sgog skya la ni ro rnam pa drug las/
234a3(mdo 'grel): skyur ba ma gtogs par mngar ba dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang/ bska ba dang/ lan tshwa'i ro 'di lnga yang yod de/ de ni tshim pa med par byed pa yin no/ /de sman gzhan dang sbyar na nad gzhi gsum cha nga yang sel to/ /de la mi min pa nyam stobs skye bar
234a4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas ni/ dpyid zla 'bring po'i ro la bza' bar bya'o/ /nad yang pa la ni dus kun yang bza' bar bya'o/ /sgog skya zhar son cing rdo gu grur por gyur la/ skyon med cing yon tan dang ldan pa de nyid kyi khu ba cho ga bsrung bzhin du /nyin re zhing
234a5(mdo 'grel): zho gnyis gnyis kyis bskyed de btung par bya'o/ /de la srang gnyis sam bzhi 'am/ drug par du rab 'bring tha ma'i tshang las nyam stobs dang sbyar zhing btang bar bshad do/ /de la rlung dang bad kan gnyis laS ni/ sman pas rtsabs skyur po dang/
234a6(mdo 'grel): tshwa dang/ tshang la sogs pas dbul/ /mkhris pa la ni 'o ma 'am/ khu ba mngar bo rnams kyis dbul lo/ /kha zas ni gro las byas pa'i bag/ skab san gnas pa'i bya na sha gang yin pa rnams kyi sha khu dang ldan par za zhing /khro ba dang/
234a7(mdo 'grel): nyal po dang /mya ngan la sogs pa dang /sman dang/ kha zas mi 'ju ba rnams spang bar bya'o/ /de'i cho ga ni nang las dpag cing /zhag bdun nam bdun gnyis sam/ zhag bdun gsum gyi bar du tshad rab 'bring rnam pa gsum du
234b1(mdo 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /de la sgog spyi'i khu ba mar dang sbyar ba ni mkhris ba sel to/ /til mar dang sbyar ba ni bad kan dang rlung sel to/ /tshil 'am rkang dang sbyar ba ni glo brdol ba'am/ zad byed kyi nang las brta bar byed do/ /sgog skya zhib tu brdungs la lo
234b2(mdo 'grel): ma dang bskol te/ kha ra dang sbyar ba 'thung zhing /sman zhu ba'i 'og tu/ kha zas 'o ma'am/ sha khu dang ldan bar zos na/ khrag lung bas nyam thag ba dang/ zad byed kyi nad dang/ rlung nad dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ smyo byed dang/ brjed byed rnams sel
234b3(mdo 'grel): zhing tshe ga grugs byung ba dang/ zug cing na bar dang /srin bu'i nad dang/ khu ba zad ba dang/ mo gsham rnams la bzang ngo/ /gzhang 'brum can dang/ tshad pa be'u snabs su 'byung bas nyam thag pa dang/ 'bras kyi phreng ba yod pa dang/ lus shin tu
234b4(mdo 'grel): ring ba dang/ bud med sbrum ba dang/ bud med bu nu bzhin ba rnams kyis ni btung bar mi bya'o/ /kun dong ni sgog skya las chung zad tsam gyis mthu chung ste/ de yang cho ga bzhin du bza' bar bya'o/ /rlung nad tsam la ni/ e raN+Ta'i mar chad dang/
234b5(mdo 'grel): rtsa bas skyar po dang/ rtsa ba lnga ba bskol ba'i khu ba dang/ srog chags skams na gnas pa'i sha khu rnams las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te/ bsros la nyam stobs dang sbyar zhing /tshod ran par btung bar bya'o/ /e raN+Ta'i mar 'bras bu
234b6(mdo 'grel): gsum bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te btang na /bad kan dang mkhris pa sel to/ /rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te btang na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad sal to/ /ra'i 'o ma 'am/ rgun chang gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te
234b7(mdo 'grel): 'thungs na gcin sgri ba dang/ rde'us 'gags pa sel to/ /'o ma dang sbyar na rlung sran sel to/ /mig ser dang/ skya rbab dang/ tshad bar 'khru ba dang/ skyug pa dang /mdze dang /rims dang /bad kan nyi tshe dang/ khrag lus pa nyi tshen pa rnamS
235a1(mdo 'grel): kyis ni bcung bar mi bya'o/ /go bye'i cho ga ni go bye'i 'bras bu lnga chog bzhin du /ba'i gcin gyi nang du bskol te/ bzhi cha lus nas mnyes la/ tshig ma bor ba'i khu ba grang mo mchu dang rkan mar gyis
235a2(mdo 'grel): bskus te/ btung zhing thabs de ltar nyin gcig bzhin du/ go bye'i 'bras bu lnga lngas bskyed/ go bya'i 'bras bu bdun cu la thug gi bar du /snga ma bzhin du btung/ /de nas nyin re bzhin lnga lngas phri ste/ 'brum bu lnga la thug nas
235a3(mdo 'grel): slar yang de bzhin du bskyed cing dbri'o/ /sman 'thungs pa zhu bar gyur pa'i 'og tu kha zas ni 'bras chan grang mo mar dang 'o ma bskol te bsgrangs pa dang ldan par bza' bya ste/ sman bcud kyi len gyi tshig 'di ni/ yid gzhungS
235a4(mdo 'grel): par byed cing /gnyer ma dang/ skra dkar med par byed la/ mdze dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ khrag tshang dang srin bu'i nyes pa rnams sel to/ /khu chul nad yod par gyur pa yang sbyong bar byed do/ /go bye'i mar nyam stobs dang sbyar zhing/
235a5(mdo 'grel): zla ba gcig gi bar du ran bar 'thungs na/ nad kyi gnod pa thams cad las thar te/ lus brtan por lo brgya'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /me gzhugs pa'i dang/ nyi ma 'deb dang/ nyen par gnyid log pa dang/ 'bru mar dang/
235a6(mdo 'grel): kha zas lci ba rnams ni spang bar bya'o/ /sman gyi mjug bcad nas kyang ji srid kyi bar du sman btang ba'i dus kyi gnyis 'gyur gyi bar du cho ga bsrung bar bya'o/ /mkhris pa shas tshe ba'i mi la ni/ sman 'di byed pa'i tshe khar 'brum
235a7(mdo 'grel): pa 'byung ba dang/ las skrung ba dang/ rims la sogs pas 'debs par 'gyur te/ de lan sman bsil ba'i lde gu 'am khu ba grang mos lus byug pa dang /steng du blugs pa dang/ btung ba rnams bya'o/ /pi pi ling bskyed pa'i
235b1(mdo 'grel): chog ni/ 'o ma bskol te phyed du nas phyung ba'i nang du /pi pi ling 'brum bu lnga btags te btung zhing /de ltar zhag bcu'i bar du nyin re zhing / pi pi ling 'brum bu lnga lngas bskyed de btung bar bya'o/ /de nas nyin re zhing pi pi ling lnga lngas phri ste/ pi pi ling
235b2(mdo 'grel): 'brum ba lnga la thugs nas yang /snga ma bzhin du bskyed cing phril/ kha zas 'o ma dang ldan par bza' zhing cho ga bsrungs na/ dreg dang/ skya rbab dang/ skran dang/ gzhang 'brum dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ spang ba dang/ dmu rdzing rnams sel cing/
235b3(mdo 'grel): rims ldang dub kyis dus mi 'dra ba med par byed de/ /ro tsa bar 'gyur ro/ /khrag zhun gser dang/ lcags la sogs pa las 'byung ste/ de dag ni mthu dang ldan zhing /de dag gi mdog dang 'dra la/ ba gcin gyi dri bro ba dang/ snum zhing lci la
235b4(mdo 'grel): rdo med pa bzang ste/ des chu chus bkru ba dang/ ba gcin gyi nang du mnye bas cho ga bzhin du btul nas/ de'i phye mas nad gzhi gsum gang gi sman du btang ba de'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu bas lan mang du bsgo zhing skam la/

235b7(mdo 'grel): mang dang spyad? na nad tsog sel to/ /sgyu ru? ra'i cho ga ni/ skyu ru ra'i khu ba phul gang la/ srang brgyad du rtsis pa'i phul bcu drug btsags la/ bum pa sbrang rtsis bsprus? pa'i nang du blugs te/ kha bcad nas yun ring du bzhag la
