240a1(mdo 'grel): srad gsum/ lgang srad gcig/ pi pi ling srang gcig/ na le sham srang gcig/ nA ga ge sar phye? ma zho bzhi/ pho ba ris dkar po zho ngo/ /sdig srin rwa zho do/ /dug zho ngo/ /'di dag thams cad phye ma zhib ? ?
240a2(mdo 'grel): bu ram srad lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang bsres te/ gang gis zos pa de me stobs su 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /mdze nad bco brgyad nyams par 'gyur ro/ /thang byed kyi nad dang/ glo dang dbugs dang/ de bzhin du
240a3(mdo 'grel): mchin nad dang/ skya bab da/ 'bras dang/ rlung nad dang/ sbrul dang/ srin bu lU ta dang/ dug nad sel par byed do/ /de bzhin du brtan pa dad g.yo ba 'ang ngo/ /stobs glang po che dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /
240a4(mdo 'grel): shugs rta lta bur 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gcig gis mer 'gyur ro/ /rna pa phag lta bur 'gyur ro/ /mig bya rgod lta bur 'gyur ro/ /'di thams cad kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i ril
240a5(mdo 'grel): bu yongs su rdzogs so// //na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma ShtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ya mahA yak+Sha se na pa ta ya/ tadya thA/ oM dzwa ra gri Nu dzwa ra gri Nu gardza gardza/ ts+tshardu ts+tshardu/ muny+dza muny+dza/ nyin
240a6(mdo 'grel): gcig pa dang/ nyin gnyis pa dang/ nyin gsum pa dang/ nyin bzhi pa dang/ rims mi zad par rnams/ a Ta ha Ta phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/ hu ru hu ru/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ si ri muny+tsa ka NAM muny+tsa? ha? zhi da yaM muny+tsa
240a7(mdo 'grel): muny+tsa/ Da da ra muny+tsa/ ka buM? muny+tsa muny+tsa kaN+Tha muny+tsa/ hasta muny+tsa/ bA do muny+tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT che ge mo'i rims nyams par gyis shig swAhA/ rims bzlog pa'o/ /dbang po'i nas dang/ zhu mkhan dang/ bu she ci dang ma sar?/
240b1(mdo 'grel): spos dkar/ pa ma/ bI tA/ ni ba Ta'i 'dab ma rnams/ gcig tu byas nas btags te gdong la byugs na gdong zla ba lta bur 'gyur ro/ /kA ma yA'i rtsa ba gtsug tu bcings na gnyid du 'gyur ro/ /ku thA? rats+tshin+na'i tsa ba khar bcug na ral
240b2(mdo 'grel): gri la sogs pa zlog par byed do/ /a laM mu ShA'i rtsa ba rna ba gnyis la bcings na rims nyin bzhi pa nyams par byed do/ /dur khrong du skyes pa'i dro Na puShpa'i khu bas mig? bkang na mig? me tog sel bar byed do/ /k+Shu? ra a si ni ka'i
240b3(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba dang/ gi wa da lhan cig btags nas thig le byas na/ rgyal po'i sgor mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /sh+ri gA la bastu kA'i rtsa ba rna ba la bcings na mig nad sel bar byed do/ /sa kho Ta ka'i rtsa bas/ mgul nad sel bar byed do/ /b+hu mi
240b4(mdo 'grel): tsam pa ka'i rtsa ba btags nas btungs na lto ba'i zug sel bar byed do/ /dka' thub pa'i chu 'ongs pa dang/ 'bras sA li dang/ 'bras thug po che dang/ ka ra dkar po dang lhan cig btungs na bud med rnams kyi khrag 'bab pa sal bar
240b5(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /tri? sh+ru li ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na glang po che dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bri ha tI dkar po'i rtsa ba 'bras thug po che'i chu dang btags nas btungs na rde nad sel bar byed do/ /su bAN+Na se phA li ka'i rtsa ba dar ba dang lhan cig btags nas byugS
240b6(mdo 'grel): par byin ni khya rngo? sel bar byed do/ /mngon par bgrod pa'i dus su agni bastu ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na mod la bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/ /a la mu ShA'i rtsa ba kaM ji ka dang btags nas mgo bo la byabs na mgo'i nad sel bar byed do/ /arka dkar
240b7(mdo 'grel): po'i rtsa pa dang ba dad btags nas btungs na mig ser sel bar byed do/ /nA ga lam dza ti'i rtsa ba khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ 'o ma dang lhan cig zos nas chags par byas na bu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /b+ho dza nany+tsa e ka ba la yA dugd+hi? na sa ha kA ra ya to?
241a1(mdo 'grel): mkhan pa'i rtsa ba dang/ dro Na puShpa'i rtsa ba dang/ yung ba dang/ 'bras thug po che lhan cig byas nas/ dril phyi byas te/ chus bkrus na gsal por smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nAg ge sar dang/ s+tha
241a2(mdo 'grel): la kum+b+hwi? dang/ nA ga da ma na ka dang/ da ma na ka puShpa rnams kyi rtsa bas dril phyi byas te chus bkrus na/ klu nor rgyas kyi bu 'ang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /na mashtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tadya thA/ yan?
241a3(mdo 'grel): le a na le tu tu swAhA/ /sngags 'di tsha ba'i til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas te/ rkang pa gnyis la byugs na dpag tshad du mar mi ngal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas pas so/
241a4(mdo 'grel): mkha' 'gros rnams kyis phyag rgya 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcings pa grol ba las bzlas bar bya'o/ /na ma:ku su nA li kA ya hi ma ra dU re sa ba ri swAhA/ byi ba sgrib par byed pa'i sngags so/ /a pA marga'i rtsa ba la bdun bsngags pa'i srang
241a5(mdo 'grel): bu yongs su bcings na rims nyin gcig pa sel bar byed do/ /ba rA ha krAn+ta'i rtsa ba lag pa la bcings na lang tsho nyams pa la'ang bu 'byung ngo/ /daN+Do tpa la'i rtsa ba dang/ ge wang lhan cig btags nas thig la byas te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/
241a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i pho brang la sogs pa yul 'khor gyi skye bo dga' bar ngag gnon? ba 'gyur ro/ /ka ko la'i rtsa ba phrang bar byas na so'i zug rngu sel bar byed/ /ta dra s+thA kri ma ya:nA sha ya ti/ b+h+ri ga ra dza'i rtsa ba dang/ a pa ra dzi ta'i rtsa ba dang/ me tog phyungs
241a7(mdo 'grel): te mgrin bar bcings na lkog 'bras sel bar byed do/ /bsdu ka'i rtsa ba pA sa'i chu dang bcas ba btungs na skya rbab kyi nad sel bar byed do/ /tik+ta la shu'i rtsa ba kany+dzi ka dang btags te spyi bor byugs na mgo bo'i zug sel bar byed do/ /su bar+Na se phA li
241b1(mdo 'grel): ka'i rtsa ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btungs na/ dri chu 'gags ba sel bar byed do/ /si dza'i rtsa ba bu ram dang lhan cig zos na gnyid du 'gyur ro/ /ba Ta'i rtsa ba btags nas byin na mig ser sel bar byed do/ /kaN+Ta kA ra'i rtsa ba rked ba la bcings na mig nad sel bar
241b2(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /sUm bat+ta dang/ b+hany+dza na'i rtsa ba btags nas lga'i khu ba dang/ rgyam tsha dang/ til mar lhan cig bsres te rna ba bkang na/ rna ba'i zug rdu sel bar byed do/ /kriSh+Na sA ka'i rtsa ba btags na sa'i zug rngu sel bar byed do/ /guny+dza'i rtsa ba dum
241b3(mdo 'grel): bu bdun du byas nas srad bu bdun rked par bcings na gzhang 'brum gyi nad sel bar byed do/ /na ba ma li'i rtsa ba ma bkrus pa bya rog mi sgrag pa'i dus su bde bar phyung nas srad bu bdun dang bcas pa rked par bcings na tsitUn sel bar ma ru mgo? nag
241b4(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /paTya'i la ka'i rtsa ba'i so shing zos na mig ser sel bar byed do/ /snga'i? rtsa ba bkol nas btungs na mdze nang sel bar byed do/ /skyu? ru ra dang nim pa'i lo ma lhan cig btags nas zos te/ sA kho Ta ka'i rtsa ba dang/ kany+dzi ka btags nas byugS
241b5(mdo 'grel): na rlung 'bras sil? bar byed do/ /sa Na'i rtsa ba sa gyi dang lhan cig zos na dbang po'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'dab ma dang bcas pa'i dman ka'i rtsa ba btags nas btungs na yongs su 'gyur ba'i zug rdu sel bar byed do/ /su war+Na se phA li
241b6(mdo 'grel): ka'i rtsa ba khar bcug na rgyan rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ba so rta ra'i si pha phyung nas lte ba'i phyogs su bcings na bud med bde bar bca' bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dza yan+ti'i rtsa ba khar bcug na tha snyad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ba rA ha krAn+ta'i rtsa ba lag pa la
241b7(mdo 'grel): bcings na tha snyad kyis ma thub par 'gyur ro/ /a ba ra dzu ta'i rtsa ba skor ma rgyal la phyung nas/ ras bal la snum byugs te dud pa dbab bar bya'o/ /des mig sman byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /kunpa'i rtsa ba skar ma rgyal la byung
242a1(mdo 'grel): ste/ brra sA dka' i gnas su bzhag na tshong rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ma yur si dA'i rtsa ba dang gi khu ba dang btags nas sar mol byugs na bud med 'dzag par the tshom med do/ /rA ma ra ti'i rtsa ba 'dab ma
242a2(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa btags nas se phal byugs na bud med 'dzag go/ nA ga ge sar gyi yu ba/ rma bya'i? gtsug phud a sho ka'i rtsa ba dang/ so rtsi dang chang gang la sbyin pa de'i a mats+tshe ka zhi bar byed do/ /su ri dang su nA la so rtsi bcos
242a3(mdo 'grel): ba zos na/ /bu pa rangs ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /d+h+ring+ga rA dza'i rtsa ba rang gi khu ba da' btags pas mig sman byes na/ gang dang gang mthong ba de dang de dbang du byad do/ /rang gi khrag dang/ gi wang gis thig le byas na
242a4(mdo 'grel): bud med gang mthong ba de dbang du byed do/ /byi tang ga dang/ nga? mo sha b+hal+lA ta ka dang/ tsi tra ka dang/ a b+ha yA dang/ sa nA ga rA ngang mnyam pa'i ril bus mar gsar lhags na gang ngal bar 'gro ba'i skyes bu de rlung dang mtshungs
242a5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /bud shing ge khu ba dang/ 'bras bu gsum dang/ lcags kyi phye ma dang/ 'dam gyi pad+ma dang/ b+h+ring+ga'i khu bas kyang ngo/ /arma pab+hu dza na mos ba ni Sh+TaM/ rany+dza ti ke sha ka pA la na seDd+ha haM/ guny+dza dkar
242a6(mdo 'grel): po'i rtsa ba skad ma rgyal byung nas/ te na daSh+Ta ka sya na saM kA ya(mdo 'grel): pra Ta pra dot+te? tsan+tsha te/ guny+dza dkar po'i rtsa ba rked ba la bcings na/ bdag nyid kyi khrag sel bar byed do/ /de'i rtsa ba skye gnas la byug par byin na mngal bsdamS
242a7(mdo 'grel): pa btsal bar byed do/ /guny+tsha dkar po'i rtsa ba phye ma zhib mor byas nas ma he'o 'o ma la bcug na zho smin par 'gyur ro/ /sA pho TA ka'i 'o ma thig pa gnyis bcug ste /legs dan smin pa nyi ma gsum pa la bsrubs pa'i ?
242b1(mdo 'grel): gsar blangs te/ dar ba/ takrany+tsa dza hwa sA pa ya/ me tog dkar po gtor bar bya'o/ /nyi ma gzhan la de'i me tog nag por 'gyur ro/ /mar sar des thod par mig sman du 'gyur ro/ /dzaM bI ra'i rtsa ba btags na/ dzin+ti ka'i nad
242b2(mdo 'grel): sel bar byed do/ /pa nag pa ti ka'i rtsa ba btags na/ bems po'i nad sel bar byed do/ /ri tu bI tI'i 'byung po'i nyi ma bzhi pa la nA ga ge sar gyi lo ma dang/ kha dog gcig pa'i ba'i 'o ma btungs na/ nyi ma bzhi pa la
242b3(mdo 'grel): skyes bu'i mdze nad sel bar 'byed da/ /skyu ru ra ge sar las skyes pa'i khu ba dang lhan cig lcags kyi snod du btags te/ mig sman byas ni rab rib sel bar byed do/ /pU narna wa'i rtsa ba dang/ so so b+hany+dza na'i rtsa ba dang/ /
242b4(mdo 'grel): 'bras thug po che'i chu dang btags nas de nyid btungs na mkhris pa sel ba'i mchog go/ tanDu? li ka'i rtsa bas mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon ngag gis bzung ba'i snying gi zug rngu sel bar byed do/ /kany+tsa nA'i rtsa ba dang/ shun pa dang/ ngar
242b5(mdo 'grel): ba mnyam par btungs na zas kyis ba rnangs pa sel bar phyed do/ /a'i shwa ra'i rtsa pa dang kany+dzi ka btags nas byugs na/ gdug pa'i rma sel bar byed do/ /de bzhin du gdug pa'i rma'i gnas su byug par yang bya'o/ /tri sU li
242b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba btags nas byug par byin na/ dug nad sel bar byed do/ /taN+Du li k+Sha'i 'dab ma dang bcas pa'i rtsa ba dang/ agni bastu ka'i rtsa ba'i khu ba btags nas lus la byugs na bcud skam sel bar byed do/ /su nga rsha ka'i rtsa ba
242b7(mdo 'grel): btags nas byugs na/ mig nad zhi bar byed do/ /? dze twe'i?  rtsa ba ras bal la bcings na tha snyad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /a shwa ganpha'i rtsa ba mar dang lhan cig btungs na/ mngal brtan par byed pa'i mchog go /su ra b+hi ta ga r?
243a1(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba btags nas byugs na/ srin bu lU ta'i dug sel bar byed do/ /gi ri kar+Ni ka'i rtsa ba btags na/ lkog 'bras sel bar byed do/ /utpal sngon po dang/ gnan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsa ba sro rtsa? ?
243a2(mdo 'grel): byin na dbang du byed pa'i mchog go/ a bA mArga'i rtsa ba dang/ rgyam tsho dang/ kam dzi ka lhan cig zangs kyi snod du sbyar nas mig sman byas na mig tshag pa sal bar byed do/ /dza yan+ta'i rtsa pa til mar gyis sman? par
243a3(mdo 'grel): byas nas zos na bcud nyams par byed do/ /ka rany+dza'i rtsa ba dang/ ma hA kA la'i rtsa ba dang/ Ta Nu la'i chu btung bar byin na/ sa'i dug sel par byed do/ /de bzhin du pu na rna bA dkar po'i rtsa ba phyung nas sna bug tu
243a4(mdo 'grel): byin na/ gdug pa'i dug sel bar byed do/ /dA thA'i rtsa ba dar ba dang lhan cig btungs na tshang pas 'khrub sel bar byed do/ /man? rA'i rtsa ba'am dang lhan cig btungs na rlung nad sel bar byed/ /arka'i rtsa ba dang/
243a5(mdo 'grel): ri Shi pU To li ka'i rtsa ba sa bon dang lhan cig chu mnyam bar byas nas chu dang btags te bshad lam du byugs na/ gzhang 'brum sel bar byed do/ /dri suA? li ka'i rtsa ba'i ma dang btags te/ gi wang dang lhan cig
243a6(mdo 'grel): zangs kyi snod du bzhag nas mig la byugs na/ rab rib sel bar byed do/ /a rung dang/ zhu de khan dang/ lung thang gi 'dab ma dang/ shing kun dang/ shu thag rnams chu dang lhan cig btags nas gal
243a7(mdo 'grel): te sos btab na 'chi ba de'i tshe yang 'di byin ni rnal du gnas bar 'gyur ro/ /ko ki lAk+Sha'i rtsa ba dang/ gu? bU tsI? dang/ ba sha ka dang/ dbyug pa'i utpal dang/ su wa rtses phwa li ka'i sa bon dang/ gi ha to'i? rtsa ba dang/ che mnyam
243b1(mdo 'grel): par byas nas yungs kar gyi snam dang lhan cig btungs na/ rkang bam dang/ rlung nad sel bar byed do/ /go dzi? hwa'i rtsa ba dar ba dang lhan cig pa tungs na/ rker ba'i nad sel bar byed do/ /utpa la'i rtsa ba da'i mar dang lhan cig btungs
243b2(mdo 'grel): na briSha Na'i rlung sel bar byed do/ /ku dza Ta'i rtsa ba phyir mar byas nas sprang dang lhan cig byin na rtsa'i rma sel bar byed do/ /pa ra me swa ra'i rtsa ba dang/ shu thag byugs na 'bras sel bar byed do/ /su N+Di kA'i rtsa ba dang/ lga dang lhan cig
243b3(mdo 'grel): lag pa la byugs na/ me rengs par byed do/ /band+hu ki'i rtsa ba snar byin na sna nang sal bar byed do/ /ba rA ha krAn+ta'i rtsa ba yungs kar gyi mar dang lhan cig khar ba nug na/ skye bo thams cad kyi mig 'ching bar byed do/
243b4(mdo 'grel): pA ThA mU laM/ oM khang+ga wA ri NI swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis kha la btab nas mtshon bza' bar bya'o/ /a ga ru dang/ gu gul dang/ shI wA sa dang/ tsan dan dang/ ne pA li ? 'dab ma dang/ ni mAs rnams bu
243b5(mdo 'grel): ram dang lhan cig cha mnyam par byas nas bdag nyid bdugs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin na skye bo thams cad kyis de'i dri snom par byed cing/ thams cad mdag gzhug tu 'gyur ro/ /til nag po dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ b+h+ring+ga rA dza dang/ /
243b6(mdo 'grel): 'di dag cha mnyam par byas nas mar dang lhan cig zos na skra dkar dang/ rab rib dang/ skya rbab rnams sel bar byed do/ /kA kA dze gta'i rang bzhin bshad par bya ste/ span? chen po kA ka dzigta a ti bA lA/ de bzhin du ba la NaM dang/ pa raN+Du'i
243b7(mdo 'grel): 'dab? mdod?/ khu ba dang/ yungs kar dkar po dang/ matDa? ka'i ril mar bra gang gis smin par byas te/ 'dis rtsa ba bkrus na chu klung gi shugs kyang zhi bar byed do/ /kA ka dza g+hA'i khu ba blangs te/ 'di'i rtsa ba dang btags nas rma la btab//
244a1(mdo 'grel): na/ rma gso ba'i mchog go/ 'di'i 'dab ma dang/ 'bras brug bo che'i chu dang btags te bkrus shing bskums nas rma tig mar gyis bkang na/ rtsa gso ba'i mchog go/ 'di'i 'dab ma'i dbu
244a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ ba lang gi chu lhan cig khas bzung na kha'i nad sel bar byed do/ /kAka dzaM g+ha dang/ skyu ru ra dang/ ba ru ra dang/ b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu ba blangs nas/ til gyis til mar gyis smin byas na khi nya 'phel bar byed do//
244a3(mdo 'grel): thos ba rengs ba sel bar byed do/ /sbrang dang lhan cig gis lkog 'bras sel bar byed do/ /b+hal+lA ta ka dang/ lhan cig zos na mdze nad sel bar byed do/ /mar sar dang lhan cig gis skyes bu'i nang sel bar byed do/ /
244a4(mdo 'grel): spos dkar dang lhan cig gis mtshan bar rdol ba sel bar byed do/ /khaN+Da dang lhan cig gis kha nad sel bar byed do/ /ba'i chu dang lhan cig gis me dpal sel bar byed do/ /'phags pa rtsa ba'i mdzod sman chen
244a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rim ba slob dpon dpal ldan 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs so// //pri yaM gu dang/ ka ko la dang/ shu dag dang/ ru rta dang/
244a6(mdo 'grel): yungs karpa dkar po dang/ nA ga buShpa dang/ spos dkar rnams kyi bdug pa byas na myur du tshong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sgog ba zos nas a ru dang/ ku Ta btags na dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /chad btungs nas du rba btags na dri ma med
244a7(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /kha ro lA'i khu ba btab na chad dkar por 'gyur ro/ /yang/ so so bI ra btab na rang bzhin du gnas bar 'gyur ro/ /kA ra sum kha dkar bo'i rtsa ba dang rma bya'i gtsug phud kyi rtsa ba dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub ba dkar po'i
244b1(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba rnam gcig tu byas nas btags te grib ma la bskams pa'i ril bu khar ba cug cib/ lus la byug su byas na g.yu las mtshon cha bzlog par byed do/ /skyu ru ra'i rtsa ba dang/ me tog byung nas khar bcug na g.yul
244b2(mdo 'grel): mtshon cha rengs bar byed do/ /u d+d+had+d+ha ga li taM ba nA ni sik+ta mrit+ti kAM gri hya dabto da ra ma rhye prakI sya ya ta gri ha phaT la s+tha yeta/ ta tra iSh+mi kA ya ta n+ti/ tsa tu rda sh+yAM/ ba hu bA ra brik+Sha sya dak+Shi Na sA khAM gri hya ka ra yi trwA sh+rid+ga ma tI sh+na sha nagni/
244b3(mdo 'grel): tatpi taM/ phug ron gyi brun dang/ lham bu chug sher gyi chu dang/ gu gul dang/ shing cha dang/ na gi dang/ ru rta dang/ ga na ka'i sa bon dang/ 'di dag gis bdugs pa'i ril bu sbyar te/ bdug spos 'dis rnyed
244b4(mdo 'grel): pha dang bcas pa'i tshod 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM na mo tsaN+Da ku Sha ku ru ku ru swAhA// //'di ni byams pa gling gi gzims khang du rgya dpe bzhugs pa las chos rje?  rin po che ngag gi dbang
244b5(mdo 'grel): phyug bsod nams rnam rgyal dpal bzang po'i bka' bzhin du/ zhal lu lo rtsa ba dag slong chos skyong bzang pos rgya dpe bzhin ji ltar go ba rnams bsgyur ba'o// //bla ma dang rgyas sman gyi bla
244b6(mdo 'grel): drang srong tshe'i rigs byed 'dzin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog mar nad kyi mtshan nyid brtag pa ni/ /pho ba'i nad rnams rlung la brten/ sems 'khrul pa dang zar zir 'byung ba mkhris pa la brten/ rang bzhin gyis 'khrul
244b7(mdo 'grel): ba bad kan la brten/ tshad pa ma 'ju ba la brten/ rlung gi tshad pa'i nad yun gyi tshad zhag bdun/ mkhris tshad zhag bcu/ bad kan tshang bzhag bcu gnyis/ ` rlung tshad kyi rtag pa ni/ tshigs rnams brdungs pa lta bur ?
245a1(mdo 'grel): g.yal stong 'byung zhing bya snyong byed snying 'dod/ grang shum shin tu che/ lus kyi ba spu ldang/ mgo dang chu rgyas rtsibs logs mur gong rkang mthil rnams lhag par na/ sgrag pa yang yang 'byung/ rna ba?
245a2(mdo 'grel): kha lor bska/ mig dang sen mo shin tu dmar/ lus la rdul 'byung/ de rnams tshan ba'i shas chen nges par rlung dang ldan pa'o/ /rtags de rnams shas che zhing rtsar mkhris pa dang bad kan gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus
245a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i rtags so/ /` mkhris tshad kyi rtags la/ chu yang yang 'tshag snying 'dod cing btags cho na zug kyang cung zad 'byung lus drod shin tu che/ mchu skam/ kha'i nang dang lce sogs la thor pa chung du mang du 'byung/ sna khrag 'bab
245a4(mdo 'grel): mig mnan pa lta bu 'degs dka' / gos gon 'bud byed snying 'dod/ /mig dang sen mo mdog ser/ kha nas dri ngan pa 'byung/ khar ro kha/ de rnams tshang ba'i shas chen mkhris pa ldan pa'o/ /rtags 'di rnams shes che zhing
245a5(mdo 'grel): rtsar rlung rtsa dang bad kan gnyis ka 'dug na 'dus pa'i nad kyi rtags so/ /` bad kan gyi rtags la/ lus dang shes pa lci bas gang yang byed mi 'dod pa/ dangs kha 'gags shing bras gang la'ang bro ba med/ mig
245a6(mdo 'grel): mnan ba lta bur lci ba/ lus rtsa ba yaM byad/ lus la drod cung zad yod pa/ sems rtsa 'khrug/ nyal snying 'dod/ kha la ro sgyur/ mchil ma mang du 'byung zhing sgyur dgos ba/ lus mdog mdangs med thal kha dang tshi
245a7(mdo 'grel): che/ mig sen mo'i mdog ljang/ de rnams tshad ba'i shes chen bad kan yin zhing/ gong gi rtags rnams phal cher tshan la rtsar chung dang mkhris pa gnyis ka ldan pa 'dus ba'i rtags so/ /da gzhan yang 'dus ba'i rtags pa gtan
245b1(mdo 'grel): chal chol smra/ gnyid che/ mig dmar zhing mchi ma 'dzag/ lce 'gas so/ /` nad glo bur ba'i rtags la/ mig mdangs nas blta nanwa? che zhing g.yo 'gul nyung/ lus sdong mi tshugs so/ /de ltar rtags dang rtsa mthun na rkang pa
245b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ dper na rlung gi rtags la mkhris pa'i rtsa/ mkhris pa'i rtags la rlung gi rtsa lta bu 'dug na mkhris rlung ste des rigs bsgres te shes par bya'o/ /` rtsa la brtag pa la/ rtsa pa rlung mkhris bad kan gsum gyi rtsa/ de
245b3(mdo 'grel): las gyes pa bcu bzhi ste/ rlung gi gnas su rlung/ mkhris pa/ bad kan dang nye ba'i rlang/ mkhris pa'i gnas su mkhris pa/ rlung/ bad kan/ bad kan dang nye ba'i mkhris pa/ bad kan gyi gnas su bad kan/ rlung/ mkhris pa/ mkhris
245b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang nye ba'i bad kan te bcu gnyis/? gsum ga'i gnas su rgyu ba'i khrag dang chu'i rtsa ste bcu bzhi'o/ /` de la rlung gi rtsa ni sdom la 'gyogs/ mkhris pa'i rtsa grims la 'gyogs/ bad kan gyi rtsa lhod la dal ba yin la/
245b5(mdo 'grel): de yang zhogs pa lus ma 'khrugs shing zas gang yang ma zos gong du blta ste mkhrig ma'i gnyer ma dang po nas rim bzhin nam mkha' / rlung/ me/ chu/ sa lnga las nam mkha' dang sa'i gnas bor ba'i rlung mi chu gsum gyi gnas
245b6(mdo 'grel): mtshon kan? chag? gsum gyi 'og tu rim pa ltar rlung mkhris bad kan gsum gyi gnas su bzung la/ rlung gnas rang gi rlung/ mkhris pa'i gnas kyi rlung/ bad kan gyi gnas kyi rlung gsum/ de yang rlung gnas rang gi rlung rtsa sprul gyi 'gros 
245b7(mdo 'grel): lta bur 'phar /mkhris gnas kyi rlung ? pa bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar/ bad kan gnas kyi rlung rma bya'i ma yA ra 'gros ltar 'phar/ de bzhin du mkhris gnas rang gi mkhris rtsa sreg la ba pa 'a phur ba ltar so? 'phar/
246a1(mdo 'grel): rlung gnas kyi mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gos ltar 'phar/ bad kan gnas kyi mkhris rtsa 'bab chu ltang? 'phar ba/ bad kan rang gnas kyi rtsa dang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ rlung gnas kyi bad kan gyi
246a2(mdo 'grel): rtsa srin 'bu? pad+ma can gyis 'gros ltar 'phar/ dzum mkhris gnas kyi bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar pa Ni 'phar/ khrag la'ang gsum ste rlung gan nyams rA jas kyi khrag rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar/ mkhris ci rig naS
246a3(mdo 'grel): kyi 'o? lu ka khrag rtsa bye'u'i skad ltang 'phang/ bad kan gnas kyi khrag rtsa phu ron gyi 'gros manduka? ltar 'phar/ chu la gnyis te rlung gnas dang mkhris gnas kyi chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gro mtshil sa ltar 'phar/ bad kan gnas kyi chu'i
246a4(mdo 'grel): rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar la/ /rlung gi gnas su sbrul gyi 'gros ltar ka bU tra 'phar na rang gnas su rang 'gros te nad kyi rtsa/ sreg pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mkhri re was rlung gi nang tshan che zhing bcos dka' / tshu'i 'gros ltar
246a5(mdo 'grel): ku kU? Ti 'phar na 'bring/ shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na mkhris rlung yin kyang tshan chung la bcos sla/ go rim de bzhin dang pa'i rgyal po sbal pa srin pu pad+ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na bad rlung che 'bring chung gsum/ nya'i
246a6(mdo 'grel): 'gros ltar 'phar na khrag rlung yin kyang tshan chung/ bye'u ltar 'phang na khrag rlung 'bring lo/ /phug ron ltar 'phar na khrag rlung gi nang babs lci/ de bzhin du rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na rlung gi chu gso bla/ khyim bya'i 'gros ltar?
246a7(mdo 'grel): 'phar na gzhi che/ ` mkhris pa'i gnas su sreg pa 'phur ba ltar 'phar na rang gnas su rang ste rang ste nang med kyi rtsa/ sbrul dang rma bya'i 'gros bya rog gi skad gsum rim pa ltar mkhris rlung che 'bring chung gsum/ /dang po'i rgyal po srin dbu?
246b1(mdo 'grel): pad+ma can sbal pa gsum gyis 'gros ltar 'phar na bad mkhris che 'bring chung gsum/ byi'i'i skad ltar 'phar na khrag mkhris chung du/ nya dang khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khrag mkhris tshan che/ rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu dang mkhris pa bzhi chung/ khyim bya'i
246b2(mdo 'grel): 'gros ltar 'phar na gzhi che/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su dang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na rang gnas su rang ste cang med/ sbrul dang bya rog rma bya gsum rim pa ltar bang rlung che 'bring chung gsum/ sreg pa shig chu gsum bad mkhris cha 'bring chung gsum/
246b3(mdo 'grel): nya byi'u phug ron gsum bad khrag che 'bring chung gsum/ rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu dang bad kan shas che/ khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na chu dang bad kan yin kyang shas chung ngo/ /de yang mtshon gyi mas sner mkhris rtsa dang/ kan gyi las sner rlung rtsa/
246b4(mdo 'grel): kan gyi mas sner bad kan gyi rtsa dang/ chag gi yas sner mkhris pa'i rtsa 'phar na nye ba'i gnas yin pas skyon chung ngo/ /` rlung gi gnas su mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na rlung mkhris yin kyang bcos na myung du bde zhing ma bcos kyang 'tsho'o/ /` rlung
246b5(mdo 'grel): gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu pad+ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na mgo na/ glo dgog pa sogs 'byung zhing skyon chung kyang ma bcos na dang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar sor dogs pa'i nyen yod do/ / ` 'phral du nad zug gzer che yang rlung gi gnas su khrag
246b6(mdo 'grel): gi rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na btsas kyang myur du bde zhing ma bcos kyang mi ring bar 'tsho ba'o/ /rlung gi gnas su chu'i rtsa rha'i 'gros lta bu 'phar na dbugs kha mi bde ba/ mig dmar zhing mig 'dag mang ba sogs 'byung/ mkhris pa'i
246b7(mdo 'grel): gnas su rlung rtsa bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar na kha skam skom dang che/ tshogs tshigs sogs khol bur na yang gso bla/ ` mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na mgo bo na?/ kha nas mi tshol ma yang yang 'kho?
247a1(mdo 'grel): dgos shing mkhris ba'ang cung zad skyug go/ ` mkhris pa'i gnas su khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i skad ltar 'bar na lus la rtse yas byed cing thor ba chung du yod/ so rnyil gyi mtshams nas khrag cung zad 'jag?
247a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ thor ba chung du 'byung/ mig gi mdangs dmar ser du 'ong ngo/ /` mkhris pa'i gnas su chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros lta bu 'phar na dangs ma 'dzag/ lus 'khyoms shing 'khor/ mig na zhing mig chu 'dzag go/ ` bad kan
247a3(mdo 'grel): gyi gnas su rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na lus grang shum byed cing rkang lag gi mgo drod med/ mdog snum zhag chung zhing skya thal pho ba sbos ba dang 'khrog pa 'byung ngo/ /` bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa 'bab
247a4(mdo 'grel): chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na glo dgog/ brang tsha/ 'grim zhing dbugs mi bde/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su khrag gi rtsi phug ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na lus drod che/ rdul 'bab/ 'og sgor khrag cung zad 'dzag/ 'phongs lug
247a5(mdo 'grel): ba sogs 'byung/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na tshigs na zhing cung zad skrad pa/ lus kyi mdangs mi gsal zhing tshi che/ lus dri mi zhim mo ` rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i rtsa sreg pa 'phur ba lta ba
247a6(mdo 'grel): bur 'bar na/ dangs ma 'dzag rkeng ba na/ lus drod che/ lus la rdul mang du 'dzag/ lus gyong/ mkhris pa skyug/ mig ser/ chu ser por 'bab pa sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni mkhris rlung gi gtso bo ste bcos la zab /
247a7(mdo 'grel): ` rlung gi sa ru mkhris pa'i rlung gi rtsa bya rog gi 'gros lta bu 'phar na/ lus brdungs pa ltar na/ pho ba sbos/ rna ba 'on/ lus la thor pa dang shu pa sogs 'byung ngo/ /` rlung gi gnas su mkhris pa'i bad kan gyi/
247b1(mdo 'grel): rtsa sbal ba'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ lus 'dar zhing g.yo gos gon mi 'dod/ cung zad 'thur du 'khru/ bya gnyong dang/ g.yal stong byed/ pho ba 'khrogs pa sogs 'byung//
247b2(mdo 'grel): ` rlung gi gnas su mkhris ba'i khrag gi rtsa byi'u'i 'gros ltar 'bar na/ lus la za 'khrug byed/ tshags tshigs dang mgo bo na/ mig na ba sogs 'byung/ rlung gi
247b3(mdo 'grel): gnas su mkhris pa'i chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ so rnyil skrangs shing chu ser dang khrag 'byung/ mkhris tshad bskyed/ dbugs mi bde/ gnyid che / lus lci ba sogs
247b4(mdo 'grel): 'byung ngo/ /` rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang pa'i rgyal bo'i 'gros ltar 'phar na lus brdungs shing bcus pa ltar na / mgo bo 'khor / dangs kha 'gag / lus khol
247b5(mdo 'grel): bur na / chu gtong pa dka' ba sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni bad rlung gi gtso bo ste bcos la zab bo/ /` rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rlung gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na pho ba bcus ba ltar
247b6(mdo 'grel): na/ rtsa gtong dka' / rked pa dang chu rgyus na/ rlung skran sogs 'byung ngo/ /` rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi mkhris ba'i rtsa 'bab chu'i 'gros ltar 'phar na brang tsha/ grang bsil
247b7(mdo 'grel): che/ kha skoms/ mig dang sen mo'i mdog ljang khur snang ba/ dangs ma 'dzag ba sogs 'byung ngo/ / ` rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi khrag gi rtsa phu ron gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na /?
248a1(mdo 'grel): 'dzag/ shu ba dang thod pa 'ong/ /mig dmar zhing 'byed 'dzum nyung ba sogs 'byung ngo/ /` rang? gi gnas su bad kan gyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i
248a2(mdo 'grel): 'gros ltar 'phar na mig 'grib/ bags pa gyong/ chu gsog 'byung/ rtsa 'bur mod dod/ tha ba khrug yod zhing brad pa dang chu sar 'dzag/ pho bar srin 'bu 'phel pa sogs 'byung ngo/ /
248a3(mdo 'grel): ` mkhris gnas su rlung gi rtsa sbrul lta bu 'phar na/ lus kyi tshags tshigs brdungs ba ltar na/ chu 'tshag dka' zhing zug che/ /ba skam zhing thong ba mang/ grang bsil che/ skom da de tshe/ pho
248a4(mdo 'grel): ban ba sogs 'byung zhing 'di ni mkhris rlung gtso bo ste bcos la zab ba gces/ ` mkhris gnas su rlung gi mkhris pa'i rtsa shig gi 'gros ltar 'phar na/ tshang ba skyed / lus skam zhing drong
248a5(mdo 'grel): che/ mig mi gsal/ kha rlungs dang rkang mthil drod che ba sogs 'byung/ ` mkhris gnas su rlung gi bad kan gyi rtsa srin bu pad ma can ltar 'phar na/ /spyi bo na/ le lo dang gnyid che /
248a6(mdo 'grel): mchil ma mang/ kha ro kha ba sogs 'byung ngo/ / ` mkhris gnas su rlung gi khrag rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'bar na/ / lus mdog dmar zhing ba spu'i bu ga nas khrag kyang cung zad 'dzag/ mig
248a7(mdo 'grel): chu mang ba sogs ? ngo/ / ` mkhris gnas su rlung gi chu'i rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ pho ba sbos/ lan lag skam zhing tshigs dang gdod skrangs/ dri chu khrag ltar bab ba sogs
248b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa ngang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na khar ro dang? ra/ khong du srin 'bu 'phel/ khog bar zo ba'i zho dreg chags pa lta bur chags/ lus kyi rting
248b2(mdo 'grel): drod chung zad tsha zhing tshags tshigs sogs khol bur na/ mkhris skran 'cha' ba sogs 'byung ste bad mkhris kyi gtso bo yin pas bcos la zab pa gces so/ / ` mkhris ba'i gnas su bad kan gyi rlung
248b3(mdo 'grel): gi rtsa rma bya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ nyin res 'jog tu da?/ lus la rdul 'byung zhing dri mi zhim/ mig gi mdangs dkar bor 'gro/ mchil ma mang ba sogs 'byung/ ` mkhris pa'i gnas
248b4(mdo 'grel): su bad kan gyi mkhris rtsa chu'i 'gros lta bu 'phar na / gnyid che/ lce 'gas/ lus gyong/ /brag cung zad skyug ba sogs 'byung ngo/ /` mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi khrag rtsa phu ron gyi 'gros
248b5(mdo 'grel): ltar 'phar na/ sna khrag 'bab/ khrag skran 'cha'/ lte ba bcu zhing gzer/ me lce 'khor lo 'byung/ ` mkhris pa'i gnas su bad kan gyi chu'i rtsa khyim bya'i 'gros lta bu 'phar na /
248b6(mdo 'grel): dangs la mi bde / ma drod 'chor/ ma brdu ba'i nang dang 'gro 'dug dka' ba sogs 'byung/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi rtsa sprul gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na/ rkang pa na /
248b7(mdo 'grel): 'grims/ kha dri mi zhi/ mgo bo 'khor/ chu'i mdog ser ba sogs 'byung ste 'di ni bde rlung gi rtsa ba yin bas zab par bcos/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi mkhris rtsa shig gi
249a1(mdo 'grel): 'gros ltar 'phar na/ dangs ma 'dzag / lus stobs nyams/ ngas chad pa sogs 'byung/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi bad kan gyi rtsa srin
249a2(mdo 'grel): bu pad ma can gyi 'gros ltar 'phar na/ be snang skyug cing glo che/ skya sbab dang mig 'dag mang ba sogs 'byung/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi khrag gi rtsa nya'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ pho ba
249a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrog cing na/ dangs ma skams pas lus stobs nyams/ srong long 'byung/ nyin re mos kyi na ba'o/ /` bad kan gyi gnas su rlung gi chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ pags nang
249a4(mdo 'grel): khol bu ba sen mo btab kyang reg ba mtshar ba/ yan lag skam/ dangs ma 'dzag / lus mgo mjug thams cad na pa sogs 'byung/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su bkhris pa'i rtsa 'sre
249a5(mdo 'grel): pa 'phur ba ltar 'phar na/ nyal na ldang 'dod ldang na nyal 'dod/ zas skom mi 'dod pa dang chu skrur skyug/ lus drod che ba sogs 'byung ste 'di yang bad mkhris gyi gtso bo yin pas
249a6(mdo 'grel): bcos la zab/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i rlung rtsa bya rog gi 'gros ltar 'phar ni/ gsus pa sbo/ mas rlung gyen du ldog/ bzhang 'brum yong pa sogs 'byung/
249a7(mdo 'grel): ` bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i bad kan gyi rtsa spal pa'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ khrag 'grims/ be snabs skyug/ lus dri mi zhim pa sogs 'byung/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i khrag gi rtsa byi'u 'i skad
249b1(mdo 'grel): ltar 'phar na/ chu sogs 'byung/ brang tsha/ rtsibs logs dang mchin pa na/ dangs la mi bde zhing zas mi 'ju ba sogs 'byung/ ` bad kan gyi gnas su mkhris pa'i chu'i rtsa rta'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ mig kyong du sdib/ chus lus skrangs?/ kha
249b2(mdo 'grel): 'grig/ tshig re mos su na ba sogs 'byung ngo/ /` mkhris ba'i gnas su mkhris pa rang gi rtsa sbal pa'i 'gros dang khrag rtsa bye'u'i skad rlung gi mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros gsum res 'jog tu 'phar na/ 'dus pa ste kha
249b3(mdo 'grel): skam zhing 'grig/ skom dang che/ lus lci shes pa mig sal na de ni myur du 'chi zhing mi 'tsho'o/ /` bad kan gyi gnas su bad kan rang gi rtsa dang pa'i rgyal po'i 'gros dang rlung gi mkhris rtsa shig gi 'gros /mkhris
249b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i bad kan gyi rtsa sbam pa'i 'gros gsum res 'jog tu 'phar na/ de yang nad gsum 'dus pa ste mi 'tsho'o/ / ` lus 'khru ba/ skyug pa/ mgo dang chags tshigs na ba/ so dang lce nag por song/ /pho ba dang
249b5(mdo 'grel): stong la gtsang ba sogs nang rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ga'i rtags tshang zhing rlung gi gnas su bad kan gyi rtsa dang ba'i rgyal po'i 'gros ltar 'phar na/ de ni nges par mi 'tsho'o/ /rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ga'i gnas su 'gro
249b6(mdo 'grel): rnams dang med sna tshogs su rgyun nang yun ring zhing 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rlung gi gnas su rlung dang mkhris pa'i gnas su 'ang rlung rtsa 'phar na ma 'ju ba'i nad ste gso sla'o/ /de ltar rtsa'i dbye ba rnams ma nor bar gtan la ?
249b7(mdo 'grel): ste nang? yin ngos zin pa dang/ de'i sman dang spyod lam rnams bya ba ni gnang ngo/ /zhes drang srong chen po dA nanda ste sbyin pa'i dbang po'i mdzad pa'i rtsa rtag cing gtan la 'bo bas pa'i rab tu bya ba rdzogs so// //
250a1(mdo 'grel): mtshon 'og 'byung ba rlung ni ? zhi gnas so? ? da/ pi ta/ ka pha / bA ra/ rlung /ma bris? pa bad kan ? sa rda/ / dzu/ dza lu ka/ ? zhig ? can rak+ta/ pA na/ mthu chu ma tsha li/ re ba/
250a2(mdo 'grel): nan? bos ? ba che'i sa mkhris pa'i gnas so/ /pi ta/ bA da/ ka pha/ pi ta/ mkhris rlung bad kan 'bris pa la ba ka/ ba i sa/ mu ba ka/ grag pa mchog? ? pa rak+ta/ pA Ni/ brang chu tsi ri/ re ba/ ni? t+ta
250a3(mdo 'grel): chag gi 'og 'byung ba chu'i sa bad kan gyi gnas so// ka pha/ bA da/ pi ta/ ka pha bad kan rlung mkhris pa bad kan haM sa rA dza/ ma yu ra/ pA Ni/ bar pa'i ` la po ? bya ? tu rak+ta/ pA Ni/ ? cha ka pu tra/ kuk+ku Ta / ? cha ?
250a4(mdo 'grel): / zas dang spyod lam bstan pa ni/ rlung gi nang mdza' dag la/ dre sar dam bar 'dug/ me la sro zhing byug pa byed/ rtsam pa'o?
250a5(mdo 'grel): dang mar/ sha dang de'i khu ba gtong/ mkhris ba'i nang la bA la dang sh+ri khaN+Da gnyis zhib par btags la chung sbyar ba'i phyug
250a6(mdo 'grel): pa byed/ grang sar sdod/ nang tshan che na lto bkag gtong/ gzhan bag thug kho na bstan no/ /bad kan la grang dro ran par byas
250a7(mdo 'grel): la dal bus 'chag / sran tsam sogs zas yang zhing 'ju ba'i rigs bstan/ bcud can dang lci ba'i rigs
250a8(mdo 'grel): mdzem mo/ /dngul chu 'dul lugs la/ rdo gzhong gi nang du dngul chu zho nyi shu rtsa bzhi blug/ de dang rdza rnying
250a9(mdo 'grel): ba'am so phag khyer gang tsam dang mnyam du nyin gnyis kyi bar du nyed/ de nas chu gtsang mar bsrings te dngul chu
250a10(mdo 'grel): dang sa rang sar phye/ chu khog ma phyed tsam blug de la 'bras bu gsum dang rgya gar stod ja zhib par btags pa ?
250b1(mdo 'grel): gang tsam zhig blug/ gong gi dngul chu ras gtsang mas dril la spung pas kha bsdams te chur sor bzhi tsam ma reg pa khebs gcod la btags te kha legs par sgrigs nas rlangs pa mi 'tshor ba byed /nyi ma'i bzhi cha
250b2(mdo 'grel): gcig tsam me pa tang la rlangs pas bcos/ chu glang thag tshod pa dang ston te rdo gzhang legs par bkrus pa'i nang du blugs la shing g+hi wa kwa ra'i shing bzhogs dang mnyam du nyin gsum gyi bar grib ma la brdung ba
250b3(mdo 'grel): dang nyi ma la srob chu tshod re tsam gyi bar re mos su byed / de nas shing che la chang gar mas khu ba byas nas nyin gsum gyi bar la nyed cing / 'di nas gzung nyin rer nyi mar
250b4(mdo 'grel): 'jog theng sa gnyis tsam las sngon ma lugs kyi re mos mi dgos/ de nas skyes pa'i chu dang ra'i 'o ma/ ba'i 'o ma/ ba sar pa'i chu rnams dang mnyam du rim pa bzhin nyin gsum re
250b5(mdo 'grel): nyid/ de nas nyi ma me tog gi lam lags su brdungs pa'i khu ba/ sgo skya rdzogs pa'i khu ba/ ba sar pa'i chu rnams dang mnyam du go rim bzhin nyin re nyed / da nas mu zi ser po no
250b6(mdo 'grel): ? shu rtsa bzhi zhing? par btags/ lcags snod du ba mar sar pa bskol ba'i? btsag tshod? pa dang btab la me cung zad btang nas pa'i 'o ma'i nang du dal bus blug la snyigs ma ma shor ba byed cing/ 'khor pa dang/
250b7(mdo 'grel): mar dang 'o ma gnyis 'dres nas mu zig? ting du 'khur ba ltar chags yong ba de dang gong gi dang ? chu gnyis bsras nas cung zad nyed / rdo gzhong zhig tu sum la zho phyed bzhir ra'i 'o ma cung zad re blug nas nyed/ yang skar pa dang sdugs 
251a1(mdo 'grel): sogs nyin gsum gyi bar byed/ pa sar ba'i chu dang 'o ma so sor rim bzhin nyin gsum re'i bar gong bzhin skam 'thag byas la tshar ba dang gong gi dngul chu dang mu zi'i zla la bsres/ rdo gzhong
251a2(mdo 'grel): nang du rgya tshwa zho do skyes pa'i chu dang mnyam du skam 'thag gong bzhin nyin gsum gyi bar byas nas dngul chu'i zla la bsres pa de rnams rdo gzhong gi nang du nyin bdun gyi bar du skam nyed byad/ de nas bzhu shel gyi dam pa ras kyis dril
251a3(mdo 'grel): la 'jim pa byugs/ de skams pa dang yang ras dang 'jim pa rim pa bdun gyi bar dril ba'i nang du gsum gnyis tsam gang ba blug/ lcags kyi skya ba dam per bcug/ rdza'i khog ma gting du bye ma song gsum tsam gting
251a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i steng du bzhag ste kha mtshams bar bye mas bstems/ dam pe'i nang du zha nye zho phyed do blug ste/ lcags mangs dal bus dkrug pa dang nyi shar nas nyi ma rgas tsam gyi bar me gtong/ de nas lcags mda' ston
251a5(mdo 'grel): la kha rgya tshwa btags pa chus rdzis pa'i 'dam gyis bcang/ de steng bye ma bkab ste khebs rgyab la nyin zhag phrug gcig gi bar me shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad par btang/ de nas phye ma grang thag mchod ring tho ma
251a6(mdo 'grel): btang bar bzhag/ grangs nges pa dang ston la ngal bus dam be bcag la phyung bas dngul chu dug bral lhad med du yod do/ / ` yang lugs gcig la/ dngul chu zho do /mu zi ser po zho do/ /shing a d+ha dza ri gsuM
251a7(mdo 'grel): na kA tso li tshom pa re/ tu la pi'i khu ba rnams sgang lkogs nang du blugs 'jim pa gcin pos kha legs par bcad/ de nas ras bdun brtsegs par 'jim pa dang bcas 'gril lugs gong ltar byas 'khon/ ma'i nas?
251b1(mdo 'grel): du bye ma blugs nas phye ma dang bcas me gtong lugs gong 'da' i nyin zhag phyed kyi bar btang la grangs pa dang ston te sgo nga dal bus bcags bas dngul chu dug bral lhang med du 'byung ngo/ /` yang lugs gcig la dngul chu zho bdun dang yi pa la'i shun
251b2(mdo 'grel): pa nyag gang bcas rdo gzhong du nyin bdun gyi bar du nyed/ b+haM ga re'i thang chu blug la slar yang nyin bdun nyid/ de nas rdza sa'i bar pu skam thag legs par chod pa'i nang du li shi zho do dang bcas blug la kha legs par bcang pi pi ling
251b3(mdo 'grel): bar du 'jim pa blug pa'i ras rim pa gsum gyis dril/ khog ma bye mas rgyangs par kha bcang de me gtong lugs sogs gong bzhin nyin zhag brug gcig gi bar byas te grangs pa dang ston pas kyang dug bral lhang med du 'byung/ ` zha nye dkar po/
251b4(mdo 'grel): zha nye nag po/ bsha' tshe gsum mang nyung ji ltar byed kyang cha bsnyams la khog ma'i nang du blug/ de la me btang ste zhu ba dang snong? ba/ zhan zhig tu ba mar sar pa btsags legs par bcad/ de nas lcags skyogs chung du zhig rang ka gis
251b5(mdo 'grel): nyi shu kha sarba lha ti tsha lang zer mang nyung zad re blug la dkrug/ mar blug pa'i du ba yal pa dang yang mar lugs ba sags lan bdun gyi bar byas/ de nas b+hA Ta'i lo ma dang d+hu ti gnyis cha mnyam zhib bar btags pa'i phye ma bsha' dkar
251b6(mdo 'grel): sogs mi mngon bar 'debs shing dkrugs/ de nas kha bcad la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam gyi bar la me shin tu che ba btang/ de nas me thag bcad de grangs pa dang ston la/ se ba bzhi nas phyad gsum gyi bar nad babs lci yang dang bstan te btang
251b7(mdo 'grel): sa rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka la phan zhing nA ga bas te de dang ka ra bsres nas zas na dangs ma 'dzag pa la mchog tu phan/ a ru ra bsnan nas btang na mgo bo na ba la phan no/ /` rdza'i par bu'i nang du zha nyer bar po nyag gang blug/ de la me btang
252a1(mdo 'grel): nas zhu ba dang dngul chu nyag byed blugs la me mtshams ma bcad bar gtong zhing skyabs dkrugs pa dang mnyam du bab bla btags pa nyag phyed rim bzhin btab ste gsum ga legs bar 'dren pa dang ?
252a2(mdo 'grel): bcad rlung mi 'chor ba byas/ de nas ras dang rdzas khrag gang rigs kyis rdzis pa'i 'jim pa byugs shing yang ras dkri ba sogs rim pa gsum brtsegs su byas/ de skams pa dang nyin zhag ljem? mtshams ma bcad par btang/ de nas grang
252a3(mdo 'grel): thag chod ba dang ston/ ba'i zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs par ston bas rdzis sbab 'thug sor gang tsam? yod pa'i sgor mor btang la ras kyis bdun brtsegs tsam dril nas skud bas bsdams de gci ba'i ma'i dkyil du bcug
252a4(mdo 'grel): la ras tshig tsam gyi tshod bzhag/ de nas grangs thag chod pa dang ston la phye mar nyes ba dang zhos khu ba byas nas rdzis te bsreg pa sogs gong ltar lan nyi shu'i bar byas ba ni bang+ge shwa ra zer te stobs bskyed dang nad tsha grangs gsar rnying thams cad
252a5(mdo 'grel): la phan zhing nad gzhi che ba la gtong na thun tshad sran ma tsam dang gzhi chung ba dang nad med la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam re gtong ngo/ /'di'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /` zangs mang nyung ci 'dod ba sbrang gshog legs par brdungs/ rdza snod kyi
252a6(mdo 'grel): nang du pa'i gcin la chu cung zad bsres par kha ri lu Na dang mnyam du btab la nyin phyed kyi bar du me btang la btsos/ de nas ston la snod bkrus pa'i nang du slar yang aM ? baM li'i 'bru chur btab pa'i nang du nyin phyed tshod/ de nas chu de bo la
252a7(mdo 'grel): snod bkrus te skyu ru ra chur btab pa'i nang du nyin byed 'tshed/ de nas pa'i dar bar kha ri lu Na btab pa'i nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du 'jog cing 'di skabs me gtong mi dgos/ de nas zangs shog ston la legs par bkrus te mu ? ser po
252b1(mdo 'grel): dang cha mnyam bteg ba phye mar byas la rdza'i bar bu'i nang du mu zi gting/ de stengs zangs shog gcig bzhag/ yang mu zi gting/ de stengs zangs shog 'jog pa sogs kyi zangs shog grangs du yod par brtsegs la kha 'grig par bcad de rlung
252b2(mdo 'grel): mi 'tshor bar byas/ de ras kyis gtums shing 'jim bas 'byug ba sogs gsum rim tsam byas la slar yang phyi 'jim pas legs par gtum la skam thag chod pa dang/ de nas sa dong brus par gci ba'i me'i nang du nyin gcig gi
252b3(mdo 'grel): bar du bsregs/ thal ba phrang thag chod ba dang ston la rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes nas phye mar byas la thun sran ma bzhi tsam gyi tshod re btang bas grang ba'i rigs dang/ rlung/ bad rlung/ dangs kha 'byed ba/ lus stobs bskyed pa/ rked pa
252b4(mdo 'grel): na ba rnams la phan/ ` yod sho mos zho gang phye mar btags pa dang gong gi zangs thal se ba bzhi bskyes? pa thun re byas btang bas yan lag zha 'khums la mchog tu phan no/ /` sum gser zho do dang se ba brgyad la sbra ngag shog 'than/
252b5(mdo 'grel): mtshal sre ba bco lnga mi ? dang bil ba'i nang gi 'bru gnyis zhib bar btaD par chu cung zad kyang blug ba'i skyon gser shog la byugs/ de nas gser shog sgril la bil ba'i nang du kho Da yon sog gser bcug kha legs bar bcad de ras kyis
252b6(mdo 'grel): dril lang rim pa ser phyed tsam byugs/ skam thag chod pa dang sa dong brus bar gci ba'i me nang du nyin gcig bsregs la gangs thag chod pa dang ston te phye mar byas la 'bras nyis 'gyur tsam gyi tshad lga ser dang mnyam du zos na glo nang
252b7(mdo 'grel): dang dbugs mi bde ba g.yal ba rnams la phan zhing skyug ba chod/ ba'i gci ba'i thal ba dang mnyam du zas na dangs ba dang skoms nad la pa na/ lga dang mnyam du btang na skran/ shu ba'i khyi rdo/ pho srin/ rlung skran rnams rtsa ba nas 'byin par 'gyur ro//
253a1(mdo 'grel): */ lu tra? /lcags phye nyag gang la dngul chu nyag phyed bsres te zhib bar nyes/ chu la shing gi wa kwa ril khu ba blugs nas gar sla zho tsam byas la/ rdo gzhong nang du nyi mar nyed cing skams pa dang khu ba gar sla sogs gong ltar byas
253a2(mdo 'grel): ba lan brgya dang brgyad kyi bar byed/ de nas rdza'i par bu'i nang du blug/ kha rlung mi 'chor ba legs par bcad/ de nas 'jim ba dang ras sbel mar lan bdun gyi bar sgril ba skam thag chod ba dang rdza'i khog ma che ba mthil du bug
253a3(mdo 'grel): brgya khab kyi rtse tshud pa tsam yod ba zhig byems rgyangs pa'i dkyil du bcug/ kha legs bar sgrigs te rlung sogs ye mi 'chor ba byas te nyin zhag bzhi'i ring ma shin tu tsha ba mtshams ma chad ba gtong/ 'di skabs las byed mi ma
253a4(mdo 'grel): gtogs 'grul gcod/ de nas grangs thag chod pa dang ston la thun tshad 'bras tsam ra ja/ 'di ni spyi 'joms chen mo ste /rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa rims sogs nang gsar rnying gang dang gang la yang 'dis mi phan ba med pas
253a5(mdo 'grel): sman thams cad kyi rgyal po lta bu'o/ /` zha nye nag bo nyag phyed lcags snod kyi nang du zhu /sa ser zhib bar btags pa'i nang du blug /yang ston la bzhu ba sogs lan nyer gcig gi bar phyed/ mdong ros dang tshal nyag re bsres la
253a6(mdo 'grel): zhig bar btags/ rdza snod du zha nye blug la me btang ste bzhu ba dang gong gi tshe la mdong ros bsres pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs pa dang mnyam du skya bas dkrugs/ legs bar 'dres nas thal nam sil bar sogs song ba dang shing gi
253a7(mdo 'grel): wa kri ba'i thu? ba blug ste skyabs dkrug cing nyin byed kyi bar me btang thal bar song ba dang kha legs par bcad la nyin mtshan lnga dang nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi bar me btang/ de nas grangs pa dang ston la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sbrang rtsi
253b1(mdo 'grel): dang mnyam du btang na rlung gi nad gsar rnying thams cad la phan/ ` ka ra dang mnyam du btang na khrag gi rigs la phan/ ` lga dang mnyam du btang na bad kan gyi rigs dang ma 'ju ba sogs po ba'i nad la phan/ ` a ru ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na
253b2(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i rigs la ban/ pi pi ling dang mnyam du btang na dang sa kha 'byed/ ` khrag dang rlung la brten nas dangs ma 'dzags na bu ram rnying ba dang mnyam du btang/ ` mkhris pa la brten nas 'dzag na a ru dang mnyam du btang/ ` ba mar
253b3(mdo 'grel): gsar ba dang mnyam du zos na stobs bskyed par byed/ ` gcong giS zin ba'i nad lus shin tu rib na gur gum dang mnyam du gtong zhing gzhan yang nang tsha grang dang bstun te/ ba bsgyur byas btang bas kun la phan par 'gyur ro/ /` ti tsha 'a bsha' tshe nyag
253b4(mdo 'grel): gang rdza snod du bzhu la pa ra ki ri nyag phyed dang/ so ra nyag phyed bsras te zhib bar btags pa'i phye ma cung zad re 'debs/ shing lcags gzar chung du'i ltar bas nyed cing dkrugs nyin phyed kyi bar byas pas 'dres te thal bar song ba dang
253b5(mdo 'grel): khabs rgyab la nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig me btang/ ? grang thag chod pa dang ston la bye mar byas te dar? la btsags/ de nas phye ma de dang/ li shi/ dza ti gsum se ba re/ bo ris/ lga/ pi pi ling/ gsum se ba gsum re rnams zhib
253b6(mdo 'grel): bar btags/ sbrang rtsis rta byas la ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la ril bu re btang bas byis pa 'khru ba'i nad dang 'cham pa la la waM ga dza ? phal phan zhing gnyid ma rin shu ? pi ba lam 'khrug par btang pas kyang gnyid
253b7(mdo 'grel): du 'gro/ ` a ru ra dang bsres nas btang na dbugs mi bde ba la phan/ ` mgo po na na ril bu chur brdar la sna bug tu blug bas phan bar 'gyur /ga bur dang bsres nas btang na kha'i dri dan ba rtsa ba nas 'byin/ ` zho dang mnyaM
254a1(mdo 'grel): du btang na skran thon/ ` kha du tshwa dang mnyam du btang na ma 'ju ba'i nad sel lo/ ` zangs mang nyung gang byed kyang sbrang gshog legs par 'then la jem rtses chung dur gtubs pa dang mu zi ser pa zangS
254a2(mdo 'grel): che chung gang yin gyi phyed mar gtang ba be da'i khog par blug la sku ru ra dang nem bu'i chu blug la kha legs par bcad de nas kyi dkyil du zla ba gcig bzhag/ de nas ston la phye mar byas te thun chad se ba bzhi'i rtsis chu grang gis
254a3(mdo 'grel): 'phul la btang na dug dang mkhris pa'i nad 'phral du skyugs nas phan zhing srin nad la btang na yang 'khru skugs yong la / gzhan yang skyugs phan pa'i nang gang la 'ang btang bas skyugs sman gyi mchog go/ kha parsa d+ha nyag phyed
254a4(mdo 'grel): brdang ba'i phye ma dang/ mu zi ser po nyag phyed / dngul chu spor gang gsum rdo gzhong du nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig gi ring zhib par nyes la gi lba kwa ra'i khu bas gar sla zho tsam byas pa nyi ma dang grib ma phyed khyer du nyes/ rkam hi cha'ang? ? tshe
254a5(mdo 'grel): thag chod pa dang slar yang khu ba lugs pa sogs nyin bcu gsum gyi bar byed/ bzhu shel gyi dam per ras dang 'dim pa sbel mar byugs pa bdun brtsegs byas pa skam thag tshong pa dang blug la kha rdzas gcim po /mgar ba so
254a6(mdo 'grel): rdog/ ar ka/ bu ram/ rgya gar stod ja rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa ba'i 'o mas rjes pa 'dam btags nyin gcig byas pa'i 'jim pas dam pe'i kha shin tu dam par bkag/ de ras kyis gtums la gong gi 'jim? pas ram?
254a7(mdo 'grel): phe? yongs rdzogs la 'byug/ de skam pa dang khog ma che ba zhig gi nang bye ma'i dkyil du bcug la kha legs par bcang de nyin zhag bzhi'i bar me mtshams ma chad bar btang/ de nas grangs sa dang ston la nad babs che na sran ma gcig
254b1(mdo 'grel): tsam nas nad med la 'bras nyes 'gyur gyi bar 'os 'grab btang bas nad ngos zin ma zin gsor ring? gang la yang phan zhing/ /nang med kyis zos na rgas kha sra ba dang phye? bas bskyed pa la sogs pa phan yon bsam mi khyab bo/ /` na nye dkar po nyag
254b2(mdo 'grel): gang lugs kong du bzhu la legs par bzhu ba dang snum gyi dkyil du blug/ de 'khang pa dang yang bzhu blug gong ltar lan gsum gyi bar du byed/ de nas snod che ba zhig tu bzhu la 'bras bu gsum zhib par btags pa'i bye ma thal 'debs
254b3(mdo 'grel): pa ltar rim bzhin btabs nas thal bar ma song bar lcags skyogs chung du'i ltag pas nyed/ de nas kha legs par bcad la nyi ma'i brgyad cha tsam gyi bar mi btang/ grangs thag chod pa dang ston la zho ras la btsags te khu ba legs
254b4(mdo 'grel): par sten pas rdzis srab thug sor gang tsam yod pa'i sgor mor btang/ de ras kyi bdun brtsegs tshal dril la skud pas bsdems/ ? ba'i me'i dkyil du bcug la ras tshig tsam gyi ched bzhag/ de nas me shi zhing glang thag chod pa
254b5(mdo 'grel): dang ston la zhing? pa de btags/ ` yang lugs gcig la/ bsha' dkar srab thub shog bu tsam brdung la/ bod kyi so mar tsa'i lo ma zhib par phung ba/ ras kha gang la phang phu bzos pa'i nang du so ma ra tsa bting la/ bsha'
254b6(mdo 'grel): dkar skrad ? shog de'i stang rim pa rtsegs su bzhag pa'i bar mtshams su so mar tsa song gsum yod pa byas la kha rtsems te/ steng 'og thams cad la lci ba ser kha ma? sor bzhi de yod pa'i dkyil du bcug ste me chung du btang shing/ lci ba chig
254b7(mdo 'grel): pa da'i grang ? bcug/ de nas lci thal gsal te so ma da tsa'i dkyil du tshal dkar me la sreg pa ltar mod ba de gzhan dang ma 'dres par 'don/ so mar tsa nyung ba dang me tshas na bsha' dkar thig bur 'dril yod pas ran pa phal che/ de ba sid+d+hi ?
225a1(mdo 'grel): zer te thun tshang sa ba gsum nas bzhi'i bar nang gzhi che chung dang bstun nas gtong/ de kha bsgyur byed lugs ni ` ga pur cung zad dang mnyam du zos na kha'i dri ngan pa sel/ ` dza ti nyis 'gyur bsres nas btang na
225a2(mdo 'grel): lus kyi stobs 'phel bar 'gyur/ yang ba mar dang mnyam du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/ ` tu la pa'i lo ma'i thang chu dang bsres nas btang na dangs ma cha grang gang gis 'dzag pa yang chod/ ` shel dkar dang mnyaM
225a3(mdo 'grel): du btang kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/ ` ba mar sar pas rta byas btang nas mkhris pa sha ser dang grang rlung la phan/ ` ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na rlung gis lto ba sbos pa sel/ ` tsha la mer bsres pa'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na
225a4(mdo 'grel): khrag skran thon par 'gyur/ ` yung ba dang mnyam du btang na khrag mkhris thon par 'gyur zhing grang mkhris la phan/ ` bye kar dang mnyam du btang na bad kan smug po la phan/ ` pA na dang mnyam du btang na dangs ma 'phel /
225a5(mdo 'grel): ` pi pi ling dang mnyam du btang na dangs kha 'byed/ 'o mas rta byas btang kyang gong dang 'dra/ ` a ru ra dang mnyam du btang na steng rlung dang dbugs kha mi bde ba la phan/ ` sa mu dra pha la dang mnyam du btang na sna'i
225a6(mdo 'grel): nas la phan/ ` li shi dang mnyam du btang na pho nad la phan/ ` gla rtsi dang mnyam du btang na rdo rje las su rung zhing 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/ /` yang khang byil gyi brun chur sbyangs la lte bar byugs te sman
225a7(mdo 'grel): chas? kyang nus? pa gong dang 'dra/ ` go yu'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na ma 'jug ba'i nang sel/ ` sgog skya dang mnyam du btang na yan lag gum pa la pha/ ` ba dar dang mnyam du btang na mig ser la phan /`
225b1(mdo 'grel): bes 'bru'i shing gi lo ma dang mnyam du btang na sgyugs sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur te zas spyod skabs dang sbyar ro/ /` dan 'dra'i rtsa ba/ 'u su'i rtsa ba/ sle tres/ gla sgang/ pu rna na ba/ lga rnams cha mnyam gyi thang chu gsum gnyis
225b2(mdo 'grel): bdus te a nA ra btang/ rlung la brten pa'i nang thams cad la phan/ ` gla sgang/ lga/ ku Ta ki/ ti ga ta/ 'u su'i 'bru rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin gu ru tsha btang na mkhris pa la brten pa'i nang thams cad la phan/ 'ba' zho
225b3(mdo 'grel): rgun 'brum li shi/ pi pi ling/ a ka ra/ lga/ la la phub chung ba rnams cha mnyam/ /cir yang tsI rA ya ta cha gnyis bcas chur btab la gsum gnyis bsdus pa'i thang zhag gsum gyi bar du btang na chad ba'i nad rigs kun
225b4(mdo 'grel): la phan zhing? gos kyis byibs la rdul kyang 'do dkar? na no/ /` shing kun cha gcig/ zi ra kar po dang lga cha gsum re/ kha ru tsha cha gnyis rnams chu la bsdus pa'i thang btang na rlung dang po ba'i nang la tsha log byed pa nas ma 'jub
225b5(mdo 'grel): rnams la phan/ ` rgya skyags/ 'u su/ la la phung rnams cha mnyam chur zhag gcig spangs pa'i thang ka ras rta byas tho rengs btang na lus drong ma ltar 'bar ba la phan/ le? su dang kha ru tshwa mnyam pa'i thang btang na rlung dang po
225b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i nang la tsha log byed pa zas ma 'jug ba rnams la phan/ ` a ka rkA ra/ la la phung/ ku ba/ kha ru tshwa/ lga rnams cha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin bsdus la btang na bad kan la brten pa'i nang thams cad la phan/ ` sla tres ?
225b7(mdo 'grel): gla sgang/ u tI sa'i rtsa ba/ 'u su'i 'bru/ lga/ ku ba rnams tsha mnyam gyi thang gong bzhin bskol tuM par nas btang na 'dus pa'i nang thams cad la phan no/ /` gur guM/ gla rtsi/ gi wang /g+ho ron la ga pur/ sh+rI ? gang po khaN+Da? rnams ? mnyam? 
256a1(mdo 'grel): phye mar btags la chus khu ba byas lus la bsku ba snye byas na/ rlung mkhris bad kan la brten pa'i sha drod tsha pa lus rdul 'dar shing ba sbu sgrid? ba/ shes pa 'khrug shing 'gro sdong sna tshogs byed pa/
256a2(mdo 'grel): gdon gyis zin pa lta bu mig 'bur btsugs su lta shing/ mig sngar sna tshogs mthong ba/ nyen gnyid ma thub shing shes gzib/ gos? yang yang 'dud pa sogs nad glo bur ba la phan na/ /` spyi 'joms mus la'i
256a3(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba ni/ mu sa yi rdza snod gsar pa'i nang du blag par ba'i 'o ma lhad med ser gang tsam gyis mthob blug/ kha legs par bcang de rlung mi 'tshor pa byed/ me chung ngu yun ring pos khu ba rang sim? bar 'tshed/ de
256a4(mdo 'grel): nas grib skam byas la skam pa dang zhib par btags pa dar la bcags pa nyag gang/ la waM ga dang dza yi pha la zho bzhi de/ mi ra tsa dang su tha/ pi pa la gsum zho bcu gnyis re rnams zhib par btags la pa'i chus rta
256a5(mdo 'grel): byas nas btang na chugs gsal phan zhing gzhan yang rtag pa'i rims dang khrag shal ba dang/ ? chu lam du dza ti khrag 'dzag po ris? pa rnamS lgal? pi pi ling mchog tu phan no/ /` chu grang giS rta byas la btang na rims nyin
256a6(mdo 'grel): gcig pa dang gnyis ba dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang rims drag po dang/ rlung nang kyis lus drong med pa rnams la phan no/ /` sbrang rtsis rta byas la btang na tshad pa gsar bying? dang mkhris pa sha ser la phan no/ / ` nim
256a7(mdo 'grel): bu'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na mkhris pa mig ser la mchog tu phan/ ` li shi mnan te zos na glo la phan/ ` ba mar sar pa btsag bcang pas rta byas nas btang na lus stobs shor nas sbyor mi nus par dangs ma
256b1(mdo 'grel): 'phel bar 'gyur/ ` las su na brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas te ril bu dril bas btang na skad 'gag pa la phan zhing skad sman yang yang ngo/ /` chang gis rta byas nas btang na byis ba btsa' ma thub pa myur du btsa' bar 'gyur/ ` ku me DA?
256b2(mdo 'grel): khu bas rta byas nas btang sgog? skya na chu rlung gis lto ba spos pa sel/ ` dzA mu Na'i 'bru dang pags pa brdungs pa'i khu bas rta byas nas sna bug la blug na mi rga zer ba'i mgo bor 'bu yod pa'i nang chu/ me/ nyi ma/ 'od can sogs mthong
256b3(mdo 'grel): bas rkyen byas nas rgyal zal? lta bu zhig long ba de la phan no/ /` rgya gar stong ja dang mnyam du btang na pho dbang las su rung bar 'gyur re/ /` ba tsa dang mnyam du btang na tsha ba'i skom dang kyi rigs dang srod long la phan/ ` mu mi ser po
256b4(mdo 'grel): dang cha mnyam btags la btang na rlung gis rna ba 'on pa dang mig gis mi mthong ba la phan/ ` gong gi mu sa li'i gcig po dang/ pho ril/ pi pi ling ?/ /lga bzhi cha mnyam btags la sman thun che phyogs gnyis kyi rtsis chu grang gis
256b5(mdo 'grel): 'phul nas btang na rgyu dang mi rgyu/ sbyar dug sha dug sogs dug rigs kun la phan te 'di yan mu sa lir kha sgyur byas pa'i sbyor sde'i 'phros don yin no/ /` nad gzhi che ba'i rigs la sbyong gtang ba'i shal sman ni/ smin drug /mgo /
256b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal/ mchu rnams gyi zla ba la/ dze pa la se ba bcu gnyis/ hA ra? Da se ba ni/ /mi ra tsa? zho gang/ tsu ka se ba phyed gsum zhib par btags la ril bu lnga byas/ /thun tshad ril bu re nga mar sar gyis dril la ming/ de'i rjes su chu/
256b7(mdo 'grel): bskol hu? ba gsum tsam re btang ngan dang?/ bag nad ro rnams e? rur sbyangs nas po ris mang du nim bu'i chu shal bar 'gyur/ sbyangs zin nas gcod sman a phi ma/ dza ti/ am+b+ha sha 'bras kyi nang ki ko la/ bidza so mar tsa ya rnams cha mnyam
257a1(mdo 'grel): thog mar dza ti dang a phI ma gnyis mar sar chung ngu dang mnyam du btags/ de nas bzhi ga chabs cig zhib par btags la bye kar raM sbrang rigs kyis rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam
257a2(mdo 'grel): sgril nas ril bu re btang/ nges 'grim pa'i rigs gang yin kyang chod do/ /yang na dza ti 'i khog brus pa'i nang du a phI ma sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam zhig blug ste kha spyad la gro zhib kyi pag gis dril la gci ba'i me du pa
257a3(mdo 'grel): yal ba'i dkyil du bsregs/ pag de bag leb chos pa tsam gyis tshad du sleb pa dang ston la dza ti de nas thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re zos pas nges par chod do/ / ` yang na zla ba gong gi bzhi po la sbyongs sman/ dzai pa la/
257a4(mdo 'grel): pu? ra/ gand+ha ka?// ma rE tsa/ pi pa la/ suM tha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/ thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re chu bskol gyis 'phrul nas btang de nang ro sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ /de gcod lugs gong dang 'dra'o/ /dan rog?
257a5(mdo 'grel): dngul chu/ mu zi ser po pa'i pha pi pi ling/ lba lga? yang na dzai pa la se ba bcu gnyis/ mi ra tsa zho do/ tsa wo la 'bru lnga bcu rnams zhib par btags pa skyu ru ra''bras bu'i chod tsam re mar sar gyis dril la btang/ de'i rjes
257a6(mdo 'grel): su chu bskol hu ba gsum tshe ma re 'thung/ ` yang na se rang? gi huM Da/ du ba ra la pa/ pho? ri la b+hau rA Da/ 'bras ha ra ta ki'i tshig gu'i nang gi snying po rnams cha mnyam btags la thun tshad sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam re bu ram gyis dril
257a7(mdo 'grel): la btang?/ /de rjes chu bskol phul gang tsam re 'thungs sh+ri laN+Da pas shal skyug gnyis ka 'byung/ ` yang na dzai pa dan? rog la pags pa bshas pa zho brgyad kyi tshod tsam ras dri ma med pas gtums la skud pas kha bsdams/ snod gang ri su
257b1(mdo 'grel): 'o ma bre do tsam blug la gor gi ras thums de so ra? bzhi tsam 'o mar ma reg pa skud pas khebs gcod la btags/ de nas khebs rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'tshor bar bstums nas 'o ma de phyed tsam skam tshod kyi bar la me btang/ de nas sman byung?
257b2(mdo 'grel): bshags la lce ston/ de dang shwa ta dzi ra/ a je ba Na/ mi ra tsa/ pi pi la lnga cha mnyam la btags/ de nas gong gi 'o as khu ba byas nas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril/ /ril bu re btang la de nas chu bskol 'thung ngo/ /bad bo/ nag po/ nya/ snron/
257b3(mdo 'grel): chu stod /dbyug gu rnams kyi a ram ? ? phud pho rim pi po ling Da'i 'bras bu/ dzai pa la/ Shai ra/ tsa wo la/ sen+d+rA /tsi ra tsa rnams tsha mnyam btags la bod kyi thun tshad tshe phyogs cam chu grang giS rta byas gtong/ zla ba'i
257b4(mdo 'grel): khyad ma gtogs phan yon dang nus pa 'dra/ ` yang na dzai pa la btul dan 'dra ma/ dan rog pi pa la/ 'bras rgya tshwa pho res /mi ra ca/ shwe ha dzi ra/ tsu ka rnams cha mnyam btags/ lga'i chu'i nang du zhag gcig
257b5(mdo 'grel): s+tha ngas lag nas snon te rdzogs nas ras kyi khud du btsir ba'i dan rog khu bas rta byas la ril bu pi pi ling skyu ru ra tsam sgril/ ril pho ras bu re chu zir dkar po grang gis rta byas nas gtong ngo/ /` yang na dzai ma la chu khol
257b6(mdo 'grel): phangs re la bardze ? sa re byas pa lan brgyad kyi bar bcos/ dre nas lce ston/ de dan a ga ra/ ShaN+Da gsum cha mnyam li zhab par btags 'un tshad bod dang 'dra ba chu grang gis rta byas la btang ngo/ /` yang na/ ni la dan rog ka waM
257b7(mdo 'grel): gis bdungs pa'i khu bar skyu ru bzhi pa par btags pa btab/ ni m+bu chu nud? drad a? bya plug bya kar lcags skyogs kyi nang du zhag gi cag bzhag /sgra dang sma ra dkar por song bar zhag gsum gyi bar/ nyin ri la khru thang re la?/
258a1(mdo 'grel): byugs theng re byed/ sla dkar nA gong bzhin byed/ me la ka rA sa/ bud med kyi 'o ma gsum sbyar la ltes byugs pas kyang phebs so/ /` yang na /suM Da/ kA ka Da sing+gi/ d+ha pa ra'i me tog gsuM
258a2(mdo 'grel): cha mnyam la bu raM gyis dril la btang thun tshad gang dang 'dra'o/ /` gcod sman gong dang 'dra/ ` bse dug gi sman la/ ba li wa/ a dza wa Na/ bu ram rnying pa gsum zho bcu gnyis ra cha mnyam btags la/ dngul chu se
258a3(mdo 'grel): ba bzhi bsres de la ril bu dgu bcos la nyi ma dgu'i bar re re khyur ming byed/ de'i bar pag dang thug ba tshwa sngor med ba ma nu khrag can la la phud ma gtogs gzhan ma za btung thams cad 'dzem/ des 'phral du
258a4(mdo 'grel): phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang na ha ra Da/ mi ra tsa/ ni la tho tha gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags te sman tshags la btsags la ba mar sar par sbyar nas rma gang 'dug la byugs pas 'phral du phan par 'gyur zhing

258a6(mdo 'grel): spangs pa'i khu bas rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril la ril bu re khyur mi byed do/ /` yan? gna ma na si la/ dngul chu mu zi ser po hA ri ta la/ ku dra/ gu Ni puts+tsha'i rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam zhib par

258b1(mdo 'grel): Na'i pa Da gal Da ? pa'i phye ma rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags sbrang gis rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas te ming par bya'o/ /yang na/ pA ra se ba bzhi/ ha la da se ba bzhi/ a dza wa Na se ba bzhi/ Shai ra se ba bzhi/ bi la wa zho gang?/
258b2(mdo 'grel): gu Da se pa bcu drug rnams zhib par btags la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam byas nyi ma bdun gyi bar la re re za zhing sman zas nas ma 'du bar la dro bcos byed do/ /dngul chu ` yung nga yang pA rA/ la la phud til nag /gaNd+ha ka/ a dza wA Na sa mu khrag can

258b4(mdo 'grel): dang 'o lga bu pa? ma ma gtogs 'dzem/ ma nu khrag can so rnyil dang rke la sogs ba skrangs kyang sman ltar chags su btang bas grol par 'gyur ro/ /` yang smyug ma'i lo ma'i rtse/ saM b+hA lu'i lo ma/ oM gA'i lo ma/ swe ta d+hU pa'i lo ma/ hid+gu la

258b6(mdo 'grel): ji hu'i me tog zhi zhibs? btags? ma da ra la bcags/ bu raM dang cha mnyam la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril ba nyin bdun gyi bar re re khong du btang/ pA rA/ ni ba gnyis se ba bzhi bzhi zhib par btags/ nim+bu'i thang chu sa 'khar sder gyi
258b7(mdo 'grel): nang du sgrul? la rkang pa dang lag pa la sman za ba dang mnyam du byugs/ de'i bar gyi dri chu rdza snod lta bur bsags pa'i chu'i nang du gong gi dngul chu dbul chu se ba'i grangs grangs gang btang ba de yong zhing de 'phral phan par 'gyur ro/ /
259a1(mdo 'grel): 'de'i bar la bag thug las dngar skyur sogs 'dzem/ ` gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang mtshan bar rdol ba la/ pi pi ling phags pa zhib par btags pa thur? mgo? ngo tsam ba'i zho phul gang tsam la btab ste/
259a2(mdo 'grel): 'thungs pas myur du phan/ ` yang na/ nad pa mgo zhabs slob ste rkang ba gdung ma lta bud btags la pa'i gci bas rtsa lam nan cher bkrus/ de nas ma nu khrag can gyi khrag ston la byugs/ de steng u Na da zhib par btags pa'i
259a3(mdo 'grel): phye ma chas sbrus pa'i pag gis bkag? de'i thog tu sol me lta bu me rdog chung ngu zhig chu chad gcig tsam gyi bar bzhag/ de nas me bsal la de bshul du su ma la se mo tsam zhig chu tshod gcig tsam gyi bar bzhag /de nas
259a4(mdo 'grel): bag dang bcas pa bsal bas 'bu mang du thon yod zhing phan no// ` yang na bu ram dang pi pi ling cha mnyams la pi pi ling zhib par btags pa bu ram gyis rta byas ril bu go yu tsam re zos na phan par 'gyur zhing 'di khyad pa
259a5(mdo 'grel): par byis pa chung du la phan no/ /` yang na lcags snod na dmar gsar pa'i nang du ya ru ra sol bar ma song tsam btsos/ de nas ston te zhib par btags pa'i phye ma slar yang gong gi mar de la btab nas ril bu dza ti tsam re zos
259a6(mdo 'grel): pas kyang pham bar 'gyur ro/ /` yang til pi la wa/ ang? Da/ phu Da/ ci tA rnams cha mnyam la zhib par btags/ sbrang rtsis rta byas la ril bu skyu ru ru tsam byas nas zos na yang phan no/ /` yang na/ nga la bzhi ba
259a7(mdo 'grel): par btags pa dang yin ? Da cha bsnyams pa rtsa lam gyi khar btab langs? kyis bsngams ta bzheg pas kyang phan no/ /` yang 'phongs lu gan gci ba'i me du pa med pa'i steng du sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa btab pa'i du lu ma?
259b1(mdo 'grel): ba bdags? na 'phral ru pha/ ` dzA rA ku sha te rims 'phrog lcags kyu'i sbyong pa bdun pa ni/ ngan reg dug bral/ dngul chu dug pral/ pa tan dug/ pho ris/ pi pi ling sgra/ /chal bsregs pa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun

259b3(mdo 'grel): ril lu byas btang na khrag tshang/ mkhris tshang/ rlung tshang/ bad kan gyi tshang pa sogs tshang pags gsar rnyid thams cad la phan no/ /` ngan rag dug bral/ /dngul chu btul ma/ mu zi ser po/ tsha la bsregs pa'i thal ba/

259b6(mdo 'grel): chu btul ma mu zi ser ba/ mtshal/ zangs bye btul ma/ citA/ pi pi ling/ a ru ra/ ba ru ra/ skya ru ra rnams cha na nyam zhib bde btags la/ b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i chus sbus la skam thag tshong? pa dang phya ma thung mgo re tsam
259b7(mdo 'grel): btang bas rims tshad kyi rigs mdza' dag la phan no/ /` ngan rog dug bral/ dngul chu btal ma/ mu zi ser po/ a la pha ris/ pi pi ling/ tshal rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la bya dkar dang mnyam du ba mang gsang/ /
260a1(mdo 'grel): pas sgril la btang na khrag tshad/ mkhris tshad/ rlung tshad/ bad kan gyi tshad pa/ rgyu tshad/ 'cham tshad/ 'khrugs tshad/ rims tshad de tshad pa brgyad la mchog tu phan no/ /` dan rog
260a2(mdo 'grel): dug bral dang ngan 'dra se ba bcu gnyis/ pho ris/ tshal bsregs pa'i thal ba/ pi pi ling gsum se ba bzhi re rnams zhib par btags/ b+h+ring+ga? rA dza'i khu bas sbrus la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam byas pa thun tshad ril bu gsum
260a3(mdo 'grel): re btang bas rims tshad kyis rigs mdza' dag la phan no/ /nges rims 'phrog lcags kyu'i sbyor ba bdun pa rdzogs so// //` go yu/ mu sa li/ 'jam 'bras kyi 'bru /pi pi
