260a6(mdo 'grel): btsags ba la gong gi sman btab nas 'dres par byas/ de nas ba'i 'o ma lhad med khal go mu'i bzhi 'gyur gcig tsam snod du mer ma gar ba byas bsdus nas gsum gcig tsam du 'dus pa dang/ de la blug ste skya bas
260a7(mdo 'grel): dkrug cing skyo ma gang la? tsim du 'dus pa dang ta 'u Shi ra btab la dkrug cing zan dron tsam du sleb ba dang me thag bcad de grangs su bcug la ril bu skyu ru ra che phyogs tsam re btang bas 'di ni go yur brtan pa'i spyi 'joms
260b1(mdo 'grel): chen mo ste rlung/ mkhris/ bad kan/ 'dus pa/ tshang pa gsar rnying/ dug gi rigs/ slan/ rmu chu/ khrag sogs mdor na nad kyi rigs gang la'ang 'dis mi phan pa med do/ /` yang gong gi ril bu dang mnyam pa'i shel dkar lcags snod du chu cung zad blug la
260b2(mdo 'grel): sgor/ chu thag chad nas/ dza te/ li shi/ dza ti'i me tog/ sug rmel bzhi shel dkar gyi bcu cha re zhib par btags pa dang gong gi ril bu btab la cung zad sgor te ril bu skyu ru ra nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la tho rangs zas ma zos pa'i gong du ril bu re
260b3(mdo 'grel): rgyun du brten na stobs 'phel zhing rgas kha sra ba/ lus yang ba/ dangs kha bde ba/ rtsal che ba/ blo rno ba/ mig gsal ba/ rna ba gsang ba/ so brtan pa/ skra dkar gnyer ma mi 'byung ba/ 'dod pa spyod nus pa/ nad dkon pa sogs phan yon
260b4(mdo 'grel): bsam las 'das so/ /` chu bsags tsha grang gang la'ang bi sa lo tsa na/ si ma la khA ra dkar po dang ser po/ rgya gar stod ja/ bi la wa rnams cha mnyam pa zhib par btags pa na'i khu bas zho sla ba tsam byas pa nyin gsum gyi bar
260b5(mdo 'grel): rdo gzhong gi nang du nyes nye bag tsam song ba dang ril bu sran chung cu gang ma tsam byas pa skrangs che na ril bu gnyis dang gzhan ma re ba ma nu khrag can mar gsar pa btsags bcad nas 'thungs na yang phan par 'gyur zhing
260b6(mdo 'grel): mar gsar ma gtogs gzhan 'dzem/ nad ji ltar tshan che yan thun bdun gyis ngas par thon no// ` bI ga dang ShA Da cha mnyam la phye mar btags so/ ba'i zho phul gyi gsum cha tsam la btab rgas 'thungs na yang phan par 'gyur zhing
260b7(mdo 'grel): 'tsis? byed ring dmar skyur dang kha tsha? dul? sum 'dzem/ /so ma ra tsa dang bye kar cha mnyam ba zho go mar bye kar hub gang la sbyar nas btang na khag mkhris las gyur ba'i chu nad thon zhing mkhris pa 'grim pa yang chod do/ /ta? yang
261a1(mdo 'grel): na/ za tshong 'dab rgyas dar ma'i dus kyi rtsa ba gang byas khog ma'i nang du blug la chu mang nyung ji ltar yang khebs gcod rgyab la rlangs pa mi 'tshor ba byas pa'i chu sum gnyis bsdus pa'i khu ba tsha mo
261a2(mdo 'grel): phor pa gang btungs lags kyis byibs pi tshu ba la rdul thon par byed pa gnad du che'o/ /` tsan dan dmar po dang btsag rdo gnyis cha mnyams pa zhib par btags la chus rta byas ril bu go yu'i 'phru tsam ril btang bas kyang/
261a3(mdo 'grel): phan no/ /` 'o su lo ma 'bru bcas rdzogs pa'i khu bas bsku/ bsnye byas kyang skrangs po 'phral rak+ta? tsadan? du 'joms ge tu par 'gyur ro/ /` sa mu dra pha la mang nyung ji tsam yod kyang ra'i gcin gyis kha spus nyin re la lan
261a4(mdo 'grel): gsum re btab pa/ de bzhin ba 'o ma/ b+h+ring+ga? rA dza'i khu ba rnams kyis nyin bdun re skem bkru byed/ de nas zhib par btags la thun tshad san ma gsum nas gcig gi bar nad babs che chung skabs dang brtun/ ` ra ma'i gcin
261a5(mdo 'grel): gyis khu pa byas nas mgo phyed na bar gang na ba'i phyogs kyi mig la 'byug pa'am sna la? blug pas phan zhing mig la byugs pas mig ser por song ba la yang phan /` ye ma kar dang mnyam du btang na ched pa gsar rnying thams
261a6(mdo 'grel): cad la phan/ ` ba'i dar bas rta byas te 'thungs na rlung rgyu mkhris kyi nad zug shin tu che ba la phan / ` hing+ga dang mnyam du btang na mkhris srin skye thung gzugs dang srin leb srin 'bu chung ngu sogs len nas bde bar 'gyur ro/ /`
261a7(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi la sbyar nas bse dug gi rma dang thor pa la bskus na 'phral du phan par 'gyur zhing/ lce dig shing khar? pas gtam? yun ring mi thon pa dang pho ba spos pa khong du btang bas phan/ ` yungs ba dang mnyam du btang na skyug
261b1(mdo 'grel): sman gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /` rang chu 'am ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na ma 'ju ba la phan zhing spyongs kyang phebs par 'gyur ro/ /` d+h+ring+ga? rA dza'i khu bas ril bu byas la btang na mig ser la phan/ ` pi pa la'i pags pa dang mnyam du zas nams rlung? gyen
261b2(mdo 'grel): ldog dang rlung rgyu mkhres la mchog tu phan no// ` yang ra ma'i chus rta byas btang na skya rbab la phan/ ` a d+hA dzA Da'i khu bas ril bu byas btang na dangs ma 'dzag pa la phan no/ /la la phud dang mnyam du btung na rims nad nyi ma re mos kyis nag
261b3(mdo 'grel): la phan no/ / ` ba'i 'o ma dang mnyam du btang na stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro// ` lga dang mnyam du btang na dangs ma 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /` a ka la ka ra phye mar byas pa dang mnyam du btang na khong pa'i srin 'bu thams cad phyir thon nas bde'o//
261b4(mdo 'grel): ` nim bu'i khu ba dang mnyam du btang na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no/ /` rang chu khyer gsum gyis 'phul te btang bas ni nA bI zer ba'i rkang lag gi ser mo dang sna gang la thebs kyang chad 'gro ba zhig yong ba de la phan/ ` yang nad de la sngags
261b5(mdo 'grel): byad na/ sar bcos kha byed rgyu'i do nub nad pa'i lus bkrus la mal bde bar nyal bcug sang zhogs sngags mkhan gyis phyin la nad pa las 'dom do tsam gyis 'gyangs byas la bsdad/ rkang lag gang na ba de bstan la 'og gi sngags
261b6(mdo 'grel): 'dren pa dang mnyam du 'bras sind+hu ra bsres pas nang pa brab/ rkang lag gang yin kyang mi gnyis tsam gyis zin kyang mi thub par sdugs mkhan gyi sar sleb yong bas khru gang tsam du sleb pa dang gris 'phred la re khA gsum 'then/ gang na
261b7(mdo 'grel): ba de 'bras? btsos pa'i zan da ri sind+hu? ra bsrang? ba'i gtums la bzhag pas phan no/ /sngags ni/ oM gA dzaM ta g+ho ra ta A ba tA tsha ra tsha du u tAr? ta a ba tA ha ya/ na ba nA ri ba ha tra ko ShA su Sha pa ra tA A ba ta ha ya/ bA hA te A ba ra ha
262a1(mdo 'grel): ya ga Dd+ha? ga ya ni te A ba tA ha ya/ kA ba ru ko ko ta bA la di lI ko pa ta sA ha/ seSha si lA ra ru ra ka ni ke pu ta ma ha ma dA pi ra man+ta paDd+ha? ta/ bad+hi Shu rA sa na b+he dzye b+hu ta bAM d+hi pre? ta bAM d+hi
262a2(mdo 'grel): de ba bAM d+hi dA no bAM d+he/ ma ri yA ma sA na bAM d+hi kA la b+hai ro pAM dI/ aSh+Ta b+hai ra ba bAM d+hi lo ha ro ha bo nA si d+ha sha d+ha baM d+hi pA na phu la ko? bAM d+hi/ te la ta le ko bAM d+hi b+hA ta du d+ha ko bAM d+hi/ ka ra na ka ra tu ti ko bAM d+hi She? raM She raM She/
262a3(mdo 'grel): h+ra pA la bAM d+hi/ a Tho ta ra so nI nA i baM d+hi bA rA sya ma pA? na bAM d+hi te rA sya ka ru bA pAM d+hi/ tso dA sya b+haM sA su ra bAM d+hi saM Sha nI DaM ka nI bAM d+hi pa ta/ tsha nI bAM d+hi be ga ni bAM d+ha to bA bA A da ma kI do hA a'i/ bi bi phA ta mA ki du hA a'i
262a4(mdo 'grel): su ba ra mu ra bA / bi bi phA ta mA ki dA ba na gi ra/ na ba lA Sha a si ha dzA ra pi ra pi kaM bar bA d+hi Da ri/ a ba de Sho re ma ha ma dwA pi te re man+t+ra ki sak+tI/ u ta ra ko u ta ra bAM d+hi/ da tsha na ko da cha na nAM d+hi pa tshI ma ko pa che ma bAM
262a5(mdo 'grel): d+hi/ purba ko purba bAM d+hi/ kA Tha kI ro Ti bAM d+hi phi re ma ha ma dA pi rA se Sha si la ra pa Dd+ha ta man+t+ra/ pA d+hi DA rI me rI b+hak+tI gu ru kI sik+ta phu ro man+t+ra a'i swa ri bA? tsA/ zhes pa'o/ /` rA sa rA dze shwa ra te bcud len dbang
262a6(mdo 'grel): phyug rkyal po'i sbyor ba ni/ dngul chu dug bral/ mu zi ser po/ mri ta sA ra /zangs phye/ tA la ka/ btsan dug /tshal? dkar/ si ma la/ mdong ros/ rgya tshwa/ lcags phye /zha nye dkar po'i phye ma /dza ti/ bong nga dmar po nang
262a7(mdo 'grel): ljang gu /mus li/ dza ba Sha ra/ nI ba/ pa ya bi rang+ga /skyer gang tu ha ri dra/ chu shing nag pos go chod tsa/ a ka la ka ra/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/ gur gum/ nA ga ke sa ra chung ba/ tsu ka/ ru d+ha ku Ta/ kA ka ra sing+gi/ hi ri ? si
262b1(mdo 'grel): ma la k+Sha? ma gu ni /bong nga dmar po/ ni ri b+hi se/ la la phud/ khu ra sa ni a dza wa na/ mu sham+ba ra/ sa mu dra pha la/ lga/ pi pi ling/ pho ba ris/ 'bras bu gsum/ zi ra nag po rnams cha mnyam dang ga pur nyis 'gyur/ de thams cad
262b2(mdo 'grel): dang dang rag du? dbyung tshar ba bsnyams par btags la dar la btsags/ b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bas brus la zha gnyer gcig gi phar btags te ril bu pho ris tsam sgril/ kA la dzIr? ril bu re b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i? khu ? bas rta byas btang na/
262b3(mdo 'grel): rlung chad gsar rnying thams cad la phan/ ` bye kar dang mnyam du btang na mkhris tshad gsar rnying thams cad la phan/ zhing zas gang zos kyang 'grims 'gro ba la btang na yang chad par 'gyur ro/ /` chang la pi pi ling phye ma
262b4(mdo 'grel): btab pas rta byas btang na bad kan la brten pa'i tshad pa 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /` ra ma'i gcin gyis rta byas nas btang na pho ba'i nad mA la dzwa re la phan/ ` soM pha dang pho ris mnan la btang na tshad pa'i rigs thams cad la phan/
262b5(mdo 'grel): ` skya ru ra dang ba'i mnan la btang na pho ba na zhing dbugs mi thon pa la phan/ ` nI pa'i lo ma dang mnyam du zos na i ka'i nad la phan/ dang ga mi ba dang lcabs dri gi nad go snyod ` b+h+ring+ga ra'i khu bar sbyar te mig la byugs na mig ser la phan no//
262b6(mdo 'grel): ` ? dang? la la phud mnan te byin na bud med kyis pa btsas ba'i rjes su sked pa dang tshang ra na ba la ba na/ ` ka ra dang kyi bu'i mnyam du btang na zas skom che grangs gang 'grams pa gcod par 'gyur ro/ / ` pA na dang mnyam du btang na
262b7(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa'i nad la phan/ ` ba'i sar dang mnyam du zas na bud med mngal chags nas mi gnas pa gnas par 'gyur ro/ /` ra'i 'o mas rta byas btang na dangs? ma 'dzag pa chod do/ /` skyu ru ra'i khu bas rta byas te btang na mu chu
263a1(mdo 'grel): 'jog pa la phan par 'gyur ro/ / ` ni ma du'i khu bar sgyar la sna bug tu blug na mgo phyed na ba la phan zhing mig la byugs na 'byugs po'i ga rong ba la phan/ ` 'o su dang ba mar mnan nas btang
263a2(mdo 'grel): na sbrul gyi dug la phan/ ` lga'i khu bas rta byas nas btang na sdig ba'i dug la phan/ ` nA gang ma tha dad mnyam du btang na gnyid chung du 'gro'o/ /` mA la kangku ni dang mnyam du btang na lus stobs 'phel lo/ /rta ni la gong gsal rnams nyin
263a3(mdo 'grel): bdun re'i bar gtong zhing zas gcod nad so so'i skabs thob sbyor/ ` spyi sman go ra ba? sgang tso le'i sbyor ba ni/ li shi/ dza ti'i me tog/ sman chen/ ku Ta ki/ mu sa li/ sug smal/ ba ya bi rang+ga/ ma nu khrag can /g+hi wa
263a4(mdo 'grel): ka ra/ ma ra ha Ti/ dngul chu/ bong nga dmar po/ mu zi ser po/ bab bla/ dan rog dug bral rnams zho gsum re dang/ jel ba tri la la phud zho bco lnga rnams zhib par a la tsi btags pa dar zho pyed gnyis la
263a5(mdo 'grel): tsags/ b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bod nga dkar po bcag nas dkyil ldang khu yod pa gnyis bas sgrus la rdo gzhong? nang du nyin nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar nyed cing skabs skabs su nyi mar cung zad bstan/ sa ha de ba'i khu bas sbrus la nyin gsum gyi bar
263a6(mdo 'grel): nyes la ril bu sma ru mgo nag tsam sgril zhos rta byas nas btang na chu ser rlung ldan la phan/ nyin bdun gyi bar btang ngo/ /` dan 'dra phye mar btags/ gong gi ril bu las sum 'gyur gyis che ba bcas btang na sbyongs phebS
263a7(mdo 'grel): sa/ /` ba mar gsang pas khu ba byas nyin re re ril bu bzhi re nyi ma bdun gyi bar btang na rlung dang nad dang me drod nyams pa mig gi a raN+Di rab rib la phan no/ /` b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bas rta byas nyi ma gcig la ril bu bzhi btang na
263b1(mdo 'grel): rlung? rigs 'dar bu la phan no/ /` ra'i 'o mas rta byas nas btang na dangs ma 'dzag ba tsha grang gang la yang phan/ ` pa'i chus rta byas na sang nus ba gong dang 'dra'o/ /` yang dangs ma chu dang mnyam du 'dzag cing nad zug byad na go yu dang mnyam du
263b2(mdo 'grel): btang bas phan no/ /` yang khrag tu 'dzag na a ba la'i? khu bas rta byas btang na phan par 'gyur ro/ /nim bu'i khu bar sbyar la mig la pags na 'byung po gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /` 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma thur mgo gsum
263b3(mdo 'grel): tsam dang ril bu bzhi mnyam du btang na mas rlung skyu rur gyen log dang stod rlung sogs rlung rigs dang yan lag zha ba la phan/ ` yang zi ra dkar po dang mnyam du btang na yang mas rlung gyen log dang stod rlung sogs rlung rigs la phan no/ /
263b4(mdo 'grel): ` a ma li zho gang dang ril bu bzhi mnyam du btang na rga? 'tshag rgyu chen po med pa la yang lang 'tshag dgos shing bcags pa dang na tsha tshan po yod ba la phan/ ` sho mo sa dang mnyam du btang na dangs ma 'phel zhing 'dod ba sbyod nus par 'gyur
263b5(mdo 'grel): ro/ /` zi ra nag po dang mnyam du chur brdar nas so na ba'i thad kyi phyi la byugs na zlug? gzer 'phral du zhi'o/ /` thang khrom gyi lo ma nyung zad dang ril pu re btang mi thin grang mkhris kyi nad la phan/ ` si bA ra dang lhan du brdar nas
263b6(mdo 'grel): bas dug gi rma dang shu ba la byugs na 'bral du phan/ ` 'bras chung sbangs ba'i khu bas rta byas btang na btsan rta d+hur? dug sbyar dug gyur dug sogs dug rigs thams cad la mchog tu phan ro/ /chu dang sngan? po ` bod spangs kyi khu
263b7(mdo 'grel): ba la sbyar nas lus la bsku ba snye byas na 'dus pa'i nad la phan no/ /` b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu bas rta byas khong du btang kyang 'dus nad la phan no/ /` phag brun mar bsregs pa'i thal ba dang bong bu'i gcin la raM la bu brdar nas sna
264a1(mdo 'grel):  ` blug na mi ni'i mgol 'bu yod pa'i me chu nyi zla sogs 'od can la bltas nas rgyal zer kyi 'gyel 'gro ba la phan nang la mchog tu phan/ ` chang gis rta byas nas btang na sha lhad gon?
264a2(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /` shing a ka la lan gsum gyi ka ra'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang na bad kan skya smug mdza' dag la phan no/ /` zangs kyi snod du pa'i zho khyong gang tsam blug par ril bu btab ste legs par bsnud la khong du
264a3(mdo 'grel): btang na ma 'ju ba'i rigs thams cad la phan no/ /` bye kar dang mnyam du btang na mkhris nga la phan/ ` spang rtsi dang mnyam du zas na lus stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /` pa thu ba'i lo ma brdungs pa dang mnyam
264a4(mdo 'grel): du btang na mkhris pa sha ser dang rdel nad la phan/ ` ma nu khrag can chung du dang mnyam du btang na gseb dri sogs lus kyi rdul chen po'i dri dang chu rtags kyi dri ngan pa la phan/ ` sle tres dang mnyam du btang grang ba 'dzag
264a5(mdo 'grel): pa tsha grang tha dag phan/ nye shing pa dang mnyam du btang na rlung gi nad? zug byed pa dang ba byi pa sogs la phan/ ` la la phud shu dag gnyis phye mar btags/ bag ni bril nas za pa dang mnyam du btang na shed? pa na la phan/ /` chus?
264a6(mdo 'grel): rta byas nas lo gsum zla ba gsum zhag gsum nyi ma'i gsum cha gsum gyi bar ril bu re bar ma chad par brten na lus kyi nad gsar rnying thams cad 'byang zhing lus stobs 'phel ba dang rgas kha sra ba sogs phan yon
264a7(mdo 'grel): bsam las 'das so/ /nad par gtong skabs zas sbyong sogs nad babs dang bstun te skabs dang sbyar ro// //` skran gyi sman la dan 'dra'i rtsa ba zho bzhi/ lga dang kha ru sa ca la lo Na ?
264b1(mdo 'grel): zho phyed do re/ shing kun se ba lnga rnams chu phor pa gsum la btab la cha gnyis bsdus pa ri phor gang khong du btang na rlung skran 'phral du zhig par 'gyur ro/ /` yang mgron bu mer bsregs pa'i thal ba/ pho ris/ pi pi ling/ lga/ tsi tA/ kha ru tshwa?
264b2(mdo 'grel): rnams zhib par btags pa dang la btsags la thur mgo do cam chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na skran gyi rigs thams cad la phan no/ /` shing kun cha phyed/ zi ra dkar po/ lga/ kha ru tshwa/ 'o su rnams cha re bcas thang thun cam chu phor pa
264b3(mdo 'grel): gsum gyi nang du btab/ cha gnyis bsdus la btang na mkhris skran zhig par 'gyur ro/ /` kA ka ra sing+gi/ d+ha ba ra'i me tog/ lga bu raM rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i ril bu ba d+ha ni nya? ru ra tsam re btang na po skran zhig par
264b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /rgya tshwa/ kha ru tshwa/ tsi tA /lga/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam dang shing cha phyed bcas zhib par btags la thur mgo do tsam chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na skran gyi rigs mdza' dag la phan/ ` ke la ka'i rtsa ba/
264b5(mdo 'grel): ngan 'dra'i sand+ha? rtsa ba/ lga/ ci tA/ rgyam tshwa rnams cha mnyam dang shing kun cha phyed bcas dang thun tsam chur bsdu lugs gong bzhin byas btang na rlung la brten pa'i ma ba zhu ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /a ru ra dang lga cha mnyam la
264b6(mdo 'grel): shing kun cha phyad bcas zhib par btags pa thur mgo ngo tsam chu bskol gyis 'phul te btang na me drod nyams pa'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyam tshwa/ kha ru tshwa/ lga/ tsi tA/ ba ru ra/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam pa dang shing kun
264b7(mdo 'grel): cha phyed bcas zhib par btags la thun tshad gong bzhin chu bskol gyis 'phul te btang na khrag la brtan pa'i ma 'ju ba'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /` m+bron thal/ lga/ pi pi ling/ li shi/ dza ti/ kha ru tshwa rnams cha mnyam?
265a1(mdo 'grel): zhib bar btags la chu bskol gyis 'phul btang na rlung skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /pho ris/ pi pi ling/ lga/ la la phud/ zi ra nag bo rnams cha mnyam dang shing kun cha phyed bcas phye mar tags la chu
265a2(mdo 'grel): bskol gyi 'phul nas btang na chu skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /` pho ris/ pi pi ling/ lga/ la la phung/ rgyam tshwa/ tsi tA/ zi ra nag po/ shing kun rnams cha bsnams pa zhib par btags la chu bskol gyis 'phul nas btang na
265a3(mdo 'grel): skran gyi rigs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /` lga/ tig ta/ pi pi ling/ la la phud/ a ka la ka ra/ li shi/ khu ra sha na/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba rnams cha mnyam thang thun tsam chu sum gnyis bsdus pa'i khuba phor gang
265a4(mdo 'grel): btang na mkhris skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /` po ris/ citA pa ta pi pi ling/ lga/ rgyam tshwa/ la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib/ lad thad? rtse par btags la ba mar btsag bcad pas rta byas gtong zhing cung zad lus la byugs na
265a5(mdo 'grel): bud med bu btsas pa'i rjes su khrag mkhris kyi skran byung ba la phan no/ /` sprul sha dang lga cha mnyam zhib bar btags pa dar la btsags te se ba bcu drug re chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na rmu chu/ skya sbab kyis skrangs pa/
265a6(mdo 'grel): mkhris pa/ rlung/ mgon ba/ pho ban ba sogs nad gsar rnying mdza' dag la phan/ ` sprul gyi pags pa brjes pa me la bsregs pa zhib par btags pa mig la byugs na mig gi nad thams cad la phan zhing mig gsal
265a7(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /` sprul shun dang ba'i 'o ma mkhur bkang byas na so'i nad thams cad la phan no/ /` sgrul shun zhib par btags pa ba zho btsags bas sbrus la ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril la gong du btang na ba?
265b1(mdo 'grel): 'khrug la phan/ gnyen 'bur gyis skrangs par sbrul gyi khrag byugs na myu du phan/ ` rma bya'i sgro mdongs me la bsregs pa'i thal ba chu grang gis 'phul nas btang na khrag sogs skyug pa'i rigs chod par 'gyur ro/ /` sdig bla?
265b2(mdo 'grel): mer bsregs ba'i thal ba sran ma tsam chu grang gis rta byas btang na rdel nad 'phral du sel zhing bud med kyi nu ma skrangs ba la yang phan no/ /` sdig pa mer bsregs pa'i du ba khan bar btang na srog chags kyi gnod ba mi b+hi tshu? yi?
265b3(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ ` mi thod zhi ba par nyes la chur sbyar te byugs na 'bras bu skrang ba la phan/ ` mi thod med bsregs la thur mgo ngo tsam re khong du zhag bdun gyi bar btang na 'bras bu skrangs shin tu che ba la phan no/ /brkang lag
265b4(mdo 'grel): gi se mo gog ba'i nad la khang byil gyi klad ba byugs na 'phral du phan/ ? gdong la gro thig yod par khan byil gyi brun chu la sbyar la nyin bdun gyi bar du byugs na med par 'gyur ro/ /` spyi ther sogs mgo la skra med
265b5(mdo 'grel): par rta'i klad pa nyin bdun gyi tsi? Di bar du byugs na skra skye bar 'gyur zhing rgya dang smar d+haM? ming sogs 'dod kyang gang 'dod par byus pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ma he mi te ka sing+ga? rwa skyu ru ra dang mnyam du chu la bcos tshos ba dang stan
265b6(mdo 'grel): non? la mar b+ho ra ka ?/ /segs pa'i thal ba gong gi chur btab ste mgo bor byugs na skra shin tu bzang ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rjes su pags mtshams la chu ser 'phel ba'i rtegs byung na rao? snum gyi dkyil du bcos la byugs
265b7(mdo 'grel): pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /` pags nad khol bu ba sen mo btab kyang reg pa mi tshor ba dang skom pa la byi ba'i brun chur brdar ba byugs pas phan no/ /mdze'i? bcos thabs ni/ thog mar mdze la rigs rnam pa bdun te/
266a1(mdo 'grel): lU ta kuSh+Tha?/ /sarbe d+hA tu kuSh+Tha/ bi tsi tra kuSh+Tha/ su ma ku Sh+Tha/ tsan+d+ra ku Sh+Tha/ Sha She n+d+re kuSh+Tha/ rnam te de yang chu rlung gi mdze la thog mar sha lpags khul bur za zhing grang
266a2(mdo 'grel): na chu ser mang chu rlung tha ma ? brten ba'i mdzo mkhris rlung la brten pa'i mdze grang rlung la brten pa'i mdze khrag la brten pa'i mdze khrag mkhris la brten ba'i mrdo grang mdzo /sha khra du don yod/ ` mkhris rlung la gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la drod shin tu che zhing
266a3(mdo 'grel): mdog kyang cung zad dmar la brang na khrag kyang 'byung ba'o/ /` grang rlung la thog mar lus khol bur skrangs/ shing mdog kyang khra bor yong la rjes su tshigs che chung thams cad skrangs shing chu ser 'dag pa'o/ /` khrag mdze
266a4(mdo 'grel): la yan lag dang rna ba sna sogs kyi rtse chang cing rnag khrag 'dzag cing mdog kyang dmar por 'ong ngo/ /` khrag mkhris la brten pa gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la drod shin tu che ba'o/ /` grang mdze la mdog dkar zhing rnag
266a5(mdo 'grel): khrag chu ser mang du 'dzag go/ ` sha khra dogs par sla ba'o/ /de dag gi sman ni/ a ru ra gser mdog dang nag chung/ bcod/ du ba ral pa/ btsan dug/ ka na pi ra'i rtsa ba rnams zhib par btags la ba'i chus
266a6(mdo 'grel): brus nas nad gang yod la byugs na chu rlung gi mdze dang mkhris rlung gi mdzo la phan no/ / ` zangs kyi pang bu'i dzhi ring ra Da /na ny+dzil+la? nang du/ gri tra dgA? rapta mu zi ser po tsha la yung ba/ am pa'i 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam
266a7(mdo 'grel): zhab par btags la tsi tA'i shing gong gi cha gcig dang/ gi wa kwa ra'i shing ma gsum bcas blug la kha legs par bcad/ de rdza'i kho gos chang bzhag gi nang du bcug la kha bsdams te thab ni/ sha 'bras gyis lkog pa rtag pa'i ? ba
266b1(mdo 'grel): gong du zla ba drug gi bar du bzhag/ de nas ston la phye mar byas te ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar nas byugs pas grang rlung gi mdzes tshigs skrangs pa 'gral du zhi'o/ /` mu zi zer po/ thang khrem gnyis til snum gyi nang du skyur la ma tshig bar me btang/
266b2(mdo 'grel): de nas grangs thag chod pa dang byugs pas mkhris rlung la brten pa'i mdze la phan ne/ /` mu zi ser po/ 'bras bu gsum/ ma nu khrag can/ sgron me shing gi 'bru dngar skyur gnyis yod pa'i skyur ba/ til nag rnams cha mnyam
266b3(mdo 'grel): g+h+rIng+ga rA dza'i thang chu dang mnyam du btags la byugs na kon po dang pags pa se ko ltar song ba'i za phrug la phan / khrag mdze la phan no/ /` hi rim bi cha gcig/ tsiD? pho ris cha gnyis/ mi thod bsregs pa'i thal ba cha gsum rnams zhib par
266b4(mdo 'grel): btags la chu grang gis rta byas btang bas mdze nad kyi rigs thams cad la phan no/ /` khyung sder smug po/ dong ga'i 'bru/ bong ? dmar po na ? dgu nI ba/ bA ya bi rang+ga/ pi pi ling/ ? tA/ mu zi ser bo/ bong dmar nang
266b5(mdo 'grel): thur pa po de ? ljang rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun thur mgo do tsam re chu grang gis rta byas btang bu ri bu tsha /rwa dza pra kA na yang mdzo rigs kun la phan/ ` lga pi pi ling/ pho ris/ dang ga'i 'bru/ bong dmar/ skyu ru ra/
266b6(mdo 'grel): pa ru ra rnams cha mnyem zhib par btags la ba'i zhun mar la sbyar te byugs na chu rlung la brten pa'i mdze la phan/ ` sgog skya/ nI ba/ tsi tA/ bakwa? bla/ mu bri ser dpon? ka na bi ra'i rtsa ba sa suM?/ ru d+ha/ sho mo sa
266b7(mdo 'grel): lcags btul ma rnams cha mnam zhib bar btags la chang gis khu ba byas nas rdza snod du blug la legs par bcang/ gci ba la rtsen dang rta spangs rnyings pa'i dkyil du zhag nyer gcig gi bar bsnyal/ de nas ? ston la byugs ?
267a1(mdo 'grel): grang rlung la brten pa'i mdze dang khrag mkhris la brten pa gnyis la mchog tu phan/ ` kha ru tshwa/ dan rog/ sma ru mgo nag/ de steng go ra tsi li'i sbyor ba dang po'i ril bu rnams cha mnyam pa zhi ba?
267a2(mdo 'grel): par btags pa grang mdze'i rma gang yong la btsags bu rnon pos rtsa bas de la btab bas phan no/ /` mu zi ser po/ 'bras bu gsum/ rA ti b+huM b+ha tsi ma nu khrag can/ tig nag/ sgron me shing gi 'bru rnams cha mnyam
267a3(mdo 'grel): zhib par btags pa b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i khu ba dang sbyar nas byugs na yang grang mdze zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /` dan rog/ sma ru mgo nag /tsi tA rnams cha re/ dzo Sha ra cha gsum/ lga cha bzhi/ nI ba cha lnga rnams zhib par btags chu
267a4(mdo 'grel): la sbyar nas byugs na yang grang mdze zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /` dong ga'i 'bru/ til nag/ lga/ bu ram rnams cha mnyam la zhib par btags pa tshwa'i rigs lce 'bigs pa lta bu ril bu skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam byas btang na grang mdze dang
267a5(mdo 'grel): sha khral pa na no/ /sman de rnams gtor pa'i ring pag thug ma gtogs dkar skyur dmar gsum thams cad 'jem/ ` ya ma'i bcos la yang rigs gsum ste/ a da si si/ pi nA sa/ na thu ra rnams/ / ` de rnams
267a6(mdo 'grel): kyi sman? ni/ pag tshil/ bu ram/ lug gi mar gsum cha mnyam mer bskol la grangs pa dang snang blug na ya ma dkar po la phan no/ /` bye dkar/ kung+gu/ ba mar ya ma dkar po ya ma khra bo ya ma nag po tshag rdol rgyab yong
267a7(mdo 'grel): gsum ma ? mnyam ma mer ? la grangs pa dang snar blug kyang phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ shing dngar ra/ dze rbi ma d+hu pi pi ling gi rtsa ba gnyis zhib par btags pa'i mgo bo bzhod phyed ? sna dbang por 'gro mar btsag bcad pa dang sbyar
267b1(mdo 'grel): la snang blug kyang phan no/ /` pha ris 'bru gsum/ a tu sa'i lo ma'i khu ba dang mnyam du nyes la snar blug kyang phan no/ /` khra bo ya/ tsha la/ pi pi ling/ shug pa/ dzo Sha ra/ ngan 'dra'i rtsa ba rnams cha bsnyams pa zhib bar
267b2(mdo 'grel): btags/ lcags stong du snum la btab ste btsag chod pa dang grangs su bcug la snar blug na phan no/ /` yang na/ yung ba/ mu zi ser po/ tsha ba gsum re ba d+hwa ra zi ra dang/ bye kar/ a ma la'i 'bru/ ru d+ha/ shu dag/
267b3(mdo 'grel): tsan dan dmar po/ a sha gand+ha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chu dang/ yam nag po sbyar nas snar blug na sna nas 'bu don yong zhing phan la mgo 'khor la yang phan no/ /` yang/ pho ris phu ram gnyis
267b4(mdo 'grel): cha mnyam btags la chad skyur la sbyar nas snar blug kyang phan no/ /` 'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling cha mnyam btags la sbrang rtsis ril bu byas te khong du btang zhing/ sbrang rtsi chung sbyangs bas rta byas snyed blug kyang phan
267b5(mdo 'grel): zhim sna khrag 'dzag pa dang kha'i pring na ba la phan no/ /mgo bzhog phyed na ba la nag po la/ skyu ru ra zhib par btags la ba mar dang mnyam du bskol te gang na sang byugs pas phan/ ` bse 'bru'i me tog dang dru ba gnyis kyi khu ba
267b6(mdo 'grel): ra'i 'o ma dang bsras la snar brum pas phan no/ /` yang/ bi bi ling/ suM hadzna'i? 'bru/ bA ya ba rang+ga/ pho ris rnams cha mnyam btags la ba'i cha la sbyar nas snar byug cing cung zad sna'i nang du btang pas kyang phan zhing sna khrag
267b7(mdo 'grel): 'dzag pa yang tshad do/ /` bye kar dang ? nag pa la sbrang rtsi gnyis pa'i 'o mar sbyar nas snar gyi ?/ blug na phan no/ /` yang/ bal bo kha che/ ku suM b+ha bse 'bru'i me tog dU ba rnams kyi khu ba ra'i 'o ma dang bsres la snang blug na phan/ / ` dza mu?
268a1(mdo 'grel): na'i 'bru/ dU pa/ bse 'bru'i me tog gsum gyi khu ba snar blug na phan zhing sna khrag kyang 'chad do/ /` yang na/ lga dang dan 'dra'i rtsa ba chang skyur la sbyar nas gang na sar bsku bas byas
268a2(mdo 'grel): na phan/ ` yang lga zhib par btags la ba'i 'o mar sbyar nas snar blug na phan no/ /` b+h+ring+ga rA dza'i thang chu dang 'bras bu gsum zhib bar btags pa chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na yang phan no/ /` yungs da cha
268a3(mdo 'grel): gcig/ bse 'bru'i lkogs cha gnyis/ ku ra'i 'bras bu'i lkogs gsum/ star bu tsha bzhi rnams btags pa ril bu byas/ ba'i chu dang sbyar te dpal bar byugs kyang phan no/ /des ya ma dkar nag
268a4(mdo 'grel): khra gsum gyi bcos rdzogs so// //tsu ka ` bse 'bru'i lkogs/ spos dkar/ ? la phung/ dza ti/ a phI ma/ li ga dur rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la
268a5(mdo 'grel): thun chad thur mgo ngo tsam chu grang gis rta byas btang na rgyun du khrag 'khrims pa 'phral du tshong par 'gyur ro/ /nA bal ` gla sgang/ spos dkar/ sha 'bras kyi pa gan bde lkogs/ na ga ge sar gyi thang chu/
268a6(mdo 'grel): ma dzu'i 'bras bu/ bil ba'i nang gi 'bru/ d+ha pa'i me tog/ dza ti/ so ma ra tsa/ a phI ma/ li ga dur/ ke la me tog/ ka ka Da sing+gi/ yi shi/ la la phud rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dang la btsags te/
268a7(mdo 'grel): thur mgo do tsam re b+hi la ka ba'i zho dang mnyam du btang na 'grims nad tsha grang yang 'phral du chod do/ /` pi pi ling gi shing gi pags pa/ po ? ra'i rtsa ba/ d+ha wa'i me tog/ mu sa li/ sha 'bras kyi lkogs/ tri? gu
268b1(mdo 'grel): Da'i rtsa ga zir dkar po/ rgya gar stod ja/ a phI ma rnams cha mnyam btags pa dar la btsags/ thun tshad gong 'dra sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na khrag 'grims pa gcod do/ /` a pI ma/ ke la'i me tog/ pho ris/ la la phung rnams cha mnyam
268b2(mdo 'grel): zhib par btags la chu grang gis rta byas btang na yang nus pa god dang 'dra'o/ /` drag shul la brten pa'i lte ba'i rtsa 'phyus pa'i nad gang zos pa dang khrag rgyun par 'thims shing nud? zug yod sar 'phar ba zhig yong/ de'i bcos la/ sa 'bras
268b3(mdo 'grel): kyi shing gi pags pa/ na ga gser gyi thang chu/ a phI ma/ la la phud/ lig dur/ pha Da ka Di rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la dar la btsags pa thur mgo do tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na myur du phan zhing gzhan yang khrag 'grims
268b4(mdo 'grel): pa la phan no/ /` yang gong gi lte ba 'phyus pa'i nad de la nad pa rang gis rgyab tu lag pa g.yas kyis rkang pa g.yon gyi mthe bong zin/ lag pa g.yon gyis rkang pa g.yas kyi mthe bong zin/ de nas mi zhig gis lag pa bsnol
268b5(mdo 'grel): mchams nas lan bdun gyi bar du btegs pa skyang 'phral du phan zhing nad par 'phral du zug zer che bar yod yang de la tshad mi dgos so/ /` dza ti/ a phI ma/ ga pur/ gla rtsi/ thad khrom gyi/ so ma ra tsa rnams cha mnyam
268b6(mdo 'grel): zhib par btags pa dang la bcags pa thun tshad skyu ru ra tsam sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na zas mdog dang khrag sogs gang 'grims pa'i rigs gsar rnying tsha grang kun la ka phur ?  ri phan/ ` tshad pa sogs skom nad sel ba'i
268b7(mdo 'grel): sman ni/ ` 'bras bu gsum/ rgyam tshwa/ lo la phub rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thung mgo do tsam re chu phor gang gi nad du blug la phyed tsam skam pa dang grang thag bcad ras la btsags te khong du btang na phan no//
269a1(mdo 'grel): ` yang mkhris tshad la brten pa kho nas skom na/ pho ris dang bye kar cha mnyam zhib par btags pa ka ka ra sing+ga'i khu bas rta byas btang na phan/ ` chu bsgrims pa la/ tshol mer bsregs pa'i thal ba
269a2(mdo 'grel): thur mgo do tsam ba dar gis rta byas btab na myur du phebs so/ /` rgyam tshwa dang kha ru tsha zhib bar btags la chu bcus nas zhag gcig song bas rta byas btang na yang phebs so/ /` bi ba'i brun pa'i dar pas khu ba byas brdar la
269a3(mdo 'grel): rdo rje dang 'bras bu gnyis dang mgo bo'i mtshogs ma la byugs khong du yang cung zad btang bas myur du phebs nges so/ /` 'jam 'bras kyi snying po zhib par btags shel dkar dang mnyam du chus rta byas la btang na yang phabs so/ /
269a4(mdo 'grel): ` lha mo dbu mas lha dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba/ /kye lha yi lha mchog dbang phyug che/ khyed ni 'jig rten byed po ste/ /ka mtsho nad kun zhi zhing blo 'phel pa'i/ /sman mchog bdag la bstan du gsol// /ces gsol pa dang/ dbang phyug
269a5(mdo 'grel): gis bka' stsal ba/ nyon cig ri sras dpal chen mo/ /nad 'joms blo 'phel yon tan gter/ /sman mchog ma la kI gu ni'i/ /brten thabs phan yon bshad par bya/ /de la dang por bshal skyugs kyis lus dag par bkrus la nyin dang par
269a6(mdo 'grel): ma la ShAM gu ni'i? 'bru? gcig /gnyis par gnyis/ de nas rim bzhin nyin bdun gyi 'bru re spar/ nyin bdun nas gzung zla ba gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar 'bru bdun re bsten/ de bar zas gang? la'ang tshwa'i rigs 'joms pas rlung/ mkhris/ bad
269a7(mdo 'grel): kan/ 'dus 'da' ? sogs tsha grang gsar rnying thams cad rtsa ba nas 'byin par byed cing/ lus brtan pa dang/ gzi brjid che ba dang/ nad dkon pa/ mig gsal ba/ stobs 'phel ba sogs yon tan mdza' yas shing/ khyad par blo gros pad+ma kha phye
269b1(mdo 'grel): ba lta ra gyur nas blo rno ba/ 'dzin bzang ba/ rig pa gsal ba/ /brjed mi 'gro ba/ rtsod pa bzang ba sogs blo 'phel gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /` yang tshes bco lnga dang gza' nyi ma 'dzom pa'i mtshan mo ma la kI gu ni'i snum gyi
269b2(mdo 'grel): sgron me spar/ de la rkun po'i thod pa bkab nas du ba chags su bcug pa de mig la byugs na mig chus ma dag par lha 'dre mi gsum gang gis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /` yang gza' lhag pa yod pa'i nyi ma ? kAM gu ni'i
269b3(mdo 'grel): snum khol ma rnying pa'i nang du chu blug/ de steng ma la kA gu ni'i zhig par btags pa btab la bskol ba grangs su bcug pa'i snum kha zhag ltar yod ba zos la rting par byugs na mdze rigs kyi yan lag chad 'gro ba bsos par 'gyur zhing
269b4(mdo 'grel): gdong mdzes shing mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nyin nyer gcig gi ba snum se ba bcu gnyis re khong su btang na mdze'i rigs mdza' dag rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro/ /` yang gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin snod gtsang mar ba nag
269b5(mdo 'grel): mo'i 'o ma bskol/ de la ma la kI gu ni zhib par btags la btab ste ru ma dang bcas zho bsnyal/ de dkrogs te mar bcos la 'bras ba nag mo'i 'o mar bcos sar mar de nas seb bcu gnyis re btab pa zla ba gcig
269b6(mdo 'grel): zhag bcu'i? ? zos na/ skra dang smar dkar pos song ba slang nag por 'gyur ro/ /` gza' mig dmar yod pa'i nyin ba nag mo'i mar btsag bcad la phyed tsam grang bar ma la kI gu ni'i 'bru dang til nag cha mnyam phye mar btags
269b7(mdo 'grel): pa blug ste nyin dang por se pa bcu gnyis/ gnyis par zho gang se ba bzhi sogs nyin bdun gyi bar du cha re spar/ de nas rgyun du bsten thub na rab de min zla gcig dang zhag bcu'i bar du bsten na che shin tu ring bar 'gyur zhing
270a1(mdo 'grel): gang du 'gro/ yang 'gyogs bul rtsa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lha dbang phyug gis lha mo dbu mar gdams pa rdzogs so// //` a sha gand+ha gzhib par
270a2(mdo 'grel): btab pa'i phye ma zho gsum/ ba dkar rkyang/ nag rkyang lta bu spu mdog gang yin kyang mdog gzhan ma 'dres pa'i kha gtsang gi mar btsag bcad pa'i nang du btab ste 'khang pa dang bud med dus babs kyi zla mtshan 'dzag nas
270a3(mdo 'grel): chad pa'i nyin khong du btang na bud med phru gu mi yong ba'ang nges par sbrums par 'gyur ro/ /` yang so g+ha Da/ lga/ b+ha Ta ka Tai ya/ pi pi ling/ na ga ge sar rnams cha mnyam zhig par btags pa dar la btsags pa thur
270a4(mdo 'grel): mgo gsum pa mdog gcig gi 'o ma khyor gang tsam la btab ste dus gong mtshungs la byin na'ang nges par mngal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ma la chags kyang mi gnas par 'jig na/ lA la ka ma la'i rtsa ba ba'i
270a5(mdo 'grel): 'o mar btsos/ de nas slar yang ba mar gyi nang du btsos la zhib par btags la gong gi ba mar bzhu ba dang mnyam du btang na 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /` yang bi lba'i 'bru dang/ lung thang 'dra ? dmar sdug rib mnga' ? byed pa'i ri bas ? tshe cing ?
270a6(mdo 'grel): smyug ma'i lo mcham nyam zhib par btags la chus rta byas nas nyin bdun gyi bar btang kyang mi 'jig go/ zhag bdun nang byang ? g.yong ` mig sman gyi spyod thabs ni/ urma/ mdor ros/ sa mu dwa phal rgya mtsho ? dben/ lbu ba mu tig/ byi
270a7(mdo 'grel): thad ga ? bigs na/ bsdu gang? pa ri yang Da ki Di/ byu ru/ lod+ha/ po ris rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags dang la legs par btsags/ 'khar snod du tsan dan dmar po'i skya ba'i mjug zangs dmar gyis btums pas nyin
270b1(mdo 'grel): phyed tsam skam nyed byas/ de nas bcus nas zhag gcig song ba'i chu cung zad blug la nyi ma'i bzhi cha gcig tsam bsnur la ril bur dril/ skam pa dang rdo 'jam po'i ngos su chu dang lhan du brdar nas mig la byugs na ling tog/ steng 'og
270b2(mdo 'grel): gi 'gribs/ sha 'dzer/ mig chu 'dzag pa/ rgyad mig mi gsol ba sogs mig gi nang mdza' dag la phan no/ /` ki ka ra'i me tog/ rgya gar stong ja/ gla sgang/ khi r+Ni'i 'bru/ pha Ta ki ri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/
270b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang la bcags/ ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas la ril bu sgril ba zhos khu ba byas brdar nas mig steng 'og gang rigs kyis bsgribs nas mi mthong bar byugs na mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /` ri phyugs kyi gcig ming kha ma med/
270b4(mdo 'grel): la bsregs pa'i thal ba zhib par btags/ de chur blug la ras saM dar la 'chag thengs gnyis byas/ de nas chu de dangs su bcug la ngal bus pho bas mthil du chags pa'i thal ba de skams pa dang/ 'khar snod
270b5(mdo 'grel): du srang kha'i snum dang ldan du tsan dan gyi sgra ba zangs gtams can gyis nyi ma gsum gyi par bslur ba chung du re mig la byugs na sha 'dzin dang/ dmar por song ba sogs khrag la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan/ ` bdud
270b6(mdo 'grel): ? sman gyi sbyor ba ? sum/ gser dzo/ mdor ros/ bad phan/ pha Ti ka Ti/ tirma dzi/ pi pi ling/ pho ris/ rgyam tshwa/ ku ru pA la/ ba ru da'i 'bru'i nang gi snying po/ Sha pa ri ya rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dang la
270b7(mdo 'grel): ? tsags/ /rdo gzhing? shin tu 'jam sen ma bri pa'i nang du chu bcus nas zhag gcig song bas gang sla zho tsam sbrus pa skam thag ma chod par nyer thengs gcig/ de nas nyi mar cung zad gcig bzhag/ yang bud med bu skyes pa'i ? 
271a1(mdo 'grel): mas gar slar gong tsam byas pa ma skam par nyed thengs gcig/ de bzhin du ba'i 'o mas thengs gcig/ ra'i 'o mas thengs gcig sprus pa'i ma skam tsam la ril bu sgril la skam thag chod? pa
271a2(mdo 'grel): dang sbrang rtsis rta byas brdar nas mig la byugs na rlung la brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan/ ` ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na srod long la phan/ ` bud med kyi 'o mas khu ba byas nas byugs na khrag rlung la
271a3(mdo 'grel): brten pa'i mig nad thams cad la phan/ ` ba'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas byugs na mig che zhing mig 'dag mang du 'dzag pa la phan/ ` 'o su'i khu bas rta byas byugs na sha 'dzer dang mig dmar por song ba la phan ni//
271a4(mdo 'grel): de rnams ni bdud rtsi mig sman gyi sbyor ba kha bsgyur dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //` ni ra ma li/ ra tan dze ti sgyur ba gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags 'o mar sbyar te byugs na rgyad mig migs laS?
271a5(mdo 'grel): ba phan/ ` du ba ral pa zho gang/ dngul chu zho gang/ rdo thal/ dan rog brgya tham pa lce ston/ pho ris brgyad cu/ dan 'dra drug cu ka ye phal zer thams pa rnams zhib par btags nim+bu'i khu bas 'dam btags byas la ril
271a6(mdo 'grel): bu dril te pad kha tsam re chu la sbyar nas byugs na 'byung ngo/ /sha za/ yi dags la sogs pa gnad pas mig na ba la phan no/ /` 'khar snod du nim+bu'i chur sma ru mgo nag dkar po zhib par brdar te steng glang po che'i rmig pa/ /nyis
271a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur gyis/ mang ba zhig tu brdar/ de steng ku ku ma sma ru mgo nag gi gsum cha gnyis tsam brdar/ de rnams legs par 'dres pa dang mig la nyid gsum nas bdun gyi bar gang rigs 'byug cing sman zhag gang 'byug
271b1(mdo 'grel): gi ring phyir mi 'don/ khyad par rlung gi rigs ma phog pa byas pas ling tog/ rwa/ sha 'dzer/ 'gribs sogs mig nang mdza' dag la mchog tu phan no/ /surma/ mi'i skra/ yung ba chung ngu bcas brdar la mi'i 'o mas khu pa byas nas mig la
271b2(mdo 'grel): byugs na khrag gis mig dmar por song ba da sha 'dzer la phan/ ` hong len ser po dang gla rtsi sbyar la byugs na tsha 'khrug mig chu 'dzag za 'khrug byed pa rnams la phan/ ` rgya mtsho lbu ba/ a pI ma/ sir sa'i 'bru rnams sa ba bzhi
271b3(mdo 'grel): re'i rtsis zhib par btags/ ba gsar pa'i chu bre gsum lcags snod ba bar na nang du skya ba'i mgo zangs kyis gtums pas dkrug pa dang me btang la chu phyed tsam skams pa dang/ gong gi sman btab ste skyo ma gar phyogs tsam byas
271b4(mdo 'grel): slar 'byug skabs ba'i chus klad la byugs na bar 'grib chu 'dzag pa za 'khrug/ rdzi ma mig la zug pa sogs mig gi nad thams cad la phan no/ /` ka ye pha la zhib mar btags pa chur 'o ma ? sbyar te byugs na srod long la phan no/ ` ra
271b5(mdo 'grel): ling shin tu che bas khebs shing na na nim+bu'i? khu bar rgya tshwa yungs 'bru tsam re brdar nas ra ling gi thig tu nyin gsum gyi bar blug pas 'phral du zug zer cung zad 'byung yang myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang mig la ra ling gi ma
271b6(mdo 'grel): cher nan bzhu shal snying pa pho ris tsam re zhib par btags la chur sbyar nas nyin gsum gyi bar gyi blug na nyin dang por zug zer cung zad ldang/ gnyis par mig skrangs po shin tu che zing zug zer kyang 'byung/ nyin gsum par
271b7(mdo 'grel): brug zer ban+dza? skrags po zhi ba dang mnyam du ra ling gang med par 'gyur zing 'og 'grib kyis mi mthong ba yang gsal bar byed do/ /` mig gangs chid kyis na ba'i zug zer tshe na chu grang gtsang ma smod gang yang rlung bar blug la
272a1(mdo 'grel): mig ma btsum par gdong chu'i nang du bcug la zug zer ma chag dang bdugs pas myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin yan lag kha pas ching pa yang chu grang mo'i nang du bcug pas phan no/ /na par
272a2(mdo 'grel): sdod gi thang chu/ ha la d+ha/ pha Ta ki ri rnams cha mnyam ni nim bu'i kha ba byung na rab de min chur sbyar nas mig gi phyi nang la byugs pas mig 'bras tshan por song zhing mig sbrin dmar ba nyin mtshan gnyis khar nang zug shin tu che
272a3(mdo 'grel): ba la phan/ ` ka ni ya ra'i rtsa ba/ mtshal/ tsha la/ ni la thod pi pi ling/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba/ pho ris/ lga bzang po rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/ lga bzang ba chur spangs pas khu ba byas nas ril bu sran mo tsam dril
272a4(mdo 'grel): la btang bas khrag la brten pa'i tshigs na ba thams cad la phan/ ` 'o ma bu'i rtsa ba/ lcang nag gi rtsa ba dang lo ma/ sgyi ba'i rtsa ba sdong po lo ma 'bras bu /gze ma rnams cha mnyam la 'o ma bu dang lcang nag gi rtsa ba cung zad
272a5(mdo 'grel): mang ba bcas gzhogs la khog ma che ba mthil du bug pa nas gshong ba tsam dzha yu yod pa zhig gi madz+nyan?/ nang du blug/ myu ba khebs gcod rgyab pa rlabs go sha ru pa mi 'tshor ba kha legs par bcad de mtshams rdza
272a6(mdo 'grel): sa'i 'jim pas gtums ras kyis dril yang 'jim pa 'byug pa dang ras kyis dril ba sogs lnga brtsegs tsam byas/ so dong brus par khog ma cung zad chud ba zhig bcug la sas stems/ da' khar gong gi khog ma bzhag/
272a7(mdo 'grel): khog ma gnyis kyi mtshams legs par bsgrigs la 'jims pas rlung mi 'tshor bar byas/ de nas khog mche bshing dang gci pa'i dkyil du bcug la nyi ma'i bzhi cha tsam zhig me shin tu che ba btang/ de nas grangs thang thag chod pa
272b1(mdo 'grel): dang ston pas khog ma chung bar gsham du chu dang khar snum spris ma ltar chags yod ba de ston la thur mgo re tsam lga dang mnyam du btang na bse dug min pa'i rlung la brten pa'i nad tsha grang? thams cad la phan/ 1 li shi dang mnyam du btang na?
272b2(mdo 'grel): grang ba la brten pa'i nad thams cad la phan/ ` yungs ba dang mnyam du btang na khrag la brten pa'i nang gsang rnying thams cad la phan/ ` rtsam pa'i bag dang mnyam du btang na bad kan gyi rigs thams cad la phan/
272b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan 'dres med pa'i mkhris ba rkyang pa'i nad dang 'grim pa gnyis bor ba'i gzhan ma nang gang la yang mi 'grib med cing khyad par yan lag zhab skams pa rnams la khong du btang zhing snum byugs pas nang med lta bur bsos par 'gyur ro//
272b4(mdo 'grel): ` phug ron/ mi rki khyim bya ba khang byil/ ri bo shag/ rnga mo guM?/ rnams kyi? thun gang legs par byas pa'i skam po khog ma steng gshong du ldugs lugs sogs gong ltar byas pas snum ston la a ka ra ka ra/ lga bzang ba/ pi pi lin gi rtsa ba/ pi
272b5(mdo 'grel): pi ling ngo/ /bur ngal la phud de chung gtsing? so ma ra tsa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa dang la btsags/ de thams cad dang cha mnyam pa'i snum blug la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam dril la btang na/ rlung/ bad kan/ khrag grang ba/ chu ser
272b6(mdo 'grel): rnams la phan zhing lus stobs rgyas pa dang khu ba 'phebs pas 'dod pa smod nus pa/ dangs kha 'byed pa sogs la phan no/ /` ri phyugs lo gcig tsam 'gro ba'i gci ba// ra'i ril ma gnyis skam thag bcang cing gang legS
272b7(mdo 'grel): par byas/ khog ma steng ga shong du me gtong lugs sogs gong ltar byas pas snum 'byung ba sbrang rtsi dang yungs pa gang rung dang mnyam du khong du btang zhing snum rgyad bas phyi la bslu bsnye byas pas chu bags 'grams/
273a1(mdo 'grel): za 'khrug/ tshags tshigs na ba sogs chu ser gyi nad thams cad la mchog tu phan zhing mig la byugs kyang rlung chu ser la brten pa'i mig nad la phan no/ ` gro dang skyer ?
273a2(mdo 'grel): nyung mnyam pa dang shu dag de'i gsum cha tsam bcas pas snod du blug la snum 'don lugs gong ltar byas pa sre ba bzhi tsam re/ bong du btang na'ang nang tsha grang gsar rnying kun la phan pa'i spyi 'joms so/ /?
273a3(mdo 'grel): ` ze tshwa /sor rgyam tshwa/ pha Ta ki Di rnams cha mnyam bzhu shel gyi dam pa 'jim pa dang ras bsnol mar lnga brtsegs byugs la zhig gi nang du phyed tsam gang ba blug/ rdza snod che ba zhig gi phyed tsam gci ba'i mes
273a4(mdo 'grel): bkang ba'i nang du gong gi dam pe gyen bsigs nyal stabs su bzhag/ kha rdza snod kyi phyir yong ba byas la steng duAng me btang/ khog ma de rdo'i sgyed bu gsum sgroms lta bur bzhag pa'i mthil nas kyang
273a5(mdo 'grel): me cung zad gtong/ khog ma'i phyir bzhu shel gyi dam pe gcig bzhag la dam pa gnyis kyi kha sprad pa'i mtshams la lhang tser bkab la phyir 'jim pa byugs te rlung mi 'tshor ba byas / me nyi ma'i brgyad cha
273a6(mdo 'grel): tsam zhig btang bas/ dam pe phye ma'i nang du snum yod ba de thigs pa gsum tsam re dang/ la la phung se ba bzhi tsam zhib par btabs pa dang mnyam du btang bas nad tsha grang gsar rnying thams
273a7(mdo 'grel): cad la mi? phan ba med do/ / ` ze tshwa/ rgyam tshwa/ pha Ta ki Di/ su ma la dkar po dang ser po/ dza ba Sha ra/ mtshal cog la ma rnams cha mnyam btags pa bzhu shel gyi dmar?
273b1(mdo 'grel): par blug la snum 'don lugs gong mtshungs byas ba'i snum de mdze'i rma/ shu ba gsar rnying/ phol mig sogs la byugs na phan no/ /` a ru ra/ tsitA /pi pi ling/ rgyam tshwa/ a ru bsregs pa rnams cha mnyam zhib
273b2(mdo 'grel): par btags pa dar la btsags/ lga spangs pa'i chus sbrus la ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril ba ril bu ra btang na glo dang mgo bo na ba la phan zhing dangs kha 'byed do/ /` ma ru rtse'i 'bras bu pa la sha? zhib par btags
273b3(mdo 'grel): la chu grang gis rta byas btang na glo pa'i rnag thon par 'gyur ro/ /` ci zhur brdungs pa'i khu pa khor du btang na phyi nang gi rtsa 'phyus pa'i rigs la phan no/ /` tha ram brdungs pa'i 'byar khyis rmugs pa'i rma la dkris na phan/ ` lung?
273b4(mdo 'grel): kha ri zhes pa'i sman tshad par phan/ ` dkar sha/ shing sha sogs sha mo'i rigs gang rnyed byed dkar dang mnyam du sbyar ba'i thad khong du btang na mkhal nad zer zug 'phral du gcog/ ` mkhan pa brdungs pa'i khu bar po ris zhib

273b6(mdo 'grel): ci ta cha bdun/ a ru ra cha drug rnams zhib par btags pa chu bskol gyis rta byas btang na/ ma 'du ba/ me drod nyams pa/ grang thobs rnams la phan no/ /` ba dmar ma dang bu ram spyad pa chus 'phul la btang na she ser dang mig

274a2(mdo 'grel): nas bza' i nad kyis 'tsho 'chi gang byed las mi gnas so/ /` rgya khur dang bye dkar dang cha mnyam sbyar ba khong du btang bas mi phyugs gang gi yang chu 'gags pa sel lo/ /` a ru
274a3(mdo 'grel): ra gnyis sbrel mgo gzhogs phyed na ba la gang na phyogs su bsdams pas d+hu ri phan zhing sna khrag kyang chod la ya ma'i 'bus na ba sel lo/ /` tsan dan dmar po dang/ btseg

274a5(mdo 'grel): no/ /` tsha la bsregs pa'i thal ba/ zi ra dkar po/ /kha ru tshwa rnams zhib par btags la thun tshad thur mgo do tsam re btsang na pho bar nad zug byed pa rlung dang ma 'jug ba'i rigs

274a7(mdo 'grel): zhig par btags dang la btsags te/ thun tshang gong bzhin btang bas ldan 'dus kyis nad gdong ser po dang dmar por song ba mig mi gsal shed chud ba'i mgo po 'khor ba rnams la
274b1(mdo 'grel): phan no/ /` phyed ? a ru ra mer bsregs pa'i thal ba/ tsI ta/ pi pi ling/ kha ru tshwa/ a ru nag chung rnams zhib par btags la lga'i khu bas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam byas la gong du btang na glo nad kun
274b2(mdo 'grel): dang pho bar rlung zhugs pa khrag skran rus chad/ dangs kha 'gag pa rnams la phan/ ` phag zun bsregs pa'i thal ba/ bong bu'i gcin gyis khu ba byas nas sna la blug bas ya ma klang zer la phan/

274b5(mdo 'grel): spangs ba'i khu ba byugs na skra tshan che bar 'gyur ro/ /` phur mong nag po sha'i srubs rnams la rdzangs na 'bu mi 'byung zhing shing kun dri mas kyang thub bo/ /` a ru ra/ pi pi ling/ kha ru tshwa gsum cha mnyam zhib

275a5(mdo 'grel): Da'i dkyil gyi ljang gu de bzhi lnga re nyin ltar gyis zos na bad rlung mgo 'khor dang mig mi gsal ba la phan no/ /` dngul chu/ so ma la kha ra/ mu zi ser po/ zi ra dkar po rnams che chung ri lam las che tsam mdog smug snum sreng ba byed ba de yin
275a6(mdo 'grel): cha mnyam phye mar byas pa lugs kong nang du blug ste kha dam par bcang la rlung mi 'tshor par byas/ de steng ras dang 'jim pas lan gsum gyi bar du sgril la me nyon gyi nang du zhag bdun gyi ring bzhag/ de nas sa dong

275b1(mdo 'grel): cha mnyam btags la btang na dangs ma tsha grang gis 'dzags kyang phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang ka ye pha la'i phags pa dang rgya gar stod ja gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags pa gri khyi sogs rma gsar rnying gang la'ang btab ste ras kyis bsdams la dag

275b3(mdo 'grel): zhib par btags pa til gyi snum dang bsres te cung zad nyed/ de nas chu cung zad re lugs pa dang glang klang lhan du nyin phyed tsam gyi bar du nyes pas mdog shin tu dkar ba zhig yod la de byugs pas myur du phan no/ /` gnyan 'bur gyis
275b4(mdo 'grel): skrangs par ba'i gci ba dang snum bsres pa'i skyo ma drod ma yal ba skrangs po gang yin la byugs/ de ras kyis bsdams grangs ba dang yang brje ba sogs byas pas myur du rnag tu smin par nus shing smin pa de brtol ba la lga ser mer bsregs

275b7(mdo 'grel): g.yon du sor gsum re gzhal ba'i sa dang bco brgyad rang gi steng ste gsum du me btsa' re bzhag pas rlung/ grang ba/ rked pa na ba/ mkhal rtsa bral ba rnams la phan/ ` tshigs pa lnga pa drug pa bdun pa gsum dang mdun gyi dkar nag 
276a1(mdo 'grel): mtshams su me btsa' re bzhag pas khrag gis brang tsha ba dang stod na ba sogs la phan zhing stod 'tshangs la de steng rke stong byar khung duAng gcig bzhag pas phan no// ` lheng lheng rtse dbus su bzhag pa'i rgya gram

276a3(mdo 'grel): sar tshugs re bzhag pas rlung khrag dang khrag skran la phan/ ` dpus mor tshigs chu 'khor na me long ru bzhir tshugs re bzhag pas khrag rlung chu ser sogs sel zhing khyad par rkyang bskum mi thub pa la phan/ ` zas 'grangs lhogs ma snyoMs

277b4(mdo 'grel): sngags ni/ oM a saM ku bu tra brahma ki wa tsa bI tsa De/ nA ba ni raM ta ra b+ha ye/ rA bna bA DI kA ran ka re ni taShwa dza la ga pe/ a tsa la dI The sta ba na mi The bam ba na/ pha la to Da Sha i/ i ka Ta bI ka Te tsa Da Sha ye/ tseta ce ta ri de wI bi ra ha na ba tA A

277b7(mdo 'grel): ste sked pa'i g.yas g.yan dang rgyab tu rdo re bsdams/ lag pa gnyis su rdo gnyis re gzung la sngags 'dren zhing phyin pas dgra dag gang gi'ang glags mi rnyed do// //
