302a3(mdo 'grel): pU ha ka ra mu la/ ka ka ra sing+gi/ ka Ta ki/ ka tsu ra/ b+ha ba ne Thi/ gurtsa/ ampa la/ ha la d+hi/ pip+pa la/ ma ri tsi/ ka la uny+dzi/ pi ta pa pa ra/ pra tra dza/ a ga ra/ dza bas/ kuSh+Ta/ ba la lo tsa Na/ ta dza/ lga a ti sa/
302a4(mdo 'grel): de pa da? ru /khams kyi ru rta na ga ra mo tha/ pa To la/ dma' ru mgo nag gi shing li khri kyu ru ra a dza wa ni/ lga ser drod sman lo ris tsi ta/ pip+pa la mu la rnams cha mnyam pa a ka ru nyag gang dang/ sha? pho ru ta tsi ra yi ta shing tsha spor ngo bcas zhib
302a5(mdo 'grel): shug pa par btags la nang du kla rkang thun tshad che phyogs tsam re chu grang gis rta byas la la phud btang bas mkhris tshang/ rlung pi pi ling gi rtsa ba'i? tshad/ bad kan la brten pa'i tshad pa/ 'khrugs tshad/ 'grams tshad/ rims tshad sogs
302a6(mdo 'grel): tshad ma gsar rnying thams cad zhi bar byed cing/ gzhan yang sgya spa ba/ grang rlung/ mig ser/ dbugs mi bde ba rnams la phan na/ /` rims 'phrog lcags kyu chen mo'i sbyor ba ni/ shuN+Thi/ ma ri? tsi /pip+pa la gsum
302a7(mdo 'grel): zho brgyad re?/ ka? ? ka?/ mu ze ser po bi Sha /sman chen dngul? chu ba ra gsum zho dor rnams zhib par btags la/ thang khrom? d+ha tu ra/ bAng+ga /swo mar tsa sga rlon pa rnams kyi khu bas 'dam btags legs lga? bar byas pho ris drod sman nas ril
302b1(mdo 'grel): bu sran ma che shos tsam re sgril la sga'i khu bas rta byas te ril bu re btang bas rlung/ mkhris pa/ bad kan/ tshad pa gsar rnying/ rims drag po/ rims nyin gcig pa/ rims nyin gnyis pa/ rims nyin gsum pa rims nyin bzhi ba/
302b2(mdo 'grel): rtag ba'i rims/ ma 'jub rnams la mchag tu phan no/ /` rims 'phrog lcags kyu grub pa'i sbyor ba ni/ shang+ga b+hasma dang ha ri ta la gnyis zho brgyad re/ nI la tho tha zho do/ gi pa ko Ti zho gsum rnams zhib bar btags pa slar yang
302b3(mdo 'grel): ge ba ko Ta'i khu bas 'dam btags byas nas dgongs/ de rdza snod gsar par blug ste kha legs par bcas nas rung? thal rlung mi ba bla 'chor ba byas/ de sa dong bi ga pan khru ngo gru bzhi gting la'ang khru ngo yod pa zhig brus la gci bas bkang
302b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i dkyil tshang da bcug par ma sbar te me shi nas grangs thag mchod bar bzhag /de nas tha ton la dma' ru mgo nag re tsam re bye dkar thun tshad tsam re dang mnyam du btang na tshad ba'i rigs gsar rnying gang la'ang phan nges shing/ gzhan
302b5(mdo 'grel): yang nad kyi rigs tsha grang gsar snying thams cad la phan pas spyi 'joms chen mo'o/ /rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka 'dom pa'i tshad pas grag tu na na/ pip+pa la/ ma Ni si la/ nim+ba pha la gsum cha mnyam zhib
302b6(mdo 'grel): bar btags la/ ka re li'i khu bas ril bu skyu bur tsam sgril la chu grang dang mnyam du btang bas myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / ` mkhris tshad gyi na na/ drod sman ma Ni tsha la ldong ros nim+ba'i 'bras bu pi ta pa pa ra zho gang zhib
302b7(mdo 'grel): par btags la/ chu cung zad blug ste 'dam btags byas/ de slar chu grang phul gang tsam la sbyangs nas btungs na myur du phan 'gyur ro/ / ` yang mkhris tshad la/ ba la lo tsa na/ na ga ra mo tha/ mnu gla sgang tsan dan
303a1(mdo 'grel): dkar po/ pi ta pa pa ra/ shuN+Thi/ ka ta ra ki dza ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la bod kyi thun tshad cho?  phyogs tsam chu grang gi rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /
303a2(mdo 'grel): ` bad kan gyi tshad pas na na/ shuN+Thi/ ma ri tsi/ lga ka yi ba la'i pha ra/ rtsa ba pip+pa la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu drang gi rta byas sna bug tu blug na phan no/ / ` rlung tshad kyi na na/
303a3(mdo 'grel): shuN+Thi/ pany+tsa/ pip+pa la/ lga ma ri tsi/ pho ris tsi ra yi ta/ ka Ta ki/ ha ri ta drod sman ka rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la bod kyi thun tshang che shos tsam re chu skol gyi rta byas btang bas phan
303a4(mdo 'grel): lga par kha ru tsha drod sman 'gyur ro/ pho ris /` ma 'ju tig te ba'i tshang pas na na/ a ru ra a dza mo d+ha/ ha ri ta// / sany+tsa ra lo Na gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshed tsha shos tsam chu skol
303a5(mdo 'grel): gyi rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /` khrugs tshad kyi na na/ til mar gyi drod sman la la phud chung ba snum tig ta a ru ra kha ru tshwa gyis bsku mnye legs par byas la/ de rjes chu dro mos lus bkrus te? gos
303a6(mdo 'grel): 'thug pos rjibs nas cung zad cig bzhag na phan no/ /` mthong tshad kyis na na/ pip+pa la/ po ris ma ri tsi/ tsi ra yi ta/ shuN+Thi/ lga hid+gu? rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs tsam chu
303a7(mdo 'grel): grang gis rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro// 'di'i nang rtags lus byings drod med la mig drod shin tu che shing mgo bo dang mig la zug khol bur ldang ba zhig yod gsung shing kun mar bsregs pa ` 'dus tshad kyi na na/ sing+ga ra phe/ rgya mtsho la? ma ri tsi /pho ris?
303b1(mdo 'grel): pip+pa la/ bi Sha/ swAng+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la sga'i khu bas ril bu dma' ru mgo nag tsam sgril ba btang bas phan zhing/ gzhan yang rlung gi nad/ grang ba/ yan lag zha gum sogs la'ang gnod//?
303b2(mdo 'grel): drod sman sman chen cha la ` yang 'dus pa'i nang la/ yid bzhin nor bu'i bcud kyi sbyor ba ni/ gand+ha ka/ bar/ ma ri tsi/ shwe ta dzi ra/ ka la dzi ra/ send+ha lo Na/ sany+tsa lo Na/ sa ba ri lo Na/ kha ri lo Na rigs
303b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ sa dzi kha ra/ ya ba kha ra/ sa mu dra kha ra/ pi Sha/ a wa ra ka/ mu dzi ser po? dngul chu pho ris shuN+Thi rnams zir dkar po zir nag po rgyam tsha/ kha ru tshwa cha mnyam lan tshwa zhib par lba tshwa rigs gnyis
303b4(mdo 'grel): btags dza tshwa la pA ni khu byi cher babs ril bu sran ma tsam sman chen lhang tshed sgril te btang bas zhi bar 'gyur lgra? zhing /spos khrog /khrag 'grim pa rnams la yang phan no/ /` yang 'dus nad kyi sman la/
303b5(mdo 'grel): ma ri tsi/ pip+pa la/ lga shuN+Thi/ bi Sha/ gand+ha ka /pa ra rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ras la bcags/ de nas rdo gzhong nang du thang khrom gyi khu bas gar sla zhe tsam byas pa ma skam par mnyad/
303b6(mdo 'grel): pho ris drong sman slar yang gong bzhin sman chen mu zi ser po dngul chu nyin gsum gyi bar mtshams ma chad par byas la/ de nas ril bu dma' ru mgo nag tsam byas la tho rangs ril bu re btang bas phan zhing/
303b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang bad kan/ grang rlung/ dus pa khol bur na ba/ dang kha mi bde ba rnams la phan no/ /` yang d+hA ni 'u su/ na ga ra mtho? /mgu gla sgang tsa ri? yi ta /tig ta kuSh+Tha /sha pho ru ta in+d+ra ya ba /dug mo nyung?//
304a1(mdo 'grel): de wa da du /shuN+Tha/ ga dza pip+pa la rnams cha mnyam zhib rtsing dang thun tshang bod kyi thang tsam chu phul brgyad la btab nas chu cha bdun ma bskam bar skol la/ de nas drod 'jam tsam la btungs bas 'dus pa'i nad/ 'dus tshang/?
304a2(mdo 'grel): g.yig gu'i skyigs bu/ shug pa lga kod bo nas yod ba'i drod sman skyugs pa/ stong du tshangs pa rnams la phan no/ /` tri ko Ta/ tri pha la/ hing+gu?/ ba tsA/ send+ha loN/ kuSh+Tha/ sa ri soM/ si ra sa pha la rnams cha mnyam zhib
304a3(mdo 'grel): par btags la ra'i chus khu ba byas nas slar yang brdar ti mig la byugs na/ mir ga'i nad/ sems g.yo zhing tsha ba gsum 'bras bu gsum shing kun shu dag rgyam tshwa sha pho ru ta bad khang 'i? 'bru'i? 'bru 'khrug pa/ mig rab rib/
304a4(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo gnyid mi yod ba rnams la phan zhing 'dre gdon gyi gnod pa'ang thub bo/ /` kuSh+Tha/ la wa ng+ga/ pip+pa la/ a ka ra ka ra ha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la sga'i khu bas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril la btang bas
304a5(mdo 'grel): bad kan/ 'dus pa/ mgo bo na ba/ sdangs pa rnams la phan no/ /` rgyu tshad kyi naS? sha ro? ru ta li shi drong sman zhing khrag 'grims pa sogs la mchog tu phan pa/ li la ba ti ba Ta'i sbyor ba ni/ ma ri tsi/ masta ki/ da Di ma/
304a6(mdo 'grel): waM sha lo tsa na/ am+ba/ lo da/ ma ra ha Thi/ d+ha tri/ d+ha ba ka phu la/ ma dzu pha la/ sim+ba ri/ kuSh+Tha?/ dza yi pha la/ ba bu ra ka pha la/ kha yi ra/ ko ha Da ka bi dza rnams cha mnyam zhib par pho ris? btags la ras so 'bru
304a7(mdo 'grel): la btsags cu gang aT 'bras te thun tshad che phyogs tsam bo sta ka'i ? sna bka' i me tog mdzu'i 'bru ma nu rta rkang sha?  pho ru rte? dza ti khu bas ba bu ra'i 'bru rta byas rgya gar stong ja? go ha Da'i 'bru btang bas phan zhing/ sman gtong ring zas spyod 'bras
304b1(mdo 'grel): zan/ ba'i dang ba dang mnyam du cung zad re btang/ gzhan ma bza' btung gi rigs mi gtong/ ` rgyu tshad spyi 'joms brid+d+ha gaM gA d+ha ra'i sbyor ba ni/ na ga ra mo tha/ lgang? shuN+Thi/ a ra lu/ d+ha ba ka phu la/ be la/ a ti sa/
304b2(mdo 'grel): mo tsa rA sa/ lo d+ha/ la dza ru/ ampa/ ka bi dza/ kuN+Tha/ in+d+ra ya ba/ ba la lo tsa na rnams cha mnyam 'phel ba 'am ka 'dzin zhib par ma nu bla skar btags la thun tshad che phyogs re d+ha ba'i me tog bil ba 'bras skam po bkrus
304b3(mdo 'grel): manu rta rkang gi thang chu pa'i chu phul phyed sbrang ba ru ra tsam aM 'bras sha pho ru ta dug mo nyung re dang mnyam du btang bas 'khru ba chod cing myur du phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang la gu gang+gA d+ha ra'i sbyor pa ni/ shuN+Thi/ d+ha ba ka phu la/ mo tsa ra sa rnams cha
304b4(mdo 'grel): ma/ ma zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re ba'i dar ba phul phyed kyi rta byas btang bas kyang nus pa gong dang 'dra/ ` yang rgyu tshad gsar rnying gi nad la/ gang+gA 'dzin? chung ba am+bi bi dza/ lga dza ye pha la/ d+ha ba'i me tog ma nu rta rkang? gi thang chu
304b5(mdo 'grel): pe lad? kha yi ra/ a phi ma rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu grang dang sbyar te lte ba'i mdza' skor du sor gsum gyi rgya tsam la byugs pas kyang zugs gzer chag cing 'khru ba chod do/ /am 'bras dza ti ` yang rgyu tshad la na ga ra d+ha'i
304b6(mdo 'grel): bil pa rgya gar stong dza? thang gi sbyor ba ni/ shuN+Thi/ kuSh+Tha/ ya ti sa/ hing+gu?/ na ga ra mo tha rnams cha mnyam zhib rtsing dang thun tshad bod kyi thad tsam chu phul brgyad la btab nas chu cha bdun ma skam bar skol lo/ de nas grong khyer las lhag pa
304b7(mdo 'grel): drod 'jam tsam la btungs chas phan par/ lga sha pho ru ta 'gyur ro/ /` yang shing kun ma nu gla? sgang rgyu tshad kyi sa khrag kho na 'grim pa la/ ba la lo tsa na/ guSh+Tha /sha ro ru ta a ti sa /na ga ra mo tha/? ma nu gla sgang bil ba be la rnams cha mnyam zhib rtsib dang
305a1(mdo 'grel): thun tshad sogs gtong lugs gong bzhin byas pas myur du chod par 'gyur ro/ /` yang/ lo d+ha /in+d+ra dug spong? ya ba/ mo tsa ra sa/ na ga ra mo tha/ be la/ d+ha ba ka phu la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags
305a2(mdo 'grel): la bu ram gyis rta byas ril bu pa ru ra tsam sgril la btang bas kyang tshod do/ /` yang rgyu tshad kyi khrag dang ser po gnyis ka 'grims na/ ma nu rta rkang gi thang shing ma nu gA sgang bil ba/ d+ha ba'i me tog send+ha lo Na/ sany+tsa ra lo Na/ ting+gu?
305a3(mdo 'grel): ba tsa/ shu khaha? rI ta kA arA a ti sa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re chu skol gyi rta byas btang pas myur du chod cing phan par 'gyur ro/ /` pho ba'i me drod nyams pa'i zas rgyam tshwa kha du tshwa? shing kun
305a4(mdo 'grel): gang zos kyang mi 'du bar 'grim zhing spos nyams byed pa la/ dang kha mi bde/ lus gshed rim bzhin chag pa'i nad la/ d+ha ni ya/ na ga ra mo tha/ shuN+Tha/ mu li ka bi dza rnams cha mnyam gyi thar tshad dang bsdu
305a5(mdo 'grel): lugs gong bzhin btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ na ga ra mo tha/ shuN+Tha/ a ti sa/ gi lo hi rnams cha mnyam zhib par 'u su ma nu gla sgang btags lga la thun la phug gi 'bru tshad che phyogs tsam re chu skol gyis
305a6(mdo 'grel): rta byas btang bas kyang bon?/ /` yang/ lo d+ha/ pa Dhi/ la dza ru/ ma Tu gA sgang '? na ga ra mo tha/ be ma/ shuN+Thi/ d+ha ni ya/ a ti sa/ gu ru/ ba la lo tsa na/ kuSh+Tha/ d+ha ba ka phu la rnams cha mnyam gyi thad tshad dang
305a7(mdo 'grel): bsdu lugs god bzhin byas btang bas phan 'gyur ro/ /` zhang 'brum gyi nad la/ ma ri tsi pa ya? 'am nu gla sgang khil ba lga zho gang/ 'u pu lga shutThi li khri li khri zhobS? ngo/ tsi to zho brgyad/ sha po ru ta rna ba'i rbo te? su ra Na zho bcu drug rnams zhi ba
305b1(mdo 'grel): par btags la ril bu skyA ngur las me tsam re btang bas phan zhing/ sman gtong ba'i bar la ro mngar ba/ /kha ba/ lug gi sha rnams mi za'o/ /yang/ /a ra lu/ tsi ta /li in+d+ra kha/ lga shuN+Thi/ se nd+ha lo Na/ be la rnams cha?
305b2(mdo 'grel): zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re ba'i dar? ba phul ras rta byas btad na phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang gzhad 'brum gyi nad kyi khrag 'dzag pa la/ dU di ba Thi dang la wang+go? dug mo 'ung? rnams cha mnyam rgyam tshwa bi lag zhib par
305b3(mdo 'grel): btags pa mang nyung zho bdun rer thun re bcad pa ba mar btsag bcad pas rta byas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btang bas nges par phan no/ /` tshan bar rdel bi'i nad la/ ha la d+hi dang am+ba la gnyis chu'i nang du brdar la gar sla zho
305b4(mdo 'grel): cam rma kha' byug la ras kyis khebs bkab nas bzhag pas phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang bi la yi ka ha Ta zhib par btags pa 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang mnyam du legs par sga seng brdar la skyu rur gar sla zho tsam byung ba dang rmar/
305b5(mdo 'grel): byugs te ra sa bkab pas phen no/ /` yang send+ha? lo Na/ lga shuN+Thi/ ha la d+hi/ b+ha Ta po? tra ? gu rtsi'i bridza ye tri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa zho la sbyar nas rma khar byugs te ras bkab pas kyang phan par 'gyur ro/ /` pho
305b6(mdo 'grel): spyan gyi nad la/ sanyu ra lo ha/ sa na lo Na/ rgyam tshwa shuN+Thi/ lga hing+gu?/ sga ser a bya ya/ shing na'i? lo ma dze te'i me tog bi pA la/ a dza mo ra/ ya ba kha ra/ ga yi bi rang+ga?  rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags lu ba mar gyis ril bu skyu ru ra
305b7(mdo 'grel): tsam sgril nas btang kha ru ? bas zhi? to? rgyas sbe? bar 'gyur zhing ma bzhu gang? kun/ ba'i nad gzhan la yang phan no/ /` lus drong sman dbyig mongs kyi mdog/ byi? tshad? gser por/ byi thang ga? 'gyur zhing skrad na/ drong spran pap+pi la/ kaT yi/ lba shuN+thi? /na gar 
306a1(mdo 'grel): mo tha/ tsita/ pilpa laka mu la/ ga ja pip+pa la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che phyogs tsam re chu skol gyi rta byas btang bas phan zhing khog skran dang dang kha mi bde ba la yang
306a2(mdo 'grel): phan no/ /` yang na/ ma nu gla sgang shuN+Thi/ ba yi drod sman gyi rtsa ba kong po nas yod ba'i drod sman bi rang+ga/ ha ri ta ke/ de ba da ru rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad che shos tsam chu skol gyi rta byas btang bas nus pa gong
306a3(mdo 'grel): dang 'dra'o/ /` yang na/ da ru ha ri lga 'dra/ e raN+Da ka pha la/ ti bi/ ba yi byi thang ka bi rang+ga/ a ru ra shug pa a tis/ ma ri ci/ in+d+ra ya ba rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa thun tshad che phyogs te chu skol
306a4(mdo 'grel): gyi rta byas bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /rkyer pa ` yang na/ gug+gul/ dag 'dra'i 'bru ha ri ta ke/ ga byi gang kad pur+Na/ dA ru ha ri dra/ gurtsa pho ris rnams cha dug mo nyung mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas btang na nus pa
306a5(mdo 'grel): gong 'dra'o/ /` srin nad la/ send+htshA lo Na/ gug+gul/ dag 'da' i 'bru ha ri ta ke/ ga byi gang kad pur+Na/ dA ru ha ri dra/ gu rtsa pho ris rnams cha dug mo nyung mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas btang na nus pa
306a6(mdo 'grel): na/ tri pa la/ tri ku Ta/ ti bi/ rgyaM rtsa ba tsa/ ni mwa twa tsa/ byi thang ka kha yir/ kuSh+Tha/ ba yi bi rang+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba'i chus rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /pho ba rlung gi sbos
306a7(mdo 'grel): nas na na/ 'bras bu gsum ? gsum khar tsa sany+tsa shu dag shing gi ? Da ba ra lo Na/ rgya gar stong ? ru ta byi thang ka hing+gu/ shing kun lga shuN+Thi gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis rta byas
306b1(mdo 'grel): btang na phan no/ /` yang na/ ma ri ci/ pa ? la/ shuN+Thi/ hid+gu/ send+ha lo Na/ dzir do/ a dza mod rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyi rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang na
306b2(mdo 'grel): pip+pa la/ shuN+Thi/ ha ri ta ke/ bo ris sany+tsha drod sman ra lo Na/ ska shing kun ti bi rgyam tsha rnams cha/ ? ri dkar nag dbyi mod mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan no/ /` yang na/ shuN+Thi/ ma ri tsi/ pi?
306b3(mdo 'grel): pi pi ling wa la/ a ru ras dz?i kha ra rnams kha ru tshwa cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyi rta byas btang kyang phan no/ ` /skya sbab dang mgi ser gyi nad la/ ga da pur+Na/ tri ba la/ kuSh+Tha/ lga po ris pi pi ling
306b4(mdo 'grel): tsi ra yi ta/ u ru sa/ nam+ba/ za tshwa gu rtsa rnams cha mnyam gyi thang tshad dang bsdu lugs snga ma bzhin la/ bsdus tshar ba'i steng/ sbrang ba rur tsam zhig btab ste btungs pas 'bras bu gsum ru ta myur du phan par
306b5(mdo 'grel): tig ta 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ li khri te ku Ta/ hA la d+hi/ amha la/ lu ha ka tsur+Na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun chad che shos tsam re ba mar ba rur tsam bzhu bar sbrad de nyis 'gyur gyi ched
306b6(mdo 'grel): tsam bcas btab la legs par 'dres chab gsum sba ser ba dang btang nu skyu rur mchog lcags che tu phan no/ /` mig ser kho na'i nad la/ tri pa la/ kuSh+Tha/ ha la d+hi/ dA ru ha la dwa rnams cha mnyam zhib par
306b7(mdo 'grel): btags/ la sprang dang mar gyi sbyor lugs gong ltar bzos pas phan no/ /` yang na/ btsag ge ru/ ha la d+hi sga sar skyu ru ra am+ba la/ 'bras bu gsuM ? ta gsum sge ser skyer ba cha mnyam zhib tu btags te chu la
307a1(mdo 'grel): sbyar nas mig la byugs bas phan no/ /` glo 'grams kyi nad la/ a sa gand+ha/ shuN+Thi/ pip+pa la/ la wang+ga/ mi sri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu grang gi rta byas btang bas
307a2(mdo 'grel): phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ a ka ba na ka phul dang la wang+ga gnyis cha mnyam zhib par ba spub lga drod sman li shi shal dkar btags la chus ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam sgril te btang bas
307a3(mdo 'grel): phan no/ /` yang na/ ti pa la/ a ka ba ne'i me tog shu r+N+Tha lga/ li shi ba yi bi rad+ga/ ma ri tsi/ pip+pa la/ na ga ra mo tha/ pip+pa la ka mu la/ la wang+ga/ de ba nga ru/ e la ya tsi/ te dza ba tra/ ma d+hu/ nA ga ke sa
307a4(mdo 'grel): ra rnams cha mnyam 'bras bu gsum zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig byi thang ka po ris dang/ drod slan mnu gla sgang pi pi ling gi rtsa ba shal dkar li shi de nyis shug pa 'gyur ka ko la dang bcas sbrang rtsi nag ge sar
307a5(mdo 'grel): pa thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam chu grang gi rta byas btang bas phan no/ /` g.yig gu'i skyigs bu'i nad la/ ma ni cha la/ ha la d+hi/ ma ri tsi/ mi sri/ la wang+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad nyis 'gyur
307a6(mdo 'grel): tsam sbrang bar ru tsam dang mnyam du zos pas myur du phan no/ /` yang g.yig gu dang skyugs pa gnyis ka ldong ros ska ser 'dom nas pho ris shel dkar li shi na na/ she ta tsan dan/ na ga ra mo tha/ e la ya rtsi/ la dza ru/
307a7(mdo 'grel): pip+pa la drod sman/ li shi la wang+ga/ be ri ki ga ri chid ba khi 'bru'i snying go ka ma la ka Ta/ ga dza ge sa ri rnams cha mnyam gyi cha gcig dang/ sbrang dang shel dkr gnyis kyi cha tsandan dkar po gcig ma nu gla sgang ka kol byas te ril bu
307b1(mdo 'grel): ba ru ra tsam re zos bas myur du phan no/ /`yang na/ la dza ru/ ha ri ta ke/ la wang+ga/ ka ma la ka Ta/ e la ya tsi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du zos pas kyang phan no/ /` dbugs mi ?
307b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i nad la/ shuN+Thi/ pip+pa la/ ka ka ra sid+gi/ su ka ra mu la/ ka tsu ra/ a ru ra b+ha rid+ga/ li shina ga ra motha/ ma ri tsi ka ko la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun ched che phyogs re chu skol gyis rta byas btang bas phan no/ /`
307b3(mdo 'grel): yang na/ sga rad+ga Ni/ rbod sman su ka ra mu la/ khams kyi ru Ta lga skya a rus/ shuN+Thi/ ku la tha ma nu gla sgang pho ris rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyi rta byas btang kyang phan par 'gyur ro/ /` dbugs mi bde
307b4(mdo 'grel): zhing glo grag tu lang na/ shuN+Thi khams kyi ruta be Da ha/ pip+pa la/ ka ka ra lga seng+ga/ b+ha rgya sran rad+gi/ gi ba ko ri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chus ril bu skya ru ra tsam sgril te btang bas phan no/ /`yang na/ a ru sa/ shu NI lga/
307b5(mdo 'grel): ldang zhing lud pa mi lga khog na/ a ba ru ra drod sman rus/ shuN+Thi/ pip+pa la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la sbrang rtsis rta byas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril te btang bas myur du phan no/ /` glo grar tu
307b6(mdo 'grel): pip+pa la/ tsa sa/ ka Ta ri rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags te lga chu drod sman skol gyi rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /` zas mi 'ju zhing dang kha mi bde ba la/ pip+pa la/ ti bi/ ha ri ta ke/ shaN+Thi/ sany+tsa ra la Na
307b7(mdo 'grel): drod sman rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyi rta byas btang bas phan no/ /`yang na/ send+ha lo Na/ rgyam tshwa ha ri ta kre a ru ra/ drod sman pra p+pi la/ tsi ta rnams cha drod sman mnyam zhib a rung lga par kha ru tshwa btags
308a1(mdo 'grel): la chu skol gyi rta byas btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yag na/ tri pha la/ tri ku Ta/ sany+tsa ra lon/ hid+gu/ a dza wa na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig dang/ bu ram gyi cha gcig byas pa'i
308a2(mdo 'grel): ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril te btang bas kyang phan no/ /` yang na/ send+ha lo Na/ sany+tsar lo bras bu gsum tsha ba gsum kha ru tshwa Na/ ba yi bi shing kun? la la phud rad+ga/ ma ri tsi/ pip+pa la/ lga shuN+Thi/ ha ri ta ke/ ba Da ha/ am+ba la/ ri bi/
308a3(mdo 'grel): la wad+ga/ tsi tra ka/ hid+gu/ a dza wa na/ dzir do/ nag ra mo rgya mtsho kha du tshwa tha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags byi thang ka la star bu'i khu bas/ pho ris zan drod sman tsam rdzis pa skem a rur ba rur thang skyu ru ra gsum byas
308a4(mdo 'grel): mi shi pa'i phye ma shing kun mi la bsrigs ba la la phung zir dkar nag ma nu gla sgang thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re btang bas phan des so/ /` 'bras bu skrangs pa'i nad la/ shwe twa dzir/ send+ha lo Na/ hid+gu rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags
308a5(mdo 'grel): la pad kha'i snam me la bsros bar btab ste byugs pas myur du phan no/ /` yang na/ 'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma ba'i chus rta byas btungs pas zhag zir dkar po rgyam tshwa bdun nam shing kun yun ring yang bcu bzhi'i khongs su
308a6(mdo 'grel): grag go/ /` yang na/ som pa zhib par btags pa thun chang che phyogs tsam re ba mar skyu ru ra nyis 'gyur tsam dang pad kha'i snum sgong kogs phyed tsam sros par btab ste nyin bdun gyi bar btungs pas phan no/ /` yang na/ shwe ta jo
308a7(mdo 'grel): ra/ o raN+Da dan 'dra/ ko snyad ru ta shuSh+Tha/ ba tsa shu dag /hu la hu la hu bu tu la'i 'bru ka bi dza rnams cha mnyam zhib btags pa/ chu bre do tsam gyi nang du 'bras tsam pa ltar btags pa bra gang tsam zhig blug nas me mdag gi steng thad dkar po
308b1(mdo 'grel): du zhag gnyis gsum zhi bzhag nas chu de skyur mor song ba dang/ de la gong gi sman rnams btab ste byugs pas myur du skam par 'gyur ro/ /` dangs ma 'dzag pa la/ a na ra ki ka li dang shwe ta kha yir gnyis cha mnyam zhib par
308b2(mdo 'grel): btags pa'i cha gcig dang/ shel dkar cha gcig bsres te thun tshang che phyogs re tho rangs dang dgongs mo zhag bdun gyi ring star chags su btang na chod par 'gyur ro/ /se 'bra'i me tog ` yang na/ e la stong ja dkar po yi tsa dang shel dkar
308b3(mdo 'grel): cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun chad nyis 'gyur tsam re zos pas phan zhing/ sman gtong ring ro skyur ba dang la phug sogs mi bza' / ` yang na/ saM kha hu li/ e la yi tsa/ se la dzi ta sug smel gsumcha mnyam zhib par
308b4(mdo 'grel): btags pa'i cha gcig /shel dkar gyis cha gcig byas la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re chu grang gi rta byas btang bas kyang phan no/ /` yang chu dang mnyam du na zug dang ? smel bcas te 'dzag na/ e la yi tsa/ a ru sa/ g+ho Shu ra/
308b5(mdo 'grel): ba ma ne The/ pip+pa la/ e raN+Da rnams kyi thang thun chad dang bsdu lugs song ma rnams dang 'dra ba byas la/ de steng se la ? ta dang sbrang cung zad re btab ste btungs pas myur du phan par 'gyur zhing rdel sug smel nad kyang gze bar ma'o/
308b6(mdo 'grel): dma' ru mgo nag gi rtsa ba drod sman /den 'dra thon bar 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ e raN+Di/ a ru sa/ e la yi tsa/ po sta ka bi dza rnams zhib par btags la ba'i zhos rta byas nas btang na yang phan no/ /` chu 'gags pa la/ mu sa ka b+hiSh+Ta
308b7(mdo 'grel): zhib par btags la chu zho tsam sbyar ba me la sros te lte 'og nas spu ngan 'dri dkar nag yan la gug? smel ha lo'i 'bru byugs na myur du phan des so/ /` rdel nad dang chu 'gags gnyis 'dzom nas nan/ g+ho Shu ra gzem/ dza ba sa/ byi pa'i ?
309a1(mdo 'grel): ha ri ta ka/ pa kha na bed rnams cha mnyam gyi thang tshad dang bsdu lugs gong dang 'dra ba byas la/ de steng sbrang cung zad tsam zhig btab ste btungs pas kyang phan no/ /` yang na/ tri pha la/ sind+ha
309a2(mdo 'grel): lo Na/ g+ho Sha ra/ a ru ra bra gzhun gser me dog ka re li rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thun tshad nyis 'gyur tsam re chu skol gyis phul nas btang bas rdel nad chu 'gags gnyis ka la phan no/ /'bras bu gsum rgyam tshwa
309a3(mdo 'grel): ` yang rdel gze ma nad chu 'gags bcos thabs zab gnad khyad par can no/ sba ha ga mer bsregs pa'i thal ba chu 'gags la phye ma cung zad re gsang gnas kyi nang du blug pas de phral chu 'bab cing thun tshad chung
309a4(mdo 'grel): phyogs re chu skol gyis phul ste khong du btang bas rdel nad myur du zhil ba myong grub tshal khyad par can no/ /` mdze'i nad gang la yang/ tri phal/ a rus/ nam+ba/ pa ra ba ra ka la tA/ kha yaM ra stong ja?/
309a5(mdo 'grel): gu rtsa rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu grang gis rta byas te btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ tri pa la/ many+dzi Sh+Tha /gurtsa/ 'bras bu gsum ka Ta ki/ nim+ba/ ha la d+hi/ ba tsa/ da ru ha ri dra/ ba yi
309a6(mdo 'grel): bi rad+ga ? a ru sa/ de wa da ru rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la thang thun chur phyogs tsam re chu grang gi rta byas was bu gsum brtsod li ? zhag nyer gcig gi bar la btang nas ?  ser bu dag skyer ba phan na dang/ byi thang ka
309a7(mdo 'grel): ma phan tshe zhag zhe dgu'i ? pa bar la btang bas phan la/ de'i bar rtsam pa dang 'bras kho na las zas gzhan mi gtong la/ sman 'di za phug la yang phan no/ /` khrag shas che ba'i mdze nad la/ many+dziSh+Tha bcod/
309b1(mdo 'grel): tri pha la/ kuSh+Tha/ ha la d+hi/ de ba da ru/ ba tsa rnams kyi thang tshad dang bsdu lugs sngon ma rnams dang 'dra ba byas nas btang bas kyang phan par 'gyur ro/ /` mdze dkar po la/ guny+dza/ nim+ba/ kuSh+Tha/ ba tsa/ tsi traka/
309b2(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu gsum ru ta mnyam sga ser zhib par shug pa shu dag btags la/ gong 'bras bu skrangs pa'i skabs su bstan pa'i 'bras phye btang pa'i chu skyur mo des khu ba byas nas gar sla zho tsam dma' ru mgo nag rma gang ruta shu dag 'dug la byugs
309b3(mdo 'grel): pas phan no/ /` yangna/ ma Ni tsha la/ tsi tra ka/ bu ku tsi/ bedga na b+hasma rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags te gong gi chus rta byas nas byugs na yang phan+no/ /` za phrug gi nad la/ ma ri tsa dang sind+hu ra gnyis cha mnyam
309b4(mdo 'grel): zhib par btags la mar la/ sdong ros sbyar nas byugs pa byas na bad+ge na'i thal ba sel bar 'gyur ro/ /` za phrug/ g.yan pa/ shu ba gsum la/ ha la d+hi/ ba ku tsi/ nam+bi da la/ am+ba la rnams cha mnyam zhib
309b5(mdo 'grel): par btags la ba'i chus rta byas la nyin bdun gyi bar du btang bas phan no/ /` yang na/ gand+ha ka/ ba ku tsi/ ba yi bi rad+ga/ ruta kuSh+Tha/ sid+ga ra pya/ sga ser ha la d+hi/ tsa ka ba Da/ ni sba'i lo ma sind+hu ra sgyu ru ra rnams cha mnyam zhib
309b6(mdo 'grel): par btags la/ d+hU tur/ nim+ba/ pA na gsum gyi khu bas sbyar nas byugs na phan no/ /mu zi ser po ` yang na/ du ba byi thad ka dang ha la sga ser rgya 'tshal d+ha gnyis zhib par sga ser thal dkar rdo rje btags la tshul sbyar nas byugs kyang phan no//
309b7(mdo 'grel): ` yang na/ du ba/ ? bram ba ku tsi/ rgyam tsha sand+ha lo na/ a rur se ba/ thal dkar rdo rje tsa ka ba Ta rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la gong gi chu skyur mos sbyar te byugs kyang phan no/ /` me lce 'khor lo la/ shwe te tsan dan tsan dan dkar po/
310a1(mdo 'grel): kuSh+Tha/ sam+b+ha lu/ ka ma la ka Ta/ nim+ba rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chul sbyar nas byugs pas phan na/ /` gnyan 'bur la/ si ru ba me la phyed tsam bsregs pa'i thal ba ba'izhos rta bbyas
310a2(mdo 'grel): thun tshad che phyogs ru ta tsam re nyin bdun gyi ka ma la'i 'bru bar btang na p han par 'gyur ro/ /` grang rlung gi nad la/ a sa gand+ha/ shuN+Thi/ ka la ti la rnams nya lcebs cha mnyam zhib par btags pa'i cha gcig/
310a3(mdo 'grel): shel dkar gyis cha gcig byas pa thang thun chung phyogs tsam re ba mar btsag bcad par btab ste btang na phan par 'gyur ro/ /ba spu ` yang lga na/ til nag pip+pa la/ tsi tra ka /a sa gand+ha/ ba yi bi rad+ga/ a dza bA na/
310a4(mdo 'grel): shuN+Thi/ ka la bany+dzi/ pip+pa la ka mu la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa cha gcig/ bu ram gyi cha gnyis byas pa'i ril bu skyu ru ra nyis 'gyur tsam re btang drad sman bas phan no ba? spru ba /` gyi thad ka yang na/ la la phud
310a5(mdo 'grel): lga bAng+ga/ sam+b+ha lu/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba bAng+gar/ muN+Di rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu skol gyi rta byas btang kyang phan no/ /` yang na/ shuN+Thi/ a raN+Di/ rA sa na/ de ba da ru/ gu rtsa rnams
310a6(mdo 'grel): so mar tsa cha mnyam gyi thang bsdu lugs gong ma rnams dang 'dra bar byas nas btang na phan par 'gyur ro/ /` grang rlung la brten pa'i yan lag na lga zhing zha dan wa gum skrangs pa sogs shug pa li khri la/
310a7(mdo 'grel): po sa ka pi dza na lo'i 'bru/ thar khom gyi thang chu d+ha tu ra ka ra sa/ guny+tsa dma' rus mgo nag/ bi Sha sman chen/ d+ha tu ra ka thang khrom gyi 'bru/ bi dza rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags la til mar skol bar btab ste byugs na phan par 'gyur ro/ /
310b1(mdo 'grel): ` stong skyugs dang zas gang zos kyang skyugs na/ e la ya tsi/ ka ma la ka Ta/ tshu ba ra gsum cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu grang gi rta byas skyugs mchod bar du yang btang bas phan par 'gyur ro/ /
310b2(mdo 'grel): ` bad kan la brten pa'i glo grag tu lang na/ ke sa ra/ ka ko la ma ri tsi/ ka ma la'i 'bru pip+pa la/ kha sur ba ni tam+ba mar/ la wang+ga rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la 'byor na pA Na dang mnyam du bza' zhing ma rnyed na chu dro
310b3(mdo 'grel): 'jam gyis phul la btang na phan zhing dbugs gur kum kha mi bde bo ris ba la yang drod sman phan no/ /zangs btul ma/ li shi ` yang na/ pip+pa la/ rang+ga ni/ la wAng+ga/ pa rad+gi/ shuN+Thi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btaD
310b4(mdo 'grel): la chu skol gyi rta byas btang kyang phan no/ /` phol mig gi nad la/ pip+pa la/ ka tsa na ba ki b+ha ka li tri pha la rnams cha mnyam drod sman zhib par btags la sha chu skol gyis lga rgya byas btang na bsos par
310b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ ba rang+gi dang/ shuN+Thi/ gnyis cha mnyam drod sman 'bras ka tsan ra'i sogs pa bkrus 'bras bu gsum pa'i khu ba dang mnyam du gar sla zho tsam brdar la rma gang yod la byugs pas myur du bsos
310b6(mdo 'grel): so/ /kha nad la/ ti khu ra/ lga a la ya tsi/ kha yi ra gsum zhib par btags la chus ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril la khar zung na phan no/ /` so rnying nas khrag 'jog na/
310b7(mdo 'grel): a rus/ na ga ra tha rams mo tha ma nu gla sgang/ ka ko la / stong ? kha yir stod ja/ ru ta kuSh+Tha /lorda/ /brtsod ma jiSh+Tha rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la so rtsar btab pas phan zhing so brtan par
311a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /` so srin gyi na na/ tri pa la/ da kha/ gu rtsa/ tsam+be? li ke pa ta/ da ru ha ri dra rnams kyi thang gi steng du sbrang rtsi cung zad re btab la khar?
311a2(mdo 'grel): zung zhing pho bas phan no/ /` sna ya mas skrangs nang na ba dang snag 'bras bu gsum rgun 'brum li khri tsam bi yi'i yog gi za ba la/ skye dang 'di khu ba thon cam las gong ma lugs bzhin bsdu mi dgos bdu ba/ ku su m+ba/
311a3(mdo 'grel): ha ri ha ke/ a na ra ga phul rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags pa chu grang gi sbyar nas zhag drug tsam gyi ring snar blug pas phan no/ /` yang na/ ma ri ci rdog gcig dang son ka sa ra ki bi dza khal po kha che
311a4(mdo 'grel): a ru ra til 'bru tsam bse 'bru'i me tog zhig chur brdar la sna nang du blug pas kyang phan no/ /` mig na ba la/ ras ba ti/ send+ha lo Na/ ha ri ta bo ris ke/ ge ru/ so nag? pa'i 'bru ha la da /
311a5(mdo 'grel): rnams cha mnyam zhib par btaD la chu la sbyar te mig gi mdza' skor la byugs pas phan par 'gyur ro// /` mig na mi na thams cad rgyam tshwe la pan pa'i a ru ra mig sman ni/ bcag ni ram sga ser li dang
311a6(mdo 'grel): dza sta gnyis me ha gi'i khu bas rta byas brdar nas mig la byugs pas na zhi zhing gsal ba brtan pa sogs 'byung ngo/ /` mig la srod lor byung na / su ra ma dang ha la d+hi gnyis dza ba tri'i khu bas khar
311a7(mdo 'grel): sha gang ba'i snod du brdar la mig la byugs bas phan no/ /` mig dmar por song zhing na na/ ma ri tsi pho ris/ bcag? gi ru/ spa? tshwa khi ri lo Na/ gsum cha mnyam lga ser/ dza ti'i me tog zhib bar
311b1(mdo 'grel): btags chul sbyar nas mig gi phyi'i mthal skor la byugs na phan par 'gyur ro/ /khrag la brten pa'i mig na na/ send+ha lo Na nas tsam re snum la brdar nas mig gi nang la byugs na phan no/ /` rlung la brten pa'i mig mi
311b2(mdo 'grel): gsal zhing/ khyad par rgyang mig gsal ba la/ pa ra/ dzasta/ sing+gi mi sri/ muk+ta ka/ rgyab tshwa u Ti ka dam ta/ a ru sa rnamS cha mnyam zhib par btags la khar snod du ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas/
311b3(mdo 'grel): legs par brdar nas mig nang du byugs na phan par 'gyur dngul? chu sha dkar zhing/ mig gi mu tig 'grib la yang phan rnga mor gi so no/ /` yang na/ mri ta hampa / dzasta / nI la tho tha/ pha Ta ki ri/ sa mu
311b4(mdo 'grel): dra phe na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/ de nas khar snod du ba'i mar dang mnyam du legs par snur la mig ? la byugs pas kyang phan no/ /` yang mig na ba la/ zangs bshul? ma sha dkar big san shwe ta dzi ta/ phaT rgya mtsho sbub
311b5(mdo 'grel): ki ri/ tri pha la/ swa ba/ ra sa pa ti/ ha li ma/ ha la d+hi/ lo d+ha rnams cha mnyam zhig par btags / ras dri med pa'i nang du stums la chu gtsang mar cung zad bcug la/ de nas mig zir dkar po la bdugs
311b6(mdo 'grel): na phan no// 'bras bu gsum sga ser // ` yang mig gi rab rib la/ su ra ma/ send+ha lo Na/ shangkha/ ma ni tsha la / tri ku Ta/ ni ra ma li/ sing+gi mi sri/ sa mu
311b7(mdo 'grel): dra se na rnams zhib par btags la khar snod du ra'i 'o ma dang mnyam du snur? la/ de nas mig nang du byugs pas phan rgyam tshwa zhing ling dud tog la yang ldong pos phan no/ /tsha ba gsum /` yang mig 'grib pa/ rgya mtsho sgrub?
312a1(mdo 'grel): ling tog / sha 'jar?/ rib rab la sogs mig gi nad thams cad la phan pa'i spyi 'joms chen mo ni/ zha nye si sa bzhu ba ba dar zhag lon pa'i skyur mo'i nang du blug / de khangs pa dang slar
312a2(mdo 'grel): yang bzhu nas lugs thengs re la dang ba rje thengs re byas pa lan bcu'i bar byas/ slar yang de bzhin gi ba ko Ti'i khu bar lugs thegs bcu byas/ a ka ba na'i khu bar lan bcu/ b+hang+ga ra'i khu bar
312a3(mdo 'grel): lam bcu/ ba'i chur lan bcu / tri pha la'i khu bar lan bcu/ ba'i 'o ma'i sbyir lan bcu / ba'i gci ba slon par lan bcu/ ba'i zhor lan bcu/ til snum la lan bcu /
312a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'o mar lan bcu / ba'i mer la lan bcu/ 'bras bu gsum ni lba'i khu bar lan bcu rnams bzhu lugs rim par byas/ slar bzhu ba'i nang du dngul chu zha nye rang dang brjid mnam pa zhig blug / de
312a5(mdo 'grel): nas 'khar snod gla rtsi dang mnyam du ra'i 'o mas khu ba byas nas brdar te mig la byugs pas kun la phan zhing mig 'grib zin yang phye bar 'gyur de/ /` rna pa na ba la a ka ka ra sa/ la su Na ka ra sa /
312a6(mdo 'grel): ka la ti la gsum cha mnyam bsres la rna bar blug pas phan zhing rna ba 'on nas lo mang po ma song bas yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ da? wa da ru/ ba tsa/ a ka'i khu ba shuNkhi? /sgog skya'i khu ba send+ha lo Na/
312a7(mdo 'grel): til nag khung? tshwa sany+tsa lo na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags ra'i cha la btab ste cung zad skol la rna bar blug na'ang nus pa gong dang 'dra'o/ /` rlung la shug pa shu dag brten pa'i mgo bo lga na ba la/ rgyam tshwa
312b1(mdo 'grel): de wang ru/ shuN+Tha/ ka yi phal/ a raN+Da ka ta la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa bzo lugs gong du bstan pa'i 'bras bu? blug ba'i chu skyur mo des khu ba byas mer cung zad skol la mgo bor byugs pas
312b2(mdo 'grel): shug ba phan no/ /ru ta ~ bad kan la brten pa'i mgo bo na na /de na 'dra'i snum e raN+Da / ra sa ni / kuSh+Tha// many+dziSh+Tha/ ba ca/ be ba ra / na ga ra mo tha rnams cha mnyam zhib bar btags la chur gar sla zho
312b3(mdo 'grel): tsam sbyar me la cung zad bsros te mgo por byugs pas phan no/ /ngan? 'dra ` mkhris pa la brten ru to? pa'i btsid mgo bo shu dag na na/ shwe ta tsan ma cu gla sgang / ngan / se ba / du ba/ ka ta ra ki dza? la /
312b4(mdo 'grel): am+ba la / ka ma la ka ba / hu lu hu lu bi dza rnams ma mnyam zhib par btags la mgo bor byugs pas phan no/ /` yang /tsan dan dang po rlung mkhris bad kan sogs ya rung gdil brten kyang ba la'i rtsa ba
312b5(mdo 'grel): skyu ru ra mgo po na ba'i ka ? ma'i 'bru spyi sman ni/ hu lu hu la'i 'bru kuSh+Tha/ ma ri tsi/ ka pi pha la / e raN+Da ka dza la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags nas gar sla zho tsam chur sbyar la mar cung zad bsros te mgo bor byugs
312b6(mdo 'grel): pas mgo nang kun la phan nges so/ /` yang na/ ru ta pap+pi la/ pho ris ma ra tse lca'ang phye/ dan 'dre'i rtsa ba ha ri ta ke rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/ ? gong gi chu skyur mos gar sla zho tsam sbyar pa mgo bor byugs pas
312b7(mdo 'grel): phan no/ /` skra dkar nag por gtong na / drod sman po ris lu ta tsa r+Na/ ni la tho tha bges na/ a ru ra tri ba la 'bras bu gsum rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags/ de nas lcags snod du
313a1(mdo 'grel): */ tog /b+hang+ga ra sa'i khu bjang mnyam du nyin gsum gyi bar legs par snur gar sla zho tsam byung ba dang ra'i chus gar sla dang ba tsam sbyangs la srong la skra rgya sma ra sogs gang 'dod la sku mnye
313a2(mdo 'grel): legs par byas rjes ras bkab? ste bzhag / sang nyi ma shar ba dang chu dro mos bkrus pas nag por 'gyur nges shing/ slar yang dkar po byung na gong ba zhin byas pas phan no/ /
313a3(mdo 'grel): ` bud med kyi mngal khrag mang du 'dzag nas na na/ ga dza ke sa ra / ti khu ra / shwe ta tsa na dan / ba la lo tsa na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la 'bras bkrus
313a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i khu bas rta byas btang na tshed par 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ ga dza ka sa re dang si ta tha rams gnyis cha mnyam tsan dan dkar po zhib par btags pa thang thun chung phyogs tsam re 'bras bkrus pa'i
313a5(mdo 'grel): khu bas gar sla zho tsam byas btang kyang phan no/ /` yang bud med zla mtshan mi shel dkar 'dzag cing phrug gu mi yong ba la / tum+bi ka bi dza / ya 'a kha ra/ g+hu ra/ pip+pa
313a6(mdo 'grel): la / men pa la / ha la d+hi rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la se hu Da ka du dzas sbyar la ras lder byugs nas mtshan mar bcug ku ha'i 'bru pas byi tsher pa/ zla mtshan dang /bu dam bdud? sman ?
313a7(mdo 'grel): ldan zhing me na'i 'bras bu mngal 'dzin lga sar par 'gyur la / sha ma mthon pa yang thon zhing mo nang dngos gzhi la yang phan no/ /` yang na/ /si ra sa kra pa ta sir pa'i lo ma /
313b1(mdo 'grel): ja ye pha la /ji ? lo mas mu dra phe na/ ba ye bi rang+ga/ e la ya dzi/ ga dza ke sa da rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags pa thun tshang zho re chus ril bu sgril la ba mdog dkar rkyang dam nag rkang sogs kha dog
313b2(mdo 'grel): gang yin yang mdog rgya mtsho'i sbu ba byi thang ka gzhan 'dres /ka ko la /med pa be'u pho skyes pa'i 'o mas rta byas btang bas mngal dang ldan par 'gyur la / sman gtod ring 'bras la ze ma cung
313b3(mdo 'grel): zar btab pa / mar sbrang rtsi ja 'jam pa chwa med rnams las bza' btung gzhan mi gtong / ` yang na / ma ri tsi / shuN+Thi/ /
313b4(mdo 'grel): pip+pa la / /ga dza ke sa ra / rang+ga na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la ba mar bzhu bas rta byas btang kyang mngal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /` yang na/ pho ris ? ga dza ke sa ra/
313b5(mdo 'grel): drong sman a sa gand+ha / si ta/ go lo tsa na rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la pa mdog gcig sa be'u pho skyes pa'i 'o mas rta byas btang na yang sbrum par 'gyur la / sman gtong
313b6(mdo 'grel): ring 'bras ba sdu ba za zhing kar 'o ma gi tang 'thung ngo/ /` yang na / ga dza ke so ra zhib par btags la ba mar bzhu ba'i rta byas nas btungs kyang gong dang 'dra'o /
313b7(mdo 'grel): ? yang nges par drug gu yod ba'i sman myong grub na/ lak+Shu ma na'i rtsa ba zhib par btags la ba mdog gcig ma pe'u pho skyes pa'i 'o mas rta byas btang na nges par mngal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
314a1(mdo 'grel): zas spyod gong dang 'dra / ` bud med phrug gu 'jur nas mi sdong na / d+ha ba ka phu la / ka ma la ka Ta /
314a2(mdo 'grel): ba ma ne Thi / la dza ru rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la/ 'bras bkrus pa'i khu bas rta byas btang na 'jur bar mi 'gyur ro/ /` sbrum d+ha ba'i 'brum btsa' ka ma la'i 'bru /
314a3(mdo 'grel): dma' ru mgo nag gi rtsa ba ma thub pa la/ se hu Da'i 'o ma rkang lag gi se mo rnams dang / lte bar byugs na myur du btsa' nges so/ /` yang na / muN+Da'i
314a4(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba bud med kyi mkhrig ma g.yon la bsdams na yang btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /` bud med kyi mtshan ma chung du gtong na / pa hi / ka se la / pha Ta ki ri/
314a5(mdo 'grel): lo d+ha / kaspu ra / be ra dza re / ka na ya la'i pags pa / ma dzu'i 'bras bu rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la / mtshan ma'i nang du

314a7(mdo 'grel): rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la mtshan ma'i nang du blug na gong dang 'dra'o/ /` yang na / tri pa la 'bras bu gsum lo d+ha / d+ha ba'i me tog / chi pa kha'i rtsa ba
314b1(mdo 'grel): dza mu ni ka twa tsa rnams zhib par btags la / sbrang dang sbyar te byugs kyang gong dang 'dra'o/ /` yang na/ kastu ri dang / kuSh+Tha gnyis cha mnyam zhib par btags la / sbrang
314b2(mdo 'grel): dza mu na'i pagS pa rtsis ril bu skyu ru tsam sgril ba mtshan mar bcug pas kyang gong dang 'dra'o/ /` bud med kyi nu gla rtsi ma chung ru ta du gtong na / a sa gand+ha / don /
314b3(mdo 'grel): ga dza ke sa ra / bibba la/ ka se la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la slar yang chu blug ste brdar la gar sla zho tsam nu mar byugs na chung zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /yang ba spu ba bud med khan pa dkar po
314b4(mdo 'grel): kyi nu ma skrangs na/ drod sman gi wa ko Ta'i shun ba me la bsros nas mu mar slan na 'phral du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /` pho rtag sbom ring mkhrang ba sogs 'dod na / pang+ga dang d+ha tu ra cha mnyam
314b5(mdo 'grel): e na ya la'i khu ba dang mnyam du 'dam btags legs par byas te / ril bu sgril la grib mar skams / de nas skyes pa gzhan dar ma'i chur zho tsam brdar la ring bar so ma ra tsa thang khom
314b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod na / po rtags kyi rgyab dang / sgom ring mkhrang gsum ka 'dod na / sgyer lo ma na yongs rdzogs la byugs pas ji ltar 'dod pa 'byung ngo/ /yang pho rtags
314b7(mdo 'grel): las su mi rung na / a sa gand+ha ba sru pa / pa ra dngul chu / ga dza pip+pa la kong po nas yong ba'i drod sman / ha la d+hi ? ser / ha ri ta a ru ra /
315a1(mdo 'grel): ke rnams cha zhib par btags la skyes pa gzhan gyi chus zho tsam sbyar la pho rtags gyi sgyer lo mnal byugs pas las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ /` yang 'dod pa spyod mi nus ba la/ la dza ru/ se
315a2(mdo 'grel): dzu'i khu ba dang ra'i 'o mar brdar la rkang lag gi sen mo/ rkang mthil/ lte ba rnams la byugs na 'dod pa gcod nus so/ /` yang dangs ma 'phel zhing ro tsa bar 'dod na/ ta lam kha na/ mu sa ri kanda/ lga shu N+Thi/

315a4(mdo 'grel): gze mar mgo ka ba tsa'i 'bru bsbub? du ba'i pad+ma ge sar 'o ma phor gang tsam la btab nas ma nu rta rkang nyin bcu bzhi'i bar btang bas stobs bskyed/ dangs ma 'phel/ 'dod pa ci 'dod spyod nus par 'gyur ro/ / yang na/
315a5(mdo 'grel): kung+ku? ma/ sid+ha ra ma/ dza ye pha la/ ta la ma kha na/ ka ba tsha ka bi dza/ tadza/ masta ki/ a ka ra ka ra/ tu nda lu/ la wang+ga/ te dza ba tra rnams cha mnyam gyi cha gcig /a phi ma cha gcig/ khu ra sa ni a dza wa ni cha gsum rnams zhib
315a6(mdo 'grel): gung sum rgya ? dza nye bar btags/ de nas so ma ka ba tsho'i 'brur tsa'i khu bas ril bu sran ma nyis 'gyur tsam ? sho sgril la nyal gdong ril bu ra thos bal ci 'dod spyod nus so/ /` lus la la phung chung ba kyi bse dri med par 'dod na/
315a7(mdo 'grel): nag pa mo ? sgang/ be la ka bi dza/ bil ba'i byu ? ri ta ka/ a ru ra a mA li aswa li'i 'brus ka pa la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la chu sbyar nas mchan khung 'og la yang yang byugs pas med par 'gyur ro/ /` kha dri mi zhim
315b1(mdo 'grel): pa la/ be la / na ri a ra ki ga ri / ila ya tsi / dza ye ba tri/ ta dza/ ga dza ke sa ra / dza ye ba la rnams cha mnyam zhib par btags la sbrang rtsis rta byas ril bu skyu ru ra tsam sgril ba nyal gdong khar bcug
315b2(mdo 'grel): nas gnyid bil ba nyal na be ra'i 'bras bu'i nang ka ko la dri dan pa/ dza ti'i me tog med par 'gyur ro/ /` dza ti rlung gi nang rigs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la thongs pas chog pa'i spyi 'joms 'chi med ril bu'i sbyor ba ni/ tsi tra ka dang ha
315b3(mdo 'grel): rit? ke gnyis zho sum cu re/ gand+ha ka zho nyi shu/ shuN+Thi / pip+pa la/ pip+pa la ka mu la gsum zho bcu re / kuSh+Tha / na ga ra mo tha / e la ya tsi/ pi Sha/ a ka ra ka ra ta/ ta dza rnams
315b4(mdo 'grel): a nu pa zho lnga re bcas zhib bar mu zi ser po lga btags drod sman pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la pu ra me rnying pa tusta zho sum ma nu gla sgang cu sug rmel sa sman chen brgyad kyis rta byas ra'i chu cung

316a7(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /` shel dkar dang mnyam du btang na bud med bu bcas pa'i bang tshad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /` ra'i chus rta byas btang na mkhris ba'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /` ba'i dar ba

318a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i khyad chos/ slob dpon ha ri ha ri b+ha ci'i gdams pa zab mo ni/ pa la sha ba dze'i? snum legs par ston la/ snum se ba phyed/ sgrang rtsis se ba phyed gnyis/ ba mar se ba mdo ste yongs sgril se ba bzhi'i rtsis res rings
318a2(mdo 'grel): ltar chags rgyun du zos na nyin mo'ang skar ma thams cad mthong/ che ring thung lha dang mnyam/ gzhan gyis bal sha'i? 'bru mthong na lus shin tu ring zhing sbom pa blos mi 'khyung btsam du mthong/ gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas gzhan gyis blags lta

318b3(mdo 'grel): chad pa/ a ru nga bad kan /rlung skran /srin nad/ gzhad 'brum/ lte ba'i rlung gzer /tshaD tshigs na ba/ pho ba spos khrog/ kha dri mi zhim pa/ rlung gi riD/ 'dus ba rnams la mchog tu phan zhing dangs kha 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /` ka ka dzi gi'i rtsa ba nang pa'i chu la
318b4(mdo 'grel): brdar nas rma gang yod la byugs pas mda' gri phog pa sogs rma gsar rnying kun bsos shing khrag kyang chad do/ /khyi smyo ba dang ma smyo ba gang gis rmuD kyang /tsa ra tsi ri'i lo ma phyed dang gsum/ bu ram ba ru tsam re dang mnyam du khong du btang zhing /lo mchur?
318b5(mdo 'grel): brdar ba rma khar yang byugs bas rma myur du bsos zhing khyi dug gi gnod pa yang mi 'byung ngo/ /` sha dpar /rgya mtshal/ lhang cher/ zangs/ lcaD soD 'dul thabs las/ ` sha dkar 'dul lugs ni/ rang+ga zho bcu bzhu ba'i nad du dngul chu zho lnga rlug /de khangs pa dang
318b6(mdo 'grel): ? spang? bu lta bu khengs ldan gyi nad ? zhib mos brgyangs pa'i bkyil du bcug nas kha leD par ba? sha? dkar la soD ba btul ma 'di rnams sman sbyor gang dang gang gi skabs su de dang btul dgos ba byung? na so so'i kha ? rnams dor te btaD bas chog go/ sgrigs/ shi dkar/ de ras brdungs pa bsres pa'i 'dam bag sbyin pos srab
318b7(mdo 'grel): thug nas phyed tsam gyis bstums/ de nas dong khru gang tsam zhig brus la re'i ril mas bkang ba'i dkyil du bcug /de la me sbar te ma mngal tsam la slar yang ril ma bsnan te zhag gsuM gyi bar me ma chad par btang /de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la rdza'i khog mar sa'i ??
319a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i khu ba srad lnga dang mnyam du blug la kha legs par bsdams nas kha mtshams 'byin bas byugs la rlung mi 'gro ba byas te nyin phyed tsam gyi bar shing gi me mtshams mchad par btang/ de nas bton la grangs thag
319a2(mdo 'grel): chod dang rdo gzhong gi nang du zhib par btags/ thog mar gro tsam re dang/ de nas sran ma tsam re dza ti'i bzhi cha re dang mnyam du btang na lus stobs 'phel/ dangs kha bde/ gzhon sha chags ba sogs yon tan mdza' yas ba 'byung
319a3(mdo 'grel): ngo/ /` rgya mtshal 'dul thabs ni/ sing+gar pha srang de bal? ba'i 'bras bu'i kha nas mtheb gang tsam ma chag pa sgor ba'i nang du blug /de nas sgor ba des kha bcad/ ras brdungs ba sres pa'i 'byin pa sbyin pos srab thug nas gang tsam
319a4(mdo 'grel): stums/ de na las dong brus la ra'i ril ma'i nad rgya mtshal na ma gtong lugs yun tshad sogs bong bzhin tshar ba dang bton 'byin ba la sogs gang legs bar byas rjes rgyam tshal bil ba dang dbyer med song ba de rdo gzhor gi nang du legs bar
319a5(mdo 'grel): snur la sran ma cam re li shi rdog bzhi tsam btags pa dang mnyam du btang rkyang yon tan gong dang 'dra'o/ /` lhad tsher 'dul thabs ni/ a b+ha? ka srang lnga/ snum bton pa'i re ma ba cha srang bcu dang mnyam du legs par brdungs te srab
319a6(mdo 'grel): thub bag leb tsam byas la skam thag chod pa dang gci ba'i me'i dkyil du nyin phyed tsam gyi bar bsregs/ de nas bton la grang thag chod ba lhad? chad? dang gi la ko Ti'i khu ba dang mnyam du rdo gzhong nang du nyin gcig gi ring brdar te slar yang srab
319a7(mdo 'grel): thug? bag lebyeng tsam zos/ de skam thag chod pa dang gon bzhin gci ba'i me nang du nyin phyed kyi bar bsregs/ ma he ri'i khu bas nyin gcig gi bar nyed pa dang bag leb tsam bcos nas gci ba'i mer bsregs pa sogs sngar bzhin byas/
319b1(mdo 'grel): pa na bu thi'i khu ba dang mnyam du nyed ba sogs gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la gcig ba'i me nang du nyin gcig gi bar bsregs la/ de nas grangs thag chod pa dang bton la rdo gzhong nang du zhib par btags la ras la btsags/ de nas 'bras
319b2(mdo 'grel): tsam re li shi bzhi tsam brdungs pa'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang bas lus rgyags pa/ brtan pa/ gzi mdang che ba/ rgas kha sra ba/ 'dod ba spyod nus pa sogs stobs bskyed kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /` zangs 'dul thabs ni/
319b3(mdo 'grel): tam+ba mang nyung ji ltar 'dod pa sbrang? gshog legs par thon de mer bsregs/ de snum gyi dkyil du bcug/ yang mer bsregs/ snum nang du 'jug pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas/ de bzhin du rim pa ltar/ dar pa/ ba'i chu kha'i
319b4(mdo 'grel): zangs zho/ ltar bu'i khu ba rnams lan bdun re byas rjes/ de nas rdza snod du ra'i chu zangs mang nyung dang bstun ba'i snod kyi phyed tsam gang ba blug la me btang ste/ chu de skam thag chod pa dang chu gtsang mas legs bar bkrus/ de?
319b5(mdo 'grel): nas dngul chu zangs ye? ba gang yod kyi phyi nad tshang mar mdog dkar par ma song bar byugs/ de steng b+hang+ga? ri'i khu ba legs bar byugs/ de nas zangs dang brjid mnyam pa'i mu ni ser bo btags pa zangs brtsegs pa'i srubs la gang snyas?
319b6(mdo 'grel): yod ba byas nas khag? ma gsar ba'i nang du bcug /khog ma'i kha dam par bcad de kha mtshams 'byin las stums nas rlung mi 'gro ba byas/ de lcags spyod lta bu'i steng du bzhag nas nyin gnyis dang mtshan gcig gi bar mar? mtshams
319b7(mdo 'grel): ma chad bar btang/ de yang nyin dang po lam cung zad chung ba btang/ nyin mtshan phyi ma gnyis la shin tu tsha ba btang/ de nas grangs thag chod pa dang ras kyi khud du stums nas chu gtsang mar 'jug 'don thengs lnga tsam byas/ de rjes?
320a1(mdo 'grel): skam thag chod pa dang rdo gzhod du zhib bar btags/ de nas 'bras tsam re nam zla grang dus li shi dang/ gro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du btang bas pho ba'i me drod che cher bskyed de zas gang zos kyang 'phral du 'ju bas
320a2(mdo 'grel): dangs kha shin tu bde la lus gzim dang dang stobs rtsal che zhing gzhon sha chags pa sogs yon tan dpag tu med pa 'byung ngo/ /lcags 'dul lugs ni/ lu ha mang nyung ji ltar 'dod pa srab thug nas phyed tsam brdungs pa sor
320a3(mdo 'grel): bzhi gru bzhi tsam pa bcos/ de rdza snod kyi nad du bi sa kha pa ri'i khu ba dang mnyam du blug la nyi ma gang tsha sar zhag nyi shu'i bar khu ba skam rim bzhin blug nas lcags bzhag/ zhag grangs thim pa dang bton la slar yang gong
320a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin la phug brtsir ba'i khu ba dang mnyam du zhag nyi shu'i bar bzhag/ de nas bton la sol ba'i me nang du skam bas bzung la dmar por tshig pa dang ba'i chu'i nang du bcug /slar yang sreg 'jug gong bzhin lan
320a5(mdo 'grel): lnga'i bar byas la/ de nas rdo gzhong nad du zhib par btags la nas tsam re nam zla grang dus lga dang/ dro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du zos par dangs ma 'phel zhing lus stobs bskyed la/ mus bar dang mnyam du zas na
320a6(mdo 'grel): rmu rdzing dang skya sbab sel/ a ka ra ka dang la bang+ga cha mnyam btags pa se ba byed do dang/ gong gi lcags phye se ba phyed bcas btang na dbug kha mi bde ba/ glo /mi gser rnams la phan no/ /` zha nye nag bo 'dul thabS
320a7(mdo 'grel): ni/ shi sha mang zha nya nag po nyung dzi yi shi ltar 'dod pa srab thug ras tsam brdungs pa sen mo tsam du btubs/ de dang brjid mnyam pa'i drod sman pip+pa la dang mnyam du rdo gzhong nad du nyin gnyis kyi bar skam
320b1(mdo 'grel): nyid zhib bar byas/ de nas ras la btsags pa se ba phyed shel dkar dang li shi cha mnyam du btags pa zho re dang mnyam du btang na/ lus shin tu ring cing gshed med pa sogs la mdangs dang lus stobs mchog tu bzang bar

320b3(mdo 'grel): zhib par btags la ras la btsags sha tshe ba se ba phyed shel dgar dang ka ko la cha mnyam du btags ba se ba bzhi dang mnyam du btang na tsha ba'i nad rigs thams cad la phan no/ /` bab la 'dul thabs ni/ ha ri ta la tab ki

320b5(mdo 'grel): mtshams pa btags pa'i shing tshag khog ma'i khang 'jog / khog ma lcags skyed lha bu'i steng du bzhag nas me nyin phyed kyi ring bar ma chad par btang/ de nas bton la rdo gzhong nang du a dzyo ba la srang do dang mnyam ras shing gi rtsa
320b6(mdo 'grel): bas khu ba byas la nyin gsum gyi bar du snur/ de bzhin du pa la sha'i khu ba/ /b+hang+ga? ri'i khu ba/ pa d+hu ra'i khu ba/ ku ha Da'i khu ba/ baT ku i'i khu ba rnams kyis rim ba bzhin nyin gsum re'i bar snur la/ de nas srab
320b7(mdo 'grel): thug bag la ba cal bras? la skam/ /de nas khog ma'i nang du pa la sha brdar ba'i phye mas khog ma'i phyed brgyangs? pa'i steng du bzhag /de steng du yang shing phye khongs par blug la kha gcod legs bar sgrigs ba'i mtshams 'byin pas 
321a1(mdo 'grel): bstums nas rlung mi 'chor ba byas/ da ltags skyed kyi steng du bzhag la thog mar nyin phyed kyi bar me chung ba rta ma chad tsam re btang/ de nas nyin phyed kyi bar de las che tsam btang/ de nas nyin mtshan gnyis kyi

321b1(mdo 'grel): chad ba zhom pa sogs bsos so/ /` pa la lo tsa Na dang ba na zho re bcas ba zhag grangs gong bzhin zos na rlung la brton pa'i yan lag zha gum/ gong ba sogs bsos bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du zhag bcu bzhi'i bar

321b7(mdo 'grel): ? dze ti dgu'i bar zos na rtsab? 'di bgyi nad so la lo/ /` bang+ga na'i khu ba zho do dong mnyam du zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos na stsa'i? nad sel lo/ /gsar me tog ti ta par la 'khu ba zho ngo/ /rang+ga ni'i khu ba zho drug dang bcas pa

323a1(mdo 'grel): la bskrung? na/ a kA sha ki ka mi ni bend+he/ ba ha la ki na gi ni band+he/ na be nA/ tha tsau ra si sid+d+ha band+he/ dA he ne na ra sing+ga band+he/ sa ta sa ta hu la band+he/ pany+tsa pany+tsa hu la band+ha /tsau da ha ra ne band+he/ u

323a7(mdo 'grel): roM ki rak+Sha/ yaM ga rak+She yaM gi shwa ra/ ka ? rak+Shai b+hai sa sur/ si sa ra rak+She sI ta la/ hi yo rak+Sha ba ma ha ri/ ba ma rak+She k+She tra pA la/ na bo na ri ba ha tra ko Tha ra rak+She bar bir/ kau na bi ra ha nu min+ta bi ra/ rA dza rA ma tsanra ke pa
323b1(mdo 'grel): yi ka ? ma he sha kuSh+Thi ki ba ha na/ sI tA ke sa ho da la/ me ri b+ha k+te/ ku ru ki sak+ti/ pho ri man+ta i shwa ro ba tsa/ zhes pa 'di dag par gzung la rab mig dmar gzar nam yod dang/ de min zla ba rer mig dmar
323b2(mdo 'grel): yod pa'i tshes grangs gang yin la do ma stongs tsam re khrus byas/ mdun du ras gtsang ma'i steng gro phye/ mar/ kar gsum bsres pa'i ril bu bya sgong tsam gcig/ de'i steng du sind+hu ra tshon tsam/ mar meg?
323b3(mdo 'grel): spos dang bcas bzhag la tshar gsum las mi nyung ba'i gang lcogs de bzlas na gzhan gis sngags/ rdzas/ ting nge 'dzin sogs kyi sgo nas ngan byed byas pa thams cad byed po kho rang la bzlog pa las glags

323b7(mdo 'grel): na(mdo 'grel): so la ka ri taM ma tsu le lai/ dza ra thaM bu / dza ra ka thaM bu/ thaM bu ma ga la ta thi/ dza ra ta te la gi / hu kar yi tham bu/ haM bi sa ka rams khi/ dze hUM dze hUM te la ba re/ si ra u pa ra shaur?
324a1(mdo 'grel): ke sing pa thi/ phu re man+t+ra i shwa ro ba tsa/ sngags 'di blo la bzung la snum bkrug skabs tshar bdun bsgrangs la lag par bus btab la bkruD pas ? ba tshig par mi 'gyur ro/ /` ha tha pa kha ru/
324a2(mdo 'grel): mu kha do uM/ De Da ke ba duM ba ra/ rA dza he ka ruM par ja/ ma hA tha he rga ruM se a ra sa du ba e pai thuM/ sing+ga b+hai ni ka suM/ tsit+to ka re dzi bya tsa re/ ba thuM na ra sing+ga dzi gi mu ha ni/ ra hi dza ga tra mo tsha mi/
324a3(mdo 'grel): de Sho na ra sing+ga ki sak+ti/ me re b+ha k+ti/ /phu re man+t+ra i shwa ro ba tsa/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di tshar bdun bgrangs la chur phu bteb nas kha lag gdong gsum bkrus ta phyin na// rgyal po / rgyal phran/ blon po/ gtso
324a4(mdo 'grel): bo sogs kyis dgyes par brtse bas skyong zhing rang gi 'dod pa gang yin gter la gang smras bden par 'dzin no/ /` ka thus su ba ri tsu Na/ isti ka pe Tha d+he/ paThe ho il ge ma re to mas na ho i/ i dzag dzi bai ho
324a5(mdo 'grel): ta ra ba tsa trai / me ri b+hak+ti gu ra ki sak+ti/ phu re man+t+ra? i shwa ro ba tsa/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di go yu phyed mar btab pa la lan sum cu bgrangs te bsngags la dzar btab ste bud med gang 'dod la sbyin na rang gi dbang du 'dus
324a6(mdo 'grel): nas ci zer nyan par 'gyur ro/ /` sprad bu zi na bo mo gnyis gza' nyi ma yod pa'i nyin zin la dur khrod du pho mo ma nor ba me la bsregs pa'i thal ba ma nor ba so sor tshags byas/ de'i pho'i thal ba bud med kyi skyes
324a7(mdo 'grel): bar byin na skyes pa de dbang du 'du zhing/ mo'i thal ba skyes pas bud sngon la phur pa bo dang rjes la phung pa ?/ med la byin na bu med de dbang du 'gyur nges so/ /` a ra dza ra ko ni da ba re/ a ra dza ra go ra pa ra ba ti ni ra ba re/ do ha i ta
324b1(mdo 'grel): nu man+tha kai/ me ri b+ha k+ti gu ra ki sak+ti/ phu re man+t+ra i shwa ro ba tsa/ ya mas mgo bo phyed na ba la mi zhig mgo bo na ba nas 'dzin du 'jug rang gis sngags 'di tshang bdun ma sod bar gri rtses sa la ri mo mig mangs ris gang mang
324b2(mdo 'grel): bris / sngags grangs tshar ba dang gri rtse ra'i mo'i dkyil du btsugs la nad gang na 'dug dris/ gzhan du 'phos 'dug na de nas zin la sngar ltar byas pas zug zer 'phral du chag nas nang med bde par 'gyur ba ni
324b3(mdo 'grel): myong grub zab gnad can no/ /de ltar shin tu zab pa'i man ngag gi tshogs 'di rnams kyang 'phags yul dbus 'gyur ma thu ra'i rgyal rigs kyi sman pa dgu nA tha los dang mo sman rams pas rnyed pa'o// //
324b4(mdo 'grel): mig 'byer mthong ba don ldan bzhugs so/ /rgya gar shA dzang gi sman pa yul ba ri pu ra nas 'ongs pa'i man ho'i lag len zin bris su bgod pa ni/ de la sman dpyad zas spyod bzhi la/ sngon 'gro /
324b5(mdo 'grel): dngos gzhi/ rjes/ rten 'brel/ sngags rnams so/ /dang por dgongs mo nyal nas san mig mi 'byed kyi bar du zas skom gyi rigs bkag / sprin med nyi ma dro sar nad pa dang sman pa gnyis stan bde bar sngad / yo byad
324b6(mdo 'grel): la/ dkar yol gtsang mar chu // me tro ga dub med pa/ ras dkar dr med/ srin pa la/ gtsags bu / thur ma / phyi'i mig sman yung ba/ nang gi mig sman la bya phung lab 'dra pa/ shing sman gaN+Da pa Ta gsum/
324b7(mdo 'grel): rnga mong gi ko lpags kyi rdar/ rdo rdar 'jam pa rnams bsags rjes/ nad pa dang sman pa gnyis kyi lham phud/ sman pa'i lag pa gtsang bar bkrus/ nas phung gnyis ka'i lag tu thogs nas gsol 'debs bden ba ?
325a1(mdo 'grel): brjod nas nas mthor/ yud tha brdar nas chu dang sbyar bas mig gang 'byed kyi smin ma'i ltag la byugs/ de rjes mig g.yon ma lta bu 'byed na sman pa'i pus mo g.yas bslangs par/ nad pa'i lag pa
325a2(mdo 'grel): spar 'dzings kyi bzung/ de'i rjes mig gi 'grib kyi thad g.yon byed na g.yon zur/ dkar na gnas gang gi mtshams su gtsangs bur nar dkar gyi skud pas skad bcings byas pa'i steng du rgya gram pa rgyab pa'i rtse nas
325a3(mdo 'grel): nas phyed tsam mthong ba des bsnun nas pags pa phebs pa byas rjes thung ma bra bo 'dra bas tshad dar skud kyi mtshams su sleb pa rgyal mor btang/ de nas rten 'brel gyi sogs ma dkar po gcig gi sked pa btubs nas nad pa dang rang
325a4(mdo 'grel): nyid gyi bang la sog ma lag g.yas kyi de g.yon dang g.yon gyi de g.yas la bskyur rjes/ lag g.yon gyi mig lpags yar 'then pa dang/ g.yas kyi thung ma rgyal mo'i sgrib byed 'phan ltar bsgril bas thung mar sgrib
325a5(mdo 'grel): byed 'khril nas rgyal mo nag sing de byung ba dang thung ma'i sbab nas bteb bteg byed pa dang lag g.yon gyis mig gang 'byed kyi tshog sgang du sdeg sdeg byas pas 'grib log byung na sngar ltar bsgril nas bzhag /de nas mig gi
325a6(mdo 'grel): mthong byed du rdzas kha dog sna tshogs pa che ba chung ba'i bar rim par bstan pas phra rags so sor dbye 'byed thub pa yod// de rjes mig la srin bal chur sbyangs pa bkab/ me mdangs kyi sras so pas 'grib byed thon sla ba 'ong
325a7(mdo 'grel): da nas thur mtshur bsgril nas bton/ thur rtse yung ba'i chur bcug pas sgrib byed thur mar 'khril nas dngos su mthong ba yong/ de nas bya phur rgya gar skang la rtho? don dzo ti le 'dra ba/ ni mA'i shing sman /giN+Da pa Ta
325b1(mdo 'grel): rnams chu thig gnyis gsum rdo 'jam po'i steng blug par rim bzhin brdar ba'i skyom sngar gyi thur ma brgyab par bslan/ de'i rjes srin bal chur sbyangs bkab de steng ras dkar yung ba'i khu bar bcug pa
325b2(mdo 'grel): bkab/ rgyal mo dmar nag byung na dar dkar tshwa snum bsres par spabs pa bkab/ dkar po byung na mtshal dkar ma btul ba dang dung gnyis brdar ba'i skyo ma gong ltar bslan/ de nas srin bal chur sbyangs yung ba'i
325b3(mdo 'grel): chur ras sbags pa rim par bkab steng ras dkar gyi mig 'bras bkab/ rdzas la/ byu ru / gla rtsi / gri chung / dngul gsum po mi 'jig gis? go thog tu bzhag nas / sngags 'di brjod do/ /khang+ga rA khang+ga rA/
325b4(mdo 'grel): sA ta saM bud+d+har/ pa la/ gaN+Da/ gau ra/ smau re/ mA le/ be se pA ni(mdo 'grel): /zhes pa tshar gsum bzlas la mig gi steng du phu gsum rgyab pas mig gi nang zug dang bgegs sogs zhi bar byed pa yin/ gri chung
325b5(mdo 'grel): nad pa'i rkang leg? tu 'dren/ yang mig rus dang mig na na/ tsan dan dmar po dang yung ba/ rgya gar gyi btsa g.yug brdar ba'i skyo ma na sar byugs / zas skom chu grang gi zan bya sgong tsam dang/ rtsam pa sman che
325b6(mdo 'grel): gtab pha'i tsha ba brdi ba nyin re kha skom na thug pa phong pa gsum re tsam gang dgos gtong/ zhag gsum gyi bar zas skom 'di ma gtogs mi byed/ spyod lam nyi mo gnyid mi nyal/ ldan pa g.yas g.yon phab
325b7(mdo 'grel): nas mi sdong?/ dgong mo nyal sa steng gshod la 'gro dgos yod tshe dal rus phyin nas nyal zhing rkang pa brkangs cho ga/ de nyin nas bzung zhag gsum gyi bar mig sman mig 'byed pa'i dus dang dgongs?
326a1(mdo 'grel): mig kha phye nas rdzas phra rags bstan pas gsal bar yod/ de'i rjes mig sman re brgyab nas dkrigs ma sngar bzhin byed/ ` rlung rtags kyi mgo dang mi rus la sogs na ba byug? snum bskol ba la// ga
326a2(mdo 'grel): pur/ gla rtsi/ li shi/ pi pi ling/ dza ti/ btsag yug rnams rim cha bskyed nas btab byugs bas phan zhing/ gzhan yang log gnon/ 'gram pa/ 'grib pa/ zhar ba/ gzer ba sogs rgyud ltar shes par bya'o/ /
326a3(mdo 'grel): kye ma shar phyogs rin chen shel gyi gzhal yas na/ bde chen pad+ma dkar po'i gdan khril/ /sku yi rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ deng 'dir zhi ba'i dbang dang byin rlabs stsol/ /lho'i dring man ngag srang ser po/ kye ma
326a4(mdo 'grel): lho phyogs rin chen gser gyi gzhal yas nas/ bde chen pad+ma ser po'i klong dkyil nas/ /yon tan rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ /deng 'dir rgyas pa'i dbang dang byin rlabs stsol/ /nub kyi drang srong dmar po/ kye ma
326a5(mdo 'grel): nub phyogs rin chen mchod gi gzhal yas nas/ /bde chen pad+ma dmar po'i dkyil dbus nas/ /gsung gi rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ /deng 'dir dbang ldan dbang gi byin rlabs stsol/ /byang gi drang srong ljang gu /

326b1(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi bu brgyud slob brgyud thams cad la/ /drang srong rigs lnga sman skyong bsrung mar bcas/ /bskal pa ma stongs bar du byin byis rlobs// //kye' rin chen sna lnga be DUr gzhal yas khang/ /

327a5(mdo 'grel): la brton ba'i rigs mdza' dag la phan/ nyi ma byung na dang/ de min me la sros pa'i 'jug theng gnyis byed/ spong phyed re nad gzhi gang yod la sku nye zhib 'them byas pa'i lo gcig song na zhag bdun tshun la drag /

327b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i ? za ma zhu brtsams? la sngags/ sman ma zhu na dug ril stag pa skred zhas pa yang 'di yin/ 'khyags pa sogs grang ba'i nad rigs kun la phan/ rgya gar gyi la la phung cha la thun che ba ro btab la skol ba'i khu ba phor pa
327b7(mdo 'grel): ngo gsum ? btang bshe pa ? gang rigs byung na phan/ ` grang pa yun ring lo 'das 'grim pa la ko ? ci la ? ne la bsregs pa dad la la phun/ ? thag gsum khram khrum brdungs pa thun che pa gsum zos pa la yan
328a1(mdo 'grel): rtsam ba rtsam thug mdzo zho'i chu ras la btsags pa btang bas phan/ po ba ril bu gsum sdom chung ba la thag btang ba gcig zhib par btags pa'i khu ba mgo bo

328a3(mdo 'grel): la byugs pas phan/ ` so ma ra tsa brdar ba'i khu ba mig gi mdza' la byugs pas na zug che ba la phan/ me la drod 'dugs byed/ ha ha tha g+ha rul g+ha ru ra yi ke kem tsu li/
